40001001	Yesu Kirisito tirɛ anranw boi gɔbe unwɔin: Yesu Kirisito, Isɛrɛlu ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ Dawide tɔgu nɛ goi. Dawide Abarahamu tɔgu nɛ goi.
40001002	Abarahamu, Isakai narun, Isaka, Jakɔbui narun, Jakɔbu, Juda lee, wo suŋɔw leei narun,
40001003	Juda, Perɛsu lee, Jera leei narun. Be na boi Tamarui. Perɛsu, Hɛsurɔin narun, Hɛsurɔn, Ramui narun,
40001004	Ramu, Aminadabui narun, Aminadabu, Nasɔin narun, Nasɔn, Salumai narun,
40001005	Saluma, Boasui narun. Boasu na boi Rahabui. Boasu, Obɛdui narun. Obɛdu na boi Rutui. Obɛdu, Jɛsei narun,
40001006	Jɛse, Ɔgɔnɛ Dawide ba gɔ woi. Dawide, Salomɔi narun. Salomɔ na Uri yaanran pɛii.
40001007	Salomɔ, Roboamui narun, Roboamu, Abiai narun, Abia, Asapui narun,
40001008	Asapu, Josapatui narun, Josapatu, Joramui narun, Joramu, Osiasui narun,
40001009	Osiasu, Yotamui narun, Yotamu, Ahajui narun, Ahaju, Esekiasui narun,
40001010	Esekiasu, Manasei narun, Manase, Amɔi narun, Amɔ, Josiasui narun,
40001011	Josiasu, Yɛkonia lee, wo suŋɔw leei narun. Isɛrɛlu unrunw Babilɔnɛ gana nɛ gunɔ be yai waaru gɔ woi.
40001012	Nɛɛ, Isɛrɛlu unrunw, Babilɔnɛ gana nɛ gunɔ be yai onu nɛ, Yesu tirɛ anranw gɔbe unwɔin: Yɛkonia, Seyalatiɛlui narun, Seyalatiɛlu, Sorobabɛlui narun,
40001013	Sorobabɛlu, Abiudui narun, Abiudu, Eliakimui narun, Eliakimu, Ajɔrui narun,
40001014	Ajɔru, Sadɔkui narun, Sadɔku, Akimui narun, Akimu, Eliudui narun,
40001015	Eliudu, Eleyajarui narun, Eleyajaru, Matain narun, Matan, Jakɔbui narun,
40001016	Jakɔbu, Josɛpui narun. Josɛpu, Yesu na, Mari igɛ gɔ woi. Yesu, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ woi.
40001017	Nɛɛ, Abarahamu nɛ goi ye, Dawide nɛ yai dɔɔ, tirɛ anranw pɛli naisigɛ toin. Iyaa, Dawide nɛ goi ye, Isɛrɛlu unrunw Babilɔnɛ gana nɛ gunɔ be yai nɛ yai dɔɔ, tirɛ anranw pɛli naisigɛ toin. Iyaa, gunɔ waaru gɔ nɛ goi ye, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ nɛ yai dɔɔ, tirɛ anranw pɛli naisigɛ toin.
40001018	Nɛɛ, Yesu Kirisitoi bana narin sɔɔ unwɔ: Yesu na Mari, Josɛpu yaalai bee. Kaa, Josɛpu, Marii wo aamɔ nɛ, Mari Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le bɛrɛ jeɲu.
40001019	Josɛpu inɛ teitai bee. Wo Mari boi yanwan ga ibɛla bee. Kɔɔ dɛi, Mari, bɛrɛ biyaajɛ ga waaru wo iye le, wo baŋiyaan unrun sɔɔ gɔ ɛlu goonɔlu go Marii dadagado ga ajubaube.
40001020	Kunrin ajubau wo wɔu, Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu yaŋawelu le wo bɛrɛ wiyaa, wo le ɔn gin’ gi: «Josɛpu, Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, Marii jeɲɛ ga liyɛnɔu. Sabu wo Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le bɛrɛ jeɲaa wɔɔ.
40001021	Mari, aini nanarando. Ii wogɔ wo ba unrunw gɔbei hakɛ bemɛ nɛ wo yabado. Kɔɔ dɛi, ii gɔ boi Yesu kunɔ.»
40001022	Sɔɔ kɔɔ puu, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ aŋa nɛ Inɛw Baŋa Ama sɔɔ kunu ɔin kibemɔ dɛi bii:
40001023	“Iyaa aala gɔ, bɛrɛ bɛi ye ii nanarando. Ii gɔ boi Emanuɛlu kunɔdɛin.” Emanuɛlu tiyɛ gɔ Ama emɛ le wɔɔ.
40001024	Josɛpu, giri yemaa, Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ wo bɛrɛ bana gi gin’ kanraanbe. Wo Marii ginrun womɔ nɛ jeɲaa, kunaabe.
40001025	Kaa, Mari, aini womɔ yai wo naraindo baa, Josɛpu wo le diinyɛnlu. Josɛpu, aini gɔ boi Yesu kunu.
40002001	Yesui Judea gana Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu nɛ waaru narin le, Ɔgɔnɛ Herɔde, gana gɔ kuu nɛ daanbe. Yesui be naraan, hakilɛgunw tolo jugɔnw duu sibɛ go gowaa, Jerusalɛmu dɔwaabɛin.
40002002	Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ dɔwaa, selumaa kijɛ be gi: «Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛ kanɛ narin gɔ yago wɔɔ? Emɛ tolo womɔ duu sibɛ go iyaa, woi demɛniyɛnmɔi wɛin.»
40002003	Ɔgɔnɛ Herɔde kɔɔ ɛgaa, wo lee, Jerusalɛmu bɛɛnw wooi lee kikinu manaai.
40002004	Wo Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw bemɛ lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw bemɛ lee mɔɔnaa, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tiido gɔ yago narandɛin ma selumaabe.
40002005	Inɛw kɔɔbe ɔn gin’ sain: «Woi Judea gana, Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu ana nɛ narandɛin. Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ turu Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu dɛi Ama ɔn gin’ gi ga sɔɔ wo tɔŋu unwɔ:
40002006	“Judea gana, Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu, tɔgu ma Isɛrɛlu gɔi inɛ teeremɔido gɔ u nɛ goodo. Wogɔ digɛu, Judea gana ana puu logoro nɛ ui ana gailiyɛmɔɲui laa.”
40002007	Herɔde waaru kɔɔ wo ɛgu le, wo baŋiyaan, hakilɛgunw gɔbei boonɔmaa, bemaa waaru inge le tee tolo gɔ goi ma be nɛ selumu.
40002008	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Herɔde, bei Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu nɛ tiiu, be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «E yaai, ibanrin gɔi ɛjii dɛnɛi. E woi iyaajɛi ye, maa kuu ma le woi yai demɛniyɛnmɔ bɛɛ ga, mu bɛrɛ wɛɛ tagai.»
40002009	Kɔɔ gin’, ɔgɔnɛ sɔɔ sɔi gɔ ɛgaa, hakilɛgunw gɔbe Jerusalɛmu gowaa, Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu yaai tɔlin. Tolo duu sibɛ go be iyi gɔ giru bemɛ nɛ yaaube. Tolo gɔ ibanrin gɔ yalu tobe gɔ kuu nɛ dɔwaa, konɛ iŋiyaanbe.
40002010	Hakilɛgunw gɔbe, Tolo gɔ, waaru be iye le, kinɛ bemɛ gaai ɛɛliyaabe.
40002011	Be ibanrin yalu tobe gɔ nɛ yowaa, ibanrin gɔ lee, wo na Mari lee iyaabɛin. Be ibanrin gɔ giru nɛ tuŋiyaan woi demɛniyɛnmaabɛin. Be gelu bemɛ nɛ sin obu tɔgu dɛin dɛin goonaa, ibanrin gɔ bɛrɛ obaabɛin. Be kange lee, mɔi jiɲu ɛju lee, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju turu boi gɔ miire gɛɛu, wogɔ lee obin.
40002012	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Ama be bɛrɛ yaŋawelu le jugɔmaa, bemaa waja Herɔde sibɛ go yaanɔu gi. Kɔɔ dɛi, be gana bemɛ nɛ oju waja le yain.
40002013	Hakilɛgunw gɔbe pilemaa ana bemɛ nɛ yaa be yaa, Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu, yaŋawelu nɛ unruin Josɛpu bɛrɛ tagaraa, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Josɛpu, ingele! Herɔde, ii gɔi daado giye dɛdɛnɛdo. Kɔɔ dɛi, ii gɔ lee wo na lee jeɲɛ ye, Ejipute gana nɛ jɔbɔ yaa. Uwaa pilemɛ ye wɛɛ mu gɛɛido baa, Ejipute nɛ yabiyɛ.»
40002014	Josɛpu digɛ wogɔ tee ingelaa, ii gɔ lee, wo na lee dimɛraan Ejipute yai.
40002015	Herɔde wo yinwɛindo baa, Josɛpu Ejipute nɛ yabii. Sɔɔ kɔɔ le digɛu, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ turu sɔɔ tɔŋu kibaai. Inɛ wogɔ pɔɔlɔ baa Inɛw Baŋa Ama ɔn gin’ gi tɔŋu: “Mu, ii ma Ejipute gana nɛ boonaa, goonaabɔn.”
40002016	Herɔde, hakilɛgunw gɔbe woi jamaatin ga waaru wo jugu le, kinɛ womɔ ɛjii banraain. Wo Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu nɛ inɛw tiyaa bemaa Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu lee, wo le bɛrii ana wɔin lee nɛ, anranw unrunw gɔ puu daiti gi. Ɔnhɔn, hakilɛgunw gɔbe, tolo gɔ waaru iyaabɛin ga wo bɛrɛ be tagu le kɛukɛu, anranguju lɛi goi ye, doɲu go sugo, anran unrunw gɔ puu daiti gi.
40002017	Kɔɔ gin’, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Jeremi sɔɔ gɔ kibaai. Jeremi pɔɔlɔ baa sɔɔ tɔŋu unwɔ:
40002018	“Rama nɛ tɔɔnrɔn ɛgɛmaabe. Sɔmiyɛn lee, bɔnrɔn pii diyɛ lee ɛgɛmaabe. Rasɛlui unrunw womɔ dɛi piiuwɔ. Unrunw gɔbe yinwaain dɛi, wo woi dɔbɔrɔmɔ ga yabalu.”
40002019	Herɔde yinwaan wo yaa, Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu, Josɛpu Ejipute nɛ wo wɔu, yaŋawelu nɛ wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi:
40002020	«Josɛpu, ingele! Inɛw ii gɔi daa ga dɛnɛubɛin gɔbe yinwaain. Nɛɛ, ii gɔ lee, wo na lee gɛli ye pilemɛ Isɛrɛlu gana nɛ yaa.»
40002021	Josɛpu ingelaa, ii gɔ lee, wo na lee gɛliyaa Isɛrɛlu gana nɛ yaabe.
40002022	Kaa, Herɔde aini Arukelausu, wo ba dilɛ nɛ Judea gana kuu nɛ daan ga ɛgaa, Josɛpu, wogɔ nɛ dɛinyɛn ga liyaai. Ama pilemaa yaŋawelu le womaa Galile gana nɛ dɛinyɛn ga wo bɛrɛ jugɔmaa wo kanran, wo kunrin Galile gana,
40002023	Nasarɛtu nɛ wiyaa dɛinyin. Nasarɛtu ana nɛ be dɛinyin gɔ le digɛu, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn nɛ, woi Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛi gɛɛdɛin ga, tɔŋi gɔ kibaai.
40003001	Bai kɔɔbe nɛ, Jan Batise, Judea gana olusolo nɛ gowaa wiyaa, waaju tagai tɔlu.
40003002	Waaju womɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ inɛw le gɛɛbe: «Alagala diinɛ gɔ bɛruniyaain. Kɔɔ dɛi bana ebe dulomɔi.»
40003003	Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi, pɔɔlɔ baa Jan wogɔ dɛi sɔɔ ɔn gin’ tɔŋu: “Olusolo nɛ, inɛ turu mii goonaabe. Kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: ‘E Inɛw Baŋa oju gɔ yegerei. Oju na womɔbe demu demu bojoi.’”
40003004	Jan, sɔi wo tobe gɔ, ɔgɔyɔn kukuli le yegeraabɛin. Wo guju kɛyaa narun womɔ nɛ pagaa sɛbe. Wo kakaa lee, olu yɛin lee le pana unrunmɔ kunɔube.
40003005	Jerusalɛmu nɛ lee, Judea gana nɛ lee, Jurudɛn dibe le ana bɛrii wɔin gɔbe lee nɛ gowaai ye, inɛw Jan bɛrɛ wɛɛubɛin.
40003006	Inɛw kɔɔbe, hakɛ bemɛ sɔwaa be jɛ ye, Jan kɔɔ gin’ bei Jurudɛn dibe nɛ batise kanraunbe.
40003007	Parisiɛn joo lee, Saduseyɛn joo lee, unrunbei batise kanranmɔi wɛɛubɛin. Jan, wogɔ iyaa, be le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: «E yuguru kɔkɔju tɔgu gɔbe, Ama kinɛbanrun wɛɛido gɔ nɛ ebaa ɛli goo ga aa ei tinwinrun?
40003008	Bana ebe duliyaai ga birɛ ebe le tagarai.
40003009	Iyaa kinɛ ebe kɔlɔ nɛ Abarahamu e bai ga gɛɛnu biyɛnɔugi. Sabu mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Ama, tibu e iyejɛ ɔnbei dulomu ye Abarahamu unrunwin bojo bɛbɛɛjɛ.
40003010	Kanɛ baa, gulɔ tiun duu gɔ dɛŋɛido gɔ yɛgaa wɔɔ. Tiun, ii ɛju naraannɛ gɔbe puu kɛjɛ ye yaun nɛ kunɔdɛin.
40003011	«Bana ebe dulomaati tagara ga, mu ei dii nɛ batise kanraunwɔn. Kaa, inɛ turu onu ma nɛ yawɛɛjɛ. Inɛ wogɔ wiyaai ye, wo Kikinu Pilu nɛ lee, yaun nɛ lee ei batise kanrando. Kɔɔ dɛi inɛ wogɔ mu dɛi sigɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ. Halu taga womɔ kɔmɔlɔ ga mu le jaanla.
40003012	Wo kijɛ dɛnrɛn wɛyi womɔ numɔ le gɛli ye wɛɛdo. Wo tɛɛliyɛ womɔ gɔ ɛjii sasagarado. Wo dɛnrɛn ii gɔ guyɔ womɔ nɛ mɔmɔɔnɔdo. Kaa kɔkɔjɔun gɔ yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ tɛtɛgɛrɛdo.»
40003013	Yesu Galile gana nɛ gowaa, Jurudɛn dibe nɛ Jan bɛrɛ unruin batise kanranmɔi wɛi.
40003014	Kaa, Jan woi batise kanran ga yabalu kanrun ibɛɛ bee. Kɔɔ dɛi, ɔn gin’ wo le gi: «Mui batise u kanraun jaan. Yani u mu bɛrɛ wɛɛuwɔu?»
40003015	Yesu ɔn gin’ wo le sai: «Kanɛ kɔɔ gin’ kanran ga yaba. Kunrin emɛ Ama diŋɛ kikibemɔdɛin.» Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo saa, Jan yabaabe.
40003016	Woi batise kunaa kilaa, dibe gɔ nɛ goou wo digɛu, alagala pinɛlaa, Ama Kikinu pelegele gin’ sugaa Yesu kuu nɛ dɛinyɛun wo wɔu iyaabe.
40003017	Alagala gowaa mii ɛgɛmaabe. Mii gɔ ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ɔn Aini ibɛ ma gɔ woi. Wo le kinɛ ma ɛjii aa wɔɔ.»
40004001	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe onu nɛ, Ama Kikinu Yesui dimɛraan olusolo nɛ, jinrun puu kuu baŋa bɛrɛ woi subɔrɔmɔi yai.
40004002	Aga pɛnai, digɛ pɛnai baa, Yesu aŋa pagaa bee dɛi, giyɛ woi aai.
40004003	Kɔɔ waaru le jinrun puu kuu baŋa, genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa, ɔn gin’ wo le gi: «Ui Ama Ainii ye, tibu ɔnbe bemaa buru taŋa giye tɔɔrɔ.»
40004004	Yesu ɔn gin’ aŋa womɔ sai: «Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “Inɛ jaa le sai kɔiyɔɔlɛ. Kaa, sɔɔ Ama aŋa nɛ goojɛ le kɔiyɔjɛ.”»
40004005	Kɔɔ onu nɛ jinrun puu kuu baŋa woi dimɛraan, Ama dɛi ana dɛiin wɔɔ, Jerusalɛmu nɛ, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ daa gɔ nɛ, yalu pala naa pala gɔ nɛ unaa,
40004006	ɔn gin’ wo le gi: «Ui Ama Ainii ye, doɲu gɔ nɛ kili sugo. Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “Ama, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe bemaa ui kajuba giye tɔtɔɔrɔdo. Tibu nɛ kubɔ uwɔ tomɔnɔu giye, be numɔ bemɛ le ui dɔɔn gɛgɛliyɛdɛin.”»
40004007	Yesu ɔn gin’ sai: «Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ ɔn kanran tɔŋaaɲu: “U Inɛw Baŋa Ama uwɔ gɔi subɔrɔnɔu.”»
40004008	Jinrun puu kuu baŋa iyaa, Yesui dimɛraan, kokoo gabu turu nɛ unaa, wo bɛrɛ aduna laamu gɔbe puu lee, ɔgɔ bemɛ lee tagaraa,
40004009	ɔn gin’ wo le gi: «Giru ma nɛ tuŋiyaan mui demɛniyɛnmaajɛu ye, mu kijɛ ɔnbe puu u bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.»
40004010	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu ɔn gin’ sai: «Setanu! Genɛ ma nɛ goo. Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “U Inɛw Baŋa Ama uwɔ gɔ, wo turu sai demɛniyɛnmɔ, wo turu sai baba.”»
40004011	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo saa, jinrun puu kuu baŋa woi yinpaju. Mɛlɛnkɛbe genɛ womɔ nɛ wiyaa, kai womɔ kilaabɛin.
40004012	Yesu, Jan Batisei kaju kunaatin ga waaru wo ɛgu le, wo Galile gana nɛ yai.
40004013	Kaa, wo Nasarɛtu ana gɔ pajaatiyaa, Kapɛrunaumu ana nɛ yaa dɛinyin. Ana wogɔ, Sabulɔn lee, Nɛputali lee tɔgu nɛ, Galile dibe diŋirun nɛ daan.
40004014	Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi sɔɔ tɔŋu gɔ kibe ga kunrin bii. Esayi sɔɔ ɔn gin’ tɔŋu:
40004015	“Sabulɔn gana lee, Nɛputali gana lee, gana dibe le bɛrii wɔin inɛw gɔbe, gana Jurudɛn dibe onu go wɔin inɛw gɔbe, Galile gana, Yahutunw tɔgui laain sibɛ wɔin inɛw gɔbe, sɔɔ ɔn keŋiyɛin:
40004016	Ɔlɔ nɛ inɛw tobɛin gɔbe, be wijɛ diyɛ iyaaɲu. Yiun kini gana nɛ inɛw wɔin gɔbe, be dɛi wijɛ gowaai.”
40004017	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ Kapɛrunaumu ana nɛ dɛinyɛun digɛu, waaju tagai tɔlu. Wo waaju womɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ gɛɛube: «Alagala diinɛ gɔ bɛruniyaain. Bana ebe dulomɔi.»
40004018	Bai turu, Yesu Galile dibe genɛ nɛ galau, ba unrunw iiju aanw lɛi dii gɔ nɛ jɔɔ kamau be wɔu iyaabe. Iiju aanw gɔbe Simɔ, boi waja womɔ Piɛru gɛɛɲu lee, wo bainɛ Andere lee bee.
40004019	Yesu be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mui wɛɛ dimiyɛin. Mu ei inɛw aawin bojodɔn.»
40004020	Ɔgu kɛu, Simɔ lee, Andere lee, jɔɔ bemɛ pajaatiyaa woi dimiin.
40004021	Kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, giru go yaa, Yesu, ba unrunw lɛi waja Sebede unrunw Jake lee, Jan leei iyaabe. Be diikoro gɔ nɛ be ba be wooi jɔɔ bemɛ yegereubɛin. Yesu bei boonaabe.
40004022	Be ginsɛsai be ba lee, diikoro gɔ lee pajaatiyaa, woi dimiin.
40004023	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu Galile gana yalu puu nɛ yaaube. Wo Ama gɛɛn ginrun bemɛ gɔbe nɛ inɛwin deereu, alagala diinɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ tagaube. Wo inɛw jiun puu lee nurun puu lee bajamɔube.
40004024	Boi goo womɔ, Siri gana nɛ, yalu wooi dɔwaabe. Kɔɔ dɛi, inɛw, wo bɛrɛ jiungunw tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee, ɔɲɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee, gana nɛ goi ye jɛɛlɛubɛin. Gamuu kuu nɛ jinruin daan, gamuu tibu sugowin, gamuu inɛw goju yinwaan wɔinbei. Yesu jiungunw kɔɔbe puu bajamaabe.
40004025	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw joo, Galile gana nɛ lee, Ana Pɛlu gana nɛ lee, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ lee, Judea gana nɛ lee, Jurudɛn onu nɛ gana wɔin gɔbe nɛ lee gowaa wiyaa, Yesui dimiyaanbɛin.
40005001	Inɛw kulɔ gɔbe iyaa, Yesu, tetemɛ turu kuu nɛ ulaa dɛinyin. Jaŋu unrunw womɔbe, genɛ womɔ nɛ wiyaabɛin.
40005002	Wo ɔn gin’ bei deerei tɔlu:
40005003	«Inɛw Ama sibɛ go unrunbe dɛgu le wɔin ga jugaa wɔin gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Alagala diinɛ gɔ bemɛi.
40005004	Inɛw kinɛjiun le wɔin gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Ama kinɛ bemɛ kakaaliyɛmɔdo.
40005005	Inɛw kuu unrunbemɛ sunugaa, tɛgɛ sɛnɛ wɔin gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Pui gana gɔ kɛn bemɛi biyɛdo.
40005006	Inɛw kinɛ bemɛ nɛ naran go, Ama bana dɛnɛjɛ gin’ teitai bii dadaaru le wɔin gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Aŋai be dɛnɛjɛ gin’ Ama bei bobojodo.
40005007	Inɛw, inɛ waja amasɔgɔjugɔnw gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Ama amasɔgɔ bemɛ jujugɔdo.
40005008	Inɛw, kinɛpilu bɛɛnw gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Be Ama ihiyedɛin.
40005009	Inɛw logoro nɛ, inɛw jamu jɛɛlɛnw gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Ama bei unrunw unrunmɔi gɛɛdo.
40005010	Ama aŋai dɛnɛjɛ gin’ teitai be wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, inɛw ɔɲɔmu biyaa wɔin gɔbe, Ama be yabu. Alagala diinɛ gɔ bemɛi.
40005011	«Jaŋu unrunw mai e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, ei duyaaɲu ma, ei ɔɲɔmaaɲu ma, kuu ebe nɛ kakalu tɔgu dɛin dɛin maŋaaɲu ma biyaai ye, Ama e yabu.
40005012	Alagala nɛ e tujɔ diyɛ bɛbɛɛdei. Inɛw Ama titiyaanw giru ebe nɛ galin gɔbe, ɔɲɔmu yinbɛin. Kɔɔ dɛi, sɔɔ kɔɔ tunmɔ e bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, naran go kinɛ ebe ɛɛliyɛmɔi.»
40005013	«Yɛnɛi! Aduna nɛ ei nɛwin. Kaa, nɛu, ɛɛlu womɔ manaai ye, wo bɛrɛ ɛɛlu gɔ yani pilemu ye obu bɛɛmɔdo? Bain go woi togoti ye, inɛw bɛrɛ namamɔi laa ye, niwɛn waja sɛlɛ.
40005014	«Aduna nɛ ei wijɛi. Ana tetemɛ kuu nɛ daan baŋi bɛɛlɛ.
40005015	Inɛ, lanpa tanugu ye, taju le kiilɛ. Kaa, yalu wijɛ gaai wo obojɛ nɛ jeleɲu. Kɔɔ gin’ lanpa gɔ inɛw ginrun kɔlɔ nɛ toin gɔbe puu wiwijɛmɔjɛ.
40005016	Inɛw bemaa birɛ ɛju ebe iye ye, e Ba alagala go daan gɔi sɔmɔ ga, wijɛ ebe gɔ inɛw giru nɛ lanpa gin’ wo biyɛmɔi.»
40005017	Yesu iyaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn nɛ lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe nɛ lee sɔɔ too gɔ mu kɔɔlɔmɔi wɛiun ga ajubanɔugi. Mu sɔɔ bemɛ kɔɔlɔmɔi wɛɛlun. Kaa sɔɔ kɔɔbe, kibemɔi wɛiun.
40005018	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, alagala lee, minɛ lee galaidɛin baa, Tɔɔru gɔ nɛ sɔɔ turu ma, halu sɔɔ sije turu kanran kɔɔlɔidolo. Sɔɔ gɔ puu kikibedo.
40005019	Kɔɔ digɛu, inɛ aai kanran, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe logoro nɛ, halu tɔɔru dagii kanran, koturu kajubalu kanraan, iyaa, inɛw bɛrɛ tɔɔru wogɔ kajubanɔu ga deeraajɛ biyaa ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, alagala diinɛ nɛ, inɛ dagii biyɛdo. Kaa, inɛ aai kanran Ama tɔɔru gɔbe kajubaa, inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ deeraajɛ biyaai ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, Ama diinɛ nɛ inɛ diyɛi biyɛdo.
40005020	Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Ama tɔɔru aŋai e gɛliyɛjɛ gɔ, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, Parisiɛnbe lee, aŋai gɛlin dɛi irela biyaai ye, e alagala diinɛ nɛ bɛɛ yooidelei.»
40005021	«E tirɛ anranw bɛrɛ sɔɔ ɔn tagaabɛin ga e ɛgaabei: “Inɛ daanɔu. Inɛ, inɛ daajɛ, woi badu dadaanadɛin.”
40005022	Kaa, kijɛ mu gɛɛjɛ unwɔ: Inɛ aai kanran wo bɔɔnɛ le kinɛ banranmaajɛ, kɔɔbaŋai badubadanw diyɛnw bɛrɛ jɛyaadɛin. Inɛ wo bɔɔnɛ womaa bomɔginɛ giyaajɛ, kɔɔbaŋai kanran badu daanau jaain wɔɔ. Inɛ wo bɔɔnɛ womaa wejeginɛ giyaajɛ, kɔɔbaŋai yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ kunɔu jaain wɔɔ.
40005023	Kɔɔ digɛu, Ama bɛrɛ sadaga jɛɛlaa ye sadagadumu gɔ nɛ wiyaa u wɔnu, kɔɔ nɛ inɛ turu u le sɔɔ yasɛ ga jugaajɛu ye,
40005024	sadaga uwɔ gɔ dumu giru nɛ pajaatiyaa ye, u bɔɔnɛ e lɛi laa yai sɔɔ yegere. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Ama bɛrɛ wɛɛ, sadaga uwɔ obo.
40005025	«Kɔɔ gin’, u jaŋunɛ turu, ui dimɛraan saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ jɛyaauwɔ ye, oju nɛ tonu mainiyaan ye, ɔgu wo le sɔɔ yegere. Kɔɔi laa ye, wo ui saliyɛ kirɛnw numɔ nɛ kukunɔdo. Saliyɛkirenw gɔbe ui garidu numɔ nɛ kunɔ ye, kaju nɛ ui kunɔmɔdɛin.
40005026	Mu naran go u bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, yoru gɔ tujaa, halu kɛturu kanran u le wajaa ye, kajuginrun gɔ nɛ bɛɛ gooidolou.»
40005027	«E be gɛɛu ɛgaabei: “Dimu dimiyɛnnɔu.”
40005028	Kaa, mu ɔn gin’ gɛɛjɔn: Inɛ aai kanran yaanran turu yɛnaa, daariyaajɛ biyaa ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kinɛ womɔ nɛ yaanran kɔɔ le dimu dimiyaanti.
40005029	Kɔɔ digɛu, halu, giri iin uwɔ dɛi, ui hakɛ nɛ yoodo ga wɔɔ ye, giri wogɔ wɔgɔrɔ ye, wagee u kamatiijɛ ire. Goju uwɔ puu sɛɛu wɔnu, yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ u yoi dɛi, goju uwɔ taŋa turu tolo u bɛrɛ ire.
40005030	Nɛɛ, numɔ iin uwɔ dɛi, ui hakɛ nɛ yoodo ga wɔɔ ye, numɔ gɔ polo ye, u le wagee kamati. Goju uwɔ puu sɛɛu wɔnu, yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ u yoi dɛi, goju uwɔ taŋa turu tolo u bɛrɛ ire.»
40005031	«Sɔɔ ɔn kanran ei tagaabɛin: “Inɛ aai kanran yaanran womɔ papajado ye, wo bɛrɛ yaajipolu dɔn tɔŋaa obaa ye, kɔɔ gin’ woi paja.”
40005032	Kaa, mu ɔn gin’ gun: Inɛ aai kanran sala dɛi laa go, yaanran womɔ pajaa wo kanran, yaanran gɔ igɛ waja ɛyaai ye, ainɛ kɔɔbaŋa yaanran wo paju gɔi dimu nɛ kunaati. Iyaa kɔɔ gin’, yaanran pajaaɲu gɔ, inɛ jeɲaajɛ, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kanran dimu dimiyɛnnɛi.»
40005033	«E tirɛ anranw bɛrɛ sɔɔ ɔn kanran tagaabɛin ga e ɛgaabei: “Saba laga ye, kijɛ dɛi saba u lagu gɔ kanranlu kanrannɔu. Inɛw Baŋa Ama dɛi saba u lagajɛ gɔ, saba wogɔ kibemɔ.”
40005034	Kaa, mu ebaa asuu saba laganɔu gun. Alagala, Ama ɔgɔdɔin dɛi, alagala le jɛbi ye, saba laganɔugi.
40005035	Minɛ, Ama kubɔsɔrɔi dɛi, minɛ le jɛbi ye, saba laganɔugi. Jerusalɛmu ana gɔ, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ anai dɛi, Jerusalɛmu ana le jɛbi ye, saba laganɔugi.
40005036	Iyaa, u kukuli uwɔ turu piluniyɛnmɔ ma, gɛunniyɛnmɔ ma kanran bɛɛlɛu dɛi kuu uwɔ le kanran jɛbi ye, saba laganɔu.
40005037	Sɔɔ sɔɔnu, ‘ee’ ma ‘ai’ ma gɛɛi. Sɔɔ waja kɔɔ kuu nɛ baraɲu gɔbe puu, Mɔɲu kuu baŋa bɛrɛ goojɛ.»
40005038	«E sɔɔ ɔn kanran ɛgaabei: “Giri tujɔ, girii, tɔnrɔn tujɔ, tɔnrɔin.”
40005039	Kaa, mu ɔn gin’ gɛɛjɔn: Duguru uwɔ goonɔu. Inɛ turu mamana iin uwɔ pejaajɛ ye, mamana nana gɔ woi dɛɛrɛ.
40005040	Iyaa, inɛ turu u bɛrɛ arugoi dagi uwɔ yabado ga saliyɛ nɛ ui boonaajɛ ye, arugoi na uwɔ wo bɛrɛ yapaja.
40005041	Iyaa, paŋaginɛ turu u bɛrɛ gelu womɔ paŋa le duiyɔmaa kilomɛtɛrɛ turu yaamaajɛ ye, kilomɛtɛrɛ lɛi baa gelu gɔ le yayaa.
40005042	Inɛ turu u bɛrɛ gɛɛn gɛnyaanjɛ ye, wo bɛrɛ obo. Inɛ unrun bɛrɛ yoru kunɔ ga wiyaa wɔɔ bɛrɛ yoru kunɔ.»
40005043	«Sɔɔ ɔn kanran e bɛrɛ tagaabɛin: “U bɔɔnɛi, ibɛi biyɛ. U jaŋunɛi ibiliyɛ.”
40005044	Kaa, mu ɔn gin’ gɛɛjɔn: E jaŋuwin ibɛi biyɛi. Inɛw ei ɔɲɔmɔw gɔbe dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
40005045	E Ba Ama alagala go daan gɔ unrunwin tɔitɔi biyɛ dɛi, e kɔɔ gin’ kanrain. Inɛw ɛju lee, inɛw mɔɲu lee dɛi, wo nai womɔ gogoomɔjɛ. Inɛw teitai wɔin lee, inɛw teitai wɔnɛ lee dɛi, wo anran mimiimɔjɛ.
40005046	E, inɛw ei ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe sai ibɛi ye, Ama bɛrɛ tujɔ ingei bɛɛdei? Halu, sɛgu yabanw gɔbe, be kanran yinkanranɲu.
40005047	E, e ba unrunwin laa ye, inɛ waja poonɔɔlɛi ye, kijɛ sigɛ e kanranjɛ gɔ ingei? Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe kanran yinkanraannɛ ma?
40005048	Kɔɔ digɛu, e Ba alagala nɛ daan gɔ gin’ e kanran kibaa biyɛi.»
40006001	«Kuu ebe kajubai. Ama digi ebe nɛ, Ama dɛi birɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ, inɛw giru nɛ birɛ ye, bemaa ei iye giye kanrannɔugi. E kɔɔ gin’ kanraanjɛi ye, e Ba alagala go wɔɔ gɔ numɔ nɛ tujɔ bɛɛidelei.
40006002	«Nauginɛ bɛrɛ sin waaru u kanranjɛ le, inɛw kuu ulogunw aŋai Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ ma, pɔŋɔrɔn nɛ ma, be kanranjɛ gin’ kanrannɔu. Be boonu kunu ye, inɛw bemaa bei sɔmɔ giye sin bemɛ kanranɲu. Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, be kanɛ baa, tujɔ bemɛ biyaaɲu.
40006003	Kaa u, nauginɛ bɛrɛ sin waaru u kanranjɛ, numɔ nana uwɔ bɛrɛ numɔ iin uwɔ kijɛ kanranjɛ jugɔmɔnɔu.
40006004	U kɔɔ gin’ kanraanjɛu ye, sin u kanrun gɔ babaŋa. Ama u Ba gɔ, sɔɔ babaŋa ihiyejɛ digɛnu, wo ui tutujɔdo.»
40006005	«Iyaa, waaru Ama e gɛɛnjɛ, inɛw aŋa lɛilɛigunw aŋai kanranjɛ gin’ kanrannɔugi. Be inɛw bemaa bei iye giye, Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ ma, ana pɔŋɔrɔn nɛ ma iŋi ye, Ama gɛɛn ga be bɛrɛ ɛjii wɔɔ. Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, be kanɛ baa tujɔ bemɛ biyaaɲu.
40006006	Kaa u kai, u Ama gɛɛn ibɛɛ wɔu ye, ginrun uwɔ nɛ, deun giru go yayoi ye, kuu uwɔ nɛ taan pinɛ ye, Ama uwɔ gɛɛn. Ama u Ba gɔ, wo yalu babaŋa kɔɔ nɛ u le yɔɔ. Wo yalu babaŋa kɔɔ nɛ kijɛ u kanranjɛ iyeuwɔ digɛu, ui tutujɔdo.
40006007	«Waaru Ama e gɛɛnjɛ le, inɛw Ama inin gɔbe aŋai gɛɛnjɛ gin’, sɔɔ buu sɔɔnɔugi. Ajubu bemɛ nɛ sɔɔ joo bemɛ dɛi Ama gɛɛn bemɛ sasaado ga be yinsɛin.
40006008	Be gin’ kanrannɔugi. Ama e Ba gɔ, wo bɛrɛ e gɛɛnmɔ nɛ, wo kijɛ kai e sɛɛ gɔ igii wɔɔ.
40006009	Ama gɛɛnnu ɔn gin’ gɛɛi: ‘Ama emɛ Ba, alagala go daan gɔ, boi uwɔ gaai biyɛmɔ.
40006010	Diinɛ uwɔ wɛɛmɔ. Bana diŋɛ uwɔ alagala nɛ kanranɲu gin’, aduna nɛ kunrin kanranmɔ.
40006011	Iye pana emɛi baaido, emi obo.
40006012	Inɛw emɛ bɛrɛ hakɛ kanranɲu gɔbe, aŋai yaabu emɛ kanranjɛ gin’, hakɛ emɛ gɔ yaabu kanran.
40006013	Emi subɔrɔmɔnɔu. Kaa, Mɔɲu kuu baŋa numɔ nɛ emi yaba. [Sabu diinɛ lee, gɔnrɔn lee, dooro lee uwɔi. Asuu nasuu. Amina.]’
40006014	«Naran go, inɛw e bɛrɛ hakɛ kanranɲu gɔbe, e bei yaabu kakanranjɛi ye, e Ba alagala nɛ daan gɔ kanran hakɛ ebe e bɛrɛ yaabu kakanrando.
40006015	Kaa, inɛw e bɛrɛ hakɛ kanranɲu gɔbe, e bei yaabu kanraanlɛi ye, e Ba Ama yaa hakɛ ebe e bɛrɛ yaabu kanraindolo.»
40006016	«Nɛɛ, waaru aŋa e pagajɛ le, inɛw aŋa lɛilɛigunw gin’, girupala ebe yaŋujiyɛmɔnɔugi. Inɛw puu bemaa aŋapagu le wɔin ga iye giye, be girupala yaŋujiyɛmɔ ye gɛliyɛɲu. Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, be kanɛ baa tujɔ bemɛ biyaaɲu.
40006017	Kaa, u aŋa pagaa wɔu ye, girupala uwɔ mɔŋɔ ye, kukuli uwɔ ɛjii yegere.
40006018	Kɔɔ gin’ uwaa aŋapagu le wɔɔ ga, inɛw jugɔidenɛ. Kaa, u Ba, yalu babaŋa nɛ wɔɔ gɔ, wo turu sai bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ. Wo sɔɔ babaŋa ihiyejɛ digɛu, ui tutujɔdo.»
40006019	«Aduna ɔn nɛ kijɛ mɔɔnɔnɔugi. Aduna nɛ peru lee, kɔjɔ lee, kijɛ gɔbe yamulutiiɲu. Gugunyɔnw kanran taan wɔlugu ye, kijɛ mɔɔni gɔ balajɛɛɲu.
40006020	Kaa, kijɛ ebe alagala nɛ mɔɔnɔi. Alagala nɛ peru ma kɔjɔ ma wɔlɔ. Gugunyɔnw kanran taan wɔlugɔ ma, kijɛ bala ma wɔlɔ.
40006021	Sabu kijɛ uwɔ yalu wɔɔ gɔ nɛ, kinɛ uwɔ kanran yalu wogɔ nɛ biyɛjɛ.»
40006022	«Giri, goju nɛ lanpa gin’ wɔɔ. Giri uwɔ sɛɛu wɔɔ biyaai ye, goju uwɔ puu wijɛ nɛ too.
40006023	Kaa, giri uwɔ sɛɛu laa biyaa ye, goju uwɔ puu ɔlɔ nɛ too. Nɛɛ wijɛ u nɛ too gɔ ɔlɔi biyaai ye, u ɔlɔ diyɛ naa diyɛ nɛ tou.»
40006024	«Nɛɛ, inɛ turu kanran kuu bɛɛnw lɛi dɛi birɛ birɛ bɛɛidolo. Wo koturu baŋai ibɛi biyaa, waja gɔi ibɛi biyɛlu kanrun ye koi. Koturu baŋa birɛ nɛ kuu womɔ obaa ye, waja gɔ birɛ nɛ kuu kunɔlu kanrun ye koi. Ama dɛnɛ lee, kɛɛlɛ dɛnɛ lee, e sɔɔ kɔɔbe lɛi kubɔ tunmɔ kanrun bɛɛidelei.»
40006025	«Nɛɛ, e bɛrɛ kijɛ mu gɛɛjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Pana ebe dɛi, diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Kijɛ e kayaido dɛi ma, kijɛ e nɔɔido dɛi ma diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Kinrun, kayɛrɛ dɛi irela ma? Iyaa, sɔi goju ebe nɛ e kunɔido dɛi, diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Goju, sɔi dɛi irela ma?
40006026	Sasaabe bana yɛnɛi. Be toi tɔɔnɛ, gɛlu gɛlɛɛnɛ. Guyɔ nɛ, dɛnrɛn mɔɔnɔidenɛ. Kaa, Ama e Ba alagala nɛ daan gɔ, pana bemɛ tɔtɔɔjɛ. Ei sigɛ le sasaabe dɛi irela ma?
40006027	Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ aa kuu womɔ dɛi jiire wo jiirejɛ dɛi, kinruntaun womɔ, halu gaila kanran baru bɛɛjɛ?
40006028	«Iyaa, inge dɛi sɔi e yooido dɛi jiire le biyɛdei? Minɛ nɛ kinrunbɔmɔbe aŋai puyo be puyojɛ ajubu yɛnɛi. Be birɛ birɛɛnɛ. Sɔi kanran tiyɛɛnɛ.
40006029	Kaa naran go, halu, Ɔgɔnɛ Salomɔ, ɔgɔ womɔ wooi nɛ, puyo kɔɔbe baa saŋa saŋiyɛnlu.
40006030	Puyobe, iye kowɔnu, yogo yaun nɛ kunɔɲu gɔ, Ama kɔɔ gin’ bei sasaŋaranjɛ biyaai ye, wo wogɔ dɛi sigɛ duŋu ebe gooidolo ma? Gagawu ebe gaila de!
40006031	Nɛɛ, diyɛdai le bii ye, e inge kayadɛin ma, inge nɔɔdɛin ma, inge goriyedɛin ma gɛɛnɔugi.
40006032	Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, kijɛ kɔɔbe puu dɛi diyɛdai le be biyɛjɛ. Kaa, Ama e Ba alagala go daan gɔ, e kijɛ kɔɔbe puu kai yasɛi ga igii wɔɔ.
40006033	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ Ama diinɛ lee, teitai womɔ lee dɛnɛi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, kijɛ wajunw gɔbe puu kuu ebe nɛ boru babaradɛin.
40006034	Kɔɔ digɛnu, yogo kai dɛi diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Yogo, kai womɔ sagu wo duiyɔdo. Bai puu ɔɲɛ womɔi. Iyaa, bai tuturu ɔɲɛ duiyɔun baa wɔɔ.»
40007001	«Ama ei jaruganɔu giye, inɛw wajunwin jaruganɔugi.
40007002	Kaa, e inɛwin jarugauwɔi ye, bana bei e jarugu le kɛukɛu Ama bana wogɔ gin’ tee ei yinjarugado. Iyaa inɛw mɔ gelu le e tunwɔnjɛ gɔ, Ama gelu wogɔ le ebe tunwɔndo.
40007003	Giri uwɔ nɛ lalu too gɔ kajubaalɛu, u bɔɔnɛ giri nɛ keri too gɔ inge dɛi iyejɛu?
40007004	Iyaa giri uwɔ nɛ lalu wo tonu, u bɔɔnɛ womaa giri womɔ nɛ keri too gɔ goonɔmu yani gɛɛ bɛɛjɛu?
40007005	U aŋa lɛilɛiginɛ gɔ, giri uwɔ nɛ lalu too gɔ laa, yai goonɔ. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, u bɔɔnɛ giri nɛ keri too gɔ goonɔ ga sɛɛu giri ihiyedou.
40007006	«Iju bemaa kigelemaa ye ei kɛrɛnɔu ga, kijɛ ɛjaa wɔɔ be bɛrɛ obonɔugi. Tolu bemaa, dugɔi ebe kubɔ le namanɔu ga, be bɛrɛ wogɔ kamu tiinɔugi.»
40007007	«Gɛɛin, e bɛbɛɛdei. Dɛnɛi, e ihiyedei. Mɔnɔgolo taan gɔ tɔgɔi, e dɛi pipinɛlɛdɛin.
40007008	Inɛ gɛɛnjɛ, bɛbɛɛjɛ. Inɛ dɛnɛjɛ, ihiyedo. Inɛ taan tɔgɔjɛ, wo dɛi taan pipinɛlɛdɛin.
40007009	Nɛɛ, logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ aa, aini womɔ wo bɛrɛ buru gɛnyaanjɛ ye, tibu wo bɛrɛ obodo?
40007010	Maa iiju wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaanjɛ ye, yuguru obodo?
40007011	E inɛw mɔɲu gɔbe, unrunw ebe bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju aŋai oboɲu igii wɔi ye, Ama e Ba alagala go daan gɔ, inɛw wo bɛrɛ gɛɛnw bɛrɛ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ kijɛ ɛju oboidolo ma?
40007012	«Inɛw, kijɛ e bɛrɛ kanran ga e ibɛ puu, e yaa kijɛ wogɔbe be bɛrɛ kanrain. Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn gɔ nɛ lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe nɛ lee, sɔɔ Ama kanran ga, wo tɔɔru gɔ kɔɔ woi.»
40007013	«Mɔnɔgolo ɛmu gɔ le yoi ye, galai. Mɔnɔgolo wanu gɔ suyi oju mɔnɔgoloi. Inɛw joo, mɔnɔgolo wogɔ le galaa ye, oju wanu gɔ nɛ yaauwɔin. Wogɔ nɛ yaa ga, naula.
40007014	Kaa, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ oju mɔnɔgolo gɔ ɛmi wɔɔ. Oju womɔ gɔ nawin wɔɔ. Inɛw gaila sai oju wogɔ iyeɲu.»
40007015	«Inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw dɛi, kuu ebe kajubai. Be peju le murin biyaa, logoro ebe nɛ yooɲu. Kaa, kɔlɔ bemɛ nɛ bei tataa mɔɲubei.
40007016	E birɛ bemɛ bana le bei jugɔdei. Resɛn ilɛ, teɲu na nɛ pala bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ ma? Iyaa, gaa ii, ɛɲɛ anran jijii nɛ pala bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ ma?
40007017	Tiun na ɛju, ii ɛju naranjɛ. Kaa tiun na mɔɲu, ii mɔɲu naranjɛ.
40007018	Tiun ɛju, ii mɔɲu naran bɛɛidolo. Tiun mɔɲu kanran, ii ɛju naran bɛɛidolo.
40007019	Kɔɔ dɛi, tiun na, ii ɛju naraanlɛ gɔ, kɛjɛ ye yaun nɛ kunɔɲu.
40007020	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’ inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw gɔbe, e birɛ bemɛ bana le bei jugɔdei.»
40007021	«Inɛw maa ‘Inɛw Baŋa, Inɛw Baŋa’ gɛɛɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ, puu alagala diinɛ nɛ bɛɛ yooidenɛ. Kaa, mu Ba Ama, alagala go daan gɔ diŋɛ kanranw gɔbe be yoodo.
40007022	Aduna saliyɛ bai kireidɛin, inɛw joo mu le gɛgɛɛdɛin: ‘Inɛw Baŋa, Inɛw Baŋa, emɛ boi uwɔ le Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔnɛ ma? Emɛ boi uwɔ le inɛw kuu nɛ jinrun nananɛ ma? Emɛ boi uwɔ le taanrinyɛn joo kanrannɛ ma?’
40007023	Kaa, mu aŋa bemɛ sasaadɔn: ‘Mu ei inɔn. Asuu ei inɔn. Genɛ ma nɛ dɔrɔ gooi, e mɔɲu kanranwin.’ »
40007024	«Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ aai kanran sɔɔ mu sɔi ɔnbe puu keŋiyaan wogɔ gin’ kanraanjɛ biyaai ye, inɛ wogɔ inɛ sɔɔ jugɔnɛ, ginrun womɔ tibu kuu nɛ ujaa sɛɛ le murin wɔɔ.
40007025	Anran miyaan, goro wiyaa, ooɲɔ suyaa ginrun kɔɔi lagaabe. Kaa, duu womɔ tibu kuu nɛ daan gɔ dɛi, ginrun gɔ wololu.
40007026	Kaa, inɛ aai kanran sɔɔ mu sɔi ɔnbe keŋiyaan, wogɔ gin’ kanranlu ye, inɛ wogɔ bomɔginɛ ginrun womɔ sɔsɔun kuu nɛ ujaa sɛɛ le murin wɔɔ.
40007027	Anran miyaan, goro wiyaa, ooɲɔ suyaa ginrun kɔɔi lagaabe. Ginrun gɔ wolaa, yanwan womɔ gaai biyaabe.»
40007028	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ deeru wo deeraa, inɛw kulɔ woi ɛgin gɔbe deeru bana wo deerejɛ gɔ bei ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe.
40007029	Deeru bana wo deereu bee gɔ lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw bemɛ mɔ gɔ lee ɛjii kabu yatobe. Wo gɔnrɔn le bei deereube.
40008001	Yesu tetemɛ gɔ nɛ gowaa wo sugaa, inɛw joo woi dimiyaanbɛin.
40008002	Kɔɔ gin’ nɛwɛnginɛ turu, giru womɔ nɛ wiyaa tuŋiyaan ɔn gin’ wo bɛrɛ gi: «Mu Baŋa, u ibɛɛ wɔu ye, nɛwɛn ma gɔ ɛjɛmu bɛbɛɛdou.»
40008003	Yesu numɔ wajaraa, ainɛ gɔi tabaa, kijɛ gi: «Mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Ui ɛjaai biyɛ.» Yesu kɔɔ gin’ gɛɛu wo digɛu, nɛwɛn gɔ ainɛ gɔ nɛ gowaai.
40008004	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu wo le ɔn gin’ gi: «Ɛjii keŋiyɛn! Ui bajaai ga inɛ kanma bɛrɛ sɔɔnɔu. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ gɔ bɛrɛ yaa. Ui bajaai ga, wo bɛrɛ tagara. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ui naran go bajaai ga inɛw puu bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛi biyɛ ga Mɔise, nɛwɛnginɛ bajaai ye, sadaga jɛɛlɛ wo gi gɔ, wogɔ jɛɛlɛ.»
40008005	Yesu, waaru Kapɛrunaumu ana nɛ wo yoi le, sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa turu genɛ womɔ nɛ wiyaa,
40008006	ɔn gin’ wo bɛrɛ gɛɛn gɛin: «Mu Baŋa, birɛbirɛnɛ ma, goju gɔ yinwaan, ginrun go ɛjii ɔɲɔu yadiin.»
40008007	Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Mu woi bajugai yayaadɔn.»
40008008	Sɔludasu kuu baŋa gɔ saa: «Mu Baŋa, ginrun ma nɛ u yooun, mu le dagalu. Kaa sɔɔ turu sai gɛɛ. Birɛbirɛnɛ ma gɔ babajado.
40008009	Mu, kuu ma bɛɛnw diŋɛ nɛ wɔun. Iyaa, mu yaa sɔludasu unrunw gamuu bɛrɛ tɔɔru obo bɛbɛɛjɔn. Koturu baŋa womaa yaa gun ye, wo yayaajɛ. Lee womaa wɛɛ gun ye, wɛwɛɛjɛ. Iyaa, gunɔnɛ ma womaa ɔn kanran gun ye, kakanranjɛ.»
40008010	Yesu waaru sɔɔ kɔɔ wo ɛgu le, wo bɛrɛ maunɛ kanraanbe. Inɛw woi dimɛbɛin gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, halu, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu nɛ kanran mu gagawu ɔn tunmɔ iyetɛlun.
40008011	Ɛjii keŋiyɛin, inɛw joo duu sibɛ nɛ lee, dudaga sibɛ nɛ lee goi wɛi ye, Abarahamu lee, Isaka lee, Jakɔbu lee, be wooi mɔrin ye, alagala diinɛ nɛ jaa kakayadɛin.
40008012	Kaa, diinɛ gɔ nɛ inɛw yooun jaan gɔbei bain go, ɔlɔ yalu nɛ kamatiidɛin. Be wogɔ nɛ, pii piinu, tɔnrɔn tɛnwɛnnu biyɛdɛin.»
40008013	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, sɔludasu kuu baŋa gɔ le kijɛ gi: «Ginrun uwɔ nɛ yaa. Kijɛ bibiyɛdo ga u gawu gɔ, u bɛrɛ kakanrandɛin.» Waaru Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔi gɔ le tee, birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ bajaai.
40008014	Yesu kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, Piɛru ginrun nɛ yai. Wo Piɛru yaanran na teenu nɛ kɛbaamu le wo diiun yaa tɛmu.
40008015	Yesu, yaanran gɔ numɔ aa wo kanran kɛbaamu gɔ woi pajaati. Wo ingelaa, Yesu bɛrɛ pana oboi yintɔlu.
40008016	Bai wogɔ tee, digɛnai wo sugaa, inɛw jinrun kuu bemɛ nɛ daain joo, Yesu bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabɛin. Yesu sɔɔ womɔ le jinrun gɔbe inɛw kuu nɛ nana goonɔube. Wo iyaa, jiungunw wajunw gɔbe puu bajamaabe.
40008017	Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi sɔɔ kibe ga, Yesu sɔɔ kɔɔbe kanraanbe: “Wo kuu womɔ le, yɛbɛlɛ emɛ jeɲaabe. Jiun emɛ gɔbe goonaa emɛ le wagee bojaabe.”
40008018	Inɛw kulɔ woi gɔŋaa gɛlin ga iyaa, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ tɔɔraa, bemaa dibe diŋirun waja go galamɔ gi.
40008019	Kɔɔ waaru le, Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ turu Yesu genɛ nɛ dɔwaa, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, yalu u yaaido wooi nɛ mu ui didimiyɛndɔn.»
40008020	Kaa Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Yurugube bonɔ yasin. Sasaabe kuru yasin. Kaa, Inɛ Aini gɔ, yalu kuu tuŋɔrɔnɲu kanran sɛlɛ.»
40008021	Inɛ waja iyaa Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu Baŋa, u mu bɛrɛ mu ba yiun laa yai mu bojomɔ.» Inɛ wogɔ Yesu jaŋu ii bee.
40008022	Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Mui wɛɛ dimiyɛn. Inɛw yiun gɔbe pajaa ye, yiun bemɛ be bojomɔ.»
40008023	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu diikoro nɛ yowaa, jaŋu unrunw womɔ be wooi gowaa yinyain.
40008024	Dibe gɔ nɛ yaau be wɔu, kubɔ turu ooɲɔ diyɛ ingelaai. Diigunu ɛjii ingelaa ye, diikoro gɔi kimɛube. Kaa, kɔɔ waaru le Yesu giri yeiyeube.
40008025	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe yaa, woi yemɛlaa, ɔn gin’ wo le gin: «Inɛw Baŋa, emi suiyoido. Emi yaba.»
40008026	Yesu be le saa gi: «Inge sabu dɛi e ɔn baa liyaa wɔi? Gagawu ebe gaila!» Kɔɔ gin’ giyaatiyaa, wo ingelaa ooɲɔ gɔ lee, dibe dii gɔ lee ganwaanbe. Kunrin, yalu gɔ kelemu biyaai.
40008027	Inɛw puu bɛrɛ sɔɔ gɔ maunɛ kanraanbe. Kɔɔ dɛi, be ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Aa! Inɛ ɔn inɛ inge tɔgui? Halu ooɲɔ lee, dibe dii lee, sɔɔ womɔ yabauwɔin.»
40008028	Yesu, dibe gɔ kɛjaa taŋaa, waaru Gadara gana nɛ wo dɔi le, anranw lɛi, ɔnsain yalu nɛ gowaa wo bɛrɛ wɛin. Inɛw gɔbe jinrun bei ɛjii ɔɲɔmɔube. Iyaa, weje bemɛ saii mɔɲi bee gɔ digɛu, inɛw taŋa be bee gɔ le, oju galabenɛ.
40008029	Anranw kɔɔbe, Yesu bɛrɛ wiyaa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Ama Aini, uwɔ ingei? Emi ɔɲɔmɔu waaru dɔɔlu wo wɔnu, u emi ɔɲɔmɔdou ma?»
40008030	Yalu kɔɔ le gaila wagee, tolu kulɔ belu tɛnwɛun yabɛin.
40008031	Jinrun gɔbe, Yesu bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, gin: «U emi nananadou ye, tolu gɔbe nɛ emi tii.»
40008032	Yesu bemaa yaa gi. Be anranw lɛi gɔbe nɛ gowaa, yaa tolu gɔbe nɛ yoin. Tolu gɔbe nɛ yoou be digɛu, tolu kulɔ gɔ puu kokoo daa gɔ nɛ gowaa, ɔgu jɔbaa, dibe gɔ nɛ wiyaa yowaa suiyaain.
40008033	Kɔɔ gin’ wo biyaa, inɛw tolu gɔbe girɛubɛin gɔbe jɔbaa, ginrun wiyaa, sɔɔ gɔ puu inɛw bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Sigɛ le, anranw lɛi kuu nɛ jinrun daanbe gɔ bɛrɛ sɔɔ bii gɔ tagaabɛin.
40008034	Kɔɔ gin’ be tagaa, ana gɔ puu jɔbaa, Yesu bɛrɛ wɛin. Waaru woi be iye le, be wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, womaa gana unrunbemɛ nɛ goojɛ gin.
40009001	Yesu pilemaa diikoro nɛ yowaa, dibe gɔ kɛjaa taŋaa, ana wo daanbe gɔ nɛ yai.
40009002	Kɔɔ nɛ wo dɔwaa, inɛw, ainɛ goju sanaai turu pɛnrɛnpanran le duiyaa, wo bɛrɛ jɛɛlin. Yesu, inɛw gɔbe aŋai wo le gawaa be wɔɔ gɔ iyaa, jiunginɛ gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Aini ma, anrangaju kunɔ. Hakɛ uwɔ yaabu kanraantin.»
40009003	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Ama tɔɔru deerenw, yalu gɔ nɛ wɔu, kinɛ bemɛ nɛ ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Inɛ ɔn, Ama boi yamalauwɔ.»
40009004	Yesu, kinɛ bemɛ ajubu jugɔube gɔ digɛu, be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «E inge dɛi, kinɛ ebe nɛ ajubu mɔɲu kɔɔ ajubauwɔi?
40009005	Yɛnɛi! Ainɛ ɔn womaa, hakɛ womɔ yaabu kanraantin aŋa le gɛɛ lee, womaa ingele ye yoi yaa gɛɛ lee, kolɛi logoro nɛ yagɔ naaran?
40009006	Kaa Inɛ Aini gɔ, aduna nɛ inɛw bɛrɛ hakɛ bemɛ yaabu kanranɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔdɔn.» Kunrin, ainɛ goju sanaai gɔ le kijɛ wo gi: «Ingele, pɛnrɛnpanran uwɔ jeɲɛ, ginrun uwɔ nɛ yaa.»
40009007	Ainɛ gɔ ingelaa ginrun womɔ nɛ yai.
40009008	Inɛw, sɔɔ kɔɔ waaru be iye le, liliyɛ le jowaabɛin. Ama, inɛw bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn kɔɔ tunmɔ wo obu gɔ dɛi, be boi womɔ sɔmɔubɛin.
40009009	Yesu yalu kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, oju womɔ digiyaa yaau, sɛgu yabu yalu nɛ ainɛ turu Matiu gɛɛu wo daaun iyi. Wo wo le sɔwaa gi: «Wɛɛ mui dimiyɛn.» Matiu ingelaa woi dimiyaanbe.
40009010	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, Matiu ginrun nɛ jaa kayau daanbe. Jaa kayau wo wɔu, sɛgu yabanw joo lee, inɛw boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔin wajabe joo lee wiyaa, Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee, be wooi mɔrinyaan jaa kayaubɛin.
40009011	Parisiɛnbe wogɔ iyaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Jaŋudeerenɛ ebe gɔ, sɛgu yabanw lee, inɛw boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔin lee, inge dɛi be le mɔrinyaan jaa kayauwɔ?»
40009012	Yesu wogɔ ɛgaa, be le sɔwaa gi: «Inɛw sɛɛu wɔin gɔbe, jɔŋujɔŋɔnɛ kai sɛnɛ. Inɛw jiungunw, jɔŋujɔŋɔnɛ kai be sɛɛ.»
40009013	Yesu iyaa gimaa be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Yai ye, sɔɔ ɔn tiyɛ womɔ ɛjii lubo yɛnɛi: “Kijɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ gɔ, inɛw, bɛlu sadaga, be tɛgɛrɛjɛ gɔi laa. Kaa amasɔgɔjugɔ aŋai be sɛɛ gɔ, mu wogɔi lugojɔn.” Iyaa, mu, inɛw teitai wɔin dɛi wɛɛlun. Kaa inɛw hakɛ kanranw dɛi wɛiun.»
40009014	Jan Batise jaŋu unrunw gɔbe Yesu genɛ nɛ dɔwaa ɔn gin’ wo bɛrɛ selumi: «Parisiɛnbe lee, emɛ lee, emɛ wooi aŋa papagaɲu. Inge dɛi jaŋu unrunw uwɔ gɔbe aŋa pagaanɛ wɔin?»
40009015	Yesu saa: «Purupagu bai gɔ, akana anrunge gɔbe, akana le wɔnu, yiundɔin daain gin’ kanran bɛbɛɛdɛin ma? Asuu. Kaa, bai yawɛɛjɛ, akana gɔ be le kabugutiidɛin. Kɔɔ waaru le be aŋa papagadɛin.»
40009016	Yesu sɔɔ kɔɔ kuu nɛ gimaa ɔn gin’ taanrinyɛn dain: «Inɛ turu kanran, sɔi kana pɛlɛ ye, sɔi pɛi kuu nɛ daŋaalɛ. Wogɔ gin’ kanraan ye, sɔi gɔ biɲiyaain ye, kaaru gɔ babariyɛjɛ.
40009017	Iyaa inɛ turu kanran kɔɲɔ ilɛ, umulu pɛibe nɛ kunɔɔlɛ. Wogɔ gin’ kanraan ye, kɔɲɔ gɔ waaru ilɛnu wo yaajɛ, umulu gɔbe popojodɛin. Kɔɲɔ gɔ totogiyedo. Iyaa umulu gɔbe yaa yayanwandɛin. Kɔɔ dɛi kɔɲɔ ilɛ gɔ, umulu kanabe nɛ kunɔɲu. Kɔɔ gin’ yanwan biyɛidolo.»
40009018	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔu wo gɛlɛu, Yahutunw inɛ giru tobe turu wiyaa, giru womɔ nɛ tuŋiyaan, ɔn gin’ wo le sɔi: «Iyaa ma, kanɛ sai sai kinrun gowaai. Kaa, kuu womɔ nɛ wɛɛ numɔ yaŋaraan ye, Ama gɛɛn. Wo ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.»
40009019	Yesu ingelaa, jaŋu unrunw womɔ be wooi, ainɛ gɔi dimiyaan yaai tɔlin.
40009020	Kɔɔ gin’ yaau be wɔu, yaanran turu Yesu onu nɛ dɔwaa sɔi womɔ kinrun tabu. Wo kinɛ womɔ nɛ, unrun Yesu sɔi sai biyaa tabaa ye, unruin babajado gɛɛube. Yaanran gɔ anranguju pɛli lɛisigɛ baa bain goi jiun le bee.
40009022	Yesu onu kigelemaa, woi iyaa, wo le ɔn gin’ gi: «Iyaa ma, anrangaju kunɔ. Gagawu uwɔ ui bajamaati.» Waaru kɔɔ le tee yaanran gɔi bajaai.
40009023	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, Yahutunw inɛ giru tobe gɔ ginrun nɛ dɔwaa, keresujɔnw lee, pii piinw lee, ginrun gɔ siɲɛ le joonaa be sɛu tɛmaa,
40009024	ɔn gin’ be le sɔi: «Ebe goojɛɛi: Iyaa gɔ yinwɛnlu. Wo giri yeiyeuwɔ.» Kaa, inɛw gɔbe woi mɔmɔubɛin.
40009025	Nɛɛ, inɛw gɔbe puu waaru bain be goomu le, Yesu deun gɔ nɛ yowaa, iyaa gɔ numɔ aabe. Iyaa gɔ sɛɛu ingelaai.
40009026	Gana gɔ wooi nɛ sɔɔ kɔɔ kibɛru ginaabe.
40009027	Yesu, kɔɔ nɛ gowaa yaau wo wɔu, oju nɛ girumuw lɛi onu womɔ nɛ dimiyaan, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, amasɔgɔ emɛ jugɔ.»
40009028	Nɛɛ, waaru Yesu ginrun dɔi le, girumuw gɔbe genɛ womɔ nɛ be wiyaa, Yesu ɔn gin’ be bɛrɛ selumu: «Mu ei bajugaɲu gɔnrɔn yasɔn ga e gawaa wɔi ma?» Be saa: «Ee, emɛ Baŋa, emɛ gawaa wɔin.»
40009029	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu giri bemɛ tabaa, be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Gagawu ebe le kɛukɛu, e bɛrɛ yinbiyɛmɔ.»
40009030	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo giyaa, giri bemɛ pinɛlaai. Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu be le ɛjii sɔwaa, bemaa sɔɔ bii gɔ inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran jugɔmɔnɔu gi.
40009031	Kaa, be goou digɛu, gana wogɔ yalu puu nɛ yaa, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ gowaabɛin.
40009032	Inɛw kɔɔbe Yesu genɛ nɛ gowaa yaau be wɔu, inɛw, Yesu bɛrɛ ainɛ waja jɛɛlaabɛin. Ainɛ gɔ, jinrun, kuu womɔ nɛ dɛinyaan, wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔmɔbele.
40009033	Kaa Yesu, ainɛ gɔ kuu nɛ jinrun gɔ nanaa goonɔu wo digɛu, ainɛ gɔ sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabe. Inɛw, wogɔ iyaa, be bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe. Kɔɔ dɛi be gɛɛubɛin: «Emɛ Isɛrɛlu gana nɛ sɔɔ ɔn tɔgu iyetɛnɛ.»
40009034	Kaa, Parisiɛn gɔbe, be ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Inɛw kuu nɛ jinrun nana ga, jinrunbe kuu baŋa gɔ, gɔnrɔn gɔ, Yesu bɛrɛ wo obojɛ.»
40009035	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ ana diyɛ lee, ana dagi lee nɛ yaaube. Wo ana kɔɔbe Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ, deeru deereube. Ama diinɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ tagaube. Jiun tɔgu dɛin dɛin puu lee, goju yɛbɛlɛ wooi lee bajamɔube.
40009036	Inɛw wo bɛrɛ wɛɛbɛin gɔbe ɛjii ɔɲaa, kinɛ bemɛ yanwaan bee. Be peju, girɛnɛ sɛnɛ gin’ bɛin. Wogɔ digɛu, Yesu, inɛw gɔbe amasɔgɔ, ɛjii woi aabe.
40009037	Kɔɔ dɛi, wo ɔn gin’ jaŋu unrunw womɔbe le gi: «Dɛnrɛn ilaa, gaai wɔɔ. Kaa, birɛbirɛnw joolain.
40009038	Kɔɔ dɛi, minɛ baŋa bɛrɛ gɛɛin, womaa dɛnrɛn gɔ ginrun jɛɛlɛ giye, birɛbirɛnw minɛ gɔ nɛ tii wa.»
40010001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ womɔ gɔbei boonaa, genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔɔnaabe. Jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nanu goonu gɔnrɔn lee, inɛw bajamu gɔnrɔn lee, inɛw goju nɛ nurun too puu bajamu gɔnrɔn lee be bɛrɛ obaabe.
40010002	Jaŋu unrunw wogɔbe Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei. Boi bemɛ unwɔ: Laa gɔ Simɔi, woi Piɛru boonɔbɛin. Iyaa, wo bainɛ Andere lee, Sebede anranw unrunw lɛi gɔbe Jake lee, wo bainɛ Jan lee,
40010003	Pilipe lee, Barutelɛmi lee, Tɔmasu lee, Matiu sɛgu yabanɛ gɔ lee, Alupe ii Jake lee, Tade lee,
40010004	Simɔ lee, wo gana womɔ gunɔ nɛ goo ga mainiyɛunbe. Iyaa, Judasu Isukariɔte lee. Yesui, numɔ nɛ kunɔnɛ gɔ woi.
40010005	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu womɔ gɔbei waaju taga tiyaabe. Bei tiiu, wo bei tinwɛnraan: «Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain sibɛ go yaanɔugi. Samari gana anabe nɛ yoonɔugi.
40010006	Kaa, Isɛrɛlu unrunw peju gin’ manaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ yaai.
40010007	E oju yaanu wɔnu, waaju ebe nɛ alagala diinɛ gɔ bɛruniyaain gɛɛi,
40010008	jiungunw bajamɔi, yiun bulomɔi, nɛwɛngunw bajamɔi, jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nanai. Mu gɔnrɔn gɔ e bɛrɛ dɔnrun wɔlɔ go obun. E kanran gɔnrɔn gɔ le dɔnrun wɔlɔ go birɛ birɛi.
40010009	Kange ma, sarudu ma, mɛnu buudu ma jeɲɛnɔugi.
40010010	Oju ebe dɛi jɛmɛ jeɲɛnɔugi. Arugoi lɛi ma, taga ma, baga ma jeɲɛnɔugi. Inɛ birɛbirɛnɛ kijɛ wo kayaun, wo bɛrɛ oboun jaain wɔɔ.
40010011	«Ana nɛ waaru e yowaajɛ, ana diyɛ ma, ana dagi ma, inɛ ɛju dɛnaajɛi ye, womɔ nɛ sugoi. Ana gɔ nɛ e gooido baa ginrun sugo turu wogɔ nɛ yabiyɛi.
40010012	Ginrun gɔ nɛ yoonu, poo kunɔi.
40010013	Ginrun gɔ inɛw ei sɛgɛraaɲu ye, jamu poo ebe gɔ kɔɔ nɛ wo biyɛmɔ. Kaa be ei sɛgɛrɛnɛ ye, jamu poo e kunu gɔ kɔɔlɔmɔi.
40010014	Ginrun turu nɛ ma, ana turu nɛ ma, ei sɛgɛrɛnɛ ma, ei keŋiyɛnnɛ ma biyaai ye, waaru e goojɛ kubɔ ebe nɛ minɛ tara gɔ pogoti gooi.
40010015	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido dɔwaai ye, Sodomɛ lee, Gomɔre lee ana bɛɛnw ɔɲɛ gɔ ana kɔɔ inɛw mɔ baalu biyɛdo.»
40010016	«Mui ɛjii keŋiyɛin. Mu, ei peju gin’ tataabe logoro nɛ tiiuwɔn. Kɔɔ dɛi kuu ebe kajubai. Yuguru gin’ sasai le biyɛi. Pelegele gin’ tɛgɛ sɛlɛ go biyɛi.
40010017	Inɛw, saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ ei boboonɔdɛin. Iyaa, Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ ei bɔɔniyɛn le lalagadɛin. Kɔɔ dɛi, kuu kajubu le biyɛi.
40010018	Mu le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, inɛw, sɛmɛgunw bɛrɛ lee, ɔgɔnw bɛrɛ lee, ei jajaaradɛin. Kaa, kole digɛnu, e be bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ goo bɛbɛɛdei. Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe kanran, kole digɛnu sɛɛrɛ ebe ɛhɛgɛdɛin.
40010019	Kaa waaru numɔ nɛ be ei kunaaɲu le, sɔɔ e sɔɔido dɛi ma, bana sɔɔ e sɔɔido dɛi ma, diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Sɔɔ e sɔɔido gɔ kuu ebe le bɛɛidelei. Sɔɔ e sɔɔun jaan gɔ, waaru wogɔ le tee e bɛrɛ obodɛin. E Ba Ama Kikinu e bɛrɛ sɔɔ gɔ wo sɔɔmɔdo.
40010021	«Inɛw, be ba unrunwin tɔitɔi daiti giye, numɔ nɛ kukunɔdɛin. Banw, unrunw bemɛi daa giye, numɔ nɛ kukunɔdɛin. Unrunw kanran, bei naranw dɛi ingele ye bei koi daamɔdɛin.
40010022	Boi ma le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, inɛw puu ei ihibiliyɛdɛin. Kaa, dumɔ gɔ baa inɛ ɛɛn go iŋiyaanjɛ, inɛ wogɔi yayabadɛin.
40010023	Ana turu nɛ, ei ɔɲɔmɔuwɔin ye, ana waja nɛ jɔbɔ yaai. Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Inɛ Aini gɔ wɛɛmɔ nɛ, e Isɛrɛlu gana, ana puu nɛ yai dogoidelei.
40010024	«Jaŋu ii, jaŋudeerenɛ womɔ dɛi gaala. Birɛbirɛnɛ kanran wo baŋa dɛi gaala.
40010025	Jaŋu ii, jaŋudeerenɛ womɔ yalu wɔɔ gɔ nɛ dɔwaai ye, woi babaado. Birɛbirɛnɛ kanran wo baŋa yalu wɔɔ gɔ nɛ dɔwaai ye, wogɔ woi babaado. Inɛw, ginrun gonɔ kuu baŋa gɔ nɛ Belujebule boi kuni biyaai ye, ginrun gonɔ womɔ nɛ inɛw toin gɔbe bɛrɛ boi kɔɔ dɛi mɔɲu kukunɔdɛin ga igii biyɛi.»
40010026	«Nɛɛ, kɔɔi biyaa ye, e inɛwin liyɛnɔugi. Sabu kijɛ babaŋa ɛlu goonɔidenɛ turu kanran biyɛidolo. Iyaa kijɛ boŋurun jugɔmɔidolo turu kanran biyɛidolo.
40010027	Kɔɔ gin’, kijɛ ɔlɔ nɛ toun e bɛrɛ mu tagajɛ gɔ, wogɔ pilemu ye, aga wijɛ nɛ sɔɔi. Iyaa, sɔɔ boŋurun e ɛgɛjɛ gɔbe, e wogɔ dala nɛ boonu kunu tagai.
40010028	Inɛw goju ebe daa ye, kikinu ebe dai bɛɛnɛ gɔbei liyɛnɔugi. Kaa Ama, goju ebe gɔ lee, kikinu ebe gɔ lee, yaun asuu yinwɛindolo gɔ nɛ kunu ye suyo bɛbɛɛdo. Kɔɔ dɛi woi liyɛi.
40010029	Yɛnɛi, sasaa dɔɔrɛi lɛi dɔnrun gɔ, tama turu gɔ, woi laa ma? Kaa, Ama e Ba gɔ, soo sɛlɛ wo wɔnu, sasaa dɔɔrɛi turu kanran yinwɛn ye, minɛ nɛ bagu sugoidolo.
40010030	E kai, halu, kuu ebe kukuli gɔbe yaa puu lugaa bojaaɲu.
40010031	Kɔɔ digɛu, liyɛnɔugi. E sasaa dɔɔrɛi joo dɛi irei!»
40010032	«Inɛ aai kanran, inɛw giru nɛ unruin jaŋu ii mai daii giyaajɛ ye, mu kanran, mu Ba alagala go daan gɔ giru nɛ, woi jaŋu ii mai gɛgɛɛdɔn.
40010033	Kaa, inɛ aai kanran, inɛw giru nɛ unrun mui inɛɛ daii giyaajɛ ye, mu kanran, mu Ba alagala go daan gɔ giru nɛ, woi inɛɛ gɛɛdɔn.»
40010034	«Aduna nɛ, mu jamui jɛɛlɛi wɛiun ga ajubanɔugi. Mu jamu jɛɛlɛi wɛɛlun. Kaa, jaii jɛɛlun.
40010035	Mu, aini lee wo ba lee, iyaa lee, wo na lee, ii yaanran lee wo igɛ na lee logoro nɛ jaŋu kunɔi wɛiun.
40010036	Kɔɔ gin’, inɛ, jaŋunɛ womɔ, wo maranw logoro nɛ goodo.
40010037	«Yɛnɛi! Inɛ, wo ba ma, wo na ma, mu dɛi sigɛ bei ibɛ ye, inɛ wogɔ, woi mu le jaanla. Inɛ, ii womɔ ma, iyaa womɔ ma, mu dɛi sigɛ bei ibɛ ye, inɛ wogɔ, woi mu le jaanla.
40010038	Iyaa, inɛ aai kanran baga jai womɔ duiyi ye, onu ma nɛ dimiyɛɛnlɛ ye, inɛ wogɔ, mu le jaanla.
40010039	Inɛ, aduna ɔn nɛ, kinrun womɔ nɛ tari ye biyɛjɛ gɔ, kinrun womɔ susuyodo. Kaa, mu dɛi inɛ kinrun womɔ pajajɛ gɔ, kinrun womɔ yayabadɛin.»
40010040	«Inɛ ei sɛgɛraajɛ, inɛ wogɔ mui sɛguru. Iyaa, inɛ mui sɛgɛraajɛ, mui tiinɛ gɔi sɛguru.
40010041	Inɛ aai kanran, inɛ Ama titiyainɛi, Ama titiyainɛi wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi woi sɛgɛraajɛ ye, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ bɛrɛ tujɔ oboidɛin gɔ, wo kanran wogɔi bɛɛdo. Iyaa, inɛ aai kanran, inɛ teitai wɔɔ, teitai wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, woi sɛgɛraajɛ ye, inɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ bɛrɛ tujɔ oboidɛin gɔ, wo kanran wogɔi bɛɛdo.
40010042	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛ aai kanran, halu dii kaalu diikɔrɔi turu jaŋu ii dagi ma turu bɛrɛ, jaŋu ii mai wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, obaajɛ ye, inɛ wogɔ tujɔ womɔ asuu manaidolo.»
40011001	Yesu, kɔɔ gin’ jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ womɔ gɔbe bɛrɛ tinwinrun obaa waaru wo kilu le, wo yalu wo bee gɔ nɛ gowaa, Galile ana diyɛ gɔbe nɛ wo inɛw deere lee, iyaa waaju kanran lee dɛi yai.
40011002	Jan Batise kajuginrun nɛ tou, Kirisito birɛ gɔbe kibɛru ɛgaabe. Wo kɔɔ gin’ jaŋu unrunw unrunmɔbei wo bɛrɛ tiyaa,
40011003	bemaa ɔn gin’ wo bɛrɛ selumɛ wa: «Inɛ wɛwɛɛjɛ gin gɔ, ui ma, inɛ waja emɛ dɔmiyɛun jaan?»
40011004	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Kijɛ e ɛgɛjɛ gɔ lee, kijɛ e iyejɛ gɔ lee, Jan bɛrɛ yai tagai.
40011005	Womaa girumuw giri iyeuwɔin wa. Tegutegenw, sɛɛu yoi yaauwɔin wa. Nɛwɛngunw bajauwɔin wa. Suguruduŋube, suguru ɛgɛuwɔin wa. Inɛw yiun bulouwɔin wa. Dɔgɔpaganw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagauwɔin wa.
40011006	Mu dɛi, inɛ kinɛ womɔ yanwanlu gɔ, inɛ wogɔ Ama wo yabu.»
40011007	Jan jaŋu unrunw gɔbe yaa be yaa, Yesu, inɛw joo wo le bɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ Jan dɛi sɔɔ ɔn gin’ sɔɔi tɔlu: «Waaru olusolo go e yai le, e, inɛ inge tɔgui yɛnɛi yaii? Saguba ooɲɔ woi jigemɔjɛi yɛnɛi yaii ma?
40011008	Nɛɛ, e ingei yɛnɛi yaii? Ɔgɔinɛ sɔi ɛju kunaa wɔɔi, yɛnɛi yaii ma? Ai. Inɛw sɔi ɛju le wɔin gɔbe, ɔgɔnw ginrun nɛ toiyoɲu.
40011009	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, e, olusolo go inge dɛi yaii? Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ yɛnɛi yaii ma? Ee gun, halu titiyainɛ dɛi kanran sigɛ.
40011010	Sabu Jan, Ama Dɔn nɛ, inɛ dɛi Ama ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔmu gɔ woi: “Yɛnɛ, mu, inɛ titiyainɛ ma giru uwɔ nɛ titiidɔn. U wɛɛmɔ nɛ, wo oju uwɔ yeyegeredo.”
40011011	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, yaanw unrunw narin logoro nɛ, inɛ Jan Batise dɛi gaa goolu. Kaa alagala diinɛ nɛ inɛ wo dagi gɔ, wo dɛi gaa.
40011012	Jan Batise waaju waaru nɛ tɔlaa, iye wɛɛ dɔɔ, alagala diinɛ gɔi paŋa tagarauwɔin. Inɛw paŋa sɛin gɔbe, wogɔ be ɛlɛjɛ.
40011013	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe puu nɛ lee, Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn gɔ nɛ lee, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔu, Jan waaru nɛ baa dɔwaabɛin.
40011014	E gawa ibɛɛ wɔi ye, Eli wɛwɛɛdo gin gɔ, Jan woi.
40011015	Inɛ suguru too baŋa, wo sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛn.
40011016	«Kanɛ inɛw ɔnbe, mu aa le bei tunwɔndɔn? Be unrunw dagunw, tai nɛ dɛinyaan, tunmɔ ɔn gin’ jarugaɲu le murin wɔin:
40011017	‘Kere emɛ sujaa, e gɔɔ gɔɔli. Iyaa, yiun tɔɔnrɔn emɛ tɔɔnraan, e yiun pii piili.’
40011018	Sabu Jan wiyaa, jaa kayabele, resɛndii ilɛ nɔɔbele wo wɔu, jinruin kuu womɔ nɛ daan gin.
40011019	Inɛ Aini gɔ wiyaa, jaa kayau, dii nɔɔu wo wɔu, be saa, inɛ ɔn, jaa kayanɛi, kɔɲɔnɔɔnɛi gin. Wo, sɛgu yabanw lee, inɛw waja boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔɔ lee anrungei gin. Kaa, hakilɛ Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ teitai wɔɔ ga birɛ womɔ gɔ le jugɔmɔjɛ.»
40011020	Kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaatiyaa, Yesu, ana taanrinyɛn womɔbe joo, wo kanrun gamuui jarugai tɔlu. Kaa, inɛw gɔbe bana bemɛ dulomɔ ga yabanɛ.
40011021	Kɔɔ dɛi, wo ɔn gin’ gi: «Korajinɛ ana bɛɛnw, Bɛtusayida ana bɛɛnw, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu ana ebe nɛ taanrinyɛn birɛ kanraan tagurin gɔbe, Tire lee, Sidɔn lee ana nɛ kanraan tagurin bee biyaa ye, be ɔn baa bana bemɛ dulomu ye, sɔi sɛmɛlɛ gori ye, minɛ kɔkɔriyɛbɛin.
40011022	Kɔɔ dɛi, mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido dɔwaai ye, Tire lee, Sidɔn lee bɛɛnw ɔɲɛ gɔ, ebe mɔ gɔ baalu biyɛdo.
40011023	U kai, Kapɛrunaumu ana gɔ, ui jeɲaa ye, alagala baa unɔdɛin ma? Ai, ui yinwunrun baa sunugodɛin. Taanrinyɛn birɛ u bɛrɛ kanraan tagurin gɔ, Sodomɛ ana nɛ kanraan tagurin bee biyaa ye, iye dɔɔ ana gɔ bibiyɛbe.
40011024	Kɔɔ dɛi, mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido, Sodomɛ ana bɛɛnw ɔɲɛ gɔ, ɔɲɛ uwɔ gɔ baalu biyɛdo.»
40011025	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu sɔwaa gi: «Ba, alagala lee, minɛ lee Baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ ɔnbe, hakilɛgunw lee, jugɔjugɔnw lee bɛrɛ baŋaraantiyaa, unrunw dagunw bɛrɛ u jugɔmu gɔ dɛi, u birɛpoo.
40011026	Ɔnhɔn! Ba, sabu giru uwɔ nɛ kijɛ dagaa gɔ woi.
40011027	«Mu Ba, kijɛ wooi numɔ ma nɛ kunaajɛ. Ba gɔi laa ye, Aini gɔi inɛ igu wɔlɔ. Iyaa, Aini gɔ lee, Aini gɔ inɛ bɛrɛ Ba gɔ jugɔmu wo ibɛ gɔ lee laa ye, inɛ Ba gɔi igu wɔlɔ.
40011028	«E inɛw ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbe, iyaa dɔɔ duiyaa wɔin gɔbe, e puu mu bɛrɛ wɛɛi. Mu e bɛrɛ deeliye ohobodɔn.
40011029	Mu kinɛ ɛju baŋai, kuu sunugu baŋai, wogɔ digɛu, baga lolugu ma kɔkɔlɔ ebe nɛ kunɔ ye, deeru ma yabai. Kunrin, kinɛ ebe jamu bɛbɛɛdo.
40011030	Sabu baga lolugu ma gɔ ɔnrɔnni wɔɔ. Iyaa, dɔɔ ma gɔ yaa yomɔli wɔɔ.»
40012001	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe onu nɛ, deeliye bai turu, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ be wooi, alukama minɛ kɛjaa taŋaubɛin. Jaŋu unrunw gɔbei giyɛ yasɛbe. Kɔɔ dɛi, be alukama gɔ polaa nawanranmaa tɛnwɛin tɔlaabɛin.
40012002	Kɔɔ gin’ kanraun be wɔu, Parisiɛnbe iyaa, Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Yɛnɛ! Jaŋu unrunw uwɔ gɔbe deeliye bai kijɛ kanran danwan gɔ kanraunwɔin.»
40012003	Yesu saa: «Dawide lee, inɛw wo le bɛin gɔbe lee giyɛ bei aa wo kanran, kijɛ be kanrun gɔ e jaŋali ma?
40012004	Wo Ama ginrun gɔ nɛ yayowaa, wo Ama burui ga, buru duunaaɲu gɔ, wogɔ jeɲaa kayaabe. Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw gɔbei laa ye, inɛ waja buru kɔɔ kayaun jaanla bee.
40012005	Iyaa, Tɔɔru dɔn gɔ nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ gɔ, e jaŋali ma? Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw gɔbe, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ tonu, be deeliye bai gɔ taanɛ. Kaa bemaa deeliye bai taa gɔ yamalaatin gɛɛnɛ.
40012006	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, ɔn nɛ, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ dɛi gaa kijɛ yɔɔ.
40012007	Iyaa “Kijɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ gɔ, inɛw, bɛlu sadaga be tɛgɛrɛjɛ gɔi laa. Kaa amasɔgɔjugɔ aŋai be sɛɛ gɔi” ga Ama Dɔn gi gɔ, e wogɔ paamu kanraanbei ye, inɛw jarugu sɛnɛ ɔnbe kuu nɛ jarugu duurɔbelei.
40012008	Sabu, Inɛ Aini gɔ, deeliye bai sɔɔ gɔ wo sagi.»
40012009	Yesu, yalu gɔ nɛ gowaa, Ama gɛɛn ginrun turu bemɛ nɛ yai.
40012010	Wo, Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ ainɛ numɔ sanaai turu tɛmaabe. Inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe Yesui sɔɔ nɛ kunu ibɛi bɛin gɔ digɛu, be deeliye bai inɛ jɔŋɔu jaain wɔɔ ma jaanla ma gin.
40012011	Kɔɔ gin’ be selumaa, Yesu saa: «Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ aa, peju turu wo sɛɛ gɔ, ɔmɔrɔn nɛ bagaa yowaai ye, deeliye baii giye, peju gɔi goonɔlu kanrando?
40012012	Inɛ, peju dɛi irela ma? Aiwa, yinbiyaai ye, deeliye bai inɛ bɛrɛ ɛju kanrun bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.»
40012013	Kɔɔ gin’ wo ainɛ numɔ sanaai gɔ womaa, numɔ womɔ wajara gi. Ainɛ gɔ numɔ womɔ wo wajaraa, numɔ gɔ, numɔ lɛiye gɔ gin’ sɛɛu biyaai.
40012014	Parisiɛnbe gowaa yaa, badu dɛinyaan, Yesui aŋai dai be bɛɛido dabulu dɛnɛubɛin.
40012015	Inɛw woi dai dɛnɛuwɔin ga, Yesu jugaa, wo yalu kɔɔ nɛ gowaa yai. Inɛw joo, onu womɔ nɛ dimiyaanbɛin. Yesu, logoro bemɛ nɛ jiungunw tobɛin gɔbe puu bajamaabe.
40012016	Kaa, wo be bɛrɛ ɛjii sɔwaa, bemaa unruin aai ma inɛ bɛrɛ taganɔu gi.
40012017	Ama, inɛ titiyainɛ womɔ Esayi le digɛu, sɔɔ wo sɔi ɔn kibe ga sɔɔ kɔɔ bii:
40012018	“Birɛbirɛnɛ mai ga, inɛ mu yɛmu gɔ unwɔ. Mu woi ɛjii ibɛɛ wɔun. Wo le kinɛ ma ɛjii aa wɔɔ. Mu Kikinu ma wo nɛ totoiyomɔdɔn. Kɔɔ gin’ wo tɔgu wajunw bɛrɛ teitai sɔɔ tatagado.”
40012019	Birɛbirɛnɛ wogɔ, inɛ turu le kanran jiireidolo. Wo paŋa le sɔɔ sɔɔidolo. Boi dɛnɛjɛ giye pɔŋɔrɔn nɛ gɔŋɔlɔnu, sɔɔ sɔɔnu wo yalanu iyemɔidolo.
40012020	Wo tiun numɔ ii yɔniyaan wɔɔ gɔi pɛɛlɛidolo. Wo iyaa lanpa yaun yinwɛndo ga wɔɔ gɔi daaidolo. Teitai gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn wo bɛɛmɔido baa, wo kɔɔ gin’ kanrannu yinbiyɛdo.
40012021	Tɔgu wooi diyɛ bemɛ wo nɛ daanadɛin.”
40012022	Inɛw, iyaa Yesu bɛrɛ ainɛ jinrun kuu womɔ nɛ daan turu jɛɛlaabɛin. Jinrun gɔ wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔmɔbele, iyaa giri iyemɔubele. Yesu, ainɛ gɔi bajugaabe. Kɔɔ gin’ ainɛ gɔ sɔɔ sɔɔube, iyaa giri sɛɛu iyeube.
40012023	Inɛw taanrinyɛn kɔɔ iyaa, be bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe. Be ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Ɔn Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ woi laa ma?»
40012024	Kaa, Parisiɛnbe kɔɔ ɛgaa, saa: «Inɛ kɔɔ, jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nana goonɔ ga, jinrunbe kuu baŋa, Belujebule, gɔnrɔn gɔ wo bɛrɛ obojɛ.»
40012025	Kaa, Yesu kinɛ bemɛ ajubu igii bee dɛi, saa gi: «Laamu turu nɛ, inɛw gɔbe tunmɔ le jaiyaain ye, laamu bemɛ gɔ suiyiyaado. Iyaa ginrun turu inɛw ma, ana turu nɛ ma, inɛw tunmɔ le jaiyɛuwɔin ye, ginrun gɔ ma, ana gɔ ma biyɛidolo.
40012026	Setanu, kuu womɔ le Setanui nanajɛ ye, wo kuu womɔ le jaiyɛuwɔ. Nɛɛ, laamu womɔ gɔ yani iŋi bɛɛdo?
40012027	Kaa iyaa, mu Belujebule gɔnrɔn le jinrunbe nanajɔn biyaai ye, nɛɛ e bɔɔnw gɔbe, jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nana be goonɔjɛ gɔ, gɔnrɔn wogɔ aa bei obaajɛ? Saliyɛ ebe be kiredo.
40012028	Kaa mu, Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nana goonɔuwɔn biyaai ye, Ama diinɛ gɔ e bɛrɛ dɔwaai ga jugɔi.
40012029	«Yɛnɛi, inɛ turu kanran, inɛ ɛjii paŋa sɛɛ ginrun nɛ yoi ye, baŋai laa ai ye kɔmɔlu go, ginrun gɔ bala bɛɛlɛ. Kaa woi laa aa kɔmaatiyaa ye, wo ginrun gɔ bala bɛbɛɛdo.
40012030	«Inɛ mu le tolo gɔ, inɛ wogɔ mu jaŋunɛi. Iyaa, inɛ mui baru ye kijɛ yalu turu nɛ mɔɔnɔɔlɛ gɔ, giginɛgejɛ.
40012031	Wogɔ digɛu, mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw bɛrɛ hakɛ bemɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee, Ama boi yamulu sɔɔ be sɔɔjɛ gɔ lee, wogɔbe yaabu kanrun bɛbɛɛmɔdo. Kaa, inɛ Ama Kikinu boi yamulu sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ ye, hakɛ wogɔ yaabu kanraindenɛ.
40012032	Inɛ Aini gɔ, inɛ, wo le sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔwaajɛ kanran, baŋa hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛbɛɛdo. Kaa, inɛ Kikinu Pilu le sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔjɛ gɔ, aduna ɔn nɛ hakɛ womɔ yaabu kanraindenɛ. Iyaa, aduna wɛɛido gɔ nɛ yaa hakɛ womɔ yaabu kanraindenɛ.»
40012033	«Tiun na ɛju, ii womɔ le woi jugɔmɔjɛ. Kɔɔ dɛi, tiun ii gɔ sɛɛu wɔɔ ye, tiun na gɔ sɛɛu wɔɔ. Tiun ii gɔ sɛɛula ye, tiun na gɔ yaa sɛɛula.
40012034	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, nɛɛ, e inɛw mɔɲu gɔbe, yuguru kɔkɔju tɔgu gɔ, yani sɔɔ ɛju sɔɔ bɛɛdei? Kinɛ nɛ sɔɔ jowaa too gɔ, aŋa wogɔi sɔɔjɛ.
40012035	Inɛ ɛju, kijɛ ɛju womɔ yalu wo gɛliyɛjɛ nɛ kijɛ ɛjui goonɔjɛ. Iyaa inɛ mɔɲu, kijɛ mɔɲu womɔ yalu wo gɛliyɛjɛ nɛ kijɛ mɔɲui goonɔjɛ.
40012036	Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, aŋa sɔɔ uwɔ le Ama saliyɛ uwɔ kiredo. Sɔɔ u sɔi gɔ, ui wo yabado. Iyaa jarugu kuu uwɔ nɛ wo duurɔdo. Kunrin, Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido, inɛw sɔɔ niwɛn sɛlɛ be sɔi gɔbe puu dɛi, bei seselumɛdɛin.»
40012038	Kɔɔ waaru le, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gamuu lee, Parisiɛnbe gamuu lee, ɔn gin’ wo bɛrɛ sɔin: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, taanrinyɛn turu u kanrun ye, emɛ iye ibɛɛ wɔin.»
40012039	Kaa, wo saa: «Kanɛ inɛw gɔbe, inɛw mɔɲu, Ama sibɛ go sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋɛlain gɔbe, taanrinyɛn iye ibɛɛ wɔin. Kaa, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Jonasu taanrinyɛn gɔi laa ye, taanrinyɛn waja be bɛrɛ kanrun ye tagaraidenɛ.
40012040	Jonasu, aga taanu, digɛ taanu, iiju poo kɔlɔ nɛ aŋai wo tobe gin’, Inɛ Aini gɔ aga taanu, digɛ taanu, minɛ nɛ toiyodo.
40012041	Iyaa, Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido, Niniwe ana bɛɛnw, kanɛ inɛw ɔnbe giru nɛ iŋi ye bei jajarugadɛin. Sabu Niniwe bɛɛnw, Jonasu waaju ɛgaa, bana bemɛ dulomaabɛin. Yɛnɛi, ɔn nɛ wɔɔ baŋa gɔ Jonasu dɛi sigɛ.
40012042	Iyaa, Ama aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido tɛŋurun gana ɔgɔyaanran gɔ yaa, kanɛ inɛw gɔbe giru nɛ iŋi ye bei jajarugado. Sabu wo yalu wage naa wage nɛ gowaa, Salomɔ hakilɛ sɔɔ gɔbe keŋiyɛin wiyaabe. Yɛnɛi, ɔn nɛ wɔɔ baŋa gɔ Salomɔ dɛi sigɛ.»
40012043	«Jinrun inɛ kuu nɛ gowaai ye, jinrun gɔ, yalu bii deeliyeɲu dɛnɛjɛ giye olusolo nɛ yaa, wɛɛ, kanranjɛ. Deeliye yalu bɛɛlu kanraan ye,
40012044	wo yalu pɛi wo goi gɔ nɛ pilemu yaajɛ gɛɛjɛ. Kɔɔ gin’ pilemaa wiyaai ye, wo ginrun gɔ sɛmaa seisei, ɛjii yegeraa, kijɛ kanma tolo go tɛmɛjɛ.
40012045	Kɔɔ waaru wo iyaajɛ, wo yaa ye, jinrun wo dɛi mɔɲu, jinrun waja sɔi wo le dimɛrɛn ye jɛɛlɛjɛ. Be wooi puu wiyaain ye, inɛ gɔ kuu nɛ yindɛinyɛnɲu. Nɛɛ kai, inɛ gɔ bana, pɔɔlɔ mɔ gɔ dɛi mɔɲu biyɛjɛ. Kanɛ inɛw mɔɲu ɔnbe mɔ yaa kunrin biyɛdo.»
40012046	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ mɔɔnu gɔ le sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, wo na lee, wo suŋɔw lee wiyaa, bain go iŋiyaan, wo le bana sɔɔ sɔɔɲu dɛnɛubɛin.
40012047	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ turu yaa Yesu le ɔn gin’ gi: «U na lee, u suŋɔw lee, bain go yɔɔin. Be u le sɔɔ sɔi ibɛɛ wɔin.»
40012048	Yesu, inɛ kɔɔ aŋa saa: «Mu na gɔ aai? Mu suŋɔw gɔbe aabei?»
40012049	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbei siiraa tagaraa gi: «Yɛnɛi. Mu na lee, mu suŋɔw lee unwɔin.
40012050	Inɛ, mu Ba alagala nɛ daan gɔ diŋɛ kanranjɛ gɔ, wogɔ baŋa mu ba ii gɔ woi, mu saa gɔ woi, mu na gɔ yaa woi.»
40013001	Bai wogɔ tee, Yesu ginrun gowaa dibe diŋirun go yaa dɛinyin.
40013002	Inɛw joo wɛi wɛi genɛ womɔ nɛ mɔrinyɛunbɛin. Jojoo bemɛ dɛi, Yesu ingelaa yaa diikoro turu nɛ yowaa dɛinyin. Mɔɔnu gɔ dii diŋirun gɔ nɛ bee.
40013003	Yesu be bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn le sɔɔ joo tagaabe. Kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Toimaɲanɛ turu toi maɲai gowaabe.
40013004	Toi maɲau wo wɔu, toi ii gamuu oju nɛ sugin. Sasaabe wiyaa toi ii wogɔbe jɔnwaanɲu.
40013005	Toi ii gamuu tibu yalu nɛ, yalu minɛ gaai wɔlɔ nɛ sugin. Minɛ gɔ toola digɛu, toi gɔ ɔgiri tɛiyaabe.
40013006	Kaa, nai ɛjii wo gowaa, toi gɔ duu ɛju bɛɛlu bee gɔ digɛu, nai tɛgaa maaŋiyɛnmaati.
40013007	Toi ii gamuu dɔgɔ jijii sɛin logoro nɛ sugin. Kaa, waaru be tɛiyɛjɛ le, dɔgɔ jijii sɛin gɔbe, be dɛi sigɛ gabiyaa bei kimaatin.
40013008	Kaa toi ii gamuu minɛ ɛju nɛ sugin. Toi wogɔbe tɛiyaa, ɛjii gabiyaa, ii kunaabɛin. Gamuu ii suŋu kuni, gamuu pɛlukuloi, gamuu pɛtaanu.
40013009	«Inɛ suguru too baŋa, wo sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛn.»
40013010	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu jaŋu unrunw, genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa, inɛw bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn le sɔɔ wo sɔɔjɛ gɔ, inge dɛii ma gin.
40013011	Yesu saa gi: «Alagala diinɛ sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ, e bɛrɛ kai jugɔmaaɲu. Kaa, be bɛrɛ wogɔ jugɔmɔla.
40013012	Sabu inɛ kijɛ sɛɛ baŋa bɛrɛ baraa ye ohobodɛin. Wo kɔɔ gin’ kijɛ gaai sisiyɛdo. Kaa, inɛ kijɛ sɛlɛ gɔ, gaila wo sɛɛ gɔ yaa wo bɛrɛ ɛhɛlɛdɛin.
40013013	Sabu be giri gɔmaa kosɛin. Kaa kijɛ kanma iyeenɛ. Suguru bemɛ dɛɛraa kosɛin. Kaa sɔɔ ɛgɛɛnɛ, paamu kanraannɛ. Mu kɔɔ sabu dɛi taanrinyɛn le be le sɔɔ sɔɔjɔn.
40013014	Kunrin, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi, sɔɔ tɔŋu ɔn be sibɛ go kibaai: “E sɔɔ ɛhɛgɛdei, kaa paamu kanraindelei. E giri gɔmaa ye yɛyɛnɛdei, kaa e iyeidelei.
40013015	Nɛɛ, tɔgu ɔn inɛw kinɛ bemɛ ɛɛnnaatin. Hakilɛ bemɛ sɔɔ paamu kanrun ye, bemaa mu sibɛ go kigelemu ye, maa bei bajugamɔnɔu ga, giri bemɛ kijɛ iyenɔu dɛi, suguru bemɛ sɔɔ ɛgɛnɔu dɛi, suguru bemɛ duŋaatin, giri bemɛ dɛbaatin.”
40013016	Kaa, e kai, Ama e yabu. E giri iyeuwɔi. Suguru ɛgɛuwɔi.
40013017	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw Ama titiyaanw joo lee, inɛw Ama diŋɛ kanranw joo lee, kijɛ e iyejɛ ɔnbe iye ibɛɛ bɛin, kaa biyaa iyenɛ. Be sɔɔ e ɛgɛjɛ ɔnbe ɛgɛ ibɛɛ bɛin, kaa biyaa ɛgɛnɛ.»
40013018	«Nɛɛ, toimaɲanɛ taanrinyɛn tiyɛ gɔ keŋiyɛin.
40013019	Inɛ aai kanran, alagala diinɛ sɔɔ ɛgaa paamalu ye, inɛ wogɔ bana gɔ, toi ii oju nɛ sugu gɔ le tunwɔn bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ. Mɔɲu kuu baŋa wɛi ye sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ womɔ nɛ goonɔjɛɛjɛ.
40013020	Inɛw gamuu, sɔɔ gɔ ɛgɛnu digɛnu kinɛ ɛɛli le yabaɲu. Bana bemɛ gɔ, toi ii tibu yalu nɛ sugu gɔ le tunwɔn bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
40013021	Kaa be sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ bemɛ nɛ paŋa siyɛmɔɔnɛ digɛu, sɔɔ gɔ nɛ kuu kunu ye tanwaannɛ. Wogɔ digɛu, Ama sɔɔ gɔ dɛi ɔɲɛ ma, tɔɔɲɔ ma be bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, be ɔgu kɛu sɔɔ gɔ pajutiiɲu.
40013022	Inɛw gamuu bana gɔ, toi ii dɔgɔ jijii sɛin logoro nɛ tɛɛjɛ gɔ gin’ wɔɔ. Be sɔɔ gɔ kekeŋiyɛnɲu. Kaa, aduna ɔn sɔɔ jiire lee, arusɛgɛ mɔɔnu dadaaru, inɛi lelemɔjɛ gɔ lee, sɔɔ gɔ kimɛjɛɛɲu. Kɔɔ dɛi, sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ bemɛ nɛ birɛ birɛɛlɛ.
40013023	Nɛɛ, inɛw gamuu sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa ye, bana bemɛ toi ii minɛ ɛju nɛ sugu gɔ le tunwɔn bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ. Be sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa ye papaamaɲu. Sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ bemɛ nɛ birɛ bibirɛjɛ, ii nanaranjɛ. Gamuu mɔ suŋu, gamuu mɔ pɛlukuloi, gamuu mɔ pɛtaanu.»
40013024	Yesu iyaa, taanrinyɛn waja daan, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Alagala diinɛ bana gɔ, ainɛ, minɛ womɔ nɛ toi ɛju maɲaa sɛɛ le tunwɔn bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
40013025	Baŋa toi maɲaa wo dagaa, digɛ inɛw diinyaan be yaa, jaŋunɛ womɔ turu wiyaa, alukama toi ɛju wo maɲu gɔ logoro nɛ dɔgɔ ii mɔɲu maɲaatiyaa yai.
40013026	Nɛɛ, toi gɔ tɛiyaa gabiyaa, ii kunɔi tɔlaabe. Ii kunɔi wo tɔlaa, gamuu dɔgɔ mɔɲui ga yinjugɔmu.
40013027	Birɛbirɛnw gɔbe dɔgɔ mɔɲu gɔ iyaa, minɛ baŋa bɛrɛ wiyaa ɔn gin’ selumi: ‘Emɛ baŋa, u minɛ uwɔ nɛ toi ɛjui kunɔlu ma? Nɛɛ dɔgɔ mɔɲu ɔnbe yago goin?’
40013028	Wo saa: ‘Kɔɔ jaŋunɛ turu birɛi.’ Birɛbirɛnw gɔbe pilemaa wo bɛrɛ selumaa unrun bemaa yai dɔgɔ gɔbe mɔmɔti ma gin.
40013029	Wo saa, ai, yapaja gi. Dɔgɔ gɔbe waaru e mɔmɔjɛ, jugɔlu go alukama gamuu mɔmɔmɔdei ma mu liyaaun.
40013030	Alukama gɔ lee, dɔgɔ mɔɲu gɔ lee pajaa ye, be lɛi puu, gɛlu waaru dɔɔido baa, be gabiyɛmɔi. Gɛlu waaru dɔwaai ye, mu gɛlugɛlɛnw gɔbe bemaa dɔgɔ gɔ laa gaa mɔɔnɔ giye tɔɔrɔdɔn. Dɔgɔ gɔ gaa mɔɔnaa ye, pagu ye tɛtɛgɛrɛdɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, bemaa alukama gɔ gaaɲu ye, guyɔ ma nɛ yinkunɔ gɛɛdɔn.»
40013031	Yesu iyaa taanrinyɛn waja daan, ɔn gin’ gi: «Alagala diinɛ bana gɔ, ainɛ, mutarudu ii turu, sadiŋɛ minɛ womɔ nɛ kunaa sɛɛ le murin wɔɔ.
40013032	Tiun ii walaɲube puu logoro nɛ, mutarudu ii, wo uji. Kaa tɛiyaa, gabiyaai ye, tiun nai. Sadiŋɛ nɛ, kijɛ walaɲu puu dɛi gaa. Kunrin, sasaabe kanran, numɔ ii womɔ nɛ wɛi ye, kuru, koi kuroɲu.»
40013033	Yesu iyaa, taanrinyɛn waja daan ɔn gin’ gi: «Alagala diinɛ bana gɔ, kijɛ buru pidemu le murin wɔɔ. Yaanran turu kijɛ buru pidemu wogɔ jeɲaa, punau kilo pɛɛlɛi numɔrɔnsigɛ nɛ kunaa, bolaa, punau bolaaɲu gɔ puu ingeleido baa pajaabe.»
40013034	Yesu, taanrinyɛn kɔɔ gin’ daan ye, mɔɔnu gɔbei deereube. Wo sɔɔ womɔ puu nɛ taanrinyɛn daaunbe.
40013035	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ Ama titiyainɛ sɔɔ ɔn yinkibemɔube: “Mu taanrinyɛn le be le sɔɔ sɔɔdɔn. Kunrin, aduna mɔii nɛ gowaa, iye wɛɛ dɔɔ sɔɔ ɛlu goonɔtɛnɛ gɔ, mu be bɛrɛ jujugɔmɔdɔn.”
40013036	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, mɔɔnu gɔi pajaatiyaa, ginrun yai. Jaŋu unrunw womɔbe genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa ɔn gin’ gin: «Dɔgɔ mɔɲu minɛ nɛ maɲi taanrinyɛn gɔ, tiyɛ womɔ emɛ bɛrɛ taga.»
40013037	Yesu saa: «Inɛ toi ɛju maɲanɛ gɔ, wogɔ Inɛ Aini gɔi.
40013038	Minɛ gɔ, wogɔ adunai. Toi ɛju gɔ, wogɔ alagala diinɛ inɛw gɔbei. Nɛɛ, dɔgɔ mɔɲu maɲanɛ gɔ, wogɔ jinrun puu kuu baŋai. Dɔgɔ mɔɲu gɔbe, wogɔ Mɔɲu kuu baŋa unrunw gɔbei. Gɛlu waaru gɔ, wogɔ aduna dogogu bai gɔ woi. Gɛlu gɛlɛnw gɔbe, wogɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbei.
40013040	Dɔgɔ mɔɲu goonɔ ye, yaun le bana tɛgɛrɛɲu gin’, aduna dogogu le kɔɔ gin’ tee biyɛdo.
40013041	Bai wogɔ, Inɛ Aini gɔ, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbei titiido. Inɛw wajunw suuru ye, hakɛ nɛ inɛw kunɔɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe lee, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe, inɛw wogɔbei alagala diinɛ gɔ nɛ gogoonɔdɛin.
40013042	Be bei yaun banrun nɛ kamu kunɔdɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ pii lee, tɔnrɔn tɛnwun lee bibiyɛdo.
40013043	Kaa, Ama diŋɛ kanranw gɔbe nai bana doorojɛ gin’, be Ba diinɛ gɔ nɛ yindoorodɛin. Inɛ suguru too baŋa, wo sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛn.»
40013044	«Alagala diinɛ gɔ iyaa, arusɛgɛ diyɛ minɛ turu nɛ baŋa le murin wɔɔ. Inɛ turu arusɛgɛ gɔ soo biyaa, baŋaraan yapaju. Kinɛ womɔ ɛɛliyaa gabaa, wo yaa, kijɛ wo sɛbe puu dɔnraan, wiyaa minɛ gɔ ɛbaabe.»
40013045	«Alagala diinɛ bana gɔ iyaa, tɔŋutɔŋɔnɛ dugɔi dɔnrun diyɛ dɛnɛjɛ le tunwɔn bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
40013046	Wo dugɔi ɛju iyaa ye, kijɛ wo sɛɛ puu yaa dɔnraan wiyaa ye, dugɔi gɔ ɛbɛjɛ.»
40013047	«Alagala diinɛ bana gɔ, iyaa dibe nɛ jɔɔ kamaa kunaa, iiju tɔgu dɛin dɛin aajɛ le tunwɔn bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
40013048	Jɔɔ gɔ nɛ kɔɔ gin’ iiju jowaa wo wɔnu, iiju aanw gɔbe jɔɔ gɔ jeɲaa ye, dibe diŋirun gɔ nɛ wɛɛɲu. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, be dɛinyaan ye, iiju ɛju gɔbe yɛmaa, gelu nɛ kunaa ye, mɔɲu gɔbe kamatiiɲu.
40013049	Aduna dogogu bai gɔ, kɔɔ gin’ tee yinbiyɛdo. Mɛlɛnkɛbe wɛi ye, inɛw mɔɲu gɔbei ɛju gɔbe le kabugu ye,
40013050	bei yaun banrun nɛ kunɔdɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ pii lee, tɔnrɔn tɛnwun lee bibiyɛdo.»
40013051	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumu: «E sɔɔ gɔ puu paamaabei ma?» Be saa ee gin.
40013052	Yesu gimaa gi: «Aiwa, Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ, alagala diinɛ sɔɔ ɛjii paamu kanraan, sɔɔ gɔ le yabaa wɔɔ ye, bana womɔ ɔn le murin wɔɔ: Ginrun baŋa, arusɛgɛ mɔɔnaa wo sɛɛ nɛ, kijɛ kana lee, kijɛ pɛi lee gogoonɔjɛ. Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ wogɔ yaa kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ.»
40013053	Yesu taanrinyɛn kɔɔbe daantiyaa, yalu kɔɔ nɛ gowaa,
40013054	ana wo gabi gɔ nɛ yai. Kɔɔ nɛ wiyaa, Yesu Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yowaa, waaju kanrain tɔlu. Waaju bana wo kanranbe gɔ, inɛwin ɛjii maunɛ kanrun. Kɔɔ dɛi be ɔn gin’ sɔɔubɛin: «Hakilɛ wo sɛɛ ɔn lee, taanrinyɛn birɛ wo birɛjɛ ɔn lee, yago gowaa wo bɛrɛ wɛi?
40013055	Maa, kɔɔi ye baga birɛbirɛnɛ ii gɔ woi laa ma? Wo na Marii laa ma? Jake lee, Josɛpu lee, Simɔ lee, Jude lee wo suŋɔw gɔbe, bei laa ma?
40013056	Wo saabe puu emɛ le unwɔnɛ ma? Nɛɛ wo ɔn puu, aa le bɛi?»
40013057	Kunrin, ajubu kɔɔ dɛi be, Yesu le gawaa bɛɛnɛ. Yesu gowaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ, yalu puu nɛ baba yasɛ. Kaa, wo ba ginrun nɛ lee, ginrun gonɔ womɔ nɛ lee, wo baba siyɛɛlɛ.»
40013058	Yesu le gawaa bɛɛnɛ be kanrun gɔ dɛi, Yesu, ana womɔ nɛ taanrinyɛn gaila laa ye kanraan bɛɛlu.
40014001	Waaru wogɔ le, Herɔde, Galile gana sɛmɛginɛ gɔ, Yesu sɔɔ be sɔɔu ɛgaabe. Kɔɔ gin’ wo birɛbirɛnw womɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ gi:
40014002	«Kɔɔ tee, Jan Batisei! Woi bulaa wɛi. Wo kɔɔ dɛi birɛ taanrinyɛn birɛ bɛɛjɛ.»
40014003	Herɔde, Jain aamaa, pagaa, kaju nɛ kunaabe. Jan womaa, wo suŋɔrɔn Pilipe yaanran Herɔdiadei wo jɛi gɔ jaanla gɛɛube dɛi wo woi kaju nɛ kunu.
40014005	Herɔde Jain dai ibɛɛ bee. Kaa wo Yahutunw inɛwin liyɛube. Be Jain inɛ Ama titiyainɛi ga lugaa sɛbɛin.
40014006	Nɛɛ, kɔɔ gin’ Herɔde narin bai gɔ, Herɔdiade iyaa jaa kayanw gɔbe giru nɛ gɔɔ gɔwaabe. Herɔde, iyaa gɔ le kinɛ womɔ aa gabaa,
40014007	wo saba sabaa, iyaa gɔ womaa kijɛ wo selumɛido puu unrun wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn gi.
40014008	Iyaa gɔ, wo na tinwinrun keŋiyaan wiyaa, Jan Batise kuu gɔ polo ye, baɲa nɛ kunu ye, ɔn nɛ unrun bɛrɛ obo gi.
40014009	Sɔɔ kɔɔ, ɔgɔnɛ kinɛ ɛjii jinwɛnmaabe. Kaa, inɛw wo boonu gɔbe puu giru nɛ wo iyaa gɔ le pui kunaa, saba sabaabe dɛi, kijɛ wo selumu gɔ obo ga tɔɔraabe.
40014010	Wo inɛ tiyaa, kajuginrun nɛ yaa Jan kuu polomaabe.
40014011	Kuu gɔ, baɲa nɛ kunaa jɛɛlaa, iyaa gɔ bɛrɛ be obaa, wo yaa wo na bɛrɛ jɛyaabe.
40014012	Jan jaŋu unrunw wiyaa, yiun gɔ jeɲaa, yaa bojaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, be sɔɔ bii gɔ puu Yesu bɛrɛ yaa tagaabɛin.
40014013	Yesu sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgaa, yalu wo bee gɔ nɛ gowaa, diikoro nɛ yowaa, yalu inɛ wɔlɔ nɛ yaai tɔlu. Kaa, inɛw wogɔ kibɛru ɛgaa, ana dɛin dɛin nɛ gowaa, dii diŋirun gɔ le digɛu, kubɔ le woi dimiyaanbɛin.
40014014	Yesu, waaru diikoro gɔ nɛ wo goi le, mɔɔnu diyɛ iyaabe. Inɛw gɔ amasɔgɔ ɛjii woi aabe. Kɔɔ dɛi, wo jiungunw logoro bemɛ nɛ tobɛin gɔbe puu bajamaabe.
40014015	Digɛnai wo sugaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe Yesu genɛ nɛ dɔwaa, ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Digɛ digiyɛuwɔ. Iyaa, yalu ɔn nɛ kijɛ kanma wɔlɔ. Wogɔ digɛu, mɔɔnu gɔi pajaa ye ana gɔbe nɛ yai ye, pana bemɛ be ɛbɛmɔ.»
40014016	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Ana gɔbe nɛ be yaaun baalu. E kuu ebe le pana bei oboi.»
40014017	Kaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe saa, buru numɔrɔn lee, iiju lɛi lee laa ye, unrunbe ɔn nɛ kijɛ kanma sɛnɛ gin.
40014018	Yesu bemaa wogɔ unrun bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛ gi.
40014019	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo bemaa inɛw gɔbei belu gɔ nɛ dɛinyɛnmɔ ga tɔɔraabe. Yesu, buru numɔrɔn gɔ lee, iiju lɛi gɔ lee jeɲaa, giri daa go dɛɛraa gɛlɛu, Amai birɛpoo tagaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo buru gɔ kabalaa, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ obaabe. Be mɔɔnu gɔ bɛrɛ gamalaabɛin.
40014020	Inɛw puu pana kayaa, bei baabe. Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe kɛbɛlɛ waju gɔ turaa be kanran, taju pɛli lɛisigɛ le joo bee.
40014021	Kaa, inɛw buru kayin, yaanw lee, unrunw lee tolo go, anranw sai, inɛw muɲu numɔrɔn gin’ bee.
40014022	Sɔɔ kɔɔ galau wo digɛu, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔbei diikoro gɔ nɛ yoomaa, bemaa giru unrunmɔ nɛ dibe diŋirun waja go be galanu, unrun, mɔɔnu gɔi ginrun tiiti ye wɛɛdɔn gi.
40014023	Kɔɔ gin’ mɔɔnu gɔ yaamaatiyaa, wo tetemɛ kuu nɛ dɛiin Ama gɛɛin ulu. Digɛ yai digiyɛ baa, wo, wo turu kɔɔ nɛ yabe.
40014024	Waaru kɔɔ le, diikoro gɔ dibe logoro nɛ dɔwaayaabe. Kaa, ooɲɔ gɔ be le daii, ɛjii paŋa yasɛbe gɔ digɛu, diigunu diikoro gɔi ɛjii lagaube.
40014025	Baayaara bɛruniyaan wo kanran, Yesu dii gɔ kuu nɛ yoi yaau, be sibɛ go wɛɛube.
40014026	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe dii nɛ yoi yaau wo wɔu iyaa, liyaa kinɛ manaa bɛin. Be, Yesui, inɛ kikinui ga ɛjii piiubɛin.
40014027	Kaa, Yesu ɔgu kɛu be nɛ mii tiyaa gi: «Anrangaju kunɔi, mu Yesui, liyɛnɔugi.»
40014028	Kɔɔ waaru le, Piɛru aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, naran go kɔɔ ui ye, maa dii gɔ kuu nɛ u bɛrɛ wɛɛ giye tɔɔrɔ.»
40014029	Yesu saa womaa wɛɛ gi. Kɔɔ gin’ Piɛru diikoro gɔ nɛ gowaa, dii gɔ kuu nɛ Yesu bɛrɛ yaaube.
40014030	Kaa, ooɲɔ gɔ waaru wo iye le, wo liyaai. Dii gɔ nɛ woi piriyeube gɔ digɛu, wo mii ɛɛn le Yesu bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ gɛin: «Inɛw Baŋa, mui yaba.»
40014031	Ɔgu kɛu Yesu, numɔ unrunmɔ wajaraa, woi aa, ɔn gin’ wo le sɔi: «U inge dɛi liyiu? Gagawu uwɔ gaila.»
40014032	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, be lɛi diikoro gɔ nɛ yowaabɛin. Yoou be digɛu, ooɲɔ gɔ dɛɛnrinyaain.
40014033	Kɔɔ gin’ wo biyaa, inɛw wajunw diikoro gɔ nɛ tobɛin gɔbe, Yesu giru nɛ wiyaa tuŋiyaan ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Naran go, ui Ama Ainii.»
40014034	Nɛɛ, be dibe gɔ kɛjaa taŋaa, Jenɛsarɛtu gana nɛ yaa iŋi.
40014035	Gana gɔ bɛɛnw Yesui jugaa, yalu puu nɛ womaa wiyaai ga ginɛmaabɛin. Kɔɔ dɛi, inɛw jiungunw bemɛ puu wo bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabɛin.
40014036	Be, wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, womaa, jiungunw gɔbei pajaa ye arugoi kinrun womɔ sai be tabamɔ gɛɛbɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw woi tabin gɔbe puu bajaain.
40015001	Waaru kɔɔ le, Parisiɛnbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw lee, Jerusalɛmu gowaa wiyaa, Yesui tɛmaa, wo bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumi:
40015002	«Jaŋu unrunw uwɔ gɔbe, emɛ tirɛ anranw atɛmu gɔ inge dɛi yamalaɲu? Be jaa kayanu numɔ bemɛ aŋai jaan gin’ mɔŋɔɔnɛ.»
40015003	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa: «E kanran, inge dɛi Ama tɔɔru gɔ pajaatiyaa, atɛmu ebe giru kunaa yaauwɔi?
40015004	Sabu Ama gi: “U ba lee, u na lee baba.” Iyaa, inɛ wo ba ma, wo na ma duyaajɛ, daiti gi.
40015005	Kaa, e ɔn gin’ gɛɛjɛi: ‘U ba ma, u na ma bara ga, be bɛrɛ kijɛ u oboun jaan gɔ, u kijɛ wogɔ, Ama dɛi sin obu dɛiin wɔɔi gu ye,
40015006	waja bei baralu kanran gaju wɔlɔ.’ Ama sɔɔ pajaatiyaa ye, dilɛ womɔ nɛ, atɛmu ebe bana e kunɔjɛ gɔ, kɔɔ woi.
40015007	Ei inɛw aŋa lɛilɛigunwin. Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi e dɛi Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi wo tɔŋu ɔn, bana ebe le sɛgɛraa wɔɔ:
40015008	“Tɔgu ɔn aŋa le sai mui babajɛ. Kaa kinɛ womɔ mu le wagee wɔɔ.
40015009	Be inɛw tɔɔru gɔ, tɔɔru ma gɔ woi giye, inɛw bɛrɛ wogɔi deereɲu. Wogɔ digɛu, mui babaɲu giye, kanran be kanranjɛ gɔbe puu, kanran niwɛn sɛlɛi.”
40015010	Sɔɔ kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu mɔɔnu gɔi boonaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii keŋi ye, paamu kanrain:
40015011	Aŋa nɛ kijɛ yoojɛ, Ama sibɛ go inɛi lɔgɔjiyɛmu bɛɛlɛ. Kaa, aŋa nɛ sɔɔ goojɛ gɔ, Ama sibɛ go inɛi wo lɔgɔjiyɛmɔjɛ.»
40015012	Yesu sɔɔ kɔɔ wo sɔwaa, jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbe wo bɛrɛ wiyaa ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Sɔɔ uwɔ kɔɔ, Parisiɛnbe kinɛ jinwɛnmaabe ga jugaabeu ma?»
40015013	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa: «Mu Ba alagala nɛ wɔɔ gɔ, tiun wo yibelu gɔbe puu mɔmu goonɔtiidɛin.
40015014	Wogɔ digɛu bei yapajai. Be girumuwin. Kaa inɛw teeremɔuwɔin. Giruminɛ, giruminɛ waja teeremɔuwɔ ye, be lɛi kɛu bonɔ nɛ numɔ yoyoodɛin.»
40015015	Piɛru, sɔɔ jeɲaa Yesu womaa taanrinyɛn kɔɔ tiyɛ unrunbe bɛrɛ taga gi.
40015016	Yesu saa gi: «E yaa nimɛ kanran sɔɔ paamu kanraanlɛi ma?
40015017	Inɛ, kijɛ wo kayajɛ puu, bɛrɛ nɛ yoojɛ. Bɛrɛ gɔ le digɛnu waja bain go yaajɛ ga paamaalɛi ma?
40015018	Kaa, aŋa nɛ sɔɔ goojɛ gɔ, kinɛ nɛ goi ye wɛɛjɛ. Iyaa, wogɔ inɛwin Ama sibɛ go wo lɔgɔjiyɛmɔjɛ.
40015019	Ajubu mɔɲu kinɛ nɛ too gɔ, inɛi suuraa ye inɛ wo daamɔjɛ. Inɛ bɛrɛ dimu wo dimiyɛnmɔjɛ, inɛi sala nɛ wo kunɔjɛ, inɛi gunyɔn wo gunyɔnmɔjɛ, inɛ bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ kakalu wo goomɔjɛ, inɛ waja dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu wo sɔɔmɔjɛ.
40015020	Ama sibɛ go, inɛi kijɛ lɔgɔjiyɛmɔjɛ gɔ, kɔɔ woi. Kaa jaa kayanu, atɛmu ebe nɛ aŋai wɔɔ gin’ tee numɔ mɔŋɔnɛ giye, Ama sibɛ go inɛi lɔgɔjiyɛɛlɛ.»
40015021	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu yalu kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, Tire ana lee, Sidɔn ana lee gana sibɛ go yai.
40015022	Kaana gana yaanran turu, yalu kɔɔ nɛ yadaanbe. Wo Yesui wiyaa tɛmaa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu Baŋa, Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, amasɔgɔ ma jugɔ. Jinrun, iyaa ma kuu nɛ dɛinyaan, ɛjii woi ɔɲɔmɔuwɔ. Wo bɛrɛ ɛjii nawin wɔɔ.»
40015023	Kaa Yesu, sɔɔ turu kanran wo le saalu. Nɛɛ, jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbe genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa, wo bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ gɛɛin: «Yaanran ɔn, onu emɛ nɛ siɲɛ gabaai. Woi baraa ye, wo yaamɔ.»
40015024	Yesu saa: «Mui, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu nɛ peju manaa wɔin gɔbe sai dɛi tiin.»
40015025	Kaa, yaanran gɔ iyaa Yesu giru nɛ wiyaa tuŋiyaan ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu Baŋa, mui bara.»
40015026	Yesu saa, unrunw pana gɔ, jeɲɛ ye, iju unrunw bɛrɛ kamu tiiun jaanla gi.
40015027	Yaanran gɔ saa: «Mu Baŋa, sɔɔ uwɔ gɔ narain. Kaa halu iju unrunw, be baŋa, jaa kayanu wo daannu, jaa kɛbɛlɛ bagajɛ gɔ turo ye, kakayaɲu.»
40015028	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «U yaanran gagawu gaai sɛɛi de! Bana u dɛnɛjɛ gin’, Ama kunrin u bɛrɛ biyɛmɔ.» Waaru kɔɔ le tee, iyaa womɔ gɔ bajaai.
40015029	Yesu iyaa yalu kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, Galile dibe diŋirun nɛ yai. Wo tetemɛ turu kuu nɛ ulaa dɛinyaanbe.
40015030	Inɛw joo kɔɔ nɛ wɛi ye, woi tɛmɛubɛin. Be tegutegenw lee, girimuw lee, suguruduŋube lee, numɔ ma kubɔ ma sɛɛulain lee, iyaa jiungunw wajabe joo, wo bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabɛin. Be jiungunw gɔbe jɛɛlaa, Yesu kubɔsɔrɔ nɛ duunaabɛin. Yesu bei bajugaabe.
40015031	Suguruduŋube, sɛɛu sɔɔ sɔɔubɛin. Inɛw numɔ ma kubɔ ma sɛɛula bɛin, sɛɛu biyaain. Tegutegenw, yoi sɛɛu yaaubɛin. Iyaa, girumuw, giri iyeubɛin. Inɛw, wogɔ iyaa, be bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe. Be, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu bɛɛnw Ama gɔi sɔmɔubɛin.
40015032	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔbei boonaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛw ɔnbe mu le be digi, bai taanu dɔwaai. Nɛɛ, pana bemɛ dogaai. Amasɔgɔ bemɛ mui yasɛ. Mu giyɛ le bei ginrun tii ibɛlaun. Koi laa ye oju nɛ bei giyɛ jajarado bibiyɛ.»
40015033	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe saa: «Yalu pana wɔlɔ ɔn nɛ, inɛw ɔnbe puu kijɛ kayaido emɛ yago bɛɛdɛin.»
40015034	Kɔɔ gin’ be saa, Yesu bemaa buru aŋa sɛin ma gi. Be saa, buru sɔi lee, iiju uji gaila lee sɛin gin.
40015035	Yesu, mɔɔnu gɔ womaa minɛ gɔ nɛ dɛinyɛn gi.
40015036	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo buru sɔi gɔbe lee, iiju gɔbe lee jeɲaa, Amai birɛpoo tagaatiyaa, kabalaa, jaŋu unrunw womɔbei obu. Be mɔɔnu gɔ bɛrɛ gamalaabɛin.
40015037	Be puu wogɔ kayaa, bei baabe. Kɛbɛlɛ waju gɔ be turaa, taju sɔi joo bee.
40015038	Yaanw lee, unrunw lee tolo go, yalu kɔɔ nɛ anranw muɲu nai bee.
40015039	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, mɔɔnu gɔi tiyaatiyaa, diikoro gɔ nɛ yowaa, Magadan gana nɛ yai.
40016001	Parisiɛnbe lee, Saduseyɛnbe lee, Yesu pinɛ yɛnɛdɛin ga, genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa, womaa Ama woi tii ye unrunbe bɛrɛ wogɔ sɛɛrɛ, taanrinyɛn Ama bɛrɛ goi ye wɛɛjɛ turu le jugɔmɔ gin.
40016002	Kaa, Yesu aŋa bemɛ ɔn gin’ sai: «Digɛnai, nai numɔgu waaru le, alagala banrin wɔɔ ye, e yalu ɛjii bibiyɛdo gɛɛjɛi.
40016003	Iyaa, agapaali anran iminiyaan, gɛunniyaan wɔɔ ye, e anran ooɲɔ ihingeledo gɛɛjɛi. Alagala yɛnɛ ye, tiyɛ womɔ jugu bɛbɛɛjɛi. Kaa, emɛ kanɛ waaru inge tɔgu nɛ toin ma e wogɔ tiyɛ gɔ jugɔɔlɛi.
40016004	Kanɛ inɛw gɔbe, inɛw mɔɲu, Ama sibɛ go sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋɛlain gɔbe, taanrinyɛn iye ibɛɛ wɔin. Kaa, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Jonasu taanrinyɛn gɔi laa ye, taanrinyɛn waja be bɛrɛ kanrun ye tagaraidenɛ.» Kɔɔ gin’, Yesu bei pajaa yinyai.
40016005	Yesu jaŋu unrunw gɔbe waaru dibe diŋirun waja go be galabe le, buru jeɲɛ ga naŋaai.
40016006	Yesu gowaa, ɔn gin’ be le sɔi: «Parisiɛnbe lee, Saduseyɛnbe lee kijɛ buru pidemu bemɛ gɔ dɛi kuu ebe kajubai.»
40016007	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe tunmɔ le jiiraa ɔn gin’ gin: «Emɛ buru jeɲɛnɛ dɛi, wo sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ.»
40016008	Yesu, sɔɔ be sɔɔbe soo biyaa ɔn gin’ gi: «E inge dɛi ajubau, maa buru sɛlɛ e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi sɔɔjɛ gɛɛuwɔi? Gagawu ebe gaila de!
40016009	E nimɛ kanran paamu kanranli ma? Buru numɔrɔn, inɛw muɲu numɔrɔn bɛrɛ mu gamulu gɔ, e sɔɔ wogɔ naŋaai ma? Buru waju taju aŋa jɛɛli ma naŋaai ma?
40016010	Iyaa, buru sɔi, inɛw muɲu nai bɛrɛ mu gamulu gɔ, e sɔɔ wogɔ naŋaai ma? Buru waju taju aŋa jɛɛli ma naŋaai ma?
40016011	Nɛɛ, sɔɔ mu sɔi gɔ, buru dɛi sɔɔlun ga paamaalɛi e wɔɔ gɔ inge dɛi? Kaa Parisiɛnbe lee, Saduseyɛnbe lee kijɛ buru pidemu gɔ dɛi kuu ebe kajubai.»
40016012	Kɔɔ waaru le, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, Yesu bemaa kijɛ buru pidemu tɔitɔi dɛi kuu bemɛ kajuba gɛɛlu, kaa, Parisiɛnbe lee, Saduseyɛnbe lee deeru dɛi gi ga jugaabɛin.
40016013	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, Sesare Pilipe ana le gana diŋɛ gɔ nɛ yaabe. Wo jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumu: «Inɛw, Inɛ Aini gɔi aai gɛɛɲu?»
40016014	Be saa: «Inɛw gamuu ui Jan Batisei bulaa wɛi gɛɛɲu. Gamuu inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Elii gɛɛɲu. Gamuu iyaa Jeremii ma, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ wajai ma gɛɛɲu.»
40016015	Yesu be bɛrɛ selumaa: «Nɛɛ, e mui aai ga sɛi.»
40016016	Simɔ Piɛru aŋa womɔ saa: «Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii, Ama ɔnmɔ Ii gɔ, ui.»
40016017	Kɔɔ gin’ wo saa, Yesu wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Jan ii Simɔ, Ama u yabu. Naran u sɔi kɔɔ, Adama ii turu kanran u bɛrɛ jugɔmɔlu. Kaa, mu Ba alagala nɛ daan gɔ, u bɛrɛ wo jugɔmu.
40016018	Iyaa, mu kanran sɔɔ ɔn u bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Piɛru, ui tibu tabai. Iyaa, tibu taba wogɔ kuu nɛ mu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ma dadaanadɔn. Yinwunrun paŋa gɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kɔɔ bɛrɛ kijɛ kanma gɔnrɔindolo.
40016019	Mu alagala diinɛ taan ii gɔbe numɔ uwɔ nɛ kukunɔdɔn. Aduna nɛ kijɛ le yabalu u wɔɔ gɔ, alagala nɛ wogɔ le yabaidenɛ. Iyaa, aduna nɛ kijɛ le u yabaajɛ gɔ, alagala nɛ yaa wogɔ le yayabadɛin.»
40016020	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ ɛjii sɔwaa bemaa inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran unruin Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔi ga taganɔu gi.
40016021	Sɔɔ kɔɔ wo galu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ sɔɔ wo bɛrɛ dɔɔido daii tagai tɔlaabe: «Waajibi Jerusalɛmu yayaadɔn. Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe lee, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, mui ɛjii ɔhɔɲɔmɔdɛin. Waajibi mui dadaadɛin. Kaa bai taaniye gɔ mu bubulodɔn.»
40016022	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Piɛru woi dɛiin dimɛraan goonaa, woi sɔɔi tɔlu: «Inɛw Baŋa, kɔɔ gin’ gɛɛnɔu. Ama, wogɔ nɛ ui yaba. Sɔɔ u gɛɛjɛ kɔɔ, u bɛrɛ biyɛidolo.»
40016023	Kaa Yesu, Piɛru sibɛ go kigelemaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Setanu, genɛ ma nɛ dɔrɔ goo! U sɔɔ uwɔ le kinɛ ma yamalauwɔu. Ajubu uwɔ kɔɔ Ama bɛrɛ goolu. Kɔɔ Adama ii ajubui.»
40016024	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛ aai kanran jaŋu ii mai bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, wogɔ baŋa kuu womɔ naŋa ye, baga jai womɔ duiyi ye, mui wo dimiyɛnmɔ.
40016025	Aduna ɔn dɛi inɛ kinrun unrunmɔ yabado ga wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa, aduna wɛɛido gɔ nɛ kinrun womɔ susuyodo. Kaa inɛ kinrun unrunmɔ mu dɛi pajaajɛ, wogɔ baŋa kinrun womɔ yayabado.
40016026	Aduna ɔn puu uwɔi kanran, kinrun uwɔ suiyaai ye, niwɛn yasɛ ma? U waja kijɛ inge le kinrun uwɔ gɔ dɔrugu bɛɛdou?
40016027	Inɛ Aini gɔ, bai turu, wo Ba dooro nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ womɔ gɔbe le wɛwɛɛdo. Wo inɛ tuturu puu bɛrɛ, kanran womɔ le kɛukɛu tutujɔdo.
40016028	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw ɔn nɛ unwɔin gɔbe logoro nɛ, gamuu, Inɛ Aini gɔ, diinɛ womɔ le wo wɛɛnu iyelu go, yinwɛindenɛ.»
40017001	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe galu, bai kuloi dɔwaa wo kanran, Yesu, Piɛru lee, Jake lee, wo bainɛ Jan lee dimɛraan, be wooi sai kokoo gabu turu kuu nɛ ulin.
40017002	Yesui kubɔ turu jaŋu unrunw gɔbe giru nɛ duliyaai. Girupala womɔ nai gin’ dooroube. Sɔi womɔbe piluniyaan, wijɛ gin’ bee.
40017003	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Mɔise lee, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Eli lee, Yesu le sɔɔ sɔɔu be wɔu, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe iyaabɛin.
40017004	Kɔɔ waaru le, Piɛru Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛw Baŋa, yalu ɔn nɛ biyɛ ga ɛjii wɔɔ. U ibɛɛ wɔu ye, ɔn nɛ, mu kuru taanu kukurodɔn. Turu uwɔi, turu Mɔise mɔi, turu Eli mɔi.»
40017005	Kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, kulumɔ doorojɛ turu wiyaa bei dɛbaajɛ. Kulumɔ gɔ nɛ mii ɛgɛmaabe: «Ɔn Aini ibɛ ma gɔ woi. Wo le kinɛ ma ɛjii aa wɔɔ. Sɔɔ womɔ ɛjii keŋiyɛin.»
40017006	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe mii kɔɔ ɛgaa, kikinu bemɛ manaa, numaa sugaa, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa gɛlɛbɛin.
40017007	Kɔɔ gin’ be wɔu, Yesu, genɛ bemɛ nɛ dɔwaa, bei tabaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Liyɛnɔugi. Ingelei.»
40017008	Kuu jɛiin be kanraan, Yesui laa ye, inɛ kanma iyenɛ.
40017009	Kokoo gɔ nɛ gowaa sugou, Yesu ɔn gin’ be le sɔi: «Inɛ Aini gɔ yinwɛn ye, wo buloido baa, kijɛ kanɛ e iyi gɔ, inɛ kanma bɛrɛ wogɔ sɔɔ sɔɔnɔugi.»
40017010	Sɔɔ kɔɔ onu nɛ, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe sɔɔ ɔn Yesu bɛrɛ selumi: «Inge dɛi Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ wɛɛmɔ nɛ Eli laa pilemɛ ye wɛɛdo gɛɛɲu?»
40017011	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa: «Narain, Eli wɛi ye, kijɛ puu wo yegereun jaain wɔɔ.
40017012	Kaa mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, wo wiyaa galaai. Inɛw woi jugɔnɛ. Be kijɛ be nawan wo bɛrɛ kanraanbɛin. Inɛ Aini gɔi yaa, be kɔɔ gin’ ɔɲɔmɔdɛin.»
40017013	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, be womaa Jan Batise sɔɔi sɔɔjɛ ga jugaabɛin.
40017014	Nɛɛ, waaru mɔɔnu gɔ yalu nɛ be dɔi le, ainɛ turu Yesu giru nɛ wiyaa tuŋiyaan,
40017015	kijɛ wo gi: «Mu Baŋa, ii ma amasɔgɔ jugɔ. Wo tibu susugojɛ. Woi ɛjii ɔɲaa wɔɔ. Waaru jiun womɔ ingelaa wɔɔ, yaun nɛ ma, dii nɛ ma numaa ye koi yoojɛ.
40017016	Jaŋu unrunw uwɔ bɛrɛ woi mu jɛɛlaa, be woi bajamaa bɛɛnɛ.»
40017017	Yesu saa: «Aa! E inɛw mɔɲu, gagawu sɛnɛ gɔbe, waaru yagɔ baa e le mu biyɛun jaan? Waaru yagɔ baa ei muyɔndɔn? Ii gɔi ɔn nɛ mu bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛi.»
40017018	Yesu, jinrun gɔi ɛjii ganwaan wo kanran, jinrun gɔ ii gɔ kuu nɛ gowaai. Waaru wogɔ le tee ii gɔ bajaai.
40017019	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, waja Yesu be wooi sai wɔu, genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa, ɔn gin’ selumi: «Emɛ inge dɛi jinrun gɔ nanaa bɛɛnɛ kanrin?»
40017020	Yesu saa: «Gagawu gaila ebe sabu dɛii. Kɔɔi laa ye, mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, gagawu ebe gɔ halu mutarudu ii popoo baa bee ye, kokoo ɔn womaa, ɔn nɛ goi ye, kɔɔ nɛ yaa e gi ye, yayaabe. Kijɛ gɔnrɔɔnlɛ e wɔɔ turu kanran biyɛidolo. [
40017021	Kaa jinrun kɔɔ tunmɔ gɔ, Ama gɛɛn lee, aŋapagu lee le sai nana goonɔ bɛɛmɔjɛ.]»
40017022	Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee, Galile gana nɛ wɔu, Yesu be le sɔwaa: «Inɛ Aini gɔi inɛw numɔ nɛ kukunɔdɛin.
