41016002	Kunrin, jugu bai pɔlɔ gɔ, aga, giresin, nai tumɔgu waaru gɔ le, be ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaabɛin.
41016003	Ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaau wɔu, be tunmɔ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Ɔnsain gɔ nɛ dɔwaa ye, dumɔ diyɛ murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ pinɛ gɔ, inɛ aa emɛ bɛrɛ dunɔrɔnmu obodo?»
41016004	Kaa be yɛnaa, dumɔ diyɛ gɔ dunɔrɔnmaa, goonaatiyaabɛin ga be iyaabɛin.
41016005	Be ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yowaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ sagatara ii turu, arugoi pilu le numɔ iin bemɛ sibɛ go wo daaun be iyaabɛin. Yaanw gɔbe woi iyaa, liyaain.
41016006	Kaa, sagatara ii gɔ be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «E kai, liyɛnɔugi. E, Yesu, Nasarɛtu ana bɛɛnnɛ, baga jai nɛ pɛgaa dain gɔi dɛnɛjɛi. Wo ɔn nɛ tolo. Wo bulaai. Yɛnɛi! Yalu wo diinbe gɔ unwɔ.
41016007	Nɛɛ yaai, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bemaa bana be bɛrɛ pɔɔlɔ baa wo tagaabe le kɛukɛu, wo Galile gana nɛ giru bemɛ nɛ yaai wa. Bemaa kɔɔ nɛ woi iyedɛin wa. Piɛru bɛrɛ taga ga naŋanɔugi.»
41016008	Yaanw gɔbe liliyɛ le jowaa wɔu, kinwɛun, ɔnsain gɔ nɛ gowaa, wagee jɔbaa yain. Liliyɛ bemɛ sabu dɛi be inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran, sɔɔ kanma taganɛ. [
41016009	Jugu bai pɔlɔ gɔ agapaali, Yesu bulaa, Mari Magudala bɛɛnnɛ bɛrɛ laa unruin taguru. Wo Mari wogɔ kuu nɛ jinrun sɔi baa nanaa goonu.
41016010	Nɛɛ, Mari, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe yiun pii piiu, sɔmiyɛun be wɔu wiyaa tɛmaa, kibɛru gɔ be bɛrɛ tagaabe.
41016011	Kaa Yesu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ, unrun woi iyaabɔn ga, Mari wo sɔwaa waaru be ɛgu le, be wo le gawanɛ.
41016012	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ana dagi turu oju nɛ, Yesu unruin jaŋu unrunw lɛi bɛrɛ bana waja le tagaraabe.
41016013	Be ginrun wiyaa jaŋu unrunw wajunw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɔɔ gɔ tagaabɛin. Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, kɔɔbɛɛnw le yaa gawanɛ.
41016014	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, jaŋu unrunw pɛli turusigɛ gɔbe jaa kayau be wɔu, Yesu be bɛrɛ wiyaa unruin taguru. Yesu bulaai ga inɛw iyin gɔbe sɛɛrɛ le gawanɛ be kanrun gɔ dɛi, Yesu, gagawu sɛlɛ bemɛ lee, kɔkɔlɔ maa bemɛ lee dɛi bei pɛbaabe.
41016015	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Aduna kale wooi nɛ yaai. Inɛw puu bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagai.
41016016	Inɛ kole gawaa, unruin batise kanranmaajɛ, inɛ wogɔi yayabadɛin. Kaa inɛ kole gawalu gɔ, kuu womɔ nɛ jarugu duduurɔdɛin.
41016017	Inɛw kole gawaidɛin gɔbe taanrinyɛn birɛ be birɛido gɔbe unwɔ: Be boi ma le inɛ kuu nɛ jinrun nananadɛin. Be sɔɔ kana sɔsɔɔdɛin.
41016018	Be yuguru numɔ bemɛ le aaɲu kanran, dugo kayaaɲu kanran, kijɛ kanma be bɛrɛ biyɛidolo. Jiungunw kuu nɛ numɔ yayaŋarandɛin, be babajadɛin.»
41016019	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe be le sɔwaatiyaa, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu alagala go ulaa, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ go dɛinyin.
41016020	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, yalu wooi nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagai yaabɛin. Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, birɛ wogɔ nɛ bei baraube. Waaju be tagajɛ gɔ narain ga inɛw bemaa jugɔ ga wo taanrinyɛn birɛ joo be bɛrɛ birɛmɔube.]
42001001	Inɛw joo, logoro emɛ nɛ sɔɔ biyaabe gɔ mainiyaan tɔŋaabɛin.
42001002	Be, sɔɔ gɔbe giri bemɛ le tɔlɔgu gɔ baa, inɛw iyenw gɔbe, iyaa lee inɛw pilemaa Kibɛru Ɛju birɛbirɛnwin biyaabɛin gɔbe, bana emɛ bɛrɛ be tagu gin’ tee, tɔŋaabɛin.
42001003	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Teyɔpile, baŋa ire, sɔɔ kɔɔbe digu le digu le tɔŋaa, u bɛrɛ tii ga, mu bɛrɛ yaa ɛjii wɔɔ.
42001004	Kɔɔ le digɛnu uwaa kijɛ ui deerin gɔbe narain jugɔ ga mu tɔŋɔuwɔn.
42001005	Herɔde, Judea gana ɔgɔnɛi waaru wo bee le, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ turu yabe. Boi womɔ Jakari gɛɛbɛin. Wo Abia tɔgui bee. Yaanran womɔ boi Elisabɛtu gɛɛbɛin, Aarɔn tiruwɛnɛ turui.
42001006	Jakari lee, Elisabɛtu lee, Ama giru nɛ inɛw teitai bɛin. Be Inɛw Baŋa Ama tɔɔru gɔbe lee, sɔɔ womɔ gɔbe lee, lelu tolo go ɛjii kajubaubɛin.
42001007	Kaa be ii sɛbenɛ. Sabu Elisabɛtu yaanran ii naraanlɛi bee. Iyaa be lɛi puu inɛw pɛii bɛin.
42001008	Bai turu Jakari, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ kɔlɔ nɛ, Ama bɛrɛ sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ birɛube. Sabu dinrɛn gɔ tɔgu womɔ inɛw mɔi bee.
42001009	Womaa Inɛw Baŋa Ama Ginrun Diyɛ kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ yoo ye, mɔi jiɲu ɛju gɔ, Ama bɛrɛ sadaga tɛgɛrɛ ga, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw atɛmu le kɛukɛu, keriteŋu gɔ Jakari kuu nɛ sugaabe.
42001010	Mɔi jiɲu ɛju tɛguru waaru le inɛw gɔbe puu bain go, Ama gɛɛun bɛin.
42001011	Kɔɔ waaru le Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu, Jakari bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mɔi jiɲu ɛju gɔ yalu tɛgɛrɛɲu numɔ iin sibɛ go iŋɛbe.
42001012	Jakari, Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔi waaru wo iye le, saii bimiliyaai. Wo ɛjii liyaabe.
42001013	Kaa mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ wo le kijɛ gi: «Jakari, u liyɛnɔu, sabu Ama, gɛɛn uwɔ gɔ saati. Yaanran uwɔ Elisabɛtu, u bɛrɛ aini narun ohobodo. U ii gɔ boi Jan kunɔ.
42001014	U ii gɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ bɛbɛɛdou. Inɛw joo, ii gɔ naraanɲu dɛi kinɛ bemɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛdo.
42001015	Wo Inɛw Baŋa Ama giru nɛ inɛ diyɛi biyɛdo. Wo resɛndii ilɛ ma, kijɛ inɛi bimiliyejɛ turu kanran nɔɔidolo. Wo na bɛrɛ nɛ baa, wo Kikinu Pilu le joi ye biyɛdo.
42001016	Wo Isɛrɛlu inɛw jooi, pilemɛ ye Inɛw Baŋa Ama bemɛ bɛrɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdo.
42001017	Wo giru womɔ nɛ, Eli bana lee, Eli gɔnrɔn sɛbe gɔ lee le bii ye, birɛ birɛdo. Kɔɔ le digɛnu banw gɔbei pilemɛ ye unrunw gɔbe le mɔmɔɔnɔdo. Iyaa inɛw kɔkɔlɔmaagunw gɔbei dulomɔ ye, inɛw teitai wɔin gɔbe hakilɛ bɛbɛɛmɔdo. Wo Inɛw Baŋa Ama bɛrɛ tɔgu kinɛ yeguru ɛju le wɔɔ bobojodo.»
42001018	Jakari, Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ aŋa saa gi: «Mui pɛyaai, iyaa yaanran ma yaa inɛ pɛii. Nɛɛ, mu wogɔ yani jugɔdɔn ma?»
42001019	mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ wo le saa gi: «Mui Gabiriɛlui, Ama giru nɛ mui iŋɛ. U bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔ ga, iyaa kibɛru ɛju kɔɔ u bɛrɛ taga ga mui tiyaaɲu.
42001020	Yɛnɛ, u waja sɔɔ sɔi bɛɛidolou. Sɔɔ gɔ bai kibeido dɔɔ baa, aŋa uwɔ pagiyaado. Sabu u sɔɔ u bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔ le gawalu. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe, waaru gɔ dɔwaai ye, sɛɛu kikibedɛin.»
42001021	Kɔɔ waaru le mɔɔnu gɔ Jakarii dɔmɔbe. Nɛɛ Jakari, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ toun tanwaain dɛi be bɛrɛ maunɛ bee.
42001022	Bain waaru wo goi le, Jakari, mɔɔnu gɔ le sɔɔ sɔwaa bɛɛlu. Kɔɔ waaru le, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ tou, wo kuu iye turu iyaabe ga, be jugaabɛin. Wo numɔ ii le be le sɔɔ sɔɔube, aŋa womɔ pagiyaayaabe.
42001023	Jakari, birɛ luumɔ womɔ galaai onu nɛ, wo pilemaa ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ yai.
42001024	Bai dagaa galaai onu nɛ, yaanran womɔ Elisabɛtu, bɛrɛ jeɲaabe. Wo iyepilu numɔrɔn baa inɛw giru nɛ baŋiyaanbe. Wo ɔn gin’ sɔɔube:
42001025	«Inɛw Baŋa Ama, giri womɔ mu bɛrɛ waaru wo dɛɛru le, inɛw giru nɛ kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔgɔi bee gɔ goonaabe. Kijɛ mu bɛrɛ wo kanrun gɔ kɔɔ woi.»
42001026	Elisabɛtu, bɛrɛ jeɲu iyepilu kuloiye gɔ, mɛlɛnkɛ Gabiriɛlu, Ama woi Galile gana nɛ Nasarɛtu ana nɛ,
42001027	iyaa aala turu ginrun nɛ tii. Iyaa aala gɔ, ainɛ turu, boi womɔ Josɛpu gɛɛbɛin gɔ, Dawide ginrun bɛɛnnɛ turu yaalai bee. Boi womɔ Mari gɛɛbɛin.
42001028	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaa kijɛ gi: «Poo, u inɛ Ama nɛɛma diyɛ biyaajɛ gɔ. Inɛw Baŋa Ama u le wɔɔ.»
42001029	Kaa Mari liyaa, kikinu manu le bee. Wo poo gɔ tiyɛ gɔ ingei ma ajubau bee.
42001030	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ kɔɔ waaru le wo le kijɛ gi: «Mari, u turu kanran liyɛnɔu, sabu Ama nɛɛma u le yɔɔ.
42001031	Yɛnɛ, u bɛrɛ bɛbɛrɛdou, aini nanarandou, boi womɔ Yesu kukunɔdou.
42001032	Woi inɛ diyɛi bibiyɛdo, iyaa woi Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ Ainii gɛgɛɛdɛin. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, wo tirɛ ainɛ Dawide ɔgɔdɔin gɔ wo bɛrɛ ohobodo.
42001033	Wo asuu Jakɔbu tɔgu gɔi laamu kakanrando, iyaa laamu womɔ dumɔ siyɛidolo.»
42001034	Mari, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ le kijɛ gi: «Sɔɔ kɔɔ yani kanrun bɛɛmɔdo ma? Sabu mu ainɛ inɔn.»
42001035	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Kikinu Pilu gɔ kuu uwɔ nɛ susugodo. Iyaa, Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ gɔ gɔnrɔn, kini gin’ ui dɛdɛbɛdo. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi ii dɛin u naraindo gɔ, woi Ama Ainii gɛɛdɛin.
42001036	Yɛnɛ, Elisabɛtu, yaanran u mɛrɛnnɛ gɔ, wo kanran pɛi womɔ kuu nɛ aini naran ga bɛrɛ jeɲaa wɔɔ. Yaanran ii naraanlɛi ga gɛɛubɛin gɔ, kanɛ iyepilu kuloi baa bɛrɛ le wɔɔ.
42001037	Sabu Ama kijɛ kanrun bɛɛidolo wo wɔɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ.»
42001038	Mari aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Yɛnɛ, mui Inɛw Baŋa Ama gunɔ yaanrain. Sɔɔ u sɔi gɔ le kɛukɛu, mu bɛrɛ kunrin biyɛmɔ.» Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ Marii pajaatiyaa yaai.
42001039	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe biyɛun be digɛu, Mari ingelaa, ɔgu kɛu, kokoo sibɛ go Judea ana turu nɛ yaabe.
42001040	Wo Jakari ginrun nɛ yowaa, Elisabɛtui poonaabe.
42001041	Elisabɛtu, Mari poo kunu gɔ waaru wo ɛgu le, ibanrin kɔlɔ womɔ nɛ too gɔ ɔgu bɔnrinyaanbe. Kɔɔ waaru le Kikinu Pilu Elisabɛtu nɛ jowaabe.
42001042	Elisabɛtu, mii ɛɛn le sɔwaa gi: «Yaanw logoro nɛ sigɛ le ui duba kanraanɲu, iyaa ii kɔlɔ uwɔ nɛ too gɔ yaa duba wo le wɔɔ.
42001043	Kijɛ inge ma dɛi Inɛw Baŋa ma na gɔ mu bɛrɛ wɛɛu wɔɔ ma?
42001044	Sabu yɛnɛ, waaru poo u kunu gɔ suguru ma nɛ yoi le, ibanrin gɔ kɔlɔ ma nɛ kinɛ ɛɛlu le bɔnrinyaanbe.
42001045	Sɔɔ Inɛw Baŋa Ama sɔi gɔ kikibedo ga u yaanran gawaa wɔɔ gɔ, Ama u yabu.»
42001046	Kɔɔ waaru le Mari saa gi: «Kinɛ ma Inɛw Baŋa Amai demɛniyɛnmɔuwɔ.
42001047	Mu Ama, mui Yabanɛ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛlu le wɔun.
42001048	Sabu gunɔ yaanran gailiyɛmaaɲu gɔ sibɛ go, wo giri unrunmɔ dɛɛraabe. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi yɛnɛ, waja, tɔgu gɔbe puu Ama mu yabu gɛɛdɛin.
42001049	Ama, gɔnrɔn baŋa gɔ, mu dɛi kijɛ diyɛ kanraanjɛ. Boi womɔ gaai wɔɔ.
42001050	Amasɔgɔjugɔ womɔ gɔ, inɛw giri womɔ liyɛnw gɔbe sibɛ go asuu dumɔ siyɛidolo.
42001051	Wo birɛ diyɛ diyɛ numɔ womɔ paŋa le biraabe. Inɛw kinɛ unrunbemɛ nɛ kuu ulo le jowaa wɔin gɔbei digaa tiyaabe.
42001052	Wo ɔgɔnw gɔbe ɔgɔdɔin bemɛ nɛ nanaa goonaati. Dɔgɔpaganw gɔbe kuu unaabe.
42001053	Giyɛgunw gɔbe kakayɔn ɛju le bei baamaabe. Ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbei numɔ ije le digaa tiyaabe.
42001054	Wo Isɛrɛlu tɔgu, birɛbirɛnw womɔ gɔbei baraabe. Wo bana emɛ babe le pui wo kunaabe gin’ amasɔgɔjugɔ womɔ gɔ Abarahamu lee, wo tirɛnw gɔbe lee dɛi asuu naŋalu.»
42001056	Mari iyepilu taanu gin’ Elisabɛtu le biyaa, kɔɔ onu nɛ pilemaa ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ yai.
42001057	Elisabɛtu, bɛrɛ womɔ wo dɔwaa, wo aini naraanbe.
42001058	Ginrun diŋu womɔ inɛw gɔbe lee, wo mɛrɛnw gɔbe lee, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, amasɔgɔ womɔ jugaabe ga ɛgaa, Elisabɛtu le bariyaa kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmaabɛin.
42001059	Ii gɔi narin bai gagaraye gɔ woi araa nɔɔmɔi wiyaabɛin. Be boi womɔ wo ba Jakari boi gɔ kunaabɛin.
42001060	Kaa ii na gɔ saa gi: «Ai, boi womɔ Jan gɛɛdɛin.»
42001061	Be saa: «U mɛrɛnw logoro nɛ inɛ boi kɔɔ gin’ boonɔɲu turu kanran wɔlɔ.»
42001062	Be numɔ ii le ii gɔ ba bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔwaabɛin, womaa ii gɔ boi inge kunu ibɛɛ bee ma gin.
42001063	Jakari, baga kɛkɛbu dɔn tɔŋu turu selumaa, wo ɔn gin’ tɔŋu: “Boi womɔ gɔ Jan woi.” Inɛw gɔbe puu bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaabe.
42001064	Kɔɔ waaru le tee Jakari aŋa pagalaai. Wo sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabe. Amai sɔmɔube.
42001065	Ginrun diŋu inɛw gɔbe puu liyaabɛin. Judea kokoo gana wooi nɛ kijɛ kɔɔbe puu dɛi sɔɔ sɔɔubɛin.
42001066	Inɛw sɔɔ kɔɔbe ɛgɛnw gɔbe puu ajubu ajubu yɛnɛubɛin. Iyaa kuu unrunbemɛ selumɛubɛin, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ii ɔn, inge ii tɔgui biyɛdo?» Inɛw Baŋa Ama gɔnrɔn diyɛ gɔ naran go ii gɔ le yabe.
42001067	Jakari, Jan Batise ba gɔ, Kikinu Pilu le jowaa, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔwaabe:
42001068	«Inɛw Baŋa, Isɛrɛlu Ama gɔ, boi womɔ sɔmi biyɛmɔ. Sabu wo tɔgu womɔ inɛwin yɛnɛi wiyaa, kuu bemɛ goonaabe.
42001069	Wo gunɔnɛ womɔ Dawide tɔgu nɛ, Yabanɛ diyɛ, paŋa sɛɛ gɔi, ingelemaajɛ.
42001070	Ama pɔɔlɔ baa inɛw titiyaanw ɛjaa womɔbe le digɛu bana wo sɔwaabe gin’,
42001071	wo jaŋuw emɛ numɔ nɛ lee, inɛw emi ibiliyaa wɔin gɔbe numɔ nɛ lee, emi yayabado ga pui kunaabe.
42001072	Kɔɔ gin’ wo amasɔgɔjugɔ womɔ, emɛ babe bɛrɛ tatagarado gi. Wo iyaa, aaru asuu kɔɔlɔɔlɛ womɔ gɔ naŋaidolo gi.
42001073	Sabu Ama, Abarahamu emɛ tirɛ ainɛ bɛrɛ, kuu unrunmɔ jɛbiyaa, pui kunaa,
42001074	jaŋuw emɛ numɔ nɛ emi yayabado gi. Emaa, liliyɛ sɛlɛ le woi demɛniyɛnmɔ ga,
42001075	bai emɛ wooi nɛ emaa, giru womɔ nɛ inɛw kuu emɛ wo bɛrɛ sɛɛu obaa wɔiin biyɛ ga, inɛw teitai biyɛ ga, wo kunrin kanraanbe.
42001076	Nɛɛ, u, aini ma, ui Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ gɔ titiyainɛi ga gɛgɛɛdɛin. Sabu u Inɛw Baŋa giru nɛ bii ye, oju womɔ yegerenɛi biyɛdou.
42001077	Iyaa, kɔɔ gin’ yayabu gɔ, hakɛ yaabu kanrun le bɛɛmɔjɛ ga, tɔgu womɔ inɛw bɛrɛ jugɔmɔdou.
42001078	Ama emɛ gɔ, wo ihibɛ lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee le jowaa wɔɔ. Inɛw ɔlɔ nɛ daain gɔbe lee, inɛw yiun kini nɛ daain gɔbe leei wijɛmɔ ga, iyaa emi jamu oju nɛ dimɛrɛn yaa ga, kodɛi nai tumɔgu wijɛ gɔ, emɛ dɛi dodoorodo.»
42001080	Ii gɔ gabiyɛube, iyaa hakilɛ yaa bɛɛ bɛɛ yaaube. Isɛrɛlu tɔgu bɛrɛ unruin wo tagaraido baa, wo olusolo nɛ biyaabe.
42002001	Waaru wogɔ le, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ Ogusute gɛɛbɛin gɔ, laamu womɔ gana gɔbe nɛ, inɛw gɔbe wooi lugo ga, tɔɔru ginɛgaabe.
42002002	Lugo pɔlɔ wogɔ waaru le, Siri gana nɛ sɛmɛginɛ daanbe gɔ, Kiriniusu gɛɛbɛin.
42002003	Inɛ tuturu puu gowaa, inɛ kanma ana womɔ tɔitɔi nɛ yaa ye, unruin lugomɔbe.
42002004	Kɔɔ gin’, Josɛpu yaa, Galile gana, Nasarɛtu nɛ gowaa, Judea gana nɛ, Dawide ana, Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu gɛɛbɛin gɔ nɛ yaabe. Sabu wo Dawide ginrun bɛɛnnɛi, wo tiruwɛnɛi.
42002005	Josɛpu, boi unrunmɔ lee, yaalai womɔ Mari boi lee tɔŋɔmɔi yaabe. Mari bɛrɛ le bee.
42002006	Waaru Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu nɛ be bee le, Mari bɛrɛ dɔwaai.
42002007	Wo bɛrɛ pɔlɔ unrunmɔ aini naraan, sɔi le munaa, arusɛgɛ koro nɛ duunaabe. Sabu, yerunw ginrun sugo yalu gɔ nɛ, be yalu bɛɛnɛ.
42002008	Gana turu wogɔ nɛ, pejugirɛnw olu nɛ yabɛin. Be bɛlu kulɔ bemɛ dɔmɔnu baa yaaubɛin.
42002009	Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu, giru bemɛ nɛ wiyaa iŋiyaanbe. Ama dooro gɔ, yalu be bee gɔi ɛjii wijɛmaabe. Kɔɔ waaru le liliyɛ diyɛ kinɛ bemɛ nɛ yowaabe.
42002010	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ be le kijɛ gi: «E turu kanran liyɛnɔugi. Sabu yɛnɛi, mu kibɛru ɛju inɛw puu dɛi kinɛ ɛɛli sɔɔi biyɛido e bɛrɛ tagai wɛiun.
42002011	Dawide ana nɛ, iye, Yabanɛ e dɛi naraanɲu. Wogɔ Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa gɔ woi.
42002012	Ɔn e bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛi biyɛdo: E ibanrin turu sɔi le munaa, arusɛgɛ koro nɛ wo diinnu tɛtɛmɛdei.»
42002013	Ɔgu kɛu, mɛlɛnkɛ kulɔ joo, alagala gowaa mɛlɛnkɛ pɔlɔ mɔ gɔ le bariyaa, Ama boi sɔmɔu, kijɛ be gɛɛbe:
42002014	«Daa go, alagala nɛ, Ama boi sɔmi biyɛmɔ. Aduna nɛ inɛw Ama kinɛ aamɔw gɔbe, jamu be le biyɛ.»
42002015	Kɔɔ gin’, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe waaru bei pajaatiyaa, alagala be yai le, pejugirɛnw gɔbe tunmɔ le kijɛ be gi: «Kɔɔ gin’ biyaai ye, emɛ Bɛtɛlɛhɛmu baa yaamɔi. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ jugɔmu gɔ yɛnɛi yaamɔi.»
42002016	Be ɔgu kɛu gowaa yaabɛin. Be Mari lee, Josɛpu leei tɛmaabɛin. Ibanrin gɔ yaa, arusɛgɛ koro nɛ wo diiun tɛmaabɛin.
42002017	Waaru kɔɔ be iyi le, be ibanrin gɔ dɛi sɔɔ be bɛrɛ tagin gɔbe jugɔmaabɛin.
42002018	Pejugirɛnw gɔbe sɔɔ sɔin inɛw ɛgɛnw gɔbe puu bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaabe.
42002019	Kaa Mari, sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu kinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ gɛliyaa, ajubaube.
42002020	Pejugirɛnw gɔbe wogɔ nɛ gowaa, pilemaa yalu bemɛ nɛ yaau, bana be bɛrɛ jugɔmi le kɛukɛu, kijɛ be ɛgu lee, kijɛ be iyi lee dɛi Amai sɔmɔubɛin, woi babaubɛin.
42002021	Yesui narin bai gagaraye gɔ, woi araa nɔɔmɔɲu bai gɔ, boi womɔ Yesu kuni. Boi wogɔ mɛlɛnkɛ, Mari, bɛrɛ bɛrɛlu baa, boi kunu gɔ woi.
42002022	Nɛɛ, Mɔise tɔɔru le kɛukɛu bei ɛjɛmɔidɛin bai gɔ wo dɔwaa, be ii gɔi gɛliyaa Jerusalɛmu yaabɛin. Inɛw Baŋa Ama tɔɔru nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “Aini pɔlɔ naraindɛin puu, Inɛw Baŋa Ama dɛi woi dɛiin bobojodɛin.” Sɔɔ kɔɔ le kɛukɛu ii gɔi Ama bɛrɛ sagu gawaraabɛin.
42002024	Iyaa Inɛw Baŋa Ama tɔɔru le kɛukɛu, sadaga goonɔu jaain wɔɔ gɔ, “pelegele lɛi ma, gurumɔ unrunw lɛi ma”, be sadaga wogɔ goonaabɛin.
42002025	Ainɛ turu yaa Jerusalɛmu nɛ yabe. Boi womɔ Simɛyɔn gɛɛbɛin. Wo ainɛ teitai bee, iyaa wo Ama giri liyɛnɛi bee. Ainɛ kɔɔ, inɛ wɛɛ ye kinɛ kaalu Yahutunw tɔgu bɛrɛ obonɛ gɔi dɔmiyaan bee. Kikinu Pilu wo nɛ yatobe.
42002026	Kikinu Pilu wo bɛrɛ jugɔmaa, womaa Inɛw Baŋa Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔi giri womɔ le iyelu go, yiun wo bɛrɛ dɔɔidolo gi.
42002027	Ama Kikinu woi dimɛraan, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ jɛɛlaabe. Josɛpu lee, Mari lee, Mɔise tɔɔru nɛ, kijɛ ibanrin gɔ dɛi kanraun dagaa gɔ kibemɔ ga, waaru Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ ii gɔi be jɛɛlu le,
42002028	Simɛyɔn, ibanrin gɔi amugiyaa gɛliyaa, ɔn gin’ Amai birɛpoo tagaabe:
42002029	«Inɛw Baŋa, nɛɛ bana u sɔwaabe gin’, u gunɔnɛ uwɔ gɔi pajaa ye jamu le yaamɔ.
42002030	Sabu inɛw wooi giru nɛ yayabu u yegeraabe gɔ, giri ma iyaajɛ.
42002032	Wogɔ wijɛi biyɛdo. Wijɛ le digɛnu tɔgu wooi ui jugɔidɛin gɔi. Iyaa, tɔgu uwɔ Isɛrɛlu boi ɛju goi sɔɔi biyɛdo.»
42002033	Ii ba gɔ lee, ii na gɔ lee, ibanrin gɔ dɛi kijɛ sɔɔbɛin gɔ bei ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe.
42002034	Simɛyɔn, bei duba kanraantiyaa, ii na Mari le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ii ɔn Isɛrɛlu nɛ inɛw joo wo dɛi numɔ ye susugodɛin, iyaa inɛw joo gamuu wo sabu dɛi pilemɛ ye ingilu bɛbɛɛdɛin. Woi Ama sɛɛrɛi biyɛdo. Sɛɛrɛ le inɛw joo jaiyɛidɛin biyɛdo.
42002035	Kɔɔ le digɛnu wo sɔɔ boŋurun inɛw joo kinɛ nɛ too gɔ jujugɔmɔdo. Kaa u kai, ii na gɔ, kinɛjiun kinɛ uwɔ polukaaba gin’ sɔsɔbɔdo.»
42002036	Iyaa, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ, boi womɔ Anɛ gɛɛbɛin gɔ yaa yabe. Woi Panuɛlu iyaai bee. Asɛru tɔgui bee. Anɛ yaanran pɛii bee. Wo anranguju sɔi, gulɔi womɔ waaru le igɛ wo ɛi gɔ le biyaa,
42002037	panu dɛinyaan, igɛ ɛɛlu. Anranguju womɔ pɛgagara naisigɛ bee. Wo Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ goobele. Wo aŋapagu lee, amagɛɛn lee nɛ biyaa, aga lee, digɛ lee, Ama babaube.
42002038	Kɔɔ gin’ wo yaa, waaru kɔɔ le tee Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ yowaa, Amai birɛpoo tagai tɔlaabe. Ama, Jerusalɛmui numɔ nɛ goonɔido bai inɛw dɔmɔbɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ, wo ii gɔ sɔɔ sɔɔube.
42002039	Inɛw Baŋa Ama tɔɔru nɛ kijɛ kanraun jaain wɔɔ gɔbe puu waaru be kibemu le, Josɛpu lee, Mari lee, Galile gana nɛ, ana bemɛ Nasarɛtu nɛ pilemaa yain.
42002040	Ii gɔ kai bariyɛube, gɔnrɔn bɛɛ bɛɛ yaaube. Wo hakilɛ le jowaa bee, iyaa, Ama nɛɛma gɔ wo le bee.
42002041	Yesui naranw gɔbe, anranguju tuturu wooi, be Taŋagalu janwan gɔ dɛi Jerusalɛmu nɛ yaaubɛin.
42002042	Taŋagalu janwan atɛmu gɔ le kɛukɛu, Yesu, anranguju pɛli lɛisigɛ womɔ waaru wo bɛi le, wo lee, wo maranw gɔbe lee, be Jerusalɛmu yaabɛin.
42002043	Kaa, janwan gɔ kilaa, waaru ginrun pilemaa be yaaube le, Yesu, Jerusalɛmu nɛ yabii. Woi naranw gɔbe soo sɛbenɛ.
42002044	Ajubu bemɛ nɛ, Yesu, inɛw mɔɔnu yoi yaanw be bɔɔnw gɔbe le digiyaa yai ga sɛbɛin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi be bai turu sɛɛu yoi yaa, be mɛrɛnw lee, inɛw be igu gɔbe lee logoro nɛ, Yesui dɛnaabɛin.
42002045	Kaa woi dɛnaa iyenɛ kanraan, be pilemaa woi dɛnɛ dɛnɛ Jerusalɛmu wiyaabɛin.
42002046	Bai taaniye gɔ, be Yesu, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ kɔlɔ nɛ, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe logoro nɛ dɛinyaan, bei keŋiyɛun, iyaa selumu be bɛrɛ selumɛu wo wɔu yaa tɛmaabɛin.
42002047	Inɛw sɔɔ womɔ ɛgɛnw gɔbe puu, hakilɛ womɔ gɔ lee, bana aŋa wo saabe gɔ lee, be bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ bee.
42002048	Mari lee, Josɛpu lee, waaru Yesui be iye le, be bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ biyaabe. Wo na wo le kijɛ gi: «U inge dɛi ɔn gin’ emɛ bɛrɛ kanraanbeu ma? Yɛnɛ, u ba lee, mu lee, emɛ ui dɛnɛu ɛjii liyaabɛin.»
42002049	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «E inge dɛi mui dɛnɛubei ma? E maa, mu Ba birɛ mu birɛun dagaa ga inin ma?»
42002050	Kaa be sɔɔ wo sɔɔbe gɔ paamu kanraunbenɛ.
42002051	Kɔɔ gin’ wo onu bemɛ nɛ dimiyaan, Nasarɛtu nɛ wiyaabe. Iyaa, wo sɔɔ bemɛ yabaube. Wo na, sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu, kinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ gɛliyɛube.
42002052	Yesu, hakilɛ bɛɛ bɛɛ yaaube, sɛɛu gabiyɛube. Ama lee, inɛw lee giru nɛ, sɔɔ womɔ ɛjii bee.
42003001	Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ Tibɛre, ɔgɔ wo dɛinyin anranguju pɛli numɔrɔnsigɛye gɔ le, waaru Pɔnse Pilate, Judea sɛmɛginɛi bee le, Herɔde, Galile kuu nɛ waaru daanbe le, iyaa Herɔde bainɛ Pilipe, Iture gana lee, Tarakonite gana lee, waaru laamu wo kanraunbe le, Lisaniasu, Abilɛnɛ kuu nɛ waaru daanbe le,
42003002	iyaa waaru Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa birɛ nɛ Hanɛ lee, Kayipe lee tobɛin le, waaru wogɔ le tee, Jakari aini Jan, olusolo nɛ, Ama, sɔɔ unrunmɔ wo bɛrɛ obaabe.
42003003	Jan kɔɔ gin’ Jurudɛn dibe le bɛrii gana daanbɛin wooi nɛ gɔŋɔlɔube. Wo inɛwin waaju kanraun, bemaa hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛɛ ga, bana bemɛ dulomɔ ye, batise yoo gɛɛube.
42003004	Wogɔ, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ ɔn le sɛgɛraai: “Olusolo nɛ inɛ turu mii goonaabe. Kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: ‘E Inɛw Baŋa oju gɔ yegerei. Oji womɔbe demu demu bojoi.
42003005	Ɔmɔrɔn wooi jojoonɔdɛin. Kokoo wooi lee, dudumu wooi lee dumii bobojodɛin. Bɛdɛ yalu gɔni wɔɔ gɔ wooi, pilemaa ye demu demu bobojodɛin. Iyaa, oju kuɲu gɔbe wooi ɔnrɔnni bobojodɛin.
42003006	Adama unrunw wooi, Ama yayabu gɔ ihiyedɛin.’”
42003007	Inɛw mɔɔnu joo wo bɛrɛ wɛi ye, unrunbei batise kanranmɔubɛin gɔbe le, Jan kijɛ gi: «E yuguru kɔkɔju tɔgu gɔbe, Ama kinɛbanrun wɛɛido gɔ nɛ ebaa ɛli goo ga aa ei tinwinrun?
42003008	Bana ebe duliyaai ga, birɛ ebe le tagarai. Iyaa, kinɛ ebe kɔlɔ nɛ Abarahamu e bai ga gɛɛnu biyɛnɔugi. Sabu mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Ama, tibu e iyejɛ ɔnbei bilemɛ ye, Abarahamu unrunwin bojo bɛbɛɛjɛ.
42003009	Kanɛ baa, gulɔ tiun duu gɔ dɛŋɛido gɔ, yɛgaa wɔɔ. Tiun, ii ɛju naraanlɛ gɔbe puu kɛjɛ ye yaun nɛ kunɔdɛin.»
42003010	Kɔɔ waaru le, mɔɔnu gɔ, nɛɛ kijɛ inge unrunbe kanraun dagaa ma Jan bɛrɛ selumi.
42003011	Jan, aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Inɛ aai kanran, arugoi lɛi sɛɛ ye, turu gɔ inɛ sɛlɛ baŋa bɛrɛ obo. Iyaa, inɛ kakayɔn sɛɛ gɔ, inɛ sɛlɛ le gamala.»
42003012	Sɛgu yabanw gɔbe yaa, unrunbei batise kanranmɔ ga wiyaa, Jan bɛrɛ selumaa gin: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, emɛ, inge emɛ kanraun dagaa ma?»
42003013	Wo aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «E bɛrɛ tɔɔrin dɛi sigɛ inɛw bemaa tujɔ kaara gɛɛnɔugi.»
42003014	Sɔludasu unrunw gamuu yaa, wo bɛrɛ selumaa gin: «Emɛ yaa, nɛɛ inge emɛ kanraun jaan ma?» Jan aŋa bemɛ saa: «E inɛ turu nɛ kanran kɛɛlɛ, paŋa le ma, sɛɛrɛ kakalu le ma yabanɔugi. Kaa tujɔ ebe gɔ ei wo baamɔi.»
42003015	Inɛw gɔbe diyɛ daanu le dɔmiyaan bɛin. Inɛ tuturu wooi, kinɛ ajubu womɔ nɛ Jain Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔi ma ga ajubaubɛin.
42003016	Jan be le sɔwaa kijɛ gi: «Mu ei dii nɛ batise kanraunwɔn. Kaa inɛ mu dɛi sigɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ gɔ yawɛɛjɛ. Halu, taga womɔ suŋu kɔmɔlɔ ga, mu le jaanla. Inɛ wogɔ, wo Kikinu Pilu nɛ lee, yaun nɛ lee, ei batise kanrando.
42003017	Wo tɛɛliyɛ womɔ gɔ ɛjii sagara ga, kijɛ dɛnrɛn wɛyi womɔ numɔ le gɛli ye wɛɛdo. Wo dɛnrɛn ii gɔ guyɔ womɔ nɛ mɔmɔɔnɔdo. Kaa kɔkɔjɔun gɔ, wo yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ tɛtɛgɛrɛdo.»
42003018	Kɔɔ gin’ Jan, tinwinrun tɔgu dɛin dɛin waja le, inɛw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagaube.
42003019	Kaa Sɛmɛginɛ Herɔde, wo bainɛ yaanran Herɔdiadei, wo jɛi gɔ dɛi Jan woi jarugaabe. Iyaa, Herɔde, sɔɔ mɔɲu joo wo kanrun gɔ dɛi yaa, woi jarugaabe.
42003020	Herɔde, iyaa, sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu kuu nɛ baraa, Jain aa, kaju nɛ kunaabe.
42003021	Inɛw gɔbe puu, waaru batise kanrin le, Yesu yaa, unruin batise kanranmaabe. Batise yowaa, Ama gɛɛun wo wɔu, alagala pinɛlaa,
42003022	Kikinu Pilu, pelegele goju gin’ biyaa, Yesu kuu nɛ sugaa dɛinyaanbe. Alagala gowaa, mii ɛgɛmaabe, kijɛ gi: «Aini ibɛ ma gɔ ui. U le kinɛ ma ɛjii aa wɔɔ.»
42003023	Yesu, waaru deeru womɔ birɛ wo tɔlu le, anranguju pɛtaanu gin’ sɛbe. Inɛw, woi Josɛpu ii ga sɛbɛin. Josɛpu wogɔ, Heli ii bee. Heli Matatu ii,
42003024	Matatu Lewi ii, Lewi Mɛluki ii, Mɛluki Janayi ii, Janayi Josɛpu ii, Josɛpu Matatiasu ii,
42003025	Matatiasu Amɔsu ii, Amɔsu Nahumu ii, Nahumu Ɛsuli ii, Ɛsuli Nagayi ii, Nagayi Maata ii,
42003026	Maata Matatiasu ii, Matatiasu Semɛyin ii, Semɛyin Josɛku ii, Josɛku Joda ii, Joda Joananu ii,
42003027	Joananu Resa ii, Resa Sorobabɛlu ii, Sorobabɛlu Seyalatiɛlu ii, Seyalatiɛlu Nɛri ii, Nɛri Mɛluki ii,
42003028	Mɛluki Adi ii, Adi Kosamu ii, Kosamu Ɛlumadamu ii, Ɛlumadamu Ɛru ii, Ɛru Josue ii,
42003029	Josue Eliejɛru ii, Eliejɛru Jorimu ii, Jorimu Matatu ii, Matatu Lewi ii, Lewi Simɛyɔn ii,
42003030	Simɛyɔn Juda ii, Juda Josɛpu ii, Josɛpu Jonamu ii, Jonamu Eliakimu ii, Eliakimu Mɛleya ii,
42003031	Mɛleya Mɛna ii, Mɛna Matata ii, Matata Natan ii, Natan Dawide ii, Dawide Jɛse ii,
42003032	Jɛse Obɛdu ii, Obɛdu Boasu ii, Boasu Sala ii, Sala Nasɔn ii, Nasɔn Aminadabu ii,
42003033	Aminadabu Adimini ii, Adimini Arini ii, Arini Hɛsurɔn ii, Hɛsurɔn Perɛsu ii, Perɛsu Juda ii, Juda Jakɔbu ii,
42003034	Jakɔbu Isaka ii, Isaka Abarahamu ii, Abarahamu Tera ii, Tera Nahɔru ii, Nahɔru Sɛrugu ii,
42003035	Sɛrugu Reu ii, Reu Pelɛgu ii, Pelɛgu Ebɛru ii, Ebɛru Sala ii, Sala Kayinamu ii,
42003036	Kayinamu Arupasadu ii, Arupasadu Sɛmu ii, Sɛmu Nɔwe ii, Nɔwe Lemɛku ii, Lemɛku Matusalɛmu ii,
42003037	Matusalɛmu Henɔku ii, Henɔku Yerɛdu ii, Yerɛdu Malaleyɛlu ii, Malaleyɛlu Kena ii, Kena Enɔse ii,
42003038	Enɔse Sɛtu ii, Sɛtu Adama ii, Adamai Ama maŋu.
42004001	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu, Kikinu Pilu le jowaa, wo Jurudɛn dibe gɔ nɛ gowaa, Ama Kikinu, olusolo nɛ woi dimɛraan yaabe.
42004002	Bai pɛnai jinrun puu kuu baŋa woi subɔraabe. Yesu, bai pɛnai gɔ wooi nɛ kijɛ turu kanran kayalu. Bai pɛnai gɔ onu nɛ, giyɛ Yesui aai.
42004003	Kɔɔ waaru le jinrun puu kuu baŋa wo le kijɛ gi: «Ui Ama Ainii ye tibu ɔnbe bemaa buru taŋa giye tɔɔrɔ.»
42004004	Kaa Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “Inɛi jaa le sai kɔiyɔɔlɛ.”»
42004005	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, jinrun puu kuu baŋa, Yesui yalu gabu turu nɛ unaa, wo bɛrɛ ɔgu kɛu aduna laamu gɔbe puu tagaraa,
42004006	Yesu le kijɛ wo gi: «Mu gɔnrɔn ɔn wooi lee, diinɛ ɔnbe dooro gɔ lee, u bɛrɛ ohobodɔn. Sabu mu bɛrɛ wogɔ obaaɲu, iyaa, mu inɛ obu mu ibɛ bɛrɛ obodɔn.
42004007	Nɛɛ, u mui demɛniyɛnmaajɛu ye, kijɛ ɔn puu uwɔi biyɛdo.»
42004008	Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “U Inɛw Baŋa Ama uwɔ gɔ wo turu sai demɛniyɛnmɔ, wo turu sai baba.”»
42004009	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, iyaa, jinrun puu kuu baŋa, Yesui dimɛraan, Jerusalɛmu nɛ jɛyaabe. Ama Ginrun Diyɛ daa gɔ nɛ yalu pala naa pala gɔ nɛ woi unaa, wo le kijɛ gi: «Ui Ama Ainii ye, daa ɔn nɛ gowaa ye, doɲu gɔ nɛ kili sugo.
42004010	Sabu, Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “Ama, bemaa ui ɛjii gɛliyɛ ga, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe bɛrɛ u dɛi tɔtɔɔrɔdo.”
42004011	Iyaa, tɔŋaaɲu: “Tibu nɛ kubɔ uwɔ tomɔnɔu giye, be numɔ bemɛ le ui dɔɔn gɛgɛliyɛdɛin.”»
42004012	Yesu, jinrun puu kuu baŋa aŋa saa gi: «Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “U, Inɛw Baŋa Ama uwɔi subɔrɔnɔu.”»
42004013	Jinrun puu kuu baŋa, kɔɔ gin’ dabulu dɛin dɛin le Yesui subɔraa kilaa, waaru waja wɛɛido baa, wo Yesui pajaatiyaa, gowaa yai.
42004014	Yesu, Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le jowaa, Galile nɛ pilemaa yaabe. Boi womɔ gana wogɔ wooi nɛ gowaabe.
42004015	Wo Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ deeru deereube. Inɛw wooi boi ɛju womɔ boonɔubɛin.
42004016	Yesu, ana wo gabi, Nasarɛtu nɛ yaabe. Bana kanraan wo wɛɛjiyaa gin’, deeliye bai le, wo Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaabe. Wo Ama Dɔn jaŋa ga ingelaabe.
42004017	Kɔɔ waaru le, wo bɛrɛ inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi dɔn gɔ obaabɛin. Wo dɔnmunɔ gɔ munɔraan, yalu turu dɛnaabe, wogɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋaaɲu:
42004018	“Inɛw Baŋa Ama Kikinu gɔ kuu ma nɛ yɔɔ, sabu wo maa dɔgɔpaganw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga ga, nii togokɔɔru le mui yɛmaabe. Kajugunw hɔɔlɔwin biyɛ ga, girumuw giri pinɛlaai biyɛ ga, maa wogɔ boonu kunɔ ga, wo mui tii. Inɛw ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbei deeliye obo ga,
42004019	iyaa, Inɛw Baŋa Ama nɛɛma anranguju kibɛru gɔ boonu kunɔ ga mui tii.”
42004020	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, dɔn gɔ pilemaa munaa, birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ bɛrɛ obaatiyaa, yaa dɛinyin. Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ inɛw tobɛin gɔbe puu, giriyɛnu wo bɛrɛ dɛɛraabɛin.
42004021	Kɔɔ waaru le wo sɔɔ sɔi tɔlaa, be le kijɛ gi: «Ama Dɔn sɔɔ ɔn, iye waaru e ɛgɛjɛ gɔ le tee, kibaai.»
42004022	Be wooi Yesu sɛɛrɛ ɛju gooubɛin. Iyaa nɛɛma sɔɔ aŋa womɔ nɛ goobe gɔ dɛi, be puu bɛrɛ maunɛ bee. Kɔɔ dɛi be gɛɛubɛin: «Ɔn baŋa Josɛpu aini gɔi laa ma?»
42004023	Kaa, Yesu be le saa gi: «E mu le taanrinyɛn ɔn dadaandei ga, mu igii wɔun: ‘Jɔŋujɔŋɔnɛ, kuu uwɔ le ui jɔŋɔ.’ E iyaa gɛgɛɛdei: ‘Kapɛrunaumu ana nɛ kijɛ uwaa kanraanbe ga emɛ ɛgu gɔ, nɛɛ ana uwɔ gɔ nɛ yaa, wogɔ kanran.’ »
42004024	Iyaa, Yesu sɔwaa gi: «Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ turu kanran wo ba ginrun nɛ ɛjii sɛgɛrɛidenɛ.
42004025	Kaa mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, anranguju taanu lee iyepilu kuloi lee baa, anran miilu kanraan, giyɛ diyɛ Isɛrɛlu gana gɔ wooi nɛ waaru yoi le, Eli waaru le, gana gɔ nɛ yapanuw joo yabɛin.
42004026	Kaa Elii gana kɔɔ nɛ yapanuw bɛin turu kanran bɛrɛ tiinɛ, Sidɔn gana nɛ, Sarɛputa ana nɛ yapanunɛ turu bɛrɛ laa ye.
42004027	Elise, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ gɔ waaru le kanran, Isɛrɛlu gana nɛ nɛwɛngunw joo yabɛin. Kaa logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛ turu kanran bajamɔnɛ, Siri gana bɛɛnnɛ Naamai laa ye.»
42004028	Waaru sɔɔ kɔɔbe be ɛgu le, Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ inɛw tobɛin gɔbe puu kinɛ saii banraain.
42004029	Be ingelaa, Yesui nanaa, ana bemɛ nɛ goonaabɛin. Kokoo kuu nɛ ana bemɛ daan gɔ nɛ woi dimɛraan jɛyaabɛin. Daa gɔ nɛ goo ye doɲu gɔ nɛ woi dama tii dɛnaabɛin.
42004030	Kaa Yesu, logoro bemɛ nɛ sɔriyaa galaa yaai.
42004031	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, Kapɛrunaumu ana, Galile gana nɛ sugaabe. Wo deeliye bai inɛwin deereube.
42004032	Inɛw bɛrɛ deeru bana wo deerejɛ gɔ ɛjii maunɛ bee, sabu wo sɔɔ womɔ gɔ gɔnrɔn diyɛ le sɔɔube.
42004033	Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ, ainɛ jinrun kuu womɔ nɛ daanbe turu yabe. Wo mii diyɛ le kɔnwaan:
42004034	«Hei! Yesu, Nasarɛtu ana bɛɛnnɛ gɔ, mu ui aai ma igii wɔun. Inɛ ɛjaai Ama bɛrɛ goi gɔ ui. Inge dɛi u emi tɔɔɲɔuwɔu? U emi suyoi wɛiu ma?»
42004035	Yesu, jinrun gɔi ganwaan gi: «Kemu kemu biyɛ. Ainɛ kɔɔ kuu nɛ goo.» Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo giyaa, jinrun gɔ ainɛ gɔi inɛw logoro nɛ jaraatiyaa, mɔɲu wo bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔlu go, gowaa yinyai.
42004036	Inɛw gɔbe puu bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ kanrun. Be tunmɔ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Ɔn sɔɔ yeru inge tɔgui? Sabu wo jinrun gɔbe bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn le, paŋa le sɔɔ sɔwaajɛ ye, be inɛw kuu nɛ koi gooɲu.»
42004037	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu boigoo gɔ gana wogɔ sibɛ wooi nɛ dɔwaabe.
42004038	Kaa kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ gowaa, Simɔ ginrun nɛ yowaabe. Simɔ yaanran na gɔ kɛbaamu mɔɲu le wo diiun, Yesu tɛmaabe. Be yaanran gɔ dɛi Yesu bɛrɛ gɛnyaanbɛin.
42004039	Yesu, yaanran gɔ kuu nɛ jimiyaan, kɛbaamu gɔi ganwaanbe. Kɔɔ waaru le kɛbaamu gɔ woi pajaabe. Yaanran gɔ ɔgu kɛu ingelaa, Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee bɛrɛ, pana oboi yintɔlu.
42004040	Kɔɔ nɛ be wɔu, nai numɔgu waaru le, inɛw jiungunw tɔgu dɛin dɛin sɛbɛin gɔbe, Yesu bɛrɛ bei jɛɛlaabɛin. Wo jiungunw gɔbe tuturu kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan, bei bajugaabe.
42004041	Jinrunbe kanran, inɛw joo nɛ gowaa, kɔnwɔun, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ama Aini gɔ ui.» Kaa Yesu ɛjii bei ganwaunbe. Wo be bɛrɛ sɔɔ turu kanran sɔɔmɔbele. Sabu jinrun gɔbe Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ woi ga igii bɛin.
42004042	Waaru baa yai le, Yesu ingelaa, bain go yalu babaŋa turu nɛ yai. Inɛw mɔɔnu joo woi dɛnɛu, yalu wo wɔɔ gɔ nɛ baa dɔwaabɛin. Be womaa unrunbei pajuti ye yaanɔu ga woi tɛŋɛubɛin.
42004043	Kaa wo be le sɔwaa gi: «Mu Ama diinɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ana wajunw gɔbe nɛ yaa mu tagaun jaain wɔɔ. Sabu wogɔ dɛi mui tiyaaɲu.»
42004044	Wo kɔɔ gin’ Yahutunw gana Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ waaju tagaube.
42005001	Yesu, dibe diyɛ, Jenɛsarɛtu dibe gɛɛɲu gɔ genɛ gɔ nɛ iŋiyaan, Ama sɔɔ tagaube. Inɛw joo tunmɔi damau, sɔɔ womɔ keŋiyɛn ga, woi gɔŋaa gɛlɛbɛin.
42005002	Yesu, kɔɔ waaru le diikoro lɛi, dibe diŋirun nɛ be wɔu iyaabe. Iiju aanw gɔbe diikoro gɔ nɛ gowaa, jɔɔ bemɛ mɔŋɔubɛin.
42005003	Yesu, diikoro turui gɔ nɛ yowaabe. Diikoro wogɔ Simɔ mɔi bee. Wo Simɔ bɛrɛ selumaa, womaa gaila dii diŋirun gɔ le diikoro gɔi wageniyɛnmɔ gi. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo diikoro gɔ nɛ dɛinyaan, mɔɔnu gɔi Ama sɔɔ deereube.
42005004	Waaru sɔɔ sɔwaa wo kilu le, wo Simɔ le kijɛ gi: «U diikoro uwɔ gɔ dii too gɔ nɛ jɛyaa, kɔɔ onu nɛ iiju aa dɛi, jɔɔ ebe kamu kunɔi.»
42005005	Kaa Simɔ, Yesu aŋa saa gi: «Mu baŋa, emɛ birɛ birɛu baa yaabɛin, kaa kijɛ turu kanran bɛɛnɛ. Kaa sɔɔ uwɔ dɛi mu jɔɔ gɔbe kamu kukunɔdɔn.»
42005006	Waaru kunrin be kanrun le, be iiju gaai aabɛin. Kɔɔ dɛi jɔɔ bemɛ puloi tɔlaabe.
42005007	Be, be bɔɔnw diikoro waja gɔ nɛ tobɛin gɔbei unrunbei bara dɛi numɔ le boonaabɛin. Be wiyaa, diikoro lɛi gɔ puu nɛ iiju joonaabɛin. Kɔɔ dɛi diikoro bemɛ gɔ piriye ga bee.
42005008	Simɔ Piɛru, waaru sɔɔ kɔɔ wo iyi le, wo Yesu kubɔsɔrɔ nɛ numaa sugaa, wo le kijɛ gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, u genɛ ma nɛ dɔrɔ goo, sabu mui inɛ hakɛginɛi.»
42005009	Sabu iiju kɔɔ baa be ai gɔ dɛi, Simɔ lee, inɛw wo le bɛin gɔbe puu lee bɛrɛ maunɛ bee.
42005010	Iyaa, Jake lee, Jan lee, Sebede anranw unrunw gɔbe, Simɔ le bariyaa iiju aaubɛin gɔ, be bɛrɛ yaa maunɛ biyaabe. Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu, Simɔ le sɔwaa gi: «U liyɛnɔu. Kanɛ ɔn nɛ tɔlaa ye, waja u inɛ aanɛi bibiyɛdou.»
42005011	Be kɔɔ gin’ diikoro gɔbe dii diŋirun gɔ nɛ dɔɔnaa dii gɔ nɛ biɲaa goonaatiyaa, kijɛ wooi pajaatiyaa, Yesui dimiyaanbɛin.
42005012	Yesu, ana turu nɛ tobe. Ana wogɔ nɛ ainɛ nɛwɛn saii aa bee turu yabe. Waaru Yesui wo iyi le, wo giru womɔ nɛ tuŋiyaan, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa, wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaan kijɛ gi: «Mu Baŋa, u ibɛɛ wɔu ye, nɛwɛn ma gɔ ɛjɛmɔ bɛbɛɛdou.»
42005013	Yesu, numɔ wajaraa, ainɛ gɔi tabaa kijɛ gi: «Mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Ui ɛjaai biyɛ.» Yesu kunrin gɛɛu wo digɛu, nɛwɛn gɔ wo nɛ gowaai.
42005014	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, ainɛ gɔ bɛrɛ tɔɔraa, womaa inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ taganɔu gi. Kaa wo le sɔwaa gi: «U yaa ye, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ bɛrɛ ui tagara. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ui naran go bajaai ga, inɛw puu bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛi biyɛ ga, Mɔise, ɛjɛmu dɛi sadaga tɔɔru gɔ, wogɔ goonɔ.»
42005015	Yesu boigoo bariyɛ bariyɛ yaaube. Inɛw mɔɔnu joo sɔɔ womɔ keŋiyɛn dɛi lee, iyaa jiun bemɛ bajamɔ dɛi lee, wo bɛrɛ wɛɛubɛin.
42005016	Kaa wo Ama gɛɛn dɛi, yalu babaŋa nɛ yaaube.
42005017	Bai turu, Yesu, inɛw bɛrɛ waaju tagaube. Parisiɛnbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw lee kɔɔ nɛ yadaanbɛin. Be Galile lee, Judea lee gana nɛ, ana dɛin dɛin nɛ gowaa, iyaa Jerusalɛmu nɛ lee, gowaa wɛin. Jiungunw gɔbe bajuga ga, Inɛw Baŋa Ama gɔnrɔn gɔ, Yesu le bee.
42005018	Inɛw, ainɛ goju sanaai turu, pɛnrɛnpanran le duiyaa, jɛɛlaabɛin. Be ainɛ gɔ Yesu ginrun tobe gɔ nɛ kunaa ye, giru womɔ nɛ duunɔ ibɛɛ bɛin.
42005019	Kaa, mɔɔnu gɔ gabaai gɔ digɛu, be wo bɛrɛ bana dɔɔɲu sɛbenɛ. Be dala gɔ nɛ ulaa, dala gɔ tɔgɔraa, jiunginɛ gɔi pɛnrɛnpanran womɔ le, boonɔ gɔ nɛ mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ Yesu yalu bee gɔ nɛ tee yasunugin.
42005020	Kɔɔ gin’ be kanraan, Yesu, inɛw gɔbe aŋai wo le gawaa be wɔɔ gɔ iyaa, ɔn gin’ jiunginɛ gɔ le gi: «Banrunge, hakɛ uwɔ u bɛrɛ yaabu kanraantin.»
42005021	Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, Parisiɛn gɔbe lee, kinɛ bemɛ nɛ ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Inɛ Ama boi yamalanɛ kɔɔ aai ma? Amai laa ye, inɛ aa, hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛɛjɛ?»
42005022	Kaa Yesu, kinɛ bemɛ ajubu jugaa, be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inge dɛi e kinɛ ebe nɛ ajubu kɔɔ ajubauwɔi?
42005023	Ainɛ ɔn womaa, hakɛ womɔ wo bɛrɛ yaabu kanraantin aŋa le gɛɛ lee, womaa, ingele ye yoi yaa gɛɛ lee, kolɛi logoro nɛ, yagɔ naaran?
42005024	Kaa Inɛ Aini gɔ, aduna nɛ inɛw bɛrɛ hakɛ bemɛ yaabu kanranɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ, e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔdɔn.» Kɔɔ gin’ giyaatiyaa, Yesu, ainɛ goju sanaa bee gɔ le ɔn gin’ gi: «U le gɛɛjɔn, ingele, pɛnrɛnpanran uwɔ jeɲɛ, ginrun uwɔ nɛ yaa.»
42005025	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo giyaa, ainɛ gɔ ɔgu kɛu ingelaa, pɛnrɛnpanran womɔ jeɲaa, inɛw puu giru nɛ Amai dooromɔu, gowaa, ginrun yinyai.
42005026	Sɔɔ gɔ inɛwin ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe. Be ɛjii liyaa, Ama boi sɔmɔu, ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Emɛ iye, sɔɔ taanrinyɛn iyaaɲu.»
42005027	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu gowaa, sɛgu yabanɛ turu boi womɔ Lewi gɛɛbɛin gɔ, sɛgu yabu yalu nɛ wo daaun iyi. Yesu, wo le sɔwaa gi: «Wɛɛ mui dimiyɛn.»
42005028	Kɔɔ waaru le, Lewi, kijɛ wooi pajaatiyaa, ingelaa, Yesui dimiyaanbe.
42005029	Lewi, Yesu dɛi jaa diyɛ, ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ yegeraabe. Wogɔ nɛ sɛgu yabanw joo lee, inɛw waja joo lee, jaa kaya ga be le yadaanbɛin.
42005030	Parisiɛnbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw bemɛ gɔbe lee guguun gunwaan, Yesu jaŋu unrunw le kijɛ be gi: «Inge dɛi e sɛgu yabanw lee, inɛw boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔin wajabe lee le mɔrinyaan, jaa kayauwɔi?»
42005031	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Inɛw sɛɛu wɔin gɔbe, jɔŋujɔŋɔnɛ kai sɛnɛ. Inɛw jiungunw, jɔŋujɔŋɔnɛ kai be sɛɛ.
42005032	Mu, inɛw teitai wɔin dɛi wɛɛlun. Kaa, inɛw hakɛ kanranw bemaa bana bemɛ dulomɔ ga bei tagai wɛiun.»
42005033	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, inɛw, Yesu le ɔn gin’ gin: «Jan Batise jaŋu unrunw gɔbe lee, Parisiɛnbe jaŋu unrunw gɔbe lee, waaru joo aŋa papagaɲu, Ama gɛgɛɛnɲu. Kaa jaŋu unrunw uwɔ gɔbe kakayaɲu, nɔnɔɔɲu.»
42005034	Kɔɔ gin’ be sɔwaa, Yesu aŋa bemɛ ɔn gin’ sai: «Purupagu bai gɔ, akana anrunge gɔbe, akana le wɔnu, be bɛrɛ aŋa pagamɔ bɛbɛɛdei ma? Asuu!
42005035	Kaa, bai yawɛɛjɛ, akana gɔ be le kabugutiidɛin. Be bai wogɔbe le aŋa papagadɛin.»
42005036	Yesu iyaa, kɔɔ kuu nɛ gimaa, taanrinyɛn waja ɔn gin’ dain: «Inɛ turu kanran sɔi kana nɛ sɔi pɛlɛ ye, sɔi pɛi kole daŋaalɛ. Wogɔ gin’ kanraanjɛ ye, wo sɔi kana gɔ kaaraa yamalaati, iyaa yɛnaa ye, sɔi kana gɔ sɔi pɛi gɔ nɛ daŋaaɲu ye, yegiyeidolo.
42005037	Iyaa, kɔɔ gin’, inɛ turu kanran kɔɲɔ ilɛ umulu pɛibe nɛ kunɔɔlɛ. Wogɔ gin’ kanraan ye, kɔɲɔ gɔ waaru ilɛnu wo yaajɛ, umulu gɔbei popojomɔdo, kɔɲɔ gɔ totogiyedo, iyaa umulu gɔbe yaa, yayanwandɛin.
42005038	Kɔɔ dɛi, kɔɲɔ ilɛ gɔ, umulu kanabe nɛ kunɔu jaan.
42005039	Iyaa, inɛ kɔɲɔ ilɛ nɔwaanjɛ, kɔɔbaŋa kɔɲɔ ilɛlu, yalu wogɔ nɛ tee daariyɛidolo. Sabu wo gɛgɛɛdo: ‘Kɔɲɔ ilɛ gɔ ɛjii wɔɔ.’ »
42006001	Deeliye bai turu, Yesu, alukama minɛ turu nɛ kɛjaa galaube. Jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbe, alukama gɔ polaa ye, nawanranmu ye, tɛnwɛunbɛin.
42006002	Parisiɛn gamuu wogɔ iyaa, ɔn gin’ be le gin: «Deeliye bai kijɛ kanran danwan gɔ, e wogɔ inge dɛi kanranjɛi?»
42006003	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa, gi: «Dawide lee, inɛw wo le bɛin gɔbe lee, giyɛ ɛjii bei aa wo kanran, kijɛ be kanrun gɔ, e jaŋali ma?
42006004	Wo Ama ginrun gɔ nɛ yayowaa, Ama burui ga, buru duunaaɲu gɔ, wo wogɔ jeɲaa kayaabe. Iyaa, inɛw wo le bɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ obaa, kayamaabe. Buru wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw gɔbei laa ye, inɛ waja kayaun jaanla bee.»
42006005	Yesu iyaa be le sɔwaa gi: «Inɛ Aini gɔ, deeliye bai sɔɔ gɔ wo sagi.»
42006006	Deeliye bai waja, Yesu, Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaa, deeru deereube. Ainɛ turu numɔ iin sanaai kɔɔ nɛ tɛmaabe.
42006007	Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, Parisiɛnbe lee, Yesu womaa, deeliye bai gɔ le, inɛ babajamɔdo ma woi ɛjii sebereubɛin. Iyaa, wogɔ le woi sɔɔ nɛ kunu ibɛi bɛin.
42006008	Kaa Yesu, kinɛ bemɛ ajubu igii bee. Wo ainɛ numɔ sanaai gɔ le ɔn gin’ gi: «Ingele! Logoro ɔn nɛ wɛɛ iŋiyɛn!» Ainɛ gɔ ingelaa, wiyaa iŋiyaanbe.
42006009	Yesu, inɛw woi sebereubɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ gi: «Mu e bɛrɛ selumɛuwɔn: Deeliye bai inge kanraun jaan? Ɛju kanraun jaan ma, mɔɲu kanraun jaan? Inɛ kinrun yabaun jaan ma, inɛi suyoun jaan?»
42006010	Yesu, sibɛ sibɛ womɔ nɛ inɛw bɛin gɔbei yɛnaatiyaa, ainɛ gɔ le ɔn gin’ gi: «Numɔ uwɔ wajara.» Ainɛ gɔ, numɔ womɔ wo wajaraa, numɔ gɔ bajaai.
42006011	Kɔɔ waaru le, inɛw gɔbe kinɛ saii banraain. Be Yesu bɛrɛ kijɛ inge kanrandɛin ma tunmɔ le badaubɛin.
42006012	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe onu nɛ, bai turu Yesu, kokoo turu nɛ Ama gɛɛn ga ulaabe. Wo wogɔ nɛ Ama gɛɛun baa yaabe.
42006013	Baa wo yaa, wo jaŋu unrunw womɔbe boonaa jɛɛlaabe. Kɔɔ gin’ logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw pɛli lɛisigɛ yɛmu. Yesu, inɛw pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe boi jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu kunaabe.
42006014	Inɛw pɛli lɛisigɛ wo yɛmu gɔbe boi bemɛ unwɔ: Simɔ, Yesu boi womɔ Piɛru kunu gɔ lee, wo bainɛ Andere lee, Jake lee, Jan lee, Pilipe lee, Barutelɛmi lee,
42006015	Matiu lee, Tɔmasu lee, Alupe ii Jake lee, Simɔ lee. Wo gana womɔ gunɔ nɛ goo ga mainiyɛunbe.
42006016	Judasu, Jake ii gɔ lee, Judasu Isukariɔte Yesui jamanɛ gɔ lee.
42006017	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ le kokoo gɔ kuu nɛ gowaa sugaa, para turu nɛ iŋiyaanbe. Yalu wogɔ nɛ jaŋu unrunw womɔ mɔɔnu diyɛ yabe. Yalu gɔ nɛ iyaa, inɛw kulɔ joo Judea gana wooi nɛ lee, Jerusalɛmu nɛ lee, dii diŋirun ana gɔbe, Tire lee, Sidɔn lee nɛ gowaa wɛin.
42006018	Be Yesu sɔɔ keŋiyɛn dɛi lee, jiun bemɛ bajamɔ dɛi lee ga wɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw jinrun kuu bemɛ nɛ daanbe gɔbe, Yesu bei bajamaabe.
42006019	Inɛw mɔɔnu kulɔ gɔ puu, Yesui tabu ibɛɛ bɛin. Sabu gɔnrɔn wo nɛ goo ye, be wooi bajamɔube.
42006020	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ sibɛ go giri dɛɛraa, be le ɔn gin’ gi: «E, dɔgɔpaganw gɔbe, Ama e yabu. Ama diinɛ gɔ ebei.
42006021	E, inɛw kanɛ giyɛ le wɔin gɔbe, Ama e yabu. Sabu ei babaado. E, inɛw kanɛ sɔmiyɛn sɔmiyɛnw gɔbe, Ama e yabu. E mɔmu mɔmɔmɔdei.
42006022	«Inɛ Aini gɔ dɛi, inɛw ei ibiliyaaɲu ma, ei logoro bemɛ nɛ nanaa goonaaɲu ma, ei duyaaɲu ma, boi ebe yamalaaɲu ma biyaai ye, Ama e yabu.
42006023	Kɔɔ gin’ e bɛrɛ kanraanɲu biyaai ye, alagala nɛ e tujɔ diyɛ bɛbɛɛdei. Pɔlɔ baa kanran, inɛw kɔɔbe tirɛ anranw gɔbe, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbei yinhɔɲɔmi. Kɔɔ dɛi sɔɔ kɔɔ tunmɔ e bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, naran go kinɛ ebe ɛɛliyɛmɔi.
42006024	Kaa e ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu e kinɛ ɛɛlu ebe kanɛ baa biyaa galaai.
42006025	E, inɛw kanɛ ɛnrinyaan wɔin gɔbe, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu giyɛ ei ahaado. E, kanɛ inɛw mɔmu mɔmɔuwɔin gɔbe, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Kinɛ ebe sɔsɔmiyɛndo, e giridii gogoodei.
42006026	«Inɛw puu boi ɛju ebe sɔɔɲu ye, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Inɛw boi ɛju ebe boonɔw kɔɔbe tirɛ anranw yaa, inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw gɔbe bɛrɛ kɔɔ gin’ kanraunbɛin.»
42006027	«Nɛɛ, e inɛw sɔɔ ma keŋiyɛnw gɔbe, mu e le ɔn gin’ gun: E jaŋuwin ibɛi biyɛi. Inɛw ei ibiliyaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ ɛju kanrain.
42006028	Inɛw ei jɛbɛnw gɔbe dɛi, Ama boi booi. Inɛw ei ɔɲɔmɔw gɔbe dɛi, Ama gɛɛin.
42006029	Inɛ turu mamana uwɔ sibɛ turu pejaajɛ ye, sibɛ lee gɔ woi dɛɛrɛ. Iyaa, inɛ turu arugoi naa uwɔ yabado ga wɔɔ ye, arugoi dagi uwɔ jeɲɛ ga woi tɛŋɛnɔu.
42006030	Inɛ u bɛrɛ kijɛ gɛnyaanjɛ ye, wo bɛrɛ obo. Iyaa, inɛ, kijɛ uwɔi wɔɔ jeɲaajɛ ye, wo bɛrɛ pilemɛ ye selumɛnɔu.
42006031	Nɛɛ, inɛw, kijɛ e bɛrɛ kanran ga e ibɛ puu, e yaa, kijɛ wogɔbe be bɛrɛ kanrain.
42006032	«E, inɛw ei ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe sai ibɛi ye, kijɛ sigɛ e kanranjɛ wɔlɔ. Halu hakɛ kanranw gɔbe, be kanran, inɛw bei ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbei ibɛɛ wɔin.
42006033	Iyaa, e inɛw e bɛrɛ ɛju kanranw gɔbe sai bɛrɛ ɛju kanranjɛi ye, kijɛ sigɛ e kanranjɛ wɔlɔ. Halu, inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe yaa, yinkanraunwɔin.
42006034	E iyaa, inɛw numɔ nɛ yoru ebe bɛbɛɛdei ga e wɔɔ gɔbe bɛrɛ yoru kunɔjɛi ye, kijɛ sigɛ e kanranjɛ wɔlɔ. Inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe yaa, pilemɛ ye kɔɔ tunmɔ bɛɛ ga, hakɛ kanranw be bɔɔnw gɔbe bɛrɛ yoru yinkunɔɲu.
42006035	Kaa, e jaŋuwin ibɛi biyɛi. Iyaa inɛw bɛrɛ ɛju kanrain, inɛw bɛrɛ yoru kunɔi, kaa wogɔ dɛi kijɛ turu kanran dɔmiyɛnnɔugi. Kɔɔ gin’ tujɔ ɛju ebe gaai biyɛdo, iyaa e Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ unrunwin bibiyɛdei. Wo inɛw yogosɛlɛ sɛlɛnw lee, inɛw mɔɲube lee dɛi ɛjii wɔɔ.
42006036	E, bana Ama e Ba gɔ amasɔgɔjugɔnɛi wɔɔ gin’, inɛw amasɔgɔ jugɔi.»
42006037	«Inɛwin jaruganɔugi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Ama ei jarugaidolo. Inɛw kuu nɛ jarugu duurɔnɔugi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, kuu ebe nɛ yaa, jarugu duurɔidenɛ. Inɛwin yaabu kanrain, ei yaa yaabu kakanrandɛin.
42006038	Inɛw bɛrɛ sin kanrain. Kunrin e bɛrɛ yaa kɔɔ gin’ kanrandɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ ɛjii tunwɔn ye, joonɔ ye, nɛɲɛ ye, jigemɛ ye, buriyemɛ ye, arugoi ebe jibɛ diyɛ nɛ togo kukunɔdɛin. Sabu inɛw mɔ gelu le e tunwɔnjɛ gɔ, Ama gelu wogɔ le ebe tunwɔndo.»
42006039	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, taanrinyɛn ɔn le be le sɔwaabe: «Giruminɛ, giruminɛ wo tunmɔnɛ teeremu bɛbɛɛjɛ ma? Kunrin, kanraain ye, be lɛi kɛu, bonɔ nɛ numɔ yooidenɛ ma?
42006040	Jaŋu ii, jaŋudeerenɛ womɔ dɛi gaala. Kaa jaŋu ii bɛrɛ sɔɔ ɛjii deeraaɲu gɔ, jaŋudeerenɛ womɔ gin’ bibiyɛdo.
42006041	«Giri uwɔ nɛ lalu too gɔ kajubaalɛu, u bɔɔnɛ giri nɛ keri too gɔ inge dɛi iyejɛu?
42006042	Iyaa, u inɛ giri uwɔ nɛ lalu too gɔ iyeelɛ gɔ, u bɔɔnɛ womaa ‘Banrunge, giri uwɔ nɛ keri too gɔ goonɔmu’ yani gɛɛ bɛɛjɛu? U aŋa lɛilɛiginɛ gɔ, giri uwɔ nɛ lalu too gɔ laa yai goonɔ. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, u bɔɔnɛ giri nɛ keri too gɔ goonɔ ga sɛɛu giri ihiyedou.»
42006043	«Tiun ɛju, ii mɔɲu naran bɛɛidolo. Tiun mɔɲu kanran, ii ɛju naran bɛɛidolo.
42006044	Tiun na tuturu puu, ii womɔ le woi jugɔmɔjɛ. Gaa ii, teɲu na nɛ kɔi bɛɛmɔɔlɛ. Iyaa resɛn ilɛ, oruwo na nɛ kɔɔidenɛ.
42006045	Inɛ ɛju, kijɛ ɛju womɔ yalu wo gɛliyɛjɛ nɛ, kijɛ ɛjui goonɔjɛ. Wogɔ, kinɛ womɔ gɔ woi. Inɛ mɔɲu, kijɛ mɔɲu womɔ yalu wo gɛliyɛjɛ nɛ, kijɛ mɔɲui goonɔjɛ. Kinɛ nɛ sɔɔ jowaa too gɔ, aŋa wogɔi sɔɔjɛ.»
42006046	«Iyaa, e inge dɛi maa ‘Inɛw Baŋa, Inɛw Baŋa’ aŋa le sai gɛɛnu, kijɛ ebaa kanran mu gɛɛjɛ gɔbe kanraanlɛi wɔi ma?
42006047	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ aai kanran, inɛ mu bɛrɛ wɛɛjɛ gɔ, inɛ sɔɔ mu sɔi gɔbe keŋiyaan, wogɔ gin’ tee kanranjɛ biyaai ye, inɛ wogɔ kijɛ le tunwɔn bɛɛmɔido, mu e bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn:
42006048	Inɛ wogɔ, ainɛ turu ginrun unrunmɔ ujɔ ga, bonɔ ɛjii guraa, ginrun bɔlɔtei gɔ tibu kuu nɛ daanaabe le murin wɔɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ dii diyɛ wiyaa, goro buriyaa, ginrun gɔi lagaabe, kaa ginrun gɔi ɛjii ujaaɲu gɔ digɛu, wololu.
42006049	«Kaa, inɛ aai kanran sɔɔ ma gɔbe ɛgaa, wogɔ gin’ tee kanranlu ye, inɛ wogɔ baŋa, ainɛ ginrun unrunmɔ bɔlɔtei yegerelu go, minɛ peere nɛ ginrun ujɔnɛ le murin wɔɔ. Goro buriyaa, ginrun gɔi lagaabe. Ɔgu kɛu ginrun gɔ wolaai. Yanwan womɔ gɔ saii mɔɲi biyaabe.»
42007001	Yesu, sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu inɛw woi keŋiyɛnw bɛrɛ waaru sɔwaa wo kilu le, wo gowaa, Kapɛrunaumu ana nɛ yowaabe.
42007002	Nɛɛ, sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa turu, gunɔnɛ womɔ ɛjii jinwaan, yiun le bɛrii bee. Ainɛ gɔ bɛrɛ gunɔnɛ gɔ saii maai bee.
42007003	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu sɔɔ sɔɔu be wɔu ɛgaa, wo Yahutunw inɛw naw gamuu goonaa, Yesu bɛrɛ tiyaa, bemaa wo bɛrɛ gɛɛn ye, wɛɛ ye, gunɔnɛ unrunmɔi bajuga wa.
42007004	Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe Yesui wiyaa tɛmaa, wo bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛnyaan, ɔn gin’ gin: «Ainɛ kɔɔ gɛɛn u saaun dagaa,
42007005	sabu wo tɔgu emɛ gɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ. Iyaa Ama gɛɛn ginrun emɛ gɔ yaa, emi ujaa wo obu.»
42007006	Yesu, kɔɔ waaru le Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe le digiyaa, oju gowaabe. Kaa waaru ginrun gɔ le wo bɛruni le, sɔludasu kuu baŋa gɔ unrun anrungebei goonaa, Yesu bɛrɛ tiyaa gi: «Mu Baŋa, kuu uwɔ ɔɲɔmɔnɔu, sabu ginrun ma nɛ u yooun mu le dagalu.
42007007	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu kuu ma le u bɛrɛ wɛɛ ga mu le dagalu gɔ jugaabɔn. Kaa sɔɔ turu gɛɛ, birɛbirɛnɛ ma gɔ babajado.
42007008	Mu kuu ma bɛɛnw diŋɛ le wɔun. Iyaa, mu yaa, sɔludasu unrunw gamuu bɛrɛ tɔɔru obu bɛbɛɛjɔn. Koturu baŋa womaa yaa gun ye wo yayaajɛ. Lee womaa wɛɛ gun ye wɛwɛɛjɛ. Iyaa, gunɔnɛ ma womaa ɔn kanran gun ye kakanranjɛ.»
42007009	Yesu, waaru sɔɔ kɔɔ wo ɛgu le, ainɛ gɔi woi maunɛ kanraanbe. Yesu onu kigelemaa, inɛw woi dimɛbɛin gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, halu Isɛrɛlu tɔgu nɛ kanran mu gagawu ɔn tunmɔ iyetɛlun.»
42007010	Waaru inɛw Yesu bɛrɛ tiin gɔbe ginrun pilemaa be yai le, be gunɔnɛ gɔ sɛɛu wo wɔu tɛmaabɛin.
42007011	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe galu onu nɛ, aga baa yaa gɔ, Yesu, ana turu, boi gɔ Nayin gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ yaaube. Yesu jaŋu unrunw lee, mɔɔnu diyɛ lee, Yesu le yaaubɛin.
42007012	Kunrin Yesu, ana yoogu gɔ le waaru bɛrii wo bee le, yɛnɛ, inɛw, yiun duiyaa goonɔubɛin. Wogɔ yapanunɛ turu aini turui bee. Yapanunɛ gɔ le ana bɛɛnw joo yabɛin.
42007013	Yapanunɛ gɔi waaru wo iye le, Inɛw Baŋa, yaanran gɔ amasɔgɔ woi aa, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «U sɔmiyɛnnɔu.»
42007014	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu yadɔwaa, abiyɛ baga gɔi tabaabe. Inɛw yiun gɔ duyɔbɛin gɔ iŋiyaanbɛin. Yesu ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Sagatara, mu u le sɛun, ingele!»
42007015	Kɔɔ waaru le yiun gɔ ingelaa dɛinyaan, sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabe. Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo na bɛrɛ woi obaabe.
42007016	Sɔɔ kɔɔ waaru be iye le, inɛw gɔbe puu liliyɛ le jowaabɛin. Iyaa, be Amai sɔmɔu: «Logoro emɛ nɛ inɛ Ama titiyainɛ diyɛ turu ingelaai.» Iyaa, «Ama, tɔgu unrunmɔ inɛw gɔbei yɛnɛi wiyaai» gɛɛubɛin.
42007017	Yesu sɔɔ kanrun gɔ Judea gana nɛ lee, genɛ womɔ nɛ gana daanbɛin gɔbe puu nɛ lee ginaa dɔwaabe.
42007018	Jan Batise jaŋu unrunw gɔbe Yesu kijɛ kanrun gɔbe puu wo bɛrɛ yaa tagaabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ Jan, jaŋu unrunw unrunmɔ lɛi boonaa,
42007019	bei Inɛw Baŋa Yesu bɛrɛ tiyaabe. Bemaa wo bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumɛ gi: «Inɛ wɛwɛɛjɛ gin gɔ, ui maa inɛ waja emɛ dɔmiyɛun jaan?»
42007020	Inɛw lɛi gɔbe Yesu bɛrɛ wiyaa wo le ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Jan Batise emi u bɛrɛ tiyaa, u le ɔn gin’ gi: ‘Inɛ wɛwɛɛjɛ gin gɔ, ui maa inɛ waja emɛ dɔmiyɛun jaan?’ »
42007021	Nɛɛ, waaru wogɔ le tee, Yesu, inɛw joo jiun bemɛ lee, goju bemɛ nɛ nurun tobe gɔ lee bajamɔube. Inɛw joo kuu nɛ jinrunbei nana goonɔube, girumuw joo giri pinɛlɛube.
42007022	Wo Jan Batise, inɛw wo bɛrɛ tii gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kijɛ e iyi gɔ lee, kijɛ e ɛgu gɔ lee, Jan bɛrɛ yai tagai. Womaa girumuw giri iyeuwɔin wa. Tegutegenw, sɛɛu yoi yaauwɔin wa. Nɛwɛngunw bajauwɔin wa. Suguruduŋube, suguru ɛgɛuwɔin wa. Yiunbe bulouwɔin wa. Dɔgɔpaganw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagauwɔin wa.
42007023	Mu dɛi inɛ kinɛ womɔ yanwanlu gɔ, inɛ wogɔ Ama wo yabu.»
42007024	Jan inɛw tii gɔbe yaa be yaa, Yesu, inɛw joo wo le bɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ Jan dɛi sɔɔ ɔn gin’ sɔɔi tɔlu: «Waaru olusolo go e yai le, e, inɛ inge tɔgui yɛnɛi yaii? Saguba ooɲɔ woi jigemɔjɛi yɛnɛi yaii ma?
42007025	Nɛɛ, e ingei yɛnɛi yaii? Ɔgɔinɛ sɔi ɛju kunaa wɔɔi yɛnɛi yaii ma? Ai. Inɛw sɔi ɛju kunaa, saŋa kayaɲu gɔbe, be, ɔgɔginrun nɛ toiyoɲu.
42007026	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, e, olusolo go inge dɛi yaii? Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ yɛnɛi yaii ma? Ee gun, halu titiyainɛ dɛi kanran sigɛ.
42007027	Sabu Jan, Ama Dɔn nɛ, inɛ dɛi Ama ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔmu gɔ woi: “Yɛnɛ, mu, inɛ titiyainɛ ma giru uwɔ nɛ titiidɔn. U wɛɛmɔ nɛ, wo oju uwɔ yeyegeredo.”
42007028	Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, yaanw, unrunw narin logoro nɛ, inɛ Jan dɛi gaa wɔlɔ. Kaa, Ama diinɛ nɛ inɛ wo dagi gɔ, wo dɛi gaa.»
42007029	Inɛw gɔbe puu lee, sɛgu yabanw gɔbe lee, be inɛw Ama teitai wɔɔ ga jugaa, unrunbei Jan bɛrɛ batise kanranmaabɛin gɔbe, Yesu sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛunbɛin.
42007030	Kaa Parisiɛnbe lee, Ama tɔɔru jugɔnw gɔbe lee, be, inɛw Jan bɛrɛ unrunbei batise kanranmɔnɛ gɔbe, Ama be dɛi kijɛ aaraabe gɔ le yabanɛ.
42007031	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe kuu nɛ gimaa, Yesu, inɛw gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kanɛ inɛw ɔnbe, mu aa le bei tunwɔndɔn? Bei aa le murun?
42007032	Be unrunw dagunw, tai nɛ dɛinyaan, tunmɔ ɔn gin’ jarugaɲu le murin wɔin: ‘Kere emɛ sujaa, e gɔɔ gɔɔli. Iyaa, yiun tɔɔnrɔn emɛ tɔɔnraan, e pii piili.’
42007033	Sabu Jan Batise wiyaa, jaa kayabele, resɛndii ilɛ nɔɔbele wo wɔu, jinrun kuu womɔ nɛ daan e yingi.
42007034	Inɛ Aini gɔ wiyaa, jaa kayau, dii nɔɔu wo wɔu, e saa, inɛ ɔn, jaa kayanɛi kɔɲɔnɔɔnɛi gi. Wo, sɛgu yabanw lee, inɛ waja boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔɔ lee anrungei gi.
42007035	Kaa hakilɛ Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ teitai wɔɔ ga, inɛw wogɔ dimiyaan yaanw gɔbe le jugɔmɔjɛ.»
42007036	Parisiɛn turu, Yesu womaa unrun le wɛɛ ye, jaa kaya ga, woi boonaabe. Wo Parisiɛn gɔ ginrun nɛ yowaa, jaa kaya ga dɛinyaanbe.
42007037	Kɔɔ waaru le ana gɔ yaanran hakɛ kanrannɛ turu, ginrun gɔ nɛ wiyaa yoi. Yesu womaa Parisiɛn gɔ ginrun nɛ jaa kayaun yatobe ga, wo ɛgaabe. Yaanran gɔ alubatere tɔɲɔ lajukɔrɔ joo, numɔ le gɛliyaa,
42007038	Yesu onu go, kubɔsɔrɔ womɔ nɛ biyaa, sɔmiyɛun, giridii unrunmɔ le Yesu kubɔ gɔbe ɛnɛrɛunbe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo kuu womɔ kukuli le Yesu kubɔ gɔi sujɔube. Iyaa, wo Yesu kubɔ gɔ aŋa le ɔɲɔube, lajukɔrɔ togu togu kɔɔrɔube.
42007039	Kaa Parisiɛn Yesui ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ boonɔnɛ gɔ, yaanran gɔ sɔɔ kanraunbe gɔ iyaa, kinɛ womɔ nɛ Yesu le ɔn gin’ gɛɛube: «Inɛ ɔn naran go woi inɛ Ama titiyainɛi bee ye, wo yaanran woi tabau wɔɔ gɔ aai ma, yaanran inge tɔgui ma jujugɔbe. Wo woi yaanran hakɛ kanrannɛi ga igii bibiyɛbe.»
42007040	Kaa Yesu, Parisiɛn gɔ le saa kijɛ gi: «Simɔ, mu sɔɔ u bɛrɛ tagaun turu yasɔn.» Simɔ saa gi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, u wogɔ sɔɔ.»
42007041	Yesu saa gi: «Ainɛ yoru kunɔnɛ, inɛw lɛi bɛrɛ yoru obaabe. Ainɛ turui bɛrɛ sarudu buudu suŋu numɔrɔn yoru kunaabe. Ainɛ lɛiye gɔi sarudu buudu pɛnumɔrɔn yoru kunaabe.
42007042	Be yoru gɔ bana tujɔɲu sɛbenɛ dɛi, yoru kunɔnɛ gɔ, inɛw lɛi gɔ kɛu bɛrɛ yoru gɔ yaabaatun gi. Nɛɛ inɛw lɛi gɔbe logoro nɛ, inɛ yagɔ, ainɛ yoru kunɔnɛ gɔi sigɛ le ibɛɛ biyɛdo?»
42007043	Simɔ saa gi: «Ajubu ma nɛ kai, ainɛ bɛrɛ yoru gaai yaabu kanrin gɔi.» Yesu yaa saa gi: «Aŋai u sɔi gɔ teitai wɔɔ.»
42007044	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, yaanran gɔ sibɛ go kigelemaa, Simɔ le ɔn gin’ gi: «U yaanran ɔin iyeuwɔu laa? Aiwa, mu ginrun uwɔ nɛ yowaabɔn, kaa kubɔ ma mɔŋɔ ga u mu bɛrɛ dii obolu. Kaa yaanran ɔn giridii womɔ le kubɔ mabe ɛnɛraan kukuli unrunmɔ le sujaabe.
42007045	U aŋa le mui ɔɲɔlu. Kaa ɔn nɛ mu yoi nɛ, yaanran ɔn kubɔ mabe aŋa le ɔɲu pajalu.
42007046	U kuu ma nɛ nii togaa kɔɔrɔlu. Kaa yaanran ɔn kubɔ mabe nɛ lajukɔrɔ togaa kɔɔraabe.
42007047	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu u bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, hakɛ joo wo sɛbe gɔbe wo bɛrɛ yaabu kanraantin gɔ dɛi, yaanran ɔn ihibɛ diyɛ sɛɛrɛ tagarauwɔ. Kaa, inɛ bɛrɛ hakɛ gaila yaabu kanraanɲu gɔ, wo ihibɛ gaila sɛɛrɛ tagarajɛ.»
42007048	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, yaanran gɔ le kijɛ gi: «Hakɛ uwɔ gɔbe ui yaabu kanraantin.»
42007049	Kɔɔ waaru le inɛw Yesu le jaa kayaun daanbɛin gɔbe kinɛ bemɛ nɛ kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Kɔɔi ye, ɔn inɛ aai, hakɛ yaa yaabu kanranjɛ baŋa gɔ?»
42007050	Kaa Yesu, yaanran gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Gagawu uwɔ ui yabaati, u jamu le yaa.»
42008001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, ana diyɛ diyɛbe nɛ lee, ana dagi dagibe nɛ lee gɔŋɔlɔube. Wo Ama diinɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagaube. Jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe wo le yabɛin.
42008002	Iyaa, yaanw gamuu kuu nɛ Yesu jinrun nanaa wo goonu lee, jiun bemɛ wo bajamu gɔbe lee yaa yabɛin. Yaanran turu gɔ boi Mari Magudala ana bɛɛnnɛ gɛɛɲu. Jinrun sɔi kuu womɔ nɛ nanaa gooni.
42008003	Yaanran waja boi Jannɛ gɛɛɲu. Wo, Herɔde ginrun kɔlɔ sɔɔ ainɛ wo sagi bee, Kuja yaanrain bee. Iyaa, Susana lee, yaanw waja joo lee yabɛin. Kɔɔbɛɛnw puu, numɔ bemɛ kijɛ le Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ leei baraubɛin.
42008004	Inɛw, ana ana gɔbe wooi nɛ goo goo ye wɛɛ ye, Yesu genɛ nɛ mɔrinyɛunbɛin. Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu, taanrinyɛn le sɔɔ ɔn jeɲaa sɔi:
42008005	«Toimaɲanɛ turu toi maɲai gowaabe. Toi maɲau wo wɔu, toi ii gamuu oju nɛ sugin. Inɛw kubɔ le namau galin. Iyaa, sasaabe kanran wiyaa, toi ii wogɔbe jɔnwaanɲu.
42008006	Toi ii gamuu, tibu yalu nɛ sugin. Kaa, toi gɔ tɛiyaa, dii bei baalɛ dɛi maaŋiyaain.
42008007	Toi ii gamuu dɔgɔ jijii sɛin logoro nɛ sugin. Kaa dɔgɔ jijii sɛin gɔbe be wooi tunmɔ go tɛiyaa, dɔgɔ gɔbe be dɛi sigɛ gabiyaa, bei kimaatin.
42008008	Toi ii gamuu minɛ ɛju nɛ sugin. Toi wogɔbe tɛiyaa, ɛjii gabiyaa, dɛnrɛn gaai bɛɛmaabe.» Taanrinyɛn kɔɔ daantiyaa, Yesu, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gi: «Inɛ suguru ɛhɛgu sɛɛ, wo sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛn.»
42008009	Yesu jaŋu unrunw gɔbe womaa taanrinyɛn kɔɔ tiyɛ gɔ ingei ma selumi.
42008010	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa: «Ama diinɛ sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ, e bɛrɛ kai jugɔmaaɲu. Kaa inɛw wajunw bemaa giri gɔmaa kosɛin kanran, giri iyenɔu dɛi, iyaa, be suguru dɛɛraa wɔin kanran, paamu kanrannɔu dɛi, be bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn le sɔɔdɛin.»
42008011	«Aiwa, nɛɛ taanrinyɛn mu dain gɔ tiyɛ womɔ unwɔ: Toi ii gɔ, Ama sɔɔ gɔ woi.
42008012	Toi ii oju nɛ sugin gɔbe, inɛw Ama sɔɔ ɛgaa, bemaa Ama sɔɔ be ɛgu gɔ le gawu ye, yayabu gɔ bɛɛnɔu giye jinrun puu kuu baŋa wɛi ye, sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ bemɛ nɛ goonɔjɛɛjɛ gɔbe bei.
42008013	Toi ii tibu yalu nɛ sugin gɔbe, inɛw Ama sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa ye kinɛ ɛɛli le yabaɲu gɔbe bei. Kaa be duu bɛɛnɛ. Be waaru gaila le sɔɔ gɔ le gagawaɲu. Kaa subɔrɔ be bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, be sɔɔ gɔ pajatiiɲu.
42008014	Nɛɛ, toi ii dɔgɔ jijii sɛin logoro nɛ sugin gɔbe, wogɔ inɛw sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa, kaa yaa ye, jiire lee, arusɛgɛ mɔɔnu lee, iyaa aduna kijɛ kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔjɛ lee bei kimɛtiiɲu dɛi, ii bemɛ gɔ ilɛidolo.
42008015	Kaa toi ii minɛ ɛju nɛ sugin gɔbe, wogɔbe inɛw Ama sɔɔ ɛgaa, kinɛ teitai lee, kinɛ ɛju lee sɔɔ gɔ gɛliyɛnw gɔbe bei. Be muyɔn le bii ye, ii kukunɔɲu.»
42008016	Yesu, iyaa taanrinyɛn ɔn jeɲaa be le sɔi: «Inɛ turu kanran lanpa yaun tanugaa ye, taju le kii ma, teenu bɔlɔ nɛ kunɔ ma kanraanlɛ. Kaa lanpa tanugaa ye, inɛw ginrun gɔ nɛ yoonw gɔbe wijɛ womɔ iye ga, lanpa gɔi yalu wijɛ ɛjii wo obo bɛɛjɛ nɛ jeleɲu.
42008017	Sabu kijɛ babaŋa ɛlu gooidolo turu kanran wɔlɔ, iyaa sɔɔ boŋurun jugɔmɔidolo turu kanran wɔlɔ. Puu dɛdɛbɛlɛdɛin.
42008018	«Kɔɔ sabu dɛi sɔɔ aŋai e keŋiyɛnjɛ gɔ dɛi kuu kajubu le biyɛi. Kunrin inɛ kijɛ sɛɛ baŋa bɛrɛ, baraa ye ohobodɛin. Kaa inɛ kijɛ sɛlɛ gɔ, gaila yasɛ ga wo wɔɔ gɔ yaa wo bɛrɛ ɛhɛlɛdɛin.»
42008019	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, wo na lee, wo suŋɔw lee yalu wo bee gɔ nɛ wiyaa dɔwaabɛin. Kaa inɛw joo Yesui gɔŋaa sɛbɛin gɔ digɛu, be genɛ womɔ nɛ tee dɔwaa bɛɛnɛ.
42008020	Kunrin inɛw wiyaa Yesu le ɔn gin’ gin: «U na lee, u suŋɔw lee bain go yɔɔin. Be ui selumɛuwɔin.»
42008021	Kaa Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Mu na lee, mu suŋɔw gɔbe lee, wogɔbe inɛw Ama sɔɔ keŋiyaan ye, wogɔ le kɛukɛu yoi yaanw gɔbe bei.»
42008022	Bai turu Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ le diikoro nɛ yowaa, bemaa dibe diŋirun waja go galamɔ gi. Kɔɔ waaru le be dibe gɔ kɛjɛ taŋai tɔlaabɛin.
42008023	Waaru dibe gɔ kɛjaa taŋau be bee le, Yesu giri yeiyaai. Iyaa kɔɔ waaru le ooɲɔ diyɛ naa diyɛ dibe gɔ nɛ ingelaabe. Diikoro kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ dii jooube. Kunrin bei suiyodo ga bee.
42008024	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe yaa, Yesui yemɛlaa ɔn gin’ wo le sɔin: «Emɛ baŋa, emɛ baŋa, emi suiyoido!» Yesu giri yemaa, ooɲɔ gɔ lee, diigunu gɔ lee ganwaanbe. Kɔɔ waaru le yalu gɔ kelemu biyaabe.
42008025	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gi: «Gagawu ebe gɔ yago wɔɔ?» Kaa, be kai, Yesu kijɛ kanrun gɔ iyaa, liyaa maunɛ biyaa, tunmɔ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Aa! Inɛ ɔn inɛ inge tɔgui? Ooɲɔ lee, dibe dii lee, sɔɔ womɔ koi yabaɲu.»
42008026	Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee, kɔɔ onu nɛ, Gerasa bɛɛnw gana, Galile le daii wɔɔ nɛ yaa dɔwaabɛin.
42008027	Yesu, diikoro gɔ nɛ gowaa, waaru minɛ nɛ wo dɔi le, yalu wogɔ le bɛrii ana bee turu ainɛ wo bɛrɛ wiyaabe. Ainɛ wogɔ jinrunbe kuu womɔ nɛ yadaanbɛin. Sɔi kunɔlu go wo bii tanwaain, iyaa ɔnsain yalu nɛ laa ye, wo ginrun nɛ toiyobele.
42008028	Yesui waaru wo iyi le, wo mii diyɛ le piyaa, Yesu kubɔ doɲu nɛ numaa sugaa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ wo le sɔi: «Yesu, Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ baŋa Aini gɔ, uwɔ ingei? Mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, mui ɔɲɔmɔnɔu.»
42008029	Yesu, jinrun gɔ wa ainɛ gɔ kuu nɛ goo ga tɔɔrɔube dɛi wo sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔube. Jinrun gɔ kubɔ joo yanwunrinyɛunbe. Inɛw, yɔgu lee, inrun lee, kubɔ womɔbe pagaa sɛbɛin. Kaa wo kɔɔbe puu biɲɛ ye, puluguti ye, jinrun gɔ woi suuraa ye, yalu inɛ wɔlɔ, olusolo nɛ jɛyaaube.
42008030	Yesu ainɛ gɔi selumaa: «Boi uwɔ inge gɛɛɲu?» Jinrun joo ainɛ gɔ kuu nɛ yadaanbɛin gɔ digɛu, wo saa gi: «Boi ma “Emɛ jooi wɔin” gɛɛɲu.»
42008031	Bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ nɛ bemaa yoo giye tɔɔrɔnɔu ga, jinrun gɔbe Yesu bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛɛunbɛin.
42008032	Be le bɛrii, kokoo kuu nɛ tolu kulɔ joo belu tɛnwɛun yabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ jinrun gɔbe Yesu bɛrɛ gɛnyaanbɛin, womaa unrunbei pajaa ye tolu gɔbe nɛ yoomɔ gin. Yesu bemaa wogɔ kanran bɛbɛɛdɛin gi.
42008033	Kɔɔ gin’ jinrun gɔbe ainɛ gɔ kuu nɛ gowaa yaa, tolu gɔbe nɛ yoin. Tolu kulɔ gɔ puu kokoo daa gɔ nɛ gowaa, ɔgu jɔbaa, dibe gɔ nɛ wiyaa yowaa piriyaa yinwaain.
42008034	Inɛw tolu gɔbe girɛubɛin gɔbe, sɔɔ gɔ iyaa, be jɔbaa yaa kibɛru gɔ ginrun go lee, olu go lee tagaabɛin.
42008035	Inɛw, kibɛru gɔ ɛgaa, sɔɔ bii gɔ yɛnɛi wiyaabɛin. Kaa, inɛw gɔbe Yesu genɛ nɛ wiyaa dɔwaa, ainɛ jinrun joo kuu womɔ nɛ goi gɔ, sɛɛu, sɔi kunaa, Yesu genɛ nɛ wo daaun iyaa, be liyaain.
42008036	Sɔɔ gɔ puu aŋai galu gɔ inɛw iyin gɔbe, ainɛ jinrun joo kuu womɔ nɛ daanbe gɔ bana baju gɔ, inɛw wɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ tagaabɛin.
42008037	Gerasa gana bɛɛnw wooi Yesu bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, womaa gana unrunbemɛ nɛ goojɛ gin. Sabu be puu liliyɛ diyɛ le bɛin. Yesu kɔɔ gin’ gowaa diikoro nɛ yowaa, yaado ga kanraun wo wɔu,
42008038	ainɛ jinrun kuu womɔ nɛ goi gɔ wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, unrun wo le yaadɔn gi. Kaa Yesu woi pilemɛmaatiyaa wo le ɔn gin’ gi:
42008039	«Pilemɛ ye ginrun uwɔ nɛ yaa. Ama u dɛi kijɛ diyɛ kanrun gɔ taga.» Ainɛ gɔ kunrin gowaa yaa, ana gɔ puu nɛ Yesu wo dɛi kijɛ diyɛ kanrun sɔɔ tagaube.
42008040	Yesu, waaru dibe diŋirun waja go gowaa wo wɛi le, mɔɔnu gɔ woi sɛgɛraabe. Sabu be puu woi dɔmɔbɛin.
42008041	Ainɛ turu, boi womɔ Jayirusu gɛɛbɛin gɔ, yalu gɔ nɛ wiyaa dɔi. Ainɛ wogɔ, Yahutunw Ama gɛɛn ginrun kuu baŋai bee. Wo iyaa turu sai yasɛbe. Iyaa gɔ anranguju pɛli lɛisigɛ gin’ yasɛbe. Iyaa wogɔ jinwaan yinwɛndo ga bee dɛi, wo wiyaa, Yesu giru nɛ tuŋiyaan, womaa ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ wɛɛ dɛi wo bɛrɛ gɛɛunbe. Yesu kɔɔ gin’ ainɛ gɔ ginrun oju gowaa, yaau wo wɔu, mɔɔnu joo gɔ woi damaube.
42008043	Kɔɔ gin’ yaanran turu anranguju pɛli lɛisigɛ baa, bain goi jiun le bee, inɛw gɔbe logoro nɛ yatobe. Jɔŋujɔŋɔw joo woi jɔŋɔɲu ga ɛjii woi kayaabɛin. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ inɛ turu kanran woi jɔŋaa bɛɛlu.
42008044	Kɔɔ gin’ wo Yesu onu nɛ dɔwaa, sɔi womɔ kinrun tabu. Yesu sɔi tabau wo digɛu, jiun womɔ bajaai.
42008045	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu ɔn gin’ selumu: «Inɛ aai mui tabu?» Inɛw gɔbe puu unrunbei laa ga gɛɛubɛin. Piɛru saa gi: «Mu baŋa, mɔɔnu gɔ ui gɔŋaa gɛliyaa, inɛw sibɛ sibɛ ui damauwɔin iyeelɛu!»
42008046	Kaa Yesu saa gi: «Inɛ turu mui tabaabe. Sabu gɔnrɔn mu nɛ gowaabe ga mu jugaabɔn.»
42008047	Kɔɔ waaru le, yaanran gɔ sɔɔ wo kanrun gɔ ɛlu gowaai ga jugaa, wo kinwɛun, Yesu giru nɛ wiyaa tuŋiyaanbe. Kijɛ dɛi woi wo tabu gɔ lee, iyaa woi tabau wo digɛu bana jiun womɔ baju gɔ lee, inɛw puu giru nɛ wo Yesu bɛrɛ tagaabe.
42008048	Kaa kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu wo le saa gi: «Iyaa ma, gagawu uwɔ ui bajamaati. Jamu le yaa.»
42008049	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔu wo gɛlɛu, inɛ turu, Yahutunw Ama gɛɛn ginrun kuu baŋa, Jayirusu ginrun nɛ gowaa wiyaa, Jayirusu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Iyaa uwɔ yinwaain. Nɛɛ, jaŋudeerenɛ gɔi ɔɲɔmɔnɔu.»
42008050	Yesu, sɔɔ gɔ waaru wo ɛgu le, Jayirusu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Liyɛnɔu. Mu le gawa sai. Iyaa uwɔ gɔ babajado.»
42008051	Waaru ginrun gɔ nɛ be dɔi le, Yesu, inɛ turu kanran unrun le yoomɔlu, Piɛru lee, Jan lee, Jake lee, iyaa gɔ ba gɔ lee, iyaa gɔ na gɔ lee laa ye.
42008052	Inɛw gɔbe puu, iyaa gɔ dɛi pii piiubɛin, iyaa sɔmiyɛunbɛin. Kaa Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «E pii piinɔugi, iyaa gɔ yinwɛnlu. Wo giri yeiyeuwɔ.»
42008053	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo giyaa, inɛw gɔbe woi mɔmɔubɛin. Sabu be iyaa gɔ yinwaan galaai ga igii bɛin.
42008054	Kaa Yesu, iyaa gɔ numɔ aa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Iyaa, ingele!»
42008055	Iyaa gɔ kikinu womɔ wo bɛrɛ pilemaa wiyaabe. Kɔɔ waaru le tee wo ingelaai. Yesu, iyaa gɔ bɛrɛ pana obo ga tɔɔraabe.
42008056	Iyaa naranw gɔbei ɛjii maunɛ biyaabe. Kaa Yesu be bɛrɛ sɔwaa, bemaa inɛ kanma bɛrɛ sɔɔ gɔ jugɔmɔnɔu gi.
42009001	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ womɔ gɔbe boonaa, jinrun wooi inɛw kuu nɛ nana goonɔ ga, jiun bajamɔ ga, gɔnrɔn lee, paŋa lee bei obaabe.
42009002	Ama diinɛ waaju taga ga, jiungunw bajamɔ ga, wo bei tiyaabe.
42009003	Bei tiiu, wo ɔn gin’ be le gi: «Oju ebe dɛi baga ma, jɛmɛ ma, buru ma, buudu ma gɛliyɛnɔugi. Arugoi lɛi lɛi gɛliyɛnɔugi.
42009004	Ginrun e sugoido gɔ nɛ, e yaaido baa, kɔɔ nɛ yabiyɛi.
42009005	Yalu turu nɛ e dɔwaa, gana gɔ bɛɛnw ei sɛgɛrɛ ga yabanɛ biyaai ye, ana wogɔ nɛ goonu kubɔ ebe nɛ minɛ tara gɔ pogoti gooi. Wogɔ, be bɛrɛ jarugu be le yɔɔ sɛɛrɛi biyɛdo.»
42009006	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ bei tinwɛnraan wo kilaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe gowaa, ana ana nɛ gɔŋɔlaabɛin. Be yalu wooi nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagaubɛin. Yalu wooi nɛ jiungunwin bajamɔubɛin.
42009007	Sɛmɛginɛ Herɔde, Yesu birɛ dɛin dɛin birɛube gɔ kibɛru waaru wo ɛgu le, woi bimiliyaa, sɔɔ kanranɲu inɛɛ bee. Sabu inɛw Yesu dɛi sɔɔ dɛin dɛin sɔɔubɛin. Inɛw gamuu, woi Jan Batisei yiun nɛ bulaa wiyaa gɛɛbɛin.
42009008	Inɛw gamuu iyaa woi inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Elii, pilemaa wɛi gɛɛbɛin. Iyaa, gamuu womaa pɔɔlɔ inɛw Ama titiyaanw logoro nɛ koturui bulaa wɛi gɛɛbɛin.
42009009	Kaa Herɔde, wo ɔn gin’ gi: «Mu Jan kuu polomaabɔn. Nɛɛ inɛ dɛi sɔɔ kɔɔbe wooi ɛgɛu mu wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔ inɛ aai ma gun?» Wo kɔɔ gin’ gɛɛu, Yesui bana iyeɲu dɛnɛube.
42009010	Kɔɔ gin’, waaru waaju tagaa pilemaa be wɛi le, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, kijɛ be kanrun gɔbe puu Yesu bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Yesu bei dimɛraan, dɛiin, ana turu boi womɔ Bɛtusayida gɛɛbɛin gɔ sibɛ go jɛyaabe.
42009011	Kaa inɛw kulɔ wogɔ ɛgaa, woi dimiyaanbɛin. Yesu bei ɛjii sɛgɛraa, Ama diinɛ sɔɔ be bɛrɛ tagaabe. Iyaa inɛw bajamu kai sɛbɛin gɔbei yaa bajamaabe.
42009012	Nai yɔraa, digɛnai sugoube sabu dɛi, jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe Yesu genɛ nɛ dɔwaa, wo le ɔn gin’ gin: «U mɔɔnu gɔi pajaa ye, bemaa kɔɔ nɛ yalu diinyɛnɲu lee, kijɛ kayaɲu lee bɛɛ ga, ana diyɛ lee, dagi lee emi gɔŋaa wɔin gɔbe nɛ bei yaamɔ. Sabu yalu emɛ wɔɔ ɔn nɛ kijɛ kanma wɔlɔ.»
42009013	Yesu aŋa bemɛ ɔn gin’ sai: «E kuu ebe le pana bei oboi.» Kɔɔ waaru le, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe wo le ɔn gin’ gin: «U emaa kuu emɛ le inɛw ɔn puu dɛi yai kakayɔn ɛbɛ jɛɛlɛ ga wɔlɔu ye kai, emɛ buru numɔrɔn lee, iiju lɛi lee laa ye, kijɛ waja sɛnɛ.»
42009014	Inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe lugo gɔ, anranw sai inɛw muɲu numɔrɔn gin’ bee. Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔbe bɛrɛ tɔɔraabe, bemaa inɛw gɔbei pɔrɔ le pɔrɔ le, inɛw pɛnumɔrɔn pɛnumɔrɔn dɛinyɛnmɔ gi.
42009015	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe kɔɔ gin’ kanraanbɛin. Be inɛw gɔbe puu dɛinyɛnmaabɛin.
42009016	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu, buru numɔrɔn gɔ lee, iiju lɛi gɔ lee jeɲaa, giri daa go dɛɛraa gɛlɛu, Amai birɛpoo tagaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo buru gɔbe kabalaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe bemaa inɛw bɛrɛ gamala ga, bei obu.
42009017	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw puu pana kayaa, bei baabe. Kɛbɛlɛ waju gɔbe be turaa, taju pɛli lɛisigɛ jowaabe.
42009018	Yesu, bai turu dɛiin biyaa, Ama gɛɛun waaru wo bee le, jaŋu unrunw womɔ yaa wo le yabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ wo be bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumu: «Inɛw mui inɛ aai gɛɛɲu?»
42009019	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe saa: «Inɛw gamuu ui Jan Batisei bulaa wɛi gɛɛɲu. Gamuu uwaa inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Elii gɛɛɲu. Gamuu iyaa, uwaa pɔɔlɔ inɛw Ama titiyaanw logoro nɛ koturu bulaa wɛi gɛɛɲu.»
42009020	Yesu be bɛrɛ selumaa: «Nɛɛ, e mui aai ga sɛi?» Piɛru saa: «Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ ui.»
42009021	Piɛru kɔɔ gin’ wo saa, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ ɛjii sɔwaa, bemaa sɔɔ kɔɔ inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ jugɔmɔnɔu gi.
42009022	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ sɔɔi tɔlu: «Inɛ Aini gɔ, waajibi ɔɲɔmu joo bɛbɛɛdo. Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe lee, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, wo le yabaidenɛ. Waajibi woi dadaadɛin. Kaa bai taaniye gɔ wo bubulodo.»
42009023	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe wooi le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛ aai kanran, jaŋu ii mai bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, wogɔ baŋa kuu womɔ naŋa ye, baga jai womɔ bai wooi duiyi ye, mui wo dimiyɛnmɔ.
42009024	Aduna ɔn dɛi, inɛ kinrun unrunmɔ yabado ga wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa, aduna wɛɛido gɔ nɛ kinrun womɔ susuyodo. Kaa inɛ kinrun unrunmɔ mu dɛi pajaajɛ, wogɔ baŋa kinrun womɔ yayabado.
42009025	Aduna ɔn puu uwɔi kanran, kuu uwɔ suyaajɛu ma, kuu uwɔ yamalaajɛu ma biyaai ye, niwɛn yasɛ ma?
42009026	Mu lee, sɔɔ mabe lee dɛi, inɛ aai kanran dɔgɔ woi ahaajɛ ye, Inɛ Aini gɔ, dooro womɔ nɛ lee, Ba gɔ dooro nɛ lee, mɛlɛnkɛ ɛjaa wɔin gɔbe dooro nɛ lee, waaru wo wiyaajɛ, inɛ wogɔ dɛi dɔgɔ woi ahaado.
42009027	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw unwɔin ɔnbe logoro nɛ, gamuu, Ama diinɛ iyelu go yinwɛindenɛ.»
42009028	Yesu, sɔɔ kɔɔbe wo sɔi, bai gagara gin’ dɔwaa wo kanran, wo Piɛru lee, Jan lee, Jake lee dimɛraan, Ama gɛɛn dɛi kokoo kuu nɛ unu.
42009029	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu, Ama gɛɛun wo gɛlɛu, girupala womɔ bana gɔ duliyaai. Sɔi womɔ piluniyaan, ɛjii dooroube.
42009030	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ginsɛsai anranw lɛi Yesu le sɔɔ sɔɔu kohiŋi. Anranw lɛi wogɔbe, Mɔise lee, Eli leei bɛin.
42009031	Bei dooro diyɛ le tagaraabɛin. Be, Yesu bana birɛ womɔ kibemɔ ye, bɛrii Jerusalɛmu nɛ aŋai wo yinwɛindo sɔɔ sɔɔubɛin.
42009032	Kaa Piɛru lee, inɛw wo le bɛin gɔbe lee, giri yeiyaa bɛnraan diinbɛin. Waaru giri be yemɛ le, be Yesu dooro gɔ iyaabɛin, inɛw lɛi gɔbe yaa wo le be wɔun iyaabɛin.
42009033	Anranw lɛi gɔbe waaru Yesu le be kabiyɛbe le, Piɛru, Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu baŋa, yalu ɔn nɛ biyɛ ga ɛjii wɔɔ. Kuru taanu kuraa ye, turu uwɔi, turu Mɔise mɔi, turu Eli mɔi bojomɔi.» Wo sɔɔ wo sɔɔbe inɛɛbe.
42009034	Piɛru kɔɔ gin’ gɛɛu wo wɔu, kulumɔ turu wiyaa, bei dɛbaabe. Waaru kulumɔ gɔ bei dɛbɛube le, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe liyaain.
42009035	Kulumɔ gɔ nɛ mii ɛgɛmaabe: «Ɔn Aini ma gɔ woi. Woi mu yɛmu. Sɔɔ womɔ ɛjii keŋiyɛin.»
42009036	Mii gɔ ɛgɛmu onu nɛ, Yesui laa ye, inɛ kanma bele. Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe kijɛ be iye gɔbe dɛi, waaru wogɔ le, be sɔɔ wogɔ inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ taganɛ bɛin.
42009037	Aga baa yaa gɔ, Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee, waaru kokoo kuu nɛ gowaa be sugu le, mɔɔnu diyɛ Yesui sɛgɛrɛi wiyaabe.
42009038	Mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ, ainɛ turu kɔnwaan ɔn gin’ gi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, u aini turu ma gɔ, ii ma gɔi marun yɛnɛ.
42009039	Jinrun turu woi ahaajɛ, woi ginsɛsai pipiimɔjɛ. Ii gɔi ɛjii jigemaatiyaa ye, aŋa womɔ nɛ yugɔrɔ goomɔjɛ. Woi ɛjii ɔɲɔmɔjɛ, iyaa woi ɔgu pajaalɛ.
42009040	Mu jaŋu unrunw uwɔbe bɛrɛ jinrun gɔ ii ma kuu nɛ nanu goonɔ ga gɛnyaanbɔn. Kaa be kanraan bɛɛnɛ.»
42009041	Yesu saa gi: «Aa! E inɛw mɔɲu, inɛw gagawu sɛnɛ gɔbe. Waaru yagɔ baa e le mu biyɛun jaan? Waaru yagɔ baa ei muyɔndɔn? Ii uwɔ gɔ ɔn nɛ jɛɛlɛ.»
42009042	Waaru ii gɔ Yesu le wo bɛruni le, jinrun gɔ ii gɔi minɛ nɛ sunugaa, woi ɛjii jigemaabe. Kaa Yesu, jinrun gɔi ɛjii ganwaanbe. Wo ii gɔi bajamaatiyaa, banɛ gɔ bɛrɛ obaabe.
42009043	Ama gɔnrɔn diyɛ gɔ dɛi, inɛw gɔbe puu bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaabe. Yesu kijɛ kanranbe gɔbe dɛi inɛw gɔbe puu waaru maunɛ bee le, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw unrunmɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi:
42009044	«E kai sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii keŋiyɛin: Inɛ Aini gɔi inɛw numɔ nɛ kukunɔdɛin.»
42009045	Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, sɔɔ kɔɔ paamu kanranbenɛ. Sɔɔ gɔ bemaa paamu kanrannɔu ga, tiyɛ gɔ be bɛrɛ baŋaraantin. Iyaa be tiyɛ womɔ Yesu bɛrɛ selumɛ ga liyɛubɛin.
42009046	Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe logoro nɛ jiiru biyaabe: Be logoro bemɛ nɛ aa diyɛi ma jiireubɛin.
42009047	Kaa Yesu, kinɛ bemɛ ajubu gɔ jugaa, ii dagi turu jɛɛlaa, genɛ unrunmɔ nɛ bojaa,
42009048	jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gi: «Inɛ aai kanran, boi ma le ii dagi ɔin ɛjii sɛgɛraajɛ ye, kɔɔbaŋa mui sɛguru. Iyaa inɛ mui sɛgɛraajɛ, mui tiinɛ gɔi sɛguru. Sabu logoro ebe nɛ inɛ sigɛ le kuu unrunmɔ sunugaa wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa inɛ wo sigɛ wɔɔ gɔ woi.»
42009049	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Jan saa gi: «Mu baŋa, emɛ ainɛ turu, boi uwɔ le jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nanau wo wɔu iyaabɛin. Kaa inɛ wogɔ emɛ le ui digɛla gɔ dɛi, emɛ woi tɛŋaabɛin.»
42009050	Kaa Yesu saa gi: «E woi turu kanran tɛŋɛnɔugi. Sabu inɛ e jaŋui laa gɔ, e bɔɔi.»
42009051	Waaru Yesu, aduna nɛ goo ye, alagala wo uloido bɛruni le, wo anrangaju le biyaa, Jerusalɛmu yaa ga ɛjii namaa iŋiyaan kole bee.
42009052	Wo giru unrunmɔ nɛ inɛw tiyaabe. Inɛw gɔbe yaa Samari bɛɛnw ana dagi turu nɛ Yesu dɛi ginrun sugo yegere ga yowaabɛin.
42009053	Kaa ana gɔ bɛɛnw, Yesu Jerusalɛmu yaaube dɛi, woi sɛgɛrɛ ga yabanɛ.
42009054	Yesu jaŋu unrunw, Jake lee, Jan lee kɔɔ iyaa, ɔn gin’ gin: «Inɛw Baŋa, yaun alagala goo sugu ye, inɛw ɔnbei tɛgɛ ga emaa gɛɛ ga u ibɛlau ma?»
42009055	Kaa, Yesu be sibɛ go kigelemaa, bei ɛjii ganwaanbe.
42009056	Be kɔɔ gin’ oju bemɛ dimiyaan, ana dagi waja nɛ yain.
42009057	Oju nɛ be tou, inɛ turu wiyaa, Yesu le ɔn gin’ gi: «Yalu u yaaido wooi nɛ, mu ui didimiyɛndɔn.»
42009058	Kaa Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Yurugube bonɔ yasin. Sasaabe kuru yasin. Kaa Inɛ Aini gɔ, yalu kuu tuŋɔrɔnɲu kanran sɛlɛ.»
42009059	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, turu baŋa le ɔn gin’ gi: «Wɛɛ mui dimiyɛn.» Kaa baŋa wo le saa gi: «Mu Baŋa, u mu bɛrɛ mu ba yiun laa yai mu bojomɔ.»
42009060	Kaa Yesu saa gi: «Inɛw yiun gɔbe pajaa ye yiun bemɛ be bojomɔ. Kaa u kai yaa ye Ama diinɛ kibɛru sɔɔ gɔ taga.»
42009061	Inɛ waja yaa Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu Baŋa, mu ui didimiyɛndɔn, kaa mu maranw bɛrɛ jamu biyɛmɔ gɛɛi mu yaamɔ.»
42009062	Kaa Yesu, inɛ wogɔ baŋa le ɔn gin’ gi: «Inɛ aai kanran, sari wolu walu aa gɛliyaa, onu gɔnɔ gɔnɔ yɛnɛjɛ ye, inɛ wogɔ baŋa gɔ Ama diinɛ wo le jaanla.»
42010001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, jaŋu unrunw waja pɛsɔi lɛisigɛ yɛmaabe. Wo bei inɛ lɛi lɛi goonaa, ana nɛ lee, yalu wo yaaun jaan gɔbe wooi nɛ lee, bei giru unrunmɔ nɛ tiyaabe.
42010002	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔwaabe: «Dɛnrɛn ilaa, gaai wɔɔ, kaa birɛbirɛnw joolain. Kɔɔ dɛi, minɛ baŋa bɛrɛ gɛɛin, womaa dɛnrɛn gɔ ginrun jɛɛlɛ giye, birɛbirɛnw minɛ gɔ nɛ tii wa.
42010003	Nɛɛ, yaai! Kaa igii biyɛi, mu peju unrunw gin’ tataabe logoro nɛ ei tiiuwɔn.
42010004	Buudu yalu kunɔɲu ma, jɛmɛ ma, taga ma jeɲɛnɔugi. Oju nɛ iŋi ye, inɛ turui kanran poonɔnɔugi.
42010005	Ginrun e yoojɛ wooi nɛ, e laa gɔ ɔn gin’ gɛɛi: ‘Ginrun ɔn jamu wo le biyɛmɔ!’
42010006	Kɔɔ nɛ jamu inɛ turu yato ye, jamu ebe gɔ kuu womɔ nɛ susugodo. Kɔɔi laa ye, jamu ebe gɔ e nɛ pilemɛ ye wɛwɛɛdo.
42010007	Ginrun e yoi gɔ nɛ yabiyɛi. Kakayɔn e bɛrɛ be oboido gɔ kayai. Kijɛ nɔɔɲu e bɛrɛ be oboido gɔi nɔɔi. Sabu birɛbirɛnɛ tujɔ womɔ wo le jaain wɔɔ. E ginrun ginrun nɛ yoonu biyɛnɔugi.
42010008	Kɔɔ gin’ iyaa, ana nɛ e yoi wooi nɛ, inɛw gɔbe ei sɛgɛraaɲu ye, e bɛrɛ kijɛ oboidɛin gɔi kayai.
42010009	Ana wogɔ jiungunw gɔbei bajamɔi. Iyaa, be le ɔn gin’ gɛɛi: ‘Ama diinɛ gɔ e le bɛruniyaain.’
42010010	Kaa, ana turu nɛ e yowaa, ana gɔ bɛɛnw ei sɛgɛrɛ ga yabanɛ biyaai ye, ana wogɔ pɔŋɔrɔn gɔbe nɛ yaai, kɔɔ onu nɛ kijɛ e gɛɛido:
42010011	‘Emɛ e dɛi ana ebe ugunu, kubɔ emɛ nɛ tara gɔ kanran pogouwɔin. Kaa, kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ, Ama diinɛ gɔ e le bɛruniyaain ga jugi biyɛi.’
42010012	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido, Sodomɛ ana bɛɛnw ɔɲɛ gɔ, ana kɔɔ inɛw mɔ baalu biyɛdo.»
42010013	«Kɔɔ gin’ Korajinɛ ana bɛɛnw, Bɛtusayida ana bɛɛnw, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu ana ebe nɛ taanrinyɛn birɛ kanraan tagurin gɔbe, Tire lee, Sidɔn lee ana nɛ kanraan tagurin bee biyaa ye, be ɔn baa bana bemɛ dulomu ye, sɔi sɛmɛlɛ gori ye, dɛinyin ye, minɛ kɔkɔliyɛbɛin.
42010014	Kɔɔ dɛi, Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido dɔwaai ye, Tire lee, Sidɔn lee bɛɛnw ɔɲɛ gɔ ebe mɔ baalu biyɛdo.
42010015	U kai, Kapɛrunaumu ana gɔ, ui jeɲaa ye, alagala baa unɔdɛin ma? Ai, ui yinwunrun baa sunugodɛin.»
42010016	Yesu, iyaa pilemaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gi: «Inɛ sɔɔ ebe keŋiyɛnjɛ gɔ, mui keŋiyɛnjɛ. Iyaa, inɛ e le yabalu, mu le yabalu kanrun. Kɔɔ gin’ iyaa inɛ mu le yabalu gɔ, mui tiinɛ gɔ lei yabalu kanrun.»
42010017	Jaŋu unrunw pɛsɔi lɛisigɛ Yesu tii gɔbe kinɛ ɛɛlu le pilemaa wiyaa, ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Inɛw Baŋa, halu jinrunbe kanran boi uwɔ paŋa le emɛ le tubiyeuwɔin.»
42010018	Yesu be le saa: «Mu, Setanu, anran bana giri yɛnɛjɛ gin’, ginsɛsai, alagala gowaa bagau wo wɔu iyaabɔn.
42010019	Yɛnɛi, mu yugurube kuu nɛ lee, mɔmiyɛnbe kuu nɛ lee nama ga, paŋa e bɛrɛ obaajɔn. Iyaa jaŋunɛ paŋa puu kuu nɛ yaa e bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaajɔn. Kijɛ turu kanran mɔɲu e bɛrɛ kanrun bɛɛidolo.
42010020	Yinkanran jinrunbe e le tubiyaain ga kinɛ ebe ɛɛliyɛmɔnɔugi. Kaa boi ebe alagala nɛ tɔŋi wɔɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi.»
42010021	Waaru wogɔ le tee, Yesu, Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le kinɛ saii ɛɛliyɛmaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ba, alagala lee, minɛ lee baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ ɔnbe, hakilɛgunw lee, jugɔ jugɔnw lee bɛrɛ baŋaraantiyaa, unrunw dagunw bɛrɛ u jugɔmu gɔ dɛi, u birɛpoo. Ɔnhɔn! Ba, sabu giru uwɔ nɛ kijɛ dagaa gɔ woi.
42010022	«Mu Ba kijɛ wooi numɔ ma nɛ kunaajɛ. Ba gɔi laa ye, Aini gɔ aai ma inɛ igu wɔlɔ. Iyaa, Aini gɔ lee, Aini gɔ inɛ bɛrɛ Ba gɔ jugɔmu wo ibɛ gɔ lee laa ye, Ba gɔ ai ma inɛ igu wɔlɔ.»
42010023	Iyaa, kɔɔ onu nɛ, jaŋu unrunw unrunmɔ sibɛ go kigelemaa, be tee sai le Yesu ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kijɛ e iyejɛ ɔnbe, giri wogɔ iyenw gɔbe, Ama be yabu.
42010024	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw Ama titiyaanw joo lee, ɔgɔnw joo lee, kijɛ e iyejɛ ɔnbe iye ibɛɛ bɛin, kaa biyaa iyenɛ. Be sɔɔ e ɛgɛjɛ ɔnbe ɛgɛ ibɛɛ bɛin, kaa biyaa ɛgɛnɛ.»
42010025	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ turu ingelaa, Yesui subɔrɔ yɛnɛ dɛi, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, maa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ bɛɛ ga, kijɛ inge mu kanraun jaan?»
42010026	Yesu wo le saa gi: «Tɔɔru dɔn gɔ nɛ ingei tɔŋaaɲu? U sɔɔ wogɔ jaŋaa, yani paamu?»
42010027	Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ gɔ saa gi: «”U Inɛw Baŋa, Ama uwɔ gɔi, kinɛ uwɔ wooi le, kinrun uwɔ wooi le, gɔnrɔn uwɔ wooi le, hakilɛ uwɔ wooi le ibɛi biyɛ.” Iyaa “Aŋai kuu uwɔ u ibɛ gin’, u bɔɔnɛi yaa kɔɔ gin’ ibɛi biyɛ.”»
42010028	Yesu saa gi: «Bana u sai gɔ ɛjii wɔɔ. U kunrin kanran. Kɔɔ gin’ kanraanjɛu ye, u ɔnmɔsɔgɔ bɛbɛɛdou.»
42010029	Kaa Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ gɔ kuu unrunmɔ bɛrɛ naran obu ibɛi bee dɛi, Yesu le ɔn gin’ gi: «Nɛɛ, mu bɔɔnɛ gɔ aai?»
42010030	Yesu saa gi: «Ainɛ turu Jerusalɛmu gowaa, Jeriko sugoube. Oju nɛ wo tou, kuu numɔ numɔw kuu womɔ nɛ numaa, sɔi wo tobe gɔbe puu ɛlaa, woi lagaa, goju womɔ puu barumaa, kinrun goolu laa ye, kijɛ wo bɛrɛ waju bele wo wɔu, pajaatiyaa jɔbin.
42010031	Kɔɔ gin’ ainɛ gɔ oju nɛ wo diiun, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ turu, soo sɛlɛ womɔ le oju tutunmɔ gɔ dimiyaan sugoube. Ainɛ gɔi iyaa, baaraa galaabe.
42010032	Kɔɔ gin’ Lewi tɔgu inɛ turu yaa, yalu wogɔ nɛ wiyaa dɔwaa, ainɛ gɔi iyaa, wo kanran, baaraa galaabe.
42010033	Kaa Samari ana bɛɛnnɛ turu ana yaau, wiyaa yalu ainɛ gɔ diinbe gɔ nɛ dɔwaabe. Waaru woi wo iye le, amasɔgɔ womɔ woi aabe.
42010034	Genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa, ainɛ gɔ mirun gɔbe nɛ nii lee, resɛndii ilɛ lee togaa kɔɔraa, ɛjii pagaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ ainɛ gɔi jeɲaa arusɛgɛ unrunmɔ kuu nɛ daanaa, yerunw ginrun sugo turu nɛ woi jɛyaa, woi ɛjii kajubaabe.
42010035	Aga baa yaa gɔ, wo yerunw ginrun sugo baŋa bɛrɛ sarudu buudu lɛi goonaa obaa, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘U woi ɛjii kajuba. Waaru pilemaa mu wiyaajɛ, kɛɛlɛ sigɛ wo dɛi u goonu gɔ puu, mu u bɛrɛ tutujɔdɔn.’ »
42010036	Yesu, Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumu: «Inɛw taanu ɔnbe logoro nɛ, ajubu uwɔ nɛ, inɛ aai, ainɛ kuu nɛ kuu numɔ numɔw numi gɔ bɔɔnɛi bii?»
42010037	Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ gɔ saa gi: «Ainɛ amasɔgɔ womɔ jugɔnɛ gɔi.» Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «U kanran yaa ye, kɔɔ tunmɔ kanran.»
42010038	Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee, oju galau wɔun, ana turu nɛ be dɔwaa, yaanran turu, boi womɔ Mate gɛɛbɛin gɔ, ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ Yesui sɛgɛraabe.
42010039	Mate bainɛ turu yabe. Boi womɔ Mari gɛɛbɛin. Mari kɔɔ, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu kubɔsɔrɔ nɛ dɛinyaan, sɔɔ wo sɔɔbe gɔ keŋiyɛunbe.
42010040	Kaa Mate, ginrun kɔlɔ nɛ birɛ dɛin dɛin wo sɛbe gɔbe le ɔɲaa, wiyaa, Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛw Baŋa, mu bainɛ birɛ ɔn puu mu turu sai bɛrɛ pajaa birɛmɔu wo wɔɔ gɔ, u nɛ sɔɔ wɔlɔ ma? Womaa wɛɛ mui bara giye, wo le sɔɔ.»
42010041	Kaa Inɛw Baŋa saa wo le kijɛ gi: «Mate, Mate, u kijɛ joo dɛi liyaa, taŋa taŋa jɔbɔuwɔu.
42010042	Kaa kijɛ sigɛ le maa gɔ, kijɛ turui. Mari kijɛ yɛmu gɔ, kijɛ ire gɔ woi. Iyaa wo bɛrɛ yaa wogɔ ɛlɛidenɛ.»
42011001	Bai turu Yesu, yalu turu nɛ Ama gɛɛunbe. Waaru Ama gɛnyaan wo kilu le, jaŋu unrunw womɔ logoro nɛ turu baŋa gowaa, wo le ɔn gin’ gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, Jan Batise aŋai jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ wo deeru gin’, bana Ama gɛɛnɲu emi deere.»
42011002	Kɔɔ waaru le Yesu be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Waaru Ama e gɛɛnjɛ e ɔn gin’ gɛɛi: ‘Ba, boi uwɔ gaai biyɛmɔ, diinɛ uwɔ wɛɛmɔ.
42011003	Bai tuturu pana emi baaido gɔ emi obo.
42011004	Hakɛ emɛ yaabu kanran. Sabu emɛ yaa inɛw emɛ bɛrɛ hakɛ kanranw gɔbei yaabu kanraunwɔin. Emi subɔrɔmɔnɔu.’ »
42011005	Yesu iyaa be le ɔn gin’ gi: «Logoro ebe nɛ, turu baŋa anrunge turu yasɛ ye, wo, wo anrunge kɔɔ bɛrɛ digɛtaŋu waaru le yaa, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔwaa: ‘Mu anrunge, u mu bɛrɛ buru guni taanu yeruge,
42011006	sabu mu anrunge ana waja gowaa wiyaa ginrun ma nɛ yɔɔ, mu wo bɛrɛ kijɛ oboun turu kanran sɛlɔn.’
42011007	Wo kɔɔ gin’ wo giyaa, anrunge gɔ, ginrun unrunmɔ kɔlɔ nɛ tonu saa: ‘U mui ɔɲɔmɔnɔu! Ginrun mɔnɔgolo ma taan dadaga, unrunw ma lee, mu lee, emɛ diinyaain. U bɛrɛ buru obo dɛi mu ingele bɛɛidolɔn,’ giyaajɛ ye,
42011008	mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, be lɛi logoro nɛ anrunge too gɔ dɛi yagɔ baŋa ingele ga yabalu kanran, woi gɛɛn joo gɔ le ɔɲɔmaati dɛi, wo ingele ye, aŋai kai womɔ kilɛido gin’ wo bɛrɛ ohobodo.
42011009	Kɔɔ dɛi mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn: Gɛɛin, e bɛbɛɛdei. Dɛnɛi, e ihiyedei. Mɔnɔgolo taan gɔ tɔgɔi, e dɛi pipinɛlɛdɛin.
42011010	Inɛ gɛɛnjɛ, bɛbɛɛjɛ. Inɛ dɛnɛjɛ, ihiyedo. Inɛ taan tɔgɔjɛ wo dɛi taan pipinɛlɛdɛin.
42011011	Kɔɔ gin’, logoro ebe nɛ banɛ yagɔ, aini womɔ wo bɛrɛ iiju gɛnyaanjɛ ye yuguru wo bɛrɛ obodo?
42011012	Maa iyaa wo bɛrɛ ɛɲɛ talu selumaajɛ ye, woi mɔmiyɛn obodo?
42011013	E inɛw mɔɲu gɔbe, unrunw ebe bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju aŋai oboɲu igii wɔi ye, Ba Ama alagala nɛ daan gɔ, inɛw wo bɛrɛ gɛɛnw bɛrɛ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ Kikinu Pilu oboidolo ma?»
42011014	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, jinrun inɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔmɔbele turu, ainɛ turu kuu nɛ nanaa goonaabe. Ainɛ gɔ kuu nɛ jinrun gɔ goou wo digɛu, ainɛ gɔ sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabe. Inɛw, wogɔ iyaa, be bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe.
42011015	Kaa logoro bemɛ nɛ gamuu ɔn gin’ gɛɛubɛin: «Wo jinrunbe kuu baŋa, Belujebule gɔnrɔn le jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nanu goonɔjɛ.»
42011016	Iyaa, gamuu be Yesu pinɛ yɛnɛ ga, womaa Ama woi tii ye, unrunbe bɛrɛ wogɔ sɛɛrɛ, taanrinyɛn Ama bɛrɛ goi ye wɛɛjɛ le tagara gin.
42011017	Kaa Yesu, kinɛ bemɛ ajubu igii bee dɛi, saa gi: «Laamu turu nɛ, inɛw gɔbe tunmɔ le jaiyaain ye, laamu bemɛ gɔ suiyiyaado. Iyaa, ginrun turu inɛw tunmɔ le jaiyaain ye, ginrun bemɛ gɔ yayanwando.
42011018	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, Setanu, kuu womɔ le jaiyɛuwɔ ye, laamu womɔ gɔ yani iŋi bɛɛdo? Sabu e maa Belujebule gɔnrɔn le jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nanajɛ gi.
42011019	Kaa iyaa, mu Belujebule gɔnrɔn le jinrunbe nanajɔn biyaai ye, nɛɛ e bɔɔnw gɔbe, jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nana be goonɔjɛ gɔ, gɔnrɔn wogɔ, aa bei obaajɛ? Saliyɛ ebe be kiredo.
42011020	Kaa mu Ama numɔ paŋa le jinrun inɛw kuu nɛ nana goonɔuwɔn biyaai ye, Ama diinɛ gɔ e bɛrɛ dɔwaai ga jugɔi.
42011021	«Ainɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ, kɔmɔgelu gɛliyaa, ginrun unrunmɔ dɔmɔ biyaai ye, arusɛgɛ wo sɛɛ puu sɛɛu biyɛdo.
42011022	Kaa inɛ wo dɛi sigɛ paŋa sɛɛ wiyaa, kuu womɔ nɛ sugaa gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ ye, kɔmɔgelu nɛ diyɛ womɔ daanaa wo sɛbe gɔbe puu ɛhɛlɛdo. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo kijɛ ginrun baŋa bɛrɛ wo ɛlu gɔbe puu gagamalado.
42011023	«Inɛ mu le tolo gɔ, inɛ wogɔ mu jaŋunɛi. Iyaa inɛ mui baru ye kijɛ yalu turu nɛ mɔɔnɔɔlɛ gɔ, giginɛgejɛ.»
42011024	Yesu gimaa gi: «Jinrun inɛ kuu nɛ gowaai ye, jinrun gɔ yalu bii ye deeliyeɲu dɛnɛjɛ giye, olusolo nɛ yaa, wɛɛ, kanranjɛ. Deeliye yalu bɛɛlu kanraan ye, kijɛ wo gɛɛjɛ: ‘Yalu pɛi mu goi gɔ nɛ mu pilemɛ yayaadɔn.’
42011025	Kɔɔ gin’ pilemaa wiyaai ye, wo ginrun gɔ sɛmaa seisei, ɛjii yegeraa wo wɔnu tɛmɛjɛ.
42011026	Kɔɔ waaru wo iyaajɛ, wo yaa ye, jinrun wo dɛi mɔɲu, jinrun waja sɔi dimɛrɛn ye jɛɛlɛjɛ. Be wooi puu wiyaain ye, inɛ gɔ kuu nɛ yindɛinyɛnɲu. Nɛɛ kai, inɛ gɔ bana, pɔɔlɔ mɔ gɔ dɛi mɔɲu biyɛjɛ.»
42011027	Yesu, sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ, yaanran turu mii ɛɛn le sɔwaa gi: «Yaanran bɛrɛ uwɔ duiyaa, ui naraan aramɔnɛ gɔ, Ama wo yabu.»
42011028	Kaa Yesu, yaanran gɔ le saa gi: «Ee, kaa kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ, inɛw Ama sɔɔ keŋi ye gɛliyɛɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.»
42011029	Mɔɔnu gɔ woi gɔŋaa waaru bee le, Yesu, sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaa gi: «Kanɛ inɛw gɔbe, inɛw mɔɲubei. Be taanrinyɛn iye ibɛɛ wɔin. Kaa, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Jonasu taanrinyɛn gɔi laa ye, sɛɛrɛ waja be bɛrɛ kanrun ye tagaraidenɛ.
42011030	Bana Jonasu, Niniwe ana bɛɛnw bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ diyɛi biyaabe gin’, Inɛ Aini gɔ, kanɛ inɛw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ diyɛi bibiyɛdo.
42011031	Kɔɔ gin’ Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido, tɛŋurun gana ɔgɔyaanran gɔ, kanɛ inɛw gɔbe giru nɛ iŋi ye, bei jajarugado. Sabu wo yalu wage naa wage nɛ gowaa, Salomɔ hakilɛ sɔɔ gɔbe keŋiyɛin wiyaabe. Kaa yɛnɛi, ɔn nɛ wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, Salomɔ dɛi sigɛ.
42011032	Iyaa Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kireido, Niniwe ana bɛɛnw, kanɛ inɛw ɔnbe giru nɛ iŋi ye, bei jajarugadɛin. Sabu Niniwe bɛɛnw, Jonasu waaju ɛgaa, bana bemɛ dulomaabɛin. Yɛnɛi, ɔn nɛ wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, Jonasu dɛi sigɛ.»
