42011033	«Inɛ turu kanran lanpa yaun tanugaa ye, yalu babaŋa nɛ kunu ma, taju le kiyaa ye paja ma kanraanlɛ. Kaa lanpa tanugaa ye, inɛw ginrun gɔ nɛ yoonw gɔbe wijɛ womɔ iye ga, lanpa gɔi yalu wijɛ ɛjii wo obo bɛɛjɛ nɛ jeleɲu.
42011034	«Giri uwɔ, goju uwɔ lanpai gin’ wɔɔ. Giri uwɔ sɛɛu wɔɔ biyaa ye, goju uwɔ puu wijɛ nɛ too. Kaa giri uwɔ sɛɛula biyaa ye, goju uwɔ ɔlɔ nɛ too.
42011035	Wijɛ u nɛ too gɔ ɔlɔi biyɛnɔu ga, u kuu uwɔ kajuba.
42011036	Lanpa dooro waaru ui wijɛmɔu wɔɔ le goju uwɔ puu bana doorojɛ gin’, kɔɔ gin’ goju uwɔ puu wijɛ nɛ too ye, yalu womɔ turu kanran nɛ ɔlɔ wɔlɔ ye, goju uwɔ puu wijaai bibiyɛdo.»
42011037	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, Parisiɛn turu wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, womaa ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ unrun le wɛɛ, naitege pana kaya gi. Yesu waaru ginrun gɔ nɛ wo yoi le, wo jaa kaya ga dɛinyaanbe.
42011038	Kaa Yesu, atɛmu le kɛukɛu numɔ mɔŋɔlu go jaa kaya dɛinyaanbe dɛi, Parisiɛn gɔ bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaabe.
42011039	Inɛw Baŋa kijɛ wo le gi: «Ɔnhɔn, e Parisiɛnbe, diikɔrɔi lee, baɲa lee bain go mɔŋaa ɛjɛmaa wɔi. Kaa kinɛ ebe kɔlɔ nɛ nabara sɔɔ lee, mɔmɔɲu lee jowaa wɔi.
42011040	Ei inɛw bomɔgunw! Bain gɔ lee, kɔlɔ gɔ lee yegeraa bojonɛ gɔ Amai laa ma?
42011041	Kɔɔ dɛi, dɛgugunw bɛrɛ gelu kijɛ nɔi ebe nɛ lee, baɲa ebe nɛ lee, kijɛ too gɔbe oboi. E kɔɔ gin’ kanranjɛi ye, kijɛ puu e dɛi ɛjaai bibiyɛdo.
42011042	«Kaa e Parisiɛn gɔbe, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu e nanaye lee, sadiŋɛ dɔgɔ uji uji kayɛrɛ nɛ e kunɔjɛ gɔbe puu lee, e jaka bemɛ gogoonɔjɛi. Kaa e teitai sɔɔ gɔbe lee, Ama ibɛɛ bii lee onu pajaati. Kaa jaka goonu gɔ pajalu go kijɛ sigɛ le kanraun jaain bee gɔbe bei.
42011043	«E Parisiɛn gɔbe, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ, yalu inɛw ei iyeɲu nɛ dɛinyin dɛnɛjɛi. E iyaa taibe nɛ inɛw ei poonɔ ga e bɛrɛ saii ɛjii wɔɔ.
42011044	Bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu e ɔnsain iyemɔɔlɛ gin’ wɔin. Inɛw jugɔlu go wogɔ kuu nɛ namanu galaɲu.»
42011045	Kɔɔ waaru le, Ama tɔɔru deerenɛ turu Yesu le ɔn gin’ sai: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, sɔɔ gɔ aŋai u sɔɔu wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, u emi yaa duyɔuwɔu.»
42011046	Kaa Yesu wo le saa gi: «E yaa, Ama tɔɔru jugɔnw gɔbe, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu dɔɔ demɛ e inɛw bɛrɛ duduurɔjɛi, kaa e numɔ ii ebe le kanran wogɔ tabaidelei.
42011047	Bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu pɔɔlɔ inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe ɔnsain gɔbe e ujɔuwɔi. Kaa e babe bei dain.
42011048	E kunrin e tirɛ anranw kijɛ kanrun gɔbe dɛi sɛɛrɛ goouwɔi. E sɔɔ bemɛ le kinɛ ebe aa ga tagarauwɔi. Sabu be pɔɔlɔ inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbei daabɛin, iyaa e ɔnsain bemɛ gɔbe ujɔuwɔi.
42011049	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama, hakilɛ womɔ le digɛu kijɛ gi: ‘Mu inɛw Ama titiyaanw lee, inɛw Kibɛru Ɛju taganw lee e bɛrɛ titiidɔn. Kaa e gamuui dadaadei, gamuui ɔhɔɲɔmɔdei.’
42011050	Kɔɔ gin’ aduna maŋi nɛ gowaa, iye wɛɛ dɔɔ, inɛw Ama titiyaanw ili togi gɔ puu, iye inɛw ɔnbe kuu nɛ sugodo.
42011051	Abɛlu dain nɛ gowaa, Jakari nɛ wɛɛ dɔɔ, ili gɔ kuu ebe nɛ sugodo. Jakari kɔɔ, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ, sadagadumu gɔ le bɛrii woi daabɛin. Naran go, ili wogɔ iye inɛw ɔnbe kuu nɛ sugodo.
42011052	«Ama tɔɔru jugɔnw gɔbe, bɔnrɔn e le yɔɔ. Sabu jugɔ taan ii gɔ e gɛlɛ. E yooli. Iyaa inɛw yoi ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ yaa yoomɔɔlɛi.»
42011053	Yesu, waaru yalu gɔ nɛ gowaa wo yaabe le, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, Parisiɛn gɔbe lee, kuu womɔ nɛ ɛjii ɔgiyɛmɔi tɔlaabɛin. Sɔɔ joo le be Yesu aŋasaara ɛgu dɛnɛubɛin.
42011054	Sɔɔ womɔ gɔ le digɛnu bana woi jaaraɲu bɛɛ ga be dɛnɛubɛin.
42012001	Kɔɔ waaru le, inɛw lugo kale sɛlɛ mɔrinyaanbɛin. Jojoo bemɛ gɔ dɛi be tunmɔ kubɔ namaubɛin. Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbe le laa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Parisiɛnbe aŋa lɛilɛi, kijɛ buru pidemu gin’ wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, kuu ebe kajubai.
42012002	Kijɛ babaŋa puu ɛlu gogoodo. Iyaa kijɛ boŋurun puu jujugɔmɔdo.
42012003	Kɔɔ gin’ ɔlɔ nɛ baŋiyaan toun kijɛ e sɔi gɔbe puu, aga wijɛ nɛ sɔsɔɔdɛin. Iyaa, ginrun kɔlɔ nɛ tunmɔ suguru nɛ dujo dujo ye, sɔɔ e sɔɔjɛ gɔbe dala nɛ boonu kunu ye tatagadɛin.»
42012004	«E mu anrunge gɔbe, mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw goju ebe daatiyaa ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ kijɛ kanma kanrun bɛɛidenɛ gɔbei liyɛnɔugi.
42012005	Kaa, mu inɛ e liyɛun dagaa gɔ e bɛrɛ tatagadɔn, inɛ goju ebe daa ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ ei yaun asuu yinwɛindolo gɔ nɛ kamu kunɔɲu gɔnrɔn sɛɛ gɔ, e kɔɔbaŋai liyɛi. Ɔnhɔn, mu e le daii sɔɔuwɔn, e inɛ wogɔ baŋai liyɛi.
42012006	«Sasaa dɔɔrɛi numɔrɔn dɔnrun gɔ, tama lɛi gɔ, woi laa ma? Kaa Ama, sasaa kɔɔbe logoro nɛ turu kanran naŋaalɛ.
42012007	Halu kuu ebe kukuli gɔbe yaa puu lugaa bojaaɲu. Kɔɔ digɛu, e liyɛnɔugi. Sabu e sasaa dɔɔrɛi joo dɛi irei.»
42012008	«Iyaa, mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛ aai kanran, inɛw giru nɛ, unruin jaŋu ii mai daii giyaajɛ ye, Inɛ Aini gɔ kanran, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe giru nɛ, woi jaŋu ii unrunmɔi gɛgɛɛdo.
42012009	Kaa, inɛ aai kanran, inɛw giru nɛ, unrun mui inɛɛ daii giyaajɛ ye, inɛ wogɔ baŋai, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe giru nɛ kanran, woi inin gɛgɛɛdɛin.
42012010	«Inɛ aai kanran, Inɛ Aini gɔ le sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔwaajɛ kanran, baŋa hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛbɛɛdo. Kaa, inɛ Kikinu Pilu boi yamalaajɛ gɔ, hakɛ womɔ yaabu kanraindenɛ.
42012011	«Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe giru nɛ lee, inɛw giru toin giru nɛ lee, paŋagunw giru nɛ lee, waaru ei dimɛraan yaaɲu le, bana sɔɔ e sɔɔido dɛi ma, sɔɔ e sɔɔido dɛi ma, diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi.
42012012	Sabu Kikinu Pilu gɔ, waaru wogɔ le tee sɔɔ sɔɔun jaan gɔ e bɛrɛ jujugɔmɔdo.»
42012013	Inɛ turu, mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ ɔn gin’ Yesu le gi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, u mu bainɛ womaa kɛn emɛ gɔ mu lee, wo lee logoro nɛ gamala gɛɛ.»
42012014	Kaa Yesu, ainɛ gɔ le ɔn gin’ sai: «Hei! Banrunge, inɛ aa mui saliyɛkirenɛ ebei biyɛ ga kuu ebe nɛ daanu? Maa, inɛ aa mui kijɛ gamalanɛ ebei boju?»
42012015	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Girikakala dɛi kuu ebe kajubai. Sabu inɛ kijɛ aŋai wo sii puu, kijɛ joo sii womɔ kinrun womɔ yabu bɛɛidolo.»
42012016	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, taanrinyɛn turu be le ɔn gin’ dain: «Ɔgɔinɛ turu minɛ nɛ dɛnrɛn ɛjii ilaabe.
42012017	Kɔɔ waaru le, ɔgɔinɛ gɔ, kinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: ‘Nɛɛ, mu inge kanrandɔn? Sabu mu dɛnrɛn ma gɔbe puu yalu kunɔɲu sɛlɔn.’
42012018	Wo iyaa kinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ ajubu: ‘Kijɛ mu kanraindo gɔ unwɔ: Mu guyɔ ma gɔbe lalagadɔn. Kɔɔ onu nɛ guyɔ pɔlɔ mɔ gɔ dɛi gaa uhujɔdɔn. Kɔɔ gin’ mu dɛnrɛn ma lee, kijɛ ɛju mu sɛɛ wooi lee, wogɔ nɛ kekeenɛdɔn.
42012019	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, kuu ma le ɔn gin’ gɛɛdɔn: Mu anranguju joo dɛi kijɛ joo mɔɔnaajɔn. Mu dedeeliyedɔn, jaa kakayadɔn, kijɛ nɔɔɲu nɔnɔɔdɔn, kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔdɔn.’
42012020	Kaa Ama, ainɛ ɔgɔinɛ gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔwaa gi: ‘Bomɔginɛ! Iye digɛ tee kinrun uwɔ gogoodo. Nɛɛ kijɛ balaa mɔɔnaa u sɛɛ gɔ, wogɔ aa mɔi biyɛdo?’ »
42012021	Kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaatiyaa, Yesu baraa gi: «Inɛ kuu bana unrunmɔ dɛi kijɛ mɔɔnɔi laa ye, Ama giru nɛ kijɛ sɛlɛ gɔ sɔɔ kunrin wɔɔ.»
42012022	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe onu nɛ, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ le kijɛ gi: «Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, pana ebe dɛi diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Kijɛ e kayaido dɛi ma, goju ebe nɛ sɔi e kunɔido dɛi ma, diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi.
42012023	Kinrun, kayɛrɛ dɛi ire, iyaa goju yaa, sɔi dɛi ire.
42012024	E gaŋabe sɔɔ ajubu yɛnɛi: Be toi tɔɔnɛ, gɛlu gɛlɛɛnɛ. Iyaa be yalu kijɛ baŋaranɲu ma, guyɔ ma sɛnɛ. Kaa Ama, pana bemɛ tɔtɔɔjɛ. Ei sigɛ le sasaabe dɛi ire.
42012025	Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ aa, kuu womɔ dɛi jiire wo jiirejɛ dɛi kinruntaun womɔ halu gaila kanran baru bɛɛjɛ?
42012026	E kɔɔ gin’ kijɛ dagi kɔɔ tunmɔ kanran kanrun bɛɛlɛi biyaa ye, inge dɛi kijɛ wajunw dɛi diyɛdai le wɔi?
42012027	Minɛ nɛ kinrunbɔmɔbe aŋai puyo be puyojɛ ajubu yɛnɛi. Be birɛ birɛɛnɛ. Sɔi kanran tiyɛɛnɛ. Kaa naran go, halu, Ɔgɔnɛ Salomɔ ɔgɔ womɔ wooi nɛ, puyo kɔɔbe baa saŋa saŋiyɛnlu.
42012028	Puyobe, iye kowɔnu, yogo yaun nɛ kunɔɲu gɔ, Ama kɔɔ gin’ bei sasaŋaranjɛ biyaai ye, wo wogɔ dɛi sigɛ duŋu ebe gooidolo ma? Gagawu ebe gaila de!
42012029	Nɛɛ, e bai wooi diyɛdai le bii ye, kijɛ e kayaido ma, kijɛ e nɔɔido ma dɛnɛnu biyɛnɔugi.
42012030	Aduna ɔn nɛ inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, kijɛ kɔɔbe dɛi diyɛdai le be biyɛjɛ. Kaa e kai, e Ba Ama, e kijɛ kɔɔbe kai yasɛi ga igii wɔɔ.
42012031	Kaa, Ama diinɛ gɔ dɛnɛi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, kijɛ wajunw gɔbe kuu ebe nɛ boru babaradɛin.
42012032	«U liyɛnɔu, peju kulɔ dagi gɔ. Sabu e Ba Ama, e bɛrɛ diinɛ womɔ gɔ obo ga, kinɛ womɔ aa wɔɔ.
42012033	Kijɛ e sɛɛ gɔ dɔnraan ye, kɛɛlɛ gɔ dɛgugunw bɛrɛ gamalai. Gelu kɛɛlɛ gɛli asuu sɛmiliyɛɛlɛ gɔ, e wogɔ dɛnɛi. Arusɛgɛ dogoolɛ gɔ alagala nɛ mɔɔnɔi. Wogɔ nɛ gugunyɔnnɛ dɔi bɛɛidolo, iyaa peru yaa yamala bɛɛidolo.
42012034	Sabu kijɛ ebe yalu wɔɔ gɔ nɛ, kinɛ ebe kanran yalu wogɔ nɛ biyɛjɛ.»
42012035	«Dɔin ebe pagaa ye, lanpa ebe tanugaa ye biyɛi.
42012036	Birɛbirɛnw, kuu baŋa bemɛ purupagu yalu nɛ yaa, pilemɛ ye, wo wɛɛido dɔmi gin’, e kunrin biyɛi. Waaru kuu baŋa gɔ wiyaa, taan gɔ wo tɔgaajɛ, ɔgu kɛu wo dɛi taan pinɛlɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin.
42012037	Birɛbirɛnw giri yeiyelu go, birɛ nɛ be toun, kuu baŋa gɔ wiyaa tɛmaajɛ gɔ, Ama be yabu. Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, wo dɔin womɔ papagado, jaa kaya ga bei dadaanado. Wo dɔɔ ye, be bɛrɛ jaa gagamalado.
42012038	Kunrin, digɛtaŋu le ma, digɛtaŋu galaa wo yaa, kuu baŋa gɔ wo wiyaa, inɛw kunrin woi dɔmɔu wo tɛmaajɛ, be kai, Ama be yabu.
42012039	«Iyaa e igii biyɛi: Ginrun baŋa, gugunyɔnnɛ, ginrun womɔ nɛ waaru wɛɛido igii bee ye, wo gugunyɔnnɛ gɔi paja ye, ginrun unrunmɔ tɔgɔrɔmɔbele.
42012040	Kɔɔ dɛi e kanran, waaru wooi yeguru le biyɛi. Sabu Inɛ Aini gɔ, lɛɛrɛ ajubaa sɛlɛ e wɔɔ gɔ le wɛɛdo.»
42012041	Piɛru saa gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, u taanrinyɛn u dain kɔɔ, u emɛ dɛi sɔɔjɛu ma, inɛw puu dɛi sɔɔjɛu?»
42012042	Inɛw Baŋa, Piɛru le saa gi: «Ginrun kajubanɛ sɔɔ turu baŋa, hakilɛ sɛɛ gɔ aai? Inɛ wogɔ waaru jaan gɔ le birɛbirɛnw wajunw gɔbe pana tɔɔ ga, wo baŋa sagu bemɛ wo bɛrɛ gawarado.
42012043	Birɛbirɛnɛ wogɔ, kɔɔ gin’ birɛ womɔ nɛ sɛɛu wo tonu, wo baŋa wiyaa tɛmaa ye, Ama wo yabu.
42012044	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, ginrun baŋa gɔ, kijɛ unrunmɔ puu wo bɛrɛ gagawarado.
42012045	Kaa birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ kinɛ womɔ nɛ unrun baŋa ɔgu wɛɛidolo ga ajubaa, anranw birɛbirɛnw wajunw gɔbe lee, yaanw birɛbirɛnw gɔbe lee lagai tɔlaajɛ ye, iyaa jaa kayaa ye, kɔɲɔ nɔwaan ye, wogɔ le bimiliyaa ye biyɛjɛ ye,
42012046	bai turu soo sɛlɛ womɔ nɛ, lɛɛrɛ ajubaa sɛlɛ wo wɔɔ le, wo baŋa wɛwɛɛdo. Wo bɔnrɔn diyɛ wo bɛrɛ ihiyemɔdo. Iyaa woi inɛw Ama inin gɔbe le mɔɔnɔ ye tutujɔdo.
42012047	«Kunrin birɛbirɛnɛ kuu unrunmɔ baŋa diŋɛ jugaa wɔun, yeguru turu kanran kunɔlu gɔ ma, diŋɛ womɔ kanrun yabalu gɔ, birɛbirɛnɛ wogɔ, logi woi babaado.
42012048	Kaa birɛbirɛnɛ wo baŋa diŋɛ inɛɛ wɔu, kijɛ logi jaan kanraanjɛ ye, logi gaila bɛbɛɛdo. Inɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ joo obaaɲu gɔ, wo bɛrɛ gaai seselumɛdɛin. Iyaa inɛ bɛrɛ joo go sagu gawaraaɲu gɔ, wo bɛrɛ inɛw wajunw mɔ dɛi sigɛ seselumɛdɛin.»
42012049	«Mu aduna nɛ yaun kunɔi wɛiun. Kanɛ baa yaun gɔ tanugaatiyaabɛin ye ibɛɛ wɔun.
42012050	Mu batise tɔgu turu mu bɛɛun jaain wɔɔ. Batise wogɔ sɔɔ kibeido baa, mu kinɛjiun le wɔun.
42012051	Ajubu ebe nɛ, mu aduna nɛ jamui jɛɛlɛi wɛiun ga wɔi ma? Ai de! Mu inɛw tunmɔ le kabuga dɛi wɛiun.
42012052	Kanɛ baa, inɛw numɔrɔn ginrun nɛ yatoin ye, inɛw taanu inɛw lɛi gɔbe le kakabiyɛdɛin, inɛw lɛi gɔbe taanu gɔbe le kakabiyɛdɛin.
42012053	Banɛ, aini unrunmɔ le jajaiyɛdo, aini, unrun ba le jajaiyɛdo. Nanɛ, iyaa womɔ le jajaiyɛdo, iyaa kanran, unrun na le jajaiyɛdo. Igɛ na, ii unrunmɔ yaanran le jajaiyɛdo, ii yaanran, unrun igɛ na le jajaiyɛdo.»
42012054	Yesu iyaa, mɔɔnu gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Waaru dudaga sibɛ go, anrankulumɔ daanau wo wɔu e iyaajɛ, e ɔgu gɛgɛɛdei: ‘Anran yawɛɛjɛ.’ Sɔɔ wogɔ kunrin tee biyɛjɛ.
42012055	Iyaa, e ooɲɔ, tɛŋurun sibɛ go gowaa, suyou wo wɔu iyaajɛi ye, e gɛgɛɛdei: ‘Ujɔ bibiyɛdo.’ Sɔɔ gɔ kunrin tee biyɛjɛ.
42012056	E inɛw aŋa lɛilɛigunw gɔbe, minɛ lee, alagala lee yɛnɛ ye tiyɛ bemɛ jugu bɛbɛɛjɛi ye, e inge dɛi waaru ɔn sɔɔ tiyɛ jugɔɔlɛi wɔi ma?»
42012057	«E inge dɛi kuu ebe le sɔɔ bana teitai kanraun jaan gɔ yɛnɛɛlɛi wɔi ma?
42012058	Kɔɔ gin’, u jaŋunɛ ui dimɛraan saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ jɛyaauwɔ ye, oju nɛ tonu mainiyaan ye, ɔgu wo le sɔɔ yegere. Kɔɔi laa ye, wo ui saliyɛkirenɛ numɔ nɛ kukunɔdo. Saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ ui garidu numɔ nɛ kunɔ ye, garidu gɔ kaju nɛ ui kunɔmɔdo.
42012059	Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, yoru gɔ puu tujaa halu kɛturu kanran u le wajaa ye, kajuginrun gɔ nɛ bɛɛ gooidolou.»
42013001	Waaru wogɔ le tee, Pilate womaa, Galile bɛɛnw gamuu, waaru sadaga arusɛgɛ bemɛ be sɛnwɛnbe le, bei wiyaa daamaa, ili bemɛ sadaga arusɛgɛ ili gɔ le ligijiyemaabe ga, inɛw gamuu kibɛru wogɔ Yesu bɛrɛ wiyaa tagin.
42013002	Yesu aŋa bemɛ ɔn gin’ sai: «Ajubu ebe nɛ, Galile bɛɛnw kɔɔbe bana bei dain gɔ dɛi, be Galile bɛɛnw wajunw gɔbe dɛi sigɛ hakɛ kanranwin ga wɔi ma?
42013003	Ai, wogɔ narain laa ga mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn. Kaa e bana ebe dulomɔli ye, e kanran kɔɔ gin’ susuiyodei.
42013004	Inɛw pɛli gagarasigɛ kuu nɛ Silowe ginrun gabu numaa sugaa bei daabe gɔ, ajubu ebe nɛ, inɛw wogɔbe Jerusalɛmu nɛ inɛw tobɛin gɔbe puu dɛi sigɛ mɔɲu kanranwin ga e wɔi ma?
42013005	Ai, wogɔ narain laa ga mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn. Kaa e bana ebe dulomɔli ye, e kanran kɔɔ gin’ susuiyodei.»
42013006	Yesu, kɔɔ onu nɛ taanrinyɛn ɔn jeɲaa dain: «Ainɛ turu gaa na, resɛn minɛ womɔ nɛ yibaa yasɛbe. Wo gaa na gɔ kuu nɛ ii tɛtɛmɛdo ma dɛi wiyaa yɛnaabe, kaa wo ii turu kanran tɛmɛlu.
42013007	Kɔɔ waaru le, wo minɛ womɔ walanɛ gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Yɛnɛ! Gaa na ɔn kuu nɛ ii dɛnɛi wiyaa tɛmɛlu mu kanrun anranguju taaniyei. Woi bɛŋɛti. Wo inge sabu dɛi minɛ gɔ nɛ yalu bamai aa gɛlɛ?’
42013008	Kaa minɛ walanɛ gɔ saa gi: ‘Mu baŋa, u nimɛ kanran yuwɔ woi paja yɛnɛ. Taŋa taŋa womɔ nɛ minɛ gɔ guraa ye, binugu mui kunɔmɔ.
42013009	Kunrin kanraan ye, wo anranguju wɛɛido gɔ ii nanarando bibiyɛ. Kɔɔ gin’ biyɛlu ye, u woi bɛŋɛti.’ »
42013010	Deeliye bai turu, Yesu, Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ deeru deereube.
42013011	Yalu wogɔ nɛ yaanran turu yabe. Wo anranguju pɛli gagarasigɛ baa, jinrun turu woi aa sɛbe. Jinrun gɔ woi nurungiyemaa, woi yɔniyɛnmaa, demu iŋiyɛnmɔbele.
42013012	Yesu, yaanran gɔi waaru wo iye le, woi boonaa, wo le kijɛ gi: «Na, nurun uwɔ gɔ bajaai.»
42013013	Yesu, yaanran gɔ kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋaraanbe. Ginsɛsai, yaanran gɔ sɛɛu demu biyaa, Ama boi sɔmɔi tɔlaabe.
42013014	Kaa Ama gɛɛn ginrun kuu baŋa gɔ, Yesu, deeliye bai inɛi bajamu gɔ dɛi, kinɛ womɔ banraain. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi wo mɔɔnu gɔ le sɔwaa gi: «Birɛ bai birɛɲu bai kuloi wɔɔ: E ei bajamɔ ga, bai wogɔbe le wɛɛi. Kaa deeliye bai wɛɛnɔugi.»
42013015	Inɛw Baŋa aŋa womɔ saa gi: «E inɛw aŋa lɛilɛi gɔbe, e tuturu puu, deeliye bai, jandulu ebe ma, naa jiŋu ebe ma, bei dii nɔɔmɔ dɛi pegu bemɛ nɛ pagalaidelei ma?
42013016	Yaanran ɔn Abarahamu tɔgui. Anranguju pɛli gagarasigɛ baa Setanu woi pagaa gɛliyaa wɔɔ. Pagu wogɔ nɛ woi goonɔ ga deeliye bai wogɔ kanraan ye gajui ma?»
42013017	Yesu, waaru sɔɔ kɔɔbe wo sɔi le, jaŋuw womɔ gɔbe puu dɔgɔ le bɛin. Kaa Yesu, birɛ taanrinyɛn kanraanbe gɔbe dɛi, mɔɔnu gɔ puu kinɛ ɛɛlu le bee.
42013018	Yesu kijɛ gi: «Ama diinɛ gɔ, inge le murin wɔɔ? Mu inge le woi tunwɔn bɛɛdɔn?
42013019	Wo tiun ii uji mutarudu be gɛɛjɛ gɔ le murin wɔɔ. Ainɛ turu wogɔ jeɲaa sadiŋɛ womɔ nɛ tɔwaabe. Wo tɛiyaa, tiun na taŋaabe. Sasaabe wiyaa, numɔ ii womɔ gɔbe nɛ kuru bemɛ kuraabɛin.»
42013020	Yesu iyaa taanrinyɛn waja daan ɔn gin’ gi: «Mu Ama diinɛ inge le iyaa tunwɔndɔn?
42013021	Ama diinɛ gɔ kijɛ buru pidemu le murin wɔɔ. Yaanran turu kijɛ buru pidemu wogɔ jeɲaa, punau kilo pɛɛlɛi numɔrɔnsigɛ nɛ kunaa, bolaa, punau bolaaɲu gɔ puu ingeleido baa pajaabe.»
42013022	Yesu, Jerusalɛmu oju nɛ toun, ana diyɛbe lee, ana dagibe lee kɛjɛ kɛjɛ taŋaube. Wo ana wogɔbe nɛ inɛwin deeru deere deere galaube.
42013023	Inɛ turu Yesu bɛrɛ selumaa, gi: «Mu Baŋa, inɛw gailai sai yabadɛin ma?» Yesu, inɛw wo le bɛin gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sai:
42013024	«E mainiyaanjɛi ye mɔnɔgolo ɛmu gɔ le yooi. Sabu, mu e bɛrɛ daii sɔɔuwɔn, inɛw joo Ama diinɛ gɔ nɛ yoo ga dɛdɛnɛdɛin. Kaa be yoo bɛɛidenɛ.
42013025	Waaru gɔ dɔwaai ye, ginrun baŋa gɔ ingelaa ye taan gɔ pinaa ye sɔsɔgɔdo. Kɔɔ waaru le, e bain go wɔnu, taan gɔ tɔgɔnu ɔn gin’ gɛɛdei: ‘Emɛ baŋa, taan gɔ emɛ dɛi pinɛlɛ.’ Ginrun baŋa gɔ sasaado: ‘Mu e yago goii ma inɔn.’
42013026	Kɔɔ waaru le e gɛgɛɛdei: ‘U lee, emɛ lee, emɛ mɔrinyaan kayaabɛin, nɔwaanbɛin. U iyaa ana tai emɛbe nɛ deeru deeraabeu.’
42013027	Wo ɔn gin’ e le saado: ‘Mu ei aabei ma inɔn. Genɛ ma nɛ dɔrɔ gooi, e inɛw mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe.’
42013028	Waaru Abarahamu lee, Isaka lee, Jakɔbu lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe puu lee, Ama diinɛ nɛ e iyaajɛ, waaru ei bain go kamaatiyaaɲu, e pii piinu, tɔnrɔn tɛnwɛnnu biyɛdei.
42013029	Inɛw duu sibɛ go lee, dudaga sibɛ go lee, donɔ sibɛ go lee, tɛŋurun sibɛ go lee goi wɛi ye, Ama diinɛ nɛ jaa kakayadɛin.
42013030	E sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii paamu kanrain: Kanɛ inɛw onu dimi gɔbe, logoro bemɛ nɛ, inɛw gamuu waaru wogɔ le giru totoiyodɛin. Iyaa kanɛ inɛw giru toin gɔbe, logoro bemɛ nɛ, inɛw gamuu waaru wogɔ le onu didimiyɛndɛin.»
42013031	Kɔɔ waaru le, Parisiɛn gamuu wiyaa, Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔin: «U ɔn nɛ gowaa ye yalu waja nɛ jɔbɔ yaa, sabu Herɔde ui dai ibɛɛ wɔɔ.»
42013032	Yesu be le saa gi: «Yurugu kɔɔ bɛrɛ yaa ye ɔn gin’ sɔɔi: ‘Mu bai lɛi jinrunbe inɛw kuu nɛ nana goonɔuwɔn, iyaa inɛwin sɛɛu bajamɔuwɔn. Kɔɔ onu nɛ birɛ ma gɔ kikilɛdo.’
42013033	Kaa bai lɛi mu oju ma digi mu yaaun jaain wɔɔ. Sabu inɛ Ama titiyainɛ, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛi laa ye yalu waja nɛ wo yinwɛun dagalu.
42013034	«Nɛɛ, u Jerusalɛmu, u, ana inɛw Ama titiyaanw daanɛ gɔ, Ama u bɛrɛ inɛw tii gɔbe, u ana bei tibu le kamu kamu daajɛ gɔ, waaru joo nɛ mu unrunw uwɔ gɔbei mɔɔnɔ ga dɛnaabɔn. Ɛɲɛ na, unrunw womɔ gamuju doɲu nɛ wo kunɔjɛ gin’, mu ei mɔɔnɔ ga dɛnaabɔn. Kaa, e wogɔ yabali.
42013035	Aiwa! Kɔɔi biyaa ye, ginrun ebe e bɛrɛ koolo pajadɛin. Naran go, e waja “Inɛw Baŋa Ama boi le inɛ wɛɛjɛ gɔ duba wo le biyɛmɔ” e gɛɛido bai yai dɔɔ baa, e mui iyeidelei.»
42014001	Deeliye bai turu, pana kaya dɛi, Parisiɛnbe inɛ giru too turu, ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ Yesui boonaabe. Inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe, Yesu kijɛ kanranjɛ gɔ puu ɛjii sebereubɛin.
42014002	Ainɛ goju pidu jiun le bee turu, Yesu genɛ nɛ wiyaa dɔwaabe.
42014003	Yesu, sɔɔ jeɲaa, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, Parisiɛn gɔbe lee le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Tɔɔru emɛ le kɛukɛu, deeliye bai, inɛ jɔŋɔu jaain wɔɔ ma jaanla?»
42014004	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo selumaa, be wooi puu sɔɔ turu kanran saanɛ. Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu, jiunginɛ gɔi aa, woi bajamaatiyaa, ginrun tii.
42014005	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gi: «Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ aa, aini womɔ ma, naa jiŋu womɔ ma, deeliye bai ɛkɔrɔ nɛ ɛliyaa yowaai ye, ɔgu kɛu goonɔlu go kɔɔ nɛ pajado?»
42014006	Be sɔɔ saaun turu kanran bɛɛnɛ.
42014007	Inɛw jaa dɛi booni gɔbe dɔindain sigɛ gɔbe tee yɛmɛɲu ga waaru wo iye le, Yesu, taanrinyɛn ɔn be bɛrɛ daan, kijɛ wo gi:
42014008	«Purupagu jaa dɛi ui boonaaɲu ye, u dɔindain sigɛ yɛmɛ ye dɛinyɛnnɔu. Sabu inɛ u dɛi ire turu yaa boonaabɛin bibiyɛ.
42014009	Nɛɛ kɔɔ gin’, inɛ ui lee, woi lee boonɔnɛ gɔ, u le wɛɛ ye ɔn gin’ sɔɔdo: ‘Dɔindain uwɔ gɔ inɛ ɔn bɛrɛ obo.’ Wo kɔɔ gin’ u le giyaajɛ ye, u waja bɔlɔ go, dɔindain mɔɲu gɔ nɛ ingelaa ye yaa ga, u bɛrɛ dɔgɔi biyɛdo.
42014010	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, waaru janwan yalu nɛ ui boonaaɲu, u dɔindain mɔɲu gɔ nɛ dɛinyɛn. Kɔɔ gin’ waaru inɛ ui boonɔnɛ gɔ wiyaajɛ, wo u le ɔn gin’ sɔɔdo: ‘Mu anrunge, u dɔindain ɛju kɔɔ nɛ dɔɔ.’ Kɔɔ waaru le, inɛw jaa kaya dɛi boonaaɲu gɔbe wooi giru nɛ, wogɔ u bɛrɛ baba diyɛi biyɛdo.
42014011	Sabu inɛ aai kanran kuu unrunmɔ unaajɛ ye, kuu womɔ susunugodɛin. Iyaa inɛ kuu unrunmɔ sunugaajɛ gɔ, kuu womɔ uhunɔdɛin.»
42014012	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, ainɛ ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ woi boonɔnɛ gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «U aga pana dɛi ma, digɛ pana dɛi ma inɛwin boonaajɛu ye, u anrungebe ma, u ba unrunw ma, u maranw ma, ɔgɔ unrunw ginrun diŋu uwɔbe ma boonɔnɔu. Sabu be kanran ui pilemɛ ye boonɔ ye, uwɔ gɔ ui tujɔ bɛbɛɛɲu.
42014013	Kaa, waaru ginrun uwɔ nɛ janwan dɛi inɛwin u boonaajɛ, u dɛgugunw lee, inɛw numɔ ma, kubɔ ma yanwaain gɔbe lee, tegutegenw lee, girumuw lee, bei boonɔ.
42014014	Kɔɔ gin’ u duba bɛbɛɛdou, sabu be kijɛ le ui tujɔɲu sɛnɛ. Inɛw teitai wɔin bai buloidɛin, u tujɔ ɛju uwɔ bɛbɛɛdou.»
42014015	Janwan gɔ nɛ inɛwin boonaaɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ, turu baŋa waaru sɔɔ kɔɔ wo ɛgu le, kijɛ gi: «Inɛ Ama diinɛ nɛ jaa kayaido, kɔɔbaŋa Ama wo yabu.»
42014016	Yesu wo bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn ɔn sɔɔ tagaa, kijɛ gi: «Ainɛ turu, bai turu janwan dɛi jaa diyɛ yegeraa, inɛw joo wogɔ dɛi boonɔmaabe.
42014017	Jaa kayi lɛɛrɛ waaru dɔi le, birɛbirɛnɛ womɔ tiyaa, inɛwin jaa kaya dɛi boonaaɲu gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gɛɛ gi: ‘Nɛɛ e wɛɛi, yeguru yegeraa kilaai.’
42014018	Kaa, be wooi puu tuturu temu tamu dɛnaabɛin. Pɔlɔ baŋa gɔ gi: ‘Mu minɛ turu ɛbaajɔn, wogɔ yɛnɛi mu yaaun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, kawuru kanran.’
42014019	Turu baŋa yaa saa gi: ‘Mu naa jiŋu pɛlu ɛbaajɔn, mu wolu walu bemɛ bana ɛjii wɔɔ ma, marun yɛnɛi yaadɔn. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, kawuru kanran.’
42014020	Inɛ waja kanran saa gi: ‘Mu yakana jɛyaa wɔun. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu wɛɛ bɛɛidolɔn.’
42014021	Birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ pilemaa wiyaa, wo baŋa bɛrɛ kijɛ bii gɔbe puu sɔwaabe. Kɔɔ waaru le, ginrun kuu baŋa gɔ, kinɛ banranmaa, birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ le ɔn gin’ gi: ‘U ɔgu gowaa ye, taibe nɛ lee, ana pɔŋɔrɔn nɛ lee yaa. Dɛgugunw lee, inɛw numɔ ma, kubɔ ma yanwaain gɔbe lee, girumuw lee, tegutegenw lee, bei ɔn nɛ boonu jɛɛlɛ.’
42014022	Siin wo kanraan, birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ wo baŋa le kijɛ gi: ‘Mu baŋa, kijɛ u tɔɔraabe gɔ kanraantin, kaa nimɛ kanran yalu wajaai.’
42014023	Ginrun kuu baŋa gɔ birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ le kijɛ gi: ‘U bɛdɛ gɔbe nɛ lee, sadiŋɛ gonɔ diŋirun gɔbe nɛ lee yaa, ginrun ma kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ inɛw jooi biyɛ ga, paŋa le inɛwin dimɛrɛn ye jɛɛlɛ.
42014024	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔn, inɛw jaa kaya dɛi laa mu boonaabe gɔbe logoro nɛ, inɛ turu kanran digɛ pana ma nɛwɛindolo.’ »
42014025	Mɔɔnu kulɔ joo Yesu onu nɛ dimiyaan yaaubɛin. Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu be sibɛ go kigelemaa, be le ɔn gin’ sɔi:
42014026	«Inɛ mu bɛrɛ wɛɛjɛ gɔ, wo ba lee, wo na lee, yaanran womɔ lee, unrunw womɔ lee, wo ba unrunw lee, wo saabe lee, halu kinrun womɔ ibiliyɛlu ye, wo jaŋu ii mai bii bɛɛidolo.
42014027	Iyaa, inɛ aai kanran, baga jai womɔ duiyi ye, onu ma nɛ dimiyɛɛnlɛ ye, inɛ wogɔ, jaŋu ii mai bii bɛɛidolo.
42014028	«Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ aai kanran ginrun diyɛ ujɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, wo bɔlɔtei gɔ daanaatiyaa ye, ginrun gɔ ujɔ dɔɔnu bɛɛidolo kakanrando ma giye, wogɔ ujɔ dɔɔnɔɲu kɛɛlɛ yasɛ ma, inɛ dɛinyaan ye ajubaidolo gɔ yɔɔ ma? Kɔɔi laa ye, bɔlɔtei gɔ wo daanaajɛ onu nɛ, wo dɔɔnaa bɛɛlu ye, inɛw woi iyeidɛin puu woi mɔmɔmɔdɛin.
42014030	Iyaa kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Ainɛ ɔn ginrun ujɔ ga tɔlaabe, kaa wo dɔɔnaa bɛɛlu.’
42014031	«Maa, iyaa ɔgɔnɛ turu ɔgɔnɛ waja le kɔmɔ tai ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, inɛw muɲu pɛlu le, inɛw muɲu pɛɛlɛi kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛdo ma, ɔgɔnɛ dɛinyaan ye badu badaidolo gɔ yɔɔ ma?
42014032	Wo yagɔ baŋai gɔnrɔindolo jugaajɛ ye, ɔgɔnɛ waja gɔ wage nɛ baa wo wɔnu, unrun wo le tubiyaai ga inɛw wo bɛrɛ titiido.
42014033	Kɔɔ gin’ logoro ebe nɛ inɛ aai kanran kijɛ wo sɛɛ wooi pajalu ye, jaŋu ii mai bii bɛɛidolo.»
42014034	«Narain, nɛu kai kijɛ ɛjui. Kaa, nɛu ɛɛlu womɔ manaai ye, wo bɛrɛ ɛɛlu gɔ yani pilemɛ ye obu bɛɛmɔdo?
42014035	Minɛ bɛrɛ woi ire sɛlɛ, iyaa binugui laa. Woi bain go togotiidɛin. Inɛ suguru ɛhɛgu sɛɛ, wo sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛn.»
42015001	Sɛgu yabanw gɔbe lee, inɛw waja boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔɔ gɔbe lee, Yesu sɔɔ keŋiyɛn dɛi, be puu genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaabɛin.
42015002	Parisiɛn gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee guguun guun, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ainɛ ɔn, wo inɛw boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔɔ gɔbei ɛjii sɛgɛrɛuwɔ, iyaa be le mɔrin ye jaa kayauwɔ.»
42015003	Kaa Yesu, taanrinyɛn ɔn be bɛrɛ jeɲaa tagu:
42015004	«Inɛ aa, logoro ebe nɛ peju suŋu sɛnu, turu manaai ye, peju pɛtuwɔ tuwɔsigɛ gɔbe olu nɛ pajaatiyaa ye, turu manaai gɔi wo iyeido baa, dɛnɛnu biyɛidolo ma?
42015005	Waaru peju gɔi wo iyaajɛ, wo kinɛ ɛɛli le tatabu womɔ nɛ yayaŋarando.
42015006	Kɔɔ onu nɛ waaru ginrun wo dɔwaajɛ, wo unrun anrungebe lee, ginrun bɛŋu womɔ inɛw lee boonaa ye, be le ɔn gin’ gɛɛdo: ‘E mu le bari ye kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi, sabu peju ma manaa bee gɔi iyaajɔn.’
42015007	«Kɔɔ gin’, mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛ turu bana duliyaai dɛi, alagala nɛ kinɛ ɛɛli biyɛido gɔ, inɛw teitai wɔin pɛtuwɔ tuwɔsigɛ bana dulomu kai sɛnɛ mɔ dɛi sigɛ biyɛdo.»
42015008	«Iyaa kɔɔ gin’, yaanran aa, sarudu kɛɛlɛ pɛlu sɛnu, koturu manaai ye, lanpa tanugaa ye, ginrun kɔlɔ gɔ sɛmaa ye, kɛɛlɛ gɔ wo iyeido baa, ɛjii dɛnɛlu kanrando?
42015009	Waaru wo iyaajɛ, wo yaanw wo anrungebe lee, ginrun bɛŋu womɔ yaanw gɔbe lee boonaa ye, be le ɔn sɔɔdo: ‘E mu le bari ye kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi, sabu kɛɛlɛ uji ma manaa bee gɔi iyaajɔn.’
42015010	«Kɔɔ gin’ mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, hakɛ kanrannɛ turu bana duliyaai dɛi, mɛlɛnkɛbe logoro nɛ kinɛ ɛɛli yɔɔ.»
42015011	Yesu iyaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ainɛ turu yabe, wo anranw unrunw lɛi sɛbe.
42015012	Aini dagunɛ gɔ wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Mu ba, kɛn uwɔ nɛ kijɛ mui dinrɛindo gɔ mu bɛrɛ obo.’ Kɔɔ gin’, banɛ gɔ kijɛ wo sɛɛ gɔ be lɛi logoro nɛ gamalaabe.
42015013	Bai gaila onu nɛ, aini dagunɛ gɔ, kijɛ wo sɛɛ puu dɔnraan, kɛɛlɛ gɔ balaa, gana wage turu nɛ yai. Kɔɔ nɛ wo kijɛ wo sɛɛ puu dimu dimi le yanwan tɛbaabe.
42015014	«Waaru kɛɛlɛ womɔ puu dogu le, gana gɔ nɛ giyɛ diyɛ yowaai. Wo kanran nau woi aai tɔlaabe.
42015015	Kɔɔ gin’ wo gowaa yaa, gana gɔ inɛ turu birɛ nɛ yowaabe. Kɔɔbaŋa woi minɛ unrunmɔ nɛ tolu girɛ ga tiyaabe.
42015016	Kɔɔ gin’ wo tolube tiun ii kayabe gɔ le bɛrɛ unrunmɔ joonɔ ibɛɛ bee. Kaa inɛ turu kanran wogɔ wo bɛrɛ obolu.
42015017	«Kunrin waaru hakilɛ wo bɛɛ le, unruin ajubaa, ajubaa yɛnaa, kinɛ womɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ gi: ‘Mu ba ginrun nɛ birɛbirɛnw joo yɔɔin, be jaa kayaa ye waju dagaɲu, kaa mu kai ɔn nɛ giyɛ mui daa ga wɔɔ.
42015018	Mu ingele ye, mu ba bɛrɛ yayaadɔn, wo le kijɛ mu gɛɛido: Mu ba, mu Ama lee, u lee giru nɛ hakɛ kanraantun.
42015019	Mui waja ii uwɔi gɛɛun jaanla. Birɛbirɛnɛ uwɔ turu gin’ mui lugo.’
42015020	Wo ba bɛrɛ yaa ga wo oju gowaabe. «Wage nɛ wo ba woi iyaa, amasɔgɔ womɔ woi aabe. Wo jɔbaa yaa, aini unrunmɔ kɔkɔlɔ nɛ waagiyaa, ɛjii kanwaanbe.
42015021	Kaa aini womɔ wo le kijɛ gi: ‘Mu ba, mu Ama giru nɛ lee, giru uwɔ nɛ lee hakɛ kanraantun. Mui waja ii uwɔi gɛɛun jaanla.’
42015022	Kaa banɛ gɔ, birɛbirɛnw womɔ le kijɛ gi: ‘E arugoi wo sigɛ gɔ ɔgu jɛɛlɛi, wo nɛ goroi, iyaa numɔ ii womɔ nɛ numɔsagai kunɔi, kubɔ womɔ nɛ taga kunɔi.
42015023	Kɔɔ onu nɛ naa ii siigiyaa wɔɔ gɔ jɛɛlaa ye daai. Emɛ jaa kayamɔi, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔmɔi.
42015024	Sabu aini ma yinwaanyaabe gɔ, wo pilemaa ɔnmɔi biyaai. Woi manaayaabe, kaa woi pilemaa iyemaajɛ.’ Be kɔɔ gin’ kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi tɔlaabɛin.
42015025	«Kaa aini diyɛnɛ womɔ gɔ olu go bee. Pilemaa wɛɛu, ginrun waaru wo bɛruni le, wo boi soguru lee, inɛw gɔɔ gɔɔubɛin siɲɛ lee ɛgaabe.
42015026	Wo birɛbirɛnw gɔbe logoro nɛ turui boonaa, sɔɔ kɔɔ tiyɛ ingei ma selumaabe.
42015027	Birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ saa gi: ‘U suŋɔrɔn gɔi ginrun pilemaa wɛi. Wo jamu le ginrun pilemaa yowaai dɛi, u ba naa ii siigu gɔ daabe.’
42015028	«Kɔɔ waaru wo ɛgu le, aini diyɛnɛ gɔ kinɛ banranmaa, ginrun yoo ga yabalu. Kɔɔ dɛi wo ba gowaa, wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaanbe.
42015029	Kaa wo ba le ɔn gin’ sai: ‘Yɛnɛ, mu anranguju joo u le birɛ birɛuwɔn, iyaa bai turu kanran sɔɔ uwɔ yabalu kanrantɛlun. Kaa maa mu anrungebe le kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔ ga, halu ɛnrɛn ii turu kanran mui obotɛlu.
42015030	Kaa aini uwɔ ɔn, inɛ yaanw dimu le kayanw le arusɛgɛ uwɔ yamalaabe gɔ, wo pilemaa wiyaa dɛi u wo dɛi naa ii siigu gɔ daajɛu!’
42015031	Kɔɔ waaru le banɛ gɔ wo le kijɛ gi: ‘Ii ma, u waaru puu mu le kowɔu, iyaa kijɛ mu sɛɛ gɔ puu uwɔi.
42015032	Kaa yɔgɔrɔ yɔgɔrɔun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔu jaain wɔɔ. Sabu u suŋɔrɔn ɔn, woi yinwaanyaabe, kaa wo pilemaa ɔnmɔi biyaai. Woi manaayaabe, kaa woi pilemaa iyemaajɛ.’ »
42016001	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ le kijɛ gi: «Ainɛ ɔgɔinɛ turu yabe. Wo ainɛ arusɛgɛ womɔ kajubanɛ turu yasɛbe. Arusɛgɛ kajubanɛ dɔnrun dɔnrɔnnɛ gɔ womaa ɔgɔinɛ gɔ kɛɛlɛ gɔ yanwan tɛbɛuwɔ ga, inɛw wiyaa ɛlu womɔ gooni.
42016002	Arusɛgɛ kajubanɛ gɔi boonaa, ɔgɔinɛ gɔ wo le kijɛ gi: ‘U dɛi sɔɔ mu ɛgɛjɛ gɔ inge sɔɔi ma? Aiwa! Mu birɛ ma nɛ ui goonaatun. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi u yaa ye, kɛɛlɛ ma lugi gɔ puu dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa ye jɛɛlɛ.’
42016003	Kɔɔ waaru le, arusɛgɛ kajubanɛ gɔ ajubaa yɛnaa, kinɛ womɔ nɛ kijɛ gi: ‘Mu nɛɛ inge kanrandɔn? Sabu mu baŋa arusɛgɛ kajubu womɔ birɛ gɔ nɛ mui gogoonɔdo gi. Mu wolu walu birɛ gɔnrɔindolɔn. Iyaa, gɛɛn gɛɛn ga, mu bɛrɛ wogɔ dɔgɔi.
42016004	Mu kijɛ mu kanraindo igii wɔun. Kɔɔ gin’ birɛ mu too gɔ nɛ mui nanaa goonaatin ye, inɛw, ginrun bemɛ nɛ mui sɛsɛgɛrɛdɛin.’
42016005	Kɔɔ gin’ arusɛgɛ kajubanɛ gɔ, wo baŋa yoru inɛw tobɛin gɔbe puu tuturu boonaa jɛɛlaa, pɔlɔ baŋa bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ gi: ‘U mu baŋa yoru aŋa baa sɛu?’
42016006	Wo saa, unrun nii litere muɲu nai sɛun gi. Kaa arusɛgɛ kajubanɛ gɔ wo le saa gi: ‘Yoru uwɔ dɔn unwɔ: Ɔgu dɛinyɛn, u nii litere muɲu lɛi sɛu tɔŋɔ.’
42016007	Kɔɔ onu nɛ inɛ waja le sɔwaa gi: ‘U yaa yoru aŋa baa sɛu?’ Kɔɔbaŋa saa gi: ‘Alukama bɔɔri suŋu.’ Ainɛ arusɛgɛ kajubanɛ gɔ saa gi: ‘Yoru uwɔ dɔn unwɔ: U pilemɛ ye bɔɔri pɛgagara sɛu tɔŋɔ.’
42016008	Kuu baŋa gɔ arusɛgɛ kajubanɛ teitai laa gɔ sasai birɛ biraabe dɛi woi sɔmaabe. Sabu aduna ɔn inɛw gɔbe, inɛw be bɔɔnw gɔbe sibɛ go, wijɛ inɛw dɛi sigɛ sasai le kijɛ kakanranɲu.»
42016009	Yesu iyaa lee sɔwaa gi: «Mu yaa e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, e aduna ɔn arusɛgɛ le anrunge dɛnɛi. Waaru arusɛgɛ gɔbe numɔ ebe nɛ dogaai onu nɛ, inɛw bemaa ginrun asuu sɔgɔido gɔ nɛ ei sɛgɛrɛ ga kɔɔ gin’ kanrain.
42016010	Inɛ kijɛ dagi nɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, kijɛ diyɛ nɛ yaa sɔɔ turu baŋai biyɛjɛ. Kaa inɛ kijɛ dagi nɛ teitai wɔlɔ ye, kijɛ diyɛ nɛ kanran teitai wɔlɔ.
42016011	E aduna ɔn arusɛgɛ gɔbe sibɛ go sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin biyɛli ye, inɛ aa arusɛgɛ tɔitɔi gɔbe sagu e bɛrɛ gawarado ma?
42016012	E inɛ waja arusɛgɛ dɛi sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin biyɛli ye, arusɛgɛ ebei biyɛ ga aa e bɛrɛ obodo ma?
42016013	«Birɛbirɛnɛ turu kanran kuu bɛɛnw lɛi dɛi birɛ birɛ bɛɛidolo. Wo koturu baŋai ibɛi biyaa, waja gɔi ibɛi biyɛlu kanrun ye koi. Koturu baŋa birɛ nɛ kuu womɔ obaa ye, waja gɔ birɛ nɛ kuu kunɔlu kanrun ye koi. Ama dɛnɛ lee, kɛɛlɛ dɛnɛ lee, e sɔɔ kɔɔbe lɛi kubɔ tunmɔ kanrun bɛɛidelei.»
42016014	Parisiɛnbe, sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu ɛgɛubɛin. Be kɛɛlɛ ibɛɛ bɛin dɛi Yesui mɔmɔubɛin.
42016015	Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «E, inɛw giru nɛ ei inɛw teitai wɔiin ga tagarajɛi. Kaa Ama, kinɛ ebe igii wɔɔ. Sabu inɛw kijɛ sigɛi ga kijɛ be lugojɛ gɔ, wogɔ Ama giru nɛ kijɛ jɛbaatii.
42016016	«Sɔɔ Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe lee, Jan Batise waaru dɔɔ baa biin. Waaru wogɔ galaai onu nɛ, iye bai wɛɛ dɔɔ, Ama diinɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagauwɔin. Iyaa inɛw, paŋa le Ama diinɛ gɔ nɛ yoo ga birɛuwɔin.
42016017	Tɔɔru nɛ sɔɔ kiji turu manaido dɛi, alagala lee, minɛ lee galaido bɛru.
42016018	«Ainɛ aai kanran, yaanran womɔ pajaatiyaa yaanran waja jeɲaajɛ ye, ainɛ wogɔ, yaanran lɛiye kɔɔ le dimu dimiyɛunwɔ. Iyaa, inɛ yaanran pajaaɲu gɔ jeɲaajɛ, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kanran dimu dimiyɛnnɛi.»
42016019	«Ainɛ ɔgɔinɛ turu yabe. Wo sɔi ɛju ɛju dɔnrun gaa kunɔube. Bai puu jaa ɛɛlu diyɛ diyɛ kayaube.
42016020	Ginrun mɔnɔgolo womɔ nɛ, ainɛ dɛguginɛ turu yadiinyɛnbe. Boi womɔ Lasare gɛɛbɛin. Lasare goju puu nɛ mirun gowaa gowaa bee.
42016021	Wo ɔgɔinɛ gɔ jaa kɛbɛlɛ bagabe gɔ le bɛrɛ unrunmɔ joonu ibɛɛ bee. Iyaa ijube wɛi wɛi ye, mirun womɔ gɔ dɛgɛubɛin.
42016022	«Kɔɔ gin’ wɔu, dɛguginɛ gɔ yinwun. Wo yinwaan, mɛlɛnkɛbe kikinu womɔ jeɲaa, Abarahamu genɛ nɛ, alujɛnɛ nɛ jɛyaabɛin. Ɔgɔinɛ gɔ kanran wo yinwaan, woi bojaabɛin.
42016023	Yinwunrun nɛ ɔɲɛ nɛ tou, waaru giri womɔ daa go wo dɛɛru le, wo wage nɛ Abarahamui iyaabe. Lasare kanran, Abarahamu genɛ nɛ wo wɔu iyaabe.
42016024	Ɔgɔinɛ gɔ piyaa, kijɛ wo gi: ‘Mu ba Abarahamu, amasɔgɔ ma jugɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ Lasare tiyaa ye, numɔ ii womɔ dii nɛ sowaa ye, ninɛ ma nɛ kɔɔraa ye wo kaaliyɛmɔ. Sabu mu yaun bije ɔn nɛ saii ɔɲaa toun.’
42016025	Kaa Abarahamu wo le saa gi: ‘Aini ma, waaru ɔnmɔi u bee le, aduna nɛ u kijɛ ɛju uwɔ wooi biyaabeu ga naŋanɔu. Kaa Lasare, kɔɔ waaru le ɔɲɛ biyaabe. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi kanɛ wo ɔn nɛ jamu nɛ too, kaa u ɔɲɛ nɛ tou.
42016026	Iyaa kɔɔ kuu nɛ sigiyaa, u lee, emɛ lee logoro nɛ ɔmɔrɔn diyɛ turu yegeraa pajaaɲu. Kɔɔ gin’ yalu emɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ goi ye yalu e wɔɔ gɔ nɛ inɛ galu bɛɛidolo. Iyaa yalu e wɔɔ gɔ nɛ goo ye, yalu emɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ inɛ galu bɛɛidolo.’
42016027	Ɔgɔinɛ gɔ saa gi: ‘Mu ba Abarahamu, mu koi ye, u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, u Lasare goonu ye, mu ba ginrun nɛ tii,
42016028	sabu mu ba unrunw numɔrɔn yɔɔin. Bemaa kanran ɔɲɛ yalu ɔn nɛ wɛɛnɔu ga, be bɛrɛ yai taga wa.’
42016029	Abarahamu wo le saa gi: ‘U ba unrunw gɔbe, Mɔise lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ tɔŋu gɔbe lee yasin, sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ be keŋiyɛnmɔ.’
42016030	Kaa ɔgɔinɛ gɔ saa gi: ‘Ai, mu ba Abarahamu, kɔɔ baaidolo. Kaa inɛ turu bulaa yaa bei tagaaginaajɛ ye, be bana duli bɛbɛɛdɛin.’
42016031	Abarahamu saa gi: ‘Be Mɔise lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe lee sɔɔ yabaanɛ ye, halu inɛ, yiun nɛ bulaa wiyaajɛ kanran, be gawaidenɛ.’ »
42017001	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ le sɔwaa gi: «Waajibi, kinɛ yanwan sɔɔ bibiyɛdo. Kaa, kinɛ yanwan inɛ le digi wɛɛido gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa kai, bɔnrɔn wo le yɔɔ.
42017002	Kɔɔbaŋa, inɛw dagunw ɔnbe logoro nɛ, halu koturu hakɛ nɛ wo yoomu dɛi, yuuna diyɛ nɛ suŋu kɔmaa ye kɔkɔlɔ womɔ nɛ yaa pagaa ye, nɛudii nɛ woi kamaa kuni wo bɛrɛ ire.
42017003	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi kuu kajubu le biyɛi. «U bainɛ u bɛrɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu kanranjɛ ye, u womaa sɔɔ wo kanranjɛ gɔ ɛjula ga wo bɛrɛ taga. Wo bana womɔ duliyemaati ye, u woi yaabu kanran.
42017004	Wo bai turu nɛ kubɔ sɔi u bɛrɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu kanraantiyaa, kubɔ sɔi gɔ puu wiyaa u bɛrɛ unruin lelaai ga sɔwaajɛ ye, u woi yaabu kanraun jaain wɔɔ.»
42017005	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa le kijɛ be gi: «Gagawu emɛ bariyɛmɔ.»
42017006	Inɛw Baŋa saa gi: «Gagawu ebe gɔ halu mutarudu ii popoo baa bee ye, tiun na ɔn womaa ɔn nɛ goi ye, nɛudii nɛ yai yibiye giyaajɛi ye, wo sɔɔ ebe yayababe.»
42017007	«Kɔɔ gin’, logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu, birɛbirɛnɛ woluwalanɛ ma, bɛlugirɛnɛ yasɛ ye, birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ olu gowaa wiyaai ye, womaa wɛɛ maini dɛinyɛn, jaa kaya gɛgɛɛdo ma?
42017008	Ai! E kɔɔ gin’ gɛɛidelei. Kaa kijɛ e gɛɛido: U mu dɛi digɛ pana yegere, u dɔin uwɔ paga. Jaa kayi ye, kijɛ nɔɔɲu nɔɔ ye, mu kilɛido baa u mui dɔmiyɛn. Kɔɔ onu nɛ u yaa jaa uwɔ kaya, kijɛ nɔɔɲu uwɔ nɔɔ.
42017009	Wo birɛbirɛnɛ womɔ, kijɛ tɔɔrin gɔ kanraanbe dɛi woi birɛpoo tagaidolo, woi laa?
42017010	E yaa, birɛ e bɛrɛ tɔɔrin gɔ waaru biraa e kilaajɛ, ɔn gin’ gɛɛi: ‘Emi birɛbirɛnw niwɛn toloi, kijɛ emɛ kanraun jaan gɔi emɛ kanrin.’ »
42017011	Yesu waaru Jerusalɛmu oju gowaa wo yaabe le, wo Samari gana lee, Galile gana lee urɔ diŋirun gɔ kɛjaa galaabe.
42017012	Ana turu nɛ waaru wo dɔi le, nɛwɛngunw pɛlu wo bɛrɛ wiyaabɛin. Be Yesu le wagee iŋiyaan,
42017013	kɔnwaan, kijɛ wo le be gi: «Yesu, emɛ baŋa, amasɔgɔ emɛ jugɔ!»
42017014	Yesu bei iyaa, be le sɔwaa gi: «E yaai ye, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw bɛrɛ ei tagarai.» Kunrin gowaa yaau, oju nɛ be tou, bei bajaai.
42017015	Kaa nɛwɛngunw gɔbe logoro nɛ, turui, unruin bajaai ga iyaa, Ama boi mii diyɛ le sɔmɔu, pilemaa wiyaabe.
42017016	Wo Yesu giru nɛ tuŋiyaan, woi birɛpoo tagaabe. Ainɛ wogɔ Samari gana bɛɛnnɛi bee.
42017017	Yesu, kɔɔ waaru le saa gi: «Inɛw pɛlu gɔbe puu bajugamɔnɛ ma? Nɛɛ, inɛw tuwɔ gɔbe, be yago wɔin?
42017018	Ainɛ yerunɛ ɔin laa ye, inɛ waja wiyaa Amai birɛpoo tagu wɔlɔ ma?»
42017019	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, ainɛ gɔ le kijɛ gi: «Ingele ye yaa, gagawu uwɔ ui bajamaati.»
42017020	Parisiɛnbe, Yesu bɛrɛ selumaa, womaa Ama diinɛ gɔ aduna nɛ waaru inge le wɛɛdo ma gin. Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Ama diinɛ wɛi gɔ, sɛɛrɛ giri le iyemɔjɛ le biyɛidolo.
42017021	Iyaa kɔɔ gin’, inɛw, Ama diinɛ gɔ ɔn nɛ yɔɔ ma, kɔɔ nɛ yɔɔ ma gɛɛnu biyɛidenɛ. Sabu yɛnɛi, Ama diinɛ gɔ logoro ebe nɛ yato.»
42017022	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le kijɛ wo gi: «Bai yawɛɛjɛ, e Inɛ Aini gɔ bai gɔbe logoro nɛ, koturu iyaabei ye, e bɛrɛ ɛjii bibiyɛbe. Kaa wogɔ bɛɛ iyeidelei.
42017023	Inɛw iyaa e le gɛgɛɛdɛin: ‘Yɛnɛi, wo ɔn nɛ wɔɔ.’ ‘Yɛnɛi wo kɔɔ nɛ wɔɔ.’ E yalu wogɔbe nɛ yaanɔugi. Iyaa, e inɛw wogɔbe onu nɛ dimiyɛnnɔugi.
42017024	Anrangiriyenu sibɛ turu nɛ goi ye, ɔgu kɛu sibɛ waja nɛ baa bana wo yaajɛ gin’, Inɛ Aini gɔ, wɛɛgu womɔ le kɔɔ gin’ biyɛdo.
42017025	Kaa sɔɔ kɔɔbe biyɛmɔ nɛ, waajibi, Inɛ Aini gɔ gaai ɔɲɔu jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa, kanɛ inɛw ɔnbe wo le yabalu kanran ga waajibi.
42017026	Nɔwe waaru le bana bii gin’, Inɛ Aini wɛɛgu le kɔɔ gin’ tee biyɛdo.
42017027	Inɛw jaa kayaubɛin, dii nɔɔubɛin, puru pagaubɛin, unrunw yaanw bemɛ igɛ oboubɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ kanraun be wɔu, Nɔwe, diikoro diyɛ gɔ nɛ wo yoi bai wiyaa dɔi. Dii diyɛ gɔ wiyaa be puu suyaabe.
42017028	Lote waaru le bana bii gin’, Inɛ Aini wɛɛgu le kɔɔ gin’ tee biyɛdo. Inɛw jaa kayaubɛin, dii nɔɔubɛin, ebu ɛbɛubɛin, dɔnrun dɔnrɔunbɛin, toi tɔɔubɛin, ginrun ujɔubɛin.
42017029	Kaa Lote Sodomɛ ana nɛ bai goi, bai wogɔ yaun lee, sidu lee alagala gowaa anran gin’ miyaan, inɛw gɔbe puu suyaabe.
42017030	Inɛ Aini gɔ, bai unruin wo tagaraido, kɔɔ gin’ tee biyɛdo.
42017031	«Bai wogɔ le inɛ dala kuu nɛ wɔɔ, sugo ye, ginrun kɔlɔ nɛ kijɛ jeɲɛ ye jɔbɔdɔn gɛɛnɔu. Inɛ olu go wɔɔ, ginrun pilemɛ ye wɛɛnɔu.
42017032	E Lote yaanran sɔɔ ajubu yɛnɛi.
42017033	Inɛ kinrun unrunmɔ yabu dɛnɛjɛ gɔ, woi susuyodo. Kaa kinrun womɔ mu dɛi paja ga inɛ yabaajɛ gɔ, kinrun womɔ yayabadɛin.
42017034	Mu e bɛrɛ naran go sɔɔuwɔn, digɛ wogɔ, inɛw lɛi teenu tunmɔ nɛ be diinnu, turu jeɲɛ ye, turu papajadɛin.
42017035	Yaanw lɛi dɛnrɛn nawannu be wɔnu, turu jeɲɛ ye, turu papajadɛin. [
42017036	Anranw lɛi olu nɛ be wɔnu, turu jeɲɛ ye, turu papajadɛin.]»
42017037	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, Yesu le kijɛ be gi: «Wogɔ yalu yagɔ nɛ biyɛdo ma, Inɛw Baŋa?» Kaa wo aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Yalu inge nɛi kanran, kijɛ yiun yadiin ye, waajibi dubɔbe kɔɔ nɛ mɔmɔrinyɛndɛin.»
42018001	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bemaa waaru puu Ama gɛɛun jaain wɔɔ ga, bemaa amagɛɛn nɛ ɔɲɔnɔu ga, bei deere ga, taanrinyɛn turu daanbe.
42018002	Kijɛ wo gi: «Ana turu nɛ, ainɛ saliyɛkirenɛ, Ama giri liyɛɛlɛ turu yabe. Wo inɛ turu kanran bababele.
42018003	Ana wogɔ nɛ yapanunɛ turu kanran yabe. Yapanunɛ gɔ, ainɛ saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ bɛrɛ jaa wɛɛube, wo le kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: ‘Jaŋunɛ ma kuu nɛ ma naran bɛɛ dɛi, mui bara.’
42018004	Kaa, saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ bai joo biyaabe, wo gɛɛn gɔ yabalu. Kɔɔ onu nɛ kuu unrunmɔ le kijɛ wo gi: ‘Halu, mu Ama giri liyɛnɛi laaun kanran, mu inɛwin babaalɔn kanran,
42018005	yapanunɛ ɔn womaa dumɔ gɔ suguru ma pujomɔnɔu dɛi, mu jaŋunɛ womɔ kuu nɛ wo bɛrɛ naran ohobodɔn. Sabu wo mui ɔɲɔmaati.’ »
42018006	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Inɛw Baŋa sɔwaa gi: «Saliyɛkirenɛ nabaraginɛ kɔɔ sɔɔ gi gɔi ɛjii kajubu yɛnɛi.
42018007	Nɛɛ Ama, wo, inɛw womɔ wo yɛmu gɔbe, unrunbei bara dɛi aga lee, digɛ lee wo bɛrɛ piinw gɔbe be bɛrɛ naran oboidolo ma? Wo aŋa bemɛ saa dɛi dɔdɔmiyɛndo ma?
42018008	Mu e bɛrɛ daii sɔɔuwɔn: Wo ɔgu be bɛrɛ naran ohobodo. Kaa, Inɛ Aini gɔ, waaru aduna nɛ pilemu wo wɛɛido, inɛw gagawu sɛin tɛtɛmɛdo ma?»
42018009	Yesu iyaa, inɛw unrunbe teitai wɔin ga namaa iŋi gɔbe, inɛw inɛw wajunwin lugaa sɛnɛ gɔbe dɛi, taanrinyɛn ɔn daanbe:
42018010	«Anranw lɛi Ama gɛɛn ga Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ ulaabɛin. Ainɛ turui Parisiɛn bee, lɛiye gɔ sɛgu yabanɛi bee.
42018011	Parisiɛn gɔ iŋiyaan, kinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ gɛin: ‘Ama, mu inɛw wajunw gɔbe gin’ wɔlɔn dɛi, mu ui birɛpoo tagauwɔn. Be gugunyɔnwin, mɔɲu kanranwin, iyaa, Dimudimiyɛnwin. Halu, mu ainɛ sɛgu yabanɛ ɔn gin’ wɔlɔn dɛi, ui birɛpoo tagauwɔn.
42018012	Mu bai sɔi nɛ kubɔ lɛi aŋa pagauwɔn. Kijɛ mu bɛɛjɛ wooi nɛ mu jaka goonɔuwɔn.’
42018013	Kaa sɛgu yabanɛ gɔ wagee biyaa, halu giri unrunmɔ daa go dɛɛrɛ ga daariyɛlu. Kaa wo gegeɲɛ unrunmɔ lagau, ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: ‘Ama, u mu inɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ gɔ amasɔgɔ jugɔ.’ »
42018014	Yesu kijɛ gi: «Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, ainɛ sɛgu yabanɛ kɔɔ, Ama, hakɛ womɔ yaabu kanraan ginrun yai. Kaa pɔlɔ baŋa gɔ yaabu kanrun bɛɛlu. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ aai kanran kuu unrunmɔ unaajɛ ye, kuu womɔ susunugodɛin. Iyaa inɛ kuu unrunmɔ sunugaajɛ gɔ, kuu womɔ uhunɔdɛin.»
42018015	Inɛw, Yesu bɛrɛ unrunw banrin yaa jɛɛlaa, womaa kuu bemɛ nɛ numɔ yaŋaran gin. Kaa waaru kɔɔ be iye le, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe inɛw gɔi ganwaanbɛin.
42018016	Kaa Yesu bei wo bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛmaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Unrunw gɔbei tɛŋɛnɔugi. Bei paja ye, mu bɛrɛ wɛɛmɔi. Sabu inɛw be gin’ wɔin gɔbe, Ama diinɛ gɔ bemɛi.
42018017	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛ aai kanran, Ama diinɛ gɔ nɛ yoi ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, ii dagi bana jeɲaa wɛɛlu ye, inɛ wogɔ baŋa bɛɛ yooidolo.»
42018018	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yahutunw inɛ giru too turu Yesu bɛrɛ selumaa gi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, u inɛ ɛju gɔ, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ bɛɛ ga, kijɛ inge mu kanraun jaan ma?»
42018019	Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Inge dɛi maa inɛ ɛjui gɛɛjɛu? Amai laa ye, inɛ ɛju wɔlɔ.
42018020	Nɛɛ, u Ama tɔɔru gɔbe igii wɔu: “Dimu dimiyɛnnɔu, inɛ daanɔu, gunyɔn gunyɔnnɔu, sɛɛrɛ kakalu goonɔu, u ba lee u na lee baba.”»
42018021	Kuu baŋa gɔ saa, unrun dagi unrunmɔ le baa tɔɔru kɔɔbe yadigɛun gi.
42018022	Yesu, aŋa sɛɛrɛ womɔ gɔ ɛgaa, wo le ɔn gin’ gi: «Nimɛ kanran sɔɔ turu u le wajaai: Kijɛ u sɛɛ puu dɔnraan ye buudu gɔ dɛgugunw bɛrɛ gamala. Kɔɔ gin’ kanraanjɛu ye, u alagala nɛ kijɛ gaai bɛbɛɛdou. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wɛɛ mui dimiyɛn.»
42018023	Ainɛ kɔɔ ɔgɔinɛ diyɛi bee. Kɔɔ dɛi Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo giyaa, wo kinɛjiun le gowaa yai.
42018024	Yesu kɔɔ iyaa, saa gi: «Ama diinɛ nɛ yoo ga, ɔgɔ unrunw bɛrɛ halu nawin wɔɔ.
42018025	Inɛw arusɛgɛ nɛ diyɛ bemɛ daanaa gɛlin, Ama diinɛ nɛ be yoomɔ nɛ, ɔgɔyɔn laa kala bonɔ nɛ gala bɛru.»
42018026	Inɛw sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛnw gɔbe saa gin: «Kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ biyaa ye nɛɛ, inɛ yabu bɛɛmɔido gɔ aai?»
42018027	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Inɛw kijɛ kanrun bɛɛnɛ gɔ, Ama wogɔ kanrun bɛbɛɛjɛ.»
42018028	Piɛru gowaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kunrin biyaa ye, emɛ kai, ginrun emɛ pajaatiyaa ui dimii, emɛ dɛi yani biyɛdo?»
42018029	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛ aai kanran, ginrun womɔ ma, yaanran womɔ ma, wo ba unrunw ma, wo maranw ma, unrunw womɔbe ma, Ama diinɛ dɛi pajaajɛ ye,
42018030	inɛ wogɔ baŋa, aduna ɔn nɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ joo naa joo bɛbɛɛdo. Iyaa aduna wɛɛido gɔ nɛ inɛ wogɔ baŋa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ bɛbɛɛdo.»
42018031	Kɔɔ gin’, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbei dɛiin kabugaa goonaa, be le ɔn gin’ gi: «Emɛ kanɛ Jerusalɛmu yaauwɔin. Kɔɔ gin’ Inɛ Aini gɔ dɛi, inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ tɔŋi gɔ puu kikibedo.
42018032	Sabu, woi inɛw Ama inin numɔ nɛ kukunɔdɛin. Inɛw woi yamurinyɛnmu ye, woi duduyɔdɛin, kuu womɔ nɛ yuguja tɔi ye,
42018033	bɔɔniyɛn le woi lagu ye, woi yindaadɛin. Kaa woi be dai bai taaniye gɔ, wo bubulodo.»
42018034	Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, Yesu sɔɔ sɔɔbe gɔ turu kanran paamu kanraunbenɛ. Sɔɔ wogɔ be bɛrɛ sɔɔ boŋuruin bee. Be Yesu sɔɔ be le sɔɔu bee gɔ, tiyɛ womɔ inɛɛ bɛin.
42018035	Yesu waaru Jeriko ana laara nɛ wo dɔi le, ainɛ giruminɛ turu oju genɛ nɛ dɛinyaan, gɛɛn gɛɛunbe.
42018036	Mɔɔnu gɔ galau wo wɔu ɛgaa, wo inɛw bɛrɛ wogɔ ingei ma selumaabe.
42018037	Aŋa womɔ saa, Yesu, Nasarɛtu ana bɛɛnnɛ gɔi galauwɔ ga tagin.
42018038	Kɔɔ waaru le wo mii ɛɛn le kijɛ gi: «Yesu, Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, amasɔgɔ ma jugɔ.»
42018039	Inɛw giru tobɛin gɔbe woi ganwaun womaa siɲɛ paja gɛɛubɛin. Kaa wo mii womɔ baraa ye, ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: «Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, amasɔgɔ ma jugɔ.»
42018040	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu iŋiyaan, ainɛ gɔi unrun bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛ ga tɔɔraabe. Waaru Yesu genɛ nɛ wo dɔi le, Yesu wo bɛrɛ selumaa:
42018041	«Maa u dɛi kijɛ kanran ga u ibɛ gɔ ingei?» Ainɛ gɔ saa: «Mu Baŋa, pilemu ye, giri mu iyemɔ.»
42018042	Yesu saa gi: «U giri pilemu iye, gagawu uwɔ ui bajamaati.»
42018043	Ainɛ gɔ ginsɛsai sɛɛu giri iyeube. Wo Amai birɛpoo tagau, Yesu onu nɛ dimiyaanbe. Inɛw kulɔ gɔ wogɔ iyaa, Amai sɔmɔubɛin.
42019001	Yesu, Jeriko ana nɛ yowaa kɛjaa galaube.
42019002	Ainɛ turu, boi womɔ Jase gɛɛbɛin gɔ kɔɔ nɛ yabe. Wo sɛgu yabanw kuu baŋa turui bee. Iyaa, arusɛgɛ gaai yasɛbe.
42019003	Wo Yesui aai ma iye ye jugɔ ibɛi bee. Nɛɛ mɔɔnu gɔ dɛi, iyaa wo inɛ dumii bee dɛi, Yesui iye bɛɛbele.
42019004	Kaa Yesu, gaa na turu doɲu nɛ galaun jaan bee. Kɔɔ dɛi, wo giru go jɔbaa yaa, Yesu iye ga, gaa na kɔɔ kuu nɛ ulaabe.
42019005	Yesu, waaru Jase yalu bee gɔ nɛ wo dɔi le, dogiyaa yɛnaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Jase, u ɔgiri sugo. Sabu mu iye ginrun uwɔ nɛ ginrun sugo mu sugoun jaain wɔɔ.»
42019006	Kɔɔ waaru le Jase ɔgu sugaa, wo kinɛ ɛɛli le ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ Yesui sɛgɛraabe.
42019007	Inɛw kijɛ kɔɔ waaru be iye le, guguun gunwaan kijɛ be gi: «Wo ainɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ ginrun nɛ sugaa wɔɔ.»
42019008	Kaa Jase ingelaa, kijɛ gi: «Mu Baŋa, yɛnɛ, mu arusɛgɛ ma pɛjɛrɛ turu gɔ dɛgugunw bɛrɛ ohobodɔn. Iyaa inɛw bɛrɛ nabara le kijɛ mu kanrun puu bɛrɛ, wogɔ sɔɔrɔ nai obodɔn.»
42019009	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «Iye yayabu gɔ ginrun gonɔ ɔn nɛ yowaai. Sabu ainɛ ɔn yaa, woi Abarahamu ii tɔitɔii.
42019010	Sabu Inɛ Aini gɔ, inɛw manaa wɔin gɔbe dɛnaa ye yabai wɛi.»
42019011	Inɛw, Yesu sɔɔ sɔɔbe gɔ keŋiyɛunbɛin. Yesu, kɔɔ waaru le Jerusalɛmu ana le bɛrii bee dɛi, inɛw ajubu nɛ Ama diinɛ gɔ kowɛɛdo ga bɛin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Yesu sɔɔ sɔɔu gɛlɛu, taanrinyɛn turu be bɛrɛ daanbe.
42019012	Kunrin, kijɛ wo gi: «Ɔgɔinɛ ii turu yabe. Wo gana wage nɛ, unruin ɔgɔ daanamaa ye, pilemu wɛɛdɔn ga yai.
42019013	Kɔɔ gin’ wo yaamɔ nɛ birɛbirɛnw womɔ, inɛw pɛlu boonaa, kange buudu pɛlu be tuturu numɔ nɛ kunaa, be le kijɛ wo gi: ‘Pilemu ye mu wɛɛido baa, e wogɔ le tɔŋu tɔŋɔi.’
42019014	Kaa tɔgu womɔ inɛw gɔbe woi ibiliyaa, be onu womɔ nɛ inɛw tiyaa, kijɛ be gi: ‘Emɛ ainɛ ɔin ɔgɔnɛ emɛ biyɛ ga ibɛlain.’
42019015	«Kaa ɔgɔ woi daani onu nɛ, waaru pilemaa wo wɛi le, be tuturu puu tɔŋu tɔŋaa, aŋai tinɛ be bɛi gɔ jugɔ ga, wo birɛbirɛnw bɛrɛ buudu wo gamulu gɔbei boonɔmaa jɛɛlaabe.
42019016	Pɔlɔ baŋa wiyaa, ɔn gin’ gi: ‘Mu baŋa, kange buudu uwɔ gɔ, pɛlu waja tinɛ biyaajɛ.’
42019017	Wo baŋa saa gi: ‘Ɛjii wɔɔ. U birɛbirɛnɛ ɛjui. Nɛɛ, u kijɛ dagi nɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai biyaabeu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ana diyɛ pɛlu kuu baŋai biyɛ.’
42019018	«Iyaa, birɛbirɛnɛ lɛiye gɔ wiyaa, kijɛ gi: ‘Mu baŋa, kange buudu uwɔ gɔ, numɔrɔn waja tinɛ biyaajɛ.’
42019019	Wo baŋa gɔ aŋa womɔ saa gi: ‘U kanran, ana diyɛ numɔrɔn kuu baŋai biyɛ.’
42019020	«Kɔɔ onu nɛ birɛbirɛnɛ waja wiyaa, kijɛ gi: ‘Mu baŋa, kange buudu uwɔ gɔ unwɔ. Mu woi sɔi nɛ munaa gɛlɛbɔn.
42019021	Ui inɛ nawin dɛi mu liyaaun. U kijɛ duunɔlu u wɔɔ gɔ jejeɲɛjɛu, iyaa kijɛ u tɔɔlu gɔi gɛgɛlɛjɛu.’
42019022	Wo baŋa gɔ saa gi: ‘Aŋa sɛɛrɛ uwɔ le kɛukɛu mu saliyɛ uwɔ kikirɛdɔn. Birɛbirɛnɛ mɔɲu! Mui inɛ nawin, kijɛ mu duunɔlu gɔ jejeɲɛjɔn, iyaa, kijɛ mu tɔɔlu gɔi gɛgɛlɛjɔn ga u igii beu.
42019023	U inge dɛi kange buudu ma kɛɛlɛ tɔŋutɔŋɔw numɔ nɛ kunɔlu kanrun ma? Kunrin waaru pilemaa mu wiyaa le, buudu gɔ tinɛ womɔ le yayababɔn.’
42019024	Kɔɔ gin’ kuu baŋa gɔ inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gi: ‘E kange buudu wo sɛɛ gɔ wo bɛrɛ ɛlɛ ye, pɛlu sɛɛ baŋa bɛrɛ oboi.’
42019025	Inɛw gɔbe saa gin: ‘Emɛ baŋa, wo kange buudu pɛlu baa yasɛ!’
42019026	Wo saa: ‘Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛ kijɛ sɛɛ bɛrɛ, baraa ye ohobodɛin. Kaa, inɛ kijɛ sɛlɛ gɔ, gaila wo sɛɛ gɔ yaa wo bɛrɛ ɛhɛlɛdɛin.
42019027	Nɛɛ, jaŋuw ma gɔbe, inɛw mui ɔgɔnɛ bemɛ biyɛ ga yabanɛ gɔbe, bei ɔn nɛ jɛɛlu ye, giru ma nɛ sɛnwɛin.’ »
42019028	Kɔɔ gin’ be le sɔwaatiyaa, Yesu Jerusalɛmu yaa ga mɔɔnu gɔ giru nɛ yowaabe.
42019029	Wo waaru tetemɛ Oliwe gɛɛɲu gɔ sibɛ go, Bɛtupaje ana lee, Betani ana lee wo bɛruni le, wo jaŋu unrunw womɔ lɛi, giru bemɛ nɛ tiiu,
42019030	be le kijɛ wo gi: «Giru ebe nɛ ana kowɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ yaai. Kɔɔ nɛ dɔwaajɛi ye, jandulu borogo kuu womɔ nɛ inɛ yaŋiyɛntɛlu turu wo kɔmɔnu, e tɛtɛmɛdei. E woi kɔmɔlaajɛi ye, ɔn nɛ jɛɛlɛi.
42019031	Inɛ turu e bɛrɛ selumaa, ebaa inge dɛi jandulu gɔi kɔmɔlɔjɛi ma giyaajɛ ye, e Inɛw Baŋa kai yasɛ gɛɛi.»
42019032	Inɛw tiin gɔbe yaa, Yesu bana sɔi gin’ tee tɛmaabɛin.
42019033	Jandulu borogo gɔ kɔmɔlɔu be wɔu, jandulu bɛɛnw gɔbe bemaa inge dɛi jandulu borogo kɔɔi kɔmɔlɔuwɔin ma selumi.
42019034	Be saa, Inɛw Baŋa kai yasɛ dɛi gin.
42019035	Be kɔɔ gin’ jandulu gɔi Yesu bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabɛin. Be sɔi bemɛ jandulu gɔ kuu nɛ jabaa, Yesui kuu gɔ nɛ yaŋiyɛnmaabɛin.
42019036	Yesu wɛɛu wo wɔu, inɛw, sɔi bemɛ oju gɔ nɛ abaraubɛin.
42019037	Waaru Yesu, Jerusalɛmu le wo bɛruni le, Oliwe tetemɛ jajabu yalu susugi gɔ nɛ waaru wo dɔi le, Yesu jaŋu unrunw mɔɔnu joo gɔ, taanrinyɛn be iyaabe gɔbe puu dɛi, be kinɛ ɛɛlu lee, mii diyɛ lee Ama boi sɔmɔu,
42019038	kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama boi le ɔgɔnɛ wɛɛjɛ gɔ, duba wo le biyɛmɔ. Alagala nɛ jamu biyɛmɔ. Daa go alagala nɛ baba gɔ Ama mɔi biyɛmɔ.»
42019039	Parisiɛnbe gamuu, mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ tobɛin gɔbe, kijɛ Yesu le be gi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, u jaŋu unrunw uwɔ gɔbei ganwan.»
42019040	Kaa Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw ɔnbe kelemu biyaain ye, tibu gɔbei kɔun kɔnwɔndɛin.»
42019041	Waaru Jerusalɛmu wo bɛruni le, ana gɔi iyaa, Yesu wo dɛi sɔmiyaan,
42019042	kijɛ wo gi: «U kanran, iye bai ɔn le kijɛ kanrun ye jamu u bɛɛido gɔ igii beu ye koi bee. Kaa, kanɛ kijɛ kɔɔ giru uwɔ nɛ babaŋa.
42019043	Kaa bai u dɛi yawɛɛjɛ, jaŋuw uwɔbe sibɛ uwɔ puu gɔgɔŋɔdɛin. Be ana gɔ nɛ inɛ yoomɔidenɛ, inɛ goomɔidenɛ. Iyaa, sibɛ uwɔ wooi nɛ inɛw u le jaiyɛ ga wɛwɛɛdɛin.
42019044	Be ui lee, unrunw uwɔ u nɛ toin gɔbe lee sɛɛu gagajadɛin. Be u nɛ tibu tunmɔ kuu nɛ timɛ ye pajaidenɛ. Sabu u bai Ama ui yɛnɛi wɛi gɔ jugɔlu.»
42019045	Yesu, waaru Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ wo yoi le, inɛw dɔnrun dɔnrɔnw gɔbei nanaa goonɔu,
42019046	be le kijɛ gi: «Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “Ginrun ma gɔ, amagɛɛn yalui biyɛdo.” Kaa e kai, gugunyɔnw kɔmɔi bojaa sɛi.»
42019047	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu, bai puu Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ inɛwin deereube. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, inɛw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, woi daa ga dɛnɛubɛin.
42019048	Kaa be bana wogɔ kanranɲu bɛɛnɛ. Sabu inɛw gɔbe puu Yesu sɔɔ gɔ ɛjii keŋiyɛunbɛin.
42020001	Kɔɔ gin’ bai turu Yesu, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ deeru deereu, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagau wo wɔu, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe lee kowiyaa,
42020002	wo bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Kijɛ inge uwɔ dɛi u kijɛ ɔnbe kanraunwɔu? Inɛ aa u bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaa, uwaa kijɛ ɔnbe kanran gi ma emɛ bɛrɛ taga.»
42020003	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saau, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu kanran, selumu turu ɔn sai e bɛrɛ selumɛdɔn. Jan womaa batise kanran ga, Ama woi tii ma, inɛw woi tii? Wogɔ mu bɛrɛ tagai.»
42020005	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ bei selumaa wo kanran, be tunmɔ le sɔwaa ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Emɛ Ama woi tii giyaaɲu ye, wo emaa inge dɛi sɔɔ womɔ le gawanɛ kanrin ma gɛɛdo.
42020006	Kaa, iyaa emɛ inɛw woi tii gin ye, inɛw puu tibu le emi kakamadɛin. Sabu inɛw puu Jain inɛ Ama titiyainɛ ga gawaa bɛin.»
42020007	Be kɔɔ gin’ saa, unrunbe inin gin.
42020008	Yesu yaa aŋa bemɛ saa, unrun kanran gɔnrɔn le kijɛ ɔnbe unrun kanranjɛ gɔ sɔɔidolɔn gi.
42020009	Yesu, inɛw bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn ɔn daan, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ainɛ turu, resɛn sadiŋɛ yegeraa, resɛn yibaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo resɛn birɛbirɛnw le aaraa, sadiŋɛ gɔ be bɛrɛ gawaraatiyaa, wo gowaa ana yaa tanwaanbe.
42020010	Resɛn kɔɔɲu waaru wo dɔwaa, sadiŋɛ baŋa gɔ, birɛbirɛnɛ unrunmɔ turu goonaa, resɛn birɛbirɛnw gɔbe bɛrɛ tiyaa, bemaa resɛn unrunmɔ kuru obo tii gi. Kaa inɛw gɔbe woi aa lagaa, numɔ ije le pilemaa tiyaabɛin.
42020011	Iyaa sadiŋɛ baŋa, birɛbirɛnɛ waja goonaa tiyaabe. Kaa inɛw gɔbe kɔɔbaŋai lagaa, woi duyaa, numɔ ije le woi digaa tiyaabɛin.
42020012	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo iyaa inɛ taaniye gɔ tiyaabe. Kaa be woi barumu kanraantiyaa, bain go woi kamaa gooni.
42020013	Kɔɔ onu nɛ sadiŋɛ baŋa gɔ gi: ‘Mu nɛɛ yani kanrandɔn ma? Mu aini ibɛ ma gɔi titiidɔn. Ajubu ma nɛ, be woi kai bababadɛin.’
42020014	Kaa resɛn birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, aini gɔ wɛɛu wo wɔu iyaa, be tunmɔ le aaraa, ɔn gin’ sɔin: ‘Ɔn aini kɛn balanɛ gɔi. Sadiŋɛ gɔ emɛi biyɛ ga emɛ woi daamɔi.’
42020015	Be kɔɔ gin’ aini gɔi sadiŋɛ gɔ nɛ biɲaa goonaa daabɛin. «Nɛɛ, sadiŋɛ baŋa gɔ wo be bɛrɛ inge kanrando?
42020016	Wo wiyaai ye, resɛn birɛbirɛnw kɔɔbei daatiyaa ye, sadiŋɛ unrunmɔ inɛw waja bɛrɛ gagawarado.» Inɛw gɔbe waaru kɔɔ be ɛgu le, kijɛ be gi: «Ama kɔɔ asuu biyɛmɔnɔu!»
42020017	Kaa, Yesu bei yɛnaa be le ɔn gin’ gi: «Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu ɔn tiyɛ gɔ ingei? “Ginrun ujɔnw tibu kamaa pajin gɔ, tibu wogɔ, ginrun sibɛ tibu gɔ woi bii.”
42020018	Tibu kɔɔ le inɛ tomiyaan numaa ye, dɔdɔrɔ womɔ jɔjɔgɔdo. Nɛɛ, tibu gɔi, inɛ gɔ kuu nɛ sugu ye, woi gɛjɛ ye punau tanugado.»
42020019	Ama tɔɔru deerenw lee, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw lee, waaru wogɔ le womaa unrunbe dɛi taanrinyɛn kɔɔ dain ga jugaabɛin dɛi, woi aa ga bana dɛnɛubɛin. Kaa be mɔɔnu gɔ liyaain.
42020020	Be Yesui seberei tɔlaabɛin. Kunrin be inɛw tebutebenw, unrunbei inɛw teitai wɔin gin’ bojaa, Yesu bɛrɛ tiyaabɛin. Be Yesu sɔɔ sɔɔido gɔ le digɛnu woi sɛmɛginɛ numɔ nɛ kunɔ ibɛɛ bɛin.
42020021	Kɔɔ gin’ be selumu ɔn wo bɛrɛ selumi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, emɛ igii wɔin, u sɔɔ uwɔ nɛ lee, deeru uwɔ nɛ lee teitai wɔu. U inɛw kabu kunɔɔlɛu. Kaa u Ama oju bana dimiyɛun jaan gɔ daii deerejɛu.
42020022	Nɛɛ, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ bɛrɛ, sɛgu emɛ tujɔun jaain wɔɔ ma jaanla?»
42020023	Kaa Yesu, ajubu mɔɲu bemɛ jugaabe gɔ digɛu, be le kijɛ wo gi:
42020024	«E sarudu buudu turu mu bɛrɛ jɛɛlu yɛnɛmɔi. Buudu gɔ nɛ, kuu yegeraa too gɔ lee, boi tɔŋaa wɔɔ gɔ lee aa mɔi?» Inɛw gɔbe saa, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ mɔi gin.
42020025	Yesu saa gi: «Kɔɔi biyaa ye, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ mɔi kijɛ wɔɔ gɔ, wo bɛrɛ oboi. Kijɛ Ama mɔi wɔɔ gɔ, Ama bɛrɛ oboi.»
42020026	Be Yesui, sɔɔ inɛw giru nɛ wo sɔɔbe le digɛu bana aaun bɛɛnɛ. Kaa aŋasaara womɔ gɔ dɛi, be bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaabe. Be sɔɔ turu kanran sɔɔnɛ.
42020027	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Saduseyɛnbe gamuu, inɛw bulogu wɔlɔ gɛɛnw gɔbe, Yesui wiyaa tɛmi.
42020028	Be selumu ɔn Yesu bɛrɛ selumi: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, Tɔɔru dɔn gɔ nɛ Mɔise emɛ dɛi ɔn gin’ tɔŋaa paju: “Ainɛ turu yaanran jɛyaa, yaanran kɔɔ le ii bɛɛlu go yinwaain biyaai ye, wo bainɛ gɔ yapanunɛ gɔ jeɲɛ ye ii naraan ye, inɛ yinwɛnnɛ gɔ bɛrɛ tɔgu wo tɔgɔun jaain wɔɔ.”
42020029	Kunrin anranw sɔi yabɛin. Be wooi ba turu, na turu. Delenɛ gɔ yaanran jeɲaa, ii bɛɛlu wɔu yinwaain.
42020030	Wo suŋɔrɔn gɔ yapanunɛ gɔ jeɲu.
42020031	Iyaa ainɛ taaniye gɔ yaa, yapanunɛ gɔi jeɲaabe. Kɔɔ gin’, anranw sɔi gɔ puu dinrɛn le dinrɛn le yapanunɛ gɔ jeɲaa, ii bɛɛlu wɔu yinwaain.
42020032	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, yaanran gɔ kanran wiyaa yinwaain.
42020033	Nɛɛ, anranw sɔi gɔ puu yaanran gɔi jeɲaabɛin gɔ digɛu, yiun bulogu bai gɔ le, yaanran gɔ aa mɔi biyɛdo?»
42020034	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa gi: «Yaanw jeɲɛw gɔbe lee, igɛ ɛɛnw gɔbe lee, wogɔ aduna ɔn inɛw gɔbei.
42020035	Kaa inɛw bulogu gɔ nɛ lee, aduna wɛɛido gɔ nɛ lee biyɛun dagaa ga lugaaɲu gɔbe, anranw lee, yaanw lee tunmɔ jeɲɛidenɛ.
42020036	Bei waja yinwɛindolo. Sabu be mɛlɛnkɛbe gin’ bibiyɛdɛin. Bei Ama unrunwin. Sabu be yiun nɛ bulaain.
42020037	Yiunbe bubulodɛin gɔ, Mɔise wogɔ daii sɔwaabe. Uriye turu yaun tɛgɛbele ga yalu tɔŋɔ gɔ nɛ, Mɔise Inɛw Baŋa womaa Abarahamu Amai, Isaka Amai, iyaa Jakɔbu Amai gi.»
42020038	Yesu iyaa baraa gi: «Ama, inɛw yiunbe Amai laa, kaa inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin Amai. Sabu Ama nɛ, inɛw womɔ wooi ɔnmɔi wɔin.»
42020039	Ama tɔɔru deerenw gamuu saa gin: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, aŋasaara uwɔ gɔ ɛjii wɔɔ.»
42020040	Kunrin, be waja Yesu bɛrɛ selumu turu kanran selumɛ ga daariyɛnɛ.
42020041	Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ, yani inɛw woi Dawide tiruwɛnɛi gɛɛuwɔin ma?
42020042	Sabu Dawide kuu womɔ le Sɔmu dɔn nɛ kijɛ gi: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama, Inɛw Baŋa ma le ɔn gin’ gi: ‘Jaŋuw uwɔ gɔbe gɔnrɔn ye, kubɔ uwɔ doɲu nɛ yai mu kunɔido baa, uwɔ numɔ iin ma sibɛ nɛ wɛɛ dɛinyɛn.’”
42020044	Kɔɔ gin’ Dawide, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ Inɛw Baŋai gi. Nɛɛ, Inɛw Baŋa womɔ wo tiruwɛnɛi yani bii bɛɛjɛ?»
42020045	Inɛw gɔ puu woi keŋiyɛun be wɔu, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ gɔbe le kijɛ gi:
42020046	«Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe dɛi kuu ebe kajubai. Be arugoi diyɛ diyɛ kunɔ ye gɔŋɔlɔ ga be bɛrɛ saii ɛjii wɔɔ. Iyaa be taibe nɛ inɛw bei poonɔ ga be bɛrɛ ɛjii wɔɔ. Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yalu inɛw bei iyeɲu nɛ dɛinyɛn lee, jaa diyɛ yalu nɛ bei boonaa ye, inɛw diyɛnw yalu nɛ dɛinyɛn lee, be wogɔi dɛnɛɲu.
42020047	Inɛw kɔɔbe yapanuw kijɛ sɛɛ puu ɛlɛjɛɛɲu. Kaa unrunbei inɛw ɛjubei tagaradɛin giye, be amagɛɛn pala pala gɛɛnɲu. Be tujɔ mɔɲu be le jaan gɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin.»
42021001	Yesu waaru kuu jɛiin kanrun le, wo ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe wɛi wɛi ye, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ yalu sin obu kunɔɲu gɔ nɛ sin obu bemɛ kunɔubɛin ga iyaabe.
42021002	Iyaa, yapanunɛ dɛguginɛ turu yaa wiyaa, buudu saa wo dagi gɔ, buudu ii lɛi kunɔu wo wɔu, Yesu iyaabe.
42021003	Wo saa gi: «Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, yapanunɛ dɛguginɛ kɔɔ, inɛw wajunw puu dɛi sigɛ buudu kunu.
42021004	Sabu inɛw wajunw gɔbe puu buudu sigɛ bemɛi jɛɛlaa kuni. Kaa yaanran kɔɔ, dɛgu womɔ le buudu wo kunu gɔi laa ye, buudu waja pana ɛbɛɲu sɛlɛ.»
42021005	Inɛw gamuu Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ aŋai tibu ɛju ɛju le ujaaɲu gɔ lee, sin obu kijɛbe le aŋai saŋaraanɲu gɔ lee sɔɔ sɔɔubɛin. Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu saa gi:
42021006	«Bai yawɛɛjɛ, kijɛ e yɛnɛjɛ ɔnbe, tibu, tibu waja kuu nɛ wo timɛnu iyemɔidolo. Puu damatiidɛin.»
42021007	Kaa be wo bɛrɛ selumaa gin: «Jaŋudeerenɛ, sɔɔ kanɛ u sɔi gɔ waaru inge le biyɛdo? Iyaa waaru gɔ dɔwaai ga, sɛɛrɛ inge le jugɔmɔdo?»
42021008	Yesu saa gi: «Kuu ebe kajubai, ei lelemɔnɔugi. Sabu inɛw joo boi ma kunɔ ye wɛwɛɛdɛin. Be, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ unrunbei gɛɛdɛin. Be iyaa waaru gɔ dɔwaai gɛɛdɛin. E bei dimiyɛnnɔugi.
42021009	Kɔmɔ siɲɛ ma, murutu ma sɔɔ ɛgaajɛi ye, e bimili ye biyɛnɔugi. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe laa biyɛ ga waajibi. Kaa ginsɛsai, sɔɔ kɔɔbe onu nɛ aduna dogogu gɔi laa.»
42021010	Yesu iyaa be le kijɛ gi: «Tɔgu turu, tɔgu waja le jajaiyɛdo. Laamu, laamu waja le jajaiyɛdo.
42021011	Minɛjigu diyɛ diyɛ bibiyɛdo. Aduna sibɛ dɛin dɛin nɛ giyɛ lee, jaabu lee kijɛ inɛi liirɛmu lee, alagala goi ye sɛɛrɛ diyɛbe lee bibiyɛdo.
42021012	Kaa kɔɔbe biyɛmɔ nɛ, ei ahaadɛin, ei tɔtɔɔɲɔdɛin. Saliyɛ nɛ ei jɛyaa ga, Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ ei ahaadɛin. Ei kaju nɛ kukunɔdɛin. Boi ma le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, inɛw ɔgɔnw lee, sɛmɛgunw lee bɛrɛ, ei jɛyayaadɛin.
42021013	Kaa e wogɔ le digɛnu sɛɛrɛ ma goowin bibiyɛdei.
42021014	Sɔɔ ɔn kinɛ ebe nɛ kunɔi: Saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ yaa ye, e sɔɔ inge sɔɔdei ma, waaru gɔ dɔɔmɔ nɛ ajubanɔugi.
42021015	Sabu mu e bɛrɛ sɔɔ lee, hakilɛ lee ohobodɔn. Jaŋuw ebe logoro nɛ, inɛ turu kanran wogɔ le jiiru bɛɛidolo, inɛ turu kanran wogɔ sɔnu goonu bɛɛidolo.
42021016	Halu, ei naranw lee, e ba unrunw lee, e maranw lee, e anrungebe kanran, numɔ nɛ ei kukunɔdɛin. Be logoro ebe nɛ joo dadaadɛin.
42021017	Boi ma le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, inɛw puu ei ihibiliyɛdɛin.
42021018	Kaa halu kukuli ebe koturu kanran manaidolo.
42021019	E muyɔn ebe le ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ bɛbɛɛdei.
42021020	«Waaru kɔmɔ numɔbe Jerusalɛmu ana gɔ gɔŋaa be wɔun e iyaajɛ, ana gɔ jɔgɔidɛin waaru bɛruniyaain ga e jugi biyɛi.
42021021	Kɔɔ waaru le, Judea gana nɛ inɛw toin gɔbe, be jɔbɔ ye, kokoobe sibɛ go be yaaun jaain wɔɔ. Kunrin inɛw Jerusalɛmu ana kɔlɔ nɛ toin gɔbe, jɔbɔ ye be gooun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa inɛw olu go wɔin gɔbe ana kɔlɔ nɛ yooun jaanla.
42021022	Sabu kijɛ Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gɔ puu kibe ga, bai wogɔ duguru goi baii biyɛdo.
42021023	Bai kɔɔbe le yabɛrɛgunw lee, yaanw unrunw aramɔw lee bɛrɛ mɔɲi biyɛdo. Sabu gana gɔ nɛ yanwan diyɛ bibiyɛdo. Ama kinɛbanrun, tɔgu kɔɔ inɛw kuu nɛ susugodo.
42021024	Polukaaba le inɛw kɔɔbei dadaadɛin. Gana wooi nɛ bei gunɔ jɛyaadɛin. Diinɛ bemɛ galaido baa, tɔgu wajabe inɛw wɛɛ ye Jerusalɛmui gɔnrɔn ye kubɔ le namanu biyɛdɛin.»
42021025	«Nai nɛ lee, iyepilu nɛ lee, tolobe nɛ lee sɛɛrɛ bibiyɛdo. Minɛ nɛ, gana inɛw, kinɛ manu diyɛ le bibiyɛdɛin. Be nɛudii lee, diigunu lee siɲɛ diyɛ gɔ dɛi saii bibimiliyedɛin.
42021026	Aduna yalu wooi nɛ sɔɔ biyɛido ajubu dɛi inɛw ɛjii kinwɛn ye yinwɛndɛin giye biyɛdɛin. Sabu alagala kijɛ paŋagunw gɔbe puu jijigedɛin.
42021027	Inɛ Aini gɔ, anrankulumɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn lee, dooro diyɛ lee wo wɛɛnu, ihiyemɔdo.
42021028	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe biyɛi tɔlaa ye, kɔɔ waaru le e kinɛ ɛɛli le kuu jeɲɛi, anrangaju le biyɛi, sabu kuu ebe goonu bai gɔ bɛruniyaain.»
42021029	Yesu, kɔɔ onu nɛ be bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn turu daan, kijɛ be le wo gi: «E gaa nabe lee, tiun wajunw gɔbe puu lee yɛnɛi.
42021030	Waaru numɔ ii bemɛ liyɛ dɔgɔi tɔlaaɲu e kuu ebe le wogɔ iyaajɛi ye, jinrɛn dɔwaai ga jujugɔdei.
42021031	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ kɔɔbe wɛɛu be wɔu waaru e iyaajɛ, Ama diinɛ gɔ bɛrii wɔɔ ga jugi biyɛi.
42021032	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, iye inɛw gɔbe logoro nɛ, gamuu, be yinwɛnmɔ nɛ, sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu bibiyɛdo.
42021033	Alagala lee, minɛ lee gagaladɛin, kaa sɔɔ mabe asuu galaidenɛ.»
42021034	«Kɔɔ dɛi e kuu ebe kajubai! E jaa gaa kayi lee, kɔɲɔ nɔi bimili lee, aduna sɔɔ jiire lee le kinɛ ebe nɛ joonɔ ye biyɛnɔugi. Kɔɔi laa ye, Inɛ Aini gɔ bai wɛɛido ɔgu kɛu soo sɛlɛ ebe nɛ wɛɛdo,
42021035	pɛnrɛn gin’ biyɛdo. Sabu bai wogɔ aduna nɛ inɛw wɔin wooi kuu nɛ kubɔ turu sugodo.
42021036	Ebaa kijɛ wɛɛido wooi nɛ, gɔnrɔn ɛli gooɲu siyɛ ga, ebaa, Inɛ Aini gɔ giru nɛ iŋi bɛɛ ga, e giri yeiyenɔugi. Iyaa waaru wooi amagɛɛn le biyɛi.»
42021037	Kunrin, aga waaru le, Yesu, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ inɛwin deereube. Kaa digɛ wo gowaa ye, Oliwe tetemɛ gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ yai ye diinyɛunbe.
42021038	Agapaali, inɛw gɔbe wooi Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ, sɔɔ womɔ keŋiyɛn ga wɛɛubɛin.
42022001	Buru kijɛ pidemu tolo janwan gɔ, Taŋagalu janwan gɛɛɲu gɔ bai gɔ bɛruniyɛunbe.
42022002	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, dabulu yagɔ tɔgu le Yesui ai ye daadɛin ma dɛi, bana dɛnɛubɛin. Kaa be mɔɔnu gɔ liliyɛbɛin.
42022003	Setanu, kɔɔ gin’ Judasu, boi womɔ Isukariɔte gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ yowaabe. Judasu kɔɔ Yesu jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe logoro nɛ turu gɔ woi.
42022004	Wo gowaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ garidu kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee yaa tɛmaa, be le bana Yesui numɔ bemɛ nɛ wo kunɔido sɔɔ sɔwaabe.
42022005	Waaru sɔɔ kɔɔ be ɛgu le, kinɛ bemɛ gaai aabe. Be unrunbe wo bɛrɛ kɛɛlɛ ohobodɛin ga wo le pui jeɲaabɛin.
42022006	Judasu, wogɔ yabaa, inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ soo sɛlɛ be wɔnu, bana Yesui numɔ bemɛ nɛ wo kunɔido dɛnɛube.
42022007	Kɔɔ gin’ buru kijɛ pidemu tolo janwan gɔ, Taŋagalu pana dɛi peju ii bai sɛnwɛnɲu gɔ wiyaa dɔwaai.
42022008	Yesu, Piɛru lee, Jan lee goonaa tiyaa, be le ɔn gin’ gi: «E, emɛ dɛi Taŋagalu pana emaa kaya ga, wogɔ yegerei yaai.»
42022009	Be Yesu aŋa saa gin: «U emaa wogɔ yalu yagɔ nɛ yegere ga wɔu?»
42022010	Yesu saa, be le kijɛ gi: «Yɛnɛi, waaru ana kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ yaa e yowaajɛ, e ainɛ turu toroi le dii duiyaa wo wɛɛnu e wooi sɛsɛgɛrɛdo. Ginrun wo yooido gɔ nɛ, wo le digi yoi.
42022011	Ginrun baŋa gɔ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛi: ‘Jaŋudeerenɛ emɛ uwaa, unrun, jaŋu unrunw unrunmɔ le Taŋagalu pana deun nɛ unrunbe kayaido gɔ yago wɔɔ ma gi.’
42022012	Ginrun baŋa gɔ, ginrun sɔɔrɔ turu nɛ deun diyɛ e bɛrɛ tatagarado. Deun gɔ nɛ kijɛ kai emɛ sɛɛ puu e tɛtɛmɛdei. E wogɔ nɛ Taŋagalu pana yeguru yegerei.»
42022013	Waaru jaŋu unrunw lɛi gɔbe ana kɔlɔ nɛ be yai le, bana bei tagin gin’ yintɛmi. Be kɔɔ gin’ Taŋagalu pana yeguru yegeraabɛin.
42022014	Jaa kayaun waaru wo dɔwaa, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu womɔbe le jaa kaya ga dɛinyaanbe.
42022015	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «Ɔɲɛ nɛ mu yoomɔ nɛ, Taŋagalu janwan ɔn e le mɔrin ye kaya ga kinɛ ma nɛ ɛjii daariyaabɔn.
42022016	Sabu, Ama diinɛ nɛ Taŋagalu pana tiyɛ gɔ kibeido baa, mu waja Taŋagalu pana kayaidolɔn.»
42022017	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu resɛndii ilɛ gɔ jeɲaa, Amai birɛpoo tagaatiyaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Yabai, e wooi gamulu ye nɔɔi.
42022018	Iye galaai ye, Ama diinɛ wɛɛido baa, mu resɛndii ilɛ asuu nɔɔidolɔn.»
42022019	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo buru jeɲaa, Amai birɛpoo tagaatiyaa, kabalaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe bɛrɛ obou kijɛ wo gi: «Ɔn goju mai, [e dɛi obin gɔ woi. Mui ajuba ga kunrin kanrain.»
42022020	Pana kayaajiyaa, wo kɔɔ gin’ resɛndii ilɛ gɔ jeɲaa, be bɛrɛ obou, ɔn gin’ gi: «Resɛndii ilɛ ɔn Ama aaru kanai, ili ma e dɛi togiyeido gɔ le aaru kunin gɔ woi.]
42022021	Kaa yɛnɛi! Inɛ mui jamaido gɔ, baɲa nɛ mu le numɔ kunɔuwɔ.
42022022	Inɛ Aini gɔ, Ama bana wo dɛi wo aaraabe gin’, waajibi wo yiyinwɛndo. Kaa inɛ woi numɔ nɛ kunɔido gɔ bɔnrɔn wo le yɔɔ.»
42022023	Kɔɔ onu nɛ be, logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛ aa wogɔ kanrando ma ga, tunmɔi selumɛubɛin.
42022024	Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe logoro nɛ, jaŋu ii yagɔi wajunw gɔbe dɛi sigɛ lugaa sɛin ma jugɔ dɛi, jiiru diyɛ ingelaabe.
42022025	Kaa Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe, inɛw bemɛ kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn yasin. Iyaa inɛw laamu kanranw gɔbe, inɛw, bei ɛju kanranwin gɛgɛɛɲu.
42022026	Kaa e sibɛ go kunrin biyɛmɔnɔugi. Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ wo sigɛ gɔ, unruin dagunɛ gin’ bojo. Iyaa inɛ kuu baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, birɛbirɛnɛ gin’ wo biyɛmɔ.
42022027	Sabu inɛ dɛinyaan jaa kayau wɔɔ lee, inɛ jaa jeɲu jɛɛlɛnɛ gɔ lee, be lɛi logoro nɛ kuu baŋa gɔ aai? Inɛ jaa kayau daan gɔi laa ma? Kaa, mu logoro ebe nɛ inɛ jaa jeɲu jɛɛlɛnɛ gɔ gin’ wɔun.
42022028	E kai, waaru nau ma wooi nɛ mui pajali.
42022029	Mu Ba maa laamu kanran ga, gɔnrɔn mu bɛrɛ bana wo obu gin’, mu yaa, laamu kanran ga, gɔnrɔn e bɛrɛ obouwɔn.
42022030	Kunrin e diinɛ ma nɛ mu le jaa kakayadei, mu le nɔnɔɔdei. E iyaa Yahutunw tɔgu pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe laama ga ɔgɔdɔin nɛ dɛdɛinyɛndei.»
42022031	Inɛw Baŋa kijɛ gi: «Simɔ, Simɔ, yɛnɛ, Setanu yuu gin’ ei bɛɛ ye wɛɛ ga ei selumaabe.
42022032	Kaa mu gagawu uwɔ dogonɔu ga, u dɛi Ama gɛnyaanbɔn. Kunrin, waaru pilemaa mu bɛrɛ u wiyaajɛ, jaŋu unrunw u bɔɔnw gɔbe gagawu gɔ paŋa bariyɛmɔ.»
42022033	Piɛru, Yesu le kijɛ gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, mu jiiru wɔlɔ go kaju nɛ u le yoyoodɔn. Iyaa u le yiyinwɛndɔn.»
42022034	Kaa Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Piɛru, mu u bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, iye kubɔ taanu mui inɛɛ gɛɛlu u wɔnu, ɛɲɛ kɔnwɔindolo.»
42022035	Yesu, kɔɔ onu nɛ be le kijɛ gi: «Waaru ei tiiu, ebaa kɛɛlɛ kuni ma, jɛmɛ ma, taga ma jeɲɛnɔu ga mu gɛɛbe le, e kijɛ inge kai siyaabei ma?» Be saa, unrunbe kijɛ turu kanran kai siyɛnɛ gin.
42022036	Kaa wo be le saa gi: «Nɛɛ, kanɛ, inɛ kɛɛlɛ kuni sɛɛ, wogɔ jeɲɛ. Kunrin inɛ jɛmɛ sɛɛ kanran, jɛmɛ jeɲɛ. Inɛ kijɛ kɔɔbe sɛlɛ gɔ, arugoi diyɛ womɔ dɔnraan ye, polukaaba wo ɛbɛmɔ.
42022037	Mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, sɔɔ Ama Dɔn nɛ mu dɛi tɔŋaa: “Woi mɔɲu kanrannɛ gin’ lugaabɛin” gin gɔ, sɔɔ wogɔ mu dɛi kibeun jaain wɔɔ.»
42022038	Be saa gin: «Inɛw Baŋa, polukaaba lɛi unwɔ.» Yesu saa: «Sɔɔ kɔɔ baa!»
42022039	Yesu bana pɔɔlɔ baa wo kanranjɛ gin’, wo ana gɔ pajaatiyaa, Oliwe tetemɛ gɔ nɛ yai. Jaŋu unrunw womɔ onu womɔ nɛ yadimɛbɛin.
42022040	Waaru yalu gɔ nɛ wo dɔi le, be le kijɛ wo gi: «Ebaa subɔrɔ nɛ yoonɔu ga, e amagɛɛn le biyɛi.»
42022041	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo genɛ bemɛ nɛ dɔraa gowaa, wawage gɔ tibu kamaaɲu ye yalu dɔɔido gin’ yaa, tuŋiyaan,
42022042	Ama ɔn gin’ gɛnyaanbe: «Mu Ba, u yabaajɛu ye, ɔɲɛ ɔn mu le wageniyɛnmɔ. Kaa, diŋɛ uwɔ gɔi laa ye, diŋɛ ma biyɛmɔnɔu.» [
42022043	Mɛlɛnkɛ turu wo bɛrɛ wiyaa, wo bɛrɛ paŋa obaabe.
42022044	Yesu kinɛjiun diyɛ le wɔu, Ama ɛjii gɛnyaanbe. Soo womɔ gɔ ili tegu gin’ biyaa, minɛ nɛ sugoube.]
42022045	Kɔɔ gin’ Ama gɛnyaantiyaa, ingelaa, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ pilemaa waaru wo wɛɛ le, be kinɛjiun dɛi giri yeiyaa be wɔu tɛmaabe.
42022046	Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «E inge dɛi giri yeiyeuwɔi ma? Ebaa subɔrɔ waaru le numɔnɔu ga, ingele ye Ama gɛɛin.»
42022047	Yesu sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, inɛw kulɔ wiyaa yindɔin. Ainɛ Judasu gɛɛɲu gɔ, jaŋu unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe logoro nɛ turui gɔ, inɛw kulɔ gɔi dimɛraan wo gɛlɛbe. Wo kɔɔ gin’ Yesu genɛ nɛ dɔwaa, woi amugiyaabe.
42022048	Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «Judasu, u Inɛ Aini gɔi amugiyaa poonaatiyaa, kɔɔ gin’ woi numɔ nɛ kunɔjɛu ma?»
42022049	Yesu jaŋu unrunw, wo le bɛin gɔbe, sɔɔ biyɛido gɔ iyaa, Yesu le ɔn gin’ gin: «Inɛw Baŋa, emaa polukaaba le be le jaiyɛ ma?»
42022050	Kɔɔ gin’ jaŋu unrunw gɔbe logoro nɛ turui, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ polu le tɛraa, suguru iin gɔ jabalaa goonaabe.
42022051	Kaa Yesu saa gi: «E kɔɔ gin’ pajai!» Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo ainɛ gɔ suguru tabaa, woi bajamaabe.
42022052	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ garidu kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe lee woi aa ga wiyaabɛin gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gi: «E tebutɛbɛnɛ bana aaɲu gin’ polukaaba lee, baga lee gɛliyaa wɛɛjɛi ma?
42022053	Mu bai puu, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ e le tobɔn. Kaa e mui aali. Kaa waaru ebe gɔ ɔn woi. Ɔlɔ paŋa waarui.»
42022054	Be Yesui aa, woi dimɛraan, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa ginrun nɛ jɛyaabɛin. Piɛru wagee, mɔɔnu gɔ onu nɛ yadimɛbe.
42022055	Ginrun gonɔ gɔ logoro nɛ, inɛw, yaun tanugaa, wogɔ genɛ nɛ daanbɛin. Piɛru, logoro bemɛ nɛ dɛinyaanbe.
42022056	Kaa ginrun gɔ gunɔ yaanran turu, yaun wijɛ gɔ nɛ Piɛru wo daaun iyaa, woi ɛjii yɛnɛu kijɛ wo gi: «Ainɛ ɔn kanran Yesu le bee.»
42022057	Kaa Piɛru, sɔɔ gɔ kɔri ga saa gi: «Yaanran, mu ainɛ kɔɔ inɔn.»
42022058	Siin wo kanraan, inɛ waja Piɛrui iyaa, kijɛ gi «U kanran be bɔɔnɛ turui.» Kaa Piɛru saa gi: «Ainɛ, wogɔ mui laa!»
42022059	Lɛɛrɛ turu gin’ wo galaa, inɛ waja gimaa gimaa sɔwaa gi: «Naran go, ainɛ ɔn yaa, Yesu le bee, sabu wo kanran Galile gana bɛɛnnɛi.»
42022060	Kaa, Piɛru kijɛ gi: «Hei, ainɛ! Mu sɔɔ u gɛɛjɛ gɔ inɔn.» Piɛru kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔu wo gɛlɛu, waaru wogɔ le tee, ɛɲɛ kɔnwaanbe.
42022061	Inɛw Baŋa kigelemaa, Piɛrui yɛnaabe. Kɔɔ waaru le Piɛru, Inɛw Baŋa wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔi gɔi naŋaraanbe: «Iye digɛ ɛɲɛ kɔnwɔnmɔ nɛ, u kubɔ taanu mui inɛɛu ga gɛgɛɛdou.»
42022062	Piɛru, sɔɔ kɔɔ waaru wo naŋurun le bain go gowaa, ɛjii pii piyaabe.
42022063	Inɛw Yesui gɛlɛbɛin gɔbe, woi yamurinyɛnmɔubɛin. Iyaa, woi lagaubɛin.
42022064	Be girupala womɔ sɔi le kɔmaatiyaa ye, woi selumaa ye, ɔn gin’ gɛɛubɛin: «Inɛ aa ui lagu ma jugɔ bɛɛ!»
42022065	Be Yesui duyɔu, kijɛ mɔɲu joo wo dɛi gɛɛubɛin.
42022066	Baa wo yaa, Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe lee, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee tunmɔ le mɔrinyaan, Yesui badubadanw diyɛnw bemɛ giru nɛ jɛyaa yaabɛin.
42022067	Wo le kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ ui ye, emɛ bɛrɛ taga.» Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «Mui ga, e bɛrɛ tagaajɔn kanran e wogɔ le gawaidelei.
42022068	Iyaa, mu e bɛrɛ selumu selumaajɔn kanran e aŋa ma saaidelei.
42022069	Kaa, sɔɔ ɔnbe galaai ye, Inɛ Aini gɔ, Ama, gɔnrɔn baŋa numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛdɛinyɛndo.»
42022070	Be wooi puu sɔwaa gin: «Kole, Ama Aini gɔ, ui?» Yesu saa gi: «Bana e gɛɛjɛ gin’ wogɔ mui.»
42022071	Kɔɔ gin’ be saa gin: «Nɛɛ kai, sɛɛrɛ dɛnɛnu doori. Emɛ kuu emɛ le aŋa sɛɛrɛ womɔ gɔ ɛgaabɛin.»
42023001	Inɛw gɔbe puu ingelaa, be Yesui Pilate bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabɛin.
42023002	Be ɔn gin’ woi jaarai tɔlin: «Emɛ ainɛ ɔn tɔgu emɛ inɛw lelemɔu wo wɔu tɛmaabɛin. Wo Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ bɛrɛ sɛgu tujɔnɔu ga inɛw tɛŋɛuwɔ. Iyaa unruin Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔi ga, ɔgɔnɛi ga gɛɛjɛ.»
42023003	Pilate Yesui selumaa gi: «Ui Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛi ma?» Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Wogɔ u gi.»
42023004	Pilate, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, mɔɔnu gɔ lee le kijɛ gi: «Mu kai ainɛ ɔn kuu nɛ kijɛ dɛi jarugu duurɔɲu iyelun.»
42023005	Kaa be iyaa gimaa gimaa sɔwaa, kijɛ be gi: «Wo gana emɛ wooi nɛ deeru womɔ le inɛwin suurouwɔ. Galile gana nɛ tɔlaa, kanɛ yalu ɔn nɛ baa wiyaa dɔwaai.»
42023006	Pilate, waaru Galile gana boi wo ɛgu le, wo ainɛ gɔ Galile bɛɛnnɛi ma selumu.
42023007	Waaru Yesu, Ɔgɔnɛ Herɔde laamu nɛ too ga Pilate ɛgu le, wo woi Herɔde bɛrɛ tiimaabe. Herɔde, bai wogɔ Jerusalɛmu ana gɔ nɛ yatobe.
42023008	Waaru Yesui wo iye le, Herɔde kinɛ ɛjii ɛɛliyaabe. Sabu wo Yesu sɔɔ be sɔɔu ɛgaabe, iyaa, wo tanwaain, Yesui bana iyeɲu dɛnɛube. Ajubu womɔ nɛ, Yesu, giru womɔ nɛ taanrinyɛn birɛ turu bibirɛdo ga bee.
42023009	Kɔɔ dɛi Herɔde, Yesu bɛrɛ selumu joo joo selumaabe. Kaa Yesu aŋa womɔ turu kanran saalu.
42023010	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee, kɔɔ nɛ iŋiyaan, Yesui ɛjii jaaraubɛin.
42023011	Herɔde, sɔludasu unrunw womɔ gɔbe le Yesui yamurinyɛnmaabe. Woi yau kanraan, arugoi ɛju naa ɛju woi goraa, kɔɔ onu nɛ Pilate bɛrɛ woi pilemaa tiyaabe.
42023012	Herɔde lee, Pilate lee, laa inɛw jaŋuwin bɛin gɔbe, bai wogɔ, be lɛi anrungei bii.
42023013	Pilate, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, Yahutunw inɛw giru toin gɔbe lee, mɔɔnu gɔ lee, bei boonaa jɛɛlaa,
42023014	be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «E ainɛ ɔn mu bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabei, womaa inɛwin suurouwɔ gin. Kaa mu kuu ma le giru ebe nɛ wo bɛrɛ selumaabɔn. Kaa kijɛ dɛi woi jaarau e wɔɔ gɔbe sɔɔ turu kanran mu wo nɛ tɛmɛlun.
42023015	Herɔde kanran, mɔɲu wo le tɛmɛlu, sabu wo pilemaa, woi emɛ bɛrɛ tiyaabe. Yɛnɛi, kijɛ yiun wo le dagaa turu kanran wo kanranlu.
42023016	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, mu woi bɔɔniyɛn le lagamaatiyaa ye, woi paja ye yayaamɔdɔn.» [
42023017	Taŋagalu janwan wooi nɛ Pilate, kajuginɛ turu be bɛrɛ wo pajaun jaain bee.]
42023018	Be wooi kubɔ tunmɔ kɔnwaan, kijɛ be gi: «Ɔn baŋai daa ye, Barabasui emɛ bɛrɛ paja.»
42023019	Barabasu kɔɔ, ana gɔ nɛ murutu sɔɔ biyaa wo kanran, woi sɔɔ wogɔ nɛ yatobe dɛi, iyaa inɛ turu daabɛin dɛi, kaju nɛ woi kuni.
42023020	Pilate, Yesui pajaa ye yaamɔ ga kinɛ womɔ nɛ yatobe dɛi, wo iyaa, mɔɔnu gɔ le sɔɔ sɔwaabe.
42023021	Kaa mɔɔnu gɔ kɔnwaan, ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: «Woi pɛgɛ ye daa, baga nɛ woi pɛgɛ ye daa!»
42023022	Kubɔ taaniye gɔ, Pilate be bɛrɛ selumaa gi: «Kɔɔi ye, inɛ ɔn mɔɲu ingei kanrun ma? Mu kijɛ yiun wo le dagaa turu kanran wo nɛ iyelun. Kɔɔi biyaa ye, waaru woi bɔɔniyɛn le lagamaa mu tiyaajɛ onu nɛ, mu woi paja ye yayaamɔdɔn.»
42023023	Kaa be mii diyɛ le gimaa gimaa ye, Yesui pɛgɛ ye daa ga gɛɛubɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ yowaabe.
42023024	Pilate kijɛ be dɛnɛu bee gɔ kakanrandɔn gi.
42023025	Ainɛ, ana nɛ sɔɔ ingelaabe dɛi lee, inɛ daabɛin dɛi lee kaju nɛ kunaa sɛbɛin gɔ ainɛ paja ga be dɛnɛbe gɔ, woi be bɛrɛ pajaatiyaa, Pilate, bemaa diŋɛ bemɛ kanran ga Yesui numɔ bemɛ nɛ kunaabe.
42023026	Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe Yesui dimɛraan yaaubɛin. Waaru be yaabe le, be Sirɛnɛ ana ainɛ turu, boi womɔ Simɔ gɛɛbɛin gɔ, olu gowaa wɛɛu wo wɔu sɛgɛraabɛin. Be woi aa, Yesu baga jai gɔ, wo bɛrɛ duuraa, Yesu onu nɛ woi dimiyɛnmaabɛin.
42023027	Inɛw kulɔ joo Yesui dimiyaan yaaubɛin. Logoro bemɛ nɛ yaanw, Yesu dɛi pii piiun, gegeɲɛ baaubɛin.
42023028	Yesu be sibɛ go kigelemaa kijɛ gi: «Jerusalɛmu unrunw yaanw gɔbe, e kuu ma nɛ pii piinɔugi. Kaa kuu ebe dɛi lee, unrunw ebe dɛi lee piin.
42023029	Sabu yɛnɛi, bai yawɛɛjɛ, inɛw ɔn gin’ sɔɔdɛin: ‘Yaanw gunu gɔbe lee, yaanw unrunw narantɛnɛ gɔbe lee, unrunw aramɔtɛnɛ gɔbe lee, Ama be yabu.’
42023030	Inɛw kɔɔ waaru le kokoobe le ɔn gin’ sɔɔdɛin: ‘Kuu emɛ nɛ bagu sugoi.’ Iyaa, dudumu gɔbe le kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Emi dɛbɛi.’
42023031	Sabu tinrun ɔru bɛrɛ kijɛ kɔɔbe kanraunwɔin ye, tinrun maa bɛrɛ yani bibiyɛdo ma?»
42023032	Waaru tutunmɔ gɔ le, inɛw mɔɲu kanranw lɛi yaa, Yesu le baraa ye bei daa ga dimɛraan yaaubɛin.
42023033	Yalu, boi gɔ Kuu Togolo gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ waaru be dɔi le, Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe, Yesui kɔɔ nɛ inɛw lɛi mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe le baga jaibe nɛ pɛgaabɛin. Mɔɲu kanrannɛ turu gɔ, Yesu numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ pɛgaabɛin. Lɛiye gɔ numɔ nana womɔ sibɛ nɛ pɛgaabɛin.
42023034	Yesu, Ama bɛrɛ kijɛ gi: «Ba, u bei yaabu kanran, sabu be kijɛ be kanranjɛ gɔ paamaanɛ.» Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe, keriteŋu le Yesu sɔi gɔbei gamalaabɛin.
42023035	Inɛw kɔɔ nɛ iŋiyaan, waaru yɛnɛu be bee le, Yahutunw inɛw giru toin gɔbe Yesui yamurinyɛnmɔu, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Wo inɛwin yabaabe. Nɛɛ, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ woi ye, Ama inɛ yɛmu gɔ woi ye, wo kuu womɔ yaba!»
42023036	Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe yaa, Yesui yau kanraunbɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ be genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa, wo bɛrɛ resɛndii ilɛ aaun obou,
42023037	kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ui Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛi ye, u turu kuu uwɔ yaba.»
42023038	Yesu baga jai kuu gɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋaa bojaa yasɛbɛin: “Inɛ ɔn Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛi.”
42023039	Inɛw mɔɲu kanranw baga nɛ pɛgaa bɛin gɔbe logoro nɛ turui, Yesui duyɔu, kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ ui laa ma? Aiwa, kuu uwɔ yabaa ye emi kanran yaba.»
42023040	Kɔɔ waaru le, mɔɲu kanrannɛ lɛiye gɔ, wo bɔɔnɛ gɔi ganwaan, kijɛ wo gi: «U Ama giri liyɛɛlɛu ma? U lee, wo lee tujɔ tunmɔ gɔ bɛɛuwɔi.
42023041	Emɛ kai, kijɛ emɛ kanrun tujɔi bɛɛuwɔin. Wogɔ emɛ le dagaa. Kaa ainɛ ɔn kijɛ mɔɲu turu kanran kanranlu.»
42023042	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Waaru pilemaa ɔgɔ uwɔ nɛ u wɛɛido gɔ le, u mui naŋanɔu.»
42023043	Yesu aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Mu naran go u bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, iye tee u mu le alujɛnɛ nɛ bibiyɛdou.»
42023044	Nɛɛ, naitege waaru gin’ wo dɔwaa, digɛnai, lɛɛrɛ taanu waaru yai dɔɔ baa, gana gɔ puu nɛ ɔlɔ biyaabe.
42023045	Nai wijɛ doorobele. Kɔɔ waaru le Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ kɛju sɔi gɔ, logoro gɔ nɛ tee kaaraai.
42023046	Yesu, mii diyɛ le ɛɛnnaa kɔnwaan, ɔn gin’ gi: «Mu Ba, mu kikinu ma numɔ uwɔ nɛ sagu gawarauwɔn.» Yesu sɔɔ kɔɔ giyaatiyaa kinrun gowaai.
42023047	Sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ bii gɔ iyaa, Amai sɔmɔu kijɛ wo gi: «Naran go, ainɛ ɔn inɛ teitai beei.»
42023048	Mɔɔnu giri yɛnu dɛi mɔrinyaan bɛin gɔbe, kijɛ bii gɔ waaru be iye le, gegeɲɛ baa baa ginrun yain.
42023049	Inɛw Yesui igii bɛin gɔbe lee, Galile gana nɛ waaru wo goi le baa yaanw onu womɔ nɛ dimɛbɛin gɔbe lee wagee iŋiyaan, kijɛ kɔɔbe yɛnɛubɛin.
42023050	Kɔɔ gin’ ainɛ turu, Yahutunw ana Arimate bɛɛnnɛ, boi womɔ Josɛpu gɛɛɲu gɔ yabe. Wo ainɛ ɛju, teitai beei. Ama diinɛ wɛɛido gɔ ɛjii yadɔmɔbe. Halu wo Yahutunw badubadanw diyɛnw logoro nɛ turui gɔ woi bee kanran, wo wo bɔɔnw sɔɔ gɔ lee, kanran bemɛ gɔ lee le yabalu.
42023052	Josɛpu gowaa, Yesu yiun gɔ unrun bɛrɛ obu bojomɔ ga, Pilate bɛrɛ gɛɛin yaabe.
42023053	Josɛpu, Yesu yiun gɔ baga jai nɛ sunugaa, bojo kunaa, dumɔ nɛ ɔnsain tɔgɔraaɲu nɛ yaa boju. Ɔnsain wogɔ nɛ inɛ turu kanran duunɔtɛnɛ bɛin.
42023054	Bai wogɔ deeliye bai dɛi yeguru kunɔɲu bai bee. Deeliye bai tɔlɔgu waaru gɔ bɛruniyaan yaabe.
42023055	Yaanw, Galile gana nɛ gowaa, Yesui dimiyaan wɛin gɔbe, Josɛpu le yabɛin. Be ɔnsain gɔ lee, Yesu yiun gɔ bana wogɔ nɛ duuni gɔ lee iyaabɛin.
42023056	Kɔɔ onu nɛ be pilemaa ginrun yaa, nii pariyɛɲu jiɲu ɛju lee, lajukɔrɔ lee, yiun gɔ dɛi yegeraabɛin. Tɔɔru gɔ le kɛukɛu, yaanw gɔbe, deeliye bai birɛ birɛnɛ.
42024001	Jugu bai pɔlɔ gɔ, agapaali, yaanw gɔbe nii jiɲu ɛju be yeguru gɔ gɛliyaa, ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaabɛin.
42024002	Be ɔnsain aŋa gɔ nɛ dumɔ pinɛbe gɔ, dunɔrɔnmaa, goonaatin tɛmaabɛin.
42024003	Kɔɔ gin’ be ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yowaabɛin. Kaa be Inɛw Baŋa Yesu yiun gɔ tɛmɛnɛ.
42024004	Be sɔɔ kanranɲu inin be wɔu, anranw lɛi arugoi pilu doorojɛ goriyaa, giru bemɛ nɛ iŋiyaanbɛin.
42024005	Yaanw gɔbe liyaa yaa, girupala bemɛ minɛ nɛ dujaa be wɔu, anranw gɔbe be le kijɛ be gi: «E inge dɛi inɛ ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ inɛw yiunbe logoro nɛ dɛnɛuwɔi ma?
42024006	Wo ɔn nɛ tolo. Kaa wo bulaai. Galile gana nɛ waaru wo bee le, e le sɔɔ wo sɔɔbe gɔ ajubu yɛnɛi.
42024007	Wo ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: ‘Inɛ Aini gɔi waajibi inɛw hakɛ kanranw numɔ nɛ kukunɔdɛin, woi baga jai nɛ pɛgɛ ye dadaadɛin. Kaa bai taaniye gɔ, waajibi wo bubulodo.’ »
42024008	Kɔɔ waaru le yaanw gɔbe, Yesu sɔɔ gɔbe naŋaraanbɛin.
42024009	Be kɔɔ gin’ ɔnsain gɔ nɛ gowaa, sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu Yesu jaŋu unrunw pɛli turusigɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ lee, inɛw wajunw gɔbe puu bɛrɛ lee yaa tagin.
42024010	Yaanw wogɔbe, Mari Magudala ana bɛɛnnɛ gɔ lee, Jannɛ lee, Mari Jake na gɔ lee bei bee. Be lee, yaanw wajunw be le bɛin gɔbe lee, sɔɔ kɔɔbe, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe bɛrɛ yaa be tagu.
42024011	Kaa be yaanw kɔɔbe be bɛrɛ sɔɔ tagu gɔbe tiyɛ sɛlɛ ga lugaa, yaanw gɔbe sɔɔ le gawanɛ.
42024012	Kaa Piɛru ingelaa, jɔbaa, ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaabe. Wo jimiyaan yɛnaa wo kanran, lɛn sɔi bojo gɔbei laa ye, kijɛ waja iyelu. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo gowaa, kijɛ bii gɔ dɛi wo bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaa, ginrun wiyaabe.
42024013	Bai wogɔ tee, Yesu jaŋu unrunw lɛi, ana dagi turu boi gɔ Ɛmause gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ yaaubɛin. Ɛmause ana gɔ lee, Jerusalɛmu lee logoro nɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ pɛli turusigɛ gin’ too.
42024014	Be tunmɔ bɛrɛ kijɛ biyaabe gɔbe wooi sɔɔ sɔɔubɛin.
42024015	Be kɔɔ gin’ tunmɔ le sɔɔ sɔɔu, jiiru kunɔu yaau be wɔu, Yesu kuu womɔ le bei wiyaa dɔwaa be le yaaube.
42024016	Kaa, kijɛ turu giri bemɛ dɛbaajɛ gin’, be Yesui jugɔnɛ.
42024017	Wo be le kijɛ wo gi: «E tunmɔ le inge sɔɔ sɔɔu yaauwɔi ma?» Kɔɔ waaru le be kinɛ jinwɛnmaa, iŋiyaanbɛin.
42024018	Turu baŋa boi womɔ Kileyopasu gɛɛɲu gɔ, Yesu aŋa saa gi: «Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ, bai lɛi ɔn nɛ sɔɔ bii gɔ, ui laa ye, inɛ Jerusalɛmu nɛ too ɛgɛlu gɔ aai?»
42024019	Sɔɔ inge tɔgui ma Yesu selumaabe. Be saa gin: «Yesu Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ gɔ bɛrɛ sɔɔ dɔi gɔi. Wo inɛ Ama titiyainɛ diyɛi bee: Wo wogɔ, birɛ womɔ nɛ lee, sɔɔ womɔ nɛ lee, Ama lee, inɛw lee giru nɛ tagaraabe.
42024020	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw emɛ gɔbe lee, inɛw giru toin emɛ gɔbe lee, woi daa dɛi aabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ be baga jai nɛ woi pɛgaa daabɛin.
42024021	Emɛ ajubu emɛ nɛ, inɛ Yahutunwin gunɔ nɛ goonɔido gɔ woi ga bɛin. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, sɔɔ gɔbe bii, iye bai taaniye gɔi.
42024022	Kaa yaanw gamuu logoro emɛ nɛ emɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ be sɔi gɔ maunɛ kanraanbe: Be agapaali ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaabɛin.
42024023	Kaa be yiun womɔ kɔɔ nɛ tɛmɛnɛ kanraan, be wiyaa mɛlɛnkɛbe unrunbei be bɛrɛ tagaraabɛin gin. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe womaa ɔnmɔi wɔɔ ga sɔin gin.
42024024	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw gamuu logoro emɛ nɛ gowaa, ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaabɛin. Be yaanw gɔbe aŋai sɔin gin’, yaa kunrin tɛmaabɛin. Kaa be woi iyenɛ.»
42024025	Kɔɔ waaru le, Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «E inɛw hakilɛ sɛnɛbei. Iyaa inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ sɔin gɔbe puu le yaa gawa ga kinɛ ebe ɔgiri yabaalɛ.
42024026	Waajibi, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ, kɔɔ gin’ ɔɲɔ ye dooro womɔ nɛ wo yooun jaanla bee ma?»
42024027	Kɔɔ gin’ Mɔise dɔn gɔbe lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn tɔŋu gɔbe lee nɛ tɔlaa, Yesu unrun dɛi Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu gɔbe puu tiyɛ, be bɛrɛ tagaabe.
42024028	Be kɔɔ gin’ ana dagi be yaabe gɔ nɛ waaru be bɛruni le, Yesu oji womɔ dimiyaan ye gagalado gin’ kanraanbe.
42024029	Kaa be wo bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛnyaan kijɛ be gi: «U emɛ le biyɛ, sabu digɛ yadiyɛjɛ, giri kurugu bɛruniyaain.» Wo be le biyɛ ga, be le ana kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ yowaabe.
42024030	Yesu be le jaa nɛ daaun, buru jeɲaa, Amai birɛpoo tagaatiyaa, kabalaa, be bɛrɛ gamalaabe.
42024031	Kɔɔ waaru le giri bemɛ pinɛlaa, be woi Yesui ga jugaabɛin. Kaa wo giru bemɛ nɛ manaai.
42024032	Kɔɔ waaru le be tunmɔ le kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Oju nɛ waaru emɛ le sɔɔ wo sɔɔbe le, waaru Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu tiyɛ gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ wo tagabe le, kɔlɔ emɛ nɛ kinɛ emɛ ɛjii ɛɛli bele ma?»
