43013029	Buudu gelu gɔ, Judasu numɔ nɛ tobe dɛi, inɛw gamuu janwan dɛi kijɛ kai be sɛɛ womaa ɛbɛ gɛɛjɛ ga sɛbɛin. Maa naugunw bɛrɛ kijɛ gaila obo gɛɛjɛ ga sɛbɛin.
43013030	Numɔpɛru gɔ yabaa, Judasu ɔgu kɛu gowaai. Digɛi bee.
43013031	Judasu gowaa wo yaa, Yesu ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Nɛɛ kai, Inɛ Aini gɔ, dooro le wɔɔ. Iyaa, wo le digɛu Ama dooro yaa iyemaajɛ.
43013032	Wo le digɛu Ama dooro iyemaajɛ ye, wo yaa Ama le digɛnu dooro bɛbɛɛdo. Bɛrii dooro wogɔ Ama wo bɛrɛ ohobodo.
43013033	Unrunw mabe, nimɛ kanran mu e le kowɔn. Kaa nɛɛ kai e le waaru joo biyɛidolɔn. E mui dɛdɛnɛdei. Kaa Yahutunw bɛrɛ bana mu sɔi gin’, e bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔn, yalu mu yaajɛ gɔ nɛ e wɛɛ bɛɛidelei.
43013034	Mu e bɛrɛ tɔɔru kana obouwɔn, tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛi. Ei bana ibɛi mu biyaabe gin’, e yaa kunrin tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛi.
43013035	E wogɔ gin’ tunmɔ ibɛɛ wɔi ye, ei jaŋu unrunw mabei ga inɛw puu kole digɛnu jugɔdɛin.»
43013036	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Simɔ Piɛru ɔn gin’ wo bɛrɛ selumu: «Inɛw Baŋa, u yago yaajɛu?» Yesu saa: «Yalu mu yaajɛ gɔ nɛ u kanɛ mui dimi bɛɛidolou. Kaa waja u wogɔ nɛ mui didimiyɛndou.»
43013037	Piɛru saa kijɛ gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, inge dɛi kanɛ mu ui dimi bɛɛidolɔn ma? Mu kinrun ma u giye paja ga yayabadɔn.»
43013038	Yesu saa kijɛ gi: «Naran go mu giye kinrun uwɔ paja ga yayabadou ma? Mu naran go u bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, kubɔ taanu mui inɛɛ gɛɛlu u wɔnu, ɛɲɛ kɔnwɔindolo.»
43014001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Yesu, sɔɔ womɔ digiyaa kijɛ wo gi: «Kinɛ ebe yanwanmɔnɔugi, Ama le gawai, mu le kanran gawai.
43014002	Mu Ba Ama ginrun nɛ, ginrun joo yɔɔ. Kunrin bele bee ye, mu ei tatagabɔn. Mu e dɛi yalu yegerei yaajɔn.
43014003	Mu yaa, yalu e dɛi yegeraajɔn ye, pilemu ye kowɛɛdɔn. Ei mu le jɛyayaadɔn. Kunrin yalu mu wɔɔ gɔ nɛ, e yaa kɔɔ nɛ biyɛdei.
43014004	Yalu mu yaajɛ gɔ nɛ oju le wɛɛɲu e igii wɔi.»
43014005	Yesu, kunrin wo sɔwaa, Tɔmasu ɔn gin’ wo le gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, emɛ yalu u yaajɛ inin. Nɛɛ oju le yaaɲu gɔ yani jugɔdɛin?»
43014006	Yesu, aŋa womɔ saa kijɛ gi: «Oju gɔ mui, naran gɔ lee, ɔnmɔ gɔ lee. Mu le digɛnu laa ye, inɛ turu kanran Ba gɔ bɛrɛ wɛɛ bɛɛidolo.
43014007	E mui igii bei ye, mu Bai yaa igii bibiyɛbei. Kanɛ baa e woi igii wɔi, woi iyaajɛi.»
43014008	Pilipe wo le kijɛ gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, Ba Ama gɔ emi tagara, wogɔ emi babaado.»
43014009	Yesu wo le saa kijɛ gi: «Pilipe, e le biyaa, bana mu tanwaanjɛ ɔn, u nimɛ kanran mui inɛɛu ma? Yɛnɛ, inɛ aai kanran, mui iyaajɛ ye, Ba Amai iyaajɛ. Nɛɛ, Ba Ama emi tagara yani gɛɛjɛu?
43014010	Kɔɔi ye, Ba Ama emɛ lɛi turu, mu wo le toun, wo mu le too ga, u gawalu ma? E bɛrɛ sɔɔ mu sɔɔjɛ ɔnbe, kuu ma le bɛɛlɔn. Ba Ama mu nɛ too gɔ, birɛ womɔ wo birɛuwɔ.
43014011	Sɔɔ ɔn le gawai. Mu lee, Ba Ama lee, emɛ lɛi turu. Mu wo le yatoun, wo mu le yato. Halu, sɔɔ ma dɛi gawali kanran, mu le digɛu birɛ wo birɛjɛ gɔbe dɛi, sɔɔ kɔɔ le gawai.
43014012	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛ aai kanran, mu le gawaa wɔɔ ye, birɛ mu birɛjɛ gɔbe bibirɛdo. Wogɔ dɛi sigɛ yaa bibirɛdo. Sabu mu, Ba Ama bɛrɛ yaajɔn.
43014013	Iyaa boi ma le kijɛ e gɛɛindo wooi, mu wogɔ kakanrandɔn. Kunrin, Aini gɔ le digɛnu, inɛw, Ba Ama dooro gɔ ihiyedɛin.
43014014	E boi ma le kijɛ turu gɛnyaanjɛi ye, mu wogɔ kakanrandɔn.»
43014015	«E mui ibɛɛ wɔi ye, tɔɔru mabe gɛgɛliyɛdei.
43014016	Mu, Ba Ama bɛrɛ gɛgɛɛndɔn, wo Baranɛ waja e bɛrɛ ohobodo. Kɔɔbaŋa asuu e le biyɛdo.
43014017	Wogɔ, naran Kikinu gɔ woi. Aduna bɛɛnw gɔbe, woi inin, woi iyeenɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi be woi bɛɛidenɛ. Kaa Kikinu wogɔ e le yɔɔ, e le yatoiyodo dɛi, e woi igii wɔi.
43014018	«Mu, ei, baŋa sɛlɛ go laawagunw gin’ pajaidolɔn. Mu e bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn.
43014019	Waaru gaila kanraan ye, aduna bɛɛnw mui iyeidenɛ. Kaa mu asuu ɔnmɔi wɔun gɔ digɛu, e yaa ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdei. Wogɔ digɛu, e kai mui pilemaa ye ihiyedei.
43014020	Bai wogɔ dɔwaai ye, mu, mu Ba Ama le yatoun, e paamu kakanrandei. Iyaa, mu e le yatoun, e mu le yatoi ga e paamu kakanrandei.
43014021	«Tɔɔru mabe nɛ biyaa, inɛ gɛliyaajɛ baŋa gɔ, inɛ mui ibɛ gɔ kɔɔbaŋa woi. Inɛ mui ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɔ, mu Ba Ama woi ibɛi biyɛdo. Mu yaa woi ibɛi biyɛdɔn. Iyaa, mu inɛ wogɔ bɛrɛ mui jujugɔmɔdɔn.»
43014022	Yesu kunrin wo sɔwaa, Judasu, Judasu Isukariɔtei laa gɔ, wo bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumu: «Inɛw Baŋa, emɛ bɛrɛ ui jujugɔmɔdou, kaa, aduna bɛrɛ ui jugɔmɔidolou gɔ, kɔɔ yani wɔɔ?»
43014023	Yesu, aŋa womɔ saa kijɛ gi: «Inɛ aai kanran, mui ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, sɔɔ ma le yayabado. Mu Ba Ama, inɛ wogɔ baŋai ibɛi biyɛdo. Mu lee, mu Ba lee, wo bɛrɛ wɛi ye, wo le yabiyɛdɛin.
43014024	Kaa mui inɛ ibɛla gɔ, sɔɔ ma le yabaalɛ. Sɔɔ aŋa ma nɛ goojɛ gɔ sɔɔ mai laa. Mu Ba Ama, mui tiinɛ gɔ sɔɔi.
43014025	Logoro ebe nɛ waaru mu too gɔ le, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tagaa wɔun.
43014026	Kaa, Baranɛ gɔ, Kikinu Pilu gɔ, Ba Ama, boi ma le wo tiido gɔ, wo e bɛrɛ kijɛ puu dedeeredo. Sɔɔ e bɛrɛ mu sɔi gɔ puu wo ei nanaŋaranmɔdo.
43014027	«Unrunw mabe, mu jamu e le pajauwɔn. Mu jamu ma e bɛrɛ obouwɔn. Jamu mu obojɛ gɔ aduna mɔ bana gin’ laa. Kɔɔ digɛnu, kinɛ ebe yanwanmɔnɔugi, kinɛ manu le biyɛnɔugi.
43014028	Mu yaaidɔn, kaa pilemɛ ye e bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn e le mu sɔwaa ɛgaabei. Yɛnɛi, mu Ba Ama mu dɛi gaa. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e mui ibɛɛ bei ye, mu Ba Ama bɛrɛ pilemu ye mu yaajɛ dɛi, kinɛ ebe ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔbei.
43014029	Aiwa, sɔɔ kɔɔbe waaru biyaa, ebaa gawa ga, be biyɛmɔ nɛ, mu kanɛ baa e bɛrɛ tagaa wɔun.
43014030	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, nɛɛ kai, mu e le sɔɔ joo sɔɔidolɔn. Aduna ɔn ɔgɔnɛ gɔ yawɛɛjɛ. Mu bɛrɛ kijɛ wo gɔnrɔnjɛ turu kanran wɔlɔ.
43014031	Kaa mu, mu Ba Amai ibɛɛ wɔun, iyaa kijɛ puu bana mu bɛrɛ wo tɔɔru gin’ yinkanranjɔn ga aduna bɛɛnw be jugɔun jaain wɔɔ. Ingelei, ɔn nɛ goi ye, yaamɔi.»
43015001	«Resɛn tiun tɔitɔi gɔ, wogɔ mui. Mu Ba Ama, resɛn walanɛ gɔ woi.
43015002	Numɔ ii yagɔi kanran, mu le yadigɛnu ii naraanlɛ ye, mu Ba wogɔi kɛjɛ gogoonɔjɛ. Kaa numɔ ii ii naranjɛ gɔ, ii narun womɔ bariyɛ giye wo wogɔi jijibelejɛ.
43015003	E bɛrɛ sɔɔ mu tagu gɔ le digɛu, e kai kanɛ baa ei jibili wɔɔ. Ei ɛjaai.
43015004	Nɛɛ mu nɛ yadigi ye biyɛi. Mu yaa e nɛ yadigiyɛdɔn. Numɔ ii, bɔin gɔ nɛ digɛla go, tunmi ii narun bɛɛlɛ. Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, e yaa mu nɛ digɛlai ye, e wɔɔ gɔ woi, ii narun bɛɛlɛi.
43015005	«Resɛn bɔin gɔ mui, numɔ ii gɔbe ei. Inɛ aai kanran, mu nɛ yadigɛ, mu wo nɛ yadigɛun ye, kɔɔbaŋa ii gaai nanarando. Kaa mu le kabiyaai ye, e kijɛ turu kanran kanrun bɛɛidelei.
43015006	Kaa inɛ aai kanran, mu le kabiyaai ye, numɔ ii gin’ woi kamaatiyaa ye, mamaaŋiyɛnjɛ. Inɛw, wogɔ balaa ye, yaun nɛ kunɔ ye tɛtɛgɛrɛɲu.
43015007	Kaa e mu nɛ yabiyɛjɛi, sɔɔ ma e nɛ yabiyɛjɛ ye, kijɛ e ibɛ puu gɛɛin. Wogɔ e bɛrɛ kakanrandɛin.
43015008	E ii gaii naran ye, ei jaŋu unrunw mabei ga kunrin tagarajɛi ye, mu Ba Ama dooro, inɛw puu bana iyeidɛin gɔ kɔɔ woi.
43015009	Mu Ba Ama bana mui ibɛi biyaa wo wɔɔ gin’, mu yaa ei yinhibɛi biyaa wɔun. Aiwa, ihibɛ ma nɛ toi ye yabiyɛi.
43015010	Mu Ba Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛliyaa, ihibɛ womɔ nɛ biyaa mu wɔɔ gin’, e kanran tɔɔru mabe gɛgɛliyɛjɛi ye, e ihibɛ ma nɛ yabiyɛdei.
43015011	«Kinɛ ɛɛli bana mu sɛɛ gin’, ebaa yaa kinɛ ɛɛli wogɔ tunmɔ siyi ye, kinɛ ɛɛli ebe kale dɔwaai biyɛ ga, sɔɔ kɔɔbe wogɔ dɛi e le sɔwaabɔn.
43015012	Tɔɔru ma unwɔ: Bana ei ibɛi mu bii gin’, kunrin tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛi.
43015013	Inɛ, wo anrungebe dɛi kinrun unrunmɔ pajaajɛ ye, kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ ihibɛ wɔlɔ.
43015014	Kijɛ mu tɔɔru gɔ kakanranjɛi ye, mu anrunge gɔbe ei.
43015015	Mu ei birɛbirɛnw boonɔuwɔlɔn. Birɛbirɛnɛ wo baŋa kijɛ kanranjɛ inɛɛ. Kaa ei mu anrunge boonɔuwɔn. Sabu mu Ba mu bɛrɛ kijɛ tagu gɔ puu mu e bɛrɛ jugɔmaabɔn.
43015016	Ei, mui yɛmɛli. Ebaa yaai ye ii gaai kunɔ ye, ii ebe gɔ ii sɔgɔjɛi biyɛ ga, mu ei yɛmu. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu Ba bɛrɛ boi ma le kijɛ e gɛɛindo wooi, wo ei ohobodo.
43015017	Nɛɛ e bɛrɛ kijɛ mu tɔɔrɔjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛi.»
43015018	«Aduna bɛɛnw ei ibiliyaa wɔin ye, be mui laa ibiliin ga jugɔi.
43015019	Ei aduna mɔi bee ye, aduna kijɛ womɔ ibɛi bibiyɛbe. Kaa ei aduna mɔi laa. Mu ei yɛmaa aduna ɔn nɛ goonaatun gɔ digɛu, aduna ei ibiliyaa wɔɔ.
43015020	E bɛrɛ sɔɔ mu tagu gɔ ajubu yɛnɛi. Birɛbirɛnɛ wo baŋa dɛi irela. Aduna bɛɛnw mui ɔɲɔmaabɛin ye, ei yaa ɔhɔɲɔmɔdɛin. Sɔɔ ma le yabaabɛin ye, sɔɔ ebe le yaa yayabadɛin.
43015021	Kaa, kɔɔbe puu be mu sabu dɛi e bɛrɛ kanrandɛin. Sabu mui aa tii ma be inin.
43015022	Mu wɛɛlun bɔun ma, be le sɔɔ sɔɔlun bɔun ma biyaa ye, hakɛ jarugu be le biyɛbele. Kaa kanɛ hakɛ bemɛ dɛi kijɛ poruparu turu kanran sɛnɛ.
43015023	Inɛ aai kanran, mui ibiliyaa wɔɔ ye, mu Bai yaa ibiliyaa wɔɔ.
43015024	Birɛ inɛ turu kanran birɛtɛlu gɔ, mu logoro bemɛ nɛ wogɔbe biraa tagaralun bɔun ye, hakɛ jarugu be le biyɛbele. Kaa kanɛ be birɛ gɔbe iyaaɲu. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ mui ibiliyaa wɔin, mu Ba Amai yaa ibiliyaa wɔin.
43015025	Kaa Tɔɔru bemɛ dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ ɔn gɔ kibe ga, kɔɔ bii: “Be tiyɛ sɛlɛ go mui ibiliyaa wɔin.”
43015026	«Aiwa, mu Ba bɛrɛ goi ye, Baranɛ e bɛrɛ mu tiido gɔ, naran Kikinu, mu Ba bɛrɛ gooido gɔ, waaru wo wiyaa, wo mu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goodo.
43015027	E yaa birɛ mu tɔlu le baa, mu le yɔɔi gɔ digɛu, mu dɛi sɛɛrɛ gogoodei.
43016001	«Gagawu ebe yanwannɔu ga, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tagun.
43016002	Be Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ ei nanu gogoonɔdɛin. Halu, waaru yawɛɛjɛ, inɛ aai kanran, ei daajɛ ye, unrun Ama birɛi birɛjɛ ga ajubado.
43016003	Be mu Ba Amai jugɔnɛ, mui yaa jugɔnɛ sabu dɛi, e bɛrɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe kanrandɛin.
43016004	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe waaru biyaa, e bɛrɛ kɔɔbe sɔɔ sɔwaabɔn ebaa jugɔ bɛɛ dɛi, mu sɔɔ gɔ e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn.» «Birɛ tɔlɔ ma waaru le baa sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tagalun mu kanrun gɔ, mu e le yabɔn dɛi gai.
43016005	Kaa kanɛ mu, mui tiinɛ bɛrɛ yaajɔn. Kaa ‘U yago yaajɛu ma’ inɛ selumɛjɛ e logoro nɛ wɔlɔ.
43016006	Kaa, sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔ digɛu, e kinɛ yanwan diyɛ le wɔi.
43016007	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, mu yaajɛ e bɛrɛ ire. Mu yaalun ye, Baranɛ gɔ e bɛrɛ wɛɛidolo. Kaa mu yaaun ye, woi e bɛrɛ titiidɔn.
43016008	Waaru wo wiyaa, wo aduna inɛw bɛrɛ hakɛ lee, teitai lee, Ama saliyɛ lee sibɛ nɛ lelu bemɛ bei paamu kakanranmɔdo.
43016009	Aduna inɛw mu le gawaanɛ gɔ dɛi, hakɛ sibɛ go lelaain.
43016010	Mu, mu Ba Ama bɛrɛ yaajɔn, iyaa waja e mui iyeidelei gɔ dɛi, aduna inɛw teitai sibɛ go lelaain.
43016011	Aduna ɔn ɔgɔnɛ gɔ saliyɛ kiraatin dɛi, aduna inɛw saliyɛ sibɛ nɛ lelaain.
43016012	«Mu nimɛ kanran e bɛrɛ sɔɔ tagaɲu joo yasɔn. Kaa, kanɛ e bɛrɛ tagaajɔn kanran, e tariyɛidelei.
43016013	Kaa, naran Kikinu, waaru wo wiyaa, wo oju naran kibaai gɔ nɛ ei dimɛrɛn ye yayaado. Sɔɔ wo sɔɔido gɔ wo kuu womɔ le bɛɛidolo, kaa sɔɔ wo ɛgui pilemu ye sɔɔdo. Wo sɔɔ wɛɛido e bɛrɛ tatagado.
43016014	Wo sɔɔ ma jeɲɛ ye e bɛrɛ wogɔi tagado. Wogɔ digɛu, birɛ womɔ le, wo mui dooromɔdo.
43016015	Mu Ba kijɛ sɛɛ puu mai. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kikinu gɔ, sɔɔ ma jeɲɛ ye, e bɛrɛ wogɔi tagado mu gi gɔ woi.
43016016	Aiwa, gaila kanraan ye, e mui iyeidelei. Iyaa gaila kanraan ye, e mui ihiyedei.»
43016017	Yesu kunrin wo sɔwaa, jaŋu unrunw gamuu tunmɔ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Emɛ bɛrɛ, sɔɔ wo sɔɔjɛ tiyɛ gɔ ingei? Gaila kanraan ye e mui iyeidelei gi, iyaa gaila kanraan ye e mui ihiyedei gi. Iyaa unrun Ba bɛrɛ yaajɔn dɛi gi.
43016018	Gaila kanraan ye wo gɛɛjɛ gɔ, sɔɔ ingei? Wo inge sɔɔi sɔɔjɛ ma emɛ inin.»
43016019	Be wo bɛrɛ selumu ibɛɛ bɛin ga Yesu jugaa, be le kijɛ wo gi: «Gaila kanraan ye e mui iyeidelei, gaila kanraan ye e mui ihiyedei mu gi gɔ, tunmɔ bɛrɛ kijɛ selumɛu e wɔɔ gɔ woi ma?
43016020	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, pii piinu, tɔɔnrɔn tɔɔnrɔnnu e wɔnu, aduna bɛɛnw kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔnu biyɛdɛin. E kinɛjiun bɛbɛɛdei. Kaa kinɛjiun ebe gɔ kinɛ ɛɛli tataŋado.
43016021	Yaanran, ii narun womɔ waaru dɔwaai ye, ɔɲɛ womɔ dɛi kinɛjiun le biyɛjɛ. Kaa ii gɔ waaru naraan wo biyaajɛ, inɛ turu aduna nɛ wiyaai kinɛ ɛɛli gɔ, ɔɲɛ womɔ wo bɛrɛ nanaŋamɔjɛ.
43016022	E sibɛ go yaa kunrin biyɛdo. Kanɛ e kinɛjiun le wɔi. Kaa mu pilemu ye ei yɛnɛi wɛwɛɛdɔn. Kɔɔ waaru le kinɛ ebe ɛhɛɛliyɛdo. Inɛ turu kanran kinɛ ɛɛli ebe goonu bɛɛidolo.
43016023	«Bai wogɔ dɔwaai ye, e kijɛ turu dɛi kanran mu bɛrɛ selumu selumɛidelei. Mu naran go e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, mu Ba bɛrɛ, boi ma le kijɛ e gɛɛindo wooi, wo wogɔ e bɛrɛ ohobodo.
43016024	Iye bai dɔɔ, e boi ma le kijɛ turu kanran gɛɛnli. Gɛɛin, e bɛbɛɛdei. Kunrin, kinɛ ɛɛli ebe kibaai bibiyɛdo.»
43016025	«Sɔɔ kɔɔbe mu taanrinyɛn le e bɛrɛ sɔiun. Kaa waaru yawɛɛjɛ, mu taanrinyɛn le e le sɔɔ sɔɔidolɔn. Mu Ba sibɛ go mu sɔɔ puu ei daii sɔi ye, ɛhɛjɛmɔdɔn.
43016026	Bai wogɔ dɔwaai ye, e mu Ba bɛrɛ boi ma le gɛɛn gɛgɛɛndei. Mu e dɛi wo bɛrɛ gɛɛndɔn gɛɛlun.
43016027	Sabu mu Ba Ama ei ibɛɛ wɔɔ. Maa, Ba Ama bɛrɛ goi ga gawaa, e mui ibɛi biyaa wɔi digɛu, Ba Ama yaa ei ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
43016028	Mu, Ba Ama bɛrɛ gowaa, aduna nɛ wɛiun. Kanɛ, mu aduna nɛ goi ye, pilemu ye mu Ba bɛrɛ yaajɔn.»
43016029	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, jaŋu unrunw womɔbe wo le kijɛ gin: «Nɛɛ kai sɔɔ uwɔ daii wɔɔ. U sɔɔ turu kanran taanrinyɛn le sɔɔuwɔlɔu.
43016030	U sɔɔ puu igii wɔu ga emɛ kanɛ iyaaɲu. Inɛ ui selumɛ ga kai sɛlɛu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, u Ama bɛrɛ goiu ga emɛ gawaa wɔin.»
43016031	Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «Nɛɛ, e kanɛ mu le gawaajɛi, woi laa?
43016032	Yɛnɛi, waaru yawɛɛjɛ, kanɛ baa waaru wogɔ dɔwaai. E wooi puu sibɛ ebe nɛ giginɛdei. E mu turu sai pajadei. Kaa mu turu sai wɔlɔ. Mu Ba Ama, mu le yɔɔ.
43016033	Mu le ebaa jamu bɛɛ ga, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e le sɔiun. Aduna nɛ e ɔɲɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin bɛbɛɛdei. Kaa anrangaju le biyɛi. Mu, adunai gɔnraanjɔn.»
43017001	Kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔwaatiyaa, Yesu, daa go giri dɛɛraa, ɔn gin’ Ama gɛin: «Mu Ba, waaru gɔ dɔwaai. Aini gɔ womaa, dooro uwɔ inɛw bɛrɛ tagara ga, Aini uwɔ dooro, inɛw bɛrɛ tagara.
43017002	Kunrin, inɛw puu kuu nɛ wo bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn u obu le kɛukɛu, wo inɛw wo bɛrɛ sagu u duuru gɔbe wooi bɛrɛ ɔnmɔsɔgɔ ohobodo.
43017003	Nɛɛ, u turu sai Ama tɔitɔi wɔɔ gɔ, inɛw ui jugaa, inɛ u tii, Yesu Kirisitoi jugaaɲu ye, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
43017004	Mu Ba, aduna ɔn nɛ mu dooro uwɔ tagaraabɔn. Birɛ mu bɛrɛ u obu gɔ, mu biraa donugaatun.
43017005	Nɛɛ mu Ba, aduna maŋamɔ nɛ baa, giru uwɔ nɛ dooro le mu bee gɔ, pilemu ye giru uwɔ nɛ, mui dooro wogɔ le bojo.
43017006	«Aduna nɛ inɛw yɛmaa, numɔ ma nɛ u kunu gɔbe, mu bana u wɔɔ gɔ, be bɛrɛ jugɔmaabɔn. Inɛw kɔɔbe uwɔi bɛin, u bei mu bɛrɛ obaabeu. Be sɔɔ uwɔ gɛliyaabɛin.
43017007	Kijɛ mu bɛrɛ u obu gɔbe puu, naran go, u bɛrɛ goi ga, be kanɛ jugaaɲu.
43017008	Sabu, mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ u tagu gɔbe, mu sɔɔ wogɔbe be bɛrɛ tagaabɔn. Be sɔɔ gɔ le yabaaɲu. Naran go, maa u bɛrɛ goi ga, be jugaaɲu. Mui u tii ga, be wogɔ le gawaa wɔin.
43017009	«Ba, mu be dɛi u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, aduna dɛi gɛɛnlɔn. Kaa inɛw mu bɛrɛ u obu gɔ dɛi gɛɛunwɔn. Sabu bei uwɔi.
43017010	Ɔnhɔn, kijɛ ma gɔbe puu uwɔi, iyaa kijɛ uwɔ gɔbe puu mai. Inɛw kɔɔbe le digɛu inɛw, dooro ma iyaaɲu.
43017011	Mu nɛɛ kai aduna nɛ toloun. Mu u bɛrɛ wɛɛjɔn. Kaa be aduna nɛ kotoin. Mu Ba, u ɛjaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, u lee, mu lee, emɛ lɛi turu biyaa emɛ wɔɔ gin’, bemaa yaa kɔɔ gin’ turu bii ye biyɛ ga, gɔnrɔn mu bɛrɛ u obu sagu nɛ bei biyɛmɔ. Ɔnhɔn, boi mu bɛrɛ u obu gɔ nɛ tari ye be biyɛmɔ.
43017012	Be le waaru mu bii puu nɛ, mu gɔnrɔn mu bɛrɛ u obu gɔ sagu le bei gɛliyaabɔn. Mu bei kajubaabɔn. Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ gɔ kibe ga waajibi dɛi, inɛ manau jaan gɔ wo manaai. Kɔɔi laa ye, logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛ turu kanran manalu.
43017013	Nɛɛ, mu u bɛrɛ wɛɛjɔn. Kaa kinɛ ɛɛli bana mu sɛɛ gin’ kinɛ ɛɛli bemɛ gɔ yaa kibaai biyɛ ga, aduna nɛ waaru mu too gɔ le, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe be bɛrɛ tagauwɔn.
43017014	Mu sɔɔ uwɔ be bɛrɛ jugɔmaabɔn. Kaa mui aduna mɔi laa bana wɔɔ gin’, bei aduna mɔi laa gɔ digɛu, aduna bei ibiliyaa wɔɔ.
43017015	Aduna nɛ bei goonɔ dɛi u bɛrɛ gɛɛnlɔn. Kaa, Mɔɲu kuu baŋa numɔ nɛ bei yaba dɛi gɛɛunwɔn.
43017016	Mui aduna mɔi laa bana wɔɔ gin’, bei yaa aduna mɔi laa.
43017017	Mu Ba, sɔɔ uwɔ naran gɔ woi. Sɔɔ uwɔ le bei uwɔi tee be biyɛmɔ.
43017018	Mui aduna nɛ bana u tii gin’, mu yaa bei aduna nɛ tiyaajɔn.
43017019	Bemaa naran le kuu bemɛ u bɛrɛ obo ga, mu wogɔ dɛi kuu ma ui obaajɔn.
43017020	«Mu, be turu sai dɛi gɛɛunwɔlɔn. Sɛɛrɛ be gooido dɛi inɛw mu le gawaidɛin gɔbe dɛi yaa gɛɛunwɔn.
43017021	Ba, be puui turu bojo. U mu le yatou, mu u le yatoun. Kɔɔ wɔɔ gin’, aduna inɛw u mui tii ga gawa ga, bei kanran emɛ le yatoin bojo.
43017022	Bemaa emɛ gin’ turu biyɛ ga, mu bɛrɛ dooro u obu gɔ, mu dooro tunmɔ wogɔ bei obaajɔn.
43017023	Mu be le yatoun, iyaa u mu le yatou. Kɔɔ gin’ be sɛɛu turu bibiyɛdɛin. Iyaa aduna inɛw u mui tii ga jujugɔdɛin. Mui bana u ibɛ gin’ bei yinhibɛu ga jujugɔdɛin. Iyaa, mui bana u ibɛ gin’, bei yinhibɛu jugɔ ga, mu le mɔrinyaan turu uwɔ gin’, mu yaa be le mɔrinyaan turu yinbiyaa wɔun.
43017024	«Mu Ba, mu bɛrɛ inɛw u obu gɔbe, yalu mu wɔɔ gɔ nɛ bemaa mu le bii ye, dooro ma yɛnɛnu biyɛ ga, mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Aduna maŋamɔ nɛ baa, u mui ibɛɛ wɔu dɛi dooro mu bɛrɛ u obu gɔ, bemaa wogɔ yɛnɛnu biyɛ ga mu ibɛɛ wɔun.
43017025	Mu Ba, u teitai wɔu. Aduna ui jugɔtɛlu. Kaa mu ui igii wɔun, inɛw ɔnbe yaa uwaa mui tii ga jugaaɲu.
43017026	Bemaa bana mui u ibɛ gin’, tunmɔi ibɛi biyɛ ga, iyaa, mu be le yatoun ga bemaa jugɔ ga, mu bana u wɔɔ gɔ bei jugɔmaabɔn, iyaa jujugɔmɔdɔn.»
43018001	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaatiyaa, Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ be wooi gowaa, Sedurɔn ɔmɔjɔun kɛjaa taŋaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ sadiŋɛ turu yabe. Wo jaŋu unrunw womɔbe le wogɔ nɛ yowaabe.
43018002	Yesu lee, jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee, waaru joo yalu kɔɔ nɛ wɛɛubɛin dɛi, Judasu, Yesui numɔ nɛ kunɔido baŋa gɔ, yalu kɔɔ igii bee.
43018003	Kɔɔ dɛi, Judasu, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw lee, Parisiɛnbe lee garidu tiin gɔbe lee, Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw sɔludasu gɔbe lee giru nɛ yowaa, kɔɔ nɛ wiyaabe. Be lanpa lee, tɛlutin yaun lee, kɔmɔgelu bemɛ lee gɛliyaa kole wɛin.
43018004	Yesu, unrun bɛrɛ sɔɔ dɔɔido igii bee dɛi, genɛ bemɛ nɛ yadɔwaa, ɔn gin’ be le sɔi: «E aai dɛnɛuwɔi?»
43018005	Be saa, Yesu Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ gɔi dɛnɛuwɔin gin. Yesu saa, wogɔ unruin gi. Judasu, Yesui numɔ nɛ kunɔnɛ gɔ, inɛw gɔbe le yahiŋɛbe.
43018006	Nɛɛ, Yesu, unruin ga waaru be bɛrɛ wo gi gɔ le, be puu onu dɔraa minɛ nɛ numaa sugaabɛin.
43018007	Yesu pilemaa be bɛrɛ selumaa, bemaa aai dɛnɛɲu ma gi. Be saa, Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ Yesui gin.
43018008	Yesu be le kijɛ gi: «Wogɔ mui gun. E mui digɛi ye, inɛw ɔnbei pajaa ye, be yaamɔi.»
43018009	Giru nɛ sɔɔ turu wo sɔi kibe dɛi wo kɔɔ gin’ gi. Giru nɛ Yesu ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu Ba, inɛw mu bɛrɛ sagu u duuru gɔbe logoro nɛ, inɛ turu kanran manamɔlun.»
43018010	Nɛɛ Simɔ Piɛru, polukaaba turu sɛu, wogɔ bɔwaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ gɔi tɛraa, suguru iin gɔi jabalaa goonaabe. Birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ boi Malukusu gɛɛbɛin.
43018011	Yesu, Piɛru le kijɛ gi: «Polu uwɔ kɔgɔ womɔ nɛ kunɔ. Ajubu uwɔ nɛ, mu Ba Ama, maa ɔɲɛ iye ga wo bojaajɛ gɔ, mu ɔɲɔu jaanla ma?»
43018012	Rɔmɛ sɔludasu gɔbe lee, kuu bemɛ baŋa lee, Yahutunw garidu gɔbe lee, kɔɔ waaru le Yesui aa, numɔ gɔ kɔmaabɛin.
43018013	Be woi Hanɛ bɛrɛ laa jɛyaabɛin. Anranguju wogɔ, Kayipe, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai bee. Nɛɛ Hanɛ gɔ wo anwain.
43018014	Kayipe gɔ Yahutunwin tinwɛnraan, tɔgu gɔ dilɛ nɛ inɛ turu yinwɛn ire gɛɛnɛ gɔ woi.
43018015	Simɔ Piɛru lee, jaŋu ii waja turu lee, Yesu onu nɛ yadigɛbɛin. Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ jaŋu ii turu wogɔi igii bee. Jaŋu ii wogɔ Yesu le digiyaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa ginrun gonɔ gɔ nɛ yowaabe.
43018016	Kaa Piɛru, bain go murɔn aŋa genɛ nɛ iŋiyaanbe. Jaŋu ii waja gɔ gowaa, gunɔ iyaa murɔn aŋa dɔmiyɛnnɛ gɔ le sɔwaa, Piɛrui yoomaabe.
43018017	Gunɔ iyaa murɔn aŋa dɔmɔbe gɔ Piɛru le kijɛ wo gi: «U yaa ainɛ kɔɔ jaŋu ii turui laau ma?» Piɛru saa kijɛ gi: «Ai, mu jaŋu ii womɔi laaun.»
43018018	Birɛbirɛnw lee, garidube lee, yalu gɔ nɛ kaali yabe dɛi, yaun tanugaa ɛgɛu yabɛin. Piɛru yaa be le mɔrinyaan, yaun ɛgɛube.
43018019	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ, Yesu bɛrɛ jaŋu unrunw womɔ lee, deeru womɔ lee dɛi selumaabe.
43018020	Yesu, aŋa womɔ ɔn gin’ sai: «Mu daii, aduna puu giru nɛ sɔɔ ma sɔwaabɔn. Yahutunw puu yalu mɔrinyɛnɲu, Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ lee, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ lee, mu waaru puu deeru ma yalu kɔɔbe nɛ oboubɔn. Baŋiyaan, sɔɔ mu sɔi wɔlɔ.
43018021	Nɛɛ inge dɛi mui selumɛjɛu? Inɛw mui keŋii gɔbe bɛrɛ, mu inge sɔɔi sɔiun ma selumɛ yɛnɛ. Be kai sɔɔ mu sɔi igii wɔin.»
43018022	Yesu, kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔu wo digɛu, garidu turu yalu gɔ nɛ iŋɛu, mamana womɔ pejaatiyaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa aŋa bana u saajɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi ma?»
43018023	Yesu, garidu gɔ aŋa saa kijɛ gi: «Mu sɔɔ dagiyɛlu sɔwaabɔn ye, yalu dagiyɛlu gɔ taga yɛnɛmɔ. Nɛɛ sɔɔ ma narain ye, inge dɛi mui lagajɛu?»
43018024	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Hanɛ, Yesui, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa, Kayipe bɛrɛ tiyaabe. Nimɛ kanran, Yesu numɔ kɔkɔmɔbe.
43018025	Simɔ Piɛru, ginrun gɔ nɛ yaun ɛgɛu yabe. Kɔɔ gin’ wo wɔu, inɛw wo le kijɛ gin: «U yaa inɛ kɔɔ jaŋu ii turui laau ma?» Piɛru saa: «Ai, mu jaŋu ii womɔi laaun.»
43018026	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ turu kijɛ gi: «Sadiŋɛ nɛ wo le u wɔu mu iyelun ma?» Piɛru, ai, unruin laa ga gimaa sɔwaabe. Kɔɔ sɔɔu wo digɛu, ɛɲɛ turu kɔnwaanbe. Birɛbirɛnɛ kɔɔ gin’ selumu gɔ lee, Piɛru, birɛbirɛnɛ suguru wo jabulu gɔ lee, be lɛi mɛrɛin bee.
43018028	Kayipe mɔ nɛ gowaa, Yesui dimɛraan, sɛmɛginɛ ginrun diyɛ gɔ nɛ jɛyaabɛin. Kɔɔ waaru le, baa yaa yaabe. Yahutunw inɛw giru toin gɔbe, sɛmɛginɛ ginrun nɛ yoi ye, bei purɔ ye Taŋagalu janwan kaya bɛɛidenɛ ma liyaain. Kɔɔ dɛi, be ginrun gɔ nɛ yoonɛ.
43018029	Kunrin Pilate, sɛmɛginɛ gɔ, wo gowaa, be bɛrɛ selumaabe: «E ainɛ ɔn dɛi jarugu ingei sɛi?»
43018030	Be aŋa womɔ saa kijɛ be gi: «Wo mɔɲu kanrannɛi laa bee ye, emɛ woi numɔ uwɔ nɛ kunɔbenɛ.»
43018031	Kɔɔ gin’ be saa, Pilate bemaa kɔɔi ye, kuu bemɛ le, tɔɔru bemɛ le kɛukɛu, saliyɛ womɔ yai kire gi. Yahutunw inɛw gɔbe saa: «Emɛ inɛ daa ga kara sɛnɛ.»
43018032	Yesu, aŋai wo yinwɛindo sɔɔ bana wo sɔi gin’ tee biyɛ ga, Yahutunw aŋasaara kɔɔ obin.
43018033	Pilate pilemaa ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaa, Yesui boonaa, ɔn gin’ selumu: «Ui Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛi ma?»
43018034	Yesu saa kijɛ gi: «Selumu kɔɔ kuu uwɔ selumui maa, inɛw, mu dɛi kɔɔ gin’ u bɛrɛ sɔin?»
43018035	Pilate aŋa womɔ ɔn gin’ sai: «Mui Yahutunɛi ga sɛu ma? Tɔgu uwɔ lee, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw lee, numɔ ma nɛ ui be kunu. Aiwa, kijɛ u kanrun gɔ ingei?»
43018036	Yesu aŋa womɔ ɔn gin’ sai: «Diinɛ ma gɔ aduna ɔn diinɛi laa. Diinɛ ma aduna ɔn diinɛi bee ye, Yahutunw inɛw numɔ nɛ mui yoonɔu giye, birɛbirɛnw mabe mu dɛi jajaiyɛbɛin. Kaa diinɛ ma aduna ɔn diinɛi laa.»
43018037	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo saa, Pilate kijɛ gi: «Ui, ɔgɔnɛi gɔ, narain ma?» Yesu saa kijɛ gi: «U gi, mui ɔgɔnɛi. Mui naraan, aduna nɛ mu wɛi gɔ, mu naran gɔ dɛi sɛɛrɛ gooi wɛiun. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, aai kanran, naran ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, sɔɔ ma kekeŋiyɛnjɛ.»
43018038	Pilate sɔwaa gi: «Naran gɔ ingei?» Kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaatiyaa, Pilate pilemaa bain go Yahutunw inɛw gɔbe bɛrɛ yaa kijɛ wo gi: «Mu kai ainɛ ɔn kuu nɛ kijɛ dɛi jarugu duurɔɲu iyelun.
43018039	Kaa Taŋagalu janwan dɔwaai ye, mu kajuginɛ turu e dɛi pajauwɔn. Sɔɔ wogɔ e bɛrɛ atɛmui gin’ taŋaai. Aiwa, Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛ gɔi e dɛi paja ma?»
43018040	Kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, be pilemaa mii ɛɛn le saa, «Ai, kɔɔbaŋai laa, Barabasu emɛ dɛi paja» gɛɛubɛin. Barabasu wogɔ, kuu numɔ numɔnɛi bee.
43019001	Pilate, Yesui aa bɔɔniyɛn le lagamaabe.
43019002	Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe, jijii le domɔ tiyaa, Yesu kuu nɛ kunaabɛin. Iyaa, arugoi diyɛ banrun wo bɛrɛ kunaabɛin.
43019003	Kɔɔ onu nɛ be genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔwaa ye, Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛ poo giyaa ye, mamana womɔ pejeubɛin.
43019004	Pilate iyaa pilemaa gowaa, Yahutunw inɛw gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Aiwa, ainɛ gɔ nɛ kijɛ dɛi jarugu duurɔɲu wo nɛ iyelun ebaa jugɔ ga, mu woi bain go e bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛdɔn.»
43019005	Kunrin, Yesu bain gowaabe. Jijii domɔ gɔ kuu womɔ nɛ yatobe. Arugoi banrun gɔ yaa yatobe. Pilate, Yahutunw gɔbe le kijɛ wo gi: «Yɛnɛi, ainɛ gɔ ɔn woi.»
43019006	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, garidu gɔbe lee, Yesui waaru be iye le, mii ɛɛn le kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Baga nɛ woi pɛgɛ daa, baga nɛ woi pɛgɛ daa!» Kunrin gɛɛu be wɔu, Pilate be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Aiwa, kuu ebe le woi yai pɛgɛi. Mu kai inɛ ɔn kuu nɛ kijɛ dɛi jarugu duurɔun jaan iyelun.»
43019007	Yahutunw inɛw gɔbe, Pilate aŋa saa kijɛ be gi: «Emɛ tɔɔru turu yasin, inɛ ɔn unruin Ama Ainii gi digɛu, tɔɔru wogɔ le kɛukɛu woi daaun jaain wɔɔ.»
43019008	Sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgaa, Pilate liliyɛ bariyaai.
43019009	Wo pilemaa ginrun nɛ yowaa, Yesu bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumu: «U yago bɛɛnnɛi?» Yesu aŋa womɔ saalu.
43019010	Pilate wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «U aŋa ma saalɛu ma? Mu baga nɛ ui pɛgɛ daaɲu gɔnrɔn yasɔn, iyaa ui pajaɲu gɔnrɔn yasɔn ga u inɛɛu ma?»
43019011	Yesu ɔn gin’ aŋa womɔ sai: «Ama bɛrɛ, daa go gowaa ui gɔnrɔn obin gɔi laa ye, u kuu ma nɛ gɔnrɔn turu kanran sɛlɛu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ mui numɔ uwɔ nɛ kunu gɔ, sigɛ le, hakɛ gɔ womɔ gaa.»
43019012	Kɔɔ waaru le baa, Pilate Yesui paju dɛnɛube. Kaa, Yahutunw inɛw gɔbe mii ɛɛn le sɔwaa, kijɛ be gi: «Inɛ aai kanran, unruin ɔgɔnɛi gɛɛjɛ ye, kɔɔbaŋa Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ le yabalu. Wogɔ digɛu, u Yesui pajaajɛu ye, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ e lɛi anrungei laa.»
43019013	Sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgaa, Pilate, Yesui bain go goonaa, wo kuu womɔ le saliyɛ kiru yalu womɔ, tibu le yegeraaɲu gɔ nɛ dɛinyaanbe. Yahutunw sɔɔ le yalu wogɔ boi Gabata gɛɛɲu.
43019014	Bai wogɔ, Taŋagalu janwan dɛi yeguru kunɔɲu bai bee. Naitegei bee. Pilate, Yahutunw gɔbe le kijɛ wo gi: «Ɔgɔnɛ ebe unwɔ.»
43019015	Kaa inɛw gɔbe ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Woi daa, woi daa, baga nɛ woi pɛgɛ ye daa!» Pilate be le sɔwaa kijɛ gi: «Ɔgɔnɛ ebe gɔi baga nɛ pɛgɛ ye daa ma?» Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe saa gin: «Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛi laa ye, emɛ ɔgɔnɛ waja sɛnɛ.»
43019016	Kunrin, Yesui pɛgɛ ye daa ga, Pilate woi numɔ bemɛ nɛ kunaabe. Be Yesui gɛliyaa yaabɛin.
43019017	Yesu, kuu womɔ le baga nɛ woi pɛgɛidɛin gɔ duiyaa, ana kɔlɔ nɛ gowaa, yalu Kuu Togolo gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ yaabe. Yahutunw sɔɔ le yalu gɔ boi Gɔlugota gɛɛɲu.
43019018	Be yalu kɔɔ nɛ Yesui baga jai nɛ pɛgaabɛin. Inɛw lɛi benɛ benɛ womɔ nɛ pɛgaabɛin. Yesu logoro tobe.
43019019	Pilate tɔŋu tɔŋɔmaa, Yesu baga jai gɔ nɛ pɛgaabe. Tɔŋu gɔ ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: «Nasarɛtu ana bɛɛnnɛ Yesu, Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛ.»
43019020	Yesui yalu pɛgin gɔ, ana le bɛrii bee dɛi, Yahutunw joo tɔŋu wogɔ jaŋaabɛin. Tɔŋu gɔ Yahutunw sɔɔ lee, Rɔmɛ sɔɔ lee, Gɛrɛku sɔɔ lee, sɔɔ kɔɔbe le tɔŋɔbe.
43019021	Kɔɔ gin’ wo biyaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe, Pilate le kijɛ be gi: «Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛ tɔŋɔnɔu, kaa, wo unruin Yahutunw ɔgɔnɛi gi ga tɔŋɔ.»
43019022	Pilate aŋa bemɛ saa kijɛ gi: «Kijɛ mu tɔŋu gɔ, tɔŋaatun.»
43019023	Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe Yesui baga nɛ pɛgaatiyaa, sɔi womɔ gɔbe gamulu nai gamalaabɛin. Sɔludasu ii tuturu puu, gamulu turu jeɲaabe. Be arugoi na womɔ gɔ yaa jeɲaabɛin. Arugoi wogɔ ajuru tolo, daa goi ye, doɲu sugo puu sɔi turu bee.
43019024	Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe tunmɔ le kijɛ be gi: «Emɛ arugoi na ɔn kaaramɔnɔugin. Keri teŋɛ ye aa mɔi biyɛdo ma yɛnɛmɔi.» Kunrin sɔɔ kɔɔ le digɛu Ama Dɔn sɔɔ gi ɔn kibaai: “Be tunmɔ le sɔi ma gɔbe gamalaabɛin. Arugoi na ma kuu nɛ keri teŋaabɛin.” Sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe sɔɔ kɔɔ tee woi kanrin.
43019025	Yesu baga jai le bɛrii, wo na lee, yaanran wo na bainɛ lee, Kilopasu yaanran, Mari lee, Mari, Magudala ana bɛɛnnɛ lee yahiŋɛbɛin.
43019026	Yesu, wo na lee, wo na lee bɛrii, jaŋu ii, wo ibɛ gɔ wo iŋɛu iyaabe. Wo unrun na le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Na, ii uwɔ kowɔɔ.»
43019027	Kɔɔ onu nɛ jaŋu ii gɔ le kijɛ wo gi: «U na kowɔɔ.» Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔi nɛ, jaŋu ii gɔ, Yesu nai ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ gɛliyaabe.
43019028	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Yesu, kijɛ puu kanraan kibemaati ga jugaabe. Kunrin Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ too kibemɔ ga, wo ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Diinɔɔrin mui aai.»
43019029	Yalu gɔ nɛ toroi turu le resɛndii ilɛ aaun yadaanbe. Inɛw, kijɛ turu resɛndii ilɛ gɔ nɛ sowaa, isɔpe tiun bagi nɛ pagaa, Yesu aŋa nɛ dɛɛraabɛin.
43019030	Resɛndii ilɛ aaun gɔ biyaa, Yesu kijɛ gi: «Sɔɔ puu kibaai.» Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo kuu jimɛraan, kinrun gowaai.
43019031	Bai kɔɔ, deeliye bai dɛi yeguru kunɔɲu bai gɔ woi bee. Bai kɔɔ Taŋagalu janwan dɛi bai diyɛi bee. Nɛɛ, deeliye bai le yiun gɔbe baga nɛ biyɛnɔu dɛi, Yahutunw inɛw giru toin gɔbe, Pilate bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, inɛw gɔbe ɔgiri yinwaan ye baga jai nɛ bei sunugo ga, unrunbe bɛrɛ kubɔ gɔbe pɛɛlɛtiimɔ gin.
43019032	Kunrin, sɔludasu unrunw wiyaa, inɛw Yesu le pɛgin gɔbe, inɛ pɔlɔ gɔ lee, lɛiye gɔ lee kubɔ pɛɛlaabɛin.
43019033	Yesu mɔ nɛ be dɔwaa, wo kinrun gowaai ga iyaa, kubɔ womɔ pɛɛlɛnɛ.
43019034	Kaa, sɔludasu ii turu, benɛ womɔ saru le sɔbaabe. Ɔgu kɛu, dii lee, ili lee gowaabe.
43019035	Sɔɔ kɔɔ inɛ iyi gɔ, wo sɛɛrɛ gowaabe. Sɛɛrɛ womɔ gɔ narain. Ebaa kanran gawa ga, wo kuu womɔ le sɛɛrɛ wo goi gɔ narain ga igii wɔɔ.
43019036	Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ ɔn kibe ga, sɔɔ kɔɔ biyaabe: “Kii womɔbe turu kanran pɛɛlɛidenɛ.”
43019037	Yalu waja nɛ yaa Ama Dɔn ɔn gin’ gɛɛjɛ: “Be saru le inɛ be sɔbu gɔ bɛrɛ giri dɛdɛɛrɛdɛin.”
43019038	Sɔɔ kɔɔ onu nɛ, Arimate bɛɛnnɛ, Josɛpu, Yesu yiun, unrun bɛrɛ paja ga, Pilate bɛrɛ selumaabe. Josɛpu, Yesu jaŋu ii bee, kaa Yahutunw inɛw giru toin liliyɛ dɛi, wo wogɔ daii jugɔmɔbele. Kunrin wo gɛnyaan, Pilate, Yesu yiun gɔ wo bɛrɛ paja ga yabaabe. Wo wiyaa, yiun gɔ jeɲaabe.
43019039	Ainɛ waja, yalu gɔ nɛ wiyaabe. Wogɔ Nikodɛmui, Yesu bɛrɛ, laa digɛ wɛɛube gɔ woi. Wo yiun yeguru dɛi kijɛ jiɲu ɛju, miire gɛɛɲu gɔ lee, aloɛsu gɛɛɲu gɔ lee mɔɔnaa gɛliyaa wiyaabe. Kijɛ wo jɛɛlu gɔ, kilo pɛtaanu gin’ baa bee.
43019040	Inɛw lɛi kɔɔbe Yesu yiun gɔ jeɲaa, Yahutunw bana yiun yegereɲu le kɛukɛu, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju gɔbe kunaa, goju gɔ puu, lɛn sɔi le tɔnwaanbɛin.
43019041	Nɛɛ, Yesui yalu pɛgin gɔ nɛ sadiŋɛ yabe. Sadiŋɛ gɔ nɛ ɔnsain kana, nimɛ inɛ duunɔtɛnɛ turu tɔgɔraa yegeraa yabe.
43019042	Deeliye bai yeguru kunu sabu dɛi, yalu kɔɔ bɛrii wɔɔ digɛu, be Yesui ɔnsain kɔɔ nɛ duuni.
43020001	Jugu bai pɔlɔ gɔ, yalu nimɛ ɛjɛlu wo wɔu, Mari, Magudala bɛɛnnɛ gɔ, ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaabe. Kɔɔ nɛ dɔwaa, ɔnsain murɔn aŋa nɛ dumɔ bee gɔ, dunɔrɔnmaa goonaatin ga wo iyaabe.
43020002	Wo jɔbaa yaa, Simɔ Piɛru lee, jaŋu ii waja, Yesu ibɛ gɔ lee bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ɔnsain gɔ nɛ Inɛw Baŋa Yesui goonaaɲu. Woi yago kuni ma emɛ inin.»
43020003	Mari kunrin wo sɔwaa, Piɛru lee, jaŋu ii waja gɔ lee gowaa, jɔbaa ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yaaubɛin.
43020004	Be lɛi kɛu jɔbɔubɛin. Kaa jaŋu ii waja gɔ jɔbaa, Piɛru giru nɛ galaa, wo laa ɔnsain gɔ nɛ dɔwaabe.
43020005	Kɔɔ nɛ dɔwaa, wo kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ tebiyaa yɛnaa, lɛn sɔi bojo gɔ minɛ nɛ wo diiun iyaabe. Kaa wo ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yoolu.
43020006	Simɔ Piɛru, onu womɔ nɛ wiyaa dɔwaabe. Wo ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yowaa, lɛn sɔi bojo gɔ lee, Yesu kuu nɛ sɔi tɔnwaan bee gɔ lee yɛnaabe. Sɔi wogɔ, bojo gɔ le dɛiin, yalu turu nɛ munaa duunaa sɛbɛin.
43020008	Jaŋu ii waja wo laa dɔi gɔ, wo kanran ɔnsain gɔ nɛ yowaabe. Wo kijɛ gɔbe iyaa, gawaabe.
43020009	Yesu, yiun logoro nɛ bubulodo ga Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa yato. Kaa kɔɔ waaru le, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe Dɔn sɔɔ gɔ paamu kanrannɛ bɛin.
43020010	Kunrin jaŋu unrunw lɛi gɔbe pilemaa ginrun wiyaabɛin.
43020011	Kaa Mari kai, bain go ɔnsain gɔ genɛ nɛ pii piiu yahiŋɛbe. Pii piiu wɔu, wo tebiyaa, ɔnsain kɔlɔ gɔ yɛnaabe.
43020012	Mɛlɛnkɛ lɛi, sɔi pilu le, Yesu yiun yalu diinbe gɔ nɛ be daaun, wo iyaabe. Turu, kuutuŋɔ go daanbe. Waja gɔ, kubɔsɔrɔ go daanbe.
43020013	Mɛlɛnkɛ kɔɔbe Mari le kijɛ be gi: «Yaanran, u inge dɛi pii piijɛu?» Mari saa, Inɛw Baŋa unrunmɔi goonaaɲu, woi yago kuni ma inɔn dɛi gi.
43020014	Kunrin sɔɔu, wo kigelemaa, Yesu, kɔɔ nɛ iŋɛu wo wɔu iyaabe. Kaa kɔɔ Yesui bee ma wo inɛɛ bee.
43020015	Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «Emɛ saa, u inge dɛi pii piijɛu? U aai dɛnɛuwɔu?» Mari, sadiŋɛ birɛbirɛnɛ gɔi unrun le sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ ga ajubaa, ɔn gin’ sai: «Mu baŋa, woi u jeɲu ye, yalu woi u kunu mui taga. Mu woi jejeɲɛdɔn.»
43020016	Kunrin wo sɔwaa, Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «Mari.» Mari onu kigelemaa, Yahutunw sɔɔ le ɔn gin’ Yesui boonu: «Rabuni.» Tiyɛ gɔ jaŋudeerenɛ.
43020017	Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «Mui ai gɛliyɛnɔu. Mu nimɛ kanran mu Ba bɛrɛ ulolun. Kaa, mu ba unrunw bɛrɛ yai taga, maa, mu Ba lee, e Ba lee bɛrɛ ulojɔn wa. Ama ma, iyaa Ama ebe gɔ bɛrɛ ulojɔn wa.»
43020018	Mari Magudala, kunrin ginrun wiyaa, unrun Inɛw Baŋa Yesui iyaabɔn, sɔɔ kɔɔbe unrun le gi ga, jaŋu unrunw gɔbei tagaabe.
43020019	Jugu bai pɔlɔ, bai kɔɔ tee, digɛnai gɔ le, jaŋu unrunw, ginrun kɔlɔ nɛ mɔrinyaan, taan puu pinaa tobɛin. Be Yahutunwin liliyɛbɛin. Yesu kowiyaa, logoro bemɛ nɛ iŋiyaan kijɛ wo gi: «Jamu e le biyɛ.»
43020020	Kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaatiyaa, Yesu numɔ womɔbe pɛgin gɔ lee, benɛ womɔ sɔbin gɔ lee, bei tagaraabe. Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe Inɛw Baŋa Yesui be iyi gɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛli le bɛin.
43020021	Yesu iyaa be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Jamu e le biyɛ. Mu Ba bana mui tii gin’, mu yaa ei tiiuwɔn.»
43020022	Kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaatiyaa, wo kuu bemɛ nɛ aŋa uju womɔ puyaa tiyaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Kikinu Pilu gɔ bɛɛi.
43020023	Hakɛ bemɛ inɛw bɛrɛ yaabu e kanraindo gɔ, wogɔ bɛɛnw bɛrɛ yaabu kakanrandɛin. Inɛw bɛrɛ hakɛ bemɛ yaabu e kanranlu gɔ, hakɛ bemɛ yaabu kanraindenɛ.»
43020024	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ waaru unruin wo taguru le, pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe logoro nɛ jaŋu ii Tɔmasu gɛɛɲu gɔ, ginrun gɔ nɛ tobele. Tɔmasu, boi waja womɔ Jiŋɛ gɛɛɲu.
43020025	Tɔmasu pilemaa wo wiyaa, wajunw gɔ wo le sɔwaa, unrunbe Inɛw Baŋa Yesui iyaabɛin gin. Kaa wo aŋa bemɛ ɔn gin’ sai: «Yesu numɔ pɛgu sɛɛrɛ iyelun go, numɔ ma nanawanran gɔ nɛ kunaa yɛnɛlun go, iyaa, benɛ womɔ sɔbin nanawanran gɔ nɛ numɔ ma kunaa yɛnɛlun go, mu gawaidolɔn.»
43020026	Tɔmasu, kɔɔ gin’ sɔi, bai gagara wo galaa, Yesu jaŋu unrunw gɔbe iyaa ginrun gɔ nɛ yamɔrɔnbɛin. Tɔmasu be le yabe. Taan gɔbe sɔsɔgɔ bee. Kaa Yesu wiyaa, logoro bemɛ nɛ iŋiyaan, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Jamu e le biyɛ.»
43020027	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Tɔmasu le kijɛ wo gi: «Numɔ uwɔ ɔn nɛ dɔɔnɔ ye, numɔ ma nanawanran gɔ taba yɛnɛ. Benɛ ma nɛ yaa numɔ uwɔ kunɔ yɛnɛ. Gawalu go biyɛnɔu, kaa gawa.»
43020028	Yesu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Tɔmasu, aŋa womɔ saa kijɛ gi: «Ui Inɛw Baŋa mai, iyaa Ama mai.»
43020029	Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «Mui u iyi gɔ dɛi gawu woi laa? Mui iyelu go inɛw gawaɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.»
43020030	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ giru nɛ taanrinyɛn wo kanrun joo, dɔn ɔn nɛ tɔŋɔla.
43020031	Kaa Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ, iyaa, Ama Aini gɔ, Yesu woi ga ebaa gawa ye, iyaa, gagawu wogɔ le wɔnu, boi womɔ le ɔnmɔ bɛɛmɔjɛ ebaa jugɔ dɛi, sɔɔ ɔnbe tɔŋi.
43021001	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe onu nɛ, Yesu iyaa, Tiberiade dibe diŋirun nɛ, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe. Bana unruin wo taguru gɔ unwɔ:
43021002	Simɔ Piɛru lee, Tɔmasu, Jiŋɛ gɛɛɲu gɔ lee, Galile gana, Kana ana bɛɛnnɛ, Natanayɛlu lee, Sebede unrunw gɔ lee, iyaa, Yesu jaŋu unrunw waja lɛi lee, be wooi puu, yalu turu nɛ bɛin.
43021003	Konɛ wɔu, Simɔ Piɛru be le sɔwaa, unrun iiju aa yaajɔn gi. Be yaa saa, unrunbe wo le yayaadɛin gin. Kunrin, be gowaa, diikoro nɛ yowaa yaabɛin. Digɛ wogɔ, be iiju turu kanran bɛɛnɛ.
43021004	Nɛɛ aga, baa wo yaa, Yesu, dii diŋirun gɔ nɛ yabe. Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, Yesui ma inin bɛin.
43021005	Yesu be le sɔwaa kijɛ gi: «Hei unrunw, e iiju aa kijɛ turu kanran bɛɛli ma?» Be saa, unrunbe bɛɛnɛ gin.
43021006	«Aiwa, jɔɔ gɔ diikoro numɔ iin sibɛ go kama kunɔi, e iiju bɛbɛɛdei.» Kunrin, be jɔɔ gɔ kamaa kunaabɛin. Iiju bana jowaa tobe gɔ, be jɔɔ gɔ biɲɛ goonɔ bɛɛbenɛ.
43021007	Jaŋu ii Yesu ibɛ gɔ, Piɛru le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Yɛnɛ, Inɛw Baŋai.» Inɛw Baŋai ga ɛgɛu digɛu, Simɔ Piɛru, sɔi tobele bɔɔi gɔ dɛi, sɔi unrunmɔ jeɲaa kunaa, dii gɔ nɛ kiliyaa yowaabe.
43021008	Jaŋu unrunw wajunw gɔbe diikoro gɔ nɛ tou, jɔɔ gɔ iiju joo, bumɔu kunrin wɛin. Dii gɔ nɛ yalu be bee, numɔlagu suŋu lɛi dɛi sigɛ minɛ le wagee bele.
43021009	Diikoro gɔ nɛ gowaa, minɛ nɛ waaru be sugu le, be yaun iyaabɛin. Iiju, yaun gɔ kuu nɛ yadiinbe, buru yaa yabe.
43021010	Yesu be le sɔwaa kijɛ gi: «Iiju kanɛ e ai gɔ gamuu ɔn nɛ jɛɛlɛi.»
43021011	Simɔ Piɛru, diikoro gɔ nɛ yowaa, jɔɔ gɔ biɲaa minɛ nɛ sunugaabe. Iiju poo poo, suŋu le pɛnumɔrɔn taanusigɛ wogɔ nɛ tobe. Iiju kɔɔ baa jɔɔ gɔ nɛ tobe kanran, jɔɔ gɔ pulolu.
43021012	Yesu be le sɔwaa, kijɛ gi: «Wɛɛ pana kayai.» Jaŋu unrunw gɔ logoro nɛ inɛ turu kanran woi aai ma wo bɛrɛ selumɛ ga daariyɛlu. Inɛw Baŋa woi ga, be puu igii bɛin.
43021013	Yesu yadɔwaa, buru gɔ jeɲaa be bɛrɛ obaabe. Wo iiju gɔ yaa bei obaabe.
43021014	Yesu, yiun logoro nɛ bulaa wo goi nɛ, jaŋu unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ unruin wo taguru, kɔɔ kubɔ taaniye gɔi bee.
43021015	Pana kayaa kilaa, Yesu, Simɔ Piɛru le kijɛ gi: «Jan ii Simɔ, u inɛw wajunw ɔnbe dɛi sigɛ, mui ibɛu ma?» Piɛru saa: «Ee, Inɛw Baŋa, mu ui ibɛɛ wɔun ga u igii wɔu.» Yesu kijɛ wo le gi: «Peju mabei kajuba.»
43021016	Yesu, kubɔ lɛiye gɔ Piɛru le sɔwaa: «Jan ii Simɔ, u mui ibɛɛ wɔu ma?» Piɛru saa: «Ee, Inɛw Baŋa, mu ui ibɛɛ wɔun ga u igii wɔu.» Yesu iyaa kijɛ wo gi: «Peju mabei kajuba.»
43021017	Yesu, kubɔ taaniye gɔ Piɛru bɛrɛ selumaa: «Jan ii Simɔ, u mui ibɛɛ wɔu ma?» Kubɔ taaniye kɔɔ, woi ibɛɛ wɔɔ ma, Yesu selumu gɔ dɛi, Piɛru kinɛ jinwaain. Wo ɔn gin’ sai: «Inɛw Baŋa, u kijɛ puu igii wɔu. Mu ui ibɛɛ wɔun ga u igii wɔu.» Yesu wo le kijɛ gi: «Peju mabei kajuba.»
43021018	Yesu, sɔɔ kɔɔ kuu nɛ gimaa Piɛru le kijɛ gi: «Mu naran go u bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, sagatarai waaru u bee le, u turu sai dɔin uwɔ pagaa yegeraa ye, yalu u dɛnɛjɛ nɛ yaaubeu. Kaa waaru u pɛyaajɛ, numɔ uwɔ jeɲaa u jɛ ye, inɛ waja dɔin uwɔ paga ye, yalu yai u dɛnɛɛlɛ nɛ ui dimɛrɛn ye yaado.»
43021019	Sɔɔ kɔɔ le digɛu, Yesu, Piɛru bana yinwɛindo sɔɔi jugɔmɔube. Yiun womɔ le digɛnu, Piɛru Amai bana wo dooromɔido jugɔmɔube. Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, Yesu, Piɛru le kijɛ gi: «Mui yadimiyɛn.»
43021020	Piɛru onu gɔnaa yɛnaa, Yesu, jaŋu ii wo ibɛ gɔ, onu bemɛ nɛ wo dimɛu iyaabe. Digɛ pana kayau, Yesu sibɛ go gɛŋiyaan, numɔ nɛ inɛ woi kunɔido gɔ aai ma, selumɛnɛ gɔ woi.
43021021	Piɛru, jaŋu ii kɔɔi iyaa, Yesu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛw Baŋa, inɛ ɔn dɛi yani biyɛdo? Wo bɛrɛ kijɛ inge dɔɔdo?»
43021022	Yesu saa kijɛ gi: «Pilemu ye mu wɛɛido baa, womaa ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga wɔun kanran, u le ingei digɛ? U kai, mui yadimiyɛn.»
43021023	Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu wo sɔi gɔ digɛu, jaŋu ii kɔɔ yinwɛindolo ga, ba unrunw logoro nɛ ginaa bee. Kaa Yesu, Piɛru womaa jaŋu ii kɔɔ yinwɛindolo gɛɛlu. Kijɛ wo gi: «Pilemu ye mu wɛɛido baa, womaa ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga wɔun kanran, u le ingei digɛ?»
43021024	Jaŋu ii tunmɔ wogɔ, sɔɔ ɔnbe sɛɛrɛ gowaa, wo tɔŋu. Iyaa sɛɛrɛ womɔ narain ga, emɛ igii wɔin.
43021025	Yesu, kijɛ waja joo kanraanbe. Tuturu puu digu le digu le tɔŋɔ gin ye, ajubu ma nɛ, aduna nɛ, wogɔ dɔn gɔbe yalu kunɔɲu bɛɛmɔidolo.
44001001	Teyɔpile, Yesu birɛ womɔ tɔlaa, alagala woi uni bai yai dɔɔ, kijɛ wo kanrun lee, wo deeru lee sɔɔ, mu dɔn pɔlɔ ma nɛ sɔwaabɔn. Alagala wo ulomɔ nɛ, Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le, wo jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu wo yɛmu gɔbe bɛrɛ tɔɔru unrunmɔ obaabe.
44001003	Yesu, wo yinwun onu nɛ, wo ɔnmɔi bana dɛin dɛin joo le jaŋu unrunw tunmɔ kɔɔbe bɛrɛ, bai pɛnai baa daii unruin tagaraa, Ama diinɛ sɔɔ be le sɔɔube.
44001004	Yesu, jaŋu unrunw womɔ le mɔrinyaan wɔu, wo be bɛrɛ ɛɛnnaa sɔwaa, bemaa Jerusalɛmu ana le wageniyɛnnɔu gi. Kijɛ be le wo gi: «Mu Ba kijɛ pui kunaabe ga e bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔ, wogɔ dɔmiyɛin.
44001005	Jan, dii le inɛi batise kanrun. Kaa, e kai, bai gaila nɛ, Kikinu Pilu nɛ ei batise kanrandɛin.»
44001006	Yesu kunrin wo sɔwaa, jaŋu unrunw wo le mɔrinyaan bɛin gɔbe selumaa: «Inɛw Baŋa, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu bɛrɛ pilemu ye laamu womɔ u oboido waaru gɔ kɔɔi ma?»
44001007	Yesu aŋa bemɛ saa: «Ama, kuu womɔ le waaru kɛjaa wo sɛɛ gɔ ma, bai kɛjaa wo sɛɛ gɔ ma jugɔ ga sɔɔ ebei laa.
44001008	Kikinu Pilu, kuu ebe nɛ waaru wo sugaajɛ, e gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛdei. Kunrin, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ lee, Judea gana puu nɛ lee, Samari gana nɛ lee, minɛ kale wooi nɛ lee e sɛɛrɛ ma goowin biyɛdei.»
44001009	Sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔwaatiyaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe Yesui yɛnɛu be wɔu, woi daa go jeɲaa unaatin. Anrankulumɔ wiyaa giru bemɛ nɛ woi dɛbaati.
44001010	Yesu ulou wo wɔu, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, giri daa go dɛɛraa yɛnɛu yagɛlɛbɛin. Kɔɔ waaru le, anranw lɛi sɔi pilu le wiyaa giru bemɛ nɛ iŋiyaan,
44001011	kijɛ be gi: «Galile gana bɛɛnw, ɔn nɛ iŋiyaan alagala go yɛnɛu e wɔɔ gɔ ingei? Yesu, logoro ebe nɛ jeɲaa alagala go uni gɔ, bana alagala yaau wo wɔu e iyi gin’ tee, pilemɛ ye yinwɛɛdo.»
44001012	Sɔɔ kɔɔ onu nɛ, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe Oliwe tetemɛ gɔ nɛ gowaa, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ yowaabɛin. Oliwe tetemɛ gɔ Jerusalɛmu le wagela. Kilomɛtɛrɛ turu gin’ wɔɔ.
44001013	Jerusalɛmu nɛ yowaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, ginrun sɔɔrɔ pɔɔlɔ baa be biyɛjɛ gɔ nɛ ulaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ inɛw bɛin gɔbe unwɔin: Piɛru lee, Jan lee, Jake lee, Andere lee, Pilipe lee, Tɔmasu lee, Barutelɛmi lee, Matiu lee, Alupe ii Jake lee, Simɔ gana gɔ gunɔ nɛ goo ga mainiyɛunbe gɔ lee, Jake ii Judasu lee.
44001014	Be wooi puu ajubu turu le biyaa, amagɛɛn nɛ mainiyɛunbɛin. Yesu na Mari lee, yaanw gamuu lee, Yesu suŋɔw lee be le yabɛin.
44001015	Waaru kɔɔbe le, bai turu jaŋu unrunw suŋu le pɛɛlɛi gin’ mɔrinyaanbɛin. Piɛru, logoro bemɛ nɛ ingelaa ɔn gin’ sɔi:
44001016	«Ba unrunw, Ama Dɔn sɔɔ kibe ga waajibi bee. Pɔɔlɔ baa, Kikinu Pilu, Dawide bɛrɛ Ama Dɔn gɔ nɛ Judasu dɛi sɔɔ sɔɔmaabe. Kunrin, Judasu, inɛw Yesui aai wɛin gɔbe giru teeremɔnɛi biyaabe.
44001017	Wo emɛ bɔɔi bee. Emɛ le woi lugoubɛin. Iyaa, Ama birɛ ɔn nɛ woi yaa yatobe.»
44001018	Kaa sɔɔ mɔɲu wo kanrun tujɔ gɔ le, wo minɛ ɛbaabe. Wo, bɛrɛ womɔ kuu nɛ bagaa sugaa, bɛrɛ gɔ pojaa kɔruja gɔ minɛ nɛ buriyaa gowaabe.
44001019	Jerusalɛmu ana bɛɛnw puu sɔɔ wogɔ saii igii bɛin. Wogɔ dɛi, be minɛ gɔ boi, sɔɔ bemɛ le Hakɛludama kuni, tiyɛ gɔ ili minɛ.
44001020	«Nɛɛ Sɔmu dɔn gɔ nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “Ginrun womɔ kooloi wo biyɛmɔ. Inɛ turu kanran, waja wogɔ nɛ biyɛnɔu.” Iyaa tɔŋaa gi: “Birɛ womɔ inɛ waja wo jeɲɛmɔ.”
44001021	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Jan waaru batise kanraun bee nɛ gowaa, Yesui logoro emɛ nɛ jeɲaa alagala uni bai wɛɛ dɔɔ, waaru puu, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu onu nɛ, emɛ le inɛw dimɛbɛin logoro nɛ, waajibi inɛ turu emɛ le bari ye, Yesu bulogu sɛɛrɛi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.»
44001023	Kɔɔ dɛi, inɛw gɔbe, inɛw lɛi siiraa tagurin: Josɛpu lee Matiasu lee. Josɛpu boi, inɛw Barusabasu boonɔubɛin. Iyaa boi waja womɔ Jusutusu gɛɛbɛin.
44001024	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, be ɔn gin’ Ama gɛɛin: «Inɛw Baŋa, u inɛw puu kinɛ jugɔnɛ gɔ, inɛw lɛi ɔnbe logoro nɛ, inɛ u yɛmu gɔ tagara.
44001025	Kɔɔbaŋa, Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui bii ye, birɛ ɔn nɛ Judasu dilɛ nɛ wo yoomɔ. Judasu, birɛ gɔ pajaatiyaa, yalu wo yaaun jaan nɛ yaai.»
44001026	Kunrin Ama gɛnyaantiyaa, be inɛw lɛi gɔbe dɛi keri tɛŋaabɛin. Keriteŋu gɔ Matiasu kuu nɛ sugu. Kunrin, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu pɛli turusigɛ gɔbe kuu nɛ woi baraabɛin.
44002001	Pantekɔte janwan bai wo dɔwaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe puu yalu turu nɛ mɔrinyaan bɛin.
44002002	Kunrin be mɔrɔun, kubɔ turu ooɲɔ diyɛ suyojɛ gin’, siɲɛ alagala gowaa, ginrun be daanbe gɔ nɛ jowaabe.
44002003	Ninɛbe, yaun bije muriin tunmɔ le kabiyɛu be wɔu be iyaabɛin. Ninɛ gɔbe inɛ tuturu puu kuu nɛ dɛinyaanbɛin.
44002004	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe puu, Kikinu Pilu le jowaa, tɔgu wajabe sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabɛin. Inɛ kanma puu Ama Kikinu aŋa bemɛ nɛ sɔɔ bana kunɔbe gin’ sɔɔubɛin.
44002005	Nɛɛ Yahutunw Ama giri liyɛnw, aduna gana puu nɛ gowaa, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ wiyaa yadaanbɛin.
44002006	Siɲɛ gɔ wo gowaa, inɛw joo kɔɔbe yalu gɔ nɛ jɔbaa wiyaa mɔrinyaanbɛin. Inɛ tuturu puu, sɔɔ womɔ tɔitɔi le, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, sɔɔ sɔɔu be wɔu ɛgaa, bei bimiliyaabe.
44002007	Sɔɔ gɔ be bɛrɛ halu maunɛ kanraan, be kijɛ kanranɲu inin bɛin. Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Yɛnɛi, inɛw sɔɔ sɔɔnw ɔnbe, Galile gana bɛɛnwin laain ma?
44002008	Emɛ tuturu puu, emɛ ba ginrun sɔɔ aŋa bemɛ nɛ yani ɛgɛuwɔin?
44002009	Emɛ Parute bɛɛnw lee, Mɛdi bɛɛnw lee, Elamu bɛɛnw lee, iyaa, Mɛsopotami gana lee, Judea gana lee, Kapadɔse gana lee, Pɔn gana lee, Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ lee,
44002010	Piriji gana lee, Panpili gana lee, Ejipute gana lee, Libi gana, Sirɛnɛ ana le bɛrii wɔɔ gɔ lee, Rɔmɛ ana lee,
44002011	iyaa Yahutunw lee, Yahutunw oju nɛ inɛw toin lee, Kɛrɛte gana inɛw lee, Arabu tɔgu lee, emɛ gana dɛin dɛin kɔɔbe nɛ inɛw goin gɔbe, sɔɔ emɛ tɔitɔi le Ama ɛju kanrun sɔɔ, aŋa bemɛ nɛ ɛgɛuwɔin.»
44002012	Be puu bɛrɛ saii maunɛ kanraan, be sɔɔ ajubaɲu inin bɛin. Tunmɔ le sɔɔu, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Kijɛ ɔn tiyɛ gɔ ingei?»
44002013	Kaa inɛw gamuu, sɔɔ gɔ jairɛ kanraun, saa: «Be kɔɲɔ le bimiliyaa wɔin.»
44002014	Piɛru, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu pɛli turusigɛ wajunw gɔbe be wooi ingelaa wɔu, mii jeɲaa mɔɔnu gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu ba unrunw Yahutunw gɔbe lee Jerusalɛmu nɛ inɛw wiyaa dɛinyaan wɔin gɔbe lee, sɔɔ ma nɛ suguru dɛɛraa ye, sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii paamu kanrain.
44002015	Inɛw ɔnbe kɔɲɔi nɔwaan bimiliyaa wɔin ga bana ajubaa e sɛɛ gin’ wɔnɛ. Nimɛ nai ɛjii goolu. Aga lɛɛrɛ tuwɔ sai wɔɔ.
44002016	Kaa inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Jowɛlu, sɔɔ bibiyɛdo wo gi gɔ, wogɔ ɔn woi.
44002017	“Ama ɔn gin’ sɔi wa: ‘Waaru dumɔ gɔ le, mu Adama unrunw puu kuu nɛ Kikinu ma ɛjii wɛwɛɛmɔdɔn. Anran unrunw ebe lee unrunw yaanw ebe lee, sɔɔ mu bɛrɛ goi sɔsɔɔdɛin. Sagataranw ebe kuu iye ihiyedɛin. Inɛw naw ebe yaŋawelu weweledɛin.
44002018	Ɔnhɔn, bai wogɔbe nɛ, gunɔ anranw ma lee gunɔ yaanw ma lee kuu nɛ Kikinu ma togo titiidɔn. Kunrin, be sɔɔ mu bɛrɛ goi sɔsɔɔdɛin.
44002019	Mu daa go, alagala nɛ yarabirɛ kanrun ye tatagaradɔn. Minɛ nɛ sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn kakanrandɔn. Ili lee, yaun lee, kukumɔ diyɛ lee ihiyemɔdo.
44002020	Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido, bai diyɛ naa diyɛ gɔ wo dɔɔmɔ nɛ, nai wijɛ gɔ, ɔlɔi taŋayaado. Iyepilu banraan ye, ili gin’ biyɛdo.
44002021	Kɔɔ waaru le, inɛ aai kanran, Inɛw Baŋa boi boonaajɛ gɔ woi yayabadɛin.’”
44002022	«Aiwa, Isɛrɛlu anranw, sɔɔ ɔn keŋiyɛin: Yesu, Nasarɛtu ana bɛɛnnɛ gɔ, e woi igii wɔi. Bana e jugaajɛ gin’, Ama wo le yabaajɛ tagara ga, taanrinyɛn lee, yarabirɛ lee, sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee wo bɛrɛ, logoro ebe nɛ kanranmaabe.
44002023	Ama pɔɔlɔ baa, wo dɛi sɔɔ bibiyɛdo ga wo kɛju gɔ, sɔɔ wogɔ, Yesu, bana wo jugaa bee le kɛukɛu, woi numɔ nɛ kunaabɛin. E mɔɲu kanranw numɔ nɛ woi kunaa, baga nɛ pɛgaa daamaabei.
44002024	Kaa Ama woi bulomaa, yiun ɔɲɛ nɛ yabaa goonaabe. Yiun woi ai gɛliyɛ ga, wogɔ gɔnrɔn sɛbele.
44002025	Yɛnɛi, Dawide, wo dɛi ɔn gin’ sɔi: “Mu waaru puu Inɛw Baŋai giru ma nɛ iyeubɔn. Kijɛ turu kanran mui jigemɔnɔu ga, wo numɔ iin ma sibɛ nɛ bee.
44002026	Kɔɔ digɛu, mu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔun, iyaa sɔɔ mu sɔɔjɛ gɔbe kinɛ ɛɛlu sɔɔi. Halu mui goju nawain kanran, mu diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
44002027	Sabu Ama, u kikinu ma yinwunrun nɛ pajaidolou. Iyaa, inɛ yɛmaa dɛiin u bojaajɛ gɔ, yiun womɔ ɔmaai biyɛ ga yabaidolou.
44002028	U mu nɛ, ɔnmɔ oju gɔbe tagaraabeu. U mu le wɔu dɛi, u mui kinɛ ɛɛli le jojoonɔdou.”
44002029	«Aiwa, ba unrunw mabe, emɛ tirɛ ainɛ diyɛ Dawide dɛi e bɛrɛ naran mu sɔɔmɔi: Woi yinwaan, bojaatin. Iye bai dɔɔ, ɔnsain womɔ logoro emɛ nɛ kowɔɔ.
44002030	Kaa wo inɛ Ama titiyainɛi bee. Iyaa, Ama, kuu unrunmɔ le jɛbiyaa, wo tiruwɛnɛ turu, dilɛ womɔ nɛ ɔgɔ dɛdɛinyɛndo gi ga wo igii bee.
44002031	Wogɔ digɛu, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ bulogu sɔɔ gɔ, wo pɔɔlɔ baa iyaa, sɔɔ kɔɔbe le digɛu sɔwaabe. “Kikinu womɔ gɔ yinwunrun nɛ pajanɛ. Iyaa, sɛgɛ womɔ biyaa sainyɛnlu.”
44002032	Yesu wogɔ, Ama woi bulogaabe. Emɛ wooi puu, sɔɔ wogɔ sɛɛrɛbei.
44002033	Nɛɛ, woi jeɲaa alagala go unaa, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ daani onu nɛ, wo, wo Ba Kikinu wo bɛrɛ ohobodo ga pui kunu gɔ biyaabe. Kijɛ emɛ nɛ e iyejɛ gɔ lee e ɛgɛjɛ gɔ lee, wogɔ Kikinu Pilu wo tiyaajɛ gɔi.
44002034	Yɛnɛi, Dawide alagala ulolu. Kaa kuu womɔ le, wo ɔn gin’ sɔɔ sɔi: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama, Inɛw Baŋa ma le ɔn gin’ gi: ‘Jaŋuw uwɔ gɔbe gɔnrɔn ye kubɔ uwɔ doɲu nɛ yai mu kunɔido baa, uwɔ numɔ iin ma sibɛ nɛ wɛɛ dɛinyɛn.’”
44002036	«Aiwa, wogɔ digɛu, Isɛrɛlu inɛw puu, naran go sɔɔ ɔn jugɔi: Yesu, baga nɛ e pɛgu gɔ, Ama, woi Inɛw Baŋai boju. Iyaa, Yabanɛ Diyɛ wo tii gɔ woi.»
44002037	Piɛru sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ bemɛ ɛjii jigemaabe. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi waaru sɔɔ womɔ kilu le, be Piɛru lee Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu wajunw gɔbe lee bɛrɛ kijɛ be gi: «Ba unrunw, emɛ inge kanraun jaan?»
44002038	Piɛru be le saa: «Hakɛ ebe yaabu kanran ga, bana ebe dulomaajɛi ye, Yesu Kirisito boi le ei batise kunɔmɔi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Kikinu Pilu gɔ, e bɛrɛ sin obu go ohobodɛin.
44002039	Ɔnhɔn, pui gɔ e lee unrunw ebe lee bɛrɛ kuni. Inɛw yalu wage nɛ wɔin dɛi kuni. Iyaa, Inɛw Baŋa, Ama emɛ, inɛw joo wo bɛrɛ boonu wo jɛɛlɛido gɔbe bɛrɛ kuni.»
44002040	Kunrin sɔɔ waja dɛin dɛin le, Piɛru, inɛw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ goou, bei tinwɛnrɛun, bemaa kanɛ inɛw mɔɲu ɔnbe kanran gɔ nɛ jɔbɔ goo ye, kuu bemɛ goonɔ gɛɛube.
44002041	Inɛw sɔɔ womɔ le yabin gɔbe puui batise kunaabɛin. Bai wogɔ, inɛw muɲu taanu gin’ be nɛ bariyaabe.
44002042	Be wooi puu, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe deeru gɔ nɛ lee, tunmɔ le bɔɔi bii gɔ nɛ lee, tunmɔ le mɔrin ye pana kayi gɔ nɛ lee, amagɛɛn gɔbe nɛ lee ɛjii kuu kunaa, mainiyɛunbɛin.
44002043	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe le digɛu, yarabirɛ lee sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee joo biyɛube. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛw puu liliyɛ le bɛin.
44002044	Inɛw Yesu le gawaa bɛin gɔbe puu, tunmɔ le bɛin. Be kijɛ bemɛ puu tunmɔ le gamalaubɛin.
44002045	Kunrin, kijɛ be sɛbe ma, minɛ bemɛ ma dɔnraan ye, buudu gɔ mɔɔnaa ye, inɛ tuturu bɛrɛ kai womɔ le kɛukɛu gamalaubɛin.
44002046	Bai puu maini le, be Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ ajubu turu le yaaubɛin. Be tunmɔ le mɔrin mɔrin, ginrun ginrun nɛ pana kayaubɛin. Be wogɔ kinɛ ɛɛli le, iyaa kinɛpilu le kanraunbɛin.
44002047	Be iyaa Ama sɔmɔubɛin. Inɛw puu bɛrɛ sɔɔ bemɛ ɛjii bee. Inɛw Baŋa yaa bai puu kuu bemɛ nɛ inɛw yabaaɲu baraube.
44003001	Digɛnai turu, amagɛɛn waaru le, Piɛru lee, Jan lee mɔrinyaan, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ uloubɛin. Lɛɛrɛ taanu waaru lei bee.
44003002	Bai puu, inɛw, ainɛ yaaranɛ turui duiyaa jɛɛlaa ye, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ dori Giru Yɛnu Ɛju gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ daanaubɛin. Ainɛ gɔi yaaranɛi yinnarin. Ama Ginrun gɔ nɛ inɛw yooɲu bɛrɛ gɛɛn gɛɛn bɛɛ giye woi kɔɔ nɛ daanaubɛin.
44003003	Piɛru lee Jan lee Ama Ginrun gɔ nɛ yoodo ga be wɔu, ainɛ gɔ bei iyaa, be bɛrɛ sin obu gɛnyaanbe.
44003004	Piɛru lee Jan lee giri bemɛ ainɛ gɔ nɛ dɛɛraa sɛu, Piɛru wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Emi yɛnɛ.»
44003005	Ainɛ gɔ numɔ bemɛ nɛ kijɛ ingei bɛɛdo ma ga ɛjii bei yɛnɛube.
44003006	Kaa Piɛru wo le kijɛ gi: «Mu sarudu sɛlɔn, kange yaa sɛlɔn. Kaa kijɛ mu sɛɛ gɔ, mu ui obouwɔn. Nasarɛtu ana bɛɛnnɛ, Yesu Kirisito boi le ingele ye yoi yaa.»
44003007	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo ainɛ gɔ numɔ iin aa, woi ingelemaabe. Waaru kɔɔ le tee, kubɔ womɔ lee kubɔ kɔkɔlɔ womɔ lee nɛ paŋa yowaabe.
44003008	Ainɛ gɔ kiliyaa ingelaa, yoi yaai tɔlaabe. Wo Piɛru lee Jan lee onu nɛ dimiyaan, Ama Ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaa, yoi yaau kiliyeu, Amai sɔmɔube.
44003009	Yoi yaau, Ama sɔmɔu wo wɔu inɛw puu iyaabɛin.
44003010	Be Ama Ginrun Diyɛ dori Giru Yɛnu Ɛju gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ gɛɛn gɛɛnnu ainɛ dɛinyɛnjɛ gɔ woi ga jugaabɛin. Kijɛ wo bɛrɛ bii gɔ dɛi, inɛw bɛrɛ saii maunɛ kanraanbe.
44003011	Ainɛ bajumi gɔ Piɛru lee Jan lee onu nɛ pilemɛbele. Inɛw bɛrɛ sɔɔ gɔ ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe gɔ digɛu, be jɔbaa wiyaa, yalu be bee gɔ nɛ mɔrinyaanbɛin. Yalu gɔ boi Salomɔ togu gɛɛɲu.
44003012	Piɛru wogɔ iyaa, inɛw gɔ le kijɛ wo gi: «Mu ba unrunw Isɛrɛlu bɛɛnw, inge dɛi sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaa wɔɔ? Ainɛ gɔi kuu emɛ gɔnrɔn le ma, Ama giru liyɛ emɛ le ma woi yoi emɛ yaamu gin’, emɛ nɛ giri dɛɛraa e wɔɔ gɔ ingei?
44003013	Abarahamu Ama gɔ, Isaka Ama gɔ, Jakɔbu Ama gɔ, emɛ babe puu Ama gɔ, sɔɔ ɔn le digɛu, wo birɛbirɛnɛ womɔ Yesui babauwɔ. E Yesui inin ga, woi ibɛlai ga, Sɛmɛginɛ Pilate giru nɛ yingi. Iyaa, woi numɔ nɛ yinkuni. Kɔɔi laa ye, Pilate woi paju ibɛi bee.
44003014	Yɛnɛi, inɛ ɛjaai Ama bɛrɛ goi gɔ, inɛ teitai gɔ, e woi inin, woi ibɛlai ga, Pilate womaa inɛ daanɛ gɔi e bɛrɛ paja ga gɛnyaanbei.
44003015	Kunrin, ɔnmɔ kuu baŋa gɔ, e woi daamaabei. Kaa Ama, yiun logoro nɛ woi bulomaabe. Emɛ wogɔ sɛɛrɛi.
44003016	Yesu boi le gawu gɔ dɛi, boi womɔ gɔnrɔn gɔ, ainɛ e iyejɛ, e jugɔjɛ ɔn nɛ paŋa kunaabe. Iyaa, Yesu boi le gawu gɔ, ainɛ ɔin bana e iyejɛ le kɛukɛu, sɛɛu wo bajumu.
44003017	«Nɛɛ, ba unrunw, e jugɔla dɛi kunrin Yesu bɛrɛ kanrin ga mu igii wɔun. Inɛw giru toin ebe gɔbe yaa jugɔla dɛi kanrin.
44003018	Kaa, giru nɛ baa, Ama, inɛw titiyaanw womɔ puu le digɛu sɔwaa, Yabanɛ Diyɛ unrun tiido gɔ ɔhɔɲɔdo wo gi gɔ, kijɛ e kanrun gɔ le kibemaati.
44003019	Nɛɛ Ama, hakɛ ebe yaaɲu goonɔti ga, bana ebe dulomaajɛ ye, pilemɛ ye Ama bɛrɛ wɛi ye, wo le tubiyei.
44003020	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, e bɛrɛ kinɛ kaalu waaru ohobodo. Iyaa, Yabanɛ Diyɛ e dɛi giru nɛ bojaa wo sɛbe, Yesu gɔ, e bɛrɛ titiido.
44003021	Kijɛ puu pilemɛ ye sɛɛu yegereidɛin waaru dɔɔido baa, waajibi Yesu kɔɔ, alagala nɛ yabiyɛdo. Ama pɔɔlɔ baa, inɛw titiyaanw ɛjaa womɔbe le digɛu, kijɛ puu pilemɛ ye yeyegeredo ga sɔwaabe.
44003022	Kunrin, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Mɔise kijɛ gi unwɔ: “Inɛw Baŋa, Ama ebe gɔ, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ, mu gin’ e ba unrunw logoro nɛ gogoomɔdo. Sɔɔ wo gɛɛido wooi nɛ e woi keŋiyɛin.
44003023	Kaa inɛ aai kanran inɛ Ama titiyainɛ wogɔi keŋiyɛɛnlɛ ye, woi Ama tɔgu inɛw logoro nɛ goonɔ ye susuyodɛin.”
44003024	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ sɔin gɔbe puu, Samuɛlu nɛ gowaa, onu womɔ nɛ wɛin gɔbe, be dinrɛn le dinrɛn le, bai ɔnbe dɛi sɔɔ sɔwaabɛin.
44003025	Aiwa, inɛw Ama titiyaanw le pui wo kunu gɔ nɛ ei toiyo ga, Ama kunrin boju. Iyaa, Abarahamu le digɛu emɛ babe le aaru aaraa, aduna inɛw puu Abarahamu tɔgu le digɛnu duba bɛɛdɛin gi. Pui wogɔ nɛ yaa ei yato.
44003026	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama, birɛbirɛnɛ womɔ ingelemaa, ei duba kanran ga, e bɛrɛ laa woi tii. Wo e tuturu puui dulomaa ye, mɔɲu e kanraun bee gɔ nɛ gogoomɔdo.»
44004001	Piɛru, Jan be lɛi inɛw gɔbe le sɔɔ sɔɔu be gɛlɛu, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw gamuu lee, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ garidube kuu baŋa gɔ lee, Saduseyɛn gamuu lee bei wiyaa tɛmaabɛin.
44004002	Piɛru lee Jan lee Yesu bulogu sɔɔ waaju kanraun, yiun bubulodo ga inɛw bɛrɛ deereubɛin dɛi, be kinɛbanrun diyɛ le bɛin.
44004003	Be bei aa, digɛ digiyaayaabe digɛu, ɛjii kaju kunaa gɛlɛu, aga baa yaa gɔ baa dɔwaabɛin.
44004004	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, inɛw waaju keŋii logoro nɛ, joo sɔɔ gɔ le gawaabɛin. Kunrin inɛw Yesu le gawaaɲu, anranw muɲu numɔrɔn gin’ dɔwaabe.
44004005	Aga ingelaa, Yahutunw inɛw giru toin gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw gɔbe lee Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ mɔrinyaanbɛin.
44004006	Inɛw kɔɔbe logoro nɛ, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa, Hanɛ lee, Kayipe lee, Jan lee, Alɛsandere lee yatobɛin. Iyaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa maranw puu yatobɛin.
44004007	Be Piɛru lee Jan leei logoro bemɛ nɛ iŋiyɛnmaa, bei selumaa, kijɛ be gi: «Ainɛ gɔi e bajumu gɔ, gɔnrɔn inge le e wogɔ kanraanbei? Maa, aa boi le kanraanbei?»
44004008	Piɛru, Kikinu Pilu le jowaa, saa: «Yahutunw inɛw giru toin lee inɛw naw lee,
44004009	ainɛ jiunginɛ bɛrɛ ɛju emɛ kanrun dɛi, e iye emi selumɛuwɔi. Woi bana baju selumɛuwɔi.
44004010	Aiwa, e ɔn nɛ wɔin gɔbe lee Isɛrɛlu tɔgu gɔ puu lee, e wooi ɛjii jugɔi. Nasarɛtu ana bɛɛnnɛ Yesu Kirisito boi le ainɛ ɔn baju. Yesu, baga nɛ pɛgaa e kanran, Ama yiun logoro nɛ bulomaa goonu gɔ, ainɛ ɔn iye wo kɔrumɔ le sɛɛu bajaa giru ebe nɛ iŋɛ.
44004011	Ɔnhɔn, “E ginrun ujɔnw gɔbe, tibu kamaa e paju gɔ, ginrun sibɛ tibu gɔ woi bii.” Wogɔ Yesu woi.
44004012	Wo le laa ye, inɛ waja turu le kanran yayabu bɛɛmɔɔlɛ. Alagala ɔn doɲu nɛ, boi wogɔi laa ye, boi waja le emi yabaɲu, Ama, inɛw bɛrɛ obolu.»
44004013	Piɛru lee Jan lee jaŋu jaŋanɛ, inɛw peerebei ga, badu badanw diyɛnw gɔbe jugɔubɛin. Kaa kokanran, be liyɛ sɛlɛ go, anrangaju le sɔɔ sɔɔubɛin. Wogɔ, bei ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe. Kunrin, Piɛru lee Jan lee Yesu le biyaabɛin ga be jugaabɛin.
44004014	Iyaa, ainɛ bajumi gɔ giru bemɛ nɛ yahiŋɛ, be iyeubɛin dɛi, sɔɔ saaɲu sɛbenɛ.
44004015	Be Piɛru bemaa badu yalu gɔ nɛ goo ga tɔɔraabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, tunmɔ le sɔwaa,
44004016	kijɛ be gi: «Emɛ anranw ɔnbe bɛrɛ inge kanrandɛin? Yɛnɛi, numɔ bemɛ le digɛu taanrinyɛn diyɛ biyaai ga, Jerusalɛmu inɛw puu bɛrɛ jɛnrɛin wɔɔ. Emɛ wogɔ kɔri gɛɛ bɛɛidenɛ.
44004017	Kaa sɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ inɛw logoro nɛ ginɛnɔu giye, bei liirɛmaa ye, inɛ kɔɔ boi le inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran bemaa sɔɔ sɔɔnɔu giye tɔɔrɔmɔi.»
44004018	Kunrin tunmɔ le aaraa, be Piɛrubei boonaa jɛɛlaa, bemaa asuu kanran Yesu boi le inɛw bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔnɔu, deeru obonɔu gin.
44004019	Piɛru lee Jan lee aŋa bemɛ saa: «Ama sɔɔ yabalu kanraan ye, sɔɔ ebe yaba ga, wogɔ Ama giru nɛ teitaii wɔɔ ma, kuu ebe le ajubu yɛnɛi.
44004020	Kaa, emɛ kai, kijɛ emɛ iyi lee kijɛ emɛ ɛgu lee sɔɔ sɔɔlu kanran bɛɛidenɛ.»
44004021	Kunrin, badu inɛw gɔbe pilemaa bei liirɛmaa, pajaa yaamaabɛin. Be, bei ɔɲɔmɔ ibɛi bɛin. Kaa inɛw be le yabaidenɛ ga, be igii bɛin. Inɛw puu sɔɔ bii gɔ dɛi Amai sɔmɔubɛin.
44004022	Ainɛ taanrinyɛn le bajumi gɔ, anranguju womɔ pɛnai dɛi gaa bee.
44004023	Piɛru lee Jan lee bei pajau be digɛu, jaŋu unrunw wajunw bɛrɛ yaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee Yahutunw inɛw naw gɔbe lee sɔɔ be bɛrɛ gin gɔ puu tagaabɛin.
44004024	Jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa, be wooi puu mii turu le mii jeɲaa, ɔn gin’ Ama gɛɛin: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama, alagala lee, minɛ lee, nɛudii lee, kɔlɔ bemɛ nɛ kijɛ toin puu lee maŋanɛ gɔ,
44004025	Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le, birɛbirɛnɛ uwɔ, emɛ ba Dawide bɛrɛ sɔɔmaa, ɔn gin’ u sɔi: “Inge dɛi tɔgu wajunw gɔbe kinɛ banranmaa ingelaa wɔin? Inge dɛi be aaru tiyɛ sɛlɛ tunmɔ le aaraa wɔin?
44004026	Yɛnɛi, aduna ɔn ɔgɔnw gɔbe kɔmɔ dɛi unrunbei yegeraa wɔin. Kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe Inɛw Baŋa Ama lee, Yabanɛ Diyɛ wo tii lee dɛi tunmɔ mɔɔnaa wɔin.”
44004027	Narain, Herɔde lee, Pɔnse Pilate lee, tɔgu wajabe lee, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw lee ana ɔn nɛ tunmɔ mɔɔnaa, birɛbirɛnɛ uwɔ, inɛ ɛjaai Ama bɛrɛ goi, nii togokɔɔru le u jugɔmu gɔ, Yesu dɛi ingelaabɛin.
44004028	Kunrin pɔɔlɔ baa, gɔnrɔn uwɔ le, diŋɛ uwɔ le kɛukɛu sɔɔ kɛjaa u boju gɔ, be sɔɔ wogɔ kanraanbɛin.
44004029	Nɛɛ Inɛw Baŋa Ama, bana emi liirɛmɔu be wɔɔ gɔ yɛnɛ. Emɛ, birɛbirɛnw uwɔ gɔbe bɛrɛ anrangaju obo ye, liyɛ sɛlɛ go, sɔɔ uwɔ tagu emɛ bɛɛmɔ.
44004030	Numɔ uwɔ wajaraa ye, birɛbirɛnɛ uwɔ inɛ ɛjaai Ama bɛrɛ goi Yesu, boi womɔ le inɛw bajamɔ, sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn biyɛmɔ, iyaa, yarabirɛ biyɛmɔ.»
44004031	Kɔɔ gin’ Ama gɛnyaan be kilaa, yalu nɛ mɔrinyaan be bee gɔ jigaabe. Be wooi puu Kikinu Pilu le jowaa, liyɛ sɛlɛ go anrangaju le Ama sɔɔ gɔ tagaubɛin.
44004032	Inɛw joo Yesu le gawaa bɛin gɔbe, ihibɛ turu gɔ nɛ be ajubu turu le bɛin. Inɛ turu kanran kijɛ wo sɛbe wo turu mɔi ga gɛɛbele. Kaa kijɛ bemɛ puu mɔɔnu gɔ mɔi bee.
44004033	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, gɔnrɔn diyɛ le Inɛw Baŋa Yesu bulogu sɛɛrɛ gooubɛin. Ama nɛɛma diyɛ jaŋu unrunw puu le yabe.
44004034	Logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛ kai kilɛlu tobele. Sabu inɛw minɛ sɛbɛin lee ginrun sɛbɛin lee, wogɔbe dɔnraan ye, buudu be bɛi gɔbe jɛɛlaa ye,
44004035	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe numɔ nɛ kunɔubɛin. Kunrin inɛ tuturu bɛrɛ kai womɔ le kɛukɛu buudu gɔ gamalaubɛin.
44004036	Sipere gana inɛ turu yabe. Wo Lewi tɔgu inɛi. Boi womɔ Josɛpu gɛɛɲu. Kaa jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe boi womɔ Barunabasu kuni. Tiyɛ gɔ inɛw mainiyɛnmɔnɛ.
44004037	Wo minɛ wo sɛbe turu dɔnraan, buudu gɔ kɛu jɛɛlaa, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe numɔ nɛ kunaabe.
44005001	Kaa ainɛ turu, boi womɔ Ananiasu gɛɛɲu gɔ, yaanran womɔ Sapira be lɛi aaraa, minɛ bemɛ turu dɔnraanbe.
44005002	Wo minɛ gɔ buudu gamaa gɛliyaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo yaanran womɔ le aaraa, buudu waju gɔ gɛliyaa, minɛ gɔ dɔnrin ga, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe numɔ nɛ kunaabe.
44005003	Kɔɔ gin’ wo kanraan, Piɛru kijɛ gi: «Ananiasu, yani Setanu u le yowaa, u bɛrɛ minɛ uwɔ dɔnrun gamamaa, Kikinu Pilu le baa, ɔn gin’ kakalu maŋamɔuwɔ?
44005004	Minɛ gɔ waaru dɔnrɔnlu u bee le uwɔi bele ma? Iyaa minɛ gɔ dɔnraan, buudu u bɛi gɔ le kijɛ u dɛnɛjɛ kanrun bɛɛbeleu ma? Nɛɛ, kɔɔi biyaai ye, birɛ mɔɲu u biru ajubu gɔ, kinɛ uwɔ nɛ yani yoi? Yɛnɛ, u inɛ bɛrɛ kakalu maŋalu. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ maŋu.»
44005005	Ananiasu, Piɛru sɔɔ gɔ ɛgɛu digɛu, numaa sugaa, kinrun gowaai. Inɛw sɔɔ gɔ ɛgin gɔ puu, liliyɛ diyɛ le bɛin.
44005006	Sagatara unrunw ingelaa, Ananiasu yiun gɔ sɔi le munaa, yaa bojaabɛin.
44005007	Lɛɛrɛ taanu gin’ galaa wo kanran, Ananiasu yaanran wiyaa, ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaabe. Sɔɔ bii gɔ wo soo sɛbele.
44005008	Piɛru wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Minɛ ebe e dɔnrun buudu gɔ puu ɔn woi ma mu bɛrɛ taga.» Yaanran gɔ saa, ee buudu gɔ puu kɔɔ woi gi.
44005009	Kɔɔ waaru le Piɛru saa: «U lee u igɛ lee, e lɛi aaraa, yani Inɛw Baŋa Kikinu gɔi subɔraa yɛnɛuwɔi? Yɛnɛ, u igɛ yiun bojonw gɔbe murɔn aŋa nɛ kowɛɛɲu. Be ui yaa duiyi ye yayaadɛin.»
44005010	Piɛru kunrin gɛɛu wo digɛu, Sapira, giru womɔ nɛ numaa sugaa, kinrun gowaai. Sagatara unrunw gɔbe ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaa, Sapira yinwaain tɛmaabɛin. Be woi jeɲaa yaa, wo igɛ genɛ nɛ bojaabɛin.
44005011	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ liliyɛ diyɛ inɛw le yabe. Inɛw sɔɔ gɔ ɛgin gɔbe yaa ɛjii liyaabɛin.
44005012	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee yarabirɛ lee joo inɛw logoro nɛ kanraunbɛin. Jaŋu unrunw gɔ puu ajubu turu le Salomɔ togu doɲu nɛ mɔrinyɛunbɛin.
44005013	Inɛw wajunw gɔbe be le mɔrinyɛn ga, anrangaju sɛbenɛ. Kaa, inɛw puu bei ɛjii babaubɛin.
44005014	Inɛw Yesu le gawaubɛin gɔbe, anranw lee yaanw lee jojoo bemɛ bariyɛ bariyɛ yaaube.
44005015	Inɛw, jiungunw bemɛ, teenu nɛ ma, sugɔ peere nɛ ma duunaa ye, ana pɔŋɔrɔn nɛ bojoubɛin. Piɛru galanu wo wɔnu, halu kikinɛ womɔi kanran, jiungunw gamuu kuu nɛ jii kanraan ye, bei baja ga kodɛi kanraunbɛin.
44005016	Halu ana Jerusalɛmu le bɛrii wɔin gɔbe nɛ goi ye, inɛw joo jiungunw lee inɛw jinrun bei ɔɲɔmɔu gɛlɛ gɔbe lee joo jɛɛlɛubɛin. Be puu bajaubɛin.
44005017	Kaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ lee wo bɔɔnw, Saduseyɛn gɔbe lee, be Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe sibɛ go ele le jowaa, be dɛi ingelaabɛin.
44005018	Be bei aa, kajuginrun poroba gɔ nɛ kunaabɛin.
44005019	Kaa digɛ waaru le, Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu wiyaa, kajuginrun murɔn aŋa gɔ pinɛlaa, bei goomaa, ɔn gin’ be le sɔi:
44005020	«Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ yaai, ɔnmɔ kana sɔɔ bana wɔɔ puu inɛw bɛrɛ tagai.»
44005021	Sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyaan, aga baa yaa gɔ, agapaali Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ yowaa, be inɛwin deereubɛin. Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ, wo bɔɔnw be wooi Yahutunw inɛw naw boonaa, badubadanw diyɛnw gɔbei mɔɔnaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, garidubei tiyaa, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei kajuginrun nɛ goonu jɛɛlɛ ga tɔɔraabɛin.
44005022	Garidu gɔbe yaa jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei kajuginrun gɔ nɛ tɛmɛnɛ. Be pilemaa wiyaa, inɛw bei tiin gɔbe bɛrɛ kibɛru tagaa, gin:
44005023	«Emɛ kajuginrun murɔn aŋa gɔbe puu ɛjii bana jaan gin’ pinaa wɔɔ tɛmaabɛin. Murɔn aŋa dɔmiyɛnw gɔbe puu yalu bemɛ nɛ sɛɛu be iŋɛu tɛmaabɛin. Kaa taan sɔgɔraa, emɛ kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ bei tɛmɛnɛ.»
44005024	Sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgaa, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ garidube kuu baŋa gɔ lee, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, bei sɔɔ gɔ nɛ manaai. Be tunmɔi selumɛu, sɔɔ gɔ dumɔrɔn womɔ yani biyɛdo ma gɛɛubɛin.
44005025	Inɛ turu wiyaa, ɔn gin’ be le sɔi: «Yɛnɛi, inɛw kaju nɛ e kunu gɔbe, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ inɛw deereu yatoin.»
44005026	Inɛ gɔ kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ garidube kuu baŋa gɔ lee garidu gɔbe lee yaa, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei aa jɛɛlaabɛin. Kaa bei tibu le kakamadɛin ma, be liyɛubɛin gɔ dɛi, be jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe bɛrɛ paŋa turu kanran tagaranɛ.
44005027	Jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei aa jɛɛlaa, badubadanw diyɛnw gɔbe giru nɛ, badu daanaabɛin. Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei selumaa kijɛ wo gi:
44005028	«Ainɛ kɔɔ boi le ebaa waja inɛ deerenɔu ga, emɛ e bɛrɛ ɛɛnnaa sɔɔnɛ ma? Yɛnɛi, e Jerusalɛmu ana gɔ deeru ebe le joonaati. Iyaa, ainɛ kɔɔ yiun gɔ, e kuu emɛ nɛ sunugodei ga wɔi.»
44005029	Kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Piɛru lee Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu wajunw gɔbe lee aŋa womɔ saa, kijɛ be gi: «Inɛw diŋɛ kanran dɛi, waajibi emɛ Ama diŋɛ kanrandɛin.
44005030	Yɛnɛi, e Yesui baga nɛ pɛgaa daabei. Kaa emɛ babe Ama gɔ woi bulogaabe.
44005031	Ama woi jeɲaa, numɔ iin unrunmɔ sibɛ go unaa, woi ɔgɔnɛi, iyaa, yabanɛi bojaabe. Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw bemaa bana bemɛ dulomɔ ye, hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛɛ ga, Ama kunrin kanraanbe.
44005032	Emɛ sɔɔ wogɔbe sɛɛrɛi, iyaa Kikinu Pilu, Ama, sɔɔ womɔ yabanw bɛrɛ wo obojɛ gɔ, Kikinu wogɔ yaa sɔɔ wogɔ sɛɛrɛi.»
44005033	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ be sɔwaa ɛgaa, badubadanw diyɛnw gɔbe kinɛ banraan gabaa, bei daaɲu dɛnɛbɛin.
44005034	Kaa, Parisiɛn turu yabe. Boi womɔ Gamaliɛlu gɛɛbɛin. Wo Ama tɔɔru deerenɛi bee. Inɛw puu woi ɛjii lugaa yasɛbɛin. Wo mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ ingelaa, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe waaru gaila le bain be goomɔ gi.
44005035	Kɔɔ onu nɛ badu inɛw gɔbe le sɔwaa gi: «Isɛrɛlu inɛw, inɛw ɔnbe bɛrɛ kijɛ kanrando ga e wɔɔ sibɛ go kuu ebe kajubai.
44005036	Yɛnɛi, tanwanlu, Tedasu ɔn nɛ ingelaa, unruin inɛ diyɛi gin’ bojaabe. Inɛw suŋu nai gin’ wo le dimiyaanbɛin. Kaa woi daa, inɛw woi dimɛbɛin gɔbe puu ginɛmaa, waja sɔɔ bemɛ ɛgɛmɔlu.
44005037	Tedasu onu nɛ, lugo waaru gɔ le, Galile bɛɛnnɛ Judasu ingelaabe. Wo inɛw joo onu womɔ nɛ boonaa digɛraabe. Kaa woi yaa daa, inɛw womɔ gɔbe puu ginɛmaabɛin.
44005038	Nɛɛ mu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn, inɛw ɔnbe sɔɔ gɔ yapajai. Bei pajaa ye yaamɔi. Sɔɔ ɔn ma, birɛ ɔn ma, inɛ nɛ goi ye, susuiyodo.
44005039	Kaa Ama bɛrɛ goi ye, e suyo bɛɛidelei. Wogɔ digɛu, kuu ebe kajubai. Ama le jai jaiyɛuwɔi ma liyɛi.» Gamaliɛlu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, inɛw gɔbe puu sɔɔ womɔ gɔ le yabaabɛin.
44005040	Kaa be jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei boonaa, bei baga le lagamaa, Yesu boi le waja asuu sɔɔ sɔɔnɔu ga gimaa sɔwaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ be bei pajaa, yaamaabɛin.
44005041	Jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, badu yalu gɔ nɛ gowaa, yaabɛin. Be kinɛ ɛɛli diyɛ le yaabɛin. Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi dɛi dɔgɔ be iyi gɔ, wogɔ, baba biyaaɲu gin’ be lugaabɛin.
44005042	Bai puu Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ lee ginrun ginrun nɛ lee yoi yoi inɛw deere lee, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii, Yesu Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga lee kanran ga pajanɛ.
44006001	Waaru kɔɔbe le, jaŋu unrunw lugo gɔ ɛjii bariyɛube. Logoro bemɛ nɛ Yahutunw inɛw, Gɛrɛku sɔɔ sɔɔnw gɔbe, yapanuw unrunbemɛi, bai wooi puu jaa gamulu gɔ nɛ lugoonɛ ga, Yahutunw pɔɔlɔ baa gana gɔ nɛ daanbɛin gɔbe dɛi guguun gunwaanbɛin.
44006002	Kɔɔ gin’ wo biyaa, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe puui boonaa mɔɔnaa kijɛ be gi: «Emɛ Ama sɔɔ tagu gɔ pajaatiyaa ye, jaa gamulu birɛ nɛ yoo ga, wogɔ jaanla.
44006003	Wogɔ digɛu, ba unrunw, logoro ebe nɛ anranw sɔi yɛmɛi. Inɛw puu sɛɛrɛ ɛju bemɛ goouwɔin be biyɛmɔi. Iyaa, Ama Kikinu lee hakilɛ lee jowaa wɔin be biyɛmɔi. Emɛ, inɛw wogɔbe bɛrɛ, birɛ kɔɔ sagu duduurɔdɛin.
44006004	Emɛ kai, amagɛɛn nɛ lee Ama sɔɔ tagu birɛ gɔ nɛ lee mamainiyɛndɛin.»
44006005	Jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe sɔɔ gɔ, inɛw puu kinɛ aabe. Kunrin inɛw be yɛmu gɔbe, gagawu baŋa, iyaa Kikinu Pilu le inɛ jowaa wɔɔ, Etiɛnu lee, iyaa Pilipe lee, Porokɔre lee, Nikanɔru lee, Timɔ lee, Parumɛna lee, iyaa Antiɔse ana bɛɛnnɛ, Yahutunw oju nɛ too, Nikolasu lee bee.
44006006	Mɔɔnu gɔ, inɛw kɔɔbei yɛmaa Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe bɛrɛ bei tagaraabɛin. Jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe inɛw gɔ dɛi Ama gɛnyaan, numɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ yaŋaraanbɛin.
44006007	Ama sɔɔ gɔ ɛjii giru yaaube. Jerusalɛmu nɛ jaŋu unrunw lugo gɔ ɛjii bariyɛube. Iyaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw joo naa joo gawaabɛin.
44006008	Ainɛ Etiɛnu gɛɛɲu gɔ, Ama nɛɛma wo le ɛjii yabe. Iyaa, Ama gɔnrɔn wo le ɛjii yabe. Wo yarabirɛ joo lee sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee inɛw logoro nɛ kanraunbe.
44006009	Inɛw gamuu Etiɛnu le jiiru jiirei tɔlaabɛin. Inɛw wogɔbe gamuu Ama gɛɛn ginrun, inɛw gunɔ gowaa wɔin gɛɛɲu gɔbe mɔɔnu nɛ tobɛin. Be Sirɛnɛ lee Alɛsandiri lee Yahutunwin bɛin. Gamuu iyaa, Silisi lee Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ lee Yahutunwin bɛin.
44006010	Kaa Etiɛnu, hakilɛ lee Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn lee le sɔɔ sɔɔbe dɛi, be wo le iŋi bɛɛubenɛ.
44006011	Kɔɔ gin’ wo biyaa, be inɛw gamuui suuraa, ɔn gin’ sɔɔmi: «Ainɛ ɔn, Mɔise lee Ama lee dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu wo sɔɔu emɛ ɛgaabɛin.»
44006012	Kunrin sɔɔmaa, be inɛw joo lee Yahutunw inɛw naw lee, Ama tɔɔru deerenw lee Etiɛnu dɛi ingelemaa, paŋa le woi aa, badubadanw diyɛnw mɔɔnu nɛ jɛyaabɛin.
44006013	Badu yalu gɔ nɛ, be Etiɛnu dɛi inɛw sɛɛrɛ kakalu goonw yaa jɛɛlaabɛin. Wogɔ bɛɛnw kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ainɛ ɔn, Ginrun Diyɛ Ama mɔi ga ujaaɲu gɔ lee Mɔise tɔɔru lee dɛi waaru wooi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔuwɔ.
44006014	Wo saa, Yesu, Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ kɔɔ, Ginrun Diyɛ ɔn dama susunugodo gi. Iyaa, Mɔise bɛrɛ atɛmu emɛ bɛi gɔ puu, Yesu dudulomɔdo gi ga wo sɔɔu emɛ ɛgaabɛin.»
44006015	Badu gɔ nɛ inɛw daanbɛin gɔbe puu Etiɛnu bɛrɛ giri dɛɛraa gɛlɛbɛin. Be girupala womɔ gɔ mɛlɛnkɛ girupala gin’ iyeubɛin.
44007001	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ, Etiɛnui selumaa gi: «Kɔɔ gin’ bii ma?»
44007002	Etiɛnu, aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Mu babe lee mu ba unrunw lee, sɔɔ ma keŋiyɛin. Emɛ ba Abarahamu, Haran gana nɛ waaru dɛinyɛnlu wo bee le, Mɛsopotami gana nɛ wɔu, Ama, dooro baŋa gɔ, wo bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe.
44007003	Ama wo le kijɛ gi: ‘Gana uwɔ nɛ ingele, u maranw le kabiyɛ. Gana u bɛrɛ mu tagaraido gɔ nɛ yaa dɛinyɛn.’
44007004	Ama kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Abarahamu Kalude bɛɛnw gana gɔ nɛ ingelaa, Haran yaa yindɛinyin. Wo ba yinwaan wo kanran, kɔɔ nɛ ingelaa, kanɛ gana e wɔɔ ɔn nɛ Ama woi yinwɛɛmu.
44007005	Gana ɔn nɛ, Ama, Abarahamu bɛrɛ yalu turu kanran obolu. Halu, numɔ taga gin’ kanran obolu. Kaa, halu Abarahamu wogɔ waaru le ii sɛbele kanran, Ama, gana gɔ wo lee, unrunw womɔ, onu womɔ nɛ wɛɛidɛin lee bɛrɛ ohobodo ga pui kunaabe.
44007006	Ama wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Tɔgu u tɔgɔido gɔ, gana turu nɛ yeru dɛdɛinyɛndo. Woi gunɔ kunɔ ye, anranguju suŋu nai baa ɔhɔɲɔmɔdɛin.
44007007	Kaa, tɔgu bei gunɔ kunɔido gɔ, mu Ama, saliyɛ bemɛ mu kiredo. Kɔɔ onu nɛ be gunɔ goi wɛi ye, yalu ɔn nɛ mui bababadɛin.’
44007008	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Ama araa nɔɔmu le, Abarahamu le pui jeɲaabe. Kunrin, Abarahamu Isakai naraan, bai gagaraye gɔ le woi araa nɔɔmaabe. Isaka yaa ii womɔ Jakɔbu bɛrɛ kunrin kanraanbe. Jakɔbu yaa unrunw pɛli lɛisigɛ womɔ, tirɛ anranw diyɛnw gɔbe bɛrɛ kunrin kanraanbe.
44007009	«Emɛ babe, tirɛ anranw diyɛnw gɔbe, be suŋɔrɔn Josɛpu sibɛ go ele le biyaa, inɛw Ejipute yaaubɛin bɛrɛ woi gunɔ dɔnraanbɛin. Kaa Ama, Josɛpu le bee.
44007010	Wo ɔɲɛ womɔ wooi nɛ woi goonaabe. Ama Josɛpui baraa, Ejipute ɔgɔnɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ womɔ ɛjii bee. Ɔgɔnɛ giru nɛ Josɛpu hakilɛ baŋai bee. Kunrin ɔgɔnɛ, Josɛpui, Ejipute gana puu kuu baŋai bojaabe. Iyaa, ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ, sɔɔ puu Josɛpu sagi bojaabe.
44007011	Aiwa, Ejipute gana puu nɛ lee, Kaana gana nɛ lee giyɛ diyɛ yowaabe. Giyɛ gɔ mɔɲuniyaan gabaa, emɛ babe pana kayaɲu bɛɛubenɛ.
44007012	Nɛɛ, Ejipute nɛ dɛnrɛn yɔɔ ga Jakɔbu ɛgaa, wo emɛ babei kubɔ pɔlɔ gɔ dɛnrɛn ɛbɛ ga tiyaabe.
44007013	Kubɔ lɛiye gɔ Ejipute nɛ dɛnrɛn ɛbɛi be yaa, Josɛpu wo ba unrunw bɛrɛ unruin jugɔmaabe. Kunrin, Ejipute ɔgɔnɛ, Josɛpu tɔgu jugaabe.
44007014	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Josɛpu, titii tagaa tiyaa, unrun ba Jakɔbu womaa, wo maranw puu le, Ejipute wɛɛ dɛinyɛn gi. Be inɛ pɛsɔi numɔrɔnsigɛ bɛin.
44007015	Jakɔbu kunrin Ejipute yaa dɛinyaanbe. Wo lee, emɛ ba gɔbe lee puu kɔɔ nɛ yayinwin.
44007016	Bei duiyaa, Sisɛmu nɛ jɛyaabɛin. Abarahamu, Hemɔru unrunw bɛrɛ buudu le ɔnsain Sisɛmu ana nɛ wo ɛbu gɔ nɛ bei duunaabɛin.
44007017	«Ama, Abarahamu le pui wo kunu kibeido waaru bɛruniyaan wo kanran, Ejipute nɛ, inɛw emɛ gɔbe ɛjii narinyɛin tɔlaabɛin.
44007018	Kunrin, ɔgɔnɛ waja turu Ejipute kuu nɛ dɛinyaanbe. Wo Josɛpui inɛɛ bee.
44007019	Ɔgɔnɛ wogɔ, tɔgu emɛ sibɛ go jama le biyaa, emɛ babei ɛjii ɔɲɔmaabe. Ɔɲɔmu gɔ bana mɔɲii bee gɔ, emɛ babe, unrunw banrin bemɛ ginrun nɛ kara gɛliyɛɲu sɛbenɛ. Be bain go, unrunw gɔi yiun aŋa nɛ kamu pajaubɛin.
44007020	Mɔisei, waaru kɔɔ le narin. Anran ɛju bana wo sɛbe gɔ gabaai. Wo na, iyepilu taanu ginrun nɛ woi aramaabe.
44007021	Kaa, woi waaru kamaa pajin le, ɔgɔnɛ iyaa gɔ woi jeɲaa, ii unrunmɔ gin’ kɔwaabe.
44007022	Kunrin, Ejipute bɛɛnw kijɛ jugɔjɛ puu nɛ Mɔisei deeraabɛin. Sɔɔ womɔ nɛ lee, birɛ womɔ nɛ lee Mɔise ɛjii gɔnrɔn yasɛbe.
44007023	«Anranguju pɛnai waaru wo bɛi le, Mɔise wo ba unrunw, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu gɔbei yɛnɛi yai ajubu biyaabe.
44007024	Kunrin, Ejipute bɛɛnnɛ turu wo ba ii ɔɲɔmɔu wo wɔu iyaa, Mɔise wo ba ii boru bariyaabe. Wo Ejipute bɛɛnnɛ gɔi daa, wo bainɛ duguru gowaabe.
44007025	Mɔise ajubu nɛ, Ama wo le digɛnu bei yabado ga, wo ba unrunw paamu kakanrandɛin ga sɛbe. Kaa wo ba unrunw gɔbe wogɔ paamu kanrannɛ.
44007026	Bai wogɔ aga baa yaa gɔ, Isɛrɛlu unrunw lɛi tunmɔ le jaiyɛu be wɔu Mɔise sɛgɛraabe. Wo be lɛi aŋurun ye, bemaa jamu le biyɛ ga dɛnaabe. Wo gi: ‘Yɛnɛi, e lɛi ba unrunwin. E inge dɛi tunmɔi ɔɲɔmɔuwɔi?’
44007027	Inɛ wo bainɛi ɔɲɔmɔu bee gɔ, woi damaa, wo le kijɛ gi: ‘Kuu emɛ nɛ ui aa daanu? Maa ui saliyɛkirenɛ emɛi ga aa gi?
44007028	Yaa Ejipute bɛɛnnɛ gɔi bana u dai gin’, u mui dai ibɛɛ wɔu ma?’
44007029	Sɔɔ kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Mɔise Ejipute gana nɛ jɔbaa, Madian gana nɛ yaa bii. Kɔɔ nɛ wɔu wo anranw unrunw lɛi naraanbe.
44007030	«Anranguju pɛnai galaa wo kanran, mɛlɛnkɛ turu, olusolo nɛ Sinayi kokoo le bɛrii, uriye tiun yaun bije nɛ tou, Mɔise bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe.
44007031	Mɔise wogɔ iyaa, wo bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaabe. Genɛ gɔ nɛ dɔi ye yɛnɛdo ga kanraun wo wɔu, Ama mii ɛgɛmaabe:
44007032	‘U babe Ama gɔ mui. Abarahamu lee, Isaka lee, Jakɔbu lee Ama gɔ mui.’ Mɔise, yalu gɔ nɛ kinwɛun, uriye gɔ yɛnɛ ga yababele.
44007033	Inɛw Baŋa wo le kijɛ gi: ‘Taga uwɔbe kubɔ uwɔ nɛ goonɔti. Yalu u iŋɛ gɔ minɛ ɛjaa wɔɔi. Yalu diyɛi.
44007034	Mu inɛw ma, Ejipute nɛ wɔin gɔbe ɔɲɛ iyaajɔn. Mu duru bemɛ ɛgaa, bei yabai sugun. Wogɔ digɛu wɛɛ, ui Ejipute nɛ mu tiimɔ.’
44007035	«Mɔise le yabalu be kanrun gɔ, inɛ bɛrɛ sɔwaa, ‘Aa ui kuu emɛ nɛ daanu, aa ui saliyɛkirenɛ emɛi boju’ be gɛɛbe gɔ, Ama iyaa Mɔise wogɔ tee kuu bemɛ baŋai ga tii. Mɛlɛnkɛ uriye logoro nɛ unruin taguru gɔ, woi baraa ye bei yaba ga tii.
44007036	Mɔise wogɔ, yarabirɛ lee, sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee kanraan, emɛ babe, Isɛrɛlu unrunwin Ejipute gana nɛ gunɔ wo goonu. Ejipute nɛ lee, nɛudii Banrun yalu gɔ nɛ lee, iyaa, olusolo nɛ anranguju pɛnai baa, wo taanrinyɛn kanraanbe.
44007037	Iyaa, Mɔise wogɔ, Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Ama, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ, mu gin’ e ba unrunw logoro nɛ gogoomɔdo.’
44007038	Iyaa, Mɔise wogɔ, olusolo mɔɔnu diyɛ gɔ nɛ, Sinayi kokoo nɛ, mɛlɛnkɛ wo le sɔɔ sɔɔu bee gɔ lee, emɛ babe lee logoro nɛ wo iŋɛbe. Wo Ama sɔɔ ɔnmɔ gɔ biyaa, emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe.
44007039	«Kaa emɛ babe Mɔise sɔɔ keŋiyɛn ga yabanɛ. Be wo le gowaa Ejipute gana nɛ pilemu ye yai daariyaabɛin.
44007040	Be Mɔise dele Aarɔn le sɔwaa, kijɛ be gi: ‘Giru emɛ nɛ yoi ye ama emi teeremɔnu yaaido emɛ bɛrɛ yegere obo. Kɔɔi laa ye, Mɔise, Ejipute gana nɛ emi goonu gɔ, wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ dɔi emɛ inin.’
44007041	Kunrin bai kɔɔbe le, emɛ babe naa ii yegeraabɛin. Be dege gɔ dɛi sadaga jɛɛlaa, numɔ bemɛ le kijɛ be yegeraajɛ gɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmaabɛin.
44007042	Aiwa, Ama be le onu dulaa, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋaaɲu ɔn le kɛukɛu, wo alagala tolobei babu nɛ bei pajaabe. “Isɛrɛlu inɛw, anranguju pɛnai olusolo nɛ e bee gɔ, bɛlu sɛnwɛn lee, sadaga waja goonɔ lee e kanranbe gɔ, wogɔ e mu bɛrɛ kanrin ma?
44007043	Ai. Ɔmɔlɔ Mɔlɛku sɔi kuru gɔ lee, ɔmɔlɔ Repan tolo gɔ lee, e duiyaabei. E ɔmɔlɔ kɔɔbei babadei ga, bei yegeraabei. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu ei gunɔ aamɔ ye, Babilɔnɛ gana giru go baa yayaamɔdɔn.”
44007044	«Olusolo nɛ emɛ babe, Ama, logoro bemɛ nɛ yato sɛɛrɛi ga guju kuru Ama Ginrun yaduyɔbɛin. Kuru wogɔ, Ama Mɔise bɛrɛ bana tɔɔru gin’ tee yinyegurin. Ama Mɔise bɛrɛ tɔɔraa, kuru wo bɛrɛ tagaraa be kanran wo iyi gɔ, wogɔ tunmɔ tee yegere gi.
44007045	Kuru wogɔ emɛ babei wo dinraan, Josue, giru bemɛ nɛ yowaa, bei teeremaa, be kuru gɔ gana ɔn nɛ jɛɛlaabɛin. Ama, gana gɔ inɛwin giru bemɛ nɛ nanaa, gana gɔ emɛ ba bemɛi bojaabe. Kuru wogɔ, Dawide waaru dɔɔ baa yabe.
44007046	Dawide sɔɔ, Jakɔbu Ama gɔ bɛrɛ ɛjii bee. Wo Ama wogɔ bɛrɛ ginrun ujɔdɔn ga gɛnyaanbe.
44007047	Kaa Dawide ii Salomɔ, ginrun gɔ wo uju.
44007048	Kɔɔ wooi nɛ, Ama, daa naa daa go wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, numɔ le ginrun ujaaɲu nɛ toiyoolɛ. Wogɔ inɛ Ama titiyainɛ sɔɔ ɔn le sɛgɛraa wɔɔ.
44007049	“Alagala, ɔgɔdɔin mai. Minɛ, kubɔ duunu mai. Nɛɛ mu dɛi e ginrun inge tɔgu ujɔdei? Yalu nɛ wɛi ye mu deeliyeido, yago yeguru bɛɛmɔjɛ? Kijɛ kɔɔbe puu mu maŋalu ma? Inɛw Baŋa Ama kunrin sɔi.”
44007051	«E inɛw kɔkɔlɔ maagunw gɔbe, Ama sɔɔ sibɛ go e kinɛ ebe ɛɛnnaati, suguru ebe duŋaati. E babe bana kanrun gin’, e waaru puu Kikinu Pilu sɔɔ le yabaalɛi.
44007052	E babe, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ tɔɔɲɔlu be kanrun gɔ yagɔi? Iyaa, Teitai Baŋa gɔ wɛwɛɛdo ga, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gin gɔbe puu e babe bei daatin. E yaa kanɛ Teitai Baŋa wogɔi jamaa daati.
44007053	E mɛlɛnkɛbe numɔ nɛ inɛw Tɔɔru bɛɛnw gɔbe, tɔɔru wogɔbe gɛliyɛli.»
44007054	Badubadanw diyɛnw gɔbe Etiɛnu sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa, bei tɛgaa galaa, kinɛbanrun dɛi tɔnrɔn tɛnwɛunbɛin.
44007055	Kaa Etiɛnu, Kikinu Pilu le jowaa, giri alagala go dɛɛraa, Ama dooro iyaabe. Wo Yesu, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ wo iŋɛu iyaabe.
44007056	Kijɛ wo gi: «Keŋiyɛin, alagala pinɛlaa, Inɛ Aini gɔ, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ iŋiyaan wɔɔ, mu iyeuwɔn.»
44007057	Kɔɔ waaru le, inɛw gɔbe mii diyɛ le kɔnwaan, suguru bemɛ duŋaabɛin. Be wooi puu giru giru kanraan, Etiɛnu kuu nɛ sugaa,
44007058	ana laara go woi goonaa, tibu le kamaa daabɛin. Etiɛnu dɛi inɛw sɛɛrɛ goonw gɔbe, arugoi bemɛ kolaa, sagatara ii turu giru nɛ duuni. Sagatara ii wogɔ boi Sɔlu gɛɛbɛin.
44007059	Kunrin tibu le woi kamau be wɔu, Etiɛnu, Ama gɛɛunbe. Kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, kikinu ma sɛgɛrɛ.»
44007060	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo yɔŋɔrɔn kuu nɛ numaa sugaa, paŋa womɔ puu le kɔnwaan gi: «Inɛw Baŋa, hakɛ ɔn kuu bemɛ nɛ sunugonɔu.» Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo kinrun gowaai.
44008001	Etiɛnu yiun gɔ, Sɔlu kinɛ aabe. Bai wogɔ Jerusalɛmu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi ɛjii ɔɲɔmɔi tɔlaabɛin. Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei laa ye, inɛw wajunw gɔbe puu ginaa, Judea gana go lee, Samari gana go lee yaabɛin.
44008002	Inɛw Ama liyɛnw gamuu Etiɛnu yiun gɔ jeɲaa bojaatiyaa, wo dɛi ɛjii sɔmiyaanbɛin.
44008003	Sɔlu kai, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu suyodo dɛi ɛjii mainiyɛunbe. Wo ginrun ginrun nɛ yowaa ye, jaŋu unrunw, anranw lee, yaanw lee, paŋa le aa ye kaju nɛ kunɔube.
44008004	Inɛw ginaa yain gɔbe, yalu dɛin dɛin nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagaubɛin.
44008005	Kunrin Pilipe, Samari ana diyɛ gɔ nɛ yaa, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ Yesui ga waaju kanraunbe.
44008006	Inɛw, Pilipe sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa, taanrinyɛn wo kanranbe gɔ iyaa, ajubu turu le biyaa, sɔɔ womɔ ɛjii keŋiyaanbɛin.
44008007	Jinrunbe kɔun diyɛ kɔnwɔnnu, inɛw joo kuu nɛ gooubɛin. Inɛw goju yinwaan lee, tegutegenw joo lee bajaubɛin.
44008008	Kunrin, ana gɔ nɛ kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ yabe.
44008009	Ana kɔɔ nɛ pɔɔlɔ baa, ainɛ turu yabe. Boi womɔ Simɔ gɛɛɲu. Wo dugu womɔ birɛ le Samari inɛwin maunɛ kanranmɔube. Iyaa, unruin inɛ diyɛi ga be bɛrɛ tagaube.
44008010	Kuu bɛɛnw nɛ goi ye, inɛw wajunw nɛ yai dɔɔ puu Simɔi ɛjii keŋiyɛunbɛin. Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Inɛ ɔn, Ama gɔnrɔn, gɔnrɔn diyɛ gɔ woi.»
44008011	Simɔ, dugu birɛ womɔ le inɛwin maunɛ kanranmɔi wo tɔlu tanwaain gɔ digɛu, inɛw sɔɔ womɔ keŋiyɛunbɛin.
44008012	Kaa Pilipe, Ama diinɛ Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ lee, Yesu Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ lee waaju wo kanraan, anranw lee, yaanw lee Pilipe sɔɔ gɔ le gawaa, unrunbei batise kunɔmaabɛin.
44008013	Simɔ, wo yaa sɔɔ gɔ le gawaa, unruin batise kunɔmaabe. Wo Pilipe onu nɛ pilemɛubele. Sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee, birɛ taanrinyɛn waja Pilipe birɛube gɔ lee woi ɛjii maunɛ kanraunbe.
44008014	Nɛɛ, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu Jerusalɛmu nɛ wɔin gɔbe, Samari bɛɛnw Ama sɔɔ le yabaaɲu ga ɛgaa, be Piɛru lee, Jan lee be bɛrɛ tiyaabɛin.
44008015	Piɛru lee, Jan lee Samari bɛɛnw bɛrɛ yaa, bemaa Kikinu Pilu bɛɛ ga, be dɛi Ama gɛnyaanbɛin.
44008016	Waaru kɔɔ le, Samari bɛɛnwin Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le batise kunaabɛin laa ye, inɛ turu kanran kuu nɛ nimɛ Kikinu Pilu sugolu bee.
44008017	Kunrin, Piɛru lee, Jan lee inɛw kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan, Ama gɛnyaanbɛin. Inɛw gɔbe Kikinu Pilu biyaabɛin.
44008018	Jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, jaŋu unrunw kuu nɛ numɔ waaru be yaŋaranjɛ le, Ama Kikinu gɔ jaŋu unrunw kuu nɛ sugojɛ ga, Simɔ iyaabe. Wo Piɛru lee, Jan lee bɛrɛ buudu goonaa jɛɛlaa,
44008019	gi: «Mu bɛrɛ yaa gɔnrɔn kɔɔ oboi. Inɛ aai kanran kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋaraanjɔn ye, kɔɔbaŋa Kikinu Pilu bɛɛ ga mu bɛrɛ yaa gɔnrɔn kɔɔ oboi.»
44008020	Piɛru aŋa womɔ saa kijɛ gi: «Ama, inɛ bɛrɛ sin obu wo obojɛ gɔ, buudu le ɛbɛ bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ ga u yinhajubu dɛi u lee, buudu uwɔ lee yasuiyoi.
44008021	Ai, u kinɛpilu le Amai digɛlau. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama sin obu ɔn sɔɔ nɛ ui tolo, gamulu uwɔ wɔlɔ.
44008022	Wogɔ digɛu, ajubu mɔɲu u sɛɛ gɔ pajaatiyaa ye, Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ ajubu mɔɲu kɔɔ dɛi ui yaabu kanrun bɛbɛɛmɔdo ma gɛɛn.
44008023	Kɔɔi laa ye, u hakɛ le pagiyaa, ajubu mɔɲu le jowaa wɔu ga mu iyeuwɔn.»
44008024	Simɔ, aŋa womɔ saa kijɛ gi: «Mɔɲu mu bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdo u gi kɔɔbe turu kanran mu bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔu giye, e kuu ebe le mu dɛi Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ gɛɛin.»
44008025	Kunrin, Samari nɛ sɛɛrɛ gowaa, Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ waaju kanraantiyaa, Piɛru lee, Jan lee Jerusalɛmu pilemaa yaabɛin. Samari gana ana be galabe joo nɛ, be Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ waaju kanraunbɛin.
44008026	Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu Pilipe le sɔwaa kijɛ wo gi: «Ingele, tɛŋurun sibɛ go yaa. Jerusalɛmu goi ye Gaja oju sugojɛ, olusolo oju gɔ aa.»
44008027	Pilipe ɔgu kɛu ingelaa yaabe. Oju nɛ Etiopi ainɛ turu be lɛi sɛgɛraabe. Ainɛ wogɔ, Etiopi ɔgɔ yaanran birɛbirɛnɛ diyɛi bee. Kijɛ womɔ puu, ainɛ kajubanɛ gɔ woi. Ainɛ kɔɔ, Ama demɛniyɛnmɔ ga Jerusalɛmu wiyaa,
44008028	pilemaa yaau, wogotoro womɔ nɛ inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi dɔn jaŋaube.
44008029	Ama Kikinu, Pilipe le sɔwaa, kijɛ gi: «Wogotoro kɔɔi yai dɔɔ.»
44008030	Pilipe jɔbaa yaa, Etiopi ainɛ gɔ Esayi dɔn jaŋau wo wɔu ɛgaabe. Pilipe wo bɛrɛ selumaa gi: «Kijɛ u jaŋajɛ gɔ tiyɛ paamu kanraunwɔu ma?»
44008031	Ainɛ gɔ saa: «Inɛ mu bɛrɛ tiyɛ gɔ tagajɛ wɔlɔ ye, mu yani paamu kanrun bɛɛdɔn?» Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo Pilipei gɛnyaan, womaa wogotoro gɔ nɛ wɛɛ yoo dɛinyɛn gi.
44008032	Ainɛ gɔ Ama Dɔn yalu wo jaŋabe gɔ unwɔ: “Peju dimɛrɛn ye sɛnwɛin bana yaaɲu gin’, woi dimɛraan yaabɛin. Peju ii, kukuli womɔ goonɔnu be wɔnu, piilɛ bana wɔɔ gin’, wo yaa aŋa gɔmaa, sɔɔ sɔɔlu.
44008033	Wo bɛrɛ dɔgɔ tagaraabɛin. Naran wo bɛrɛ obo ga yabanɛ. Aduna nɛ woi daabɛin. Nɛɛ, tɔgu womɔ sɔɔ, inɛ sɔɔ bɛɛido gɔ aai?”
44008034	Ainɛ gɔ Pilipe le kijɛ wo gi: «Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ gɔ sɔɔ ɔn aa dɛi sɔɔjɛ ma, mainiyaanjɛu ye mui taga. Kuu womɔ sɔɔi sɔɔjɛ ma, inɛ waja dɛi sɔɔjɛ?»
44008035	Ainɛ gɔ kunrin wo sɔwaa, Pilipe yalu kɔɔ nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ le tɔlaa, Yesu Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ wo bɛrɛ tagaabe.
44008036	Be oju bemɛ digiyaa yaau, dii yalu nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Etiopi ainɛ gɔ gi: «Dii unwɔ. Batise yoo ga kijɛ inge mui tɛŋɛjɛ?» [
