44008037	Pilipe aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Kinɛ uwɔ wooi le gawaa wɔu ye, wogɔ kanran bɛbɛɛmɔdo.» Ainɛ gɔ iyaa saa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Yesu Kirisito, Ama Ainii ga mu gawaa wɔun.»]
44008038	Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo wogotoro gɔ iŋiyɛnmɔ ga tɔɔraabe. Pilipe lee, wo lee wogotoro gɔ nɛ sugaa, dii nɛ yowaabɛin. Kunrin, Pilipe woi batise kunaabe.
44008039	Dii gɔ nɛ waaru be goi le, Inɛw Baŋa Kikinu, Pilipei jeɲaajɛ. Etiopi ainɛ gɔ waja woi iyelu. Kaa wo kinɛ ɛɛli le oju unrunmɔ digiyaa yaaube.
44008040	Pilipe kai wo unruin Ajɔte ana nɛ wɔɔ tɛmaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Sesare ana nɛ wo dɔɔido baa, wo ana wo galu puu nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ kanraanbe.
44009001	Ainɛ Sɔlu gɛɛɲu gɔ nimɛ kanran Inɛw Baŋa jaŋu unrunw gɔi liirɛmɔube. Wo bei dai dɛnɛube. Kunrin wo, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔi yaa tɛmaa,
44009002	Damasu Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe dɛi lɛtɛrɛ unrun bɛrɛ tɔŋɔ obo ga gɛnyaanbe. Ama ginrun kɔɔbe nɛ, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu oju, inɛw dimɛi yɔin ye, anranw sɛlɛ, yaanw sɛlɛ, wo bei aa kɔmaa ye, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ jɛɛlɛ ibɛi bee.
44009003	Kunrin, wo oju gowaa yaaube. Damasu ana le bɛrii wo wɔu, kubɔ turu wijɛ alagala gowaa wiyaa, sibɛ womɔ puu wijɛmaabe.
44009004	Woi minɛ nɛ numaa sugaabe. Mii turu wo le sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ wo ɛgɛube. Mii gɔ ɔn gin’ gɛɛbe: «Sɔlu, Sɔlu, u inge dɛi mui tɔɔɲɔuwɔu?»
44009005	Sɔlu saa kijɛ gi: «Ui aai ma Inɛw Baŋa?» Mii gɔ saa gi: «Mu Yesui. Inɛ tɔɔɲɔu u wɔɔ gɔ mui.
44009006	Ingele, ana kɔlɔ nɛ yoo. Kɔɔ nɛ kijɛ kanraun u jaan gɔ u bɛrɛ tatagadɛin.»
44009007	Sɔlu le digiyaa inɛw yaau bɛin gɔbe puu kinɛ manaa, iŋiyaan dɛɛnrinyaain. Be sɔɔ turu kanran sɔwaa bɛɛnɛ. Be mii ɛgɛubɛin, kaa inɛ turu kanran iyeu benɛ.
44009008	Sɔlu, minɛ nɛ ingelaabe. Wo giri ɛjii gɔmaa gɛlɛbe. Kaa kijɛ kanma iyeu bele. Numɔ womɔ aa, woi dimɛraan, Damasu ana nɛ kuni.
44009009	Bai taanu, wo kijɛ turu kanran iyelu, pana kayalu, dii yaa nɔɔlu.
44009010	Damasu nɛ jaŋu ii turu yabe. Boi womɔ Ananiasu gɛɛbɛin. Inɛw Baŋa, kuu iye nɛ woi boonaa, Ananiasu wo giyaa, Ananiasu saa: «Mu unwɔ, Inɛw Baŋa.»
44009011	Inɛw Baŋa wo le kijɛ gi: «Ingele, ana kɛri Demu wɔɔ gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ yaa. Ainɛ Judasu gɛɛɲu ginrun dɛnaajɛu ye, Taruse ana bɛɛnnɛ Sɔlui digɛu gɛɛ. Wo kɔɔ nɛ Ama gɛɛun yato.
44009012	Wo kuu iye nɛ u Ananiasui iyaabe. U ginrun wo too gɔ nɛ yowaa, womaa giri iye ga, kuu womɔ nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan, Ama gɛɛun u wɔu wo iyaabe.»
44009013	Ananiasu aŋa womɔ saa: «Inɛw Baŋa, ainɛ kɔɔ inɛw uwɔbe bɛrɛ Jerusalɛmu nɛ mɔɲu bana ɛjii wo kanrun, inɛw joo sɔɔu be wɔu mu ɛgaabɔn.
44009014	Ana ɔn nɛ yaa, inɛw boi uwɔ boonɔw puui pagaa ye yaa ga, wo gɔnrɔn yasɛ. Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw, wogɔ gɔnrɔn wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.»
44009015	Inɛw Baŋa saa: «U kai yaa. Tɔgu wajunw lee, ɔgɔnw bemɛ lee, Isɛrɛlu unrunw lee bɛrɛ boi ma jugɔmɔ ga birɛbirɛnɛ mu yɛmu gɔ kɔɔ woi.
44009016	Boi ma dɛi bana wo ɔɲɔido gɔ mu wo bɛrɛ jujugɔmɔdɔn.»
44009017	Inɛw Baŋa kunrin wo sɔwaa, Ananiasu gowaa, yinyai. Wo ginrun gɔ nɛ dɔwaa, Sɔlu kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan, ɔn gin’ wo le sɔi: «Mu bainɛ Sɔlu, oju nɛ wɛɛu u wɔu, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, unruin u bɛrɛ tagaranɛ gɔ, uwaa pilemɛ ye giri iye ga, uwaa, Kikinu Pilu le jooi biyɛ ga, mui u bɛrɛ wo tii.»
44009018	Ananiasu kunrin gɛɛu wo digɛu, Sɔlu giri nɛ kogo gin’ kijɛ gowaa bagaabe. Wo pilemaa, giri iyeube. Wo ingelaa, batise yowaabe.
44009019	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo jaa kayaa, paŋa biyaabe. Damasu ana nɛ jaŋu unrunw toin gɔbe le Sɔlu bai gaila biyaabe.
44009020	Tanwanlu, ɔgu kɛu wo Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ Yesu dɛi waaju kunɔu, Ama Aini gɔ woi gɛɛube.
44009021	Inɛw sɔɔ womɔ ɛgɛnw puu bɛrɛ maunɛ kanraunbe. Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Jerusalɛmu nɛ Yesu boi boonɔwin ainɛ ɔɲɔmɔu bee gɔ, ɔn woi laa ma? Damasu nɛ Yesu boi boonɔw aa pagaa ye, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw bɛrɛ jɛyaado ga, wo kodɛi tee ɔn nɛ wɛɛlu ma?»
44009022	Kaa Sɔlu, waaju womɔ bai puu paŋa kunɔ kunɔ yaaube. Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ Yesu woi ga jugɔmaa wo jɛ ye, Damasu nɛ Yahutunw bɛin gɔbe sɔɔ saaɲu bɛɛubenɛ.
44009023	Kɔɔ gin’ bai dagaa galaa wo yaa, Yahutunw tunmɔ le aaraa Sɔlui daitiimɔ gin.
44009024	Sɔlu, yeguru bemɛ soo biyaabe. Be woi daadɛin ga ana murɔn aŋa gɔ, aga lee, digɛ lee dɔmiyɛunbɛin.
44009025	Kaa digɛ turu jaŋu unrunw womɔbe woi tomɔ diyɛ nɛ kunaa, jege gɔ le bain go sunugaabɛin.
44009026	Nɛɛ, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ waaru wo dɔi le, Sɔlu, jaŋu unrunw logoro nɛ yoi dɛnaabe. Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe puu woi liyɛubɛin. Wo Yesu jaŋu ii biyaai ga, be wogɔ le ɛjii gawanɛ.
44009027	Kunrin wo wɔu, Barunabasu woi dimɛraan, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe bɛrɛ jɛyaabe. Damasu oju nɛ Sɔlu, Inɛw Baŋai bana wo iyi lee, Inɛw Baŋa wo le sɔɔ bana sɔi lee, be bɛrɛ tagaabe. Iyaa, Damasu ana nɛ, Yesu boi le anrangaju le waaju bana wo kanrun be bɛrɛ tagaabe.
44009028	Kɔɔ gin’ wo Jerusalɛmu ana yalu be yoobe wooi nɛ, be le yadigɛbe. Wo anrangaju le Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le waaju kanraunbe.
44009029	Sɔlu iyaa, Yahutunw inɛw Gɛrɛku sɔɔ sɔɔnw gɔbe le sɔɔ sɔɔube. Be wooi jiiru jiireubɛin. Kaa kɔɔbɛɛnw woi daa ga dɛnɛubɛin.
44009030	Ba unrunw wogɔ soo biyaa, Sɔlui dimɛraan, Sesare ana nɛ jɛyaa, Taruse ana nɛ tiyaabɛin.
44009031	Kunrin, Judea gana lee, Galile gana lee, Samari gana lee puu nɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu jamu le bee. Ɛjii paŋa kunɔube. Inɛw Baŋa giri liyɛ le yaaube. Kikinu Pilu kɔrumɔ le bariyɛube.
44009032	Piɛru, gana kɔɔ puu nɛ gɔŋɔlɔube. Kunrin, wo Lida ana nɛ Ama inɛw wɔin gɔbei yɛnɛi yaabe.
44009033	Ana kɔɔ nɛ wo ainɛ turu tɛmaabe. Boi womɔ Enɛ gɛɛbɛin. Anranguju gagara baa, goju yinwaan, wo teenu nɛ diinbe.
44009034	Piɛru wo le kijɛ gi: «Enɛ, Yesu Kirisito ui bajamɔuwɔ. Ingele, kuu uwɔ le teenu uwɔ bile.» Ɔgu kɛu Enɛ ingelaai.
44009035	Lida ana bɛɛnw puu lee, Sarɔn yalu wanu nɛ inɛw daain gɔbe lee woi iyaa, Inɛw Baŋa le tubiyaabɛin.
44009036	Jope ana nɛ yaanran jaŋu ii turu yabe. Boi womɔ Tabita gɛɛɲu. Gɛrɛku sɔɔ le Dɔruka gɛɛɲu, tiyɛ gɔ wilu. Yaanran kɔɔ birɛ ɛju joo birɛube. Iyaa, naugunw bɛrɛ ɛjii kijɛ oboube.
44009037	Piɛru Lida ana nɛ waaru bee gɔ le tee, yaanran kɔɔ jiun sugaa, yinwaain. Inɛw, yiun gɔ inɛraan, ginrun sɔɔrɔ nɛ dabaraabɛin.
44009038	Nɛɛ, Jope lee, Lida lee wagela bee dɛi, jaŋu unrunw Jope nɛ wɔin gɔbe, Piɛru Lida nɛ yɔɔ ga ɛgaa, inɛw lɛi goonaa tiyaa, Piɛru bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, womaa, tanwanlu go ɔgu unrunbe bɛrɛ wɛɛ gin.
44009039	Piɛru ɔgu kɛu inɛw wɛin gɔbe le digiyaa yaabe. Waaru Jope nɛ be dɔi le, be woi dimɛraan, ginrun sɔɔrɔ gɔ nɛ unaabɛin. Yapanuw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe puu Piɛru genɛ nɛ ɛjii sɔmiyɛun wiyaabɛin. Dɔruka be le wɔu, arugoi diyɛ lee, dagibe lee ajaraa, be bɛrɛ wo obu gɔ, be wogɔ Piɛru bɛrɛ tagaraubɛin.
44009040	Piɛru, ginrun gɔ nɛ inɛw gɔ puu goonɔmaatiyaa, tuŋiyaan Ama gɛnyaanbe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ yiun sibɛ go unruin kigelemaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Tabita, ingele.» Kunrin wo giyaa, Tabita giri kumɔlaabe. Piɛrui iyaa, wo ingelaa dɛinyaanbe.
44009041	Piɛru wo bɛrɛ numɔ dɛɛraa, woi jeɲaa ingelemaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo yapanuw gɔbe lee, Ama inɛw wajunw gɔbe lee boonaa, Tabita ɔnmɔi be bɛrɛ tagaraabe.
44009042	Jope ana puu, sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaabe. Inɛw joo Inɛw Baŋa le gawaabɛin.
44009043	Jope nɛ Piɛru, waaru gaila, ainɛ guju birɛbirɛnɛ turu Simɔ gɛɛɲu ginrun nɛ biyaabe.
44010001	Sesare ana nɛ sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa turu yabe. Boi womɔ Kɔrunɛye gɛɛɲu. Wo sɔludasu numɔ, Itali bɛɛnw numɔ kuu baŋa turui bee.
44010002	Ainɛ kɔɔ Ama giri liyɛnɛi bee. Wo lee, ginrun womɔ inɛw puu lee, be tunmɔ le Ama demɛniyɛnmɔubɛin. Wo Yahutunw inɛw, naugunw gɔbe bɛrɛ ɛjii kijɛ oboube. Iyaa, wo amagɛɛn le ɔɲɔbele.
44010003	Digɛnai turu, lɛɛrɛ taanu waaru le wo kuu iye iyaabe. Sɛɛn wo yɛnɛu, mɛlɛnkɛ turu ginrun womɔ nɛ yowaa, womaa: «Kɔrunɛye.»
44010004	Kɔrunɛye giri gɔmaa woi yɛnɛu, kinwɛun, ɔn gin’ sai: «Mu baŋa, ingei?» Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ saa: «Gɛɛn uwɔbe lee, naugunw bɛrɛ kijɛ u obu gɔbe lee, Ama yabaajɛ. Wo ui ajubaajɛ.
44010005	Nɛɛ, kanɛ inɛ goonaajɛu ye, Jope ana nɛ tiyaa ye, ainɛ Simɔ Piɛru gɛɛɲu gɔi boonu jɛɛlɛ.
44010006	Wo ainɛ guju birɛbirɛnɛ turu Simɔ gɛɛɲu ginrun nɛ sugaa wɔɔ. Ainɛ wogɔ ginrun nɛudii genɛ nɛ wɔɔ.»
44010007	Mɛlɛnkɛ wo le sɔɔ sɔi gɔ yaau wo digɛu, Kɔrunɛye, birɛbirɛnw le gawaa wo wɔɔ lɛi lee, sɔludasu woi gɛlɛin logoro nɛ Ama giri liyɛnɛ turu lee boonaabe.
44010008	Wo sɔɔ wo bɛrɛ biyaabe gɔ puu bei tagaa, kɔɔ onu nɛ bei Jope tiyaabe.
44010009	Aga baa yaa gɔ, inɛw kɔɔbe oju nɛ tou, Jope le bɛrii be wɔu, Piɛru naitege waaru le Ama gɛɛndo ga dala ulaabe.
44010010	Giyɛ woi yasɛbe dɛi, wo pana kaya ibɛɛ bee. Kunrin, wo dɛi pana birɛu be wɔu, wo kuu iye iyaabe.
44010011	Alagala pinɛlaa, kijɛ turu, sɔi diyɛ gin’ kinrun nai womɔ suŋu le kɔmaa, minɛ nɛ sunugou be wɔu wo iyaabe.
44010012	Kijɛ kubɔ nai tɔgu puu lee, kijɛ minɛ nɛ bumɔɲu lee, alagala sasaabe lee, sɔi diyɛ gin’ kijɛ sugobe gɔ nɛ yatobɛin.
44010013	Mii turu Piɛru le kijɛ gi: «Piɛru, ingele, kijɛ kɔɔbe sɛnwɛn tɛnwɛn.»
44010014	Kaa Piɛru aŋa saa: «Ai, Inɛw Baŋa, mu kijɛ kaya danwan ma, kijɛ lɔgɔgu ma turu kanran kayatɛlun.»
44010015	Kɔɔ gin’ wo saa, mii gɔ kubɔ lɛiye gɔ ɛgɛmaa, wo le kijɛ gi: «Kijɛ ɛjui, kaya bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ ga Ama giyaajɛ gɔ, kijɛ lɔgɔgui gin’ yɛnɛnɔu.»
44010016	Kubɔ taanu baa, sɔɔ kɔɔ kunrin biyaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ ɔgu kɛu kijɛ gɔbei alagala go biɲaa unaabɛin.
44010017	Kuu iye gɔ nɛ Piɛrui manaa, tiyɛ gɔ ingei ma ajubau wo wɔu, Kɔrunɛye anranw tii gɔbe, Simɔ ginrun selumaa, murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ waaru wogɔ le tee wiyaa dɔwaabɛin.
44010018	Inɛ boonaa selumaa, Simɔ Piɛru gɛɛɲu gɔ, ginrun nɛ sugaa wɔɔ gɔ ɔn woi ma gin.
44010019	Piɛru nimɛ kanran kuu iye gɔ dɛi ajubau yagɛlɛbe. Kunrin wo wɔu, Ama Kikinu wo le kijɛ gi: «Anranw taanu ui dɛnɛu kowɔin.
44010020	Ingelaajɛu ye, sugo ye, jiiru kunɔlu go be le yaa. Sabu bei ɔn nɛ mu tii.»
44010021	Kunrin Piɛru, anranw gɔbe bɛrɛ sugaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Mu unwɔun. Inɛ e dɛnɛjɛ gɔ mui. Ɔn nɛ e wɛi gɔ, inge dɛi ma mui jugɔmɔi.»
44010022	Inɛw gɔbe saa: «Sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa, Kɔrunɛye emi tii. Kɔrunɛye inɛ teitai, Ama giri liyɛnɛi, Yahutunw puu wo dɛi sɛɛrɛ ɛju goouwɔin. Ama, mɛlɛnkɛ ɛjaa unrunmɔ turu tiyaa, Kɔrunɛye womaa ginrun womɔ nɛ ui boonaa ye, sɔɔ u gɛɛido keŋiyɛn gi.»
44010023	Kunrin be sɔwaa, Piɛru bei sɛgɛraa ginrun kunaa baa yaa baa dɔwaabe. Aga baa yaa gɔ, wo ingelaa, be le digiyaa yaabe. Jope ba unrunw gamuu wo le yaabɛin.
44010024	Bai lɛiye gɔ be Sesare dɔwaabɛin. Kɔrunɛye bei yadɔmɔbe. Wo ginrun womɔ nɛ wo maranw lee, wo anrunge ɛju gɔbe lee boonaa mɔɔnaa gɛlɛbe.
44010025	Piɛru, ginrun gɔ nɛ wo yoou, Kɔrunɛye yaa woi sɛgɛraa, giru womɔ nɛ tuŋiyaan woi demɛniyɛnmaabe.
44010026	Kaa Piɛru woi jeɲaa ingelemaa kijɛ gi: «Ingele, mu kanran inɛi koi.»
44010027	Kunrin sɔɔ sɔɔu gɛlɛu, wo Kɔrunɛye le ginrun gɔ nɛ yowaa, inɛw joo be mɔrɔun tɛmaabe.
44010028	Be le kijɛ wo gi: «E igii wɔi, Yahutunw, tɔgu waja inɛ le digiyɛ ma, inɛ tɔgu waja ginrun nɛ yoo ma, wogɔ danwan. Kaa Ama mu bɛrɛ jugɔmaa, inɛ lɔgɔi ma, inɛ mui danwan ma bojonɔu gi.
44010029	Wogɔ digɛu inɛ tiyaa, mui e boonaa, mu jiiru kunɔlu go wiyaabɔn. Nɛɛ, kijɛ dɛi mui boonaa e jɛɛlu gɔ mui jugɔmɔi.»
44010030	Piɛru kunrin wo sɔwaa, Kɔrunɛye aŋa womɔ saa gi: «Iye bai nai dɔwaai, mu ginrun ma nɛ digɛnai lɛɛrɛ taanu waaru le Ama gɛɛun tobɔn. Ama gɛɛun mu wɔu, ainɛ turu giru ma nɛ wiyaa iŋiyaanbe. Sɔi womɔ ɛjii dooroube.
44010031	Mu le sɔwaa, maa Kɔrunɛye, Ama, gɛɛn ma saajɛ, naugunw bɛrɛ kijɛ mu obu gɔbe yabaajɛ, Ama mui ajubaajɛ wa.
44010032	Nɛɛ, maa Jope nɛ inɛ tiyaa ye, Simɔ Piɛrui boonɔ jɛɛlɛ gi. Wo guju birɛbirɛnɛ Simɔ ginrun nɛ sugaa wɔɔ. Ginrun gɔ nɛudii genɛ nɛ wɔɔ gi.
44010033	Kunrin, ɔgu kɛu mu inɛ tiyaa, ui boonaabɔn. U yaa, u wɛi gɔ yegiyaai. Nɛɛ, emɛ wooi puu Ama giru nɛ unwɔin. Inɛw Baŋa uwaa emɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ obo wo gi gɔ, emɛ wogɔ keŋiyɛndɛin ga dɔmiyaan wɔin.»
44010034	Kunrin, Piɛru sɔɔ jeɲaa gi: «Nɛɛ kai Ama, inɛi kabu kunɔɔlɛ ga mu paamu kanraanjɔn.
44010035	Tɔgu yagɔbe logoro nɛi kanran, inɛ giri womɔ liyaa, teitai kanranjɛ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ wo bɛrɛ ɛjii wɔɔ.
44010036	Yɛnɛi, Ama, sɔɔ unrunmɔ Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ obaa, Yesu Kirisito le jamu bɛɛmɔjɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ bei tagaabe ga e igii wɔi. Yesu wogɔ inɛw puu baŋa gɔ woi.
44010037	Jan, batise kanrun dɛi waaju wo kunu onu nɛ, Galile gana nɛ tɔlaa, Judea gana puu nɛ sɔɔ bii gɔ e igii wɔi.
44010038	Ama, Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn, Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ Yesu bɛrɛ bana wo obu gɔ e igii wɔi. Iyaa, Yesu, yalu dɛin dɛin nɛ yai yai, ɛju kanran lee, jinrun puu kuu baŋa, gɔnrɔn womɔ le inɛw pagaa wo sɛbei bajamɔ lee, bana wo kanranbe e igii wɔi. Ama wo le yabe dɛi, wo kɔɔbe kanraunbe.
44010039	Yahutunw gana nɛ lee, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ lee, kijɛ wo kanrun puu sɛɛrɛ gɔ emi. Be baga nɛ woi pɛgaa daabɛin.
44010040	Bai taaniye gɔ, Ama woi bulomaa, woi iyemɔ ga yabaabe.
44010041	Wo Yahutunw inɛw puu bɛrɛ unruin tagaralu, kaa emaa sɛɛrɛi biyɛ ga pɔɔlɔ baa, Ama emi inɛw yɛmu gɔbe, emɛ bɛrɛ unruin taguru. Yesu wo bulu onu nɛ, emɛ wo le jaa kayaa, dii nɔiin gɔbe, emɛ bɛrɛ unruin taguru.
44010042	Yesu emaa, inɛw bɛrɛ waaju kanraan ye, inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe lee, inɛw yinwaain gɔbe lee saliyɛ kire ga, Ama inɛ tii gɔ unruin ga jugɔmɔ gi.
44010043	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw puu Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ gowaa, inɛ aai kanran, wo le gawaajɛ ye, boi womɔ le hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛbɛɛdo gin.»
44010044	Piɛru kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, inɛw sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛun bɛin puu kuu nɛ Kikinu Pilu sugaabe.
44010045	Yahutunw Yesu le gawaa wɔin, Piɛru le digiyaa wɛin gɔbe, Ama, Kikinu Pilu, sin obu go, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain kuu nɛ wɛɛmaajɛ ga iyaa, be bɛrɛ ɛjii maunɛ kanraanbe.
44010046	Inɛw gɔbe sɔɔ waja sɔɔu, Amai babau be wɔu, be ɛgaabɛin.
44010047	Piɛru iyaa sɔɔ jeɲaa, gi: «Kikinu Pilu kuu emɛ nɛ bana wɛi gin’, inɛw ɔnbe kuu nɛ yaa yinwɛi. Nɛɛ, inɛw wogɔbei dii nɛ batise kanranlu kanrun bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ ma?»
44010048	Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo inɛw gɔbei Yesu Kirisito boi le batise kanran ga tɔɔraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, inɛw gɔbe woi gɛnyaan, womaa bai gaila unrunbe le biyɛ gin.
44011001	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, Judea gana nɛ ba unrunw wajunw bɛin gɔbe lee, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain yaa Ama sɔɔ le yabaaɲu ga ɛgaabɛin.
44011002	Nɛɛ, Piɛru, Jerusalɛmu nɛ wiyaa waaru wo dɔi le, Yahutunw Yesu le gawaa wɔin gɔbe, woi jarugaa, kijɛ be gi:
44011003	«U inɛw araa nɔɔnɛ ginrun nɛ yowaabeu. Iyaa be le jaa kayaabeu.»
44011004	Kunrin, Piɛru sɔɔ gɔ bana bii, digu le digu le bei tagaabe. Wo sɔwaa gi:
44011005	«Mu Jope ana nɛ bɔun. Ama gɛɛun wɔu, mu kuu iye iyaabɔn. Kijɛ turu sɔi diyɛ gin’, kinrun nai womɔ nɛ suŋu kɔmaa, alagala gowaa sugo sugo mu bɛrɛ baa dɔwaabe.
44011006	Kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ ɛjii yɛnaa, mu kijɛ kubɔ nai lee, olunawan lee, kijɛ minɛ nɛ bumɔɲu lee, alagala sasaabe lee iyaabɔn.
44011007	Mii turu maa Piɛru, ingele ye sɛnwɛn tɛnwɛn gɛɛu wo wɔu mu ɛgaabɔn.
44011008	Kaa mu saa, ai, Inɛw Baŋa, kijɛ kaya danwan ma, kijɛ lɔgɔgu ma, aŋa ma nɛ yootɛlu gun.
44011009	Kunrin mu saa, mii gɔ kubɔ lɛiye alagala gowaa ɛgɛmaa, kijɛ ɛjui, kayi bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ ga Ama giyaajɛ gɔ, kijɛ lɔgɔgu gin’ yɛnɛnɔu gi.
44011010	Kubɔ taanu baa, kunrin bii. Kɔɔ onu nɛ kijɛ gɔ puu biɲaa, daa go yinhuni.
44011011	Sɔɔ kɔɔ galau wo digɛu, anranw taanu Sesare ana nɛ gowaa, mu bɛrɛ bei tiyaa be kanran, wiyaa, ginrun emɛ tobe murɔn aŋa nɛ iŋiyaanbɛin.
44011012	Ama Kikinu, maa jiiru kunɔlu go, be le digi ye yaa gi. Ba unrunw kuloi ɔnbe kunrin mui niinaa, Kɔrunɛye ginrun nɛ emɛ yowaabɛin.
44011013	Kɔrunɛye, mɛlɛnkɛ, ginrun womɔ nɛ iyaabe ga emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi gi: ‘Jope nɛ inɛ tiyaa ye Simɔ Piɛrui boonɔ.
44011014	U lee, ginrun uwɔ bɛɛnw lee sɔɔ le yayabu e bɛɛido gɔ, wo u bɛrɛ tatagado.’
44011015	Aiwa, sɔɔ tɔlaa sɔɔu mu wɔu, Kikinu Pilu tɔlɔ gɔ le kuu emɛ nɛ bana wɛi gin’, be puu kuu nɛ yaa kɔɔ gin’ tee wiyaabe.
44011016	Kunrin wo biyaa, mu Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ gɛɛbe ɔn ajubaabɔn: ‘Jan, dii le inɛi batise kanrun. Kaa e kai, Kikinu Pilu le ei batise kanrandɛin.’
44011017	Aiwa, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito le waaru emɛ gawu le, Ama emɛ bɛrɛ sin obu wo obu gɔ, be bɛrɛ yaa obaajɛ. Nɛɛ, Ama le mu jaiyɛun jaain bee ma?»
44011018	Piɛru kunrin wo sɔwaa, be wooi puu sɔɔ gɔ dɛɛnrinyaain. Ama sɔmɔu kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain bɛrɛ yaa ajubuduli obaa, bemaa ɔnmɔ gɔ bɛɛ ga Ama yabaajɛ.»
44011019	Etiɛnui waaru daiin le, jaŋu unrunw dɛi ɔɲɔmu diyɛ biyaabe. Ɔɲɔmu wogɔ dɛi inɛw ginaa yain gɔbe, Penisi gana lee, Sipere gana lee, Antiɔse ana lee nɛ baa yaabɛin. Be Yahutunw bɛrɛ laa ye, inɛ waja bɛrɛ Ama sɔɔ tagaubenɛ.
44011020	Kaa jaŋu unrunw gamuu, Sipere lee, Sirɛnɛ lee bɛɛnw, Antiɔse yaa, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ yaa Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kibɛru Ɛju waaju kanraanbɛin.
44011021	Inɛw Baŋa Ama gɔnrɔn gɔ be le yabe. Kunrin, inɛw joo sɔɔ gɔ le gawaa, Yesu le tubiyaabɛin.
44011022	Jerusalɛmu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw gɔbe, sɔɔ kɔɔ kibɛru biyaa, be Barunabasui, Antiɔse nɛ baa tiyaabɛin.
44011023	Antiɔse nɛ waaru wo dɔi le, Ama nɛɛma gɔ bana birɛ wo biru iyaa, wo kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmaabe. Wo jaŋu unrunw gɔi tinwɛnraan, bemaa, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛ naran le ɛɛn go tari ye biyɛ gi.
44011024	Barunabasu inɛ ɛjui bee. Kikinu Pilu le jowaa bee, gagawu baŋai bee. Kunrin, inɛw joo Inɛw Baŋa Yesu bɛrɛ wiyaabɛin.
44011025	Kɔɔ onu nɛ Barunabasu, kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, Taruse ana nɛ Sɔlui dɛnɛi yai.
44011026	Sɔlui iyaa, Barunabasu woi dimɛraan, Antiɔse jɛɛlaabe. Anranguju turu kɛu baa, be lɛi Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kɔɔ le biyaa, inɛw jooi deeraabɛin. Yesu jaŋu unrunw boi “Kirisito inɛw” gɛi gɔ, Antiɔse nɛ tɔlin.
44011027	Waaru kɔɔ le, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gamuu Jerusalɛmu gowaa, Antiɔse wiyaabɛin.
44011028	Logoro bemɛ nɛ turu baŋa boi Agabusu gɛɛɲu gɔ ingelaa, Ama Kikinu woi damaa, aduna gɔ puu nɛ bɛrii giyɛ yoyoodo gi. Bana wo sɔi gin’ Rɔmɛ Ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ Kulɔde waaru le giyɛ wogɔ biyaabe.
44011029	Jaŋu unrunw tunmɔ le sɔwaa, inɛ tuturu puu gɔnrɔn womɔ bana wɔɔ le kɛukɛu buudu sɛgaa ye, Judea gana nɛ jaŋu unrunw wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ baru tiimɔ gin.
44011030	Be kunrin buudu sɛgaa, sin obu bemɛ Barunabasu lee, Sɔlu lee numɔ nɛ kunaa, Judea Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw bɛrɛ tiyaabɛin.
44012001	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe waaru le, Ɔgɔnɛ Herɔde Agiripa, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw gamuui ɔɲɔmɔ ga kuu bemɛ nɛ numɔ kunaabe.
44012002	Wo polukaaba le Jan bainɛ Jakei daamaabe.
44012003	Sɔɔ wogɔ Yahutunw kinɛ aa wɔɔ ga iyaa, wo Piɛrui yaa aamaabe. Buru kijɛ pidemu tolo janwan waaru gɔbe le sɔɔ kɔɔbe bii.
44012004	Kunrin Piɛrui aa kaju kunaatiyaa, wo sɔludasu unrunw nai nai gojo nai baa bojaa, dinrɛn le dinrɛn le kajuginrun gɔ dɔmiyɛnmaabe. Taŋagalu janwan gɔ galaai ye, wo mɔɔnu gɔ giru nɛ Piɛru saliyɛ kiredo ga bee.
44012005	Kunrin, kajuginrun gɔ nɛ Piɛrui ɛjii gɛliyaa yinbɛin. Kaa deeliye sɛlɛ go Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wo dɛi Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛɛunbe.
44012006	Baa yaa ye Herɔde, Piɛru saliyɛ kikiredo gɛɛu wo bee digɛ gɔ, Piɛru, sɔludasu unrunw lɛi logoro nɛ diinbe. Yɔgu lɛi le woi kɔmaa gɛlɛbɛin. Kajuginrun murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ yaa domudɔmiyɛnw yahiŋɛbɛin.
44012007	Kunrin wo wɔu, kubɔ turu Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu wiyaa, Piɛru ginrun tobe gɔ nɛ yowaa, ginrun gɔ wijɛ le jowaabe. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ Piɛrui aa jigemaa, woi yemɛlaa, ɔgiri ingele gi. Kɔɔ waaru le numɔ womɔ nɛ yɔgu tobe gɔ kɔmɔlaa bagaai.
44012008	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ womaa tɛmu womɔ pagiyaa ye taga womɔ kunɔ gi. Piɛru kunrin kanraanbe. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ iyaa womaa arugoi diyɛ womɔ kunaa ye unruin dimiyɛn gi.
44012009	Kunrin Piɛru gowaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔi dimiyaanbe. Mɛlɛnkɛ kijɛ kanraun bee gɔ Piɛru, wogɔ narain ga bele. Kaa wo kuu iyei iyeuwɔ ga bee.
44012010	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ lee, Piɛru lee domu pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ galaa, lɛiye gɔ nɛ galaa, inrun taan le digɛnu ana kɔlɔ nɛ yooɲu gɔ nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Taan wogɔ giru nɛ be dɔwaa, taan gɔ tunmi pinɛlaai. Be gowaa, ana pɔŋɔrɔn turu nɛ yowaabɛin. Ɔgu kɛu Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ Piɛrui pajaa yaai.
44012011	Hakilɛ womɔ wo le kɛu waaru bii le, Piɛru kijɛ gi: «Nɛɛ kai, naran go Inɛw Baŋa mu bɛrɛ mɛlɛnkɛ womɔ tiyaa, Herɔde numɔ nɛ lee, Yahutunw mu bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanran be ibɛɛ bee nɛ lee, mui yabaajɛ ga mu jugaajɔn.»
44012012	Kunrin waaru paamu wo kanrun le, Piɛru gowaa, Jan, boi waja womɔ Maruka gɛɛɲu na, Mari ginrun nɛ yai. Wogɔ nɛ inɛw joo mɔrinyaan, Ama gɛɛunbɛin.
44012013	Waaru Piɛru taan gɔ wo tɔgu le, iyaa birɛbirɛnɛ turu Rode gɛɛɲu gɔ, aai ma yɛnɛi wiyaabe.
44012014	Wo Piɛru mii jugaa, kinɛ ɛɛli le jowaa gabaa, taan gɔ pinɛlɛ dɛi, inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ jɔbaa yaa, Piɛrui murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ wiyaa wɔɔ ga tagu.
44012015	Kunrin wo tagaa, be aŋa womɔ saa: «U weje ulaau.» Kaa, iyaa gɔ mainiyaan ɛjii sɔwaa, sɔɔ gɔ narain gi. Be iyaa saa kɔɔi ye mɛlɛnkɛ womɔi gin.
44012016	Kaa Piɛru nimɛ kanran taan gɔ tɔgɔu yadigɛbe. Be yaa, taan pinɛlaa, Piɛrui iyaa, bei saii maunɛ kanraanbe.
44012017	Piɛru bemaa kelemu biyɛ ga numɔ daii kanraanbe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ Inɛw Baŋa, kaju nɛ bana woi goonu gɔ, wo be bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe. Iyaa be le kijɛ wo gi: «Jake lee, ba unrunw wajunw gɔbe lee bɛrɛ tagai.» Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo gowaa yalu waja yai.
44012018	Aga, baa wo yaa, sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe kinɛmana diyɛ le bɛin. Piɛru yago yai ma be inin bɛin.
44012019	Herɔde woi dɛnɛmaa iyelu. Wo sɔludasu kajuginrun gɔ dɔmɔbɛin gɔbe saliyɛ kiraa, bei daa ga tɔɔraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ Herɔde Judea gana nɛ gowaa, Sesare ana nɛ gaila biyɛi yaabe.
44012020	Herɔde, Tire lee, Sidɔn lee ana bɛɛnw le kinɛbanrun le bee. Ana kɔɔbe inɛw, pana bemɛ Herɔde laamu nɛ goobe digɛu, be sɔɔ gɔ yegeredɛin ga tunmɔ le aaraabɛin. Kunrin be Herɔde ginrun diinyɛnjɛ kuu baŋa, Balasutusu le anrunge laabɛin.
44012021	Sɔɔ sɔɔmɔ ga bai be kɛju gɔ dɔwaa wo kanran, Herɔde ɔgɔ arugoi unrunmɔ kunaa, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ dɛinyaan, sɔɔ diyɛ diyɛ sɔɔi tɔlaabe.
44012022	Sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu inɛw mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ woi sɔmɔubɛin: «Ɔn, ama turu mii. Inɛ mii laa.»
44012023	Kɔɔ gin’ kɔun kɔnwɔun waaru be bee gɔ le tee, Inɛw Baŋa mɛlɛnkɛ turu woi lagaabe. Herɔde, Ama bɛrɛ boi obolu dɛi kɔɔ biyaabe. Susuu woi kayaa, daati.
44012024	Kaa, Inɛw Baŋa Ama sɔɔ gɔ, yalu puu nɛ ginaa, giru yaaube.
44012025	Barunabasu lee, Sɔlu lee, birɛ bemɛ kilɛmaatiyaa, Jerusalɛmu gowaa pilemaa yaabɛin. Be Jan Maruka gɛɛɲu gɔ dimɛraan kole yain.
44013001	Antiɔse Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ, inɛw Ama titiyaanw lee, jaŋudeerenw lee yatobɛin. Inɛw wogɔbe unwɔin: Barunabasu lee, Simɛyɔn guju gɛun boonɔubɛin gɔ lee, Sirɛnɛ ana bɛɛnnɛ Lusiusu lee, Manayɛn, Sɛmɛginɛ Herɔde Antipasu be lɛi gabi gɔ lee, Sɔlu lee.
44013002	Inɛw Baŋai Amai sɔmɔu, aŋa pagaa, Ama gɛɛun be wɔu, Kikinu Pilu be le sɔwaa kijɛ gi: «Barunabasu lee, Sɔlu lee bei birɛ dɛi mu boonu gɔ dɛi dɛiin bojoi.»
44013003	Kunrin aŋa pagaa, Ama gɛnyaan kilaa, be Barunabasu lee, Sɔlu lee kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan, Ama duba be dɛi gɛnyaan, bei pajaa yaamaabɛin.
44013004	Barunabasu lee, Sɔlu lee, Kikinu Pilu kunrin bei tiyaa wo kanran, be Selesi ana nɛ yaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, diikoro nɛ yowaa, be Sipere gana dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ gɔ nɛ yaabɛin.
44013005	Salaminɛ ana nɛ dɔwaa, be Yahutunw Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ Ama sɔɔ tagaabɛin. Jan Maruka bei bara ga be le yadigɛbe.
44013006	Sipere gana gɔ puu kɛjaa taŋaa, be Papɔsu ana nɛ baa dɔwaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ be ainɛ dugu birɛ birɛjɛ turu sɛgɛraabɛin. Yahutunɛ inɛ titiyainɛ kakaluginɛ turui bee. Boi womɔ Baru-Yesu gɛɛɲu.
44013007	Wo Sɛmɛginɛ Sɛrujiusu Pɔlusu le bee. Sɛmɛginɛ kɔɔ hakilɛ ɛjii yasɛbe. Wo Ama sɔɔ ɛgɛ ga ɛjii dadaaru le bee dɛi, inɛ tiyaa, Barunabasu lee, Sɔlu lee boonaabe.
44013008	Kaa dugu birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ, Elimasu, be le ɛjii jiiru jiireube. Gɛrɛku sɔɔ le Baru-Yesu gɔ Elimasu boonɔbɛin. Sɛmɛginɛ gɔ Ama sɔɔ le yaba ga wo tɛŋɛ ibɛi bee.
44013009	Kunrin wo wɔu, Sɔlu, boi womɔ Pɔlu yaa boonɔɲu gɔ, Kikinu Pilu le jowaa, giri Elimasu bɛrɛ dɛɛraa gɛlɛu,
44013010	wo le kijɛ wo gi: «U sasai lee, nabara tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee le, inɛ jowaa wɔɔ gɔ, u jinrun puu kuu baŋa ii gɔ, sɔɔ teitai puu jaŋunɛ gɔ, Inɛw Baŋa Ama oju naran gɔbe kɔri bojodo ga u wɔɔ gɔ pajaidolou ma?
44013011	Aiwa yɛnɛ, Ama ui lagaa girumiyɛnmaa ye, waaru gaila u nai wijɛ iyeidolou.» Pɔlu kunrin gɛɛu wo digɛu, Elimasu giri nɛ ɔlɔ kanraan, woi girumiyaain. Wo sibɛ sibɛ kigelemɔu, inɛ woi teeremɔido dɛnɛube.
44013012	Sɛmɛginɛ gɔ sɔɔ kɔɔ waaru wo iyi le, Inɛw Baŋa deeru sɔɔ gɔ, woi maunɛ kanraanbe. Wo Yesu le gawaabe.
44013013	Papɔsu nɛ gowaa, Pɔlu lee, wo bɔɔnw lee, diikoro nɛ yowaa, Panpili gana, Pɛruje ana nɛ yaabɛin. Jan Maruka kɔɔ nɛ be le kabiyaa, pilemaa, Jerusalɛmu yai.
44013014	Be Pɛruje gowaa, oju bemɛ digiyaa, Pisidi gana, Antiɔse ana nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Deeliye bai gɔ, be Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yowaa, dɛinyaanbɛin.
44013015	Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn gɔ lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe lee jaŋaa waaru kilin le, Ama gɛɛn ginrun kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe, be bɛrɛ inɛ tiyaa, be le ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Ba unrunw, inɛw mainiyɛnmɔ ga, sɔɔ be bɛrɛ tagaɲu yasɛi ye, e sɔi bɛbɛɛdei.»
44013016	Pɔlu ingelaa, numɔ le inɛw bemaa kelemu biyɛ giyaatiyaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «E Isɛrɛlu inɛw gɔbe lee, e Ama giri liyɛnw gɔbe lee, sɔɔ ma keŋiyɛin.
44013017	Isɛrɛlu tɔgu Ama gɔ, pɔɔlɔ baa, emɛ babei wo yɛmu. Ejipute gana nɛ yeru waaru be daanbe le, wo tɔgu gɔi narinyɛnmaa, jooi bojaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo gɔnrɔn diyɛ unrunmɔ le bei Ejipute gana nɛ goomaabe.
44013018	Anranguju pɛnai gin’ wo olusolo nɛ bei muyaanbe.
44013019	Kaana gana nɛ tɔgu sɔi suyaatiyaa, Ama, gana bemɛ gɔ jeɲaa, emɛ babe mɔi boju.
44013020	Anranguju suŋu nai pɛnumɔrɔn gin’ gana gɔ numɔ bemɛ nɛ yatobe. «Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Ama emɛ babe bɛrɛ saliyɛkirenw obaabe. Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Samuɛlu waaru yai dɔɔ, saliyɛkirenw gɔbe yabɛin.
44013021	Kɔɔ onu nɛ emɛ babe, ɔgɔnɛ kuu unrunbemɛ nɛ daana ga gɛnyaanbɛin. Ama, Kisu ii Sɔlu, Bɛnjamɛ tɔgu gɔ, be bɛrɛ obaabe. Wo anranguju pɛnai laamu kanraanbe.
44013022	Ama Sɔlui pajaatiyaa, Dawidei jeɲaa, emɛ babe kuu nɛ ɔgɔ daanaabe. Ama, kuu womɔ le Dawide dɛi ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Mu Jɛse ii Dawidei iyaajɔn. Kinɛ ma, inɛ le yabaajɛ gɔ woi. Kijɛ wo bɛrɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ puu, wo kanrun kikibemɔdo.’
44013023	Nɛɛ Ama, pui wo kunu le kɛukɛu, Dawide tiruwɛnɛ Yesui, Isɛrɛlu yabanɛi bojaabe.
44013024	Yesu wo wɛɛmɔ nɛ, Ama, Jan Batisei tiyaa, wo Isɛrɛlu inɛw bɛrɛ waaju kunaa, bemaa bana mɔɲu bemɛ dulomɔ ye batise yoo gi.
44013025	Jan birɛ womɔ dogoido waaru dɔwaa wo kanran, ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘E mui aai ga sɛi? Inɛ e dɔmɔ gɔ wogɔ mui laa. Kaa yɛnɛi, inɛ wogɔ onu ma nɛ yawɛɛjɛ. Taga womɔ suŋu kɔmɔlɔ ga mu le jaanla.’
44013026	«Aiwa, ba unrunw, e Abarahamu tɔgu gɔbe lee, e tɔgu waja inɛw, Ama giri liyɛnw gɔbe lee, yayabu sɔɔ ɔn emɛ bɛrɛ tiin.
44013027	Yɛnɛi, Jerusalɛmu bɛɛnw lee, inɛw giru toin bemɛ gɔbe lee, Yesu aai ma paamu kanrannɛ. Iyaa, deeliye bai puu, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn nɛ sɔɔ jaŋaɲu gɔ yaa paamu kanrannɛ. Kaa, Yesu kuu nɛ jarugu be duuru gɔ, be inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔi kibemi.
44013028	Halu jarugu turu kanran be Yesu nɛ tɛmɛnɛ kanran, be Pilate bɛrɛ gɛnyaan woi daa gin.
44013029	Kunrin Yesu dɛi sɔɔ tɔŋi gɔ puu kanraan kibemaa, be baga jai kuu nɛ woi sunugaa, ɔnsain turu nɛ duunaabɛin.
44013030	Kaa Ama yiun nɛ woi bulomaabe.
44013031	Galile gana nɛ gowaa, wo le digiyaa, inɛw Jerusalɛmu ulin gɔbe, Yesu, bai lugo joo nɛ unruin be bɛrɛ tagaraabe. Kanɛ inɛw wogɔbe Isɛrɛlu tɔgu logoro nɛ Yesu sɛɛrɛi biyaa wɔin.
44013032	Emɛ yaa kuu emɛ le Kibɛru Ɛju e bɛrɛ emɛ jɛɛlu gɔ unwɔ: Emɛ babe bɛrɛ Ama kijɛ pui kunu gɔ,
44013033	emɛ unrunw gɔbe sibɛ go, Ama, pui wogɔ kibemaati. Ama Sɔmu dɔn, nii lɛiye gɔ nɛ bana tɔŋɔ ɔn le kɛukɛu, Ama Yesui yiun nɛ bulomaa pui wogɔ kibemaati: “Ui Aini mai, iye mu ui narun.”
44013034	Ama iyaa Yesui yiun nɛ bulomaa ye, asuu waja woi yinwɛindolo gi. Wo ɔn gin’ sɔi: “Dawide le pui mu kunu gɔ, mu duba dɛin kɔɔliyɛɛlɛ wogɔ, kuu ebe nɛ susugomɔdɔn.”
44013035	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, yalu waja nɛ yaa Sɔmu dɔn ɔn gin’ gi: “Inɛ yɛmaa dɛiin u bojaajɛ gɔ, yiun womɔ ɔmaai biyɛ ga u yabaidolou.”
44013036	Nɛɛ Dawide, waaru unrunmɔ le, Ama bana dɛnɛjɛ gin’, birɛ womɔ biraa, yinwaain. Wo babe le yiun womɔ bojaa, sɛgɛ womɔ sainyaain.
44013037	Kaa Ama inɛ bulomu gɔ woi ɔmɔlu.
44013038	«Aiwa, ba unrunw, nɛɛ sɔɔ ɔn paamu kanrain: Yesu le digɛnu hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛɛmɔjɛ ga emɛ e bɛrɛ tagauwɔin. Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ ei teitai bojaa bɛɛlu. Kaa Yesu le inɛw gawaɲu gɔbe, wo le digɛnu bei teitai bojaaɲu. Inɛ aai kanran, Yesu le gawaajɛ ye, hakɛ wogɔbe kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛjɛ.
44013040	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ be sɔi ɔn kuu ebe nɛ sugonɔu giye, kuu ebe kajubai:
44013041	“Inɛw sɔɔ yau kanranw gɔbe, e yɛnɛi, e bɛrɛ maunɛ kanranmu ye, manajɛɛi. Ɔnhɔn, waaru ebe le, mu sɔɔ turu kakanrandɔn bai, e bɛrɛ tiinɛ tagin bee ye, e wogɔ le gawaidelei.”»
44013042	Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ waaru be goobe le, inɛw be bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, deeliye bai wɛɛido gɔ le yaa bemaa sɔɔ kɔɔbe kuu nɛ pilemu ye unrunbe le sɔɔ sɔɔ gin.
44013043	Mɔɔnu gɔ kilaa wo kanran, Yahutunw joo lee, inɛw Yahutunw oju nɛ toin joo lee, be Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee onu nɛ dimiyaanbɛin. Be inɛw gɔbe le sɔɔu, Ama nɛɛma gɔ nɛ yabiyɛ ga ɛjii bei tinwɛnrɛunbɛin.
44013044	Deeliye bai waja wo dɔwaa, Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ keŋiyɛn ga ana inɛw ɛjii mɔrinyaanbɛin. Inɛ kɔɔ nɛ wɛɛlu joo laa.
44013045	Yahutunw inɛw, mɔɔnu diyɛ gɔ iyaa, ele be le jowaa, Pɔlu sɔɔ gɔ kɔɔrɔmɔu, woi duyɔubɛin.
44013046	Kunrin kanraun be wɔu, Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee be le daii sɔwaa, kijɛ be gi: «Ama sɔɔ gɔ e Yahutunw bɛrɛ laa taga ga waajibi bee. Kaa e sɔɔ gɔ le yabaalɛi, iyaa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ e le jaanla ga, e kuu ebe le tagarauwɔi digɛu, emɛ tɔgu wajabe inɛw bɛrɛ yaadɛin.
44013047	Yɛnɛi, Inɛw Baŋa Ama emɛ bɛrɛ tɔɔru obu gɔ unwɔ: “Uwaa, tɔgu wajabe inɛw wijɛi biyɛ ga, mu ui yɛmaa daanu. Iyaa, yayabu gɔ aduna kale wooi nɛ dɔɔnɔ ga ui yɛmu.”»
44013048	Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, sɔɔ kɔɔ waaru be ɛgu le kinɛ bemɛ ɛɛliyaa, be Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ gɔ sɔmɔubɛin. Kunrin, inɛw ɔnmɔsɔgɔ bɛɛ ga bojaaɲu gɔbe puu, Yesu le gawaabɛin.
44013049	Gana wogɔ yalu puu nɛ Ama sɔɔ ginaabe.
44013050	Kaa Yahutunw, yaanw diyɛnw Ama giri liyɛnw gɔbe lee, ana inɛw diyɛnw gɔbe leei suuraa, Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee dɛi ingelemaabɛin. Be bei ɔɲɔmaa, gana bemɛ nɛ nanaa goonaabɛin.
44013051	Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee, be dɛi kubɔ unrunbemɛ nɛ ugunu tara gɔ pogaatiyaa, Ikɔniumu ana nɛ yain.
44013052	Antiɔse nɛ, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe kai, kinɛ ɛɛli le jowaabɛin. Kikinu Pilu yaa be le jooi bee.
44014001	Ikɔniumu ana nɛ Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee iyaa Yahutunw Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yowaa, sɔɔ sɔwaabɛin. Sɔɔ bana be sɔi gɔ digɛu, Yahutunw joo lee, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain joo lee Yesu le gawaabɛin.
44014002	Kaa Yahutunw gamuu kinɛ ɛɛn le biyaa, tɔgu wajabe inɛw gɔbei suuraa, Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee dɛi, inɛw kɔɔbe kinɛ banranmaabɛin.
44014003	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee Ikɔniumu nɛ tanwaanbɛin. Be Inɛw Baŋa nɛ diyɛdɔn ɛju le biyaa, anrangaju le sɔɔ sɔɔubɛin. Inɛw Baŋa Ama yaa, nɛɛma womɔ sɔɔ be sɔɔbe gɔ narain ga, sɛɛrɛ unrunmɔ tagaraube. Wo sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee, yarabirɛ lee be le digɛu kanrinyɛnmɔube.
44014004	Ana gɔ nɛ inɛw tunmɔ le mii kabiyaain. Gamuu Yahutunw bɔɔi bɛin. Gamuu Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe bɔɔi bɛin.
44014005	Yahutunw gɔbe lee, tɔgu wajabe inɛw gɔbe lee, kuu bɛɛnw bemɛ be wooi, Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu leei ɔɲɔmɔ ye, tibu le bei kama dai ibɛɛ bɛin.
44014006	Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee wogɔ soo biyaa, be Likaoni gana nɛ jɔbaa yaabɛin. Gana kɔɔ nɛ, be Lisutere ana lee, Dɛrube ana lee, be le ana bɛrii bɛin lee nɛ yaaubɛin.
44014007	Yalu kɔɔbe nɛ, be Kibɛru Ɛju tagaubɛin.
44014008	Lisutere ana nɛ ainɛ turu yabe. Kubɔ womɔbe sanaai digɛu, wo waaru puu dadaanbe. Woi narin nɛ, wo kɔɔ gin’ yinwɔɔ. Asuu yoi yaatɛlu.
44014009	Wo Pɔlu sɔɔ sɔɔbe gɔ keŋiyɛunbe. Pɔlu wo bɛrɛ giri dɛɛraa, woi yɛnaabe. Ainɛ gɔ Ama unruin bajugu bɛbɛɛdo ga gawaa wɔɔ ga Pɔlu iyaabe.
44014010	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mii ɛɛn le sɔwaa kijɛ wo gi: «Ingele ye demu demu kubɔ uwɔ kuu nɛ iŋiyɛn.» Ainɛ gɔ kiliyaa ingelaa, yoi yaai tɔlaabe.
44014011	Pɔlu kijɛ kanrun gɔ inɛw waaru be iye le, be mii goonaa Likaoni gana sɔɔ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛubɛin: «Amabe, inɛw taŋaa emɛ bɛrɛ sugaain.»
44014012	Kunrin be ama bemɛ boi be bɛrɛ kunaabɛin. Barunabasu mɔ Sesu kuni. Pɔlu, sɔɔ gɔ wo sɔɔbe dɛi, boi womɔ Hɛrumɛsu kuni.
44014013	Ana yoogu gɔ nɛ Sesu ginrun buloɲu yabe. Sesu bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ gɔ, tiun puyo digaa mɔɔnaa, naa jaŋube kole saŋaraan, ana inɛw be wooi mɔrinyaanbɛin. Be Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee bɛrɛ, sadaga tɛgɛrɛdɛin ga, ginrun murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ wiyaabɛin.
44014014	Kaa Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe wogɔ ɛgaa, arugoi unrunbemɛ aa kaaraatiyaa, mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ yowaa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin:
44014015	«E inge dɛi kɔɔ kanraunwɔi? Emɛ yaa e gin’ inɛbei. Emɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ e bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛuwɔin. Ebaa ɔmɔlɔ ɔnbe kijɛ kanmai laa ga, wogɔ pajaa ye, Ama ɔnmɔ, alagala lee, minɛ lee, nɛudii lee, kɔlɔ bemɛ nɛ kijɛ toin puu lee maŋanɛ gɔ sibɛ go ei kigelemɔ ga, e bɛrɛ tagauwɔin.
44014016	Waaru galu gɔ le, Ama tɔgu puui oju yai be ibɛ nɛ pajaa sɛbe.
44014017	Kaa kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ, ɛju wo kanranjɛ le, wo bana unrunmɔ inɛw bɛrɛ waaru puu jugɔmaabe. Alagala goi ye wo anrandii e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔ. Dɛnrɛn gɔbe waaru bemɛ le e bɛrɛ obouwɔ. Pana joo e bɛrɛ obouwɔ. Kinɛ ebe nɛ kinɛ ɛɛli kunɔuwɔ.»
44014018	Halu be kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaabɛin kanran, mɔɔnu gɔ be bɛrɛ sadaga tɛgɛrɛnɔu ga, be pɛrɛ pɛrɛ tɛŋaa bɛɛin.
44014019	Antiɔse ana lee, Ikɔniumu ana lee nɛ gowaa, Yahutunw gamuu wiyaa, inɛw jooi dɔbɔraa unrunbe bɔɔi bojaabɛin. Be Pɔlui tibu le kamaa, woi yinwaain ga ana laara go bumaa goonaabɛin.
44014020	Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe yaa, woi gɔŋaa be kanran, wo ingelaa, ginrun yowaabe. Aga baa yaa gɔ, Barunabasu be lɛi Dɛrube ana nɛ yaabɛin.
44014021	Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee, Dɛrube ana nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju kanraan, jaŋu unrunw joo biyaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ be pilemaa, Lisutere ana le digɛu, Ikɔniumu ana nɛ wiyaa, Antiɔse ana nɛ yaabɛin.
44014022	Be jaŋu unrunw gɔbe anrangaju bariyɛmɔu, bemaa gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go biyɛ ga, bei tinwɛnrɛunbɛin. Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ama diinɛ nɛ emɛ yoomɔ nɛ, waajibi emɛ ɔɲɛ joo ihiyedɛin.»
44014023	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu be galabe puu nɛ, be Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw daanaubɛin. Aŋa pagaa, Ama gɛnyaan ye, be Inɛw Baŋa le be gawu gɔ bɛrɛ, bei sagu duurɔubɛin.
44014024	Kɔɔ onu nɛ be Pisidi gana gɔ kɛjaa galaa, Panpili gana nɛ dɔwaabɛin.
44014025	Pɛruje ana nɛ Ama sɔɔ tagaatiyaa, be Atali ana nɛ yain.
44014026	Kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, be diikoro nɛ yowaa, birɛ kanɛ be kibemu gɔ dɛi yalu nɛ bei Ama nɛɛma nɛ gawurin Antiɔse nɛ yaabɛin.
44014027	Antiɔse waaru be dɔi le, be Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw gɔ puu mɔɔnaa, be le digɛu, Ama birɛ biru puu tagaabɛin. Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain, Yesu le gawa ga, Ama bana taan pinɛlaa sɛɛ gɔ yaa tagaabɛin.
44014028	Be kɔɔ nɛ jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le bai joo biyaabɛin.
44015001	Anranw gamuu Judea gana nɛ gowaa, Antiɔse ana nɛ wiyaa, ba unrunw gɔbe bɛrɛ deeru oboi tɔlaabɛin. Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Mɔise tɔɔru le kɛukɛu e araa nɔɔli ye, yayabu bɛɛidelei.»
44015002	Sɔɔ kɔɔ le digɛu, siɲɛ diyɛ ingelaabe. Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee, inɛw kɔɔbe lee logoro nɛ jiiru diyɛ biyaabe. Kunrin Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee, Antiɔse inɛw gamuu leei Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee bɛrɛ, sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi tiyaabɛin.
44015003	Kunrin Ama inɛw mɔɔnu yoi bemɛ kai kilɛmaa wo kanran, be oju gowaabɛin. Penisi gana lee, Samari gana lee kɛjaa taŋau, be ba unrunw bɛrɛ inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain tubu bana yoin, digu le digu le tagaubɛin. Sɔɔ wogɔ ba unrunw bɛrɛ kinɛ ɛɛli oboube.
44015004	Waaru Jerusalɛmu be dɔi le, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ lee, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee bei sɛgɛraabɛin. Be yaa Ama be le digɛu bana birɛ biru tagaabɛin.
44015005	Nɛɛ, Parisiɛnbe logoro nɛ inɛw gamuu Yesu le gawaa wɔin yabɛin. Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee, sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa, Parisiɛn kɔɔbe ingelaa, waajibi inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain, tubu yoin gɔbei araa nɔɔmɔu jaain wɔɔ gin. Iyaa Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ gɛliyɛ ga be bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔun jaain wɔɔ gin.
44015006	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee, sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛjii marun yɛnɛ ga tunmɔ le mɔrinyaanbɛin.
44015007	Jiiru gɔ ɛjii ɛnyaanbe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Piɛru ingelaa, ɔn gin’ be le gi: «Ba unrunw, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, Ama Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa ye, Yesu le gawa ga, Ama waaru wage le baa maa be bɛrɛ waaju taga ga, logoro ebe nɛ mui yɛmaabe ga e igii wɔi.
44015008	Nɛɛ Ama, inɛw wooi kinɛ jugɔnɛ gɔ, Kikinu Pilu gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ bana wo obu gin’, be bɛrɛ yaa kunrin obu. Kɔɔ gin’, unrun be le yabaajɔn ga tagaraabe.
44015009	Iyaa Ama, kinɛ bemɛ, gagawu bemɛ dɛi ɛjɛmu. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, wo emɛ Yahutunw tɔgu gɔbe lee, be lee logoro nɛ kabu turu kanran kunɔlu.
44015010	Nɛɛ, Amai subɔrɔu wɔnɛ biyaai ye, emɛ babe lee, emɛ lee, dɔɔ gɔnrɔnlu emɛ wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔ jaŋu unrunw bɛrɛ duurɔdei ga e wɔɔ gɔ ingei?
44015011	Ai, kaa, bei bana yabin gin’, emɛ kanran Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛɛma dɛi emi yabaaɲu ga wogɔ le gawaa wɔin.»
44015012	Piɛru kunrin wo sɔwaa, inɛw gɔbe puu kelemu biyaabɛin. Barunabasu lee, Pɔlu lee, Ama be le digɛu inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain logoro nɛ sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee, yarabirɛ lee, bana wo kanrun tagaabɛin. Inɛw bei keŋiyaanbɛin.
44015013	Sɔɔ bemɛ waaru sugu le, Jake, sɔɔ jeɲaa, ɔn gin’ gi: «Ba unrunw, mui ɛjii keŋiyɛin.
44015014	Ama, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe mai siyaa, tɔlɔ gɔ le baa logoro bemɛ nɛ tɔgu womɔi biyɛ ga bana bei wo yɛmu gɔ, Simɔ Piɛru emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe.
44015015	Sɔɔ wogɔbe inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ tɔŋi ɔn le yaa sɛgɛraa wɔɔ:
44015016	“Bai wɛɛido nɛ, mu Inɛw Baŋa gɔ, pilemu ye e bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn. Ɔgɔnɛ Dawide ginrun numaa diin gɔ, mu wogɔ pilemɛ ye uhujɔdɔn. Ɔnhɔn, ginrun wolaa yanwaain gɔ, mu pilemu ye sɛɛu bobojodɔn. Mu ginrun gɔ sɛɛu ihingelemɔdɔn.
44015017	Kunrin inɛw wajunw puu, Inɛw Baŋa Amai dɛdɛnɛdɛin. Ɔnhɔn, tɔgu boonaa maai mu boju gɔbe puu mui dɛdɛnɛdɛin.
44015018	Inɛw Baŋa Ama pɔlɔ pɔlɔ baa sɔɔ kɔɔbe jugɔmɔnɛ gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ kɔɔ woi.”
44015019	Kɔɔ digɛu, ajubu ma nɛ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain, Ama le tubu kanraanɲu gɔbe, sɔɔ kirɛ kuu bemɛ nɛ emɛ duurɔun jaanla.
44015020	Kaa, waaru wage le baa, Mɔise tɔɔru obu gɔ waaju ana puu nɛ kunɔuwɔin. Iyaa, Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yaa deeliye bai puu wogɔbe jaŋauwɔin. Wogɔ digɛu, dɔn tɔŋaa ye inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ tiyaa ye, bemaa ɔmɔlɔ nawan tɛnwɛn ye bei lɔgɔjiyɛmɔnɔu gɛɛmɔi. Bemaa sala nɛ yoonɔu, iyaa nawan ili goolu tɛnwɛnnɔu, ili yaa kayanɔu gɛɛmɔi.»
44015022	Jake kunrin wo sɔwaa, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw lee, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw puu lee, logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw gamuu yɛmaa ye, Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee onu nɛ digɛraa ye Antiɔse ana nɛ tiimɔ gin. Be Jude, boi waja womɔ Barusabasu gɛɛɲu gɔ lee, Silasu lee yɛmaabɛin. Inɛw lɛi kɔɔbe ba unrunw logoro nɛ inɛw giru tobɛin bei.
44015023	Be lɛtɛrɛ tɔŋaa numɔ bemɛ nɛ kunaabɛin. Lɛtɛrɛ gɔ nɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ: «Ba unrunw Yahutunw tɔgui laain, Antiɔse lee, Siri gana lee, Silisi gana lee nɛ wɔin gɔbe, e ba unrunw, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee emɛ ei poonɔuwɔin.
44015024	Inɛw gamuu emɛ bɛrɛ gowaa, e bɛrɛ yaa, sɔɔ bemɛ le ei ɔɲɔmɔu, hakilɛ ebe yamalauwɔin be giyaa emɛ ɛgaabɛin. Kaa bei emɛ tiilu.
44015025	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi emɛ tunmɔ le sɔwaa, ba unrunw ibɛ emɛ, Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee onu nɛ, inɛ digɛraa ye e bɛrɛ tiimɔ gin.
44015026	Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee, be kinrun bemɛ pajaatiyaa, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito birɛ birɛuwɔin.
44015027	Aiwa, kunrin emɛ Jude lee, Silasu lee, e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔin. Be aŋa bemɛ le sɔɔ emɛ tɔŋu ɔnbe e bɛrɛ tatagadɛin.
44015028	Kijɛ waajibi wɔɔ gɔbei laa ye, dɔɔ waja e bɛrɛ duurɔun dagalu ga, Kikinu Pilu yabaajɛ, emɛ yaa yabaaɲu.
44015029	Tiyɛ gɔ, ɔmɔlɔ nɛ nawan sɛnwaanɲu tɛnwɛnnɔugi, ili kayanɔugi, nawan ili goolu tɛnwɛnnɔugi, iyaa sala nɛ yoonɔugi. Kijɛ kɔɔbe nɛ kuu ebe gɛliyaajɛi ye, ɛjii bibiyɛdo. Ama jamu le emɛ sɛgɛrɛmɔ.»
44015030	Lɛtɛrɛ gɔ kunrin tɔŋaa, inɛw tiin gɔbei pajaa, Antiɔse yaamaabɛin. Be jaŋu unrunw gɔ puu mɔɔnaa, lɛtɛrɛ gɔ obaabɛin.
44015031	Lɛtɛrɛ gɔ jaŋaa, kole digɛu anrangaju be bɛi gɔ dɛi, be kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmaabɛin.
44015032	Jude lee, Silasu lee, be inɛw Ama titiyaanwin bɛin gɔ digɛu, ba unrunw gɔbei sɔɔ joo le anrangaju obaa ye, paŋa bemɛ bariyɛmɔu tanwaanbɛin.
44015033	Be waaru gaila le kɔɔ nɛ biyaa, kɔɔ onu nɛ ba unrunw gɔbe oju bemɛ dɛi Ama duba gɛnyaan, bei pajaa, inɛw bei tiin gɔbe bɛrɛ pilemaa yaamaabɛin. [
44015034	Kaa, Silasu bɛrɛ be le biyɛ ga ɛjii biyaai.]
44015035	Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee, Antiɔse nɛ biyaabɛin. Inɛw wajunw joo be wooi Ama sɔɔ deereu, Inɛw Baŋa Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ tagaubɛin.
44015036	Bai gaila galaa wo yaa, Pɔlu, Barunabasu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ ana emɛ tagu puu nɛ pilemaa yaa ye, ba unrunw gɔbe yani wɔin ma yɛnɛmɔ.»
44015037	Barunabasu, wo Jan, boi waja womɔ Maruka gɛɛɲu gɔ, be le digi yaa ga ibɛɛ bee.
44015038	Kaa Maruka, Panpili gana nɛ baa be le kabi. Wo be le bariyaa birɛ gɔ birɛlu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi pilemɛ ye Maruka be le yaa ga, Pɔlu kinɛ iyelu.
44015039	Sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi Pɔlu lee, Barunabasu lee logoro nɛ jiiru diyɛ biyaabe. Dumɔ gɔ, be tunmɔ le kabiyaain. Barunabasu, Marukai wo le dimɛraan, diikoro nɛ yowaa, Sipere gana oju ai.
44015040	Pɔlu kai, Silasui dimɛraan yai. Ba unrunw Inɛw Baŋa nɛɛma nɛ woi sagu duuraa, be yinyain.
44015041	Silasu be lɛi, wo Siri gana lee, Silisi gana lee kɛjaa taŋaabe. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gana kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe puu paŋa bariyɛmɔube.
44016001	Pɔlu kunrin Dɛrube ana lee, Lisutere ana lee nɛ dɔwaabe. Lisutere nɛ, jaŋu ii turu Timɔte gɛɛɲu gɔ yabe. Wo na Yahutunɛ, Yesu le gawaa beei. Wo ba Gɛrɛku tɔgui bee.
44016002	Lisutere lee, Ikɔniumu ana lee ba unrunw gɔbe, Timɔte dɛi sɛɛrɛ ɛju gooubɛin.
44016003	Pɔlu, Timɔte wo le digi ye yaa ga ibɛi bee. Wo unrun le woi jeɲaabe. Yahutunw, gana kɔɔbe nɛ bɛin gɔbe puu Timɔte ba, Gɛrɛku tɔgu inɛi ga igii bɛin gɔ digɛu, Pɔlu woi araa nɔɔmaabe.
44016004	Ana be galabe wooi nɛ, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, Jerusalɛmu ana Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw lee, sɔɔ bana aarin gɔ, jaŋu unrunw bɛrɛ tagaubɛin. Iyaa, inɛw wogɔ le yaba ga gɛɛubɛin.
44016005	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go biyɛ biyɛ yaaubɛin. Bai puu inɛw bariyɛubɛin.
44016006	Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ, Pɔlu lee, wo bɔɔnw lee, Ama sɔɔ taga ga, Kikinu Pilu yabalu gɔ digɛu, be Piriji gana lee, Galasi gana lee kɛjaa taŋaabɛin.
44016007	Misi gana le bɛrii dɔwaa, be Bitini gana nɛ yai dɛnaabɛin. Kaa Yesu Kikinu gɔ be kɔɔ nɛ yaa ga yabalu.
44016008	Wogɔ digɛu, be Misi galaa, Toroasu ana nɛ sugaabɛin.
44016009	Digɛ, Pɔlu kuu iye iyaabe. Maseduanɛ gana bɛɛnnɛ turu giru womɔ nɛ iŋiyaan, ɔn gin’ gɛɛunbe: «Maseduanɛ nɛ wɛɛ ye emi bara.»
44016010	Pɔlu kuu iye kɔɔ wo iye onu nɛ, emɛ ɔgu kɛu Maseduanɛ yai dɛnaabɛin. Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga ga, Ama kɔɔ nɛ emi boonɔuwɔ ga emɛ gawaabɛin.
44016011	Toroasu ana nɛ diikoro nɛ yowaa, emɛ demu demu Samɔtarase, minɛ dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ gɔ nɛ yaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, aga baa yaa gɔ emɛ Nɛyapolise ana nɛ yaabɛin.
44016012	Kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, emɛ ana Pilipi gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ yaabɛin. Maseduanɛ gana sibɛ turu nɛ ana diyɛ gɔ woi. Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw anai. Ana kɔɔ nɛ emɛ bai gaila kanraanbɛin.
44016013	Deeliye bai wo dɔwaa, emɛ ana gɔ nɛ gowaa, goro turu nɛ, Yahutunw mɔrin ye, Ama yalu be gɛɛnjɛ yɔɔ ma yalu emɛ ajubu turu nɛ yaabɛin. Emɛ kɔɔ nɛ dɛinyaan, yaanw yalu gɔ nɛ mɔrinyaan bɛin gɔbe le sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabɛin.
44016014	Yaanw kɔɔbe logoro nɛ Ama giri liyɛnɛ turu Lidi gɛɛbɛin gɔ yatobe. Wo Tiatire ana bɛɛnnɛi. Sɔi sigɛ banrun gɔ tɔŋutɔŋɔnɛi. Inɛw Baŋa kinɛ womɔ pinɛlaa, wo Pɔlu sɔɔ gɔ ɛjii keŋiyaanbe.
44016015	Kunrin wo lee, wo maranw lee, batise yowaabɛin. Batise be yoi onu nɛ, wo ginrun womɔ nɛ emi boonaabe. Wo ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mui Inɛw Baŋa Yesu jaŋu ii ga e gawaa wɔi ye, ginrun ma nɛ wɛɛ sugo ye biyɛi.» Wo mainiyaan, emɛ bɛrɛ ginrun womɔ nɛ yaamaa kaaru.
44016016	Bai turu amagɛɛn yalu gɔ nɛ yaau emɛ wɔu, gunɔ yaanran turu emɛ wooi sɛgɛraabe. Jinrun kuu iye iyemɔnɛ wo nɛ yatobe. Sɔɔ wɛɛido inɛw bɛrɛ wo tagabe gɔ digɛu, wo baŋabe wo le buudu ɛjii bɛɛubɛin.
44016017	Yaanran kɔɔ Pɔlu lee, emɛ lee onu nɛ digiyaa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ sɔɔube: «Anranw ɔnbe Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ gɔ birɛbirɛnwin. Be yayabu oju sɔɔ e bɛrɛ tagauwɔin.»
44016018	Bai lugo joo yaanran gɔ kunrin kanraanbe. Pɔlu sɔɔ womɔ gɔ le kinraan yaa, kigelemaa, jinrun gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Yesu Kirisito boi le mu u bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔuwɔn, yaanran kɔɔ kuu nɛ goo.» Waaru wogɔ le tee, jinrun gɔ yaanran gɔi pajaati.
44016019	Kaa yaanran gɔ, wo baŋabe, waja wo le buudu bɛɛidenɛ ga jugaa, be Pɔlu lee, Silasu leei aa, badu yalu nɛ saliyɛkirenw bɛrɛ jɛyaabɛin.
44016020	Be Rɔmɛ saliyɛkirenw bɛrɛ bei jɛyaabɛin. Kijɛ be gi: «Anranw ɔnbe, ana gɔ nɛ giru giru jɛɛlɛuwɔin. Be Yahutunw tɔgu inɛwin.
44016021	Atɛmu sɔɔ be sɔɔjɛ gɔ, emɛ Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw wogɔ le yaba bɛɛidenɛ, wogɔ birɛ yaa, birɛ bɛɛidenɛ.»
44016022	Mɔɔnu gɔbe yaa, Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee dɛi ingelaabɛin. Rɔmɛ inɛw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe, Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee arugoi paŋa le goonaatiyaa, bei baga le laga ga tɔɔraabɛin.
44016023	Kunrin bei baga le ɛjii lagaa, bei kaju kunaa, kajuginrun kajubanɛ gɔ womaa ɛjii bei kajuba gin.
44016024	Kajuginrun kajubanɛ gɔ sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgaa, bei kajuginrun dɛun giru go damaa kunaa, kubɔ bemɛ baga lolugu nɛ kunaabe.
44016025	Digɛtaŋu waaru le Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee, Ama gɛɛun, Ama sɔmu nii niiubɛin. Kajugunw wajunw gɔbe bei keŋiyɛunbɛin.
44016026	Kunrin wo wɔu, ginsɛsai minɛ ɛjii jigaa, kajuginrun bɔlɔtei gɔbe puu jigaai. Waaru wogɔ le tee, kajuginrun taan gɔbe puu pinɛlaai. Kajugunw yɔgu gɔbe puu digɛraa gowaai.
44016027	Kajuginrun kajubanɛ gɔ giri yemaa, kajuginrun taan gɔbe pinɛlaa wɔɔ ga waaru wo iye le, kajugunw gɔbe jɔbaain ga ajubaabe. Wo polukaaba unrunmɔ bɔwaa goonaa, kuu unrunmɔ daado ga bee.
44016028	Kaa Pɔlu, mii ɛɛn le wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kuu uwɔ nɛ mɔɲu turu kanran kanrannɔu. Emɛ puu ɔn nɛ yatoin.»
44016029	Kɔɔ waaru le kajuginrun kajubanɛ gɔ lanpa selumaa, ɔgu jɔbaa, kajuginrun gɔ nɛ yowaa, Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee giru nɛ kinwɛun numaa sugaabe.
44016030	Wo bei bain go dimɛraan goonaa kijɛ wo gi: «Mu baŋabe, yayabu bɛɛ ga kijɛ inge mu kanraun jaan?»
44016031	Be saa kijɛ be gi: «Inɛw Baŋa Yesu le gawa. Kɔɔ biyaai ye ui yayabadɛin. U lee, u maranw lee.»
44016032	Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, be Inɛw Baŋa Yesu sɔɔ gɔ, wo lee, ginrun womɔ nɛ inɛw bɛin gɔbe lee bɛrɛ tagaabɛin.
44016033	Waaru wogɔ le tee, digɛ gɔ nɛ, kajuginrun kajubanɛ gɔ bei dimɛraan yaa mirun bemɛ mɔŋaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ɔgu kɛu wo lee, wo maranw puu lee batise yowaabɛin.
44016034	Wo iyaa ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ bei unaa, pana bei obaa kayamaabe. Wo lee, wo maranw lee, Ama le wo gawu gɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛli diyɛ le bɛin.
44016035	Aga, baa yaa wo kanran, Rɔmɛ inɛw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe, kajuginrun kajubanɛ gɔ bɛrɛ garidu tiyaa, anranw kɔɔbei paja gin.
44016036	Kajuginrun kajubanɛ gɔ wiyaa, Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee bɛrɛ tagaabe. Kijɛ wo gi: «Kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe inɛ tiyaa, ei paja ga tɔɔraabɛin. Nɛɛ, e wɛɛ gooi. Jamu le yaai.»
44016037	Kaa Pɔlu, garidu gɔbe le sɔwaa kijɛ wo gi: «Emɛ Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw tɔitɔi gɔ, saliyɛ wɔlɔ go inɛw puu giru nɛ emi baga le lagaa, kaju nɛ emi aa pinin. Kanɛ be baŋi ye emi pajadɛin ga yinwɔin ma? Ai, emɛ wogɔ yabaidenɛ. Bemaa kuu bemɛ le wɛɛ emi kaju goonɔ wa.»
44016038	Garidu gɔbe sɔɔ kɔɔ yaa be tagaa, kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe Pɔlube, Rɔmɛ inɛw tɔitɔii ga ɛgaa, liliyɛ diyɛ le biyaabɛin.
44016039	Be kuu bemɛ le wiyaa, bemaa muyɔn kanran ga ɛjii gɛnyaan, kaju nɛ bei goonaabɛin. Be bei gɛnyaan, bemaa ana gɔ nɛ goojɛ gin.
44016040	Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee kaju gowaa, Lidi ginrun nɛ yaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ ba unrunw gɔ be wooi tunmɔ iyaa, be bɛrɛ tinwinrun obaatiyaa, kɔɔ gin’ yain.
44017001	Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee, Anpipolise ana lee, Apɔlɔni ana lee digɛu, Tesalonike ana nɛ yaabɛin. Yahutunw, kɔɔ nɛ Ama gɛɛn ginrun yasɛbɛin.
44017002	Pɔɔlɔ baa wo kanranbe gin’, Pɔlu kɔɔ nɛ yowaabe. Deeliye bai taanu baa wo inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe be wooi tunmɔ le Ama Dɔn kuu nɛ sɔɔ sɔwaabɛin.
44017003	Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ, ɔɲɛ iye ye iyaa yiun logoro nɛ bulo ye gogoodo ga Dɔn yingi ga, wo be bɛrɛ ɛjɛmaa ye tagaube. Yesu dɛi be bɛrɛ unrun sɔɔjɛ gɔ, Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ woi ga wo gɛɛube.
44017004	Logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw gamuu, sɔɔ gɔ le yabaa, Pɔlu lee, Silasu lee sibɛ go bariyaabɛin. Gɛrɛku tɔgu inɛw Ama giri liyɛnw joo lee, inɛw diyɛnw yaanw joo lee yaa be le bariyaabɛin.
44017005	Kaa Yahutunw gɔbe ele le jowaa bɛin. Be ana pɔŋɔrɔn nɛ inɛw koolo dɛnaa, unrunbe le baraa, inɛw mɔɔnaa, ana gɔ nɛ giru giru kanraunbɛin. Be Jasɔn ginrun nɛ yaa, Pɔlu lee, Silasu leei inɛw giru nɛ jɛɛlɛdɛin ga bei dɛnɛubɛin.
44017006	Kaa be bei iyenɛ. Be Jasɔn lee, ba unrunw gamuu lee aa, paŋa le kuu bɛɛnw giru nɛ jɛyaa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gɛɛubɛin: «Inɛw kɔɔbe aduna puu nɛ inɛw hakilɛ ingelemɔuwɔin. Kunrin kanraun kanɛ ɔn nɛ be dɔwaa,
44017007	Jasɔn, ginrun unrunmɔ nɛ bei sɛgɛraabe. Be wooi puu Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ tɔɔru birɛ birɛɛnɛ. Be ɔgɔnɛ waja yɔɔ gɛɛɲu. Boi womɔ Yesu gɛɛɲu wa.»
44017008	Kunrin be sɔwaa, mɔɔnu gɔ inɛw lee, kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, hakilɛ bemɛ ginaai.
44017009	Jasɔn lee, inɛw wajunw gɔ lee bɛrɛ waja bei aamɔidenɛ sɛɛrɛ duunɔmaa, kɔɔ gin’ bei pajin.
44017010	Digɛ digiyɛu wo digɛu, ba unrunw gɔbe Pɔlu lee, Silasu leei Bere ana nɛ yaamaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ dɔɔu digɛu, be Yahutunw Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yowaabɛin.
44017011	Bere Yahutunw gɔbe, sɔɔ keŋi nɛ Tesalonike ana bɛɛnw dɛi ire bɛin. Be kinɛ ɛju le sɔɔ gɔ keŋiyɛunbɛin. Iyaa, sɔɔ be bɛrɛ tagau bɛin gɔ narain ma, bai puu Ama Dɔn nɛ lubo lubo yɛnɛubɛin.
44017012	Logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw joo Yesu le gawaabɛin. Gɛrɛku tɔgu inɛw diyɛnw yaanw joo lee, anranw joo lee yaa gawaabɛin.
44017013	Kaa Pɔlu, Bere nɛ yaa Ama sɔɔ tagauwɔ ga, Tesalonike Yahutunw gɔbe jugaa, be kɔɔ nɛ kanran yawiyaa, inɛw hakilɛ ligijiyemaa, bei ingelemaabɛin.
44017014	Ɔgu kɛu ba unrunw gɔbe Pɔlui, nɛudii sibɛ go yaamaabɛin. Kaa Silasu lee, Timɔte lee kɔɔ nɛ biyaabɛin.
44017015	Inɛw Pɔlui niinaa gɛlɛbɛin gɔbe, woi dimɛraan, ana diyɛ Atɛnɛ gɛɛbɛin gɔ nɛ baa yaabɛin. Pilemaa Bere wɛɛu be wɔu, Pɔlu be le tagaa tiyaa, Silasu lee, Timɔte lee bemaa, tanwanlu go Atɛnɛ nɛ unruin wɛɛ tɛmɛ gi.
44017016	Kunrin Atɛnɛ nɛ Silasu lee, Timɔte leei dɔmɔu, Pɔlu, ana gɔ, ɔmɔlɔ le bana jowaa wo wɔɔ iyaa, wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu diyɛi biyaai.
44017017	Kunrin Yahutunw Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔ nɛ, wo Yahutunw gɔbe lee, inɛw wajunw Ama giri liyɛnw gɔbe lee bɛrɛ Ama sɔɔ sɔɔube. Tai nɛ kanran, bai puu inɛw wo sɛgɛrɛu bee le sɔɔube.
44017018	Jugɔ jugɔnw Epikuriɛn gɛɛɲu gɔbe lee, Sitoyisiɛn gɛɛɲu gɔbe lee gamuu yaa Pɔlu le jiiru jiireubɛin. Kunrin inɛw gamuu kijɛ gɛɛbe: «Sɔɔ diyɛ sɔɔnɛ ɔn inge gɛɛuwɔ?» Pɔlu, Yesu Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ tagaube, iyaa bulogu sɔɔ sɔɔube. Wogɔ digɛu, gamuu iyaa ɔn gin’ sɔɔubɛin: «Ɔn baŋa, ama yerube sɔɔi sɔɔjɛ gin’ wɔɔ.»
44017019	Kunrin be Pɔlui dimɛraan, badu yalu diyɛ bemɛ Areyopaje gɔ nɛ jɛyaa, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Deeru kana sɔɔ u sɔɔjɛ gɔ ingei ma, u emɛ bɛrɛ taga bɛbɛɛdou ma?
44017020	Sɔɔ u sɔɔjɛ kɔɔbe suguru emɛ nɛ sɔɔ yerui. Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ paamu kanrun ibɛɛ wɔin.»
44017021	Atɛnɛ bɛɛnw lee, yerunw logoro bemɛ nɛ daain gɔbe lee, deeru kana keŋiyɛn lee, taga lee, birɛ bemɛ kɔɔ woi.
44017022	Pɔlu, badu yalu gɔ nɛ inɛw gɔbe logoro nɛ iŋiyaan, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Atɛnɛ anranw, amabei bulu sɔɔ nɛ e maai wɔi ga mu iyeuwɔn.
44017023	Ana ebe nɛ gɔŋɔlaa, mu kijɛ e babajɛ yalu joo iyaabɔn. Halu yalu turu nɛ “Ama inɛɛ emɛ wɔɔ sadaga goonu yalu” gɛ tɔŋaa wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Aiwa, kijɛ inɛɛ wɔu e babajɛ gɔ, mu wogɔ sɔɔi e bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔn.
44017024	Aduna ɔn lee, kɔlɔ womɔ kijɛ puu lee, Ama maŋanɛ gɔ, Ama alagala lee, minɛ lee Baŋa gɔ, Ama wogɔ, numɔ le ginrun ujaaɲu nɛ toiyoolɛ.
44017025	Wo inɛw bɛrɛ ɔnmɔ lee, ninu lee, kijɛ puu lee obonɛ gɔ, kai womɔ inɛ kilɛjɛ gin’, be wo nɛ kijɛ obo ga, wo kai sɛlɛ.
44017026	Wo inɛ turu le digɛu tɔgu puu biyɛmaa, aduna yalu wooi nɛ bei daanaabe. Wo inɛw dɛi waaru dɛin dɛin kɛjaabe. Iyaa inɛw puu yalu be biyɛun jaan kale kɛjaabe.
44017027	Ama, inɛw bemaa unruin dɛnɛ ga bei maŋu. Ɔnhɔn, inɛw tau tau kanrannu wɔnu, Ama iye bɛbɛɛmɔ ma dɛi wo bei maŋu. Kaa Ama, emɛ tuturu puu le wagela.
44017028	Yɛnɛi, “Ɔnmɔ gɔ, emɛ Ama nɛ bɛɛɲu. Wo kɔrumɔ le goju emɛ bɔnrinyɛnmɔɲu. Iyaa, emɛ wo kɔrumɔ le wɔin.” Nii niiw ebe gamuu yaa sɔɔ kɔɔ tunmɔ sɔwaabɛin. Kijɛ be gi: “Emɛ yaa unrunw womɔi.”
44017029	Nɛɛ, emɛ Ama unrunwin biyaain ye, Ama gɔ kange le ma, sarudu le ma, tibu le ma dege yegeraaɲu gin’ wɔɔ ma emɛ ajubaun jaanla. Kijɛ kɔɔbe, inɛw, ajubu bemɛ lee, jugɔ bemɛ lee digɛu yegeraaɲu.
44017030	Aiwa, jugɔla waaru gɔ, Ama wogɔ inɛw bɛrɛ lugoolɛ. Kaa kanɛ inɛw puu bemaa, yalu puu nɛ, bana mɔɲu bemɛ dulomɔ ga, wo tagauwɔ.
44017031	Wo aduna puu saliyɛ teitai le bai wo kirɛido kɛjaa yasɛ. Inɛ saliyɛ gɔ kirɛido yaa yɛmaa yasɛ. Wogɔ dɛi wo sɛɛrɛ inɛw bɛrɛ obaabe. Sabu wo inɛ wogɔi bulomaa yiun nɛ goonaabe.»
44017032	Inɛw gɔbe yiun bulogu sɔɔ waaru be ɛgu le, gamuu Pɔlui mɔmɔubɛin. Gamuu iyaa unrunbe sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi bai waja woi keŋiyɛndɛin gin.
44017033	Pɔlu kɔɔ gin’ bei pajaatiyaa yai.
44017034	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ inɛw gamuu Pɔlu le bariyaabɛin. Be Yesu le gawaabɛin. Inɛw wogɔbe logoro nɛ Areyopaje badubadanw mɔɔnu inɛ turu yatobe. Boi womɔ Dɛnisu gɛɛɲu. Yaanran turu, boi womɔ Damarise gɛɛɲu gɔ yaa yatobe. Inɛw wajabe yaa yatobɛin.
44018001	Atɛnɛ ana nɛ kunrin sɔɔ sɔwaatiyaa, Pɔlu gowaa, Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ yai.
44018002	Kɔɔ nɛ wo ainɛ Yahutunɛ turu tɛmaabe. Boi womɔ Akilasu gɛɛɲu. Rɔmɛ laamu Pɔn numɔ bɛɛnnɛi. Wo lee, yaanran womɔ Pirisilu lee, bɛrii Itali gana nɛ gowaa wɛin. Rɔmɛ Ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ, Kulɔde, Yahutunw tɔgu puu Rɔmɛ ana nɛ goo ga wo tɔɔraa, be kɔɔ gin’ jɔbaa wɛin. Pɔlu bei yaa tɛmaa,
44018003	nɛɛ, be wooi birɛ turu bee digɛu, wo ginrun bemɛ nɛ biyaa, be wooi birɛ birɛube. Birɛ bemɛ guju kuru yegurui bee.
44018004	Pɔlu, Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ Yahutunw lee, Gɛrɛku tɔgu lee bɛrɛ, sɔɔ womɔ le gawamu kaarado gɛ, deeliye bai puu be le sɔɔ sɔɔube.
44018005	Nɛɛ Silasu lee, Timɔte lee Maseduanɛ gana nɛ gowaa be wiyaa, Pɔlu waaju tagu gɔ nɛ sai biyaabe. Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ, Yesu woi ga wo Yahutunw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ gooube.
44018006	Kaa Yahutunw gɔbe sɔɔ mɔɲu mɔɲu le wo le jaiyɛubɛin. Pɔlu giru bemɛ nɛ sɔi unrunmɔbe yigaatiyaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ili ebe kuu ebe nɛ yasugo. Mu kai, e sibɛ go jarugu le wɔlɔn. Kanɛ baa, mu tɔgu wajabe inɛw bɛrɛ yaajɔn.»
44018007	Kunrin Pɔlu be nɛ gowaa, ainɛ Ama giri liyɛnɛ turu ginrun nɛ yai. Ainɛ wogɔ boi Titiusu Jusutusu gɛɛɲu. Ginrun womɔ amagɛɛn ginrun le bɛrii bee.
44018008	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ Ama gɛɛn ginrun kuu baŋa, Kirisupusu, wo maranw puu le, be Inɛw Baŋa Yesu le gawaabɛin. Kɔrɛnte bɛɛnw Pɔlui keŋiyɛunbɛin gɔbe yaa joo gawaabɛin. Be batise yowaabɛin.
44018009	Digɛ turu kuu iye nɛ Inɛw Baŋa ɔn gin’ Pɔlu le gi: «Liliyɛ le biyɛnɔu. Deeliye sɛlɛ go waaju kanran.
44018010	Mu u le yɔɔun. Inɛ turu kanran mɔɲu kanrando giye u bɛrɛ numɔ dɔɔnɔidolo. Ana ɔn nɛ, inɛw ma joo yatoin.»
44018011	Kunrin Kɔrɛnte nɛ Pɔlu anranguju turu iyepilu kuloi biyaa, inɛw bɛrɛ Ama sɔɔ deereube.
44018012	Nɛɛ, Rɔmɛ sɛmɛginɛ, Galiɔn, Akayi gana nɛ waaru wo daanbe le, Yahutunw mii turu biyaa, Pɔlu dɛi ingelaabɛin. Be woi saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ jɛɛlaa,
44018013	ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Ainɛ ɔn, Ama baba ga bana wo deerejɛ gɔ tɔɔru le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ. Kaa wo wogɔ inɛw hakilɛ nɛ kunɔ kaarado ga wɔɔ.»
44018014	Kunrin be sɔwaa, Pɔlu sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ sai ibɛɛ bee. Kaa Galiɔn, sɛmɛginɛ gɔ, Yahutunw gɔbe le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Yɛnɛi, kanran dagalu turu sɔɔi ma, yanwan tɛbu sɔɔi bee ye, e Yahutunw gɔbe, ei muyɔn ye, mu keŋiyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
44018015	Kaa, sɔɔ tiyɛ kuu nɛi ma, boi kuu nɛi ma, kuu ebe tɔɔru sɔɔ kuu nɛ, e tunmɔ le jiiru biyaa wɔi ye, kɔɔ sɔɔ ebei. Mu wogɔ saliyɛ kirɛnɛi biyɛidolɔn.»
44018016	Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ bei digaa goonaabe.
44018017	Kunrin wo biyaa, inɛw gɔbe, Ama gɛɛn ginrun kuu baŋa Sɔsutɛnɛi aa, yalu saliyɛ kiru giru gɔ nɛ woi lagai tɔlaabɛin. Kaa be ingei kanranɲu ma, Galiɔn gaila kanran gɔnaa yɛnɛlu.
44018018	Pɔlu nimɛ kanran Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ gaila tanwaanbe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ Pɔlu, Ama le pui jeɲaa sɛbe gɔ digɛu, kuu unrunmɔ kaamaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le jamu biyɛmɔ giyaatiyaa, wo lee Pirisilu lee, Akilasu lee, Sankere nɛ diikoro Siri gana nɛ yaajɛ turu nɛ yowaabɛin.
44018019	Epɛse ana nɛ dɔwaa, wo Akilasu lee, Pirisilu lee kɔɔ nɛ pajaabe. Wo Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yowaa, Yahutunw le Ama sɔɔ sɔɔube.
44018020	Be wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, womaa bai lɛi unrunbe le biyɛ gin. Kaa wo yabalu.
44018021	Bei pajaa yaau, wo be le sɔwaa gi: «Ama yabaajɛ ye mu e bɛrɛ pilemɛ ye wɛwɛɛdɔn.» Epɛse nɛ gowaa, Pɔlu diikoro nɛ yowaa,
44018022	Sesare ana yaa sugu. Kɔɔ le digɛu, wo Jerusalɛmu ulaa, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi poonaatiyaa, Antiɔse ana nɛ sugu.
44018023	Wo kɔɔ nɛ waaru gaila kanraan, pilemaa Galasi lee, Piriji lee gana nɛ gɔŋɔlaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe puu paŋa bariyɛmaabe.
44018024	Ainɛ Yahutunɛ turu Epɛse ana nɛ dɔwaabe. Boi womɔ Apɔlɔsu gɛɛɲu. Alɛsandiri ana bɛɛnnɛi. Ainɛ kɔɔ sɔɔ ɛjii sɔi bɛbɛɛjɛ. Ama Dɔn yaa ɛjii jugaa wɔɔ.
44018025	Inɛw Baŋa oju sɔɔ wo bɛrɛ deeraabɛin. Wo kinɛ unrunmɔ wooi le, lelu tolo go Yesu sɔɔ sɔɔu, deeru deereube. Kaa jugɔ womɔ batise Jan kanranbe sɔɔ nɛ galalu bee.
44018026	Wo Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ daii sɔɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabe. Pirisilu lee, Akilasu lee woi keŋiyaan, woi dimɛraan unrunbe le bojaa, Ama sɔɔ oju gɔ sigɛ le ɛjɛmaa, wo bɛrɛ tagaabɛin.
44018027	Apɔlɔsu gɔ Akayi gana go galu ibɛi bee dɛi, ba unrunw wogɔ nɛ wo bɛrɛ anrangaju obaabɛin. Be jaŋu unrunw gɔ bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiyaa, bemaa woi ɛjii sɛgɛrɛ gin. Nɛɛ, Akayi nɛ dɔwaa, Ama nɛɛma dɛi, inɛw Yesu le gawaa bɛin gɔ sibɛ nɛ Apɔlɔsu niwɛn diyɛi biyaabe.
44018028	Sabu, wo gɔnrɔn diyɛ le inɛw puu giru nɛ Yahutunw gɔbe sɔɔ kɔɔlɔmɔube. Ama Dɔn sɔɔ le digɛnu, naran go Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ, Yesui ga inɛw bɛrɛ jugɔmɔube.
44019001	Apɔlɔsu, Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ wo wɔu, Pɔlu, kokoo yalu gɔbe kɛjaa taŋaa, Epɛse ana nɛ yaabe. Wo kɔɔ nɛ jaŋu unrunw gamuu tɛmaa,
44019002	be le sɔwaa gi: «Waaru e gawu gɔ le, Kikinu Pilu, kuu ebe nɛ sugaabe ma?» Be saa kijɛ gin: «Kikinu Pilu yɔɔ be giyaa kanran emɛ ɛgɛtɛnɛ.»
44019003	Pɔlu bemaa kɔɔi ye batise be bɛi gɔ batise yɔgɔi ma gi. Be saa batise Jan kanrun gɔi gin.
44019004	Pɔlu be le sɔwaa kijɛ gi: «Bana mɔɲu bemɛ dulomɔ ga, inɛw yabaaɲu gɔbe, Jan bei batise kunɔube. Wo Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw gɔbe le sɔwaa, inɛ onu unrunmɔ nɛ wɛɛido gɔ le gawa gi. Tiyɛ gɔ, Yesu le gawa gi.»
44019005	Inɛw gɔbe sɔɔ kɔɔ be ɛgu onu nɛ, be Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le unrunbei batise kanranmaabɛin.
44019006	Pɔlu, kuu bemɛ nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan wo kanran, Kikinu Pilu, kuu bemɛ nɛ sugaabe. Be sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔi tɔlaabɛin. Iyaa, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔwaabɛin.
44019007	Inɛw gɔbe lugo bemɛ anranw pɛli lɛisigɛ gin’ dɔwaabe.
44019008	Iyepilu taanu baa, Pɔlu waaru puu Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ yowaa ye, liliyɛ sɛlɛ go, inɛw puu giru nɛ sɔɔ sɔɔube. Wo Ama diinɛ sɔɔ inɛw bɛrɛ gawamu kaarado ga, bei waajaube.
44019009	Kaa inɛw gamuu kuu ɛɛn le biyaa, sɔɔ gɔ le yabu ibɛla bɛin. Be mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ Inɛw Baŋa oju gɔ yamurinyɛnmɔubɛin. Kunrin wo biyaa, Pɔlu, inɛw kɔɔbe le kabiyaa, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe le dɛiin Tiranusu jaŋuginrun nɛ mɔrinyɛunbe. Wo bai puu wogɔ nɛ be le sɔɔ sɔɔube.
44019010	Anranguju lɛi baa wo kɔɔ gin’ kanraanbe. Wogɔ digɛu, Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ inɛw puu, Yahutunw gɔbe lee, Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe lee puu Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ ɛgaabɛin.
44019011	Ama, Pɔlu le digɛu taanrinyɛn diyɛ diyɛ kanraunbe.
44019012	Halu Pɔlu goju nɛ sɔi tobe ma, sɔi pɛlɛ tɛmi ma, jiungunw bɛrɛ tɛmɛraanbejɛ ye bajaubɛin. Jinrun yaa wogɔ le inɛw kuu nɛ gooube.
44019013	Yahutunw gamuu, yalu dɛin dɛin nɛ yai ye, inɛw kuu nɛ jinrun nana goonɔ birɛ birɛubɛin gɔbe, be yaa Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le inɛw kuu nɛ jinrun nanadɛin ga tɔlaabɛin. Be jinrun gɔbe bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔɔrɔubɛin: «Yesu dɛi Pɔlu, waaju wo kanranjɛ gɔ boi le goo ga emɛ e bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔuwɔin.»
44019014	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw kanraunbɛin gɔbe, Yahutunɛ, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu baŋa turu, Sewa gɛɛbɛin gɔ unrunw sɔi gɔbei.
44019015	Jinrun gɔ le kunrin be sɔwaa, wo aŋa bemɛ ɔn gin’ sai: «Mu Yesui igii wɔun. Pɔlu aai ma igii wɔun. Kaa e aabei?»
44019016	Kunrin sɔɔu digɛu, ainɛ jinrun kuu womɔ nɛ daan gɔ, Sewa unrunw kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn diyɛ le bana wo sugu gɔ, wo kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaa, bei barumaa, be goju ije le ginrun gɔ nɛ jɔbaa goin.
44019017	Epɛse ana nɛ inɛw bɛin puu, Yahutunw ma, Yahutunw tɔgui laain ma, kibɛru wogɔ ɛgaabɛin. Inɛw puu liliyɛ le bɛin. Be Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi sɔmaabɛin.
44019018	Inɛw Yesu le gawaabɛin gɔbe logoro nɛ, joo wɛi ye, kijɛ mɔɲu be kanrun inɛw puu giru nɛ sɔɔubɛin.
44019019	Inɛw joo dugu birɛ birɛubɛin gɔbe, dugu birɛ biru dɔn bemɛ gɔ jɛɛlaa, inɛw wooi giru nɛ tɛgɛraabɛin. Dɔn gɔbe puu dɔnrun be iijaa, sarudu buudu muɲu pɛnumɔrɔn dɔwaai.
44019020	Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ gɔ yalu puu nɛ ginɛube. Inɛw puu, sɔɔ gɔ paŋa bana sɛbe iyeubɛin.
44019021	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe galaa wo yaa, Pɔlu Maseduanɛ gana lee, Akayi gana lee kɛjaa taŋaa ye Jerusalɛmu yaado ga ajubaabe. Kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Mu kɔɔ nɛ dɔwaaun ye, waajibi Rɔmɛ ana mu iyeun jaain wɔɔ.»
44019022	Kunrin, wo woi baranw logoro nɛ inɛw lɛi, Timɔte lee, Erasute lee giru womɔ nɛ Maseduanɛ nɛ tiyaabe. Wo kuu womɔ le nimɛ kanran waaru gaila le Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ biyaabe.
44019023	Waaru kɔɔbe le, Inɛw Baŋa oju gɔ dɛi giru giru gaai biyaabe.
44019024	Sarudu birɛbirɛnɛ turu, Demɛtiriusu gɛɛɲu gɔ, sarudu le ɔmɔlɔ ginrun uji uji yegereube. Amayaa, Arutemise ginrun babaɲu gɔi yegereube. Birɛ kɔɔ le birɛbirɛnw gɔbe tinɛ ɛjii bɛɛubɛin.
44019025	Demɛtiriusu, birɛ womɔ birɛnw gɔbe lee, birɛ wogɔ inɛw birɛɲu wajunw gɔbe lee puu mɔɔnaa, be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Emɛ puu birɛ kɔɔ le kɛɛlɛ joo bɛɛuwɔin ga e igii wɔi.
44019026	Nɛɛ, Pɔlu kɔɔ kijɛ kanranjɛ gɔ e iyeuwɔi, ɛgɛuwɔi. Numɔ le ama yegeraaɲu gɔbe, amai laa ga wo sɔɔuwɔ. Epɛse nɛ sai laa, kaa Asi numɔ yalu joo nɛ wo inɛw joo bɛrɛ sɔɔ kɔɔ le gawamaa, hakilɛ bemɛ yamalaa biyaajɛ.
44019027	Kunrin, sɔɔ wogɔ birɛ emɛ kuu sunugo ye, birɛ gɔ yanwan yaado. Kɔɔ sai laa, amayaa diyɛ, Arutemise ginrun gɔ kijɛ kanmai laa bojojɛ. Iyaa sigiyaa, Asi numɔ puu lee, aduna wooi lee, boi goonaa kijɛ babau sɛin gɔ, saŋa womɔ sugo yaado.»
44019028	Demɛtiriusu sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaa, inɛw gɔbe kinɛ ingelemaa, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gɛɛi tɔlin: «Epɛse bɛɛnw Arutemise gɔ wo gaai wɔɔ, Epɛse bɛɛnw Arutemise gɔ wo gaai wɔɔ.»
44019029	Kunrin giru giru gɔ ana gɔ puu nɛ dɔwaabe. Inɛw gɔ puu giru giru kanraan, Arisutaruke lee, Gayisu leei paŋa le biɲaa, yalu mɔɔnu diyɛ be kunɔjɛ nɛ yaabɛin. Inɛw lɛi kɔɔbe Maseduanɛ bɛɛnwin. Pɔlu yoi yaanw bɔɔwin.
44019030	Pɔlu mɔɔnu gɔ bɛrɛ kuu unrunmɔ taguru ibɛɛ bee. Kaa jaŋu unrunw gɔbe woi tɛŋaabɛin.
44019031	Halu Asi numɔ inɛw kuu bɛɛnw, Pɔlu anrungebe gamuu, wo bɛrɛ tagaa tiyaa, womaa, mainiyaan ye mɔɔnu yalu gɔ nɛ wɛɛnɔu gin.
44019032	Mɔɔnu yalu gɔ nɛ, inɛw kanran gɔ ɛjii ligijiyaa bee. Inɛw gamuu kijɛ turu dɛi kɔnwɔunbɛin. Inɛw wajunw gɔbe kijɛ waja dɛi kɔnwɔunbɛin. Inɛw joo yalu gɔ nɛ wiyaa kowɔin laa ye, kijɛ inge dɛi mɔrinyaan wɔin ma kanran inin bɛin.
44019033	Sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ, mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ ainɛ turu Alɛsandere gɛɛɲu turu bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Yahutunw, woi giru go gaanaabɛin. Alɛsandere Yahutunwin sɔɔ gɔ nɛ tolo tagado ga, inɛw bemaa kelemu biyɛ ga numɔ daii kanraanbe.
44019034	Kaa wo Yahutunɛi ga waaru be jugu le, be wooi puu mii ɛɛn le lɛɛrɛ lɛi gin’ baa, ɔn gin’ gɛɛubɛin: «Epɛse bɛɛnw Arutemise gɔ, wo gaai wɔɔ, Epɛse bɛɛnw Arutemise gɔ, wo gaai wɔɔ.» Be kɔɔ gin’ kɔnwɔunbɛin.
44019035	Dumɔ gɔ, ana dɔn tɔŋɔnɛ gɔ mɔɔnu gɔi kelemu biyɛmaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Epɛse bɛɛnw, Arutemise ginrun diyɛ babaɲu gɔ lee, dege womɔ alagala gowaa bagaa sugu gɔ lee, bei Epɛse ana sagi ga inɛ inɛɛ gɔ aai?
44019036	Inɛ wogɔ jiiru bɛɛjɛ wɔlɔ. Kɔɔi biyaai ye, hakilɛ ebe daanaajɛi ye, ɔgiri ye kijɛ turu kanran kanrannɔugi.
44019037	Yɛnɛi, e inɛw ɔnbe ɔn nɛ aa jɛɛlaa unsɛin. Kaa ɔmɔlɔ ginrun emɛ nɛ be yanwan turu kanran tɛbɛnɛ, iyaa amayaa emɛ gɔ dɛi yaa sɔɔ mɔɲu turu kanran sɔɔnɛ.
44019038	Nɛɛ, Demɛtiriusu lee, birɛbirɛnw wo bɔɔnw lee, inɛ turu le sɔɔ yasin ye, Rɔmɛ inɛw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe saliyɛ bai be kirejɛ dɛiin yɔɔ. Bai wogɔbe le wɛi ye, be inɛw gɔbei boonu bɛbɛɛdɛin.
44019039	E sɔɔ waja yasɛi ye, ana bɛɛnw tɔitɔi puu, waaru mɔrinyɛindɛin le kilɛmɔdɛin.
44019040	Iye sɔɔ ɔn le digɛnu emaa murutui kanranɲu giye emi jaaru bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ. Mɔɔnu gɔ tiyɛ sɔɔ giyaa ye, emɛ sai bɛɛnɛ.» Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo mɔɔnu gɔi ginrun tiyaabe.
44020001	Siɲɛ gɔ waaru dɛɛnrin le, Pɔlu, jaŋu unrunw gɔbei boonaa, be bɛrɛ tinwinrun obaatiyaa, jamu biyɛmɔ giyaa, gowaa, Maseduanɛ yai.
44020002	Maseduanɛ gana gɔ kɛjaa taŋau, Pɔlu, yalu wo galabe wooi nɛ waaju joo le, jaŋu unrunw gɔbe bɛrɛ tinwinrun oboube. Kɔɔ gin’ wo Gɛrɛse gana nɛ yaabe.
44020003	Kɔɔ nɛ wo iyepilu taanu kanraanbe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo diikoro nɛ yowaa ye, Siri gana nɛ yaado ga yegeraa sɛbe. Kaa Yahutunw wo dɛi yeguru mɔɲu kunaa wɔin ga soo biyaa, wo Maseduanɛ le pilemɛ ye galado gi.
44020004	Inɛw woi niinaa, wo le yaaubɛin gɔbe unwɔin: Bere ana bɛɛnnɛ, Pirusu ii, Sopatɛru lee, Tesalonike ana bɛɛnw, Arisutaruke lee, Sɛkundusu lee, Dɛrube ana bɛɛnnɛ Gayisu lee, Timɔte lee, iyaa Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ bɛɛnw, Tisike lee, Toropimɛ lee.
44020005	Inɛw kɔɔbe giru emɛ nɛ yaa, Toroasu nɛ emi dɔmɔbɛin.
44020006	Emɛ kai, buru kijɛ pidemu tolo janwan bai gɔbe galaa wo yaa, Pilipi ana nɛ diikoro nɛ yowaa, bai numɔrɔn yaa, Toroasu dɔwaa, emɛ bɔɔnw gɔbei tɛmaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ emɛ bai sɔi kanraanbɛin.
44020007	Jugu bai pɔlɔ gɔ, tunmɔ le pana nɛ buru kabala ga, emɛ digɛ mɔrinyaanbɛin. Aga baa yaa gɔ ingelaa ye Pɔlu yayaajɛ ga bee. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, wo inɛw gɔbe bɛrɛ waaju tagau digɛtaŋu baa dɔwaabe.
44020008	Ginrun sɔɔrɔ emɛ mɔrɔnbe gɔ nɛ lanpa joo yabe.
44020009	Nɛɛ, sagatara ii turu yabe. Boi womɔ Etike gɛɛɲu. Wo dɔlu diŋirun nɛ dɛinyaan bee. Pɔlu, waaju tagau tanwaan wo yaa, wo giri yeiyaai. Giri le bɛnraan wɔu, wo ginrun sɔɔrɔ taaniye gɔ nɛ gowaa, doɲu go ɛliyaa sugaabe. Woi yinwin jeɲi.
44020010	Kaa Pɔlu yasugaa, kuu womɔ nɛ jimiyaan, numɔ unrunmɔ le woi jeɲaa amugiyaa gɛlɛu, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Liyɛnɔugi, wo ɔnmɔi wɔɔ.»
44020011	Pilemaa daa go ulaa, Pɔlu buru gɔ kabalaa, kayaabe. Nimɛ kanran wo waaju tagau, baayaara baa dɔwaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo gowaa, yinyai.
44020012	Sagatara ii gɔi ɔnmɔ go jɛyaabɛin. Wogɔ inɛw puu bɛrɛ kinɛ kaalu diyɛ obaabe.
44020013	Emɛ giru galaa, diikoro nɛ yowaa, Asɔsu ana nɛ yaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ Pɔlui diikoro gɔ nɛ emɛ jeɲɛu jaain bee. Pɔlu, kubɔ le wɛɛdo ga, kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ gɔ yegeraabe.
44020014	Asɔsu nɛ emi wiyaa waaru wo dɔi le, emɛ diikoro gɔ nɛ woi jeɲaa, Mitilɛnɛ ana nɛ yaabɛin.
44020015	Kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, nɛudii gɔ digiyaa, aga baa yaa gɔ emɛ Kio ana daŋaran nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Bai lɛiye gɔ, emɛ yalu dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ Samɔsu nɛ dɔwaabɛin, wogɔ aga baa yaa gɔ emɛ Mile ana nɛ yaa sugaabɛin.
44020016	Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ bii ye waaru galamɔnu doori ga, Epɛse ana daŋaran nɛ galanu, kɔɔ nɛ iŋiyɛindolo ga, Pɔlu wogɔ le bee. Kanrun bɛbɛɛmɔ ye, ɔgiri ye, Pantekɔte janwan bai gɔ le wo Jerusalɛmu dɔi ibɛɛ bee.
44020017	Nɛɛ Mile ana nɛ wɔu, Pɔlu inɛ tiyaa, Epɛse ana Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw gɔbei boonaabe.
44020018	Waaru wo bɛrɛ wiyaa be dɔi le, wo be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ bai pɔlɔ kubɔ mu kunu gowaa, e le waaru mu bii puu nɛ, e le bana mu wɔɔ e igii wɔi.
44020019	Mu kuu sunugu lee, giridii lee, Yahutunw mu dɛi dabulu mɔɲu be kunɔbe ɔɲɛ nɛ lee, Inɛw Baŋa birɛ biraabɔn.
44020020	Sɔɔ turu kanran e bɛrɛ baŋaranlu go, inɛw wooi giru nɛ lee, ginrun ginrun nɛ lee mu sɔɔ e bɛrɛ niwɛn siyɛido puu ei tagaabɔn, ei deeraabɔn.
44020021	Yahutunw gɔbe lee, Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe lee puu Ama le tubi ye, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu le gawa ga tagaabɔn.
44020022	Kanɛ Ama Kikinu mui damaa, mu Jerusalɛmu unyaajɔn. Wogɔ nɛ ingei mu bɛrɛ dɔɔdo ma inɔn.
44020023	Kaa Kikinu Pilu mu bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ goou, ana ana nɛ, kaju lee, ɔɲɛ lee mui yadɔmin ga sɔɔuwɔ.
44020024	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ kinrun ma kijɛ diyɛi gin’ lugaa wɔlɔn. Kinrun ma too toolɔn. Jobu ma sɛɛu donugu bɛɛ, iyaa, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu mu bɛrɛ birɛ sagu duuru gɔ kibemaa biyaajɔn ye koi. Wogɔ Ama nɛɛma Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagu gɔ woi.
44020025	«Aiwa, yɛnɛi, mu logoro ebe nɛ gɔŋɔlaa, Ama diinɛ waaju inɛ kanrun gɔ, e, waja mui iyeidelei ga mu igii wɔun.
44020026	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu daii iye e le sɔɔuwɔn, e wooi puu, ili ebe hakɛ turu kanran kuu ma nɛ wɔlɔ.
44020027	Sabu Ama diŋɛ sɔɔ puu mu e bɛrɛ tagaabɔn. Kijɛ mu baŋurun turu kanran wɔlɔ.
44020028	Nɛɛ, kuu ebe ɛjii kajubai, iyaa, peju kulɔ gɔ ɛjii kajubai. Kikinu Pilu, ei wogɔ kajubawin bojaabe. Ama, Aini womɔ ili le inɛw womɔ mɔɔnu wo ɛbaajɛ gɔ, ɛjii gɛliyɛi.
44020029	Mu yaaun ye, logoro ebe nɛ olunawan mɔɲube yoi ye peju gɔbe kuu nɛ susugodɛin ga mu igii wɔun.
44020030	Halu logoro ebe nɛ tee inɛw ingele ye, jaŋu unrunw gɔ bemaa unrunbei digiyɛ giye, kakalu mamaŋadɛin.
44020031	Wogɔ digɛu, kuu kajubu le biyɛi. Anranguju taanu baa, aga sɛlɛ, digɛ sɛlɛ, mu giridii le, e tuturu puui tinwinrun pajalun ga naŋanɔugi.
44020032	«Nɛɛ, mu Ama lee, nɛɛma womɔ sɔɔ lee nɛ ei sagu duurɔuwɔn. Wo paŋa ebe bariyɛmu bɛbɛɛjɛ. Iyaa Ama, inɛw womɔi wɔin puu dɛi kɛn wɔɔ gɔ, e bɛrɛ obo bɛbɛɛjɛ.
44020033	Mu inɛ turu kange ma, sarudu ma, sɔibe ma, turu kanran daariyɛlun.
44020034	Mu numɔ ma le birɛ biraa, mu lee, mu bɔɔnw lee kai kilaabɔn ga e igii wɔi.
44020035	Kijɛ puu nɛ kɔɔ gin’ birɛ birɛ ye, inɛw gɔnrɔn sɛnɛ gɔbei baraun jaan ga mu e bɛrɛ tagaraabɔn. Iyaa, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu kuu womɔ le sɔɔ wo sɔi ɔn ajubai: ‘Bɛi nɛ dɛi obu nɛ gaara duba too.’ »
44020036	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe sɔwaatiyaa, Pɔlu tuŋiyaan, be wooi mɔrinyaan, Ama gɛnyaanbɛin.
44020037	Be wooi puu pii le Pɔlu kɔkɔlɔ nɛ waagiyaa ye, woi amugiyɛubɛin.
44020038	Pɔlu bemaa waja unruin iyenɛ wo gi gɔ, sigɛ le kinɛ bemɛ kijɛ sɔmiyɛnmɔu bee gɔ woi. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, be woi niinaa, diikoro gɔ nɛ baa yaabɛin.
44021001	Epɛse ana Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw emɛ wooi kabiyaa, emɛ diikoro nɛ yowaa, demu demu Kɔsu ana nɛ yain. Kɔɔ onu nɛ aga baa yaa gɔ, emɛ yalu dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ Rode nɛ dɔwaa, kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, Patara yaabɛin.
44021002	Kɔɔ nɛ emɛ diikoro Penisi gana kɛjɛ taŋajɛ biyaa, wogɔ nɛ yowaa yain.
44021003	Minɛ dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ, Sipere, waaru emɛ iyi le, emɛ numɔ nana emɛ sibɛ go woi pajaatiyaa, oju emɛ digiyaa, Siri gana yain. Emɛ Tire ana nɛ yaa iŋiyaanbɛin. Diikoro gɔ, kɔɔ nɛ dɔɔ womɔ sunugoun jaain bee.
44021004	Kɔɔ nɛ emɛ jaŋu unrunw tɛmaa, be le bai sɔi biyaabɛin. Ama Kikinu bei damaa, be Pɔlu le sɔɔu, womaa, Jerusalɛmu yaanɔu gɛɛubɛin.
44021005	Kaa bai sɔi gɔ galaa wo yaa, emɛ oju emɛ digiyaabɛin. Be wooi puu yaanw bemɛ lee, unrunw bemɛ lee, emi niinaa, ana gɔ nɛ goonaabɛin. Nɛudii diŋirun gɔ nɛ emɛ wooi puu tuŋiyaan, Ama gɛnyaanbɛin.
44021006	Kɔɔ onu nɛ tunmɔ le jamu biyɛmɔ giyaatiyaa, emɛ diikoro nɛ yoin. Be pilemaa, ginrun bemɛ nɛ yain.
44021007	Tire nɛ gowaa, emɛ Putolemayise ana nɛ yain. Diikoro le yoi yai emɛ, kɔɔ nɛ yakali. Emɛ kɔɔ nɛ ba unrunw gɔbei poonaa, bai turu be le biyaabɛin.
44021008	Aga baa yaa gɔ oju gowaa, emɛ Sesare ana nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ emɛ Kibɛru Ɛju taganɛ Pilipe ginrun nɛ yaa, womɔ nɛ sugaabɛin. Jerusalɛmu nɛ inɛw sɔi birɛ dɛi yɛmi gɔbe logoro nɛ turu gɔ woi.
44021009	Wo unrunw yaanw gulɔi nai yasɛbe. Be Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔubɛin.
44021010	Kɔɔ nɛ biyaa, bai joo kanraan emɛ wɔu, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ turu Judea gana nɛ gowaa wiyaabe. Boi womɔ Agabusu gɛɛɲu.
44021011	Wo wiyaa emi tɛmaa, Pɔlu tɛmu jeɲaa, kole kubɔ unrunmɔ lee, numɔ unrunmɔ lee kɔmaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kikinu Pilu sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ unwɔ: ‘Tɛmu ɔn inɛ mɔi wɔɔ gɔ, Yahutunw ɔn gin’ Jerusalɛmu nɛ woi kɔmaa ye, inɛw Ama inin numɔ nɛ woi kukunɔdɛin.’ »
44021012	Sɔɔ kɔɔ waaru emɛ ɛgu le, emɛ lee, ana bɛɛnw lee, Pɔlu bɛrɛ gɛɛun, womaa Jerusalɛmu yaanɔu gin.
44021013	Kaa Pɔlu ɔn gin’ sai: «Pii piiu anrangaju ma donugou e wɔɔ gɔ ingei? Inɛw Baŋa Yesu dɛi Jerusalɛmu nɛ kɔmu sai laa, kaa yinwɛn ga yaa mu yeguru le wɔun.»
44021014	Emɛ kanrinyaan ɔɲaa, wo bɛrɛ gɛnyaan bɛɛnɛ. Inɛw Baŋa diŋɛ womɔ kanran giyaatiyaa, kunrin pajin.
44021015	Kɔɔ nɛ bai gaila biyaa, emɛ gelu yegeraa, Jerusalɛmu yaabɛin.
44021016	Sesare ana jaŋu unrunw gamuu yaa emi niinaa, jaŋu unrunw pɔlɔ tubu kanrin logoro nɛ Sipere bɛɛnnɛ turu Manasɔn gɛɛɲu mɔ nɛ jɛyaabɛin. Emɛ ginrun womɔ nɛ sugoun jaan bee.
44021017	Jerusalɛmu nɛ emɛ dɔwaa, ba unrunw gɔbe kinɛ ɛɛli le emi sɛgɛraabɛin.
44021018	Aga baa yaa gɔ, Pɔlu emɛ wooi Jake ginrun nɛ yaabɛin. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw gɔbe puu kɔɔ nɛ wiyaa mɔrinyaanbɛin.
44021019	Kibɛru kanraan sunugaatiyaa, Pɔlu, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain logoro nɛ wo le digɛu, Ama bana birɛ biru puu tuturu jeɲaa, be bɛrɛ tagaabe.
44021020	Woi keŋiyaan kilaa, be Ama sɔmaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ be wo le ɔn gin’ sɔin: «Emɛ bainɛ, Yahutunw logoro nɛ inɛw muɲu joo naa joo bana Yesu le gawaa be wɔɔ gɔ u iyeuwɔu. Be wooi puu Tɔɔru sɔɔ nɛ kuu ɛjii obaa wɔin.
44021021	Inɛw be bɛrɛ tagaa, uwaa Yahutunw inɛw, tɔgu wajunw logoro nɛ daain gɔbe, bemaa Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ dimiyɛnnɔu, unrunw bemɛ araa nɔɔmɔnɔu, iyaa atɛmu emɛ sɔɔ yaa paja gi wa.
44021022	Nɛɛ, uwaa wiyaai ga be ɛhɛgɛdɛin laa, emɛ yani kanrandɛin?
44021023	Aiwa, sɔɔ u bɛrɛ emɛ gɛɛido ɔn kanran. Logoro emɛ nɛ inɛw nai, Ama le pui kunaa yɔin.
44021024	Bei dimɛraan yaajɛu ye, be le ui ɛjɛmaajɛu ye, kuu bemɛ kaa dɛi buudu gɔ tujɔ. Kunrin, u dɛi be bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔin gɔ narain laa ga be jujugɔdɛin. U kanran Tɔɔru sɔɔ gɔbe gɛliyaa, birɛ gɔbe birɛuwɔu ga be ihiyedɛin.
44021025	Nɛɛ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain, Yesu le gawin gɔbe, emɛ tunmɔ le sɔwaa, be bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiyaa, bemaa ɔmɔlɔ nɛ nawan sɛnwaanɲu lee, ili lee, nawan ili goolu lee, sala lee nɛ kuu bemɛ gɛliyɛ gin.»
44021026	Kunrin aga baa yaa gɔ, Pɔlu inɛw nai gɔbei gɛliyaa, be le unruin ɛjɛmaa, be wooi Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ yowaabɛin. Ɛjɛmu bemɛ bai kibeido gɔ lee, inɛw gɔbe tuturu puu dɛi sadaga bai goonɔidɛin gɔ lee, wo tagaabe.
44021027	Bai sɔi gɔbe dogu bɛrii wo wɔu, Yahutunw gamuu Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ gowaa wiyaa, Pɔlui Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ iyaabɛin. Be mɔɔnu gɔ puu suuraa, ingelemaa, Pɔlui aabɛin.
44021028	Be mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Isɛrɛlu inɛw, wɛɛ emi barai. Yalu puu nɛ inɛw wooi bɛrɛ, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu lee, Mɔise tɔɔru lee, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ lee dɛi, ainɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnɛ gɔ ɔn woi. Halu, wo inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain Ama Ginrun gɔ nɛ kunaa, yalu Ama bɛrɛ dɛiin emɛ pajaajɛ gɔ tomɔmaati.»
44021029	Be ana kɔlɔ nɛ, Pɔlu, Epɛse ana bɛɛnnɛ Toropimɛ le wo yalau iyaabɛin digɛu, sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔubɛin. Pɔlu woi Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ kunaabe ga be sɛbɛin.
44021030	Ana gɔ nɛ sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi siɲɛ diyɛ biyaai. Sibɛ puu nɛ gowaa inɛw jɔbaa wiyaabɛin. Be Pɔlui aa, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ goonaa, taan gɔbe puu ɔgu pinaabɛin.
44021031	Waaru Pɔlui daa ga be dɛnɛbe le, Jerusalɛmu puu giru giru wɔɔ ga sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ bɛrɛ tagaabɛin.
44021032	Wo ɔgu kɛu sɔludasu unrunw lee, sɔludasu suŋu kuu bɛɛnw lee gɛliyaa, be bɛrɛ jɔbaa wiyaabe. Sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ lee, sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe leei, waaru be iyi le, be Pɔlui lagu gɔ pajaabɛin.
44021033	Sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ, Pɔlu genɛ nɛ dɔwaa, woi aa, yɔgu lɛi le woi kɔmɔ ga tɔɔraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ woi aai ma, wo inge kanrun ma sɔludasu kuu baŋa gɔ selumaabe.
44021034	Kaa, mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ, inɛw gamuu kijɛ turu dɛi kɔnwɔunbɛin. Inɛw wajunw kijɛ waja dɛi kɔnwɔunbɛin. Siɲɛ gɔ le sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ sɔɔ tiyɛ le wo paamu bele dɛi, wo Pɔlui, sɔludasu unrunw ginrun diyɛ toin gɔ nɛ jɛyaa ga tɔɔraabe.
44021035	Pɔlui gɛliyaa yaau, yalu tei uhuli gɔ nɛ dɔwaa, mɔɔnu gɔ yanwinrinyaan bee gɔ digɛu, sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe woi jeɲɛ le jeɲaa yain.
44021036	Sabu mɔɔnu gɔ Pɔlu onu nɛ digiyaa, mii ɛɛn le woi daa, woi daa, gɛɛube.
44021037	Sɔludasube ginrun diyɛ nɛ waaru woi kunɔdɛin ga bɛin le, Pɔlu, sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ le kijɛ wo gi: «Mu u bɛrɛ sɔɔ turu sɔi bɛbɛɛdɔn ma?» Sɔludasu kuu baŋa gɔ saa gi: «U Gɛrɛku sɔɔ igii wɔu ma?
44021038	Kɔɔi ye, Ejipute bɛɛnnɛ kanɛ bɛrii unrun yabalun ga, ingelaa, inɛw daanw muɲu nai dimɛraan, olusolo nɛ yai gɔ ui laa ma?»
44021039	Pɔlu saa kijɛ gi: «Mu Yahutunɛi, Silisi gana Taruse ana bɛɛnnɛi. Mu ana boi gowaa wɔɔ ii. Mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, mainiyaanjɛu ye mɔɔnu gɔ bɛrɛ sɔɔ mu sɔɔmɔ.»
44021040	Sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ yabaabe. Pɔlu, tei uhuli gɔ nɛ iŋɛu, mɔɔnu gɔ womaa kelemu biyɛ ga, numɔ daii kanraanbe. Inɛw puu kelemu biyaabɛin. Pɔlu Yahutunw sɔɔ le be le sɔwaa, ɔn gin’ gi:
44022001	«Mu delebe lee, mu babe lee, kuu ma goonɔ dɛi sɔɔ mu sɛɛ gɔ keŋiyɛin.»
44022002	Pɔlu be le Yahutunw sɔɔ le sɔɔuwɔ ga ɛgaa, be sigɛ le kelemu biyaabɛin. Pɔlu ɔn gin’ sɔi:
44022003	«Mu Yahutunɛi, Silisi gana Taruse ana nɛ mui narin. Kaa Jerusalɛmu ana ɔn nɛ mui kɔin. Emɛ babe tɔɔru gɔ sɛɛu digiyɛ ga, mu Gamaliɛlu le jaŋu jaŋun. Iye e wooi puu bana e wɔɔ gin’, mu yaa kunrin Ama le ɛjii maai bɔun.
44022004	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu oju nɛ inɛw tobɛin gɔbe, mu yiun nɛ yai dɔɔ baa bei ɔɲɔmɔubɔn. Anranw sɛlɛ, yaanw sɛlɛ, mu bei aa kɔmaa ye kaju nɛ kunɔubɔn.
44022005	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ lee, inɛw naw mɔɔnu nɛ inɛw toin puu lee, be sɛɛrɛ ma goo bɛbɛɛdɛin. Halu, mu numɔ bemɛ nɛ lɛtɛrɛ biyaa, emɛ ba unrunw Damasu nɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ jɛyaabɔn. Kɔɔ nɛ yai ye jaŋu unrunw wɔin gɔbei aa kɔmaa ye, Jerusalɛmu jɛɛlɛ ye ɔɲɔmɔ ga mu numɔ bemɛ nɛ lɛtɛrɛ biyaabɔn.»
44022006	«Kunrin oju nɛ tou, Damasu ana le bɛrii mu wɔu, naitege waaru le kubɔ turu wijɛ alagala gowaa wiyaa, sibɛ ma puu wijɛmaabe.
44022007	Mui minɛ nɛ numaa sugaa, mii turu mu le ɔn gin’ sɔɔu wo wɔu ɛgaabɔn: ‘Sɔlu, Sɔlu, inge dɛi mui tɔɔɲɔuwɔu?’
44022008	Mu saa, Inɛw Baŋa, ui aai ma gun. Wo saa kijɛ gi: ‘Mu Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ Yesui. Inɛ tɔɔɲɔu u wɔɔ gɔ mui.’
44022009	Inɛw mu le bɛin gɔbe wijɛ gɔ iyaabɛin, kaa inɛ mu le sɔɔ sɔɔube gɔ mii ɛgɛnɛ.
44022010	Mu iyaa ɔn gin’ gun: ‘Inɛw Baŋa, mu nɛɛ inge kanrandɔn?’ Inɛw Baŋa saa gi: ‘Ingele, Damasu nɛ yaa. Kijɛ uwaa kanran ga Ama tɔɔru gɔ puu u bɛrɛ tatagadɛin.’
44022011	Wijɛ gɔ dooro gɔ dɛi mui girumiyaan yaabe gɔ digɛu, inɛw mu le bɛin gɔbe, numɔ ma aa, mui dimɛraan, kunrin mu Damasu dɔwaabɔn.
44022012	«Kɔɔ nɛ ainɛ Ama digiyɛnɛ ɛju turu, Ananiasu gɛɛbɛin gɔ yabe. Wo tɔɔru emɛ sɔɔ le yabaube. Damasu Yahutunw gɔbe puu wo dɛi sɛɛrɛ ɛju gooubɛin.
44022013	Ainɛ kɔɔ giru ma nɛ wiyaa iŋiyaan, mu le kijɛ wo gi: ‘Mu bainɛ Sɔlu, pilemu ye giri iye.’ Waaru kɔɔ le tee giri ma pinɛlaa, mu woi iyaabɔn.
44022014	Wo gimaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Emɛ babe Ama gɔ, uwaa, diŋɛ unrunmɔ jugɔ, Teitai Baŋa gɔi giri le iye ye, aŋa womɔ nɛ sɔɔ ɛgɛ ga, giru nɛ baa ui yɛmaabe.
44022015	Sabu u inɛw puu giru nɛ kijɛ u iyi lee, u ɛgu lee dɛi sɛɛrɛ womɔ goonɛi biyɛdou.
44022016	Nɛɛ ingei dɔmɔu? Ingele, Inɛw Baŋa boi boonaa ye, batise yowaajɛu ye, hakɛ uwɔ u le wo goomɔ.’ »
44022017	«Kunrin, Jerusalɛmu waaru pilemaa mu wɛi le, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ Ama gɛɛun tou, mu kuu iye iyaabɔn.
44022018	Mu Inɛw Baŋa Yesui iyaabɔn, wo mu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Ɔgiriyɛ, ɔgu Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ goo. Mu dɛi sɛɛrɛ u gooido gɔ, ana ɔn bɛɛnw wogɔ le yabaidenɛ.’
44022019	Mu saa: ‘Inɛw Baŋa, mu ana ana nɛ, Ama gɛɛn ginrunbe nɛ yai yai ye, inɛw u le gawaa wɔin gɔbei kaju kunɔ lee, laga lee kanraunbɔn ga be kuu bemɛ le igii wɔin.
44022020	Iyaa sɛɛrɛ uwɔ goonɛ, Etiɛnui waaru daaubɛin le, mu kuu ma le kɔɔ nɛ yabɔn. Inɛw gɔ kanran gɔ kinɛ ma aabe, iyaa, inɛw woi daaubɛin gɔ sɔi mu gɛlɛbe.’
44022021	Kɔɔ waaru le, Inɛw Baŋa saa gi: ‘Yaa. Mu yalu wage nɛ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain bɛrɛ ui tiidɔn.’ »
44022022	Sɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ yai dɔɔ, mɔɔnu gɔ nimɛ sɛɛu Pɔlui keŋiyɛun yabe. Kaa sɔɔ kɔɔ wo sɔwaa, be mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ gɛɛi tɔlin: «Ainɛ kɔɔi manuguti. Inɛ ɔn tunmɔ ɔnmɔi pajaun jaanla.»
44022023	Be ɛjii kɔnwɔunbɛin. Arugoi bemɛ daa go kamu kamu tii lee, minɛ ugunu balu balu tii lee kanraunbɛin.
44022024	Kunrin wo biyaa, sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ, Pɔlui ginrun diyɛ gɔ nɛ kunaa ye, bɔɔniyɛn le lagaa ye, inge dɛi inɛw gɔbe wo dɛi ɔn baa kɔnwɔunwɔin ma wo sɔɔmɔ gi.
44022025	Kaa woi kɔmaa ye, lagadɛin ga waaru be bee le, Pɔlu, sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa, yalu gɔ nɛ iŋɛbe gɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Rɔmɛ bɛɛnnɛ tɔitɔi, saliyɛ womɔ kirelu go, woi laga ga jaain wɔɔ ma?»
44022026	Sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa gɔ sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgaa, sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ bɛrɛ yaa tagaa kijɛ wo gi: «Ainɛ gɔ Rɔmɛ ii, nɛɛ u yani kanrandou?»
44022027	Kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ wiyaa, Pɔlu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu bɛrɛ taga, u Rɔmɛ ii ma?» Pɔlu saa, ee gi.
44022028	Kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ gi: «Rɔmɛ ii tɔitɔi biyɛ ga mu buudu diyɛ goonaa, biyaabɔn.» Pɔlu saa, unruin kai Rɔmɛ ii yinnarin gi.
44022029	Pɔlu kunrin gɛɛu wo digɛu, inɛw wo bɛrɛ lagu le selumu selumɛdɛin ga bɛin gɔbe genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔraa gowaain. Kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ, wo yaa Pɔlu, Rɔmɛ ii ga ɛgaa, woi yɔgu le wo kɔmɔmu gɔ digɛu, liyaai.
44022030	Sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ, Yahutunw Pɔlui kijɛ inge dɛi tee jarugaɲu ma jugɔ ibɛi bee. Wogɔ digɛu, aga baa yaa gɔ wo Pɔlui kɔmɔlaatiyaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, badubadanw diyɛnw gɔbe puu lee mɔrinyɛn ga tɔɔraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo Pɔlui jɛɛlaa, giru bemɛ nɛ iŋɛraanbe.
44023001	Pɔlu, badubadanw diyɛnw mɔɔnu bɛrɛ giri dɛɛraa kijɛ wo gi: «Ba unrunw, mu kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le biyaa iye bai dɔɔ Ama giru nɛ yoi yaauwɔn.»
44023002	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa Ananiasu, inɛw Pɔlu le bɛrii wɔin gɔbei tɔɔraa, bemaa aŋa womɔ laga gi.
44023003	Pɔlu wo le saa: «U kanran, Ama ui lalagado, kijɛ jege piliniyɛnmaaɲu ɔn. Uwaa Tɔɔru le kɛukɛu saliyɛ ma kire ga ui daanaa be kanran, mui laga gɛɛjɛu? Wogɔ Tɔɔru yamuli.»
44023004	Inɛw kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe saa: «Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa, Ama yɛmaajɛ gɔ, u woi duyɔuwɔu ma?»
44023005	Pɔlu saa kijɛ gi: «Ba unrunw, wo Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai ma mu inɔn bɔun. Kɔɔi laa ye Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu: “U tɔgu uwɔ kuu baŋa dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnɔu.”»
44023006	Badubadanw diyɛnw gɔbe logoro nɛ gamuu Saduseyɛnbei, gamuu Parisiɛnbei ga Pɔlu igii bee. Kɔɔ dɛi wo mii ɛɛn le giru bemɛ nɛ sɔwaa gi: «Ba unrunw, mu Parisiɛin, Parisiɛn ii. Nɛɛ yiun bubulodo diyɛdɔn gɔ dɛi mui badu daanaaɲu.»
44023007	Pɔlu kɔɔ gin’ wo sɔwaa, Parisiɛn gɔbe lee, Saduseyɛn gɔbe lee logoro nɛ jai ingelaai. Mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ inɛw tunmɔ le mii kabiyaai.
44023008	Saduseyɛn gɔbe yiun bulogu lee, Mɛlɛnkɛbe lee, kikinu lee wɔlɔ gɛɛɲu. Kaa Parisiɛn gɔbe kɔɔbe puu le gawaa wɔin.
44023009	Siɲɛ ɛjii yabe. Parisiɛn mɔɔnu nɛ Ama tɔɔru deerenw toin gamuu ingelaa, jiiru diyɛ jiirei tɔlaa, kijɛ be gi: «Emɛ ainɛ ɔn nɛ mɔɲu turu kanran iyenɛ. Kikinu ma, Mɛlɛnkɛ turu wo le sɔɔ sɔwaabe ma aa jugɔjɛ?»
