44023010	Jiiru gɔ bariyɛu yaaube dɛi, sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ, be Pɔlui lagu yamulutiidɛin ma ga, sɔludasu gɔbe bɛrɛ tɔɔraa, woi logoro bemɛ nɛ goonaa ye sɔludasube ginrun diyɛ gɔ nɛ jɛyaa gi.
44023011	Nɛɛ bai wogɔ digɛ gɔ tee, Inɛw Baŋa, Pɔlu bɛrɛ unruin tagaraa, gi: «Liyɛnɔu, anrangaju le biyɛ. Jerusalɛmu nɛ mu dɛi bana sɛɛrɛ u goi gin’, waajibi Rɔmɛ ana nɛ yaa mu dɛi sɛɛrɛ u gooun jaain wɔɔ.»
44023012	Aga baa yaa gɔ, Yahutunw gamuu mɔrinyaan, Pɔlu dɛi dabulu mɔɲu tɛyaabɛin. Be saba sabaa, kuu bemɛ jɛbiyaa, unrunbe Pɔlui daalu go jaa kayaidenɛ, dii nɔɔidenɛ gin.
44023013	Kɔɔ gin’ mɔrinyaan, inɛw sɔɔ yegurin gɔbe, inɛw pɛnai dɛi gaa bee.
44023014	Be Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe leei yaa tɛmaa, kijɛ be gi: «Emɛ Pɔlui daalu go, aŋa emɛ nɛ pana turu kanran kunɔidenɛ ga saba sabaa kuu emɛ jɛbiyaa wɔin.
44023015	Nɛɛ badubadanw diyɛnw mɔɔnu gɔ e wooi yegeraajɛi ye, sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔi yai tɛmɛi. Pɔlu sɔɔ ɛjii marun yɛnɛdei giye, woi e bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛ gɛɛi. Emɛ kai e bɛrɛ wo dɔɔmɔ nɛ, woi daa ga yegeraa wɔin.»
44023016	Pɔlu lejuwenɛ dabulu mɔɲu kɔɔ soo biyaa, sɔludasu ginrun diyɛ gɔ nɛ yaa yowaa, Pɔlu bɛrɛ tagaabe.
44023017	Pɔlu, sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa turu boonaa, wo le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Sagatara ii ɔin sɔludasube kuu baŋa gɔ bɛrɛ dimɛrɛn jɛyaa. Wo, wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ tagaɲu turu yasɛ.»
44023018	Sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa gɔ, sagatara ii gɔi dimɛraan, sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ gɔ bɛrɛ jɛyaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kajuginɛ Pɔlu mui boonaa, ii ɔn u bɛrɛ sɔɔ tagaɲu yasɛ ga, u bɛrɛ woi dimɛrɛn jɛyaa gi.»
44023019	Sɔludasube kuu baŋa gɔ sagatara ii gɔ numɔ aa, dɔraa gowaa, ii gɔi selumaabe: «U sɔɔ ingei mu bɛrɛ tagai wɛiu?»
44023020	Sagatara ii gɔ ɔn gin’ sai: «Yahutunw tunmɔ le yegeraa, Pɔlu sɔɔ gɔ ɛjii marun yɛnɛdɛin giyaa ye, uwaa yogo bei badubadanw diyɛnw bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛ gɛgɛɛdɛin.
44023021	Sɔɔ bemɛ keŋiyɛnnɔu. Be logoro nɛ inɛw pɛnai dɛi sigɛ, Pɔlui daadɛin ga, wo dɛi dabulu mɔɲu kunaa wɔin. Inɛw kɔɔbe saba sabaa, Pɔlui daalu go jaa kayaidenɛ, dii nɔɔidenɛ ga kuu bemɛ le jɛbiyaa wɔin. Kanɛ yeguru bemɛ kilaai. Aŋasaara uwɔi laa ye kijɛ be dɔmɔ wɔlɔ.»
44023022	Sagatara ii gɔ kunrin sɔwaa wo kilaa, sɔludasube kuu baŋa gɔ womaa sɔɔ unrun bɛrɛ wo jugɔmu gɔ inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran sɔɔnɔu giyaatiyaa, kɔɔ gin’ woi tii.
44023023	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo sɔludasu suŋu kuu bɛɛnw lɛi boonaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Sɔludasu unrunw suŋu lɛi lee, sɔludasu sɔun bɛɛnw pɛsɔi lee, saru bɛɛnw suŋu lɛi lee mɔɔnaa ye, digɛ lɛɛrɛ tuwɔ waaru le gin’, Sesare ana nɛ yai dɛi yeguru be kunɔmɔi.
44023024	Pɔlui, Sɛmɛginɛ Pelikusu bɛrɛ sɛɛu jamu le dɔɔnɔ ga, sɔun wajabe yaa yegerei.»
44023025	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo lɛtɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋaa obu:
44023026	«Mu Kulɔde Lisiasu, Sɛmɛginɛ Pelikusu bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔn. Mu ui poonɔuwɔn.
44023027	Ainɛ ɔn, Yahutunw woi aa daadɛin ga be wɔu, Rɔmɛ ii tɔitɔii ga ɛgaa, mu sɔludasu mabe emɛ wooi yaa, numɔ bemɛ nɛ woi yabaabɔn.
44023028	Kijɛ inge dɛi be woi jarugauwɔin ma mu jugɔ ibɛɛ bɔun dɛi, Yahutunw badubadanw diyɛnw mɔɔnu nɛ woi jɛyaabɔn.
44023029	Tɔɔru bemɛ sɔɔ dɛi laa ye, jarugu waja wo le wɔlɔ ga mu iyaabɔn. Woi daaun jaan sɔɔ ma, kaju nɛ kunɔu jaan sɔɔ ma turu kanran wo nɛ tɛmɛmɔlu.
44023030	Nɛɛ wo dɛi Yahutunw dabulu mɔɲu kunaa wɔin ga ɛgaa, mu ɔgu kɛu woi u bɛrɛ tiyaabɔn. Inɛw woi jaruganw gɔbe bemaa yaa wo le sɔɔ yasin ye, u bɛrɛ yai taga gun.»
44023031	Sɔludasu gɔbe, be bɛrɛ bana tɔɔrin le kɛukɛu, Pɔlui jeɲaa, digɛ gɔ le woi dimɛraan, Antipatirise ana baa yaabɛin.
44023032	Aga baa yaa gɔ, sɔun bɛɛnw gɔbe le Pɔlui tiyaatiyaa, be pilemaa sɔludasube ginrun diyɛ gɔ nɛ wiyaabɛin.
44023033	Sesare dɔwaa, sɔun bɛɛnw gɔbe lɛtɛrɛ gɔ sɛmɛginɛ bɛrɛ obaa, Pɔlui numɔ womɔ nɛ kunaabɛin.
44023034	Lɛtɛrɛ gɔ jaŋaa, sɛmɛginɛ gɔ, Pɔlu, gana kɛju yagɔ nɛ too ma selumaabe. Silisi gana nɛ goi ga ɛgaa,
44023035	unrun, woi jaruganw gɔbe wiyaain ye woi yinkeŋiyɛndɔn gi. Wo Pɔlui, Ɔgɔnɛ Herɔde sɛmɛginɛ ginrun uju gɔ nɛ gɛliyɛ ga tɔɔraabe.
44024001	Bai numɔrɔn galaa wo kanran, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa Ananiasu, inɛw naw gamuu le Sesare ana nɛ wiyaabe. Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw tɔɔru jugɔnɛ turu yaa be le yabe. Boi womɔ Tɛrutulusu gɛɛɲu. Be Pɔlu le jarugu be sɛɛ sɛmɛginɛ gɔ bɛrɛ tagaabɛin.
44024002	Kunrin Pɔlui boonaa jɛɛlaa, Tɛrutulusu sɔɔ jeɲaa Pɔlui jarugaabe. Kijɛ wo gi: «Sɛmɛginɛ Pelikusu, u kɔrumɔ le gana ɔn jamu diyɛ le wɔɔ. Iyaa, sɔɔ bana yeguru u jugaa wɔɔ digɛu, gana ɔn inɛw dɛi, ɛju dɛin dɛin kanraanjɛu.
44024003	Wogɔ emɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ ɛjui. Emɛ yalu puu nɛ waaru wooi ui birɛpoo tagauwɔin.
44024004	Kaa sɔɔ joo le ui ɔɲɔmɔnu biyɛnu doori digɛu, mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, ɛhɛju uwɔ dɛi, waaru gaila sɔɔ emɛ keŋiyɛn.
44024005	Jaabu jiun inɛw logoro nɛ bana yanwan tɛbɛjɛ gin’, ainɛ ɔn kunrin yanwan tɛbɛnɛ diyɛi biyaa wɔɔ. Wo aduna sibɛ nai puu nɛ Yahutunw logoro nɛ sɔɔ puu ligijiyemaati. Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ oju kakalugu, kuu baŋa gɔ yaa woi.
44024006	Halu wo Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ purɔmɔdo ga tɔlaabe. Kaa emɛ woi aabɛin. [Tɔɔru emɛ le kɛukɛu emɛ saliyɛ womɔ kire ibɛɛ bɛin.
44024007	Kaa sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ Lisiasu wiyaa, numɔ emɛ nɛ paŋa le woi ɛlaabe.
44024008	Wo woi jaruganw gɔ bemaa u bɛrɛ wɛɛ ga tɔɔraabe.] U kuu uwɔ le woi selumu ye kijɛ dɛi woi emɛ jarugajɛ gɔ narain ga jujugɔdou.»
44024009	Yahutunw gɔbe yaa wo le mii turu biyaa, sɔɔ gɔ kunrin tee yinwɔɔ gin.
44024010	Sɛmɛginɛ gɔ Pɔlu bɛrɛ sɔɔ wo obaa, wo sɔɔ jeɲaa ɔn gin’ gi: «Anranguju joo u tɔgu ɔn saliyɛ kirɛnɛi biyaa wɔu ga mu igii wɔun. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu giru uwɔ nɛ, kuu ma goonɔ dɛi sɔɔ mu sɛɛ gɔ, diyɛdɔn le sɔɔdɔn.
44024011	Jerusalɛmu nɛ Amai babai mu wɛi iye bai pɛli lɛisigɛ dɛi gaa laa. Wogɔ narain ma u kuu uwɔ le marun yɛnu bɛbɛɛdou.
44024012	Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ ma, Ama gɛɛn ginrun gɔbe nɛ ma, ana kɔlɔ nɛ ma, inɛ turu le kanran jiiru jiireu mu wɔu, iyemɔlu. Maa inɛw suuraa ingelemɔ ga kanranlun.
44024013	Inɛw ɔnbe kanɛ kijɛ nɛ mui be jarugajɛ gɔ narain ga, sɛɛrɛ goo bɛɛnɛ.
44024014	Kaa mu sɔɔ ɔn nɛ giru uwɔ nɛ ihiŋiyɛndɔn: Be kakalu ojui ga be gɛɛjɛ gɔ, mu oju wogɔ digiyaa, emɛ babe Ama gɔi babauwɔn. Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn gɔ lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe lee, mu wogɔbe le gawaa wɔun.
44024015	Iyaa inɛw teitai lee, teitai laa lee puu bubulodɛin ga diyɛdɔn wogɔ mu Ama bɛrɛ biyaa yasɔn. Be yaa bulogu wogɔ yadɔmi.
44024016	Wogɔ digɛu, Ama sibɛ go ma, inɛw sibɛ go ma, kinɛ ma mui jaruganɔu ga, kuu ma le ɛjii mainiyɛunwɔn.
44024017	«Jerusalɛmu nɛ mu goi anranguju joo galaai. Kaa tɔgu ma inɛw bɛrɛ sin obu jɛɛlɛ ga, iyaa Ama bɛrɛ sadaga goonɔ ga, mu pilemaa wiyaabɔn.
44024018	Mu mui ɛjɛmaatiyaa, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ mu tou, be kɔɔ waaru le wiyaa mui tɛmi. Wogɔ nɛ mɔɔnu diyɛ bele, giru giru bele.
44024019	Kaa Yahutunw gamuu Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ gowaa wiyaa yabɛin. Be kuu bemɛ le ɔn nɛ giru uwɔ nɛ iŋi ye, mu le sɔɔ yasin ye, sɔɔ sɔɔun jaan bee.
44024020	Maa, badubadanw diyɛnw mɔɔnu nɛ waaru sɔɔ ma sɔin le, yiun bubulodo ga gawaa mu wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, iye mui giru ebe nɛ badu daanaaɲu ga mii ɛɛn le mu sɔi gɔi laa go, jarugu inge mu nɛ tɛmɛmu ma inɛw unwɔin gɔbe be sɔɔmɔ.»
44024022	Pelikusu kanran, Inɛw Baŋa oju gɔ dɛi sɔɔ ɛjii igii bee. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, wo unrun bai waja sɔɔ gɔ sɔɔdo ga bei tiyaabe. Kijɛ wo gi: «Sɔludasu kuu baŋa diyɛ Lisiasu wiyaai ye, mu sɔɔ ebe gɔ kɔɔ gin’ marun yɛnɛdɔn.»
44024023	Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, wo sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa, Pɔlui kajubanɛ gɔ bɛrɛ tɔɔraa, woi kaju nɛ yagɛliyɛ gi. Kaa kaju yɔrui bojaa ye, inɛw womɔ bɛrɛ kai womɔ kilɛmɔ ga tɛŋɛnɔu gi.
44024024	Bai gaila galaa wo yaa, Pelikusu, yaanran unrunmɔ Durusile le wiyaabe. Yaanran womɔ Yahutunɛi bee. Pelikusu inɛ tiyaa, Pɔlui boonaabe. Kirisito Yesu le gawu sɔɔ Pɔlu sɔɔbe gɔ wo keŋiyɛunbe.
44024025	Kaa Pɔlu teitai sɔɔ lee, kuu gɛli sɔɔ lee, Ama saliyɛ wɛɛido sɔɔ lee sɔɔube dɛi, Pelikusu liyaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Kanɛ u yai bɛbɛɛdou. Waaru biyaajɔn ye, mu pilemɛ ye ui boboonɔdɔn.»
44024026	Pelikusu, Pɔlu wo bɛrɛ buudu ohobodo ma yaa ajubaube. Kɔɔ dɛi wo bɛru bɛru woi boonu boonu ye, wo le sɔɔ sɔɔube.
44024027	Kɔɔ gin’ wɔu, anranguju lɛi baa galu. Sɛmɛginɛ Pelikusu dilɛ nɛ Pɔrusiusu Pɛsutusu daani. Pelikusu, Yahutunw bɛrɛ boi bɛɛdo ga, Pɔlui kaju gɔ nɛ yapaju.
44025001	Sɛmɛginɛ Pɛsutusu, gana gɔ nɛ wo wɛi, bai taanu galaa wo yaa, wo Sesare ana gowaa, Jerusalɛmu yaabe.
44025002	Kɔɔ nɛ wo yaa, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔ lee, Yahutunw inɛw giru toin lee wo bɛrɛ wiyaa, Pɔlui kijɛ dɛi be jarugajɛ sɔɔ tagaabɛin. Be Pɛsutusu bɛrɛ gɛnyaan,
44025003	Pɔlui Jerusalɛmu jɛɛlɛ gin. Kɔɔ waaru le be tunmɔ le yeguru mɔɲu kunaa, oju nɛ Pɔlui daitiimɔ ga bɛin.
44025004	Pɛsutusu saa, Pɔlu Sesare nɛ kaju too gi. Iyaa, bɛrii unrun kuu unrunmɔ le wogɔ nɛ pilemu yayaadɔn gi.
44025005	Wo baraa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Pɔlu mɔɲu kanraanbe ye, kuu ebe bɛɛnw, mu le digi ye Sesare nɛ wɛi ye, wo dɛi sɔɔ be sɛɛ be sɔɔmɔi.»
44025006	Jerusalɛmu nɛ Pɛsutusu bai gagara ma, pɛlu ma dɛi sigɛ kanranlu. Wo pilemaa Sesare wiyaabe. Bai wo wɛi aga baa yaa gɔ, wo saliyɛ kiru yalu womɔ nɛ dɛinyaan, Pɔlui jɛɛlɛ ga tɔɔraabe.
44025007	Pɔlu wo wiyaa, Jerusalɛmu gowaa Yahutunw wɛin gɔbe, woi gɔŋaa, womaa sɔɔ mɔɲu mɔɲu joo kanrun ga, woi jaaraabɛin. Kaa sɔɔ gɔbe narain ga be sɔi taguru bɛɛbenɛ.
44025008	Kaa Pɔlu, kuu womɔ goonu dɛi sɔɔ ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Mu Yahutunw tɔɔru sibɛ go ma, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ sibɛ go ma, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ sibɛ go ma, mɔɲu turu kanran kanranlun.»
44025009	Pɔlu kunrin wo sɔwaa, Pɛsutusu Yahutunw bɛrɛ boi bɛɛdo ga, Pɔlu bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ selumu: «Jerusalɛmu yai ye sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi giru ma nɛ saliyɛ uwɔ kire ga, u yayabadou ma?»
44025010	Pɔlu ɔn gin’ aŋa womɔ sai: «Mu Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ yaadɔn. Sɔɔ ma yalu kilɛmɔu jaan gɔ woi. Mu Yahutunw bɛrɛ sɔɔ turu kanran kanranlun ga u semu semu jugɔjɛu.
44025011	Jarugu mu le yɔɔ ma, mui daaun baa kijɛ kanraanbɔn ye, wogɔ dɛi mui daadɛin gin ye, mu yayabadɔn. Kaa kijɛ dɛi mui be jarugajɛ gɔ narain laa ye, inɛ turu kanran numɔ bemɛ nɛ mui kunɔ bɛɛidolo. Mu Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ saliyɛ kiru dɔmiyɛndɔn.»
44025012	Pɔlu kunrin wo sɔwaa, Pɛsutusu woi tinwɛnrɛnw be wooi tunmɔ paamaa, Pɔlu le ɔn gin’ sai: «Aiwa, u sɔɔ uwɔ Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ sagi gu. U wo bɛrɛ yayaadou.»
44025013	Bai gaila onu nɛ, Ɔgɔnɛ Agiripa lee, Berenise lee, Sesare ana nɛ Pɛsutusui poonɔi wiyaabɛin.
44025014	Sesare nɛ be bai joo biyaabɛin digɛu, Pɛsutusu, Pɔlu sɔɔ jeɲaa be bɛrɛ tagaa ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Sɛmɛginɛ Pelikusu, ainɛ turu kaju nɛ wo pajaa, ɔn nɛ yɔɔ.
44025015	Waaru Jerusalɛmu nɛ mu yai le, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw lee, inɛw naw lee mu bɛrɛ wiyaa, woi jarugaa, maa saliyɛ kiraa ye woi daa gin.
44025016	Mu aŋa bemɛ saa, inɛ saliyɛ giru nɛ iŋɛraanɲu gɔ, inɛw woi jaaranw gɔbe be wooi sɔɔ sɔɔmɔlu go, iyaa kijɛ dɛi woi jaarau wɔin dɛi kuu womɔ goonɔ ga wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ obolu go, Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw atɛmu nɛ inɛ wogɔi numɔ nɛ kunɔidenɛ gun.
44025017	Kunrin, be mu le digiyaa, ɔn nɛ wiyaabɛin. Mu sɔɔ gɔ duunɔlun. Aga baa yaa gɔ saliyɛ kiru yalu ma nɛ dɛinyaan, ainɛ gɔi jɛɛlɛ gun.
44025018	Inɛw woi jaruganw gɔbe wiyaa, sɔɔ sɔwaabɛin. Kaa ainɛ gɔ kijɛ mɔɲu kanraanbe ma mu ajubaabe sɔɔ turu kanran gɛɛnɛ.
44025019	Ama digu oju dɛin bemɛ sɔɔ lee, ainɛ turu Yesu gɛɛɲu lee kuu nɛ be wooi jiiru biyaa wɔin. Yesu gɔ yinwaain. Kaa Pɔlu womaa ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gi.
44025020	Kijɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ sɔɔ yani sɔɔɲu ma, mu inɛɛ bɔun. Wogɔ digɛu, mu Pɔlu bɛrɛ selumaa, Jerusalɛmu yai ye sɔɔ wogɔ dɛi saliyɛ womɔ kire ga yayabado ma gun.
44025021	Kaa Pɔlu, sɔɔ unrunmɔ Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ sagi ga, wo bɛrɛ unruin tii gi. Kunrin, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ bɛrɛ woi tii mu bɛɛido baa, kaju nɛ woi gɛliyɛ ga tɔɔraabɔn.»
44025022	Agiripa saa, unrun ainɛ gɔi keŋi ibɛɛ wɔun gi. Pɛsutusu womaa yogo woi ɛhɛgɛdo gi.
44025023	Kunrin aga baa yaa gɔ, Agiripa lee, Berenise lee, inɛw bɛrɛ unrunbei ɛjii tuŋɔmaa, saliyɛ kiru ginrun gɔ nɛ wiyaa yowaabɛin. Sɔludasu kuu bɛɛnw diyɛnw gɔbe lee, ana inɛw diyɛnw gɔbe lee, be wooi wɛin. Pɛsutusu tɔɔru obou wo digɛu, Pɔlui jɛɛlaabɛin.
44025024	Pɛsutusu sɔɔ jeɲaa ɔn gin’ gi: «Ɔgɔnɛ Agiripa lee, e inɛw ɔn nɛ emɛ le toin gɔ puu lee, Jerusalɛmu nɛi ma, ana ɔn nɛi ma, Yahutunw joo, ainɛ ɔn ɔnmɔi wo biyɛun jaanla ga, kɔnwɔun mu bɛrɛ bana be wɛi, e iyaabei.
44025025	Mu kai, woi daaun baa kijɛ mɔɲu wo kanranlu ga paamaabɔn. Kaa wo kuu unrunmɔ le, unrun Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ bɛrɛ yaadɔn gi digɛu, mu woi wogɔ nɛ titiidɔn gun.
44025026	Wo dɛi ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔu jaan tee iyelun. Ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ bɛrɛ, maa kijɛ tɔŋɔɲu bɛɛ ga, mu wogɔ dɛi ebaa woi selumɛ ga, giru ebe nɛ woi iŋiyɛnmu. Sigɛ le ɔgɔnɛ Agiripa, giru uwɔ nɛ woi iŋiyɛnmu.
44025027	Kajuginɛ inɛ bɛrɛ tii ye, sɔɔ dɛi woi jarugin sɛɛu ɛjɛmaa sɔɔnɛ ye, mu bɛrɛ wogɔ tiyɛ sɛlɛ gin’ wɔɔ.»
44026001	Nɛɛ Agiripa, Pɔlu le sɔwaa kijɛ gi: «U kuu uwɔ dɛi sɔɔ sɔi bɛbɛɛdou.» Kɔɔ waaru le, Pɔlu numɔ jeɲaa, kuu womɔ goonɔ dɛi sɔɔ sɔwaa kijɛ wo gi:
44026002	«Ɔgɔnɛ Agiripa, iye giru uwɔ nɛ iŋi ye, Yahutunw mui kijɛ nɛ jarugaɲu puu dɛi sɔɔ sɔɔ ga, mu bɛrɛ wogɔ kinɛ ɛɛli sɔɔi.
44026003	U Yahutunw atɛmu ɛjii igii wɔu, iyaa sigɛ le be wooi logoro nɛ jiiru bana too gɔ, u igii wɔu. Wogɔ digɛu, mainiyaan muyaanjɛu ye, mui keŋiyɛn.
44026004	«Dagi ma le baa, ana ma inɛw logoro nɛ lee, Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ lee bana mu biyaabe gɔ, Yahutunw logoro nɛ inɛw puu igii wɔin.
44026005	Mui be jugu ɛjii tanwaan wɔɔ. Be sɛɛrɛ ma goi ibɛɛ wɔin ye, Yahutunw mɔɔnu oju wo gaara teitai wɔɔ gɔ, mu mɔɔnu wogɔ nɛ tobɔn ga be igii wɔin. Wogɔ Parisiɛnbe mɔɔnu gɔ woi.
44026006	Kaa, Ama, emɛ babe le pui wo kunu gɔ nɛ diyɛ ma daanaa mu sɛɛ gɔ dɛi, mu iye saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ wɔun.
44026007	Tɔgu emɛ pɛli lɛisigɛ inɛw gɔbe yaa, maini diyɛ le Amai babau, pui wogɔ kibeido gɔ diyɛdɔn le wɔin. Ɔgɔnɛ, diyɛdɔn wogɔ mu sɛɛ dɛi, Yahutunw mui jarugauwɔin.
44026008	Ama, yiun bubulomɔjɛ ga, wogɔ le gawa bɛɛmɔɔlɛ gin’ e Yahutunw gɔbe, e bɛrɛ yinwɔɔ ma?
44026009	«Mu kuu ma le Nasarɛtu bɛɛnnɛ Yesu boi dɛi, gɔnrɔn ma kale wooi le jaiyɛun jaain wɔɔ ga ajubaabɔn.
44026010	Jerusalɛmu nɛ kijɛ mu kanrun gɔ yaa woi. Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw, mu bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaa, mu kuu ma le Ama inɛw joo kaju nɛ kunaabɔn. Bei daamɔ ga saliyɛ gɔ yinkɛjin ye, mu wogɔ le yabaubɔn.
44026011	Waaru joo, Ama gɛɛn ginrun nɛ, mu bei ɔɲɔmɔubɔn, iyaa, bemaa Yesu le gawaa be wɔɔ gɔ paŋa le kɔɔrɔmɔti ga ibɛɛ bɔun. Be le mɔɲuniyaan gabaa, halu mu bei digi ye, gana waja ana nɛ yai ye, ɔɲɔmɔubɔn.»
44026012	«Kunrin, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe mu bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaa, Damasu ana nɛ mui tiyaabɛin.
44026013	Oju nɛ mu tou, ɔgɔnɛ, naitege le mu yɛnɛu, wijɛ diyɛ alagala gowaa wiyaa, mu lee, yoi yaanw mu bɔɔnw lee gɔŋaabe. Wijɛ gɔ nai dɛi sigɛ dooroube.
44026014	Emɛ wooi puu minɛ nɛ numaa sugaabɛin. Mii turu Yahutunw sɔɔ le ɔn gin’ mu le gɛɛu wo wɔu mu ɛgaabɔn: ‘Sɔlu, Sɔlu, u inge dɛi mui tɔɔɲɔuwɔu? Mu le pirigiyenu doori.’
44026015	Mu saa Inɛw Baŋa u aai ma gun. Inɛw Baŋa saa kijɛ gi: ‘Mu Yesui. Inɛ tɔɔɲɔu u wɔɔ gɔ mui.
44026016	Kaa ingele ye kubɔ uwɔ kuu nɛ iŋiyɛn. Uwaa birɛbirɛnɛ mai biyɛ ga, iyaa sɛɛrɛ mai bii ye, mu le kijɛ u iyi lee, u bɛrɛ kijɛ mu tagaido lee, inɛw bɛrɛ taga ga mu ui yɛmaabɔn. Iye, u bɛrɛ kijɛ dɛi mui mu taguru gɔ kɔɔ woi.
44026017	Mu Yahutunw lee, tɔgu wajabe inɛw lee bɛrɛ ui titiidɔn. Numɔ bemɛ nɛ ui yayabadɔn.
44026018	Uwaa giri bemɛ pinɛlɛ ga be bɛrɛ ui tiidɔn. Uwaa ɔlɔ nɛ bei goonu ye, wijɛ nɛ jɛɛlɛ ga, Setanu paŋa nɛ bei ɛlɛ ye, Ama bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛ ga, iyaa bemaa mu Yesu le gawa ye, hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛɛ ye, inɛw Ama mɔi wɔin logoro nɛ yalu bɛɛ ga, wogɔ dɛi ui be bɛrɛ tiidɔn.’ »
44026019	«Aiwa, Ɔgɔnɛ Agiripa, alagala gowaa kuu iye mu iye gɔ le yabalu kanranlun.
44026020	Mu Damasu bɛɛnw bɛrɛ laa waaju tagaabɔn. Kɔɔ onu nɛ Jerusalɛmu bɛɛnw lee, Judea gana puu nɛ lee, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain lee bɛrɛ waaju tagaabɔn. Bemaa bana mɔɲu bemɛ dulomaa ye, Ama sibɛ go kigelemɔ ga mu bei tagaabɔn. Iyaa bana kana bemɛ le birɛ sɛgɛrɛjɛ birɛ ga tagaabɔn.
44026021	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ waaru mu tobe le, Yahutunw mui aa daadɛin ga bɛin.
44026022	Kaa Ama gɛli gɔ digɛu, mu iye baa dɔwaa wɔun. Inɛw diyɛnw sɛlɛ, dagunw sɛlɛ, mu ɔn nɛ iŋiyaan, inɛw puu giru nɛ sɛɛrɛ goouwɔn. Inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe lee, Mɔise lee sɔɔ bibiyɛdo ga be gi gɔ, wogɔ kuu nɛ mu sɔɔ turu kanran baraa sɔɔuwɔlɔn.
44026023	Be Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii, ɛjii ɔhɔɲɔdo, wo pɔlɔi yiun logoro nɛ bulo goi ye, emɛ Yahutunw lee, tɔgu wajabe lee bɛrɛ yayabu wijɛ gɔ bɛbɛɛmɔdo ga tatagado gin.»
44026024	Pɔlu kunrin kuu womɔ goonu sɔɔ sɔɔu wo wɔu, Pɛsutusu mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Pɔlu, u wejeginɛi. Jugɔ diyɛ uwɔ ui wejegiyemaati.»
44026025	Pɔlu saa: «Pɛsutusu inɛ ɛju, weje mui sɛlɛ. Kaa sɔɔ mu sɔɔjɛ ɔnbe puu narain, iyaa sɔɔ oju sɛɛi.
44026026	Ɔgɔnɛ Agiripa kai, sɔɔ ɔnbe puu jugaa wɔɔ digɛu, mu liyɛ sɛlɛ go wo le sɔɔ bɛbɛɛdɔn. Sɔɔ gɔbe baŋiyaan kanrannɛ gɔ digɛu, kijɛ soo sɛlɛ wo wɔɔ wɔlɔ ga mu gawaa wɔun.
44026027	Ɔgɔnɛ Agiripa, u inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ le gawaa wɔu ma? U gawaa wɔu ga mu igii wɔun.»
44026028	Agiripa saa: «Waaru gaila nɛ u mui Kirisito inɛi tanugu bɛbɛɛdou ga wɔu ma?»
44026029	Pɔlu gi: «Waaru gailai wee, waaru gailai laa wee, u sai laa, kaa inɛw iye mui keŋiyɛnw gɔbe puu, mui pagaa unsɛin gɔ tolo go, e wooi puu mu gin’ biyɛ ga Ama bɛrɛ kijɛ mu gɛɛnjɛ gɔ woi.»
44026030	Kunrin, ɔgɔnɛ gɔ ingelaabe. Sɛmɛginɛ gɔ lee, Berenise lee, be wooi inɛw daanbɛin gɔ puu lee yaa ingelaabɛin.
44026031	Waaru gaila be wageni le, be tunmɔ le sɔɔubɛin: «Ainɛ ɔn woi daaun jaan sɔɔ ma, kaju kunɔu jaan sɔɔ ma turu kanran kanranlu.»
44026032	Agiripa yaa Pɛsutusu le sɔwaa: «Ainɛ ɔn Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ unrunmɔ dɔɔnɔ gɛɛlu bee ye, woi paja ye yaamɔ bɛbɛɛmɔbe.»
44027001	Emi Itali gana nɛ, diikoro nɛ kunu ye jɛyaadɛin ga waaru yegeraa kilin le, Pɔlu lee, kajugunw gamuu leei sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa turu Juliusu numɔ nɛ kunaabɛin. Wo kɔmɔ numɔ Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ mɔi gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ tobe.
44027002	Diikoro turu Adaramite ana gowaa, Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ diŋirun gɔ nɛ yaaube. Emɛ wogɔ nɛ yowaa yaaubɛin. Maseduanɛ gana Tesalonike ana bɛɛnnɛ turu emɛ le yatobe. Boi womɔ Arisutaruke gɛɛɲu.
44027003	Aga baa yaa gɔ, emɛ Sidɔn ana nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Juliusu, Pɔlu le ɛjii bee dɛi, wo woi pajaa, wo anrungebe bɛrɛ kai womɔ kilɛmɔ ga yaamaabe.
44027004	Kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, ooɲɔ gɔ emɛ le daii bee dɛi, emɛ Sipere diŋirun le galaabɛin.
44027005	Nɛudii gɔ kɛjaa galau, emɛ Silisi lee, Panpili lee gana le bɛrii galaa, Lisi gana Mira ana nɛ dɔwaabɛin.
44027006	Kɔɔ nɛ dɔwaa, sɔludasu kuu baŋa gɔ Alɛsandiri ana diikoro Itali gana nɛ yaau bee turu biyaabe. Wo wogɔ nɛ emi yoomaabe.
44027007	Bai joo, emɛ dii gɔ kuu nɛ dege dege yaaubɛin. Kinide ana daŋaran nɛ emɛ dɔɔmɔ nɛ, emɛ bɛrɛ ɛjii nauniyaanbe. Ooɲɔ gɔ emɛ le daii bee dɛi, emɛ ana kɔɔ sibɛ nɛ digiyaa yaa bɛɛnɛ. Emɛ gana dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ, Kɛrɛte doɲu gɔ le galaa, Salumɔnɛ sibɛ le yaabɛin.
44027008	Kɛrɛte diŋirun nɛ gala ga emɛ bɛrɛ saii nauniyaanbe. Emɛ kunrin yalu turu nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Yalu wogɔ boi Diikoro Yalu Iŋi Ɛju gɛɛɲu. Yalu gɔ Lase ana le bɛrii wɔɔ.
44027009	Wagadu emɛ puu galaayaabe. Hakɛ mɛɛnu janwan gɔ galaa yaabe dɛi, diikoro le yoi yaa ga paruju diyɛi bee. Wogɔ digɛu, Pɔlu, inɛw gɔbe bɛrɛ tinwinrun obaa kijɛ wo gi:
44027010	«Ba unrunw, yoi ɔn paruju diyɛi biyɛdo ga mu iyeuwɔn. Diikoro gɔ lee, gelu gɔ lee yayanwando. Kaa sigɛ le kinrun emɛ yoyoodo ma liyɛun baa.»
44027011	Kaa sɔludasu kuu baŋa gɔ, Pɔlu sɔɔ gɔ gaai lugobele. Wo sigɛ le diikoro jɔbɔmɔnɛ gɔ lee, diikoro baŋa gɔ lee sɔɔ le gawaa bee.
44027012	Iyaa, kaali waaru le, diikoro yalu iŋiyɛnjɛ kɔɔ nɛ biyɛ ga ɛjula bee dɛi, inɛw joo, kanrun bɛbɛɛmɔdo ye, mainiyaan ye Penikusu nɛ dɔi ye, kaali waaru gɔ kɔɔ nɛ gala ire gin. Wogɔ Kɛrɛte gana, diikoro yalu iŋiyɛnjɛ turui. Yalu wogɔ sibɛ turu tɛŋurun sibɛ gin’ yɛnɛjɛ, sibɛ waja gɔ donɔ sibɛ gin’ yɛnɛjɛ.
44027013	Ooɲɔ wɛi, tɛŋurun sibɛ go gowaa wiyaa suyoube. Inɛw gɔbe sɔɔ unrunbe dɛnɛjɛ biyaaɲu ga ajubaa, inrun diyɛ diikoro iŋiyɛnmɔjɛ gɔ jeɲaa kunaa, gowaa, Kɛrɛte diŋirun le bɛru bɛru yaai tɔlaabɛin.
44027014	Kaa tanwanlu, ooɲɔ diyɛ naa diyɛ, Kɛrɛte sibɛ go gowaa suyoi tɔlaabe. Ooɲɔ wogɔ boi Erakilɔn gɛɛɲu.
44027015	Ooɲɔ gɔ diikoro gɔi balaa yaaube. Emɛ kanrinyaan ɔɲaa, diikoro gɔi gɔnrɔnnɛ kanraan, ooɲɔ gɔ bɛrɛ woi yapajin.
44027016	Kunrin, minɛ dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ dagi turu Kɔda gɛɛɲu gɔ, ooɲɔ gɔ gaila tɛŋaa wo sɛu, emɛ mainiyaan, pɛrɛ pɛrɛ diikoro dagi biɲaa emɛ sɛbe gɔi diikoro diyɛ gɔ nɛ jeɲaa kunaabɛin.
44027017	Diikoro nɛ birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, diikoro dagi gɔi jeɲaa kunaa, ooɲɔ gɔ woi yamalanɔu ga, suŋu le ɛjii jaŋaa kɔmaabɛin. Nɛɛ, diikoro gɔ Libi gana diŋirun sɔsɔun nɛ yai ye pipiriyedo ma liyaayaa, be diikoro sɔi diyɛ gɔbe sunugaa, ooɲɔ bɛrɛ emi balaa yaamɔubɛin.
44027018	Ooɲɔ diyɛ gɔ emi ɛjii jigemɔube digɛu, aga baa yaa gɔ, dɔɔ gamuu dii gɔ nɛ kamu kunɔi tɔlaabɛin.
44027019	Bai taaniye gɔ, be numɔ bemɛ le, diikoro gelu gamuu jeɲaa, dii gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin.
44027020	Bai lugo joo nɛ, nai ma, tolobe ma, turu kanran iyemɔlu. Iyaa ooɲɔ gɔ nimɛ kanran paŋa le suyou yagɛlɛbe dɛi, kuu emɛ gogoodo ma diyɛdɔn turu kanran sɛbenɛ.
44027021	Bai lugo joo emɛ pana kayanɛ. Pɔlu, inɛw gɔbe giru nɛ iŋiyaan, ɔn gin’ be le sɔi: «Ba unrunw, sɔɔ ma yaba ye, Kɛrɛte nɛ goolu e kanrun ire bee. E sɔɔ ma yabaabei ye, ɔɲɛ ɔn lee, yanwan ɔn lee biyɛbele.
44027022	Kaa nimɛ kanran anrangaju le biyɛi. Diikoro gɔi laa ye, logoro emɛ nɛ inɛ turu kanran kinrun suiyoidolo.
44027023	Mui Ama mɔi wɔɔ gɔ, Ama mu babajɛ gɔ, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔ turu yaa digɛ wiyaa, genɛ ma nɛ dɔwaa,
44027024	mu le ɔn gin’ sɔi: ‘Pɔlu, liyɛnɔu. Waajibi Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ u iŋiyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa, Ama ɛhɛju womɔ gaai wɔɔ digɛu, wo u le yoi yaanw gɔ puu kinrun u dɛi yayabado.’
44027025	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ba unrunw, diyɛdɔn le biyɛi. Sɔɔ gɔ puu mu bɛrɛ bana sɔin gin’ tee yinbiyɛdo ga mu wogɔ gagawu Ama le yasɔn.
44027026	Kaa waajibi ooɲɔ emi damu ye, minɛ dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ turu nɛ jajanrinyɛnmɔdo.»
44027027	Mɛditɛranɛ nɛudii kuu nɛ ooɲɔ gɔ emi taŋa taŋa balu jɛyaaube. Kunrin kanraun, bai pɛli naisigɛye gɔ wo dɔwaa, digɛtaŋu waaru le, diikoro nɛ birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, emɛ minɛ maa turu le bɛruniyaan ga ajubaabɛin.
44027028	Be suŋu tunwɔn yɛni dii gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaa tunwaanbɛin. Dii gɔ totoo mɛtɛrɛ pɛtaanu sɔisigɛ bee. Gaila yaa, be iyaa tunwaan yɛnaa, dii gɔ totoo mɛtɛrɛ pɛɛlɛi gagarasigɛ bee.
44027029	Diikoro gɔ dumɔna nɛ yai ye jajanrinyɛndo ma liyaa yaa, be inrun diyɛ diikoro iŋiyɛnmɔjɛ gɔ, diikoro onu gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin. Baa yaaido gɔ be bɛrɛ ɛjii tanwaanbe.
44027030	Birɛbirɛnw gɔbe diikoro gɔ nɛ goi ye bana jɔbɔɲu dɛnɛubɛin. Be diikoro dagi gɔ kɔmɔlaa, dii gɔ nɛ sunugaa, unrunbe diikoro giru go, inrun diyɛ diikoro iŋiyɛnmɔjɛ gɔ kamu kunɔi yaaɲu gin’ kanraun be wɔu,
44027031	Pɔlu, sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa gɔ lee, sɔludasu wajunw lee bɛrɛ sɔwaa, inɛw kɔɔbe diikoro gɔ nɛ yabiyɛnɛ ye, be inɛ turu kanran kuu gooidolo gi.
44027032	Kunrin wo sɔwaa, sɔludasu unrunw gɔ diikoro dagi suŋu gɔ kɛjaa, dii gɔ nɛ woi bagaa yoomaabɛin.
44027033	Inɛw, baa yaaido dɔmiyaan be wɔu, Pɔlu be puu bɛrɛ sɔwaa, bemaa pana kaya gi. Kijɛ wo gi: «E dɔmiyaan, pana kayalu e wɔɔ, ɔn iye bai pɛli naisigɛ wɔɔ.
44027034	Wogɔ digɛu, mainiyaanjɛi ye pana kayai. Kinrun ebe yaba ga e wogɔ kai yasɛi. Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu kanran, halu kuu womɔ kukuli koturu kanran manaidolo.»
44027035	Kunrin sɔwaatiyaa, Pɔlu buru jeɲaa, inɛw puu giru nɛ Amai birɛpoo tagaatiyaa, kabalaa kayai tɔlu.
44027036	Inɛw puu anrangaju biyaa, pana kayaabɛin.
44027037	Diikoro gɔ nɛ inɛw tobɛin puu, emɛ inɛw suŋu lɛi, pɛsɔi kuloisigɛ bɛin.
44027038	Waaru ɛjii pana kayaa bei bai le, diikoro gɔ wɛii biyɛ ga, be alukama gɔ puu nɛudii gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin.
44027039	Baa yaa wo kanran, diikoro birɛbirɛnw gɔ yalu gɔ jugɔnɛ. Kaa be nɛudii jai turu iyaabɛin. Wogɔ diŋirun nɛ sɔsɔun yabe. Be, kanrun bɛbɛɛmɔdo ye, diikoro gɔ wogɔ nɛ dama jɛyaadɛin gin.
44027040	Kunrin be inrun diyɛ diikoro iŋiyɛnmɔjɛ gɔbe kɔmɔlaa, dii gɔ doɲu go pajaa yoomaabɛin. Iyaa, kijɛ diikoro kigelemɔɲu suŋu gɔbe kɔmɔlaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ooɲɔ diikoro gɔi damaa ye yaa ga, be giru go sɔi diyɛ kunaa, dii diŋirun sibɛ go yaaube.
44027041	Kunrin yaau, be nɛudii numɔ lɛi yalu sɛgɛrɛjɛ nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Wogɔ sɔsɔun yalui bee digɛu, diikoro gɔi aajɛ. Diikoro giru gɔ sɔsɔun nɛ ɛjii piriyaa yowaa bee. Nɛɛ, diigunu, paŋa le onu gɔ ɛjii lagaa ye kabalaube.
44027042	Kajugunw gɔbe boni le goi ye jɔbɔ yaadɛin ma liyaa yaa, sɔludasu unrunw gɔbe, be puui dai ibɛɛ bɛin.
44027043	Kaa sɔludasu suŋu kuu baŋa gɔ, Pɔlui yabu ibɛɛ bee dɛi, wogɔ be bɛrɛ kanranmɔlu. Inɛw boni jugɔnw gɔbe laa dii gɔ nɛ kiliyaa yowaa ye, minɛ maa nɛ dɔɔ ga tɔɔraabe.
44027044	Inɛw wajunw gɔ bemaa baga pepenu ma, diikoro kabala gɔbe ma jeɲaa ye wogɔ nɛ ulo ye, minɛ maa nɛ dɔɔ ga tɔɔraabe. Kunrin, inɛw puu sɛɛu jamu le minɛ maa nɛ dɔwaa biyaabɛin.
44028001	Emɛ wooi puu sɛɛu jamu le gowaain onu nɛ, minɛ dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ gɔ boi Malute gɛɛɲu ga emɛ ɛgaabɛin.
44028002	Inɛw tɔgu yeru kɔɔ nɛ bɛin gɔbe, bana emi ɛjii be sɛguru gɔ, emɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ joo iyetɛnɛ. Anran miiube, iyaa kaali yabe dɛi, be yaun diyɛ tanugaa, emɛ wooi puu boonaa wogɔ nɛ dɔɔnaabɛin.
44028003	Pɔlu yaa, tinrun uji sulɔ balaa, yaun nɛ kunɔdo ga jɛɛlaabe. Tinrun gɔ yaun gɔ nɛ kamaa kunɔu wo digɛu, yaun uju gɔ dɛi yuguru kɔkɔju tinrun gɔ nɛ gowaa, Pɔlu numɔ nɛ kɛraa digiyaabe.
44028004	Yuguru gɔ numɔ womɔ nɛ kɛraa digiyaa jeleu wo wɔu iyaa, gana gɔ inɛw tunmɔ le kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Ainɛ ɔn naran go inɛ daanɛi. Wo nɛudii nɛ ɛliyaa gowaai, kaa womaa ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga Teitai yabalu.»
44028005	Kaa Pɔlu, numɔ unrunmɔ yigaa, yuguru gɔ yaun nɛ kunaabe. Wo jiun turu kanran jugɔlu.
44028006	Inɛw wajunw gɔbe Pɔlu goju pipidedo ma, woi ɛli sugu ye koyinwɛndo ma dɔmiyaan bɛin. Kaa dɔmiyaan be ɔɲaa, wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ kanma biyɛlu wo kanran, be ajubu bemɛ dulomaa, woi ama turui gin.
44028007	Yalu emɛ bee gɔ, gana gɔ inɛ diyɛ minɛ le bɛrii bee. Wogɔ baŋa boi Pubiliusu gɛɛɲu. Wo emi ɛjii sɛgɛraa, bai taanu baa emi ɛjii gɛliyaabe.
44028008	Pubiliusu ba gɔ kɛbaamu lee, bɛrɛ saliyɛ lee, woi ɔɲɔmɔu teenu nɛ diinbe. Pɔlu woi yaa yɛnaa, wo dɛi Ama gɛnyaan, numɔ kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋaraan, woi bajamaabe.
44028009	Kɔɔ wo biyaa, gana gɔ jiungunw puu wiyaabɛin. Be puu bajaabɛin.
44028010	Be bana dɛin dɛin le emi ɛjii babaabɛin. Kunrin, waaru yai emɛ dɔi le, be kijɛ kai emɛ sɛbe puu emɛ bɛrɛ obaabɛin.
44028011	Iyepilu taanu emɛ Malute gana gɔ nɛ biyaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, diikoro Alɛsandiri gowaa wɛi turu nɛ yowaa yaabɛin. Diikoro wogɔ sɛɛrɛ womɔ ama jiŋɛi bee. Diikoro kɔɔ kaali waaru gɔ puu gana kɔɔ nɛ yakanrun.
44028012	Emɛ kunrin Sirakuse ana nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Emɛ bai taanu kɔɔ nɛ biyaabɛin.
44028013	Kɔɔ nɛ gowaa, dii diŋirun gɔ digiyaa, emɛ Rɛgio ana nɛ dɔwaabɛin. Aga baa yaa gɔ tɛŋurun sibɛ go ooɲɔ goojɛ gɔ suyoube digɛu, bai lɛi nɛ sai, emɛ Pujɔle ana nɛ dɔwaabɛin.
44028014	Ana kɔɔ nɛ emɛ jaŋu unrunw gamuu tɛmaabɛin. Be emɛ bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, unrunbe le bai sɔi biyɛ gin. Rɔmɛ bana emɛ dɔi gɔ kɔɔ woi.
44028015	Rɔmɛ ba unrunw gɔbe kibɛru emɛ biyaabɛin gɔ digɛu, be Apiusu ibɛ gɔ nɛ lee, Yerunw Ginrun Sugo Taanu gɛɛɲu gɔ lee nɛ baa wiyaa, emi sɛgɛraabɛin. Bei iyeu digɛu, Pɔlu Amai birɛpoo tagaa, anrangaju biyaabe.
44028016	Rɔmɛ ana nɛ waaru emɛ dɔi le, Pɔlu dɛiin, sɔludasu woi kajubanɛ turu le biyɛ ga yabaabɛin.
44028017	Bai taanu galaa wo kanran, Pɔlu, Yahutunw inɛw giru toin gɔbei boonaa yalu womɔ nɛ jɛɛlaabe. Waaru be mɔrin le, Pɔlu be le ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Ba unrunw, tɔgu emɛ bɛrɛ ma, emɛ tirɛ anranw atɛmu le ma, mu mɔɲu turu kanran kanranlun. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ mui aa Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw numɔ nɛ kunaabɛin.
44028018	Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw mui selumaa, mui daaun baa mɔɲu kanranlun ga iyaa, mui paja ibɛɛ bɛin.
44028019	Kaa Yahutunw gɔbe wogɔ le yabanɛ. Kunrin, sɔɔ ma Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔ ga mu bɛrɛ waajibi biyaabe. Kaa mu tɔgu ma jarugadɔn ajubu le wɔlɔn.
44028020	Ei sɔɔ dɛi iye mu ibɛɛ bee gɔ kɔɔ woi. Kɔɔ dɛi ei boonu. Ɔnhɔn, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu gɔ, inɛ le diyɛ daanaa be sɛɛ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ dɛi iye ɔn nɛ mui yɔgu le kɔmaa sɛin.»
44028021	Inɛw gɔbe aŋa womɔ saa, kijɛ be gi: «Judea gana nɛ gowaa, emɛ u dɛi lɛtɛrɛ turu kanran bɛɛnɛ. Emɛ ba unrunw logoro nɛ inɛ turu kanran wiyaa, kibɛru uwɔ ma, uwaa mɔɲu kanraanbe sɔɔ ma emɛ le sɔɔlu.
44028022	Kaa yalu puu nɛ, inɛw, oju kɔɔ le jiiru kunɔuwɔin. Wogɔ digɛu emɛ oju kɔɔ sibɛ go ajubu uwɔ gɔ jugɔ ibɛɛ wɔin.»
44028023	Pɔlu lee, be lee bai kɛjaabɛin. Bai wogɔ, inɛw joo wiyaa, Pɔlu ginrun tobe gɔ nɛ woi tɛmaabɛin. Waaju womɔ nɛ Pɔlu, Ama diinɛ sɛɛrɛ be bɛrɛ gooube. Iyaa, Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn gɔ lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe lee sɔɔ le digɛnu, Yesu dɛi sɔɔ bana wɔɔ, be bɛrɛ jugɔmɔdo ga mainiyɛunbe. Aga goi ye, digɛnai dɔɔ Pɔlu kɔɔ gin’ kanraunbe.
44028024	Inɛw gamuu sɔɔ wo gɛɛbe gɔ le gawaabɛin. Gamuu kinɛ ɛɛn le biyaa, sɔɔ gɔ le yabanɛ.
44028025	Inɛw gɔbe kunrin tunmɔ le mii kabu le gowaa yaau be wɔu, Pɔlu sɔɔ ɔn sai be le sɔi: «Kikinu Pilu gɔ, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ Esayi le digɛu e babe le sɔɔ wo sɔi gɔ, wo naran yasɛbe.
44028026	Kijɛ wo gi: “‘E sɔɔ ɛhɛgɛdei, kaa tiyɛ gɔ paamu kanraindelei. E giri le yɛyɛnɛdei, kaa e iyeidelei.’
44028027	Nɛɛ, tɔgu ɔn inɛw, kinɛ bemɛ ɛɛnnaatin. Hakilɛ bemɛ sɔɔ paamu kanrun ye, bemaa mu sibɛ go kigelemu ye, maa bei bajuganɔu ga, giri bemɛ kijɛ iyenɔu dɛi, suguru bemɛ sɔɔ ɛgɛnɔu dɛi, suguru bemɛ duŋaatin, giri bemɛ dɛbaatin.”
44028028	Nɛɛ jugi biyɛi, yayabu sɔɔ gɔ, Ama inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ obaajɛ. Be kai, sɔɔ gɔ kekeŋiyɛndɛin.» [
44028029	Pɔlu kunrin wo sɔwaa, be tunmɔ le ɛjii jiireu, yinyain.]
44028030	Kɛɛlɛ tujɔu ginrun nɛ wo tobe gɔ nɛ, Pɔlu, anranguju lɛi sɛɛu biyaabe. Wo inɛw woi yɛnɛi wɛɛɲu gɔbe puui sɛgɛrɛube.
44028031	Wo Ama diinɛ waaju kanraunbe. Liyɛ sɛlɛ go, inɛ turu kanran woi tɛŋɛlu go wo Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito dɛi deeru oboube.
45001001	Mu Pɔlu, Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn mu tiiuwɔ. Maa Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyɛ ga Ama mui boonaa, iyaa inɛw bɛrɛ maa yai ye Kibɛru Ɛju wo bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ taga ga, mui wo yɛmu.
45001002	Ama pɔɔlɔ baa inɛw Ama titiyaanw le digɛu, Kibɛru Ɛju ɔn pui kunaa, Dɔn ɛjaai womɔbe nɛ tɔŋɔmaabe.
45001003	Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ, Ama Aini Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ sɔɔi sɔɔjɛ. Wo gojunawan sibɛ nɛ Dawide tiruwɛnɛi bee. Kaa kikinu ɛjaai wo nɛ tobe sibɛ go, yiunbe logoro nɛ bulaa wo goi le digɛu, Ama woi Aini unrunmɔi ga gɔnrɔn diyɛ le tagaraabe.
45001005	Wo le digɛu, iyaa boi womɔ sɔmɔ ga, tɔgu wooi inɛw jɛɛlu ye wo le gawa ga, iyaa bemaa sɔɔ womɔ gɛliyɛ ga, Ama maa Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyɛ ga, mu bɛrɛ nɛɛma obaabe.
45001006	Rɔmɛ bɛɛnw, e kanran inɛw wogɔbe nɛ yatoi. Ama, ei kanran Yesu Kirisito mɔi biyɛ ga boonaabe.
45001007	Mu e inɛw Rɔmɛ nɛ wɔin gɔbe puu bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn. Ama ei ibɛɛ wɔɔ, iyaa ebaa inɛw unrunmɔi biyɛ ga ei boonaabe. Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
45001008	Mu laa gɔ, Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu e wooi dɛi Ama mai birɛpoo tagauwɔn, sabu aduna yalu wooi nɛ bana Yesu Kirisito le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin.
45001009	Aini womɔ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagau, Ama dɛi kinɛ ma wooi le birɛ mu birɛjɛ gɔ, Ama wogɔ sɛɛrɛ mai. Waaru Ama mu gɛɛnjɛ wooi, mu waaru wooi deeliye sɛlɛ go e dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛgɛɛnjɔn. Nɛɛ kai, Ama womaa diŋɛ womɔi biyaai ye, e bɛrɛ mui wɛɛmɔ ga, wo bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn.
45001011	Sabu mu e le Ama Kikinu sin obu gamala ye, ei tibemɔ ga kinɛ ɔgu le ei iye ibɛɛ wɔun.
45001012	Tiyɛ gɔ gagawu nɛ emɛ tunmɔi mamainiyɛnmɔdɛin. Gagawu ma ei mamainiyɛnmɔdo, iyaa gagawu ebe mui mamainiyɛnmɔdo.
45001013	Ba unrunw mabe, e ɔn jugi biyɛi, mu waaru joo e bɛrɛ wɛɛ ga ajubaabɔn, kaa iye wɛɛ dɔɔ, mu bana bɛɛlun. Bana tɔgu wajunw gɔbe logoro nɛ mu bɛi gin’, mu logoro ebe nɛ birɛ tinɛ sɛɛ wɛi birɛ ibɛɛ wɔun.
45001014	Sabu inɛw puu bɛrɛ mu yaaun jaain wɔɔ, Gɛrɛku tɔgu lee, tɔgu wajunw lee, inɛw jaŋaa wɔin lee, inɛw jaŋanɛ lee bɛrɛ mu yaaun jaain wɔɔ.
45001015	Kɔɔ dɛi e inɛw Rɔmɛ nɛ wɔin gɔbe, mu kinɛ ɔgu le, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ e bɛrɛ kanran wɛɛ tagu ibɛɛ wɔun.
45001016	Kibɛru Ɛju tagu gɔ dɛi dɔgɔ turu kanran mui sɛlɛ. Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe puu yaba ga Ama gɔnrɔn wo nɛ yato. Laa gɔ Yahutunw gɔbei, kɔɔ onu nɛ Yahutunw tɔgu laain gɔbei.
45001017	Kɔɔ gin’ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, Ama yani inɛwin teitai bojojɛ ma jugɔmɔjɛ: Tɔlɔgu nɛ goi ye dumɔ gɔ nɛ dɔɔ, gagawui laa ye, sɔɔ waja digɛla. Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ gagawu le digɛu teitai wɔɔ gɔ, woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.”
45001018	Inɛw teitai laa bemɛ le naran gɔi tɛŋaa sɛin gɔbe, Ama giri liyɛla bemɛ puu lee, teitai laa bemɛ gɔbe puu lee dɛi Ama, kinɛbanrun unrunmɔ alagala nɛ wɔnu tatagarajɛ.
45001019	Ama bei lalagajɛ, sabu Ama sibɛ go kijɛ be jugɔun jaan gɔ daii wɔɔ. Ama wo kuu womɔ le wogɔ bei jugɔmaabe.
45001020	Aduna maŋi nɛ baa, inɛw, Ama gɔnrɔn asuu wɔɔ ga, naran go woi Amai ga, daii jugɔ bɛbɛɛɲu. Ama bana kɔɔbei giri le iye bɛɛmɔɔlɛ, kaa kijɛ Ama maŋu gɔbe le digɛnu, inɛw jugɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin. Kɔɔ dɛi kijɛ be kanrun sibɛ go be temu turu kanran siyɛɛnɛ.
45001021	Be Ama yɔɔ ga igii wɔin, kaa baba wo le jaan gɔ lee, birɛpoo tagu gɔ lee, wo bɛrɛ kanrannɛ. Kaa kɔɔ kanran dɛi, ajubu bemɛ ajubu ijei biyaai, kinɛ bomɔgu bemɛ gɔ ɔlɔ le jowaai.
45001022	Be unrunbei inɛw jugɔ jugɔwin gɛɛuwɔin, kaa bei wejegunwin.
45001023	Be Ama asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔi baba dɛi, Adama ii yinwɛnjɛ lee, sasaabe lee, arusɛgɛ kubɔ naibe lee, arusɛgɛ minɛ nɛ bumɔɲube lee le murin dege yegeraaɲu gɔbei babaabɛin.
45001024	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, kinɛ bemɛ dadaaru le kɛukɛu, Ama kijɛ lɔgɔgu be kanrun nɛ bei pajaabe. Kunrin be tunmɔ le kijɛ dɔgɔgu dɔgɔgu koi kanranɲu.
45001025	Be naran Ama le digɛ gɔ kakalu le tilaatin. Be Maŋanɛ gɔi babaa ye, wo dɛi birɛ birɛ dɛi, be Ama kijɛ maŋu gɔbei babaɲu, be dɛi birɛ birɛɲu. Inɛw, Amai asuu sɔmɔu jaain wɔɔ. Amina.
45001026	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama bei goju dadaaru dɔgɔgu gɔbe nɛ pajaati. Yaanw gɔbe, anranw le diin pajaatiyaa, be tunmɔ le kijɛ kanraun jaanla kanranɲu.
45001027	Kɔɔ gin’ anranw gɔbe yaa yaanw le diin pajaatiyaa, be tunmɔi daariyɛuwɔin. Anranw gɔbe tunmɔ le kijɛ dɔgɔgu dɔgɔgu kanranɲu. Be kɔɔ gin’ kuu bemɛ le tujɔ bana mɔɲu bemɛ le sɛgɛrɛjɛ bɛɛɲu.
45001028	Be Amai jugu gɔ doori ga lugin dɛi, Ama bemaa kijɛ be kanraun jaanla gɔbe kanran ga, hakilɛ mɔɲu bemɛ le bei pajaabe.
45001029	Be teitai laa lee, kanran mɔɲu lee, kijɛ baala dadaaru lee, mɔmɔɲu lee, be wooi le jowaa wɔin. Be ele lee, inɛ dai lee, jai lee, nabara lee, sasai lee le jowaa wɔin. Be gɛɛru gɛgɛɛrɛɲu,
45001030	iyaa tunmɔ mɔɲu sɔsɔɔɲu. Bei Ama jaŋuwin, inɛw gaarubei. Kuu ulo ulowin, saba sabawin. Be mɔɲu kanran dɛi bana kana dɛdɛnɛɲu, iyaa bei naranw gɔbe le tubiyeenɛ.
45001031	Be hakilɛ sɛnɛ. Be pui bemɛ kibemɔɔnɛ. Bei inɛw ihibɛ sɛnɛbei, inɛw wajunw amasɔgɔjugɔ be le wɔlɔ.
45001032	Ama saliyɛ sibɛ go inɛw kɔɔ gin’ yoi yaanw gɔbe, yiun be le jaain wɔɔ ga be igii wɔin. Kaa kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ, be sɔɔ kɔɔbe koi kanranɲu. Sigiyaa, inɛw kijɛ mɔɲu kɔɔ tunmɔ kanranw gɔbe le kinɛ bemɛ aa wɔɔ.
45002001	U, inɛ inɛw wajunw saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ, ui inɛ yagɔ tɔgui kanran, u temu yalu tamau turu kanran sɛlɛu. Sabu waaru inɛw saliyɛ kiraa, kuu bemɛ nɛ jarugu u duurɔjɛ le, u iyaa kijɛ mɔɲu kɔɔbe tunmɔ kanranjɛu digɛu, u kuu uwɔ nɛ jarugu duurɔuwɔu.
45002002	Ama, inɛw kijɛ kɔɔbe tunmɔ kanranw gɔbe saliyɛ wo kirejɛ gɔ, teitai kirejɛ ga emɛ igii wɔin.
45002003	Kaa u inɛw wajunwin kijɛ dɛi u jarugau wɔɔ gɔbe kanrannɛ gɔ, ui Ama saliyɛ gɔ nɛ ɛli gogoodo ga wɔu ma?
45002004	Maa, u Ama ɛhɛju diyɛ gɔ lee, diyɛdɛgu diyɛ womɔ gɔ lee, muyɔn diyɛ womɔ gɔ lee yau kanraunwɔu ma? U, Ama ɛhɛju gɔ bana duli nɛ ui jijɛ yaaun jaain wɔɔ ga inɛɛu ma?
45002005	Kaa u kɔkɔlɔmaaginɛi, u bana uwɔ duliyemu ibɛlau. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama kinɛbanrun gɔ lee, saliyɛ kiru teitai womɔ gɔ lee bai tagaraidɛin gɔ dɛi, u kuu uwɔ nɛ Ama kinɛbanrun gɔ bariyɛmɔuwɔu.
45002006	Ama, inɛ tuturui birɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu tutujɔdo.
45002007	Inɛw birɛ ɛju nɛ jaa toin gɔbe, dooro lee, baba lee, ɔnmɔ dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ lee dɛnɛw gɔbe, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ, Ama bei ohobodo.
45002008	Kaa inɛw kuu bemɛ diŋɛ tee dɛnɛw gɔbe, inɛw naran gɔ pajaatiyaa, teitai laa dimi gɔbe, Ama kinɛbanrun kuu bemɛ nɛ susugodo.
45002009	Yahutunw nɛ gowaa ye, iyaa inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe nɛ dɔɔ, ɔɲɛ diyɛ lee, kinɛ ɔɲɛ lee, inɛw mɔɲu kanranw wooi kuu nɛ susugodo.
45002010	Kaa inɛw ɛju kanranw gɔbe puu, Yahutunw nɛ gowaa ye, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe nɛ yaa dɔɔ, Ama bei dooro lee, baba lee, jamu lee ohobodo.
45002011	Sabu, Ama, inɛwin kabu kunɔɔlɛ.
45002012	Inɛw Mɔise tɔɔru inɛɛ wɔu hakɛ kanranɲu gɔbe, bei susuiyodo. Kaa Tɔɔru ni tolo go bei susuiyodo. Kaa Yahutunw, be inɛw Tɔɔru gɔ igii wɔu hakɛ kanranɲu gɔbe, Ama, saliyɛ bemɛ, Tɔɔru gɔ le digɛnu kiredo.
45002013	Sabu Tɔɔru sɔɔ suguru le keŋi sai le inɛwin Ama giru nɛ teitai biyɛidolo, kaa tɔɔru gɔbe kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu gɔ kanrun le Ama giru nɛ inɛwin teitai biyɛdo.
45002014	Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, Tɔɔru gɔ inɛw bɛrɛ obin gɔ bei laa. Kaa be Tɔɔru gɔ kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔ kuu bemɛ le kanraunwɔin ye, halu Tɔɔru gɔ be bɛrɛ obonɛ kanran, be kuu bemɛ le kijɛ kanraun jaan gɔ lee, jaanla gɔ lee igii wɔin ga tagarauwɔin.
45002015	Be bana yoi yaau be wɔɔ gɔ le, Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔ kinɛ bemɛ nɛ yato ga tatagaraɲu. Kinɛjugɔ bemɛ yaa wogɔ narain ga tatagarajɛ. Sabu waaru gamuu kinɛ bemɛ bei jajarugajɛ, iyaa waaru gamuu kijɛ be kanrun gɔ teitai wɔɔ ga bei tatagajɛ.
45002016	Bai Ama, Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu ajubu boŋurun gɔbe wooi saliyɛ wo kirɛido gɔ, bana mu gɛɛbe gin’ biyɛdo. Kibɛru Ɛju waaju mu tagajɛ gɔ wogɔ sɔɔi sɔɔjɛ.
45002017	Kaa u kai, u ui Yahutunɛi ga gɛɛuwɔu, u Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ nɛ diyɛ uwɔ daanaa wɔu, iyaa u Ama tɔitɔi gɔ Ama uwɔi dɛi kuu uwɔ unɔuwɔu.
45002018	U Ama diŋɛ gɔi igii wɔu, iyaa u Tɔɔru gɔ nɛ, uwaa kijɛ ɛju gɔ yɛmɛ ga ui deeraaɲu.
45002019	U ui girumuw teeremɔnɛi ga, inɛw ɔlɔ nɛ toin gɔbe wijɛi ga,
45002020	ui inɛw jugɔ sɛnɛ deerenɛi ga, iyaa jugɔ sibɛ go unrunwin wɔin jaŋudeerenɛi ga wɔu, sabu u jugɔ tɔitɔi gɔ lee, naran tɔitɔi gɔ lee, Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ nɛ yasɛu.
45002021	Nɛɛ, u inɛw wajunw deerenɛ gɔ, u kuu uwɔ le inge dɛi ui deereelɛu wɔu ma? U gunyɔn gunyɔun jaanla ga waaju taganɛ gɔ, u yani kuu uwɔ le gunyɔn gunyɔunwɔu ma?
45002022	U inɛ dimu dimiyɛnnɔu gɛɛnɛ gɔ, u yani dimu dimiyɛunwɔu ma? U inɛ ɔmɔlɔbe ibiliyaa wɔɔ gɔ, u ɔmɔlɔbe ginrun nɛ kijɛ toin gɔbe yani gunyɔunwɔu ma?
45002023	U Tɔɔru dɛi inɛ kuu uwɔ unɔnɛ gɔ, u Tɔɔru sɔɔ yamulu uwɔ le Amai yani gailiyɛmɔuwɔu ma?
45002024	Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “E dɛi tɔgu wajunw gɔbe Ama boi yamalauwɔin.”
45002025	U Tɔɔru gɔ yagɛlɛu ye, araa nɔi uwɔ gɔ tiyɛ yasɛ, kaa u tɔɔru gɔbe yamalauwɔu ye, araa nɔi uwɔ gɔ tiyɛ sɛlɛ.
45002026	Inɛ araa nɔɔmɔla gɔ Tɔɔru gɔ yabauwɔ ye, araa nɔɔmɔla womɔ gɔ araa nɔɔmu gin’ Ama lugoidolo ma?
45002027	E Yahutunw gɔbe, e Tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu gɔ yasɛi, iyaa ei araa nɔɔmaabɛin, kaa e Tɔɔru gɔ yamalaati. Tɔgu wajunw gɔbe, bei araa nɔɔmɔla, kaa be Tɔɔru gɔ yadimi. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi be kuu ebe nɛ jarugu duduurɔdɛin.
45002028	Nɛɛ Yahutunɛ tɔitɔi gɔ, inɛw inɛ Yahutunɛi gɛɛɲu gɔi laa. Iyaa, araa nɔi tɔitɔi gɔ gojunawan nɛ iyemɔjɛ gɔi laa.
45002029	Kaa Yahutunɛ tɔitɔi gɔ, inɛ kinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ Yahutunɛi wɔɔ gɔi, tiyɛ gɔ inɛ kinɛ womɔ araa nɔɔmaaɲu gɔi. Wogɔ Tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu birɛi laa, kaa Ama Kikinu birɛi. Inɛ wogɔ tunmɔ gɔ, Ama woi sɔmɔjɛ, inɛwin laa.
45003001	Yahutunɛi bii nɛ kijɛ sigɛ inɛ kuu nɛ bariyɛjɛ yɔɔ ma? Iyaa, araa nɔɔmu gɔ yaa niwɛn yasɛ ma?
45003002	Sibɛ wooi nɛ niwɛn diyɛ yasɛ. Laa gɔ, Ama, sɔɔ womɔ Yahutunw bɛrɛ gawaraabe.
45003003	Yani wɔɔ ma? Inɛw gamuu sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin laain ye, sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin biyɛla bemɛ gɔ Ama sɔɔ turu baŋai bii gɔ yayamalado ma?
45003004	Asuu. Inɛw puu kakalu maŋawin kanran, Ama kai waaru puu naran sɔɔnɛi, bana Ama Dɔn nɛ Ama dɛi tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “U waaru sɔɔ u sɔɔjɛ le, inɛw wooi sɔɔ uwɔbe narain ga jujugɔdɛin. Inɛw waaru ui be jaaraajɛ, u kuu bemɛ nɛ waaru wooi gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛdou.”
45003005	Kaa teitai laa emɛ gɔ, Ama teitai gɔ inɛw bɛrɛ jugɔmɔjɛ ye, emɛ sɔɔ inge saa bɛɛdɛin? Ama waaru emi wo lagajɛ le, wo teitai laa kanraunwɔ ma? Mu Adama unrunw aŋai sɔɔɲu gin’ sɔɔuwɔn.
45003006	Asuu. Ama teitai laa bee biyaai ye, wo yani aduna saliyɛ kire bɛɛdo?
45003007	Kakalu ma gɔ le digɛnu, Ama bɛrɛ naran goojɛ gɔ sigɛ le gaai jugɔmɔjɛ biyaai ye, iyaa wogɔ dɛi baba womɔ babariyɛjɛ biyaai ye, nɛɛ inge dɛi mui hakɛ kanrannɛi gin’ lugo ye, jarugu kuu ma nɛ duurɔdɛin ma?
45003008	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw gamuu gɛgɛɛɲu: «Ɛju gɔ wɛɛmɔ ga, emɛ mɔɲu kanranmɔi.» Inɛw gamuu kuu ma nɛ kakalu maŋaa, maa kunrin gɛɛuwɔ gin. Inɛw kɔɔbe, saliyɛ jarugu, kuu bemɛ nɛ susugodo. Wogɔ be le dagaa.
45003009	Yani wɔɔ? Emɛ Yahutunw gɔbe, emɛ inɛw wajunw dɛi irein ma? Ai, turu kanran irelain. Yahutunw lee, tɔgu wajunw lee, be puu hakɛ bei laamauwɔ ga, mu giru nɛ baa sɔwaabɔn.
45003010	Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ teitai wɔɔ wɔlɔ, halu koturu kanran.
45003011	Inɛ teitai paamu kanraanjɛ turu kanran wɔlɔ. Inɛ Amai dɛnɛnɛ turu kanran wɔlɔ.
45003012	Be wooi oju ɛju gɔ nɛ gɛŋiyaan gowaain, be wooi manaai. Ɛju kanrannɛ wɔlɔ, halu koturu kanran.
45003013	Aŋa bemɛ, ɔnsain pinɛlaaɲu gin’ wɔɔ, ninɛ bemɛ nabara kanrin. Aŋa bemɛ nɛ yuguru dugui goojɛ.
45003014	Aŋa bemɛ nɛ jebu gaaru jowaa wɔɔ.
45003015	Inɛ dai nɛ be ɔgi wɔin.
45003016	Yalu be galajɛ wooi nɛ, be yanwan lee, amasɔgɔ sɔɔ lee papajaɲu.
45003017	Be jamu oju gɔi inin.
45003018	Be Ama giri liyɛ turu kanran sɛnɛ.”
45003019	Temu tamu turu kanran inɛw aŋa nɛ goonɔu ga, iyaa aduna wooi saliyɛ gɔ Ama womaa kire ga, Tɔɔru nɛ sɔɔ too puu, inɛw Tɔɔru bei laamau wɔɔ dɛi tɔŋɔ ga, nɛɛ emɛ igii wɔin.
45003020	Sabu inɛ turu kanran, Tɔɔru kijɛ gɛɛjɛ gɔ gɛliyaabe dɛi Ama giru nɛ woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugoidenɛ. Kaa Tɔɔru, inɛw bemaa hakɛ kanraantin ga bei wo jugɔmɔjɛ.
45003021	Kaa kanɛ tɔɔru gɔbe ni tolo go Ama, bana emi teitai wɔɔ ga wo lugojɛ emi tagaraajɛ. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ Mɔise tɔɔru dɔn gɔ lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw dɔn gɔbe lee, wogɔ dɛi sɛɛrɛ gowaabɛin.
45003022	Ama, inɛw, Yesu Kirisito nɛ gagawu be sɛɛ gɔ digɛu, bei teitai wɔin ga lugojɛ. Inɛw Kirisito le gawaa wɔin puui kɔɔ gin’ lugojɛ, sabu be wooi logoro nɛ kabu turu kanran tolo:
45003023	Inɛw puu hakɛ kanraantin, be wooi Ama dooro baŋa le wagee wɔin.
45003024	Kaa kuu goonu Kirisito Yesu nɛ bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ digɛu, Ama, nɛɛma unrunmɔ le, sin obu gin’, bei teitai bojojɛ.
45003025	Kirisito ili gɔ le digɛnu, inɛw hakɛ mɛɛnɛ bɛɛ ga, Ama, Kirisitoi, sadaga gin’ obaabe. Inɛw, Kirisito nɛ gagawu be sɛɛ gɔ digɛu, hakɛ mɛɛnu gɔ bɛɛdɛin. Ama, teitai unrunmɔ tagara ga kɔɔ kanraanbe. Waaru galaai gɔ le, Ama, muyɔn unrunmɔ nɛ inɛw hakɛ lugo ga yabalu.
45003026	Kaa kanɛ iye bai ɔn le, Ama teitai unrunmɔ tagara ga, kɔɔ kanrun. Wo bana kɔɔ le unruin teitai wɔɔ ga tagarauwɔ. Iyaa inɛw Yesu le gawaa wɔin gɔbei teitai bojonɛ gɔ unruin ga tagarauwɔ.
45003027	Nɛɛ inɛw, kijɛ inge dɛi kuu ulo ulo bɛɛdɛin? Kijɛ turu dɛi kanran be kuu bemɛ unu bɛɛidenɛ. Inge dɛi kuu bemɛ unu bɛɛidenɛ wɔin? Be Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔbe kanraan teitai biyaain dɛi kuu bemɛ unɔdɛin ma? Ai, be wogɔ dɛi kuu bemɛ unu bɛɛidenɛ. Kaa be gawaa wɔin dɛi, Ama, giru unrunmɔ nɛ bei teitai wɔɔ ga lugodo.
45003028	Sabu Ama, inɛi gagawu womɔ dɛi giru unrunmɔ nɛ teitai bojojɛ. Kaa Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔ wo kanranjɛ dɛi laa ga, emɛ iyeuwɔin.
45003029	Maa Ama, Yahutunw turu sai Amai ma? Maa woi tɔgu wajunw gɔbe yaa Amai laa ma? Ɔnhɔn, tɔgu wajunw gɔbe Ama yaa woi,
45003030	sabu Ama turu sai yɔɔ. Wo Yahutunw gɔbe, gagawu bemɛ digɛnu bei teitai wɔɔ ga lugodo, iyaa inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe kanran, gagawu bemɛ digɛnu bei teitai wɔɔ ga lugodo.
45003031	Kaa sɔɔ kɔɔ tiyɛ gɔ, emɛ gagawu dɛi Tɔɔrui niwɛn sɛlɛ bojaatin ma? Ai, kɔɔ gin’ laa. Kaa emɛ Tɔɔru bɛrɛ niwɛn womɔ tɔitɔi gɔ obouwɔin.
45004001	Nɛɛ, emɛ ba Abarahamu, gojunawan sibɛ go emɛ Yahutunw tirɛ ainɛ gɔ dɛi emɛ inge gɛɛdɛin? Wo kijɛ ingei bɛi?
45004002	Abarahamu, birɛ womɔ sabu dɛi Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe ye, wo kijɛ dɛi kuu unrunmɔ unɔu yasɛ. Kaa wo Ama giru nɛ kuu unrunmɔ unɔ bɛɛlɛ.
45004003	Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Abarahamu Ama le gawaabe. Gagawu womɔ gɔ digɛu, Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe.”
45004004	Inɛ birɛ biraajɛi tutujɔɲu. Tujɔ womɔ gɔ sin obu gin’ lugoidenɛ, kaa kijɛ wo bɛɛun jaain.
45004005	Kaa inɛ kijɛ wo kanranjɛ gɔ nɛ diyɛ unrunmɔ daanaalɛ, kaa Ama, inɛ mɔɲu kanrannɛ gɔi teitai bojonɛ gɔ le inɛ gawaa wɔɔ gɔ, Ama, gagawu womɔ gɔi lugo ye woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugojɛ.
45004006	Kɔɔ gin’, kanran womɔ le laa go, Ama inɛ waa teitai wɔɔ ga wo lugojɛ gɔ, Dawide, inɛ wogɔ bana kinɛ ɛɛlu sɛɛ sɔɔ sɔwaabe.
45004007	Kijɛ wo gi: “Inɛw, kanran mɔɲu bemɛ gɔ Ama yaabu kanraanjɛ gɔbe, Ama hakɛ bemɛ sujaajɛ gɔbe, Ama be yabu.
45004008	Inɛ Inɛw Baŋa Ama hakɛ womɔ lugolu gɔ, Ama wo yabu.”
45004009	Ama be yabu ga Dawide gi gɔ, wogɔ inɛw araa nɔɔmaaɲu gɔbe turu sai dɛi ma? Inɛw araa nɔɔmɔla gɔbe yaa yatoin. Sabu emɛ igii wɔin: “Ama, Abarahamu gagawu gɔ lugaa, woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe.”
45004010	Sɔɔ wogɔ waaru yagɔ le bii? Abarahamu araa nɔɔlu wo wɔu bii ma, araa nɔwaan wo galaai? Araa nɔɔlu wo wɔu Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe, araa nɔwaan wo galaai laa.
45004011	Ama woi gagawu womɔ dɛi, araa nɔɔlu wo wɔu, woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe. Araa nɔi gɔ woi teitai wɔɔ tagara ga sɛɛrɛi. Kunrin, inɛw araa nɔɔnɛ, Ama le gawaa wɔin ba gɔ Abarahamui. Bemaa kanran, Ama bei teitai wɔɔ lugo ga wo be bai.
45004012	Woi iyaa inɛw araa nɔwaanɲu gɔbe bai, kaa be araa nɔwaanɲu sai dɛi laa. Emɛ ba Abarahamu araa wo nɔɔmɔ nɛ gagawu le wo bee gɔ, be gagawu wogɔ oju dimiyaan yaau wɔin dɛi Abarahamu be bai.
45004013	Abarahamu lee, tirɛ unrunw womɔ lee, aduna gɔ bemɛi biyɛdo ga Ama pui kunaabe. Abarahamu, Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔ kanraanbe dɛi pui kɔɔ kunɔnɛ, kaa gagawu womɔ dɛi Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe dɛii.
45004014	Ama pui kunu gɔbe inɛw Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔbe kanranw gɔbe sai mɔi bee ye, kɔɔ waaru le gagawu gɔ tiyɛ siyɛidolo, iyaa Ama pui yaa niwɛn tolo biyɛdo.
45004015	Sabu Tɔɔru gɔ, Ama kinɛbanrun wo jɛɛlɛjɛ. Kaa yalu tɔɔru wɔlɔ gɔ nɛ, tɔɔru yamulu sɔɔ kanran wɔlɔ.
45004016	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, pui Ama kunu gɔ, gagawu le digɛ. Kunrin, pui wogɔ, Ama nɛɛma digɛnu jiiru wɔlɔ go Abarahamu tirɛ unrunw puu mɔi biyɛdo. Inɛw Tɔɔru gɔ sɛin gɔbe, be sai mɔi laa, kaa iyaa inɛw Abarahamu bana Ama le gawaabe gin’ gawanw gɔbe yaa mɔi. Abarahamu emɛ puu ba gɔ woi,
45004017	Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Mu ui tɔgu joo tirɛ ainɛi bojaatun.” Ama le wo gawu gɔ giru nɛ woi emɛ bai. Ama wogɔ, yiunbe bulogonɛ gɔ woi, iyaa kijɛ biyɛlu gɔ biyɛmɔnɛ gɔ woi.
45004018	Abarahamu anranguju lugo suŋu le bɛrii bee, kaa waaru goju womɔ yinwaain gin’ bee ga wo ajubaabe le, iyaa yaanran womɔ Sara, yaanran ii naraanlɛi bee ga wo ajubaabe le, gagawu womɔ yanwanlu. Yalu diyɛ daanaɲu wɔlɔ gɔ nɛ, Abarahamu gawaabe, diyɛdɔn le bee. Kɔɔ gin’ wo “tɔgu joo tirɛ ainɛi biyaabe”, Ama bana wo le sɔwaabe gin’: “Tiruwɛnw uwɔbe lugo gɔ kɔɔ gin’ biyɛdo.”
45004020	Abarahamu, Ama pui kunu gɔ dɛi gagawu sɛlɛ le, kinɛ lɛilɛi biyɛlu. Gagawu womɔ bariyaabe, iyaa wo Ama boi sɔmaabe.
45004021	Ama, pui wo kunu gɔ kibemɔ bɛbɛɛdo ga wo naran go gawaabe.
45004022	Kijɛ dɛi Ama, Abarahamu gagawu lugaa, “woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugu” gɔ kɔɔ woi.
45004023	“Woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabɛin” gɔ, sɔɔ kɔɔ wo turu sai dɛi tɔŋɔnɛ.
45004024	Kaa iyaa, inɛw teitai wɔin ga Ama lugoido, sɔɔ kɔɔ emɛ dɛi yaa tɔŋi. Sabu emɛ, Ama, Yesu Inɛw Baŋa emɛ yiun nɛ bulomɔnɛ gɔ le gawaa wɔin.
45004025	Yesui, hakɛ emɛ dɛi inɛw numɔ nɛ kunaa, daabɛin. Iyaa Ama giru nɛ emi teitai biyɛmɔdo ga, Ama woi yiun nɛ bulomaabe.
45005001	Kɔɔ gin’ gagawu dɛi Ama, emi teitai wɔɔ lugodo. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le digɛu, Ama lee, emɛ lee logoro nɛ jamu yowaai.
45005002	Gagawu emɛ le digɛu, Yesu emi Ama nɛɛma gɔ nɛ yoomaabe. Kanɛ emɛ nɛɛma wogɔ nɛ yoi yaauwɔin. Kunrin, Ama dooro gɔ nɛ gamulu emɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin diyɛdɔn emɛ sɛɛ gɔ dɛi, emɛ kinɛ ɛɛlu le wɔin.
45005003	Iyaa kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ, emɛ ɔɲɛ dɛi kanran kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔuwɔin, sabu ɔɲɛ, inɛ bɛrɛ muyɔn obojɛ ga emɛ igii wɔin.
45005004	Muyɔn, inɛ bɛrɛ jige pinɛ yɛnaaɲu obojɛ, jige pinɛ yɛnaaɲu, diyɛdɔn obojɛ.
45005005	Diyɛdɔn kɔɔ emi jamaalɛ, sabu Ama, Kikinu Pilu emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu le digɛu, kinɛ emɛ nɛ ihibɛ womɔ gɔ togaa kunaabe.
45005006	Kirisito kai, yɛbɛlɛgunwin emɛ bee waaru gɔ le, inɛw Amai babaanɛ gɔbe dɛi, Ama waaru kɛju gɔ le tee yinwun.
45005007	Inɛ teitai wɔɔ dɛi yinwɛn ga yabu gɔ halu nawin wɔɔ. Inɛ turu, inɛ ɛju turu dɛi yinwɛn ga anrangaju sisiyɛdo bibiyɛ.
45005008	Kaa Ama wo emi yagɔ baa ibɛ ma emɛ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tagaraabe: Kirisito, waaru hakɛ kanranwin emɛ bee le emɛ dɛi yinwun.
45005009	Ili womɔ dɛi, Ama giru unrunmɔ nɛ emi teitai wɔɔ ga lugouwɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ biyaai ye, nɛɛ Yesu Kirisito, kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ, Ama kinɛbanrun gɔ nɛ emi yayabado.
45005010	Emi Ama jaŋuwin bee, kaa Aini womɔ yiun gɔ digɛu, emɛ lee, Ama lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegeraatin. Nɛɛ iyaa, Ama lee, emɛ lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegeraaɲu onu nɛ, Aini womɔ ɔnmɔi wɔɔ dɛi sigiyaa emi yayabadɛin.
45005011	Wogɔ sai laa, kaa Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito kanɛ Ama lee, emɛ lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegeraati gɔ digɛu, emɛ Ama nɛ kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔuwɔin.
45005012	Inɛ turu sabu dɛi hakɛ aduna nɛ yoi, iyaa hakɛ, yiun gɔ wo jɛɛlu. Kɔɔ gin’, inɛw puu hakɛ kanraanbɛin dɛi, yiun inɛ puu bɛrɛ dɔwaai.
45005013	Ama Mɔise bɛrɛ Tɔɔru gɔ wo obomɔ nɛ, aduna nɛ hakɛ yabe, kaa yalu tɔɔru wɔlɔ gɔ nɛ, hakɛ lugoonɛ.
45005014	Kaa Adama waaru nɛ gowaa, Mɔise waaru nɛ dɔɔ, yiun inɛw puu kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn yasɛbe. Halu, inɛw, hakɛ be kanrun gɔ, Adama, Ama tɔɔru yamalaatiyaa hakɛ kanrun gɔ le dɛin bee kanran, yiun kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn yasɛbe. Adama, Inɛ wɛɛido gɔ sɛɛrɛ tagaraaɲui bee.
45005015	Kaa be lɛi dɛin. Sabu Adama hakɛ gɔ, Ama, Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu sin obu obu gɔ le tunwɔn bɛɛmɔɔlɛ. Inɛ kɔɔ turu hakɛ gɔ dɛi, inɛw joo yinwaain ga narain. Kaa Ama nɛɛma gɔ, sigiyaa kɔɔ dɛi gaa. Iyaa Yesu Kirisito turu sai le digɛu, sin obu dɔnrun wɔlɔ go inɛw joo bɛrɛ Ama obu gɔ, ɛjii sigiyaa gaai wɔɔ.
45005016	Ama sin obu bana gɔ lee, inɛ turu bana hakɛ kanrun gɔ lee, tunmɔi laa. Saliyɛ kiru gɔ, inɛ turu hakɛ kanrun turu onu nɛ wiyaabe. Wogɔ jarugu inɛ kuu nɛ duuru sɔɔi biyaabe. Kaa sin obu gɔ, inɛw joo hakɛ joo kanrun onu nɛ wiyaabe. Wogɔ Ama giru nɛ teitai bii sɔɔi bii.
45005017	Narain, inɛ turu hakɛ dɛi yiun inɛw puu kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabe. Kaa Yesu Kirisito turu sai le digɛnu, emɛ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ bɛɛɲu: Inɛw, Ama nɛɛma gɔ lee, giru womɔ nɛ teitai bii sin obu gɔ lee kale sɛlɛ go bɛɛɲu gɔbe puu, Kirisito le digɛnu ɔnmɔi biyɛdɛin, laamu kanrandɛin.
45005018	Kɔɔ gin’, bana inɛ turu hakɛ kanrun turu dɛi inɛw puu kuu nɛ jarugu duuraabɛin gin’, Inɛ turu sai birɛ teitai gɔ, inɛw puui Ama giru nɛ teitai bojojɛ, iyaa ɔnmɔ bei obojɛ.
45005019	Inɛ turu sɔɔ yabala le digɛu, inɛw puu bana hakɛ kanranwin bojin gin’, kɔɔ gin’ iyaa Inɛ turu sɔɔ yabu gɔ le digɛu, Ama, inɛw joo, giru unrunmɔ nɛ teitai wɔin ga lugodo.
45005020	Hakɛ narinyɛn ga, Ama, Tɔɔru gɔ daanu. Kaa yalu hakɛ narinyaanbe gɔ nɛ, Ama nɛɛma gɔ sigɛ le narinyaanbe.
45005021	Nɛɛ yiun le digɛu bana hakɛ inɛwin laamu kanranjɛ gin’, iyaa Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ le digɛnu ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ nɛ emi jɛyaa ga, Ama nɛɛma gɔ, inɛwin teitai bojoɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
45006001	Emɛ yani gɛɛdɛin? Ama nɛɛma sigɛ le narinyɛn ga emɛ hakɛ kanrannu biyɛdɛin ma?
45006002	Asuu. Emi hakɛ sibɛ go yinwaain, emɛ yani iyaa lee hakɛ kanrannu biyɛdɛin ma?
45006003	Emɛ puu emi batise kanranmaabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ emɛ Kirisito Yesu le tunmɔi biyaain. Iyaa waaru emi batise kanrin gɔ le, bana wo yinwun gin’, emɛ kanran kunrin yinwin ga e inin ma?
45006004	Kɔɔ gin’ bana Kirisito, Ba Ama gɔnrɔn diyɛ gɔ le digɛu wo bulu gin’, emaa kanran ɔnmɔ kana gɔ siyɛ ga, waaru emi batise kanrin le, emi wo le mɔrinyaan yinwaain, iyaa emi wo le baraa bojaabɛin.
45006005	Sabu emɛ wo le tunmɔ go yinwaain ye, iyaa lee emɛ wo le tunmɔ go bubulodɛin.
45006006	Emɛ sɔɔ ɔn jugi biyɛmɔi: Jige pɛi hakɛ kanranjɛ gɔ suyo ga, iyaa emi waja hakɛ gunɔwin biyɛnɔu ga, jige pɛi emɛ gɔ Kirisito le mɔɔnaa baga jai nɛ pɛgaaɲu.
45006007	Sabu inɛ yinwaain gɔ, hakɛ gunɔ nɛ gowaai.
45006008	Emɛ lee, Kirisito lee tunmɔ go yinwaain ye, emɛ lee, wo lee iyaa tunmɔ go ɔnmɔi biyɛdɛin ga, emɛ gawaa wɔin.
45006009	Kirisito, yiun nɛ bulaa wo goi onu nɛ, woi waja yinwɛindolo ga emɛ igii wɔin. Yiun, waja kuu womɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn turu kanran sɛlɛ.
45006010	Waaru wo yinwun le, wo hakɛ yiun kubɔ turu sai yinwaan kilaai, kaa kanɛ ɔnmɔi wo wɔɔ gɔ, wo Ama dɛi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ.
45006011	E kanran, kɔɔ gin’ hakɛ dɛi ei yinwaain gin’ lugoi, iyaa Kirisito Yesu nɛ Ama dɛi ei ɔnmɔi wɔɔ lugoi.
45006012	Ebaa goju ebe yinwɛnjɛ dadaaru mɔɲu gɔ le yabanɔu ga, nɛɛ waja hakɛ bɛrɛ kuu womɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛmɔnɔugi.
45006013	Goju ebe digɛ dɛin dɛin gɔbe, gelu mɔɲu kanrun gin’ bojo ye, waja hakɛ gunɔwin biyɛ ga yabanɔugi. Kaa inɛw yiun nɛ bulaa gowaain gin’, e kuu ebe Ama bɛrɛ oboi. Gelu kijɛ teitai wɔɔ kanrun kibemɔw gin’, e kuu ebe sɛɛu Ama birɛ dɛi oboi.
45006014	Sabu hakɛ, kuu ebe nɛ gɔnrɔn siyɛun jaanla. E Tɔɔru diinɛ nɛ tonɛ, kaa Ama nɛɛma diinɛ nɛ toi.
45006015	Yani wɔɔ? Emɛ Tɔɔru diinɛ nɛ tonɛ, kaa Ama nɛɛma diinɛ nɛ toin dɛi, hakɛ kakanrandɛin ma? Asuu.
45006016	E inɛ turu bɛrɛ kuu ebe obaa, e sɔɔ womɔ yayabadei gi ye, e inɛ sɔɔ yabau e wɔɔ gɔ gunɔwin ga e inin ma? Ei hakɛ gunɔwin biyaai ye, ei yiyinwɛndo, maa e Ama le yabu gunɔwin ye, wogɔ ei Ama giru nɛ teitai bojojɛ.
45006017	Kaa Ama birɛpoo. Sabu e pɔɔlɔ hakɛ gunɔwin bei. Kaa kɔɔ onu nɛ, e deeru ei deerin gɔ nɛ naran too gɔ, e kinɛ ebe wooi le wogɔ le yabaabei.
45006018	E hakɛ gunɔ nɛ gowaa, kijɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ kanran ga, ei teitai gunɔwin biyaai.
45006019	Sɔɔ paamu kanrun nɛ e yɛbɛlɛ le wɔi dɛi, mu Adama unrunw bana sɔɔɲu gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn. Pɔɔlɔ kijɛ lɔgɔgu lee, kijɛ mɔɲu sigɛ sigɛbe lee kanrun gunɔ nɛ bana kuu ebe obaa e bee gin’, e kanɛ ei Ama dɛi inɛw dɛiin bojaaɲui biyɛ ga, ei kijɛ teitai wɔɔ kanrun gunɔwin biyɛ ga, kuu ebe sɛɛu oboi.
45006020	Waaru ei hakɛ gunɔwin bee le, teitai ei laamaubele.
45006021	Kijɛ dɛi kanɛ dɔgɔ ei aajɛ gɔ waaru kanraun e bee le, tinɛ ingei bɛii? Sabu kijɛ wogɔ yiun jɛɛlɛjɛ.
45006022	Kaa kanɛ ei hakɛ gunɔ nɛ gowaai, ei Ama gunɔwin. Tinɛ e bɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ ei Ama dɛi dɛiin bojui, wogɔ ɔnmɔsɔgɔi jɛɛlɛjɛ.
45006023	Sabu hakɛ tujɔ gɔ yinwin. Kaa Ama sin obu gɔ, wogɔ, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ nɛ ɔnmɔsɔgɔi.
45007001	Ba unrunw, e tɔɔru sɔɔ igii wɔi dɛi, kanɛ baa sɔɔ e bɛrɛ mu sɔɔido gɔ e jugi wɔi. Inɛ, waaru ɔnmɔi wo wɔɔ gɔ le sai, tɔɔru kuu womɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ.
45007002	Kɔɔ gin’ yaanran puru pagaa wɔɔ, wo igɛ gɔ waaru ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ le, tɔɔru, yaanran gɔi wo igɛ le pagu gɛliyɛdo. Kaa igɛnɛ gɔi yinwaain ye, tɔɔru wo igɛ le woi mɔɔnaa gɛlɛbe gɔ, waja kuu womɔ nɛ daanla.
45007003	Kɔɔ dɛi, waaru wo igɛ ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ le, wo ainɛ waja le yaa biyaajɛ ye, woi yaanran dimudimiyɛnnɛi gɛɛdɛin. Kaa wo igɛ gɔ yinwaain ye, wo tɔɔru sibɛ go hɔɔlɔi biyaai, kɔɔ gin’ woi yaanran dimudimiyɛnnɛi biyɛlu go, wo ainɛ waja yaanrain bii bɛbɛɛdo.
45007004	Ba unrunw, e sibɛ go yaa kunrin wɔɔ. Kirisito yiun le digɛu, ei yaa Tɔɔru sibɛ go yinwaain. Iyaa emaa birɛ ɛju, Ama dɛi birɛ ga, nɛɛ kanɛ ei inɛ waja, inɛ yiun logoro nɛ bulaa goonɛ gɔ mɔi.
45007005	Waaru kuu emɛ diŋɛ le emɛ bee le, Tɔɔru gɔ, hakɛ kanrun dadaaru emɛ nɛ too gɔ suuraa ye, emɛ dadaaru wogɔbe kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu gɔbe kanraunbɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ emɛ birɛ yiun nɛ emi jɛyaajɛ birɛubɛin.
45007006	Kaa kanɛ emi Tɔɔru numɔ nɛ goonaatin, sabu kijɛ emi kaju kunaa sɛbe sibɛ go emi yinwaain. Emɛ waja Ama birɛ gɔ bana pɛi tɔɔru nɛ tɔŋaa tobe gɔ le birɛɛnɛ, kaa bana kana Ama Kikinu emi tagarajɛ gɔ le birɛuwɔin.
45007007	Emɛ inge gɛɛdɛin ma? Tɔɔru gɔ hakɛi ma? Ai asuu. Kaa Tɔɔru gɔ, hakɛ ingei ma mui wo jugɔmu. Tɔɔru maa “U inɛ kijɛ daariyɛnɔu” gɛɛlu bee ye, mu kijɛ daari ingei ma igi biyɛbelɔn.
45007008	Hakɛ, kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu gɔ digɛu oju biyaa, mu bɛrɛ dadaaru tɔgu dɛin dɛin daariyɛmaabe. Sabu tɔɔru wɔlɔ biyaai ye, hakɛ gɔnrɔn turu kanran sɛlɛ.
45007009	Pɔɔlɔ waaru tɔɔru jugɔlu mu bee le, mui ɔnmɔi bee. Kaa kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu gɔ wo wiyaa, hakɛ ɔnmɔi biyaai,
45007010	kɔɔ gin’ mui yinwaain. Kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu mui ɔnmɔi biyɛmɔu jaanbe gɔ, mui yinwɛnmaabe.
45007011	Sabu hakɛ, kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu gɔ dɛi oju biyaa, mui jamaa, wogɔ le digɛu mui daabe.
45007012	Kɔɔ gin’ Tɔɔru gɔ kai ɛjaa wɔɔ, iyaa kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu gɔ ɛjaa wɔɔ, teitai wɔɔ, ɛjii wɔɔ.
45007013	Kijɛ ɛju gɔ, nɛɛ mu bɛrɛ kijɛ yiun jɛɛlɛjɛi biyaai ma? Asuu. Kaa wogɔ hakɛ birɛi. Hakɛ kɔɔ gin’ bana unrunmɔ tɔitɔi gɔ jugɔmɔ ga, wo kijɛ ɛju gɔ jeɲaa, mu bɛrɛ yiun jɛɛlaabe. Kɔɔ gin’ hakɛ, kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu gɔ le digɛu, bana mɔɲuniyɛn mɔɲuniyɛn wo yai gɔ kɔɔ woi.
45007014	Tɔɔru, kikinu le sɔɔ digɛi ga emɛ igii wɔin. Kaa mui Adama ii peerei, hakɛ bɛrɛ mui gunɔnɛ gin’ dɔnraanɲu.
45007015	Kijɛ mu kanranjɛ gɔ mu paamu kanraanlɔn. Sabu kijɛ kanrun mu ibɛ gɔ, mu wogɔi kanraanlɔn, kaa kijɛ ibiliyaa mu wɔɔ gɔi kanranjɔn.
45007016	Kijɛ mu kanranjɛ gɔ, mu wogɔ ibɛlaun ye, mu kunrin Tɔɔru gɔ kijɛ ɛjui ga jugaa wɔun.
45007017	Nɛɛ kijɛ kɔɔbe mu kanraunwɔlɔ, kaa hakɛ kinɛ ma nɛ too gɔ kanranjɛ.
45007018	Sabu kijɛ ɛju kinɛ ma nɛ tolo, tiyɛ gɔ gojunawan hakɛgu ma nɛ tolo ga mu igii wɔun. Kunrin, halu ɛju kanrun dadaaru kinɛ ma nɛ yato kanran, mu wogɔ kanrun gɔnrɔn sɛlɔn.
45007019	Kijɛ ɛju kanrun mu ibɛ gɔ, mu wogɔi kanraanlɔn, kaa kijɛ mɔɲu kanrun ibɛla mu wɔɔ gɔi kanranjɔn.
45007020	Mu kijɛ ibɛla mu wɔɔ gɔ wogɔi kanranjɔn ye, kɔɔ waaru le wogɔ mui kɔɔ gin’ kanraanlɛ, kaa hakɛ kinɛ ma nɛ too gɔ kanranjɛ.
45007021	Nɛɛ mu kijɛ ɔn jugaajɔn: Waaru kijɛ ɛju kanrun mu ibɛ le, kijɛ mɔɲu gɔ sai kanrun bɛɛjɔn.
45007022	Kinɛ ma kɔlɔ nɛ, Ama tɔɔru gɔ mu bɛrɛ ɛɛli wɔɔ.
45007023	Kaa mu nɛ mu tɔɔru waja iyeuwɔn, wogɔ hakilɛ ma kijɛ le yabaa wɔɔ gɔ le jaiyɛuwɔ. Tɔɔru wogɔ, hakɛ tɔɔru mu nɛ too gɔ kajuginɛi mui bojojɛ.
45007024	Mui naran go amasɔgɔi. Inɛ aa, yiun nɛ goju mui biɲaa yaajɛ ɔn numɔ nɛ mui ɛlɛ ye goonɔdo?
45007025	Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ le digɛu, Ama mui yayabado. Wo birɛpoo. Kɔɔ gin’ mu hakilɛ ma le digɛnu, Ama tɔɔru birɛ nɛ toun, kaa gojunawan hakɛgu ma le digɛnu, mu hakɛ tɔɔru birɛ nɛ toun.
45008001	Kanɛ kai, inɛw Kirisito Yesu nɛ toin gɔbe, jarugu kuu bemɛ nɛ wɔlɔ.
45008002	Sabu Kikinu tɔɔru, Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu emi naran go ɔnmɔi bojojɛ gɔ, mui hakɛ lee, yiun lee tɔɔru numɔ nɛ goonaati.
45008003	Gojunawan hakɛgu emɛ yɛbɛlɛ sabu dɛi, Tɔɔru kijɛ kanrun bɛɛidolo wo bee gɔ, Ama kanraanbe. Aini womɔ tɔitɔi, inɛw hakɛ sadagai biyɛ ga, gojunawan hakɛgu murin wɔɔ le tiyaabe. Wo kole digɛu hakɛ, gojunawan nɛ birɛjɛ gɔi jarugu duuraabe.
45008004	Emɛ inɛw gojunawan hakɛgu diŋɛ le laa, kaa Ama Kikinu diŋɛ le yoi yaanw gɔbe, Tɔɔru kijɛ teitai kanraun jaan gɔbe sɛɛu emɛ nɛ kibemu bɛɛ ga, Ama, Aini womɔ tiyaa, hakɛi jarugu duuraabe.
45008005	Inɛw gojunawan hakɛgu diŋɛ le yoi yaanw gɔbe, ajubu bemɛ gojunawan bemɛ kijɛ ibin gɔ le wɔɔ. Kaa inɛw Ama Kikinu diŋɛ le yoi yaanw gɔbe, ajubu bemɛ Ama Kikinu kijɛ ibɛ gɔ le wɔɔ.
45008006	Gojunawan hakɛgu kijɛ ibɛ gɔ ajubu le bii gɔ, wogɔ inɛi yiyinwɛnmɔjɛ. Kaa Ama Kikinu kijɛ ibɛ gɔ ajubu le bii gɔ, inɛi ɔnmɔ lee, jamu lee obojɛ.
45008007	Inɛw gojunawan hakɛgu kijɛ ibɛ ajubu le wɔin gɔbe, bei Ama jaŋuwin. Be Ama tɔɔru le tubiyeenɛ, iyaa wogɔ le tubi kanran bɛɛnɛ.
45008008	Inɛw gojunawan hakɛgu bemɛ diŋɛ kanranw gɔbe, be Ama kinɛ aamɔidenɛ.
45008009	Kaa e kai, Ama Kikinu gɔ naran go e nɛ yato digɛu, e gojunawan hakɛgu ebe diŋɛ le yoi yaauwɔnɛ. Kaa e Ama Kikinu diŋɛ le yoi yaauwɔi. Kirisito Kikinu inɛ nɛ tolo gɔ, woi Kirisito mɔi laa.
45008010	Kaa Kirisito e nɛ yato ye, halu hakɛ dɛi goju ebe yiyinwɛndo kanran, ei Ama giru nɛ teitai bojaaɲu dɛi, kikinu ebe ɔnmɔi wɔɔ.
45008011	Kaa Ama, Yesui yiun logoro nɛ bulomɔnɛ gɔ, Kikinu womɔ e nɛ yato ye, kɔɔ waaru le Ama Kirisito yiun nɛ bulomɔnɛ gɔ, wo iyaa goju ebe yinwɛnjɛ gɔ, Kikinu womɔ e nɛ too gɔ gɔnrɔn le digɛnu ɔnmɔi bobojodo.
45008012	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, ba unrunw mabe, kijɛ waajibi emɛ kanraun jaan gɔbe yɔɔin, kaa kijɛ kanraun emɛ jaan gɔbe goju nawan hakɛgu emɛ sibɛ goi laa. Gojunawan hakɛgu emɛ diŋɛ le yoi emɛ yaaun jaanla.
45008013	Sabu e gojunawan hakɛgu diŋɛ le kɛukɛu yoi yaauwɔi ye, ei yiyinwɛndo. Kaa e Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le digɛnu hakɛ birɛ ebe gɔi dadaajɛi ye, ei ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.
45008014	Inɛw Ama Kikinu bei teeremɔjɛ gɔbe puu, bei Ama unrunwin.
45008015	Sabu Kikinu ei obin gɔ, Kikinu ei gunɔwin bojo ye, liliyɛ nɛ ei pilemɛ kunɔjɛi laa. Kaa wogɔ Ama Kikinu, ei Ama unrunwin biyɛmɔjɛ gɔ woi. Kikinu Ama womaa «Aba» tiyɛ gɔ “De” ei kinɛ ɛɛli le gɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ woi.
45008016	Emi Ama unrunwin ga, Ama Kikinu gɔ kikinu emɛ le mɔrinyaan ye sɛɛrɛ gogoojɛ.
45008017	Emi unrunw womɔi. Kɔɔ dɛi, Ama, inɛw womɔ gɔbe dɛi kijɛ ɛju keenaa wo sɛɛ gɔ emɛ wogɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin, emɛ Kirisito le bari ye kɛn wogɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin. Sabu emɛ wo le bariyaa, tunmɔ go ɔɲaai ye, emɛ kanran wo bana dooro le wɔɔ gin’ dooro le biyɛdɛin.
45008018	Kanɛ ɔɲɛ emɛ iyejɛ ɔn lee, dooro Ama emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmɔido lee tunwɔn bɛɛmɔidolo ga, mu gawaa wɔun.
45008019	Ama kijɛ maŋu puu Ama, bai unrunw unrunmɔ wo jugɔmɔido gɔ kinɛ ɔgu le dɔmiyaan wɔin.
45008020	Kijɛ maŋaaɲu gɔ puu, kijɛ tiyɛ sɛlɛ numɔ nɛ yowaai. Wogɔ kijɛ maŋaaɲu diŋɛi laa, kaa wogɔ woi numɔ nɛ kunɔnɛ gɔ diŋɛ le biyaabe. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, diyɛdɔn turu yɔɔ:
45008021	Bai turu, kijɛ maŋaaɲu gɔ wooi yiun aŋa nɛ ɛli ye gogoodo. Iyaa, Ama unrunw hɔɔlɔi bii gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee nɛ gamulu bɛbɛɛdo.
45008022	Iye bai dɔɔ, kijɛ maŋaaɲu wooi duru durou, yaanran nɔrun daan gin’ ɔɲaa wɔɔ ga, emɛ igii wɔin.
45008023	Kɔɔ sai laa, emɛ kanran, emɛ inɛw kanɛ baa Ama Kikinu gɔ Ama sin obu gamulu pɔlɔ gin’ biyaaɲu gɔbe, Ama emi unrunw womɔi bojo ye, gojunawan emɛ kuu wo goonɔido waaru emɛ dɔmɔ gɔ le, emɛ kuu emɛ le kɔlɔ emɛ nɛ duru durouwɔin.
45008024	Sabu diyɛdɔn wogɔ nɛ toiyaa wɔu emi yabaaɲu. Nɛɛ kijɛ iyemɔjɛ diyɛdɔn gɔ, wogɔ diyɛdɔn tɔitɔii laa. Inɛ aa kijɛ wo iyejɛ bɛbɛɛdo diyɛdɔn le biyɛdo ma?
45008025	Kijɛ iyeenɛ emɛ wɔɔ gɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin diyɛdɔn gɔ le wɔin ye, emɛ wogɔ muyɔn le dɔdɔmiyɛndɛin.
45008026	Kɔɔ gin’ Ama Kikinu, yɛbɛlɛ emɛ nɛ emi babarajɛ. Sabu emɛ bana Ama bɛrɛ emɛ gɛɛun jaan gɔ inin. Kaa Kikinu, kuu womɔ le emɛ dɛi Ama bɛrɛ duru le bana wo gɛɛnjɛ gɔ, wogɔ aŋa le sɔɔ bɛɛmɔɔlɛ.
45008027	Ama, kinɛ ajubu jugɔnɛ gɔ, Kikinu womɔ ajubu gɔ igii wɔɔ. Sabu Kikinu, Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu Ama inɛw gɔbe dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛnjɛ.
45008028	Emɛ igii wɔin, Ama, inɛw woi ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe, inɛw bana wo kɛju le kɛukɛu wo boonu gɔbe, kijɛ be bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ wooi, be bɛrɛ sɔɔ ɛjui biyɛ ga kanranjɛ.
45008029	Sabu Aini womɔ, ba unrunw joo logoro nɛ aini pɔlɔi biyɛ ga, Ama, giru nɛ baa inɛw wo yɛmu gɔbe, wo iyaa giru nɛ baa bemaa Aini unrunmɔ le murin biyɛ ga kɛjaatiyaabe.
45008030	Kunrin Ama, inɛw dɛi giru nɛ baa, sɔɔ kɛjaatiyaa wo bee gɔbe, bei boonaabe. Inɛw wo boonu gɔbe, wo iyaa bei teitai bojaabe. Iyaa inɛw teitai wo boju gɔbe, wo iyaa dooro unrunmɔ bei gamalaa obaabe.
45008031	Emɛ kijɛ kɔɔbe wooi dɛi yani gɛɛdɛin ma? Ama emɛ le wɔɔ ye, inɛ aa jaŋunɛ emɛi biyɛdo ma?
45008032	Wo Aini womɔ ɔɲɛ nɛ paabalu, kaa emɛ wooi dɛi woi inɛw numɔ nɛ kunaabe. Wo Aini womɔ emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe. Kɔɔ gin’ yani wo iyaa lee, dɔnrun wɔlɔ go kijɛ puu emi obolu kanrando ma?
45008033	Inɛ aa Ama inɛw yɛmu gɔbei jarugado ma? Inɛ turu kanran. Sabu bei teitai wɔɔ ga lugonɛ gɔ Amai.
45008034	Inɛ aa kuu bemɛ nɛ jarugu duurɔdo ma? Inɛ turu kanran. Sabu yinwɛnnɛ gɔ Kirisito Yesui, kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ wo bulaai, wo Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ yadaan, iyaa wo emɛ dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ.
45008035	Kijɛ inge emi Kirisito ihibɛ le kabugu goonu bɛɛdo ma? Ɔɲɛ diyɛi ma, kinɛ ɔɲɛi ma, tɔɔɲɔi ma, giyɛi ma, dɛgui ma, parujui ma, yinwin ma?
45008036	Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “U sabu dɛi dɛnrun wooi nɛ emi yiun paruju nɛ too, inɛw, emi peju sɛnwɛin yaaɲu gin’ emi ɔɲɔmɔuwɔin.”
45008037	Kaa kijɛ kɔɔbe wooi kuu nɛ, emi ibɛɛ wɔɔ baŋa dɛi, emɛ gɔnrɔn diyɛ naa diyɛ biyaaɲu.
45008038	Sabu naran go, kijɛ turu kanran ihibɛ womɔ le emi kabugu goonu bɛɛidolo ga mu gawaa wɔun. Yiun ma, ɔnmɔ ma, mɛlɛnkɛbe ma, kuu bɛɛnw lee, paŋagunw lee ma, kanɛ kijɛ wɔɔ ma, kijɛ wɛɛido ma,
45008039	daa go paŋa ma, doɲu go paŋa ma, kijɛ maŋaaɲu waja turu kanran, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ le digɛu Ama ihibɛ tagaraajɛ gɔ nɛ emi asuu kabugu goonu bɛɛidolo.
45009001	Mu Kirisito nɛ narain sɔɔjɔn. Mu kakalui maŋaalɔn. Kinɛ jugɔ ma, Kikinu Pilu wijɛmɔjɛ gɔ, mu narain sɔɔjɔn ga mui daii tagauwɔ.
45009002	Mu tɔgu ma inɛw Yahutunw dɛi kinɛ ma gaai sɔmiyɛunwɔ, mu waaru wooi kinɛ jiun diyɛ le wɔun. Mu ba unrunw tɔgu ma bɛɛnw gɔbe bɛrɛ niwɛn sisiyɛbe ye, Ama jebu kuu ma nɛ biyɛ ga, iyaa Kirisito le mui kabugu goonɔ ga mu yayababɔn.
45009004	Bei Isɛrɛlu tɔgui. Ama bei unrunw womɔi bojaabe, iyaa dooro womɔ be bɛrɛ tagaraabe, aaru gɔbe be le aaraabe, iyaa Tɔɔru gɔ be bɛrɛ obu. Ama babu naran gɔ, be igu. Be Ama pui gɔbe biyaabɛin.
45009005	Tirɛ anranw diyɛnw unrunw gɔbe bei. Gojunawan sibɛ go Kirisito yaa tɔgu bemɛ nɛ goi. Wo, Ama kijɛ wooi kuu nɛ daan gɔ, asuu boi womɔ sɔmi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
45009006	Kaa mu Ama pui kunu gɔ yegiyelu gɛɛu wɔlɔn. Sabu Isɛrɛlu tirɛ unrunw gɔbe puu naran go Isɛrɛlu unrunwin laain.
45009007	Abarahamu tirɛ unrunw gɔbe kanran puu naran go unrunw womɔi laain. Sabu Ama, Abarahamu le kijɛ gi: “U Isaka le tirɛ unrunw u bɛrɛ obodɔn ga pui mu kunu gɔbei bɛɛdou.”
45009008	Tiyɛ gɔ gojunawan unrunw gɔbe, Ama unrunwin laain. Kaa unrunw Ama pui kunu gɔbe le kɛukɛu naraanɲu gɔbe sai, tirɛ unrunw tɔitɔi gɔbe bei ga lulugodɛin.
45009009	Sabu Ama, Abarahamu bɛrɛ pui kunɔu, sɔɔ wo sɔi gɔ unwɔ: “Yogo naŋurun, waaru ɔn le tee mu u bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn, Sara, kɔɔ waaru le aini bɛbɛɛdo.”
45009010	Iyaa kɔɔ sai laa. Rebeka anranw unrunw lɛi gɔbe, be ba turu sɛbɛin, emɛ tirɛ ainɛ Isaka gɔ woi.
45009011	Kaa aini turu yɛmu sɔɔ gɔ, Ama kuu womɔ le kijɛ kɛjaa, kakanrando ga wo beei biyɛ ga, Ama Rebeka le kijɛ gi: “Diyɛnɛ gɔ, dagunɛ gunɔnɛi biyɛdo.” Unrunw gɔbe naranmɔ nɛ, kijɛ ɛju ma, mɔɲu ma turu kanran kanrannɛ be wɔu, Ama sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔwaabe. Kunrin Ama yɛmu gɔ birɛ be biru le digɛla, kaa boonu womɔ gɔ le digɛ.
45009013	Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Mu Jakɔbui yɛmaa, Esaui pajaabɔn.”
45009014	Emɛ nɛɛ inge gɛɛdɛin? Teitai laa Ama le yɔɔ ma? Asuu.
45009015	Sabu Mɔise le kijɛ wo gi: “Mu, inɛ amasɔgɔ jugɔ mu ibɛ gɔ, amasɔgɔ womɔ jujugɔdɔn. Inɛ bɛrɛ ɛju kanran mu ibɛ gɔ, wo bɛrɛ ɛju kakanrandɔn.”
45009016	Nɛɛ kɔɔ gin’, Ama yɛmu gɔ, wogɔ inɛ kijɛ ibɛ le ma, inɛ birɛ le ma kijɛ digɛi laa. Kaa Ama amasɔgɔjugɔ gɔ le digɛ.
45009017	Ama Dɔn nɛ Ama, Ejipute ɔgɔnɛ le kijɛ gi: “Mu u le gɔnrɔn ma tagara ga, iyaa boi ma aduna yalu wooi nɛ dɔɔ ga, ui ɔgɔ daanaabɔn.”
45009018	Kɔɔ gin’ Ama, inɛ amasɔgɔ jugɔ wo ibɛ gɔ amasɔgɔ jugɔjɛ, iyaa inɛ kɔkɔlɔ maai bojo wo ibɛ gɔ kɔkɔlɔ maai bojojɛ.
45009019	Inɛ turu mu le ɔn gin’ gɛɛdo bibiyɛ: «Kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ biyaai ye, Ama inge dɛi inɛi pɛbɛjɛ? Sabu inɛ aa Ama diŋɛ le yabalu kanrun bɛɛdo ma?»
45009020	Kaa u inɛ Ama le jiirenɛ gɔ ui aai? Nage toroi, woi maanɛ le womaa inge dɛi unruin ɔn gin’ kanrun ma gɛɛidolo.
45009021	Toroimaanɛ nage gɔ le kijɛ wo ibɛ kanran bɛbɛɛjɛ. Nage tutunmɔ gɔ le wo gelu dɔnrun gaa yeguru bɛbɛɛdo, wo iyaa gelu birɛ biru kanran yeguru bɛbɛɛdo.
45009022	Ama yaa kijɛ kanrun wo ibɛ gɔ kanrun bɛbɛɛdo. Wo kinɛ banrun womɔ jugɔmu ibɛɛ bee, iyaa gɔnrɔn womɔ taguru ibɛɛ bee. Kokanran inɛw kuu nɛ kinɛbanrun womɔ sugoun jaanbe gɔbe, suiyi be le jaan gɔbe, be sibɛ go, Ama, muyɔn diyɛ unrunmɔ tagaraabe.
45009023	Emɛ inɛw amasɔgɔ emɛ wo jugaajɛ gɔbe, emɛ inɛw giru nɛ baa, emaa dooro womɔ bɛɛ ga wo boonu gɔbe bɛrɛ dooro diyɛ womɔ tagara ga, wo wogɔ gin’ kanraanbe.
45009024	Sabu Yahutunw logoro nɛ sai laa, kaa tɔgu wajunw logoro nɛ inɛw wo boonu gɔbe emi.
45009025	Ose dɔn nɛ Ama sɔwaa gi: “Tɔgu, tɔgu mai laa gɔ, mu woi tɔgu mai gɛgɛɛdɔn. Gana ibɛla mu bee gɔ, gana ibɛɛ mu wɔi gɛgɛɛdɔn.”
45009026	Iyaa, “Yalu nɛ be bɛrɛ ‘ei tɔgu mai laa’ gin gɔ nɛ, wogɔ nɛ tee bei ‘Ama ɔnmɔ anranw unrunwin’ gɛgɛɛdɛin.”
45009027	Esayi kanran, Yahutunw tɔgu dɛi kɔnwaan kijɛ wo gi: “Halu Isɛrɛlu tɔgu lugo gɔ nɛudii sɔsɔun gin’ biyaai kanran, logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw gaila wajaain gɔbe sai yayabadɛin.
45009028	Sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama, ɔgu ɔgu kubɔ turu sai aduna saliyɛ kikiredo.”
45009029	Iyaa pɔɔlɔ bana Esayi sɔwaabe gin’: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama kijɛ wooi kuu nɛ daan gɔ emi tiruwɛnw obolu bee ye, emi Sodomɛ gin’ bibiyɛbe, emi Gomɔre le murin bibiyɛbe.”
45009030	Emɛ nɛɛ inge gɛɛdɛin ma? Wogɔ unwɔ: Inɛw Yahutunwin laain gɔbe, inɛw Ama giru nɛ teitai biyɛ ga mainiyɛun benɛ gɔbe, gagawu dɛi bei teitai wɔɔ ga lugaaɲu.
45009031	Kaa Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw gɔbe kai, tɔɔru Ama giru nɛ bei teitai bojo bɛɛido gɔ bɛɛ dɛi mainiyɛun wɔu, be Tɔɔru gɔ kijɛ gɛɛjɛ kanraan bɛɛnɛ.
45009032	Inge sabu dɛi? Sabu kijɛ dɛi mainiyɛun be bee gɔ, gagawu le digɛla bee, kaa wogɔ birɛ bemɛ le digɛbe. Be “tibu inɛi tomɔmaa ye numɔmɔjɛ” gɔ nɛ kubɔ bemɛ tomaai,
45009033	bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa Ama gi gin’: “Yɛnɛ, tibu inɛw kubɔ tomɔmɔjɛ gɔ, mu Siɔn nɛ duunaajɔn. Wogɔ, dumɔ bei numɔmɔjɛ gɔi. Kaa inɛ wo le gawaajɛ gɔ, wo dɔgɔ iyeidolo.
45010001	Ba unrunw, kijɛ kinɛ ma nɛ saii mu ibɛ gɔ, kijɛ Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw dɛi Ama bɛrɛ mu gɛɛnjɛ gɔ, wogɔ bemaa yayabu gɔ bɛɛi.
45010002	Sabu mu bemaa Ama sibɛ go maini diyɛ le wɔin sɛɛrɛ goo bɛbɛɛdɔn, kaa maini diyɛ bemɛ jugɔ sɔɔ le digɛla.
45010003	Kunrin, be bana Ama inɛwin teitai wɔin ga wo lugojɛ gɔ inin dɛi, be kuu bemɛ le bana teitai biyɛɲu dɛnaabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’, be Ama bana inɛwin teitai wɔin ga wo lugojɛ gɔ le yabanɛ.
45010004	Sabu Kirisito, Tɔɔru gɔ donugaabe, kɔɔ gin’ inɛw gawaaɲu gɔbe wooi, Ama giru nɛ teitai wɔin lugoɲu.
45010005	Tɔɔru sɔɔ yabu gɔ le digɛnu, teitai bii dɛi waaru Mɔise tɔŋu le, kijɛ wo gi: “Inɛ Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ kanranjɛ gɔ, Tɔɔru gɔ digɛnu woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.”
45010006	Gagawu le digɛnu Ama giru nɛ teitai bii gɔ dɛi sɔɔ sɔin gɔ ɔn woi: U kinɛ uwɔ nɛ Kirisitoi sunugoun jaain wɔɔ ga gɛɛnɔu, bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ aa alagala uhulodo ma.”
45010007	Kirisitoi yiunbe logoro nɛ bulugu goonɔu jaain wɔɔ kanran gɛɛnɔu, bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ aa aduna minɛ doɲu nɛ too gɔ nɛ sugodo?”
45010008	Nɛɛ sɔɔ ingei sɔin? Wogɔ unwɔ: “Ama sɔɔ gɔ u le bɛrii wɔɔ, aŋa uwɔ lee, kinɛ uwɔ lee nɛ yato.” Wogɔ gagawu sɔɔ waaju emɛ tagajɛ gɔ woi.
45010009	U aŋa uwɔ le, Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa gɔ woi ga inɛw giru nɛ sɔwaajɛu ye, iyaa u kinɛ uwɔ nɛ Ama, Yesui yiun nɛ bulomaabe ga gawaa wɔu ye, ui yayabadɛin.
45010010	Sabu kinɛ uwɔ nɛ u gawaa wɔu digɛu, Ama, ui teitai wɔɔ ga lugojɛ, iyaa aŋa uwɔ le sɛɛrɛ u goojɛ gɔ digɛu ui yayabadɛin.
45010011	Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔwaa gi: “Inɛ aai kanran, wo le gawaajɛ ye, dɔgɔ iyeidolo.”
45010012	Kɔɔ gin’ Yahutunw lee, inɛw Yahutunwin laain gɔbe lee logoro nɛ kabu tolo. Inɛw puu dɛi Inɛw Baŋa turu sai yɔɔ. Inɛw boi womɔ boonɔw gɔbe puu bɛrɛ wo kijɛ ɛju gaai obojɛ.
45010013	Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ aai kanran, Inɛw Baŋa boi boonaajɛ gɔ, woi yayabadɛin.”
45010014	Be inɛ le gawanɛ be wɔɔ go boi, yani boonu bɛɛdɛin? Be inɛ dɛi sɔɔ turu kanran ɛgɛnɛ be wɔɔ gɔ le, yani gawu bɛɛdɛin? Inɛ turu kanran, wo dɛi waaju tagalu ye, be yani ɛgɛdɛin?
45010015	Inɛw waaju taganw gɔbe tiinɛ ye, yani waaju gɔ tagadɛin? Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛw Kibɛru Ɛju taganw wɛɛgu gɔ saii ɛjii wɔɔ.”
45010016	Kaa inɛw puu Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le yabanɛ. Kunrin Esayi sɔwaa kijɛ gi: “Inɛw Baŋa, inɛ aa sɔɔ emɛ gɔ le gawaabe ma?”
45010017	Kɔɔ gin’ gagawu gɔ sɔɔ keŋi le digɛnu bɛɛmɔjɛ, sɔɔ keŋi gɔ Kirisito sɔɔ waaju tagu gɔ le digɛnu bɛɛmɔjɛ.
45010018	Kaa kijɛ mu gi: Be Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ɛgɛnɛbɛin gɔ narain ma? Ai, ɛgaabɛin. Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Mii bemɛ minɛ yalu wooi nɛ ɛgɛmaabe, sɔɔ bemɛ aduna kale wooi nɛ dɔwaai.”
45010019	Iyaa kijɛ mu gi: Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw wogɔ paamanɛ ma? Paamaabɛin. Mɔise laa Ama ɔn gin’ gi ga tɔŋu: “Mu tɔgu tɔitɔi laa inɛw gɔbe le ei ele nɛ kukunɔdɔn, tɔgu bomɔgunw le kinɛ ebe babanranmɔdɔn.”
45010020	Esayi halu kara siyaa Ama ɔn gin’ gi ga tɔŋu: “Inɛw mui dɛnɛbenɛ gɔbe mui iyaabɛin, inɛw mui selumɛubenɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ mui tagaraabɔn.”
45010021	Kaa Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw dɛi, Ama womaa ɔn gin’ gi gi: “Dɛnrun gɔ wooi nɛ mu tɔgu sɔɔ yabaalɛ, tɔgu kɔkɔlɔmaaginɛ bɛrɛ numɔ ma dɛɛraabɔn.”
45011001	Nɛɛ kijɛ mu gi: Ama, tɔgu womɔ inɛwin kamaa dagaati ma? Asuu. Sabu mu kuu ma le Abarahamu tiruwɛnɛi, Isɛrɛlu tɔgui, Bɛnjamɛ tɔgui.
45011002	Ama, tɔgu womɔ giru nɛ baa wo yɛmu gɔ kamaa dagalu. E Eli dɛi Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu gɔ igii wɔi laa? Wo Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw dɛi kinɛ unrunmɔ aalu ga Ama bɛrɛ waaru wo sɔɔube le kijɛ wo gi:
45011003	“Inɛw Baŋa Ama, be inɛw titiyaanw uwɔ gɔbei daatin, sadagadumu uwɔ gɔbei wolugaatin. Mu turu sai wajaai, iyaa be mui daa ga dɛnɛuwɔin.”
45011004	Kaa, Ama yani aŋa womɔ sai? Wo Eli le kijɛ gi: “Mu inɛw muɲu sɔi mu dɛi bojaa yasɔn, be ɔmɔlɔ Baalu gɔ giru nɛ tuŋiyɛnnɛ.”
45011005	Kɔɔ gin’, kanɛ yaa, Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi inɛw lugo dagi yɛmaa wo sɛɛ gɔbe wajaa yɔɔin.
45011006	Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi bei yɛmu digɛu, birɛ bemɛ sɔɔ wɔlɔ. Kɔɔi laa ye, Ama nɛɛma gɔ nɛɛma tɔitɔii biyɛbele.
45011007	Emɛ nɛɛ inge gɛɛdɛin ma? Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw gɔbe kijɛ be dɛnɛbe gɔi bɛɛnɛ. Kaa Ama inɛw yɛmu gɔbe wogɔ biyaabɛin. Inɛw wajunw gɔbe kai hakilɛ bemɛ pinaatin,
45011008	bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Ama giri yeiyi kikinu bei obaajɛ. Be giri iye bɛɛidenɛ, be suguru ɛgɛ bɛɛidenɛ. Iye bai dɔɔ kunrin wɔɔ.”
45011009	Dawide yaa sɔwaa gi: “Jaa diyɛ bemɛ gɔ be bɛrɛ pɛnrɛn lee, atii lee gin’ biyɛmɔ. Wogɔ be bɛrɛ kijɛ kinɛ yanwanmu sɔɔ lee, tujɔ mɔɲu bɛi sɔɔ leei biyɛmɔ.
45011010	Bemaa giri iyenɔu giye, giri bemɛ purugiyɛmɔ. Waaru wooi ɔɲɛ dɛi bei yɔnɔ ye biyɛmɔ.”
45011011	Nɛɛ kijɛ mu gi: Yahutunw waaru be tomu le, be jaa numɔ ye bibiyɛdɛin ga numi ma? Asuu! Kaa be hakɛ kanraanbɛin dɛi, yayabu gɔ inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ dɔwaai. Sɔɔ wogɔ, Yahutunw bemaa ele le biyɛ ga biyaabe.
45011012	Yahutunw hakɛ gɔ dɛi aduna duba diyɛ biyaabe, Yahutunw numu gɔ le digɛu tɔgu wajunw gɔbe duba diyɛ biyaabɛin. Waaru Yahutunw gɔbe lugo kɛu yayabu gɔ nɛ be wiyaajɛ, sigɛ le duba gɔ gaai biyɛdo.
45011013	Nɛɛ, e inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, kanɛ mu e le sɔɔuwɔn: Mui, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu birɛ mu birɛun jaan gɔ dɛi kuu ulo le biyɛdɔn.
45011014	Kɔɔ gin’, Ama womaa tɔgu ma inɛw logoro nɛ gamuui yaba ga, mu kinɛ bemɛ nɛ ele kunɔ ibɛɛ wɔun.
45011015	Sabu waaru bei kamaa dagin le, aduna lee, Ama lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegiyaai. Nɛɛ, waaru Ama bei sɛgɛrɛi wo do yani biyɛdo? Wogɔ inɛw yinwaan gɔbe bɛrɛ ɔnmɔi bii biyɛdo.
45011016	Buru kawara pɔlɔ gɔ Ama dɛi dɛiin bojaatin ye, buru gunu gɔ puu Ama dɛi dɛiin bojaaɲu. Iyaa, tiun duu gɔ Ama dɛi dɛiin bojaatin ye, tiun numɔ ii gɔbe yaa Ama dɛi dɛiin bojaaɲu.
45011017	Tiun oliwe walaaɲu numɔ ii gamuu gɔbe kɛjaa goonaatiyaa, oliwe tɛbɛ numɔ ii gɔbe wogɔ nɛ jɛɛlaa taraa taŋamaabɛin. Yahutunw gɔbe oliwe walaaɲu wogɔ gin’ wɔin. E inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, e oliwe tɛbɛ tiun gin’ wɔi, iyaa ei kanɛ oliwe walaaɲu nɛ jɛɛlaa taraa taŋamaaɲu. Iyaa oliwe walaaɲu duu bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju gowaa wɛɛ gɔ tinɛi kayauwɔi.
45011018	Nɛɛ, numɔ ii kɛjaa gooni gɔbei e gailamɔu jaanla. E kuu ulo le e biyɛun jaanla. Ei numɔ ii sai. Tiun duu gɔ bɛrɛ paŋa e oboolɛ, kaa tiun duu gɔi paŋa ei obojɛ.
45011019	Kaa kijɛ e gɛɛido: «Ee, kaa emi dilɛ bemɛ nɛ jɛɛlaa taraa taŋamɔ ga numɔ ii ɔnbe wogɔ dɛi kɛjaa gooni.»
45011020	Wogɔ narain. Be gagawu sɛlɛ bemɛ dɛi bei kɛjaa gooni. Kaa e gagawu ebe dɛi yalu ɔn nɛ biyaa wɔi. Kɔɔi biyaa ye, e kuu ulo le biyɛnɔugi, kaa liyɛi.
45011021	Sabu Ama, Yahutunw, numɔ ii tɔitɔi gin’ wɔin gɔbei kamu dagu nɛ paabalu ye, ei kanran paabaidolo.
45011022	Ama bana ɛhɛju wo sɛɛ lee, bana saliyɛ kiru nɛ ɛɛn go wo wɔɔ gɔ lee yɛnɛi. Wo inɛw numaai gɔbe saliyɛ ɛɛn go kiraabe. Kaa e sibɛ nɛ ɛhɛju wogɔ tagaraabe. Kaa e ɛhɛju womɔ gɔ nɛ yabiyɛun jaain wɔɔ, kɔɔi laa ye, ei kanran kɛjɛ ye gogoonɔdɛin.
45011023	Yahutunw gɔbe gagawu sɛlɛ bemɛ pajaatin biyaai ye, pɔɔlɔ yalu be bee gɔ nɛ bei jɛɛlu taru ye tataŋamɔdɛin. Sabu Ama bei pilemɛ jɛɛlu ye taru ye, taŋamɔu gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
45011024	Halu e lee, be lee dɛin kanran, ei oliwe tɛbɛ nɛ kɛjaa goonaa, oliwe walaaɲu gɔ nɛ jɛɛlaa, taraa taŋamaabɛin. Yahutunw gɔbe, bei oliwe tiun tɔitɔi kɔɔ numɔ ii gɔ bei. Bei pilemɛ ye tiun bemɛi wɔɔ gɔ nɛ jɛɛlu ye, taru taŋamɔ ga, Ama bɛrɛ halu bɛrii wɔɔ.
45011025	Ba unrunw, ebaa kuu ebe le ei hakilɛ sɛwin gɛɛnɔu ga sɔɔ boŋurun turu ɔn mu ebaa jugɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔun. Wogɔ unwɔ: Isɛrɛlu inɛw gamuu gɔbe waaru wooi hakilɛ bemɛ pinɛ ye biyɛɛnɛ. Kaa tɔgu wajunw Ama bɛrɛ wɛɛidɛin lugo kibeido baa yai dɔɔ sai hakilɛ bemɛ pinɛ ye biyɛdo.
45011026	Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu inɛw gɔbe puu aŋai yabaidɛin unwɔ: “Yabanɛ gɔ Siɔn nɛ gogoodo, wo Jakɔbu tirɛ unrunw Ama giri liyɛla gɔ dodonugodo.
45011027	Waaru hakɛ bemɛ yaabu mu kanraindo, be le aaru mu aaraido gɔ kɔɔ woi.”
45011028	Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le yabanɛ be kanrun sɔɔ sibɛ go, be ɛju ebe dɛi Ama jaŋuwin biyaa wɔin. Kaa Ama bei yɛmu sɔɔ sibɛ go, Ama be tirɛ anranw le pui wo kunu gɔbe dɛi, Ama inɛw ibɛ gɔ bei.
45011029	Sabu Ama inɛw wo yɛmu gɔbe lee, duba wo obojɛ gɔbe lee sibɛ go ajubu womɔ duluyomɔidolo.
45011030	E kanran inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, waaru galaai gɔ le e Ama sɔɔ yabalu kanraanbei. Kaa kanɛ, Yahutunw sɔɔ yabala gɔ digɛu, Ama, amasɔgɔ ebe jugaabe.
45011031	Bemɛ yaa kɔɔ gin’ biyɛdo. Ama, amasɔgɔ ebe jugu gɔ le digɛnu, bemaa kanran kanɛ Ama, amasɔgɔ bemɛ jugɔ ga, be kanɛ Ama sɔɔ yabalu kanraanbɛin.
45011032	Sabu Ama, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ amasɔgɔjugɔ unrunmɔ tagara ga, wo inɛw wooi, sɔɔ yabala kajugunwin bojaabe.
45011033	Ama arusɛgɛ gɔ halu gaai wɔɔ. Hakilɛ womɔ lee, jugɔ womɔ lee, halu tooi wɔin. Inɛ aa Ama kijɛ kanran ga wo kɛju gɔ jugɔ bɛɛdo? Inɛ aa bana birɛ wo birɛjɛ paamu kanrun bɛɛdo?
45011034	Bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ aa Inɛw Baŋa Ama ajubu gɔbe igii wɔɔ ma? Inɛ aa tinwinrun obonɛ womɔi bii bɛɛdo ma?
45011035	Baŋai pilemɛ ye tujɔ ga, inɛ aa laa wo bɛrɛ kijɛ obaabe ma?”
45011036	Sabu kijɛ puu wo nɛ goo, kijɛ puu wo maŋu, kijɛ puu wo dɛi wɔin. Boi sɔmu gɔ asuu Ama mɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
45012001	Nɛɛ, ba unrunw, Ama, amasɔgɔjugɔ emɛ bɛrɛ wo taguru gɔ dɛi, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ kuu ebe sadaga ɔnmɔ, dɛiin bojaaɲu, Ama kinɛ aajɛ gin’, Ama bɛrɛ oboi. Amai babu tɔitɔi babu e bɛɛido gɔ kɔɔ woi.
45012002	Bana ebe, aduna ɔn bana le murin biyɛmɔnɔugi. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ ajubu kana ei obomɔ ye, wo bɛrɛ ei wo dulomɔmɔi. Kɔɔ waaru le Ama diŋɛ gɔ e igii bibiyɛdei: Wogɔ kijɛ ɛjii wɔɔ gɔ lee, kijɛ kinɛ womɔ aajɛ gɔ lee, kijɛ kibaai gɔ leei.
45012003	Ama, nɛɛma mu bɛrɛ obu gɔ dɛi, mu e puu bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔn: Bana e wɔɔ gɔ nɛ gaanu ye kuu ebe unɔnɔugi. Kaa inɛ tuturu puu, Ama, gagawu gamulu wo bɛrɛ obu gɔ le kɛukɛu, hakilɛ daanu le, kuu unrunmɔ dɛi wo ajubamɔ.
45012004	Goju emɛ turu gɔ nɛ digɛ dɛin dɛin yɔɔin, be puu birɛ bemɛ dɛin dɛin wɔɔ.
45012005	Kɔɔ gin’, emɛ yaa jooi wɔin. Kaa Kirisito nɛ emi goju turu. Iyaa, bana goju digɛ dɛin dɛin gɔbe tunmɔ le mɔrinyaan wɔin gin’, emɛ yaa tunmɔ le kɔɔ gin’ mɔrinyaan wɔin.
45012006	Ama, inɛ tuturu bɛrɛ nɛɛma obu gɔ le kɛukɛu, sin obu dɛin dɛin emɛ sɛɛ gɔbe le birɛ emɛ birɛun jaain wɔɔ. Logoro emɛ nɛ, inɛ turu, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obui sɛɛ ye, wo wogɔ gagawu womɔ bana wɔɔ gin’ wo kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
45012007	Inɛ waja, jaŋu unrunw baru sin obui sɛɛ biyaai ye, jaŋu unrunwin wo baraun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛ deeru deeru sin obu sɛɛ gɔ, deeru wo deereun jaain wɔɔ.
45012008	Inɛ, inɛw wajunw gɔbei anrangaju obu sin obu sɛɛ gɔ, bei anrangaju wo oboun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛ kijɛ wo sɛɛ inɛw wajunw le gamalanɛ gɔ, wo wogɔ numɔ maa sɛlɛ le kanran. Inɛ giru teeremɔnɛi wɔɔ gɔ, wo birɛ gɔ nɛ mainiyɛn. Inɛ dɔgɔpaganw baranɛ gɔ, wo kinɛ ɛɛlu le wogɔ kanran.
45012009	Kinɛpilu le inɛwin ibɛɛ biyɛi. Mɔɲu ibiliyɛi, ɛju kanrun gɔ nɛ pagiyɛi.
45012010	E, ba unrunw gin’ tunmɔi ɛjii ibɛɛ biyɛi, e tunmɔ babu nɛ ɛjii mainiyɛin.
45012011	E wala le biyɛnɔugi, kaa kinɛ ɔgu le birɛ ɛjii birɛi. Kinɛ ebe wooi le Inɛw Baŋa dɛi birɛ birɛi.
45012012	Diyɛdɔn ebe gɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛlu le biyɛi, ɔɲɛ dɛi muyɔn le biyɛi, waaru wooi Ama gɛɛin.
45012013	Ama inɛw gɔbe kai kilɛi. Yerunw bɛrɛ ginrunsugo oboi.
45012014	Inɛw ei tɔɔɲɔw gɔbe dɛi Ama boi booi. Ɔnhɔn! Be dɛi Ama boi booi. Kaa bei jɛbɛnɔugi.
45012015	Inɛw kinɛ ɛɛlu le wɔin gɔbe le kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Inɛw sɔmiyɛn sɔmiyɛnw gɔbe le sɔmiyɛn sɔmiyɛin.
45012016	E tunmɔ le mii turu le biyɛi. Kuu ulo le biyɛnɔugi, kaa birɛ dagi inɛw lugaa sɛnɛ gɔbei birɛ ga yabai. Ei inɛw hakilɛgunwin bojonɔugi.
45012017	Inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ mɔɲu, mɔɲu le tujɔnɔugi. Inɛw puu giru nɛ ɛju kanran ga dɛnɛi.
45012018	Kanran bɛbɛɛmɔ ye, kijɛ gɔnrɔn ebei wɔɔ gɔ puu kanrun ye, inɛw puu le jamu le biyɛi.
45012019	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e tunmi duguru ebe goonɔugi, kaa Ama kinɛbanrun bɛrɛ duguru ebe wo goomɔi. Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ Inɛw Baŋa Ama ɔn gin’ gi ga tɔŋaaɲu: “Duguru gɔ mu goodo, pilemɛ ye mu tujɔdo.”
45012020	Iyaa Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Jaŋunɛ uwɔ giyɛ le wɔɔ ye, pana kayaɲu wo bɛrɛ obo, diinɔɔrin le wɔɔ ye, dii nɔɔɲu wo bɛrɛ obo. Sabu u kɔɔ gin’ kanraanjɛu ye, yaun bɔnrɔin kuu womɔ nɛ duunɔjɛu.”
45012021	U mɔɲu bɛrɛ kuu uwɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛmɔnɔu, kaa ɛju kanrun le mɔɲu kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛ.
45013001	Inɛw wooi paŋagunw le be tubiyeun jaain wɔɔ. Sabu paŋa Ama bɛrɛ goolu turu kanran wɔlɔ, paŋa wɔin gɔbe Ama sagu le dɛinyaan wɔin.
45013002	Kɔɔ gin’, paŋa daanaaɲu gɔ le inɛ jaiyɛjɛ gɔ, Ama kijɛ daanu gɔ le jaiyɛuwɔ. Inɛ wogɔ gin’ kanranjɛ gɔ, wo tujɔ mɔɲu kuu womɔ nɛ susunugodo.
45013003	Sabu inɛw mɔɲu kanranw gɔbei laa ye, ɛju kanranw gɔbe paŋagunwin liyɛun jaanla. U paŋaginɛi liyɛ ibɛlau ma? Kɔɔ biyaai ye, u ɛju kanran, wo ui sɔsɔmɔdo.
