45013004	Sabu wo u bɛrɛ niwɛn siyɛ dɛi, Ama birɛbirɛnɛi biyaa wɔɔ. Kaa u mɔɲu kanranjɛu ye, woi liyɛ, sabu wo bamai gɔnrɔn kɔɔ sɛlɛ. Wo Ama birɛbirɛnɛi. Wo Ama kinɛbanrun goonɔ ga, inɛ mɔɲu kanrannɛ gɔi lalagajɛ.
45013005	Kɔɔ dɛi paŋagunw le u tubiyeun jaain wɔɔ. Kinɛbanrun liliyɛ gɔ sai dɛi laa, kaa kinɛjugɔ uwɔ kuu uwɔ nɛ jarugu duduurɔjɛ dɛi be le u tubiyeun jaain wɔɔ.
45013006	Kɔɔ dɛi e sɛgu sɛgɛuwɔi, sabu paŋagunw gɔbe kijɛ be kanraun jaan gɔbe sɛɛu kanraunwɔin ye, be Ama birɛi birɛuwɔin.
45013007	Kijɛ be bɛrɛ tujɔun e jaan gɔbe puu tujɔi: Sɛgu gɔ sɛgu baŋa bɛrɛ oboi, tɛɛbɛ gɔ tɛɛbɛ baŋa bɛrɛ oboi. Inɛ u liyɛun jaan gɔi liyɛ, inɛ u babaun jaan gɔi baba.
45013008	Inɛ turu yoru kanran e le biyɛmɔnɔugi. Kaa kijɛ turu e kanraun jaan yɔɔ, wogɔ tunmɔi ibɛɛ bii. Inɛ wo bɔɔnɛi ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɔ, Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔ puu kanraan kibemaati.
45013009	Kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu ɔnbe: “Dimu dimiyɛnnɔu, inɛ daanɔu, gunyɔn gunyɔnnɔu, inɛ kijɛ daariyɛnɔu”, kɔɔbe puu lee, wajunw gɔbe puu lee tiyɛ mɔɔnaa, kijɛ kanran gɛɛɲu turu ɔn sai nɛ tɛtɛmɛmɔjɛ: “Aŋai kuu uwɔ u ibɛɛ gin’, u bɔɔnɛi yaa kɔɔ gin’ ibɛi biyɛ.”
45013010	Inɛ ihibɛ sɛɛ wo bɔɔnɛ le mɔɲu kanraanlɛ. Inɛ wo bɔɔnw ibɛ gɔ, baŋa Tɔɔru gɔ puu kibemaati.
45013011	E sɔɔ kɔɔ e kanraun jaain wɔɔ, sabu emɛ waaru yagɔ nɛ wɔin ma e igii wɔi. Giri e yemɛu waaru gɔ dɔwaai. Sabu kanɛ, yayabu gɔ laa waaru Yesu Kirisito le emɛ gawu gɔ dɛi sigɛ emɛ le bɛruniyaan wɔɔ.
45013012	Digɛ waaru yagalajɛ, ba yaara bɛruniyaain. Kɔɔ dɛi, emɛ, ɔlɔ nɛ birɛ birɛɲu gɔbei pajamɔi, wijɛ nɛ kɔmɔgelu le kɔmɔ tai bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔi pagiyɛmɔi.
45013013	Yoiyaara emɛ, bana aga wijɛ nɛ biyɛun jaan gin’ bojomɔi. Emɛ yɔgɔrɔ mɔɲu nɛ lee, kɔɲɔ nɔi bimili nɛ lee, sala nɛ lee, kuu sɛlɛ birɛ nɛ lee, jai nɛ lee, ele nɛ lee, kuu emɛ kajubamɔi.
45013014	Kaa, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito bana gɔ jeɲɛi. Waja dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔ diŋɛ kanrun ajubanɔugi.
45014001	Inɛ gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛlɛ gɔ sɛgɛrɛi. Kaa kijɛ wo kanraun jaan ma, kijɛ wo kanraun jaanla ma bana wo ajubajɛ sibɛ go wo le jiirenɔugi.
45014002	Kɔɔ gin’, inɛ turu, gagawu womɔ wo bɛrɛ kijɛ puu kayamu bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ. Kaa inɛ gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛlɛ gɔ, minɛ nɛ kijɛ tɛiyɛjɛ sai kayajɛ.
45014003	Inɛ kijɛ puu kayi bɛɛjɛ gɔ, inɛ kakayɔn gamuu kayi bɛɛlɛ gɔi gailiyɛmɔu jaanla, iyaa inɛ kakayɔn gamuu kayaalɛ gɔ, inɛ kijɛ puu kayajɛ gɔi jarugaun jaanla, sabu Ama woi sɛgɛraabe.
45014004	Ui aai ma, u inɛ waja birɛbirɛnɛi jaruganɛ gɔ? Wo kijɛ wo kanranjɛ nɛ ɛɛn go iŋɛ ma, ɛɛn go iŋɛla ma, wo baŋa turu sai tagu yato. Kaa wo ɛɛn go iŋiyɛndo, sabu Inɛw Baŋa woi ɛɛn go iŋiyɛnmɔɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
45014005	Inɛ turu, bai turu bai waja dɛi sigɛ ga lugojɛ, inɛ waja yaa bai wooi kɛukɛu ga lugojɛ. Inɛ tuturu kinɛ womɔ nɛ bana wo ajubajɛ daii jugi biyɛ.
45014006	Inɛ bai turu bai wajunw dɛi sigɛ ga wɔɔ gɔ, wo Inɛw Baŋa baba ga kanranjɛ. Inɛ kakayɔn puu kayajɛ gɔ, wo Inɛw Baŋa baba ga kanranjɛ, sabu wo jaa womɔ dɛi Amai birɛpoo tatagajɛ. Inɛ kijɛ gamuu kayaalɛ gɔ, wo Inɛw Baŋa boi sɔmɔ ga kanranjɛ, wo yaa Amai birɛpoo tatagajɛ.
45014007	Sabu emɛ inɛ turu kanran, inɛ kuu unrunmɔ dɛi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ wɔlɔ, iyaa inɛ turu kanran, inɛ kuu unrunmɔ dɛi yinwɛnjɛ wɔlɔ.
45014008	Emi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ ye, Inɛw Baŋa dɛi emi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ, emi yinwaain ye, Inɛw Baŋa dɛi emi yinwɛnjɛ. Kɔɔ gin’, emi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ ma, emi yinwaan wɔɔ ma, emi Inɛw Baŋa mɔi.
45014009	Sabu Kirisito, inɛw yinwaain gɔbe lee, inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe lee, Inɛw Baŋai biyɛ ga yinwaan, bulaabe.
45014010	Nɛɛ u, inge dɛi u bainɛi jarugau wɔu ma? U kanran, inge dɛi u bainɛi gailiyɛmɔu wɔu ma? Sabu saliyɛ emɛ kiru dɛi emɛ puu Ama giru nɛ bai turu ihiŋiyɛndɛin.
45014011	Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Mu Inɛw Baŋa ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ, daii sɔwaa kijɛ mu gi: Inɛw puu giru ma nɛ tutuŋiyɛndɛin, inɛw wooi mui Amai ga daii gɛgɛɛdɛin.”
45014012	Kɔɔ gin’, emɛ tuturu wooi kijɛ emɛ kanrun tiyɛ gɔ Ama bɛrɛ tatagadɛin.
45014013	Waja emɛ tunmɔi jarugu pajamɔi. Kaa kijɛ e bainɛ kubɔ tomɔmɔjɛ ma, hakɛ nɛ woi yoomɔjɛ ma kanraindelei ga kinɛ ebe nɛ kunɔi.
45014014	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛ, mu igii wɔun, kijɛ kuu unrunmɔ le danwain ga wɔɔ wɔlɔ ga mu naran go gawaa wɔun. Kaa inɛ turu, kijɛ turu unruin danwan ga wɔɔ ye, kɔɔbaŋa bɛrɛ danwan.
45014015	Kaa kakayɔn uwɔ dɛi u bainɛ kinɛ jinwɛnmɔu wɔu ye, yoiyaara uwɔ ihibɛ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ. Kirisito, inɛ dɛi yinwun gɔ, u inɛ wogɔi kakayɔn uwɔ dɛi suyonɔu.
45014016	Kijɛ ɛjii wɔɔ ga u lugojɛ gɔ, inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ wogɔ kijɛ mɔɲui gɛɛɲu oju obonɔu.
45014017	Sabu Ama diinɛ gɔ kakayɔn lee, kijɛ nɔɔɲu lee sɔɔ le digɛla, kaa teitai lee, jamu lee, kinɛ ɛɛlu lee Kikinu Pilu obojɛ gɔ le digɛ.
45014018	Inɛ Kirisito birɛ kɔɔ gin’ birɛjɛ gɔ, Ama kinɛ ahaamɔjɛ, inɛw kanran woi bababadɛin.
45014019	Kɔɔ dɛi, emɛ maini ye kijɛ jamu jɛɛlɛjɛ gɔ lee, tunmɔi kijɛ bariyɛmɔjɛ gɔ lee dɛnɛmɔi.
45014020	Kakayɔn sɔɔ dɛi Ama birɛ birɛjɛ gɔ yamalanɔu. Narain, kakayɔn puu kayi bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ, kaa inɛ wajai kakayɔn hakɛ nɛ kunɔjɛ gɔi kaya ga mɔɲii wɔɔ.
45014021	Kijɛ ɛjui wɔɔ gɔ unwɔ: Nawan tɛnwɛnnɔu, kɔɲɔ nɔɔnɔu, maa kijɛ u bainɛ hakɛ nɛ kunɔjɛ turu kanran kanrannɔu.
45014022	Kijɛ kɔɔbe dɛi bana gawaa u wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔ u lee, Ama lee sɔɔi. Inɛ kijɛ ɛjui ga wo wɔɔ gɔ waaru wo kanranjɛ le kuu unrunmɔ jarugaalɛ gɔ, naran go, Ama wo yabu.
45014023	Kaa, inɛ kijɛ unrun kayajɛ dɛi kinɛ lɛilɛi le wɔɔ gɔ, kijɛ wo kanranjɛ gɔ gagawu le kanraanlɛ dɛi, Ama kuu womɔ nɛ jarugu duduurɔdo. Kijɛ gagawu le digɛnu kanraannɛ gɔ puu hakɛi.
45015001	Emɛ inɛw gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛin gɔbe, inɛw gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛnɛ gɔbe yɛbɛlɛ, emɛ duiyɔun jaain wɔɔ, iyaa kijɛ kinɛ emɛ aajɛ emɛ kanraun jaanla.
45015002	Kaa, emɛ bɔɔnɛ gagawu bariyɛmɔ ga, emɛ tuturu wooi, ɛju womɔ dɛi, kijɛ kinɛ womɔ aajɛ emɛ dɛnɛu jaain wɔɔ.
45015003	Sabu Kirisito kijɛ kinɛ unrunmɔ aajɛ kanranlu. Kaa Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Ui duyɔnw duyɔ gɔ kuu ma nɛ sugu.”
45015004	Emaa muyɔn lee, kinɛ kaalu lee Ama Dɔn emi obojɛ gɔ le digɛnu, diyɛdɔn bɛɛ ga, kijɛ Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gɔ emi deere ga tɔŋi.
45015005	Ebaa, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, iyaa wo Ba gɔi tunmɔ le mii turu le sɔmɔ ga, Ama, muyɔn lee, kinɛ kaalu lee obonɛ gɔ, e wooi tunmɔ le, Kirisito Yesu bana kanrun gɔ digi ye, ajubu turu le e biyɛmɔ.
45015007	Bana Kirisito ei sɛguru gin’, e kanran, Ama boi sɔmɔ ga tunmɔi sɛgɛrɛi.
45015008	Nɛɛ, kijɛ mu gi: Yahutunw tirɛ anranw gɔbe le pui kuni gɔ kibemu gɔ le digɛnu, Amai sɔɔ turu baŋai tagara ga, Kirisito, Yahutunw birɛbirɛnɛi biyaabe.
45015009	Iyaa Ama amasɔgɔjugɔ gɔ dɛi inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe Ama boi sɔmɔ ga, Kirisito, Yahutunw birɛbirɛnɛi biyaabe, bana Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Kɔɔ dɛi tɔgube logoro nɛ mu boi uwɔ sɔsɔmɔdɔn, boi uwɔ sɔmu nii niniidɔn.”
45015010	Ama Dɔn nɛ bana iyaa lee tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “E tɔgu gɔbe, Ama tɔgu inɛw gɔ le bari ye kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi.”
45015011	Iyaa lee tɔŋaaɲu: “E tɔgu gɔbe puu, Inɛw Baŋa Ama boi sɔmɔi. E tɔgu wooi, boi womɔ sɔmɔi.”
45015012	Iyaa Esayi dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa: “Jɛse tiruwɛnɛ wɛwɛɛdo. Wo tɔgu gɔbei laamu kanran ga ihiŋɛrɛndo. Be diyɛ bemɛ wo le dadaanadɛin.”
45015013	Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le diyɛdɔn ebe gɔ bariyɛnu biyɛ ga, Ama diyɛdɔn obonɛ gɔ, kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ lee, jamu diyɛ lee, gagawu wo nɛ bojaa e sɛɛ gɔ le digɛu, e nɛ joonɔ.
45015014	Ba unrunw mabe, ebaa ɛhɛju le jowaa wɔi ga, ebaa jugɔ le jowaa wɔi ga, iyaa ebaa tunmɔ tinwinrun bɛbɛɛjɛi ga, mu kai e dɛi diyɛ daanu le wɔun.
45015015	Kaa lɛtɛrɛ ma nɛ sɔɔ gamuu, liyɛ sɛlɛ le, kijɛ gamuu e igu ei naŋaranmɔ ga, daii sɔwaabɔn. Maa inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnɛi biyɛ ga, Ama mu bɛrɛ nɛɛma obu gɔ dɛi, mu liyɛ sɛlɛ le daii sɔwaabɔn. Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe sadaga Ama kinɛ aajɛ gin’ ɛjui biyɛ ga, bei Kikinu Pilu Ama dɛi inɛw dɛiin bojaajɛi biyɛ ga, mu, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ gin’, Kibɛru Ɛju Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ waaju tagauwɔn.
45015017	Kɔɔ dɛi, Kirisito Yesu nɛ tonu, Ama birɛ mu birɛjɛ gɔ nɛ mu kuu ulo le wɔun.
45015018	Inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bemaa Ama le yaba ga, Kirisito mu le digɛu birɛ biru gɔi laa ye, mu kijɛ waja sɔɔ sɔɔun kara sɛlɔn. Sɔɔ mu sɔɔjɛ gɔbe lee, birɛ mu birɛjɛ gɔbe lee digɛu,
45015019	sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛnbe lee, yarabirɛ lee gɔnrɔn le digɛu, iyaa Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le digɛu Kirisito wogɔ kanraanbe. Kɔɔ gin’ Jerusalɛmu ana nɛ gowaa, ana mu yoi gɔbe puu le digɛu, Iliri gana nɛ yai dɔɔ, mu Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ yalu wooi nɛ tagaabɔn.
45015020	Mu Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ, yalu Kirisito sɔɔ be sɔɔu ɛgɛnɛ gɔbe nɛ sai taga ga kijɛ mu dɛnɛbe gɔ kɔɔ woi bee. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ waja ginrun bɔlɔtei kuu nɛ mu ginrun ujɔu wɔlɔn.
45015021	Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛw bɛrɛ kibɛru womɔ taganɛ gɔbe, woi ihiyedɛin. Iyaa inɛw sɔɔ womɔ be sɔɔu ɛgɛnɛ gɔbe, paamu kakanrandɛin.”
45015022	E bɛrɛ yaa ga waaru joo kijɛ mui tɛŋɛbe gɔ kɔɔ woi.
45015023	Kaa kanɛ yalu mu wɔɔ ɔnbe nɛ, birɛ mu birɛun jaan gɔbe biraa kilaaun. Iyaa, ei yɛnɛi yaa ga anranguju joo daariyaabɔn dɛi,
45015024	mu kanɛ e bɛrɛ yai bɛbɛɛgɔn ga ajubaa wɔun. Mu Ɛsupaɲu yaa ga waaru oju mu too le, ei yɛnɛnu galu ibɛɛ wɔun. Waaru daaru ebe mu gowaajɛ, ebaa mui niinɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
45015025	Kaa kanɛ Ama inɛwin bara ga Jerusalɛmu yaajɔn.
45015026	Sabu, Maseduanɛ gana lee, Akayi gana lee jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, Ama inɛw Jerusalɛmu nɛ dɛgu le wɔin gɔbe dɛi kɛɛlɛ mɔɔnɔ ga kinɛ bemɛ aabe.
45015027	Wogɔ kanran ga kuu bemɛ diŋɛ le be aaru. Kaa, naran go dɛgugunw kɔɔbei be baraun jaain bee. Sabu Yahutunw jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, kikinu sibɛ go kijɛ ɛju Ama be bɛrɛ obu gɔbe, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe le gamalaabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe kanran, goju kai sibɛ go kijɛ ɛju Ama be bɛrɛ obu gɔbe Yahutunw jaŋu unrunw gɔbe bɛrɛ be oboun jaain wɔɔ.
45015028	Waaru sɔɔ kɔɔ kilɛmaa mu biyaajɛ, iyaa waaru kɛɛlɛ mɔɔni gɔ be bɛrɛ obaa mu biyaajɛ, Ɛsupaɲu yaagu ma le e bɛrɛ wawaŋadɔn.
45015029	Waaru e bɛrɛ mu wɛɛido, mu e le Kirisito duba diyɛ gɔ gagamaladɔn.
45015030	Ba unrunw, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le digɛu, iyaa Ama Kikinu ihibɛ emɛ bɛrɛ obu gɔ digɛu, e mu le bari ye mu dɛi ɛjii maini Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛin.
45015031	Judea gana nɛ inɛw gawanɛ gɔbe numɔ nɛ maa ɛli goo ga, iyaa Jerusalɛmu nɛ Ama inɛw wɔin gɔbe, baru be bɛrɛ mu jɛɛlɛjɛ gɔ kinɛ ɛɛlu le yaba ga, mu dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
45015032	Kɔɔ gin’, Ama yabaajɛ ye, mu kinɛ ɛɛlu le e bɛrɛ dɔdɔɔdɔn, e le wɔnu deeliye bɛbɛɛdɔn.
45015033	Ama jamu obonɛ gɔ, e wooi le biyɛ. Amina.
45016001	Mu emɛ saa Pebe inɛ ɛjui ga e bɛrɛ jugɔmu ibɛɛ wɔun. Wo Sankere Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ birɛ birɛuwɔ.
45016002	Woi Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi, bana Ama inɛw tunmɔi be sɛgɛrɛun jaan gin’ woi sɛgɛrɛi. E le kai wo sɛɛ wooi nɛ woi barai. Wo inɛw jooi ɛjii baraabe, mui kanran ɛjii baraabe.
45016003	Kirisito Yesu birɛ nɛ mu bɔɔnw Pirisilu lee, Akilasu leei poonɔi.
45016004	Be mui yaba ga kinrun bemɛ pajaa nɛwɛnnɛ. Mu bei birɛ poo tagauwɔn. Mu sai laa, kaa Ama inɛw mɔɔnu Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe yaa bei birɛpoo ɛjii tagauwɔin.
45016005	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, ginrun bemɛ nɛ wɔɔ gɔi poonɔi. Mu anrunge Epayinɛte, Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ, ainɛ laa tubu yoi gɔi poonɔi.
45016006	Marii poonɔi, wo e dɛi birɛ ɛjii biraabe.
45016007	Andoronikusu lee, Juniasu leei ɛjii poonɔi. Be kanran mu ba unrunwin, be lee, mu lee tunmɔ go kaju nɛ tobɛin. Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ boi bemɛ ɛjii gowaa wɔɔ. Mu dɛi be laa Kirisito jaŋu unrunwin biin.
45016008	Anpiliatusu, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ bainɛ ibɛ ma gɔi poonɔi.
45016009	Urubɛn, Kirisito birɛ nɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛ gɔ lee, bainɛ ibɛ ma Sutakise leei poonɔi.
45016010	Apɛlɛsui poonɔi, wo Kirisito le bana gawaa wo wɔɔ gɔ daii jugɔmaabe. Arisutobule ginrun gonɔ inɛw gɔbei poonɔi.
45016011	Mu bainɛ Herɔdiɔin poonɔi. Narisise ginrun gonɔ nɛ jaŋu unrunw toin gɔbei poonɔi.
45016012	Tiripɛnɛ lee, Tiripose lee, Inɛw Baŋa birɛ birɛuwɔin gɔbei poonɔi. Bainɛ ibɛ ma Pɛrusidei poonɔi, wo Inɛw Baŋa dɛi saii birɛ biraabe.
45016013	Rupusu, Inɛw Baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ ɛju kɔɔi poonɔi. Wo nai poonɔi, wo mui aini womɔ gin’ lugoube.
45016014	Asinkirite lee, Pelegɔn lee, Hɛrumɛsu lee, Patorobasu lee, Hɛrumasu lee, iyaa ba unrunw wajunw be le wɔin gɔbe leei poonɔi.
45016015	Pilolɔge lee, Juli lee, Nɛrɛ lee, wo saa lee, Olinpasu lee, Ama inɛw be le wɔin gɔbe leei poonɔi.
45016016	Ama inɛw gin’ ihibɛ le tunmɔi poonɔi. Kirisito Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe puu ei poonɔuwɔin.
45016017	Inɛw mii kabu kunɔw gɔbe, deeru e dei gɔ le inɛw jiiru ye jaŋu unrunwin lelemɔw gɔbe, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, ba unrunw, e be dɛi kuu ebe kajubai, genɛ bemɛ nɛ dɔrɔ gooi.
45016018	Sabu, inɛw kɔɔbe tunmɔ, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Kirisito birɛi birɛɛnɛ, kaa kijɛ be kayaun jaan lee, jaanla leei sai ajubauwɔin. Be sɔɔ ɛɛlu sɔi bemɛ lee, inɛwin sɔmu bemɛ lee le, inɛw jugɔ sɛnɛ gɔbe hakilɛ koi lelemɔɲu.
45016019	Inɛw puu bana Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ le yabaa e wɔɔ gɔi igii wɔin. Kɔɔ dɛi mu e le kinɛ ɛɛlu le wɔun. Kaa, mu ebaa kijɛ ɛju kanrun nɛ inɛw hakilɛgunwin biyɛ ga, mɔɲu kanrun nɛ inɛw sɔɔ inɛɛbei biyɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
45016020	Ama, jamu obonɛ gɔ, bɛrii Setanui kubɔ ebe doɲu nɛ pɔpɔjugɔdo. Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
45016021	Timɔte, birɛbirɛnɛ mu bɔɔnɛ gɔ ei poonɔuwɔ. Mu ba unrunw Lusiusu lee, Jasɔn lee, Sosipatɛru lee kanran ei poonɔuwɔin.
45016022	Iyaa mu Tɛrutiusu, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn Pɔlu mu bɛrɛ tɔɔraa tɔŋɔnɛ gɔ, mu Inɛw Baŋa nɛ ei poonɔuwɔn.
45016023	Ginrun sugo ma baŋa Gayisu, inɛ ginrun nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ puu mɔrinyɛnjɛ gɔ, wo ei poonɔuwɔ. Erasute, ana gɔ kɛɛlɛ gɛliyɛnɛ gɔ lee, emɛ bainɛ Karutusu lee ei poonɔuwɔin. [
45016024	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e wooi le biyɛ. Amina.]
45016025	Emɛ Amai sɔmɔmɔi. Kibɛru Ɛju mu tagajɛ gɔ, Yesu Kirisito sɔɔ waaju gɔ lee, iyaa, sɔɔ boŋurun pɔɔlɔ baa baŋabe gɔ emi kanɛ jugɔmaaɲu gɔ lee sɔɔ le kɛukɛu, Ama gagawu nɛ ei ɛɛn go iŋiyɛnmɔu gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
45016026	Kaa, inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa too gɔ le digɛu kanɛ sɔɔ boŋurun wogɔ tagaraaɲu. Inɛw wooi Ama le gawa ga, iyaa sɔɔ womɔ yaba ga, Ama asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ kijɛ tɔɔru gɔ le digɛu, tɔgu wooi bɛrɛ sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ jugɔmaaɲu.
45016027	Ama wo turu sai hakilɛ baŋai gɔ, Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu boi sɔmu gɔ womɔi biyɛmɔ, asuu nasuu. Amina.
46001001	Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ womɔ le mui boonaa, Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui bojaajɛ gɔ, mu lee, emɛ bainɛ Sɔsutɛnɛ lee,
46001002	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ wɔɔ gɔ bɛrɛ, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔin. Yalu yago nɛi kanran, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito, emɛ Baŋa gɔ lee, be Baŋa gɔ lee boi boonw gɔbe wooi le bariyaa, Ama, Kirisito Yesu nɛ ei dɛiin bojaa, inɛw unrunmɔi bojodo ga, e inɛw boonaaɲu gɔbe, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔin.
46001003	Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
46001004	Ama ma, Kirisito Yesu nɛ e bɛrɛ nɛɛma bana wo kanrun gɔ dɛi, mu waaru wooi e dɛi woi birɛpoo tagauwɔn.
46001005	Kirisito dɛi, Ama kijɛ puu numɔ ebe nɛ joonaa, e, Ama sɔɔ sɔi sin obu puu lee, Ama sɔɔ jugu sin obu puu lee yasɛi.
46001006	Naran go, Kirisito dɛi e bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛ goin gɔ, sɔɔ wogɔ logoro ebe nɛ paŋa biyaajɛ.
46001007	Nɛɛ kai, Ama sin obu e bɛɛlu turu kanran wɔlɔ. E kunrin Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito unruin wo tagaraido gɔ kinɛ ɔgu le dɔmiyaan wɔi.
46001008	Dumɔ gɔ baa, ebaa numɔlu go gain gain iŋiyɛn ga, ei gɛliyɛnɛ gɔ yaa Kirisito woi. Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito bai wɛɛido gɔ le, ebaa jarugusɛlɛ le biyɛ ga, Ama, dumɔ gɔ baa ei gɛgɛliyɛdo.
46001009	Wo sɔɔ turu baŋai. Naran go, Aini unrunmɔ, Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ le ebaa bɔɔi biyɛ ga Ama ei boonɔnɛ gɔ, wo sɔɔ turu baŋai.
46001010	Ba unrunw, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito boi dɛi mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, e puu sɔɔ ebe turu biyɛmɔi. Logoro ebe nɛ mii kabu biyɛmɔnɔugi. Kaa, kinɛ ajubu turu, dadaaru turu le biyaajɛi ye, ɛjii mii turu biyɛi.
46001011	Ba unrunw mabe, logoro ebe nɛ jiiru ɛjii yato ga, Kulowe ginrun bɛɛnw gamuu, mu bɛrɛ tagaabɛin.
46001012	Kijɛ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: E tuturu puu, gamuu unrunbe Pɔlui dimɛi gɛɛjɛi, gamuu Apɔlɔsui dimɛi gɛɛjɛi, gamuu Piɛrui dimɛi gɛɛjɛi, gamuu iyaa, Kirisitoi dimɛi gɛɛjɛi.
46001013	Kɔɔi ye Kirisito gɔi gamalaa, dɛin dɛin bojaaɲu ma? E dɛi, mu Pɔlui baga jai nɛ pɛgaabɛin ma? Maa mu Pɔlu boi le ei batise kuni ma?
46001014	Logoro ebe nɛ Kirisupusu lee, Gayisu lee laa ye, mu inɛ turu kanran batise kunɔlun. Wogɔ digɛu, Ama birɛpoo.
46001015	Kunrin, inɛ turu kanran ebaa boi ma le batise yoi gɛɛ bɛɛidolo.
46001016	Narain, mu Sutepanasu ginrun bɛɛnw gɔi yaa batise kunaabɔn. Inɛw kɔɔbei laa ye, inɛw waja batise kunaabɔn ma inɔn.
46001017	Inɛwin batise kunɔ ga Kirisito wogɔ dɛi mui yɛmaa tiilu. Kaa, maa Kibɛru Ɛju waaju kanran dɛi mui tii. Kaa, Kirisito baga jai sɔɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn too gɔ gailiyɛmɔnɔu dɛi, mu waaju gɔ, inɛw hakilɛ jugɔ sɔɔ le tagauwɔlɔn.
46001018	Kirisito, baga jai nɛ wo yinwun sɔɔ gɔ, inɛw suiyoidɛin bɛrɛ wogɔ bomɔ sɔɔi. Kaa emɛ inɛw yayabu oju nɛ yaauwɔin bɛrɛ, wogɔ Ama gɔnrɔin.
46001019	Kodɛi Ama Dɔn nɛ Ama kijɛ gi: “Mu hakilɛgunw hakilɛ gɔ niwɛn sɛlɛ bojodɔn. Jugɔ jugɔnw jugɔ gɔ, kijɛ kanmai laa bojodɔn.”
46001020	Nɛɛ hakilɛginɛ yago wɔɔ? Jaŋudeerenɛ diyɛ yago wɔɔ? Maa, aduna ɔn jiiru kunɔnɛ yago wɔɔ? Aduna ɔn hakilɛ gɔ bomɔ sɔɔi ga Ama tagaralu ma?
46001021	Yɛnɛi, Ama hakilɛ, aduna nɛ unruin taguru gɔ, aduna kuu womɔ hakilɛ le, Ama hakilɛ wogɔi yɛnaa, kole Amai jugaa bɛɛlu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, bomɔ waaju emɛ tagajɛ ɔn le inɛw gawaaɲu gɔbei yaba ga, Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii biyaai.
46001022	Yahutunw, sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛin digɛin. Tɔgu wajunw, hakilɛi dɛnɛɲu.
46001023	Emɛ kai, Kirisitoi baga jai nɛ pɛgaabɛin sɔɔi waaju kanranɲu. Wogɔ Yahutunw sibɛ nɛ kinɛ yanwan sɔɔi. Tɔgu wajunw sibɛ nɛ bomɔ sɔɔi.
46001024	Kaa inɛw Ama boonaajɛ gɔbe, Yahutunwin sɛlɛ, tɔgu wajabei sɛlɛ, be bɛrɛ, Kirisito Ama gɔnrɔin, Ama hakilɛi.
46001025	Sabu, Ama sibɛ go bomɔi gin’ kijɛ wɔɔ gɔ, aduna hakilɛ dɛi sigɛ hakilɛ sɛɛ. Iyaa, Ama sibɛ go yɛbɛlɛi gin’ kijɛ wɔɔ gɔ, aduna paŋa dɛi sigɛ paŋa sɛɛ.
46001026	Ba unrunw, e inɛw Ama ei boonu gɔbe, kuu ebe sɔɔ ajubu yɛnɛi: Logoro ebe nɛ inɛw sibɛ go hakilɛgunw joo tolo, inɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ joo tolo, inɛ diyɛ joo tolo.
46001027	Kaa aduna ɔn nɛ bomɔi ga kijɛ lugoɲu gɔbe, Ama, kijɛ wogɔbe yɛmaa, hakilɛgunw bɛrɛ kole dɔgɔ iyemu. Iyaa aduna ɔn nɛ kijɛ yɛbɛlɛi ga lugoɲu gɔbe, Ama kijɛ wogɔbe yɛmaa, paŋa sɛnw gɔbe bɛrɛ kole dɔgɔ iyemu.
46001028	Aduna ɔn kijɛ koolo gɔbe, kijɛ lugoun baalu, kijɛ kanmai laa wɔin gɔbe, Ama, kijɛ wogɔbe yɛmaa, kijɛ diyɛi ga wɔin gɔbei, kijɛi laa kole boju.
46001029	Kunrin, Ama giru nɛ inɛ turu kanran kuu unrunmɔ unɔ bɛɛlɛ.
46001030	Nɛɛ e kai, Ama ei Kirisito Yesu le mɔɔnaajɛ. Wo Kirisito Yesui, hakilɛ emɛ gɔ woi boju. Ama giru nɛ, emɛ Kirisito dɛi teitai wɔin, wo dɛi Ama emi dɛiin bojaa sɛɛ, wo dɛi hakɛ nɛ emi gowaa, iyaa emɛ kuu goonu biyaaɲu.
46001031	Nɛɛ Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa wɔɔ gin’: “Inɛ aai kanran, kuu womɔ uhunɔdo ye, Inɛw Baŋa kijɛ kanrun dɛi kuu womɔ unɔ.”
46002001	Mu kai, ba unrunw, Ama sɔɔ boŋurun e bɛrɛ waaru tagai mu wɛi le, mu sɔɔ sigɛ le ma, jaŋu diyɛ sɔɔ le ma wɛɛlun.
46002002	Logoro ebe nɛ waaru mu tobe le, Yesu Kirisito sɔɔi laa ye, sigɛ le baga jai nɛ wo yinwun sɔɔi laa ye, mu kijɛ waja sɔɔ sɔɔ ga dɛnɛlun.
46002003	Wogɔ digɛu, logoro ebe nɛ tou, mu yɛbɛlɛ le bɔun, liliyɛ le bɔun, goju kinwun diyɛ le bɔun.
46002004	Inɛw, hakilɛ bemɛ le sɔɔ yegeraa ye, ɛjii sɔɔɲu gin’ sɔɔ ma nɛ lee, waaju ma nɛ lee, mu wogɔ gin’ e le sɔɔlun. Kaa Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn bana iyemɔido gin’ e le sɔwaabɔn.
46002005	Gagawu ebe bɔlɔtei gɔ, inɛw hakilɛ sɔɔ nɛ biyɛnɔu, kaa Ama gɔnrɔn kuu nɛ biyɛ ga, mu kɔɔ gin’ sɔwaabɔn.
46002006	Kokanran, emɛ gagawu sibɛ go inɛw giru yaa wɔin bɛrɛ hakilɛ too waaju kakanranɲu. Kaa hakilɛ wogɔ, aduna ɔn hakilɛ sɔɔi laa. Aduna ɔn kuu bɛɛnw hakilɛ sɔɔi kanran laa. Gɔnrɔn bemɛ gɔ puu susuiyodo.
46002007	Hakilɛ sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ, wogɔ Ama hakilɛ sɔɔi. Inɛw bɛrɛ wogɔ kijɛ baŋiyaan wɔɔi. Kaa aduna maŋamɔ nɛ baa, emaa Ama dooro le biyɛ ga, Ama hakilɛ wo yɛmu gɔ woi.
46002008	Aduna ɔn kuu bɛɛnnɛ turu kanran hakilɛ wogɔ inɛɛ. Be hakilɛ wogɔ jugaabɛin ye, dooro baŋa gɔi baga jai nɛ pɛgɛbenɛ.
46002009	Yɛnɛi, Ama Dɔn nɛ kijɛ tɔŋɔ unwɔ: “Giri kijɛ iyetɛlu gɔ, suguru kijɛ ɛgɛtɛlu gɔ, inɛ ajubu nɛ kijɛ dɔɔtɛlu gɔ, kijɛ wogɔbe, Ama, inɛw woi ibɛɛ wɔin dɛi yegeraa sɛɛ.”
46002010	Kaa emɛ bɛrɛ, Ama, Kikinu unrunmɔ le digɛu kijɛ kɔɔbe tagaraajɛ. Kikinu gɔ kijɛ puu lubo yɛyɛnɛjɛ, kijɛ puu igii wɔɔ. Halu Ama ajubu too gɔbe igii wɔɔ.
46002011	Adama ii ajubu jugɔnɛ gɔ aai? Kikinu womɔi laa ye yɔɔ ma? Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, Ama sibɛ go yaa, Ama Kikinui laa ye, Ama ajubu jugɔnɛ wɔlɔ.
46002012	Nɛɛ emɛ, Kikinu emɛ bɛi gɔ, aduna ɔn kikinui laa. Kaa Kikinu emɛ sɛɛ gɔ Ama bɛrɛ goi. Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ sin wo kanrun puu emaa jugɔ bɛɛ ga, Kikinu womɔ emɛ bɛrɛ tii.
46002013	Wogɔ digɛu, sɔɔ kɔɔbe kuu nɛ waaru sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ, sɔɔ emɛ gɔ Adama ii jaŋu hakilɛ sɔɔi laa. Kaa Ama Kikinu emɛ bɛrɛ bana deerejɛ gin’ sɔɔɲu. Inɛw Ama Kikinu sɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ deeru obonu, Kikinu sɔɔ obojɛ jeɲaa ye, kole be le sɔɔɲu.
46002014	Inɛ Ama Kikinu sɛlɛ gɔ, Kikinu sɔɔ le yabu bɛɛlɛ. Wo sibɛ nɛ wogɔ bomɔ sɔɔi. Iyaa, sɔɔ wogɔbe Kikinu le digɛnu kabu kunu bɛɛmɔjɛ digɛu, wo wogɔbe jugɔ bɛɛlɛ.
46002015	Kaa Ama Kikinu inɛ woi teeremɔjɛ gɔ, wo kijɛ puu kabu kunu bɛbɛɛjɛ. Kaa inɛw wajunw sɔɔ womɔ gɔ paamu kanrun bɛɛnɛ.
46002016	Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Inɛ aa Inɛw Baŋa Ama ajubu gɔbe igii wɔɔ ma? Inɛ aa woi tinwinrun bɛɛjɛ ma?” Kaa, emɛ kai, Kirisito ajubu sɛɛ gɔ woi sɛin.
46003001	Naran go, ba unrunw, Ama Kikinu inɛw bei teeremɔjɛ gin’ mu kunrin e le sɔɔ sɔwaa bɛɛlun. Kaa gojunawan bemɛ diŋɛ le inɛw wɔin gin’ mu e le sɔɔ sɔwaabɔn. Kirisito oju nɛ ei unrunw dagunwin gin’ e le sɔɔ sɔwaabɔn.
46003002	E jaa gunu gɔnrɔnbelei digɛu, mu wogɔ e bɛrɛ obolun. Kaa e bɛrɛ irui obun. Halu, kanɛ kanran e jaa gunu tariyɛɛlɛi.
46003003	E gojunawan diŋɛ le yaauwɔi gɔ digɛu, jaa gunu tariyɛɛlɛi. Ele lee, jai lee, logoro ebe nɛ yɔɔ biyaai ye, e gojunawan ebe diŋɛ le yaauwɔi ga tagarauwɔlɔi ma?
46003004	Logoro ebe nɛ inɛw gamuu unrunbei Pɔlu jaŋu unrunwin, inɛw wajunw unrunbei Apɔlɔsu jaŋu unrunwin gɛɛɲu ye, kɔɔ Adama unrunw peere sɔɔ kanrain laa ma?
46003005	Apɔlɔsu aai? Pɔlu aai? Emɛ le digɛu e gagawu oju nɛ wɛii laa ye, emɛ Ama birɛbirɛnw peerei. Emɛ tuturu puu Inɛw Baŋa, emɛ bɛrɛ birɛ gɔ bana obu gin’, inɛ kanma puu yinbiraabe.
46003006	Minɛ gɔ nɛ tiun ii gɔ mu tɔi. Apɔlɔsu dii kunu. Kaa Ama, tiun gɔ wo tɛiyɛmu.
46003007	Kunrin Ama, tiun tɛiyɛmɔnɛ gɔi laa ye, inɛ tɔɔnɛ gɔ lee, dii kunɔnɛ gɔ lee, emɛ kijɛ kanmai laain.
46003008	Inɛ tɔɔnɛ gɔ lee, dii kunɔnɛ gɔ lee, be lɛi kɛkɛu. Ama, be lɛi kɛu bɛrɛ birɛ bemɛ bana wɔɔ gin’ tutujɔdo.
46003009	Ama birɛ nɛ, Apɔlɔsu emɛ lɛi tunmɔ le birɛbirɛnw bɔɔi. Ei Ama minɛi. Iyaa ei Ama ginrun ujɔu wɔɔi.
46003010	Ama mu bɛrɛ nɛɛma wo obu le kɛukɛu, ginrun ujɔnɛ ɛju bana kanranjɛ gin’, ginrun bɔlɔtei gɔ mu daanu. Kanɛ inɛ waja bɔlɔtei wogɔ kuu nɛ ujɔuwɔ. Kaa inɛ tuturu puu ginrun gɔ bana wo ujɔjɛ kajubaun jaain wɔɔ.
46003011	Bɔlɔtei daani gɔ, wogɔ Yesu Kirisito woi. Inɛ turu kanran bɔlɔtei wogɔi laa ye, waja daanu bɛɛidolo.
46003012	Bɔlɔtei gɔ kuu nɛ, inɛ, kange le ujɔjɛ ma, sarudu le ujɔjɛ ma, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ le ujɔjɛ ma, baga le ujɔjɛ ma, belu le ujɔjɛ ma, keru le ujɔjɛ ma,
46003013	inɛ tuturu birɛ gɔ tatagaradɛin. Saliyɛ bai gɔ le, inɛ tuturu puu, birɛ bana wo biru yaun le jujugɔmɔdɛin. Inɛ tuturu puu birɛ yani wɔɔ ma, yaun le suburu yɛnɛdɛin.
46003014	Bɔlɔtei gɔ kuu nɛ birɛ u biru gɔ, yaun le subɔraa be yɛnaa, yaun gɔ tatariyɛjɛ ye, baŋa tujɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
46003015	Kaa birɛ gɔ yaun tariyɛɛlɛ, tɛgaajɛ ye, baŋa tujɔ bɛɛidolo. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, yaun kɛjaa wo taŋu gin’ wo bɛrɛ biyɛdo laa ye, woi yayabadɛin.
46003016	Ama ginrun gɔ, wogɔ ei ga, iyaa, Ama Kikinu gɔ kinɛ ebe nɛ yadaan ga e inin ma?
46003017	Inɛ aai kanran, Ama ginrun yamalaajɛ ye, Ama yaa inɛ wogɔ baŋai yayamalado. Sabu Ama ginrun, ginrun Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔi. Ama ginrun wogɔ ei.
46003018	Inɛ turu kanran kuu womɔ lelemɔnɔu. Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu, unrun aduna ɔn sibɛ go hakilɛ yasɛ ga wɔɔ ye, baŋa bomɔginɛi taŋaa ye, hakilɛ tɔitɔi gɔ wo bɛɛjɛ ire.
46003019	Aduna ɔn hakilɛ gɔ, Ama sibɛ nɛ bomɔi. Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Hakilɛgunw sosoŋɔ pɛnrɛn be kunɔjɛ gɔ, Ama, pɛnrɛn wogɔ le bei aajɛ.”
46003020	Yalu waja nɛ yaa Ama Dɔn ɔn gin’ sɔɔjɛ: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama, hakilɛgunw ajubu igii wɔɔ. Ajubu bemɛ kijɛ kanma lugo nɛ tolo ga igii wɔɔ.”
46003021	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, inɛ turu kanran Adama ii peere dɛi kuu womɔ unɔnɔu. Yɛnɛi, kijɛ gɔ puu ebei.
46003022	Pɔlu wee, Apɔlɔsu wee, Piɛru wee, aduna gɔ wee, ɔnmɔ wee, yiun wee, kijɛ kanɛ wɔɔ wee, kijɛ wɛɛido wee, puu ebei.
46003023	Kaa ei kai Kirisito mɔi. Iyaa, Kirisitoi yaa Ama mɔi.
46004001	Kunrin, e emi Kirisito birɛbirɛnw gin’ lugoi. Ama sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraaɲu gin’ emi lugoi.
46004002	Inɛ bɛrɛ birɛ gawaraaɲu gɔ, inɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai biyɛun jaan. Iyaa, birɛ gɔ sɛɛu inɛ birɛ bɛɛjɛi biyɛun jaan. Sigɛ le wo bɛrɛ kijɛ dɔmɔi gɔ kɔɔ woi.
46004003	Mu kai wogɔ sibɛ go ei ma, inɛ wajai ma, mui maraan yɛnaa sɔɔ sɔwaajɛ kanran, mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ diyɛi laa. Mu kuu ma le kanran, saliyɛ ma kireelɔn.
46004004	Kinɛ ma kijɛ turu dɛi kanran mui jarugaalɛ. Kaa, wogɔ giye mui teitai wɔɔ kanran gɛɛnɛ. Saliyɛ ma kirenɛ gɔ Inɛw Baŋai.
46004005	Wogɔ digɛu, waaru gɔ dɔɔlu wo wɔnu, ɔgiri ye inɛ turu kanran saliyɛ kirenɔugi. Inɛw Baŋa pilemu ye wɛɛido dɔmiyɛin. Wo kijɛ ɔlɔ nɛ baŋiyaan too puu wijɛ nɛ gogoonɔdo. Wo inɛw kinɛ ajubu yaa jujugɔmɔdo. Kunrin, inɛ tuturu puu sɔmu bana wo le dagaa gin’, Ama bɛrɛ bɛbɛɛdo.
46004006	Ba unrunw, kanɛ sɔɔ mu sɔi gɔbe, mu kuu ma lee, Apɔlɔsu kuu nɛ lee, sɔwaabɔn. Wogɔ le e bɛrɛ deeru obodɔn dɛi sɔwaabɔn. Ebaa emɛ le digɛnu paamu kanrun biyaajɛi ye, bana gɛɛɲu gin’ ”Kijɛ tɔŋaa wɔɔ kuu nɛ taŋanɔu” dɛi sɔwaabɔn. Inɛ turu dɛi kanran kuu ulo le bii ye, woi inɛ waja dɛi ire gin’ bojonɔugi.
46004007	Inɛ wajunw dɛi ire aa ui boju? Kijɛ u sɛɛ gɔ puu u bɛrɛ obo le obonɛ ma? Nɛɛ u bɛrɛ ohobin ye, u bɛrɛ obonɛ, kuu uwɔ le bɛiu gin’ kuu uwɔ unɔu u wɔɔ gɔ ingei?
46004008	Kanɛ baa e kai kijɛ e dɛnɛjɛ puu biyaajɛi. Kanɛ baa e ɔgɔ ulaai. Emɛ tolo go kanɛ baa e kai laamu kanrain tɔlaa wɔi. Kaa ebaa ɔgɔwin tɔitɔii biyɛ ga mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Ɔgɔwin tɔitɔi bii ye, emɛ lee, e lee, tunmɔ go laamu kanran ga mu ibɛɛ wɔun.
46004009	Yɛnɛi, emɛ Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, Ama emi onu digɛraa sɛɛ gin’ mu bɛrɛ wɔɔ. Kajugunw yiun be le jaan gin’, Ama emi yinbojaa sɛɛ gin’ mu bɛrɛ wɔɔ. Aduna puu giru nɛ, emi kijɛ yɛnɛɲui biyaai. Mɛlɛnkɛbe bɛrɛ lee, Adama unrunw bɛrɛ lee, emi kijɛ yɛnɛɲui.
46004010	Kirisito dɛi emɛ kai bomɔgunwin biyaain. Kaa e kai Kirisito le digɛu hakilɛgunwin biyaai. Emɛ yɛbɛlɛgunwin. Kaa e paŋa yasɛi. Emɛ baba sɛnɛ. Kaa e baba yasɛi.
46004011	Halu iye wɛɛ dɔɔ ɔɲɛ emi yadigɛ. Emɛ giyɛ le wɔin, dii nɔɔrin le wɔin, duŋu le wɔin, emi lagauwɔin, yalu turu nɛ bɛɛ biyɛɛnɛ.
46004012	Emɛ numɔ emɛ le birɛ biraa ye, soo goonu pana emɛ dɛnɛuwɔin. Inɛw emi duyaaɲu ye, emɛ be dɛi Ama boi booɲu, tɔɔɲaaɲu ye, emɛ mumuyɔnɲu,
46004013	boi emɛ yamalaaɲu ye, emɛ sɔɔ ɛju le be le saaɲu. Halu iye dɔɔ, aduna nɛ kijɛ jumɔti gɔ emi. Kijɛ koolo gɔ emi.
46004014	Ɔn gin’ e bɛrɛ mu tɔŋɔjɛ gɔ, ebaa dɔgɔ iye dɛi tɔŋɔuwɔlɔn. Kaa ei unrunw ibɛ mabei gin’ ei tinwɛnrɛn ga tɔŋɔuwɔn.
46004015	Kirisito oju nɛ ei inɛw teeremɔw, inɛw muɲu pɛlu baa wɔɔ kanran, e ba gɔ turu. E, ba joo sii bɛɛidelei. Kunrin, Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ le digɛu, Kirisito Yesu oju gɔ nɛ ei inɛ narun gɔ mui.
46004016	Wogɔ digɛu, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ mui deewin biyɛi.
46004017	Ebaa mui deewin biyɛ ga, mu Timɔtei e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Woi ii mai gin’ wɔɔ. Mu woi ɛjii ibɛɛ wɔun. Wo Inɛw Baŋa le sɔɔ turu baŋai biyaa wɔɔ. Yalu puu nɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu nɛ bana deeru mu obojɛ le kɛukɛu, wo Kirisito Yesu oju nɛ bana mu yaajɛ, e bɛrɛ nanaŋaranmɔdo.
46004018	Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛw gamuu, maa waja e bɛrɛ wɛɛidolo ga ajubaa, kuu ulo le wɔin.
46004019	Kaa Inɛw Baŋa Ama yabaajɛ ye, mu bɛrii e bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn. Kɔɔ waaru le, inɛw kuu ulogunw kɔɔbe, sɔɔ le sai kuu bemɛ unaa wɔin ma, naran go birɛ birɛuwɔin ma, mu ihiyedɔn.
46004020	Sabu, Ama diinɛ gɔ, sɔɔ sɔi bɛɛ, sɔɔi laa, kaa gɔnrɔn sɔɔi.
46004021	Baga gɛli ye, ei lagai mu wɛɛjɛ e bɛrɛ ire ma, ihibɛ le, jamu kunɔ ye, e bɛrɛ mu wɛɛjɛ ire? Kɔɔ lɛi logoro nɛ e bɛrɛ ire gɔ e yɛmɛjɛ.
46005001	Nɛɛ, logoro ebe nɛ sala sɔɔ yɔɔ ga yalu puu nɛ ɛgɛmɔuwɔ. Sala wogɔ tunmɔ, halu inɛw Ama ininbe logoro nɛ iyemɔɔlɛ. Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu wo ba yaanran le diinyɛnjɛ ga mu ɛgaabɔn.
46005002	Kɔɔ wooi nɛ, e kai kuu ulo le wɔi. Ai, kinɛ jiun diyɛ le bii ye, inɛ wogɔ kanrannɛ gɔi logoro ebe nɛ nana e goonɔu jaain wɔɔ.
46005003	Halu mu goju sibɛ go e le wagee wɔun kanran, kikinu sibɛ go mu e le yɔɔun. Mu logoro ebe nɛ yatoun gin’ biyaa, kanɛ baa Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le inɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu kanrannɛ kɔɔ saliyɛ kiraatun.
46005004	Waaru mɔrinyaan, kikinu sibɛ go e le mu wɔɔ gɔ le, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu gɔnrɔn gɔ e le bibiyɛdo.
46005005	Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido gɔ le kikinu womɔ yabaaɲu biyɛ ga, kanɛ goju womɔ Setanu numɔ nɛ kunu ye wo yamalamɔi.
46005006	Kuu ebe unaa e wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔ jaanla. Bana gɛɛɲu gin’ ”Kijɛ buru pidemu gaila sai, punau lɔɔraaɲu gɔ puu ingelemɔjɛ” ga e inin ma?
46005007	Kijɛ buru pidemu pɛi kɔɔ logoro ebe nɛ goonɔti ye, punau lɔɔru kana, kijɛ pidemu toloi biyɛi. Yɛnɛi, Taŋagalu janwan peju emɛ gɔ sɛnwaantin. Wogɔ Kirisitoi. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, buru pidemu tolo gin’ e yaa naran go ɛjaa wɔi.
46005008	Nɛɛ, kɔɔi biyaa ye, emɛ janwan emɛ kanranmɔi. Kaa kijɛ buru pidemu pɛi gɔ le janwan gɔ kanranmɔnɔugin. Tiyɛ gɔ kinɛ gɛun ma, mɔmɔɲu ma kijɛ buru pidemu gɔ le kanranmɔnɔugin. Kaa janwan gɔ, buru pidemu tolo le kanranmɔi. Wogɔ, kinɛ pilu lee, naran lee bei.
46005009	Giru nɛ e bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ mu tii gɔ nɛ, ebaa inɛw salagunw le mɔrinyɛnnɔu ga mu sɔwaabɔn.
46005010	Kaa mu aduna salagunw puu ma, aduna giru kakalagunw puu ma, kuu numɔ numɔw puu ma, ɔmɔlɔ bulonw puu ma sɔɔi sɔɔlun. Be puu le kabiyɛ gin ye, aduna naa gɔ nɛ e gooun jaain wɔɔ.
46005011	Kaa e bɛrɛ kijɛ mu tɔŋu gɔ, ebaa inɛ turu unruin jaŋu ii gɛɛnu, sala nɛ too ma, giru kakalaginɛi ma, ɔmɔlɔ bulonɛi ma, duyɔ duyɔnɛi ma, kɔɲɔ nɔɔnɛi ma, kuu numɔ numɔnɛi ma biyaai ye, inɛ wogɔ le kabiyɛ gun. Inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ le mɔrin ye, halu jaa kanran kayanɔugi.
46005012	Bain inɛw, inɛw tubu tonɛ, saliyɛ kire ga, wogɔ sɔɔ mai laa. Ama saliyɛ bemɛ kiredo. Kaa inɛw ebe gɔbe, saliyɛ bemɛ e kireun jaanla ma? Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Ama Dɔn bana gɛɛjɛ le kɛukɛu: “Mɔɲu kanrannɛ gɔi logoro ebe nɛ nana goonɔi.”
46006001	Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ turu baŋa, inɛ waja le sɔɔ biyaajɛ ye, wo Ama inɛw pajaatiyaa ye, aduna saliyɛkirenw bɛrɛ yani yai bɛɛjɛ?
46006002	Ama inɛw gɔbe, aduna saliyɛ be kiredo ga e inin ma? Nɛɛ aduna saliyɛ e kiredo biyaai ye, sɔɔ uji giru goonu e bɛɛun jaanla ma?
46006003	Aduna ɔn sɔɔbe saliyɛi laa koi, halu mɛlɛnkɛbe saliyɛ emɛ kiredo ga e inin ma?
46006004	Kaa e tunmɔ le sɔɔ biyaajɛi ye, inɛw, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔɔ be le digɛla bɛrɛ yai ye sɔɔ gɔ giru goonɔmɔjɛi.
46006005	Ei dɔgɔ aa dɛi sɔɔjɔn. Waajibi logoro ebe nɛ, ba unrunw le sɔɔ yegere ga, inɛ turu hakilɛ sɛɛ kai yato.
46006006	Nɛɛ kɔɔi biyaa ye, bainɛ turu, bainɛ wajai dimɛrɛn ye, saliyɛkirenw Ama le gawanɛ bɛrɛ yaaun jaain wɔɔ ma?
46006007	Naran go, tunmɔ le saliyɛ sɔɔ e sɛɛ gɔ dɛi, kanɛ baa ei numaai sɛɛrɛi. Tunmɔ le saliyɛ yoo dɛi, inge dɛi teitai laa e bɛrɛ kanranɲu gɔ muyɔindelei wɔi? Inge dɛi ei pajaa ye punɔmɔidelei ma?
46006008	Kaa wogɔ gin’ kanran dɛi, e ba unrunw bɛrɛ, teitai laa gɔ lee, bei punu birɛ gɔ lee, e birɛjɛ.
46006009	Koi ye, mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe Ama diinɛ kɛn bɛɛidenɛ ga e inin ma? Kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi: Salagunw lee, ɔmɔlɔ bulonw lee, dimudimiyɛnw lee, anranw be tunmɔ dɛnɛw lee,
46006010	gugunyɔnw lee, giru kakalagunw lee, kɔɲɔnɔɔw lee, duyɔ duyɔnw lee, kuu numɔ numɔw lee, inɛw kɔɔbe tunmɔ turu kanran Ama diinɛ kɛn bɛɛidenɛ.
46006011	Logoro ebe nɛ e inɛw gamuu kunrin bei. Kaa hakɛ nɛ ei mɔŋaaɲu, ei dɛiin Ama mɔi bojaaɲu, ei teitai bojaaɲu. Kɔɔbe puu Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito boi le, iyaa, Ama emɛ Kikinu gɔnrɔn le e bɛrɛ kanrin.
46006012	Logoro ebe nɛ inɛw gamuu ɔn gin’ gɛɛɲu: «Mu kijɛ puu kanrun bɛbɛɛjɔn.» Kaa kijɛ puu niwɛn tolo. Maa «Mu kijɛ puu kanrun bɛbɛɛjɔn.» Kaa mu kijɛ turu kanran gunɔi biyɛ ga yabaidolɔn.
46006013	Inɛw gamuu sɔwaa ye, kayɛrɛ bɛrɛ dɛi wɔɔ, bɛrɛ kayɛrɛ dɛi wɔɔ gɛɛɲu. Kaa kolɛi kɛu puu Ama bei susuyodo. Kaa inɛ goju gɔ, sala dɛi maŋanɛ. Goju, Inɛw Baŋa mɔi. Iyaa Inɛw Baŋa, goju mɔi.
46006014	Ama, Inɛw Baŋai yiun nɛ bulugaa wo goonu gin’, emi yaa kunrin gɔnrɔn unrunmɔ le bubulugodo.
46006015	Goju ebe gɔ, Kirisito goju, digɛ dɛin dɛiin ga e inin ma? Nɛɛ, mu Kirisito goju digɛ gɔ jeɲɛ ye, yaanran dimu le kayanɛ goju digɛi bojodɔn ma? Asuu.
46006016	Koi ye, yaanran dimu le kayanɛ le ainɛ yoojɛ, wo le goju turu taŋajɛ ga e inin ma? Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Be lɛi inɛ turu taŋaɲu.”
46006017	Kaa Inɛw Baŋa le inɛ mɔrinyɛnjɛ gɔ, Inɛw Baŋa le kikinu sibɛ go, turu biyɛjɛ.
46006018	Sala dɛi jɔbɔi. Hakɛ waja turu kanran le, inɛ, goju womɔ lɔgɔjiyɛmɔɔlɛ. Puu, goju womɔ le digɛla. Kaa inɛ kuu unrunmɔ sala nɛ obojɛ gɔ, goju womɔi hakɛ nɛ kunɔjɛ.
46006019	Goju ebe gɔ, Kikinu Pilu ginruin ga e inin ma? Kikinu Pilu e nɛ yato. E woi Ama bɛrɛ bɛii. Kuu ebe ebei laa, kaa Ama, dɔnrun kunaa ei ɛbaajɛ ga e inin ma? Ama dɔnrun tujaa ei ɛbu. Wogɔ digɛu, goju ebe le Amai babai.
46007001	Nɛɛ, lɛtɛrɛ mu bɛrɛ tiyaa, ainɛ yaanran jeɲɛlu go biyɛ ga ɛjii wɔɔ sibɛ go selumu e selumu gɔ dɛi sɔɔ ma unwɔ:
46007002	Sala gabaai dɛi, ainɛ tuturu puu yaanran womɔ siiyɛ, yaanran tuturu puu yaa, igɛ womɔ siiyɛ.
46007003	Yaanran bɛrɛ kijɛ dagaa gɔ, ainɛ wogɔ wo bɛrɛ kanraun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ ainɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ dagaa gɔ, yaanran wogɔ wo bɛrɛ kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
46007004	Yaanran, goju womɔ le kijɛ wo ibɛ kanrun bɛɛlɛ. Goju womɔ wo igɛ mɔi. Kunrin, ainɛ yaa goju womɔ le kijɛ wo ibɛ kanrun bɛɛlɛ. Goju womɔ yaanran womɔ mɔi.
46007005	Tunmɔ le ai gɛɛnɔugi. Tunmɔ le aaraa ye, waaru gaila amagɛɛn nɛ biyɛdeii laa ye, tunmɔ le ai gɛɛnɔugi. Waaru wogɔ galaai ye, tanwanlu go pilemu ye bana ebe jeɲɛi. Kɔɔi laa ye, ei aa gɛliyaa bɛɛlu kanrun ye, Setanu subɔrɔ nɛ yoi ye, nunumɔdei.
46007006	Sɔɔ e bɛrɛ mu sɔɔjɛ gɔ tɔɔrui laa, kaa, inɛ ibɛɛ wɔɔ kanrun bɛbɛɛdo.
46007007	Naran sɔɔ giyaa ye, mu kai inɛw puu mu gin’ biyɛ dɛnɛjɔn. Kaa Ama, inɛ tuturu puu bɛrɛ sin obu womɔ dɛiin obaa yasɛ. Inɛw gamuu sin obu gɔ, bana turu gin’ wɔɔ. Inɛw wajunw mɔ bana waja gin’ wɔɔ.
46007008	Inɛw puru paganɛ lee, yapanuw gɔbe lee, be kai mu gin’ biyaain ye, ɛjii wɔɔ.
46007009	Kaa be kuu bemɛ ai gɛli bɛɛnɛ ye, puru be pagajɛ ire. Dadaaru dɛi ɔɲɔnu biyɛ dɛi, puru paga ire.
46007010	Nɛɛ, inɛw puru pagaa wɔin bɛrɛ kijɛ mu tɔɔrɔjɛ unwɔ: Mui laa, Inɛw Baŋa be bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔjɛ, yaanran, wo igɛ le goonɔu.
46007011	Kaa wo igɛ le gowaai ye, wo, igɛ waja ɛɛnɔu. Maa pilemu ye wo igɛ le sɔɔ yegere. Ainɛ yaa yaanran womɔi pajanɔu.
46007012	Inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ sɔɔ mu sɔɔjɛ unwɔ: Inɛw Baŋai laa, kuu ma le mu sɔɔjɛ, bainɛ turu yaanran jaŋu ii laa yasɛ ye, yaanran gɔ wo le biyɛ ga yayabado ye, woi pajanɔu.
46007013	Iyaa, yaanran, wo igɛ jaŋu ii laa kanran, wo le biyɛ ga yayabado ye, wo le goonɔu.
46007014	Ainɛ jaŋu ii laa gɔ, yaanran womɔ sabu dɛi, Ama le bɛrii wɔɔ. Kunrin yaanran jaŋu ii laa gɔ, wo igɛ sabu dɛi, Ama le bɛrii wɔɔ. Kɔɔi laa ye, unrunw bemɛ gɔ lee, inɛw Ama inin unrunw gɔ lee kɛkɛu gin’ wɔɔ. Kaa naran sɔɔ giyaa ye, unrunw bemɛ gɔ yaa Ama le bɛrii wɔin.
46007015	Kaa, inɛ jaŋu ii laa gɔ, jaŋu ii gɔ le goo ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, kunrin wo kanranmɔ. Wogɔ gin’ biyaa ye, jaŋu ii gɔ, ainɛi ma, yaanrain ma, inɛ jaŋu ii laa gɔ le biyɛ kaara ga wɔlɔ. Ama emaa jamu le biyɛ ga emi boonu.
46007016	U yaanran jaŋu ii, u igɛi yayabadou ma yani jugɔ bɛɛdou? U igɛnɛ jaŋu ii, yaanran uwɔi yayabadou ma, u yaa yani jugɔ bɛɛdou?
46007017	Sɔɔ kɔɔ gowaai ye, inɛ tuturu puu, Inɛw Baŋa u bɛrɛ sin bana kanrun le kɛukɛu biyɛ. Ama ui bana boonu gin’ yabiyɛ. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu bɛrɛ bana mu tɔɔrɔjɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
46007018	Ama ui waaru boonu le, u araa nɔwaanbeu ye, kunrin yabiyɛ. Araa nɔɔlubeu ye, waja araa nɔɔjɛ giye kanrannɔu.
46007019	Araa nɔwaanbeu ma, nɔɔlu ma, kijɛ kanmai laa. Kaa Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛli gɔ, kijɛ lugoɲu gɔ woi.
46007020	Inɛ tuturu puu Ama ui bana boonu gin’ yabiyɛ.
46007021	Gunɔnɛi u wɔu Ama ui boonu ma? Diyɛdai le biyɛnɔu. Kaa gunɔ gooɲu bana biyaajɛu ye, pajanɔu.
46007022	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, gunɔnɛ boonaa, wo le bojaajɛ gɔ, Inɛw Baŋa woi gunɔ goonaati. Kunrin, inɛ gunɔ gowaa wɔɔ Kirisito boonaajɛ gɔ, wo Kirisito gunɔnɛi.
46007023	Ama dɔnrun tujaa ei ɛbu. Wogɔ digɛu, inɛw gunɔwin taŋanɔugi.
46007024	Ba unrunw, Ama waaru ei wo boonu le, bana e bee gin’, inɛ tuturu puu giru womɔ nɛ bana wogɔ le yabiyɛi.
46007025	Inɛw nimɛ puru paganɛ sibɛ go, mu Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ be dɛi tɔɔru dɛiin biyaa sɛlɔn. Kaa Ama amasɔgɔjugɔ dɛi, mu le gawu bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ digɛu, wogɔ sibɛ go kijɛ mu ajubajɛ e bɛrɛ tatagadɔn.
46007026	Kanɛ, waaru nau gɔbe tɔlaatin digɛu, kijɛ mu ajubajɛ unwɔ: Ainɛ bana wo wɔɔ gin’ biyɛ ga wogɔ ire.
46007027	U yaanran yasɛu ma? Woi pajadou giye kanrannɔu. U nimɛ yaanran jeɲɛlu ma? Jejeɲɛdou gɛɛnɔu.
46007028	Kaa yaanran jeɲaajɛu kanran, hakɛi laa. Iyaa, yaanran igɛ ɛɛlu, igɛ ɛyaajɛ ye, wogɔ hakɛi laa. Kaa aduna nɛ waaru be wɔɔ gɔ le, inɛw puru pagaa wɔin, bai puu ɔɲɛ bɛbɛɛɲu. Mu ɔɲɛ wogɔ nɛ ei paabu ibɛɛ wɔun.
46007029	Ba unrunw, sɔɔ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ ɔn woi: Waaru gɔ gaai wajalu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, kanɛ baa inɛw yaanran sɛin gɔbe, yaanran sɛlɛi gin’ biyɛi.
46007030	Inɛw sɔmiyɛn sɔmiyɛunwɔin gɔbe, kanɛ baa kinɛ ebe sɔmiyɛɛnlɛ gin’ biyɛi. Inɛw mɔmu mɔmɔuwɔin gɔbe, kanɛ baa kinɛ ɛɛli sɛlɛi gin’ biyɛi. Inɛw ebu ɛbɛnw gɔbe, kanɛ baa kijɛ kanma sɛlɛi gin’ biyɛi.
46007031	Aduna ɔn sɔɔ nɛ inɛw toin puu, kanɛ baa wogɔ nɛ toloi gin’ biyɛi. Aduna kanɛ bana wo wɔɔ, emɛ iyejɛ ɔn gin’ biyɛidolo. Bɛrii aduna gagalado.
46007032	Ebaa jiire sɛlɛ go biyɛ ga, mu wogɔi dɛnɛjɔn. Inɛ yaanran jeɲɛlu gɔ, waaru wooi Inɛw Baŋa birɛ ajubu le biyɛjɛ. Wo Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju kanrun dɛnɛjɛ.
46007033	Kaa inɛ yaanran sɛɛ, aduna ɔn sɔɔ ahajubajɛ. Wo yaanran womɔ bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju kanrun dɛnɛjɛ.
46007034	Kunrin woi sibɛ lɛi nɛ biɲiyɛnjɛ. Yaanran igɛ kuu nɛ daanla ma, iyaa nimɛ puru pagalu ma, be Inɛw Baŋa kijɛ dɛnɛjɛ ajubu le biyɛɲu. Be kuu bemɛ sɛɛu, Ama bɛrɛ obu dɛnɛɲu. Kaa yaanran igɛ le wɔɔ, aduna ɔn sɔɔ ahajubajɛ. Wo, wo igɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju kanrun dɛnɛjɛ.
46007035	Mu ei bara ibɛɛ wɔun dɛi sɔɔ ɔnbe sɔɔuwɔn. Kuu ebe nɛ tɔɔrui daanauwɔlɔn. Ebaa bana ɛju gɔ nɛ bii ye, Inɛw Baŋa birɛ gɔ nɛ pagiyɛ ga, kijɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ gɔ woi.
46007036	Nɛɛ, inɛ turu dadaaru le ɔɲɔu, yaalai womɔ le aŋai jaan gin’ bii bɛɛlɛ dɛi, woi jɛɛun jaain wɔɔ gi ye, wogɔ gin’ wo kanranmɔ. Wogɔ hakɛi laa. Puru be pagamɔ.
46007037	Kaa inɛ hakilɛ daanu le wɔɔ, kijɛ waja woi damaalɛ, diŋɛ womɔ inɛ sɛɛ, kinɛ womɔ nɛ kɛjaa, yaalai unrunmɔ le aŋai biyɛun jaan gin’ bibiyɛdo gi ye, wo birɛ ɛjui birɛjɛ.
46007038	Kunrin, inɛ yaalai womɔ jeɲɛjɛ gɔ, birɛ ɛjui birɛjɛ. Inɛ jeɲɛɛlɛ gɔ, wogɔ dɛi sigɛ birɛ ɛju birɛjɛ.
46007039	Yaanran puru pagaajɛ, wo igɛ yinwɛindo baa, wo le pagiyaa wɔɔ. Kaa wo igɛ yinwaain ye, wo ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, igɛ waja ɛi bɛbɛɛjɛ. Kaa waajibi, igɛnɛ gɔ jaŋu ii wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
46007040	Kaa, wo igɛ ɛɛlu go bana wo wɔɔ gin’ biyaai ye, kinɛ ɛɛli womɔ wogɔ gaa. Kɔɔ ajubu mai. Kaa mu kanran Ama Kikinu mu nɛ yato ga gawaa wɔun.
46008001	Nɛɛ, ɔmɔlɔ nɛ nawan sɛnwaanɲu sibɛ go, sɔɔ marun yɛnɛmɔi. Narain, “Emɛ puu jugɔ yasin” ga emɛ igii wɔin. Kaa jugɔ wogɔ, kuu ulo le inɛi joonɔjɛ. Kaa ihibɛ, gagawu sibɛ go inɛ waja paŋa babariyɛmɔjɛ.
46008002	Inɛ turu unrun jugɔ yasɛ ga wɔɔ ye, wo nimɛ kanran bana kijɛ jugɔun jaan gin’ jugɔlu.
46008003	Kaa, inɛ Amai ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɔ, Ama wogɔ baŋai igii wɔɔ.
46008004	Nɛɛ, ɔmɔlɔ nɛ nawan sɛnwaanɲu, tɛnwɛun jaain wɔɔ ma, jaanla? Ɔmɔlɔ, aduna nɛ kijɛ nanaai laa ga emɛ puu igii wɔin. Ama koturu sai wɔɔ ga yaa emɛ igii wɔin.
46008005	Halu inɛw gamuu ama tɔgu dɛin dɛin, alagala nɛ lee, minɛ nɛ lee bojaa, ama joo, inɛw baŋabe joo wɔin kanran,
46008006	emɛ kai Ama koturu sai wɔɔ ga jugɔɲu. Wogɔ emɛ Ba gɔ woi. Kijɛ puu wo maŋu. Emɛ wo ga wɔin. Inɛw Baŋa yaa koturu sai wɔɔ. Wogɔ Yesu Kirisitoi. Kijɛ puu wo le maŋi. Emɛ wo dɛi ɔnmɔi wɔin.
46008007	Kaa inɛw puu sɔɔ kɔɔ inin. Inɛw gamuu ɔmɔlɔ sɔɔ le wɛɛjiyaa gabaa, halu iye dɔɔ, nawan kɔɔ tunmɔ tɛnwɛnnu, nawan gɔ ɔmɔlɔ mɔi gin’ be bɛrɛ wɔɔ. Nimɛ kanran, wogɔ sibɛ go kinɛjugɔ bemɛ gɔnrɔn sɛlɛ digɛu, be kinɛ yanwan le biyɛɲu.
46008008	Kaa kayɛrɛ, Ama le emi bɛruniyɛnmɔ bɛɛlɛ. Emɛ, kayɛrɛ kayanɛ kanran, Ama sibɛ nɛ emi kijɛ nɛ gamiyɛnjɛ wɔlɔ. Kayɛrɛ kayaaɲu kanran, Ama sibɛ go emi kijɛ nɛ bariyɛjɛ wɔlɔ.
46008009	Kaa kokanran, kuu kajubu le biyɛi. E bɛrɛ gaju wɔlɔ giye kijɛ e kanranjɛ gɔ le digɛnu, inɛw gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛnɛ gɔbei hakɛ nɛ numɔ yoomɔnɔugi.
46008010	U inɛ jugɔ sɛɛi ga wɔɔ gɔ, ɔmɔlɔ turu ginrun nɛ, jaa u kayau, inɛ kinɛjugɔ nɛ gaai paŋa sɛlɛ turu iyaajɛ ye, wogɔ woi damaa ye ɔmɔlɔ bɛrɛ nawan sɛnwaanɲu tɛnwɛnmɔidolo ma?
46008011	Kunrin, inɛ gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛlɛ kɔɔ, Kirisito bainɛ dɛi yinwun kɔɔ, jugɔ uwɔ dɛi susuiyodo.
46008012	E ba unrunw bɛrɛ kunrin hakɛ kanraun, kinɛjugɔ gɔnrɔn sɛlɛ bemɛ barumau e wɔɔ gɔ, e Kirisito bɛrɛ tee hakɛ kanraunwɔi ga jugɔi.
46008013	Wogɔ digɛu, nawan mu tɛnwɛnjɛ dɛi, mu bainɛi damaa ye hakɛ nɛ kunɔjɛ ye, womaa hakɛ nɛ yoonɔu giye, mu asuu nawan tɛnwɛindolɔn.
46009001	Mu, mu bɛrɛ ɛju gin’ bii bɛɛlɔn ma? Maa mui Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui laa ma? Kɔɔi ye, mu Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesui iyelun ma? Inɛw Baŋa dɛi birɛ mu biru sɛɛrɛ gɔ ei laa ma?
46009002	Halu inɛw gamuu mui jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui laa gin’ lugoɲu kanran, e kai mui jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui lugoun jaan. Inɛw Baŋa nɛ e too gɔ dɛi, mui Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui ga sɛɛrɛ gɔ ei.
46009003	Mui Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui laa ga inɛw sɔɔ sɔɔɲu gɔbe aŋa bana mu saaido unwɔ:
46009004	Birɛ emɛ dɛi, pana lee, dii lee emɛ yabaun dagalu ma?
46009005	Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu wajunw lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu suŋɔw lee, Piɛru lee, bana kanranɲu gin’, emɛ yaa yaanran jaŋu ii jɛɛ ye, emɛ le jɛyai bɛɛnɛ ma?
46009006	Maa birɛ birɛ ye pana kunɔ ga, Barunabasu emɛ lɛi sai le dagaa ma?
46009007	Sɔludasu ii aa, kɔmɔ taa yaa ye kuu unrunmɔ kijɛ le kai unrunmɔ kilɛjɛ? Maa, resɛn tiun yibenɛ womaa, resɛn tiun ii womɔ kayanɔu yɔɔ ma? Maa bɛlugirɛnɛ arusɛgɛ womɔ iru nɔɔnɔu yɔɔ ma?
46009008	Sɔɔ ma Adama unrunw kanran nɛ tee duu womɔ sibaa sɛɛ ma ajubanɔugi. Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ yaa sɔɔ tunmɔ wogɔ woi sɔɔjɛ.
46009009	Mɔise tɔɔru nɛ kijɛ tɔŋɔ unwɔ: “Naa jiŋu dɛnrɛn kiju namaa ye, ii goonɔjɛ aŋa nɛ aŋapɔin e kunɔu jaanla.” Ama, naa dɛi jiire le wɔɔ ga kɔɔ sɔi ma?
46009010	Wo sɔɔ kɔɔ emɛ dɛi sɔɔlu ma? Ee, wo emɛ dɛi sɔi. Inɛ woluwalanɛ gɔ lee, dɛnrɛn laganɛ gɔ lee, be lɛi kɛu, dɛnrɛn kuru bemɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin diyɛdɔn le, birɛ bemɛ birɛun jaan.
46009011	Emɛ, Kikinu sɔɔ logoro ebe nɛ toi gin’ tɔwaabɛin. Nɛɛ, emɛ numɔ ebe kijɛ gamuu gɛlu gin’ gɛlaaɲu ye, wogɔ sɔɔ diyɛi ma?
46009012	Inɛw wajunw numɔ ebe nɛ kijɛ bɛɛuwɔin ye, emɛ, be dɛi sigɛ numɔ ebe nɛ kijɛ bɛɛun dagalu ma? Kaa emɛ le kijɛ jaan gɔ ebaa emɛ bɛrɛ obo kaara emɛ gɛɛnɛ. Emɛ kijɛ puu muyaanbɛin. Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju oju gɔ tɛŋɛnɔu ga, emɛ kijɛ puu muyaanbɛin.
46009013	Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, pana bemɛ Ama ginrun gɔ nɛ yagoojɛ ga e inin ma? Iyaa, sadagadumu nɛ sadaga tɛgɛrɛnw gɔbe, kijɛ tɛgɛrɛɲu gɔ nɛ kuru bemɛ gogoojɛ ga e inin ma?
46009014	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, inɛw Kibɛru Ɛju taganw gɔbe, Kibɛru Ɛju le kaya ga Inɛw Baŋa yintɔɔru.
46009015	Mu kai, kijɛ kɔɔbe turu kanran dɛnɛlun. Iyaa kanɛ wogɔ sɔɔ tɔŋɔuwɔn ye, ebaa wogɔ mu bɛrɛ kanran dɛi laa. Kuu ma unu sɔɔ ɔn inɛ turu wogɔ yamalaati biyɛ dɛi, mu bɛrɛ mu yinwɛnjɛ ire.
46009016	Kibɛru Ɛju tagu gɔ, mu bɛrɛ kuu ma unu sɔɔi laa. Wogɔ mu bɛrɛ waajibi sɔɔi. Kibɛru Ɛju tagalun ye, bɔnrɔn mu le wɔɔ.
46009017	Diŋɛ ma le, birɛ gɔ nɛ mu yoi bee ye, mu wogɔ nɛ tujɔ bɛbɛɛbɔn. Kaa birɛ gɔ mu bɛrɛ sagu duduurin dɛi, birɛ ga mu bɛrɛ waajibi.
46009018	Nɛɛ, wogɔ nɛ tujɔ mu bɛɛjɛ gɔ ingei? Kibɛru Ɛju taganɛ tinɛ bɛɛjɛ gɔ dɛnɛlu go, bamai kɛɛlɛ wɔlɔ go Kibɛru Ɛju tagaa ye kinɛ kaalu mu bɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ tujɔ ma gɔ woi.
46009019	Mu inɛ turu kanran gunɔ nɛ toloun. Kaa inɛw joo bɛɛ dɛi, mu mui inɛw puu gunɔnɛi bojaa wɔun.
46009020	Yahutunw gɔbe logoro nɛ, bei bɛɛ ga, mu mui Yahutunɛi gin’ bojojɔn. Halu Mɔise tɔɔru kuu ma nɛ gɔnrɔn sɛlɛ kanran, inɛw Mɔise tɔɔru le yaaɲu logoro nɛ yowaai ye, bei bɛɛ ga mu Mɔise tɔɔru le yaauwɔn gin’ biyɛjɔn.
46009021	Iyaa, inɛw Mɔise tɔɔru inin logoro nɛ yowaaun ye, bei bɛɛ ga, be gin’ Tɔɔru wogɔ kuu ma nɛ wɔlɔ gin’ biyɛjɔn. Kaa kɔɔ dɛi giye, Ama tɔɔru le yabalun gin’ wɔlɔn. Waajibi Kirisito tɔɔru kuu ma nɛ yadaan.
46009022	Inɛw gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛnɛ gɔbei bɛɛ ga, mu yaa gagawu nɛ paŋa sɛlɛ gin’ biyɛjɔn. Kunrin, yani biyaai kanran, inɛw gamuui yabu bɛɛ ga, mu mui inɛw puu bɛrɛ kijɛ puui bojojɔn.
46009023	Kɔɔbe puu mu Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ dɛi kanranjɔn. Kibɛru Ɛju tinɛ gɔ nɛ kuru ma bɛɛ ga kanranjɔn.
46009024	Tunmɔ galu jobu nɛ, inɛw gɔ puu jobu jɔjɔbɔɲu. Kaa inɛ turu sai giru galaai ye tujɔ gɔ bɛɛjɛ ga e inin ma? Tujɔ gɔ bana e bɛɛido gin’ jobu gɔ yinjɔbɔi.
46009025	Jobu jɔbɔnw puu, jobu gɔ bɛɛ ga dadaaru joo nɛ kuu unrunbemɛ ɛjii ahaaɲu. Aduna ɔn domɔ tanwaanlɛ gɔ bɛɛdɛin ga, be kɔɔ kanranɲu. Kaa emɛ domɔ asuu wɔɔ dɛi kanranɲu.
46009026	Wogɔ digɛu, mu jobu kale yalu gɔ nɛ giri dɛɛraa jɔbɔuwɔn. Numɔ kumi le tunmɔ girupala laganw gin’ jai jaiyɛuwɔn. Kaa mu para salai lagauwɔlɔn.
46009027	Inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ waaju tagati ye, mu le yabanɛ giye, mui kamu titiimɔ ma liyɛuwɔn dɛi, mu goju ma bɛrɛ bɔnrɔn joo dɔdɔɔnɔjɔn, sɛɛu goju ma gɔgɔnrɔnjɔn.
46010001	Ba unrunw, emɛ babe bɛrɛ sɔɔ dɔi gɔ jugɔlu go e bii ye mu ibɛlaun. Be puu kulumɔ bei teeremaa gɛlɛbe gɔ doɲu nɛ sɛɛu yaaubɛin. Be puu nɛudii Banrun gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ sɛɛu kɛjaa taŋaabɛin.
46010002	Kulumɔ gɔ nɛ lee, nɛudii gɔ nɛ lee, be puu Mɔise le digɛu kunrin batise kanraanbɛin.
46010003	Be puu pana kikinugu turu gɔ woi kayin.
46010004	Be puu dii kikinugu tunmɔ gɔ woi nɔyin. Dumɔ kikinugu be le yaaube gɔ, be dumɔ wogɔ dii nɔɔubɛin. Dumɔ wogɔ Kirisitoi bee.
46010005	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, be logoro nɛ, inɛw joo kanran gɔ, Ama kinɛ aalu. Wogɔ digɛu, be olusolo nɛ numaa yinwaain.
46010006	Nɛɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe emɛ bɛrɛ tinwinrun sɔɔi biyaai. Emaa be gin’ dadaaru mɔɲu le biyɛnɔu ga, be bɛrɛ sɔɔ dɔi gɔ, emɛ bɛrɛ deeru sɔɔi.
46010007	Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋɔ ɔn le kɛukɛu, be logoro nɛ gamuu bɛin gin’ ɔmɔlɔ bulowin biyɛnɔugi: “Inɛw gɔbe dɛinyaan jaa kayaa, dii nɔwaanbɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, be ingelaa ɔmɔlɔ gɔ dɛi yɔgɔrɔ yɔgɔraabɛin.”
46010008	Be gin’ emɛ sala nɛ yoomɔnɔugin. Be logoro nɛ inɛw gamuu wogɔ nɛ yowaa, bai turu nɛ inɛw muɲu pɛɛlɛi taanusigɛ yinwun.
46010009	Be gin’ emɛ Inɛw Baŋai suburu yɛnɛmɔnɔugin. Be logoro nɛ gamuu Inɛw Baŋai subɔraa, yuguru bei kɛraa dai.
46010010	Be gin’ guguun guunnɔugi. Logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw gamuu Ama le guguun gunwaan, Dadaanɛ gɔ wiyaa, bei daati.
46010011	Kijɛ ɔnbe puu be bɛrɛ dɔi gɔ, inɛw wajunwin deere dɛi dɔi. Sɔɔ gɔ puu tɔŋaa, emɛ inɛw waaru dumɔ le bɛrii wɔin gɔbe, emaa wogɔ le soŋirinyɛn dɛi tɔŋi.
46010012	Wogɔ digɛu, u inɛ ihiŋɛ ga sɛɛ gɔ, numɔnɔu ga kuu uwɔ u kajubaun jaain wɔɔ.
46010013	Subɔrɔ e bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ gɔ, Adama ii puu bɛrɛ subɔrɔ dɔɔjɛ gɔ woi. Ama, sɔɔ turu baŋai digɛu, subɔrɔ e bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ gɔ, paŋa ebe dɛi ire biyɛ ga wo yabaidolo. Iyaa subɔrɔ gɔ wiyaai ye, wogɔ muyɔnɲu paŋa e bɛrɛ ohobodo, subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gooɲu bana yaa ohobodo.
46010014	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu sabu dɛi, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, ɔmɔlɔ bulu le kabi ye biyɛi.
46010015	E hakilɛ inɛw sɛin gin’ mu e le sɔɔuwɔn. E yaa kuu ebe le sɔɔ ma gɔ marun yɛnɛi.
46010016	Inɛw Baŋa pana nɛ, dii gelu jeɲaa ye, Amai birɛpoo tagaa ye, waaru resɛndii ilɛ gɔ emɛ nɔɔjɛ, emɛ Kirisito ili gɔ le bɔɔi biyaain ga tagaraun wɔnɛ ma? Buru kabulu ye emɛ kayajɛ gɔ, Kirisito goju le bɔɔi biyaain ga tagaraun wɔnɛ ma?
46010017	Buru gunu koturu sai kabalaɲu. Emɛ wooi puu buru gunu tunmɔ gɔ woi gamalaɲu digɛu, halu emɛ jooi wɔin kanran, emɛ puu goju turu.
46010018	Nɛɛ Isɛrɛlu tɔgu sɔɔ yɛnɛmɔi. Ama bɛrɛ arusɛgɛ sadaga tɛgurin nawan inɛw tɛnwɛnɲu gɔbe, be sadagadumu gɔ le bɔɔi biyaain.
46010019	Mu ɔmɔlɔ ma, ɔmɔlɔ nawan ma kijɛ nanaai gɛɛuwɔn ma? Ai.
46010020	Kaa kijɛ mu gɛɛjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, sadaga be goonɔjɛ gɔ, Ama bɛrɛ goonɔɔnɛ. Kaa jinrunbe bɛrɛ goonɔɲu. Ebaa jinrunbe le bɔɔi biyɛ ga mu ibɛlaun.
46010021	Inɛw Baŋa gelu nɛ nɔɔnu, iyaa jinrunbe gelu nɛ nɔɔnu, e kanrun bɛɛidelei. Inɛw Baŋa tabalu nɛ kaya, jinrunbe tabalu nɛ kaya, e kanrun bɛɛidelei.
46010022	Maa koi ye emɛ Inɛw Baŋa kinɛbanrun ingelemɔ ibɛɛ wɔin ma? Ajubu emɛ nɛ, paŋa emɛ, womɔ dɛi gaa ma?
46010023	Inɛw gamuu gɛɛjɛ gin’: «Emɛ kijɛ puu kanrun bɛbɛɛɲu.» Kaa kijɛ puu niwɛn tolo. «Emɛ kijɛ puu kanrun bɛbɛɛɲu.» Kaa kijɛ puu inɛi bariyɛɛlɛ.
46010024	Inɛ turu kanran kuu womɔ too toonɔu, kaa inɛw wajunw too yaa too.
46010025	Kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɔɔ biyɛnɔu dɛi, selumu kunɔlu go ibɛ nɛ kijɛ dɔnrɔnɲu puu, ɛbɛ ye kayai.
46010026	Ama Dɔn bana gɛɛjɛ gin’: “Aduna gɔ lee, kɔlɔ womɔ kijɛ puu lee, Inɛw Baŋa Ama mɔi.”
46010027	Inɛ jaŋu ii laa ei jaa nɛ boonaajɛ ye, e yai ibɛɛ wɔi ye, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɔɔ biyɛnɔu dɛi, selumu kunɔlu go e bɛrɛ kijɛ wo obojɛ puu kayai.
46010028	Kaa inɛ turu u bɛrɛ sɔwaa, nawan kɔɔ ɔmɔlɔ nawain gi ye, inɛ u bɛrɛ taganɛ gɔ lee, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɔɔ lee dɛi, nawan kɔɔ tɛnwɛnnɔu.
46010029	Kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɔɔ mu gi gɔ, kinɛjugɔ uwɔ ui jarugajɛ dɛi laa, kaa inɛ u bɛrɛ taganɛ gɔ kinɛjugɔ womɔ woi jarugajɛ dɛi sɔɔuwɔn. Nɛɛ inɛw gamuu ɔn gin’ selumu bɛbɛɛɲu: «Inɛ waja kinɛ jugɔ womɔ woi jarugajɛ dɛi, maa kijɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ kanrannɔu yɔɔ ma?
46010030	Mu kijɛ mu kayajɛ dɛi Amai birɛpoo tagaabɔn ye, birɛ poo tagu le pana mu kayajɛ dɛi inge dɛi boi ma yanwanjɛ?»
46010031	Wogɔ digɛu, jaai kayajɛi ma, kijɛi nɔɔjɛi ma, kijɛ ingei kanran e kanranjɛ puu, Amai baba ga kanrain.
46010032	Yahutunw ma, tɔgu waja inɛw ma, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ma, kinɛ bemɛ, e le digɛnu yanwaain biyɛmɔnɔugi.
46010033	Mu yaa kijɛ puu nɛ, inɛw puu bɛrɛ bana ɛju gin’ kanran ga mainiyɛunwɔn. Mu kuu ma bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju dɛnɛɛlɔn. Kaa inɛw puu yayabu gɔ bɛɛ ga, inɛw puu bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju kanranjɔn. E yaa mu kanranjɛ gin’ kanrain.
46011001	Mu Kirisito deenɛi biyaa mu wɔɔ gin’, e yaa mui deewin biyɛi.
46011002	E kijɛ wooi nɛ mui ahajubajɛi, iyaa, e bɛrɛ deeru bana mu obu le kɛukɛu e sɔɔ ma yabaa wɔi. Wogɔ digɛu, mu ei sɔmɔuwɔn.
46011003	Kaa sɔɔ ɔn paamu e kanrun ye mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Ainɛ tuturu puu kuu gɔ Kirisitoi. Yaanran kuu gɔ, wo igɛi. Iyaa Kirisito kuu gɔ, Amai.
46011004	Wogɔ digɛu, Ama gɛɛnnu ma, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔnu ma, ainɛ aai kanran kuu womɔ sɔi le goraa kanranjɛ ye, wo kuu womɔ baŋa Kirisitoi gailiyɛmɔuwɔ.
46011005	Kaa yaanran, Ama gɛɛnnu ma, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔnu ma, kuu womɔ nɛ sɔi gorola ye, wo kuu womɔ baŋa, wo igɛi gailiyɛmɔuwɔ. Yaanran kuu kaa sɛɛ be lɛi kɛkɛu.
46011006	Yaanran, kuu womɔ nɛ sɔi goroidolo ye, kukuli womɔ wo sɛɛmɔ. Kaa yaanran, kukuli sɛɛ ye biyɛ ma, kuu kai ye biyɛ ma, wogɔ dɔgɔi. Kɔɔi biyaa ye, sɔi le kuu womɔ wo goromɔ.
46011007	Ainɛi, Ama le murin maŋaaɲu. Wo Ama dooroi. Kodigɛu, ainɛ kai, kuu womɔ sɔi le goru kai sɛlɛ. Kaa yaanran wo igɛ dooroi.
46011008	Waaru ainɛ maŋi le, woi yaanran nɛ goolu. Kaa yaanran, ainɛ nɛ goi.
46011009	Iyaa, ainɛi yaanran ga maŋanɛ. Kaa yaanrain ainɛ ga maŋi.
46011010	Wogɔ digɛu, mɛlɛnkɛbe sabu dɛi, yaanran, kuu womɔ nɛ inɛ yadaan sɛɛrɛi giye, kuu womɔ goroun jaain wɔɔ.
46011011	Kaa kokanran, Inɛw Baŋa le bana emɛ yaajɛ le kɛukɛu, yaanran wɔlɔ ye, ainɛ kanran wɔlɔ. Iyaa ainɛ wɔlɔ ye, yaanran kanran wɔlɔ.
46011012	Sabu, yaanran, ainɛ nɛ bana goi gin’, ainɛ yaa yaanran woi naranjɛ. Kunrin kijɛ puu Ama maŋajɛ.
46011013	E kanran, kuu ebe le ajubu yɛnɛi: Ama babu yalu nɛ, yaanran kuu dɛbɛla go, Ama gɛɛn ga, wogɔ dagaa wɔɔ ma?
46011014	Bana wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, ainɛ kukuli pala siyɛ ga, wogɔ woi gailiyɛmui laa ma?
46011015	Kaa yaanran kukuli diyɛ yasɛ ye, wogɔ wo bɛrɛ baba sɔɔi. Yaanran bɛrɛ kukuli womɔ gɔ, kuu dɛbi ga obin.
46011016	Kaa nimɛ kanran inɛ turu sɔɔ kɔɔ kuu nɛ jiiru jiire ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, emɛ kai kɔɔ sibɛ go bana biyɛɲu waja sɛnɛ. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe yaa bana waja sɛnɛ.
46011017	Nɛɛ kanɛ sɔɔ e bɛrɛ mu sɔɔido sibɛ go, mu ei sɔmɔuwɔlɔn. Mɔɔnu ebe gɔ, ei ɛjii biyɛ dɛi mɔrinyɛɛnlɛi. Mɔɲii biyɛ dɛi mɔrinyɛnjɛi.
46011018	Sɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔ unwɔ: Ebaa Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔɔ dɛi waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, logoro ebe nɛ kabu dɛin dɛin yɔɔ ga mu bɛrɛ tagin. Wogɔ nɛ mu bɛrɛ naran uji yato gin’ wɔɔ.
46011019	Gagawu tɔitɔi le inɛw wɔin gɔbei jugɔmɔ ga, waajibi logoro ebe nɛ gojo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
46011020	Waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, naran go Inɛw Baŋa pana kaya dɛi mɔrinyɛɛnlɛi.
46011021	Kaa pana nɛ dɛinyɛnnu digɛnu, inɛ kanma puu tunmɔ dɔmiyɛnlu go, jaa wo jɛɛlu gɔ kayajɛɛjɛ. Kunrin, inɛw gamuu giyɛ le wɔin, gamuu kayaa nɔwaan bimiliyaa wɔin.
46011022	Kɔɔi ye, ginrun ebe nɛ jaa kayi ye nɔɔ bɛɛlɛi ma? Maa e Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi gailiyɛmɔu, inɛw kijɛ sɛnɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ dɔgɔ tagarauwɔi? Mu e le inge gɛɛdɔn? Ei sɔsɔmɔdɔn ma? Ai, sɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ mu ei sɔmɔlun.
46011023	Deeru Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ biyaa, e bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔ ɔn woi: Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, digɛ woi numɔ nɛ kuni gɔ, buru jeɲaa,
46011024	Amai birɛpoo tagaatiyaa, kabalaa kijɛ wo gi: «Ɔn goju mai, e dɛi obin gɔ woi. Mui ajuba ga kunrin kanrain.»
46011025	Pana kayaajiyaa, wo kɔɔ gin’ resɛndii ilɛ gɔ jeɲaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Resɛndii ilɛ ɔn, Ama aaru kanai, ili ma gɔ le aaru kuni gɔ woi. Waaru ɔn e nɔɔjɛ wooi, mui ajuba ga kunrin kanrain.»
46011026	Kunrin, buru ɔn gin’ waaru e kayajɛ wooi, resɛndii ilɛ waaru e nɔɔjɛ wooi, e Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛido baa, yiun womɔ sɔɔi sɔɔjɛi.
46011027	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ aai kanran, wo le dagalu wo wɔu, Inɛw Baŋa buru gɔ kayaajɛ ma, gelu womɔ nɛ nɔwaanjɛ ma biyaai ye, Inɛw Baŋa goju lee, ili womɔ lee wo gailiyɛmu dɛi, baŋa jarugu le wɔɔ.
46011028	Wogɔ digɛu, inɛ kanma puu unruin maraan yɛnaatiyaa ye, kɔɔ gin’ buru gɔ kaya, kɔɔ gin’ gelu gɔ nɛ nɔɔ.
46011029	Inɛ aai kanran, Inɛw Baŋa goju le sɔɔ bana digɛ lugolu go, buru gɔ kayaajɛ ma, gelu gɔ nɛ nɔwaanjɛ ma biyaai ye, kɔɔbaŋa, wo kayi lee, wo nɔi lee dɛi jarugu yaduyɔ.
46011030	Sɔɔ kɔɔ digɛu, logoro ebe nɛ inɛw joo jinwaan paŋa dogaain, iyaa gamuu yinwaain.
46011031	Emɛ, kuu emɛ le, bana emɛ marun yɛyɛnɛɲu biyaai ye, saliyɛ nɛ numɔidenɛ.
46011032	Kaa aduna le bari ye saliyɛ nɛ jarugu kuu emɛ nɛ sugonɔu giye, Inɛw Baŋa wo saliyɛ emɛ kiraa ye, emi oju nɛ kukunɔjɛ.
46011033	Ba unrunw mabe, Inɛw Baŋa pana kaya dɛi waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, tunmɔ dɔmiyɛin.
46011034	Inɛ turu giyɛ woi yasɛ ye, ginrun womɔ nɛ pana kayi ye wɛɛ. E mɔrinyɛnjɛ gɔ, kuu ebe nɛ jarugu duurɔjɛi biyɛmɔnɔu dɛi kunrin kanrain. Selumu waja ebe gɔbe, mu wiyaaun ye e le sɔɔdɔn.
46012001	Ba unrunw, nɛɛ, Ama Kikinu sin obu gɔbe sibɛ go, sɔɔ jugɔlu go e bii ye mu ibɛlaun.
46012002	Waaru Ama inin e bee le, ɔmɔlɔ sɔɔ sɔi bɛɛnɛ, suguru ɛgɛɛnɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin bɛrɛ diŋɛ ebe tolo go, bana e yaabe e igii wɔi.
46012003	Wogɔ digɛu, sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii jugɔi: Inɛ turu kanran, Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ ye, Yesui jɛbaaɲu gɛɛ bɛɛidolo. Iyaa inɛ turu kanran, Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le laa ye, Yesui Inɛw Baŋai gɛɛ bɛɛidolo.
46012004	Ama Kikinu sin obu gɔbe, tɔgu dɛin dɛin jooi wɔin. Kaa wogɔbe puu Kikinu turu gɔ obojɛ.
46012005	Birɛ bana birɛɲu gɔ tɔgu dɛin dɛin jooi wɔɔ. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa turu gɔ dɛi birɛɲu.
46012006	Birɛ gɔbe yaa tɔgu dɛin dɛin wɔɔ. Kaa Ama turu gɔ, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ, kɔɔ puu gɔnrɔn gɔ wo obojɛ.
46012007	Inɛw puu niwɛn dɛi, Ama Kikinu, inɛ tuturu bɛrɛ sin obu wo obojɛ le digɛnu unruin tagarajɛ.
46012008	Wo inɛ turu bɛrɛ hakilɛ ɛju le sɔɔ sɔi sin obu obojɛ. Ama Kikinu turu gɔ iyaa, inɛ waja bɛrɛ jugɔ ɛju le sɔɔ sɔi sin obu obojɛ.
46012009	Iyaa Kikinu turu wogɔ, inɛ turu bɛrɛ gagawu sin obu obojɛ, inɛ waja bɛrɛ jiun tɔgu dɛin dɛin bajamu sin obu obojɛ.
46012010	Inɛ turu bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn birɛ biru sin obu obojɛ, inɛ waja bɛrɛ Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu obojɛ. Iyaa inɛ waja bɛrɛ, kikinu ɛju lee, mɔɲu lee kabu kunu bɛi sin obu obojɛ. Inɛ waja bɛrɛ iyaa, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu obojɛ. Inɛ waja bɛrɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe tiyɛ tagu sin obu obojɛ.
46012011	Ama Kikinu turu gɔ sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu wo kanranjɛ. Wo bɛrɛ bana ɛju gin’ inɛ tuturu puu bɛrɛ sin obu gɔ obojɛ.
46012012	Yɛnɛi, inɛ goju nɛ digɛ jooi yato. Kaa goju gɔ koturu. Digɛ gɔbe bana jooi be bii puu, goju gɔ kai koturu wɔɔ. Kirisito yaa kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ.
46012013	Emɛ Yahutunw gɔbe lee, Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe lee, gunɔw gɔbe lee, inɛw gunɔwin laain gɔbe lee, emɛ wooi puu goju turu biyɛ ga, Ama Kikinu turu gɔ nɛ emi batise kanraanɲu. Emɛ wooi puu bɛrɛ Kikinu turu wogɔ dii gin’ nɔɔmaabɛin.
46012014	Goju, digɛ turu sai sɛlɛ, kaa digɛ womɔ jooi wɔin.
46012015	Kubɔ, unruin numɔi laa digɛnu, goju digɛi laa gi kanran, wogɔ giye woi goju digɛ turui laa biyɛɛlɛ.
46012016	Suguru, unruin girii laa digɛnu, goju yalu turui laa gi kanran, wogɔ giye woi goju yalu turui laa biyɛɛlɛ.
46012017	Goju gɔ puu girii bee ye, yani kanraan ye suguru ɛgɛmɔdo? Goju gɔ puu sugurui bee ye, yani kanraan ye jiɲu sama bɛɛmɔdo?
46012018	Kaa, Ama, diŋɛ unrunmɔ le kɛukɛu, goju digɛ gɔbe maŋaa, yalu dɛin dɛin nɛ wo kunu.
46012019	Goju gɔ puu digɛ koturu sai bee ye, goju naa gɔ yalu yagɔi biyɛdo?
46012020	Kaa digɛ jooi wɔin. Goju turu wɔɔ.
46012021	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, giri numɔ kai sɛlɛ gɛɛ bɛɛlɛ. Kuu yaa unrun kubɔbe kai sɛlɛ gɛɛ bɛɛlɛ.
46012022	Kaa goju yalu paŋa sɛnɛ gin’ wɔin gɔbe, emɛ kai bemɛ yasin.
46012023	Iyaa goju yalu gaai maala ga emɛ wɔɔ gɔbe, yalu wajunw dɛi sigɛ bei babaɲu. Kunrin goju yalu dɔgɔgu gɔbe, emɛ sigɛ le bei babaŋaranɲu.
46012024	Kaa goju yalu dɔgɔgui laain gɔbe, boŋurun wogɔ kai sɛnɛ. Ama, sɔɔ gɔ puu yegeraa, goju yalu baba sɛnɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ sigɛ le baba obaabe.
46012025	Goju nɛ kabu biyɛnɔu, kaa goju yalu dɛin dɛin gɔbe tunmɔi kajuba ga, Ama kɔɔ gin’ kanraanbe.
46012026	Goju yalu turu ɔɲɛ le wɔɔ ye, wajunw gɔ puu, wo le bari ye ɔɲɛ le biyɛɲu. Goju yalu turu baba biyaajɛ ye, wajunw gɔ puu, wo le bari ye kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu.
46012027	Kirisito goju gɔ ei. E inɛ tuturu puu goju womɔ yalu turui biyaai.
46012028	Kunrin, Ama, inɛw unrunmɔ mɔɔnu nɛ, inɛ puu bɛrɛ yalu womɔ obaa daanaabe. Yalu pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei daanaabe. Yalu lɛiye gɔ nɛ, inɛw Ama titiyaanw daanaabe. Yalu taaniye gɔ nɛ jaŋudeerenw daanaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ taanrinyɛn kanranw gɔbei, kɔɔ onu nɛ jiun bajamu sin obu ma, inɛ baru sin obu ma, inɛ teeremu sin obu ma, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu ma wɛɛjɛ.
46012029	Inɛw puu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui laain, inɛw puu inɛw Ama titiyaanwin laain, inɛw puu jaŋudeerewin laain. Iyaa, inɛw puu taanrinyɛn kanrun sin obu sɛnɛ,
46012030	jiun bajamu sin obu sɛnɛ, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu ma, sɔɔ inɛmɔ tiyɛ tagu sin obu ma sɛnɛ.
46012031	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, sin obu sigɛ le maai wɔɔ gɔbe, e wogɔbe daariyɛi. Kaa kɔɔ wooi dɛi sigɛ, oju ɛju nɛ yaaun e jaan gɔ, mu e bɛrɛ tatagadɔn.
46013001	Halu mu inɛw sɔɔ sɔɔɲu ma, mɛlɛnkɛbe sɔɔ sɔɔɲu ma sɔsɔɔjɔn kanran, ihibɛ sɛlɔn ye, sɔɔ ma inrun ma, gaŋaran ma, siɲɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
46013002	Halu mu Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goii sɔɔjɔn kanran, halu jugɔ puu lee, kijɛ boŋurun puu lee igii wɔun kanran, halu gagawu diyɛ kokoo yalu womɔ nɛ goonɔjɛ yasɔn kanran, ihibɛ sɛlɔn ye, mui kijɛ kanmai laa.
46013003	Halu mu arusɛgɛ ma puu dɛgugunw bɛrɛ gamalaa obaajɔn kanran, halu goju ma tɛgɛrɛ ga obaajɔn kanran, ihibɛ sɛlɔn ye, wogɔ mu bɛrɛ niwɛn turu kanran sɛlɛ.
46013004	Ihibɛ muyɔn yasɛ. Ihibɛ ɛhɛju le jowaa wɔɔ, inɛ waja kijɛ daariyɛɛlɛ. Kuu unrunmɔ unɔɔlɛ, kuu ulo sɛlɛ.
46013005	Ihibɛ kijɛ dagalu turu kanran kanraanlɛ, kuu unrunmɔ too tee toolɛ, kinɛbanrun sɛlɛ, ajubu mɔɲu sɛlɛ.
46013006	Ihibɛ teitai laa dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔɔlɛ. Kaa naran dɛi kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔjɛ.
46013007	Ihibɛ sɔɔ puu mumuyɔnjɛ, kijɛ wooi nɛ, ihibɛ gagawu le biyɛjɛ, kijɛ wooi nɛ diyɛdɔn le biyɛjɛ, kijɛ wooi tatariyɛjɛ.
46013008	Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi bai turu dodogodo, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi dodogodo, jugɔ dodogodo, kaa ihibɛ asuu sɔsɔgɔjɛ.
46013009	Emɛ kijɛ puu sɛɛu jugaa wɔnɛ, jugɔ emɛ kibelu. Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ yaa kibelu.
46013010	Kaa kijɛ kibaai gɔ waaru wiyaajɛ, kijɛ kibelu gɔ mamanado.
46013011	Waaru dagi mu bee le, mu ii dagi bana le kɛukɛu sɔɔ sɔɔubɔn, ii dagi bana le kɛukɛu sɔɔ iyeubɔn, ii dagi bana gin’ ajubu ajubaubɔn. Kaa waaru inɛ na mu taŋu le, mu ii bana gɔ pajaatun.
46013012	Kanɛ kijɛ bana emɛ iyejɛ gɔ purugi wɔɔ. Kikinu yɛni nɛ kijɛ emɛ yɛnɛjɛ gin’ wɔɔ. Kaa bai turu, emɛ giri le giri le kijɛ ihiyedɛin. Iye, jugɔ emɛ kibelu. Kaa bai turu, emɛ sɛɛu sɔɔ jujugɔdɛin. Ama bana sɛɛu mui jugɔjɛ gin’, mu yaa kunrin kijɛ jujugɔdɔn.
46013013	Nɛɛ, kijɛ taanu ɔnbe sɔsɔgɔɲu: Gagawu lee, diyɛdɔn lee, ihibɛ lee. Kaa be taanu logoro nɛ, diyɛnɛ gɔ ihibɛi.
46014001	Kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ ihibɛ nɛ giri dɛɛraajɛi ye, woi dɛnɛi. Kaa Ama Kikinu sin obu wajunw gɔbe yaa ɛjii daariyɛi. Sigɛ le Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu daariyɛi.
46014002	Sabu sɔɔ inɛmɔ le inɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ, inɛ turu kanran sɔɔ womɔ ɛgɛɛlɛ gɔ digɛu, wo sɔɔ womɔ inɛw le sɔɔuwɔlɔ, kaa Ama le sɔɔuwɔ. Wo Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le, sɔɔ boŋurun sɔɔuwɔ.
46014003	Kaa, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi inɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ, inɛw le sɔɔuwɔ. Wo sɔɔ womɔ gɔ le inɛwin babariyɛmɔjɛ, anrangaju ohobojɛ, kinɛ kakaaliyɛmɔjɛ.
46014004	Inɛ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔjɛ baŋa gɔ, kuu unrunmɔi sai bariyɛmɔjɛ. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi inɛ sɔɔjɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu bariyɛmɔjɛ.
46014005	E wooi puu sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu bɛɛ ga mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Kaa kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu e bɛi ye, mu dɛnɛjɔn. Inɛ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnɛ, sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ tagaa ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi babariyɛmɔjɛ ye, ɛjii wɔɔ. Kɔɔi laa ye, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi inɛ sɔɔjɛ wo dɛi sigɛ niwɛn sɛɛ.
46014006	Ba unrunw, e bɛrɛ selumɛuwɔn: Sɔɔ inɛmɔ e bɛrɛ wiyaa sɔwaajɔn ye, e bɛrɛ inge niwɛin sɛɛ? Kaa Ama mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmu turu le ma, jugɔ sɔɔ turu le ma, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi turu le ma, deeru turu le ma e bɛrɛ wiyaajɔn ye, mui e bɛrɛ niwɛn yato.
46014007	Ajubu yɛnɛi, kijɛ nii nii, kere gin’ ma, kɔni gin’ ma, mii bemɛ kabu kunu bɛɛmɔɔlɛ biyaai ye, kijɛ be gɛɛjɛ gɔ yani paamu kanrun bɛɛmɔdo?
46014008	Iyaa kaan sujɔnɛ, kaan gɔ, tiyɛ le sujɔɔlɛ ye, sɔludasu ii aa kɔmɔ taa ga unruin yegeredo?
46014009	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, sɔɔ inɛmɔ le sɔɔ e sɔɔjɛ gɔ ɛjɛlu ye, kijɛ e gɛɛjɛ gɔ aa paamu kanrando? E sɔɔ ebe ooɲɔ le sɔii.
46014010	Aduna nɛ sɔɔ tɔgu dɛin dɛin jooi wɔɔ. Kaa puu ɛhɛgɛmɔjɛ, tiyɛ yasin.
46014011	Kaa mu inɛ turu sɔɔ ɛgɛɛlɔn ye, inɛ wogɔ mu bɛrɛ yerunɛi. Wo bɛrɛ yaa mui yerunɛi.
46014012	E Ama Kikinu sin obu gɔbe daariyɛjɛi digɛu, sigɛ le sin obu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu bariyɛmɔjɛ gɔ, wogɔbe joo dɛnɛi.
46014013	Wogɔ digɛu, u sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnɛ gɔ, sɔɔ inɛmɔ tiyɛ taga bɛɛ sin obu bɛɛ ga, Ama gɛɛn.
46014014	Kɔɔi laa ye, sɔɔ inɛmɔ le mu Ama gɛɛnjɔn ye, narain, kikinu ma amagɛɛn nɛ too, kaa, hakilɛ wogɔ nɛ tolo.
46014015	Kɔɔ biyaai ye mu yani kanrandɔn? Kikinu ma le Ama gɛgɛɛndɔn, iyaa hakilɛ ma le yaa gɛgɛɛndɔn. Mu kikinu ma le nii niniidɔn, hakilɛ ma le yaa niniidɔn.
46014016	Kɔɔ gin’ wɔlɔ biyaa ye, Amai birɛpoo taganu, u kikinu sai le sɔɔjɛu ye, inɛ waja mɔɔnu nɛ daan gɔ, sɔɔ u gi gɔ inɛɛ wɔnu, wo Amai birɛpoo tagu uwɔ dɛi amina yani gɛɛ bɛɛdo?
46014017	Amai birɛpoo tagu uwɔ sɔɔ yani baa ɛjii bee kanran, woi kijɛ nɛ bari turu kanran wɔlɔ.
46014018	Mu e puu dɛi sigɛ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔjɔn gɔ dɛi Ama birɛ poo.
46014019	Kaa Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ, sɔɔ inɛmɔ le sɔɔ muɲu joo sɔɔ dɛi, inɛw deere ga, mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ inɛw paamu kanranjɛ, sɔɔ ii numɔrɔn sɔɔ ire.
46014020	Ba unrunw, sɔɔ bana e iyejɛ sibɛ nɛ unrunw gin’ biyɛnɔugi. Mɔmɔɲu sibɛ go unrunw gin’ biyɛi, kaa, sɔɔ paamu kanrun nɛ anranw kibaain biyɛi.
46014021	Tɔɔru dɔn nɛ kijɛ tɔŋɔ unwɔ: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama kijɛ gi: ‘Mu sɔɔ dɛin sɔɔnw le tɔgu ɔn le sɔɔ sɔɔdɔn. Tɔgu waja inɛw le be le sɔɔdɔn. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, be mui keŋiyɛindenɛ.’”
46014022	Nɛɛ kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ biyaai ye, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi gɔ, inɛw gawanɛbe sɛɛrɛi. Inɛw gawaaɲu bɛrɛ, sɛɛrɛi laa. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi gɔ, wogɔ inɛw gawaaɲu sɛɛrɛi. Inɛw gawanɛbe bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛi laa.
46014023	Nɛɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu nɛ, inɛw gɔ puu sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnu be wɔnu, jaŋu unrunw wajabe ma, inɛw jaŋu unrunwin laain ma wiyaa tɛmaaɲu ye, be ebaa weje ulaain gɛɛidenɛ ma?
46014024	Kaa e puu Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔnu e wɔnu, jaŋu ii waja ma, inɛ jaŋu ii laa ma, logoro ebe nɛ wiyaa yowaai ye, sɔɔ ebe gɔ, hakɛ womɔ wo bɛrɛ jujugɔmɔdo, iyaa woi jajarugado,
46014025	kinɛ womɔ nɛ sɔɔ baŋaraan wo sɛɛ gɔ puu ɛlu gogoodo. Kɔɔ waaru le, wo numaa sugaa ye, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa gɛlɛnu, Amai bababado. Iyaa, naran go Ama logoro ebe nɛ yato gɛgɛɛdo.
46014026	Nɛɛ ba unrunw, yani wɔɔ? Ama baba ga waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, inɛ turu Amai birɛpoo tagu nii sɛɛ, inɛ waja mɔ deerui, inɛ waja mɔ Ama wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmui, inɛ waja mɔ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔii, inɛ waja mɔ sɔɔ inɛmɔ tiyɛ tagi. Kɔɔ wooi, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu paŋa bariyɛmu sɔɔi biyɛmɔi.
46014027	Sɔɔ inɛmɔ le Ama sɔɔ sɔɔɲu ye, dinrɛn le dinrɛn le, inɛw lɛi ma, taanu ma dɛi joo biyɛmɔnɔugi. Iyaa, inɛ turu sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ wo tagamɔi.
46014028	Kaa sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ inɛ taganɛ wɔlɔ ye, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnɛ gɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu logoro nɛ kelemu wo biyɛmɔ. Baŋa kuu womɔ lee, Ama lee bɛrɛ wo sɔɔmɔ.
46014029	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw, inɛw lɛi ma, taanu ma sɔɔ be sɔɔmɔi. Wajunw gɔbe sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ marun be yɛnɛmɔi.
46014030	Kaa sɔɔ u sɔɔnu, inɛ waja dɛinyaan wɔɔ bɛrɛ, Ama, sɔɔ turu jugɔmaajɛ ye, u inɛ laa baŋa gɔ kelemu biyɛ.
46014031	Inɛw gɔ puui deere ye, anrangaju obo ga, e wooi puu dinrɛn le dinrɛn le, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔ bɛbɛɛdei.
46014032	Ama, oju sɛlɛ go wɔlɔ. Wo jamu Amai. Wogɔ digɛu, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ gɔ, sin obu wo sɛɛ gɔi gɔgɔnrɔnjɛ. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu nɛ bana kanranɲu gin’,
46014034	mɔɔnu nɛ, yaanw gɔbe kelemu be biyɛmɔi. Sɔɔ sɔɔ ga be bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔnɛ. Tɔɔru bana gɛɛjɛ le kɛukɛu, tubi ye be biyɛmɔi.
46014035	Be sɔɔ turu paamu kanrun ibɛɛ wɔin ye, ginrun yaa ye be igɛ bɛrɛ selumɛ. Sabu yaanran, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ sɔɔ sɔɔ ga, wogɔ dɔgɔi.
46014036	Maa, Ama sɔɔ gɔ ebe nɛ goi ma? Maa e bɛrɛ sai Ama sɔɔ dɔi?
46014037	Inɛ turu, unruin inɛ Ama titiyainɛi ga wɔɔ ma, Ama Kikinu sin obu turu yasɛ ga wɔɔ ma biyaai ye, e bɛrɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaa mu tiijɛ ɔn, Inɛw Baŋa tɔɔru turui ga baŋa wo jugɔ.
46014038	Kaa inɛ turu wogɔ jugaa bɛɛlu ye, woi yapajai, woi lugonɔugi.
46014039	Ba unrunw mabe, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu gɔ daariyɛi. Kaa sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu gɔ yaa tɛŋɛnɔugi.
46014040	Sɔɔ gɔ puu oju le ɛjii kanrain.
46015001	Ba unrunw, Kibɛru Ɛju e bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju le yabaa, gain gain aa e gɛlɛ gɔ, mu wogɔ e bɛrɛ naŋaranmɔuwɔn.
46015002	Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ le ei yabin. E bɛrɛ bana mu tagu gin’ e kunrin gɛliyaa wɔi ye, ei yabaaɲu. Kɔɔi laa ye, e gawu gɔ niwɛn sɛlɛ.
46015003	Deeru biyaa e bɛrɛ mu obu gɔ nɛ, sɔɔ maai wɔɔ gɔ unwɔ: Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋɔ le kɛukɛu, Kirisito hakɛ emɛ dɛi yinwun.
46015004	Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋɔ le kɛukɛu, woi bojaa, bai taaniye gɔ, wo bulaai.
46015005	Wo Piɛru bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe.
46015006	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo jaŋu unrunw womɔ suŋu numɔrɔn dɛi joo, yalu turu nɛ be wɔu, unruin be bɛrɛ tagaraabe. Inɛw wogɔbe logoro nɛ, iye dɔɔ, pɛjɛrɛ dɛi gaa ɔnmɔi yɔɔin. Kaa gamuu yinwaain.
46015007	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo Jake bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu womɔ puu bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe.
46015008	Be wooi puu onu nɛ, mui inɛ ii narun dɔɔlu gin’ wɔɔ gɔ, wo mu bɛrɛ yaa unruin tagaraabe.
46015009	Sabu Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu logoro nɛ mu dagi. Naran go mu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ɔɲɔmaabɔn dɛi, jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu boi gɔ mu le jaanla bee.
46015010	Kaa Ama nɛɛma dɛi, kijɛi mu wɔɔ gɔ, mui kijɛ wogɔi. Iyaa Ama mu bɛrɛ nɛɛma kanrun gɔ ijei biyɛlu. Kaa mu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu wajunw puu dɛi sigɛ birɛ biraabɔn. Narain, birɛ gɔ kuu ma le mu birɛlu. Kaa Ama nɛɛma mu le wɔɔ gɔ, birɛ gɔ wo biru.
46015011	Bana biyaai puu, mui ma, bei ma, waaju emɛ tagajɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi. Kijɛ le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ yaa woi.
46015012	Kirisito yiun nɛ bulaai ga, emɛ wogɔ waajui kanranɲu. Nɛɛ logoro ebe nɛ, inɛw gamuu, yiun buloidolo ga yani sɔɔɲu?
46015013	Wogɔ narain biyaai ye, Kirisito kanran yiun nɛ bulolu.
46015014	Iyaa Kirisito yiun nɛ bulolu biyaai ye, waaju emɛ tagajɛ gɔ, waaju kooloi. Gagawu ebe gɔ yaa gagawu ijei.
46015015	Sigiyaa, emɛ Ama kuu nɛ kakalu maŋawin biyaain. Sabu Ama, Kirisitoi yiun nɛ bulomaabe ga emɛ sɛɛrɛ yingoouwɔin. Nɛɛ yiun buloolɛ ye, Ama Kirisitoi bulomɔlu.
46015016	Yiun buloolɛ ye, Kirisito kanran bulolu.
46015017	Kirisito bulolu biyaai ye, gagawu ebe gɔ gagawu ijei. E nimɛ kanran hakɛ ebe nɛ piriyaa yatoi.
46015018	Iyaa Kirisito nɛ tou inɛw yinwin gɔbe puu suiyaain.
46015019	Kirisito le diyɛdɔn emɛ sɛɛ gɔ, aduna nɛ unkaliyɛjɛ ye, inɛw puu dɛi sigɛ emi amasɔgɔi.
46015020	Kaa naran go Kirisito yiun nɛ bulaai. Kunrin, inɛw wo nɛ yinwaain gɔbe puu bubulodɛin tagara ga, dɛnrɛn ii pɔlɔ gin’, wo laa yiun nɛ bulaa gowaabe.
46015021	Yiun gɔ inɛ turu le digɛu wɛi. Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, yiun bulogu gɔ yaa, inɛ turu le digɛu wɛi.
46015022	Adama dɛi, inɛw puu bana yinwɛnɲu gin’, Kirisito dɛi inɛw puu pilemu ye ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdɛin.
46015023	Kaa, inɛ puu dinrɛn womɔ le bulodo: Kirisito kai, puu logoro nɛ wo pɔlɔi. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, inɛw Kirisito mɔi wɔin gɔbe, waaru pilemu ye wo wɛɛido le bubulodɛin.
46015024	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, aduna dumɔ gɔ dɔdɔɔdo. Kirisito, kuui bii wooi lee, paŋa wooi lee, gɔnrɔn wooi lee donugaatiyaa ye, laamu gɔ Ba Ama numɔ nɛ kukunɔdo.
46015025	Ama, Kirisito jaŋuw gɔbe puu gɔnrɔn ye, kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ wo kunɔido baa, laamu gɔ Kirisito numɔ nɛ toiyoun jaain wɔɔ.
46015026	Jaŋunɛ dumɔrɔn gɔnrɔindɛin gɔ, yiun woi.
46015027	Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa, “Ama kijɛ puu gɔnraan, kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ kunaajɛ” gi. Kaa kijɛ puu gɔnraan Kirisito le tubiyemaaɲu gin ye, Ama, kijɛ puu wo le tubiyemaabe baŋa gɔ, woi wogɔ nɛ tolo ga jɛnrɛin wɔɔ.
46015028	Ama, kijɛ puu Kirisito le tubiyemaa dogaai ye, Aini gɔ kuu womɔ le, Ama kijɛ puu wo le tubiyemaabe baŋa gɔ le tutubiyedo. Kunrin, kijɛ puu kuu nɛ, Ama sɛɛu laamu kakanrando.
46015029	Iyaa, yiunbe giye inɛw unrunbei batise kunɔmɔu gɔbe, bemɛ yani biyɛdo? Naran go yiunbe buloonɛ bɛin ye, inge dɛi be giye unrunbei batise kunɔmɔɲu?
46015030	Emɛ yaa, inge dɛi waaru puu paruju nɛ yooɲu?
46015031	Ba unrunw, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ nɛ e dɛi kuu ulo mu sɛɛ gɔ dɛi sɔɔjɔn, mu bai puu yiun le bɛrii wɔun.
46015032	Aduna ɔn tinɛ bɛɛ dɛi, mu ɔn nɛ Epɛse ana nɛ olunawanbe le jai jaiyɛdɔn ye, mu bɛrɛ wogɔ inge niwɛin sɛɛ? Yiunbe buloonɛ bɛin ye, inɛw bana gɛɛɲu le kɛukɛu: “Yogo emi yiyinwɛndo digɛnu, maini ye, kayi ye nɔɔmɔi.”
46015033	Ai, kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi. “Digu mɔɲu, jige ɛju yayamalajɛ.”
46015034	Hakilɛ biyaajɛi ye, bana jaan gin’ biyaajɛi ye, hakɛ pajai. Naran go logoro ebe nɛ inɛw gamuu Ama inin. Mu ei dɔgɔ tagara dɛi wogɔ gɛɛjɔn.
46015035	Inɛ turu ajubaa yɛnaa ye, yani kanraan ye yiun bulojɛ ma selumɛjɛ? Yiun bulaa ye, goju bemɛ goju inge tɔgui ma gɛɛjɛ?
46015036	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ selumɛnɛ gɔ, u bomɔginɛi. Dɛnrɛn ii minɛ nɛ u tɔɔjɛ gɔ, ɔmɔlu ye, pilemɛ ye tɛiyi bɛɛlɛ.
46015037	Iyaa, minɛ nɛ kijɛ u tɔɔjɛ gɔ, wogɔ dɛnrɛn ii peerei. Alukamai ma, toi ii wajai ma biyɛjɛ. Kaa, kijɛ tɛiyɛjɛ gɔ wo le murunla.
46015038	Ama, bana wo bɛrɛ ɛju gin’, toi ii gɔ bɛrɛ goju gɔ wo obojɛ. Wo toi ii tuturu bɛrɛ, goju womɔ tɔitɔi gɔ obojɛ.
46015039	Kijɛ ɔnmɔ puu, gojunawan bemɛ turu laa. Inɛ goju nawan dɛin, arusɛgɛ bemɛ dɛin, sasaa bemɛ dɛin, iiju bemɛ dɛin.
46015040	Iyaa, alagala kijɛ yɔɔ, minɛ kijɛ yɔɔ. Kaa alagala kijɛ dooro gɔ dɛin, minɛ kijɛ dooro gɔ yaa dɛin.
46015041	Nai dooro dɛin, iyepilu dooro dɛin, tolo dooro yaa dɛin. Halu tolobe logoro nɛ, tolo turu dooro dɛin, tolo waja dooro dɛin.
46015042	Yiun bulogu yaa kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ. Goju ɔmɔjɛ minɛ nɛ kunaa ye, goju ɔmɔɔlɛ goojɛ.
46015043	Goju yɛnɛ ɛjula, minɛ nɛ kunaa ye, goju dooro le wɔɔ bulo ye goojɛ. Goju yɛbɛlɛgu kunaa ye, goju paŋagu bulojɛ.
46015044	Gojunawan peere ɔn kunaa ye, goju kikinugu bulojɛ. Gojunawan peere ɔn yɔɔ ye, waajibi goju kikinugu kanran yɔɔ.
46015045	Wogɔ digɛu, Ama Dɔn sɔwaa, “Adama, ainɛ pɔlɔ gɔ, ɔnmɔi biyaai” gi. Kaa Adama dumɔrɔn gɔ, inɛ bɛrɛ, kikinu ɔnmɔ obojɛi biyaai.
46015046	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, kijɛ pɔlɔ wɛɛjɛ gɔ, inɛ kikinugu gɔi laa, inɛ goju nawangu gɔi. Inɛ kikinugu gɔ onu womɔ nɛ wɛɛjɛ.
46015047	Adama pɔlɔ gɔ, minɛ ugunu nɛ goi. Wo minɛ kijɛi. Adama lɛiye gɔ alagala goi.
46015048	Minɛ unrunw puu, inɛ minɛ nɛ goi gɔ gin’ wɔin. Alagala unrunw puu, alagala goonɛ gɔ gin’ wɔin.
46015049	Minɛ nɛ inɛ goi le murin emɛ wɔɔ gin’, alagala goonɛ gɔ le yaa murin emɛ yinbiyɛdɛin.
46015050	Ba unrunw, sɔɔ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Gojunawan ɔn, ili le, asuu Ama diinɛ kɛn gin’ bɛɛidolo. Kijɛ ɔmɔjɛ, kijɛ ɔmɔɔlɛ sii bɛɛidolo.
46015051	Mu sɔɔ boŋurun turu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn. Emɛ wooi puu yinwɛindenɛ. Kaa ginsɛsai, giri kɛmɛjɛ kanranmɔ nɛ, kaan dumɔrɔn waaru sujaaɲu gɔ, emɛ puu duduliyedɛin. Kaan gɔ waaru sujaaɲu, yiun gɔbe goju asuu ɔmɔidolo gɔ le bulodɛin. Emi duduliyedo.
46015053	Waajibi goju ɔmɔjɛ ɔn duli ye, goju ɔmɔɔlɛi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Goju yinwɛnjɛ ɔn duli ye, yinwɛɛnlɛi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
46015054	Goju ɔmɔjɛ ɔn duliyaa, ɔmɔɔlɛi biyaai ye, iyaa goju yinwɛnjɛ ɔn duliyaa, yinwɛɛnlɛi biyaai ye, Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ ɔn gɔ kikibedo: “Yiun kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛmaajɛ. Ɔnhɔn, yiun kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛmaa, woi suyaatin.”
46015055	“Aa, yiun, gɔnrɔn uwɔ yago wɔɔ? Aa, yiun, kijɛ inɛ barumu uwɔ gɔ yago wɔɔ?”
46015056	Yiun kijɛ inɛ barumu gɔ, wogɔ hakɛi. Hakɛ yaa paŋa womɔ Tɔɔru nɛ goojɛ.
46015057	Kaa Ama birɛpoo. Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le digɛu, wo yiun kuu nɛ emɛ bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaajɛ.
46015058	Kɔɔbe wooi sabu dɛi, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin. Kijɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran ei jigemɔnɔugi. Inɛw Baŋa le birɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ bamai biyɛidolo ga e igii wɔi gɔ digɛu, waaru puu maini ye, birɛ gɔ nɛ giru go yaai.
46016001	Ama inɛw gɔbei bara ga, buudu mɔɔnɔu wɔin gɔ sibɛ nɛ, Galasi gana Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe bɛrɛ bana mu tɔɔru gin’, e yaa kunrin kanrain.
46016002	Buudu sɛgu gɔ mu dɔwaaun ye biyɛnɔu ga, jugu bai pɔlɔ puu, inɛ tuturu wooi, kijɛ bana wo bɛi le kɛukɛu, buudu dɛiin ginrun nɛ goonu bojo.
46016003	Waaru mu wiyaajɛ, inɛw e yɛmɛido gɔbe, mu be dɛi lɛtɛrɛ tɔŋaa obaa ye, sin obu ebe gɔ le bei Jerusalɛmu yintiidɔn.
46016004	Kuu ma le mu yaaun gin’ wɔɔ ye kanran, inɛw e yɛmu gɔbe mu le yayaadɛin.
46016005	Mu Maseduanɛ gana kɛjɛ tataŋadɔn. Gana wogɔ kɛjaa taŋaa ye, kunrin e bɛrɛ wɛɛdɔn.
46016006	Mu waaru gaila logoro ebe nɛ totoiyodɔn biyɛdo. Halu kaali waaru gɔ puu e le kanrandɔn biyɛdo. Kunrin, yalu yaa mu ibɛ nɛ yaa ga e mui baru bɛbɛɛdei.
46016007	Iye mɔ ɔn, oju galanu sai e bɛrɛ waŋaa ye koi kanran ibɛlaun. Inɛw Baŋa yabaajɛ ye, mu bai gaila e le bii ibɛɛ wɔun.
46016008	Kaa, Pantekɔte janwan dɔɔido baa, mu Epɛse ana nɛ unbiyɛdɔn.
46016009	Halu jaŋuw gɔbe jooi wɔin kanran, birɛ diyɛ birɛ ga, ɔn nɛ mu dɛi taan gɔ gaai pinɛlaa wɔɔ.
46016010	Timɔte e bɛrɛ wɛwɛi ye, logoro ebe nɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go wo biyɛmɔi. Sabu wo kanran, mu gin’, Inɛw Baŋa birɛ nɛ too.
46016011	Inɛ turu kanran woi gailiyɛmɔnɔu. Kaa woi baraa ye, jamu le mu bɛrɛ dɔɔ ga woi niinɛi. Wo lee, ba unrunw wajunw gɔbe lee, mu bei dɔmiyaan wɔun.
46016012	Bainɛ Apɔlɔsu kai, mu kubɔ joo woi gɛnyaan, ba unrunw gɔbe le ei yai yɛnɛ giyaabɔn. Kaa kanɛ kai, wo e bɛrɛ yaai goolu. Waaru ɛju biyaajɛ ye, wo e bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdo.
46016013	Ba unrunw, inɛ giri yeiyaa wɔɔ gin’ biyɛnɔugi. Gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go biyɛi, anrangaju le biyɛi, paŋa siyɛi.
46016014	Logoro ebe nɛ, kijɛ puu, ihibɛ le kanrain.
46016015	Ba unrunw, tinwinrun waja kanran unwɔ: Sutepanasu lee, wo maranw lee, e sɔɔ bemɛ igii wɔi. Akayi gana nɛ be laa tubu yoin. Be iyaa Ama inɛw dɛi ɛjii birɛ biraabɛin.
46016016	Inɛw kɔɔbe tunmɔ lee, be le mɔrinyaan, inɛw ɛjii birɛ birɛɲu gɔbe lee, be le tubiyei.
46016017	Sutepanasu lee, Pɔrutunatusu lee, Akayikusu lee, mui yɛnɛi be wɛi gɔ, ɛjii kinɛ ma aabe. E ɔn nɛ yabei ye, kijɛ mu bɛrɛ kanrando ga e bee gɔ puu, be kanraantin.
46016018	Sabu be kinɛ ma kaaliyɛmaa, kinɛ ebe yaa kaaliyɛmaatin. Inɛw ɛju kɔɔ tunmɔbei e kajubaun jaain wɔɔ.
46016019	Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe ei poonɔuwɔin. Akilasu lee, Pirisilu lee, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ginrun bemɛ nɛ mɔrinyɛnjɛ gɔ lee, Inɛw Baŋa boi le ei ɛjii poonɔuwɔin.
46016020	Ba unrunw ɔn nɛ wɔin gɔ puu ei poonɔuwɔin. Ama inɛw gin’ ihibɛ le tunmɔi poonɔi.
46016021	Mu Pɔlu, numɔ ma le poo ɔnbe mu tɔŋɔuwɔ.
46016022	Inɛ, Inɛw Baŋai ibɛla gɔ, jebu wo le wɔɔ. Maranata! ee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ wɛɛ.
46016023	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
46016024	Mu Kirisito Yesu nɛ e puui ibɛɛ wɔun.
47001001	Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, bainɛ Timɔte le lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tɔŋɔuwɔn. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ wɔɔ gɔ lee, Ama inɛw Akayi gana puu nɛ wɔin gɔ lee bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn.
47001002	Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
47001003	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, iyaa wo Ba gɔ, Ba amasɔgɔjugɔ baŋa gɔ, kinɛ kaalu wooi obonɛ Ama gɔ, woi sɔmɔmɔi.
47001004	Wo bɛrɛ goi ye kinɛ kaalu emɛ bɛɛjɛ gɔ le digɛnu, emaa inɛw ɔɲɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin nɛ toin kinɛ kaaliyɛmu bɛɛ ga, wo ɔɲɛ emɛ puu nɛ kinɛ emɛ kakaaliyɛmɔjɛ.
47001005	Kirisito ɔɲɛ ɔɲu tunkanrin joo bana emɛ bɛɛjɛ gin’, Kirisito le digɛnu emɛ kinɛ kaalu diyɛ yaa bɛbɛɛɲu.
47001006	Emɛ ɔɲɛ nɛ toin ye, ebaa kinɛ kaalu lee, yayabu lee bɛɛ dɛi bii. Emɛ kinɛ kaalu biyaaɲu ye, ebaa ɔɲɛ emɛ muyɔnjɛ tunkanrin tari bɛɛ ga, kinɛ kaalu gɔnrɔn ei oboido bɛɛ dɛi bii.
47001007	Kodigɛu, e sibɛ go diyɛ emɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ. Sabu, ɔɲɛ emɛ nɛ gamulu bana e bɛɛjɛ gin’, kinɛ kaalu emɛ nɛ yaa gamulu yinbɛɛdei ga, emɛ igii wɔin.
47001008	Ba unrunw, sɔɔ ɔn jugɔlu go e bii ye, emɛ ibɛlain. Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ ɔɲɛ emɛ bɛi gɔ, demɛniyaan, dɔɔ emɛ dɛi gaa bee. Halu kinrun emɛ wogɔ nɛ ɛliyɛidolo ga emɛ sɛbɛin.
47001009	Emɛ kai, ajubu emɛ nɛ yiun emɛ sɔɔ kɛjaatin ga bɛin. Kaa emaa kuu emɛ gɔnrɔn le gawanɔu, Ama, yiun bulomɔjɛ baŋa gɔ nɛ gagawu emɛ bojo ga kunrin bii.
47001010	Yiun mɔɲu kɔɔ nɛ emi wo yabu, iyaa wo yabado. Ama nimɛ kanran emi yayabado ga, emɛ wo sibɛ go diyɛdɔn wogɔ le wɔin.
47001011	Sabu e yaa, emɛ dɛi Ama e gɛɛnjɛ le emi babaradei. Kunrin, inɛw joo amagɛɛn dɛi duba emɛ bɛɛido gɔ, inɛw joo bɛrɛ emɛ dɛi Amai birɛpoo tagu sɔɔi biyɛdo.
47001012	Kijɛ nɛ kuu unu emɛ bɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ aduna nɛ, iyaa sigɛ le e sibɛ nɛ, emɛ daii, naran Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ le yoi yaauwɔin ga, kinɛjugɔ emɛ sɛɛrɛ emɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔ woi. Emɛ Adama ii hakilɛ le wogɔ kanrannɛ, kaa Ama nɛɛma le kanrin.
47001013	Sɔɔ jaŋau, paamau e wɔɔ gɔi laa ye, emɛ sɔɔ wajai e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔnɛ. Kanɛ baa gaila paamu kanraan e wɔɔ gin’, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu bai wɛɛido gɔ, e dɛi kuu emɛ uloido gin’, kuu ebe yaa emɛ dɛi ulodo. Kaa e wogɔ paamu ye dain dɔdɔɔdei ga mu gawaa wɔun.
47001015	Diyɛdɔn wogɔ mu le ɛjii yabe dɛi, mu e bɛrɛ laa yaadɔn ga yegeraabɔn. Ebe nɛ gowaai ye, Maseduanɛ galaai ye, iyaa Maseduanɛ gowaa e bɛrɛ wiyaa ye, ebaa Judea gana yai nɛ mui niinɛ ga bɔun. Kunrin ebaa kubɔ lɛi duba bɛɛ ga bɔun.
47001017	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe waaru mu yeguru le, mu inɛ iŋu sɛlɛi bɔun ma? Maa aduna bɛɛnw kanranjɛ gin’, sɔɔ nɛ «ee» gɛiti ye, yalu turu gɔ nɛ «ai» yaa mu gɛɛjɛ ma?
47001018	Kaa Ama sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ gin’, e bɛrɛ sɔɔ emɛ sɔi nɛ, «ee» lee, «ai» lee biyɛlu.
47001019	Sabu mu lee, Silasu lee, Timɔte lee, logoro ebe nɛ, Ama Aini Yesu Kirisito sɔɔ waaju emɛ kanrun gɔ, wo, «ee» lee, «ai» lee inɛi biyɛlu. Waaru puu womɔ «eei» bee.
47001020	Iyaa, Ama pui gɔbe puu wo le digɛu «eei» biyaain. Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ Ama sɔmɔnu, «amina» gɔ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu gɛɛɲu.
47001021	Kirisito nɛ, emɛ lee, e lee puui ɛɛin bojonɛ baŋa gɔ, iyaa emi yɛmɛnɛ gɔ, Ama woi.
47001022	Wo, emi womɔi ga, sɛɛrɛ womɔ emɛ nɛ kunaa, kijɛ ɛju emɛ dɛi wo bojaajɛ giru duuni ga, Kikinu womɔ obaa, kinɛ emɛ nɛ daanaabe.
47001023	Ama sɛɛrɛ mai, wo kinɛ ma igii wɔɔ. Mu amasɔgɔ ebe jugaa, Kɔrɛnte wɛɛlun kanrun.
47001024	Emɛ kijɛ e gawaun jaan paŋa le e bɛrɛ gawamɔ ibɛlain, sabu gagawu nɛ e ɛɛn go iŋiyaan wɔi. Kaa ebaa kinɛ ɛɛli bɛɛ ga, emɛ e le bariyaa birɛ birɛuwɔin.
47002001	Kunrin, waja pilemu ye kinɛ jiun e bɛrɛ obonɔu ga, mu e bɛrɛ pilemɛ yaaidolɔn ga, kinɛ ma nɛ kɛjaabɔn.
47002002	Yɛnɛi, kinɛ ebe mu jinwɛnmɔjɛ ye, aa mu bɛrɛ kinɛ ɛɛlu obodo? Inɛw kinɛ mu jinwɛnmu gɔbei laa ma?
47002003	Lɛtɛrɛ kɔɔ kijɛ dɛi tɔŋaa mu tii gɔ, e inɛw kinɛ ma ɛɛliyɛmɔu jaan gɔbe, e bɛrɛ dɔwaaun ye kinɛ ma jinwɛnmɔnɔu dɛi tɔŋun. Kinɛ ɛɛli ma e puu kinɛ ɛɛlii ga mu gawaa wɔun.
47002004	Mu kinɛ aalu le, kinɛ jiun diyɛ le, giridii goou lɛtɛrɛ kɔɔ tɔŋun. Kinɛ ebe jinwɛnmɔ dɛi laa, kaa ihibɛ diyɛ e sibɛ go mu sɛɛ gɔ ebaa jugɔ ga tɔŋu.
47002005	Inɛ turu kinɛ jiun sɔɔ kanraanti ye, wo kinɛ mai jinwɛnmɔlu, e puu kinɛi jinwɛnmu. Kaa sɔɔ biɲɛnu doori dɛi, e gamuu kinɛi jinwɛnmu gɛɛmɔi.
47002006	E inɛw joo woi jarugaa, kijɛ wo bɛrɛ e kanrun gɔ, woi baa wɔɔ.
47002007	Nɛɛ kai, wo bɛrɛ jinwɛn galu ye, kinɛ womɔ yanwannɔu ga, woi yaabu kanraan ye kinɛ kaalu wo bɛrɛ e oboun jaain wɔɔ.
47002008	Kɔɔ dɛi mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, e woi ibɛɛ wɔi ga wo bɛrɛ jugɔmɔi.
47002009	Sabu lɛtɛrɛ gɔ, mu iyaa kijɛ puu nɛ ebaa sɔɔ ma yayabajɛi ma, ei marun yɛnɛdɔn ga tɔŋu.
47002010	Nɛɛ kai e inɛ bɛrɛ yaabu e kanranjɛ gɔ, mu yaa woi yaabu kanraunwɔn. Sɔɔ yaabu mu kanrun gɔ, mu sɔɔ yaabu kanranɲu yasɔn ma laa ye, Setanu kuu emɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛnɔu ga, Kirisito giru nɛ e dɛi yaabu kanrun. Sabu Setanu sɔɔ kanranjɛ ga wɔɔ, emɛ igii wɔin.
47002012	Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju taga ga, Toroasu ana nɛ waaru mu dɔi le, maa kɔɔ nɛ birɛ birɛ ga, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, taan pinɛlaabe.
47002013	Kaa mu bainɛ Titei tɛmɛlun gɔ dɛi, kinɛ ma jamu sɛbele. Kodɛi ba unrunw bemaa jamu biyɛmɔ giyaatiyaa, mu Maseduanɛ gana nɛ wiyaabɔn.
47002014	Ama birɛpoo, sabu Kirisito gɔnrɔn bɛɛjɛ gɔ nɛ, wo waaru puu emi yatoiyomɔjɛ. Iyaa lajukɔrɔ jiɲu, yalu puu bana dɔɔjɛ gin’, yalu puu nɛ emi Kirisito jugɔ tagarawin bojojɛ.
47002015	Naran go, inɛw yabaaɲu lee, inɛw suiyou wɔin lee logoro nɛ, Ama bɛrɛ Kirisito lajukɔrɔ gɔ emi.
