47002016	Inɛw suiyou wɔin bɛrɛ emɛ yiun jiɲu, inɛ daajɛi jiɲiyɛnɲu. Inɛw yabaaɲu bɛrɛ ɔnmɔ jiɲu, ɔnmɔ obojɛi jiɲiyɛnɲu. Inɛ aa birɛ kɔɔbe birɛ bɛɛdo?
47002017	Inɛw joo Ama sɔɔ le tɔŋu tɔŋɔuwɔin gɔbe, emɛ be gin’ wɔnɛ. Kaa Ama emi tii dɛi, emɛ kinɛpilu le Ama giru nɛ Kirisito le pagu turu biyaa sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin.
47003001	Nɛɛ iyaa emɛ pilemaa kuu emɛ le emi sɔmɔuwɔin ma? Maa inɛw gamuu gin’, lɛtɛrɛ boi ɛju emɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ e bɛrɛ emɛ jɛɛlɛun jaain wɔɔ ma? Maa emɛ bɛrɛ e oboun jaain wɔɔ ma?
47003002	Lɛtɛrɛ boi ɛju emɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ, kinɛ emɛ nɛ tɔŋaa too gɔ, ei. Inɛw puu jugɔ ye jaŋa bɛbɛɛɲu.
47003003	Ei Kirisito lɛtɛrɛ, emɛ le tiin ga jɛnrɛin wɔɔ. Wogɔ dii tɔŋu tɔŋu le tɔŋɔnɛ, kaa Ama ɔnmɔ Kikinu birɛi. Tibu kɛbiriyɛun nɛ tɔŋɔnɛ, kaa kinɛ nɛ tɔŋɔ.
47003004	Kirisito le digɛu Ama giru nɛ diyɛdɔn emɛ sɛɛ gɔ dɛi, emɛ sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔɲu.
47003005	Emɛ kuu emɛ le birɛ kɔɔ birɛɲu gɔnrɔn yasin ga ajubaa wɔnɛ. Gɔnrɔn emɛ, Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ.
47003006	Aaru kana birɛbirɛnwin biyɛ ga, gɔnrɔn gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu. Wogɔ tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu aarui laa, Ama Kikinu aarui. Sabu tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu gɔ, yiun wo nɛ goojɛ. Kaa Ama Kikinu ɔnmɔ obojɛ.
47003007	Tɔɔru, lɛtɛrɛ ii tuturu tibu kɛbiriyɛun nɛ tɔŋaa waaru obobɛin le, Ama dooro iyemaabe. Halu dooro kɔɔ dooro galajɛi bee kanran, Isɛrɛlu unrunw Mɔisei yɛnɛ bɛɛubenɛ. Tɔɔru yiun jɛɛlɛjɛ gɔ dooro kɔɔ tunmɔ le wɛi ye,
47003008	Kikinu birɛ gɔ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ Ama dooro tagaraidolo ma?
47003009	Tɔɔru birɛ, jarugu inɛ kuu nɛ duurɔjɛ gɔ dooro le bee ye, Kikinu birɛ, inɛwin teitai bojojɛ gɔ sigɛ le ɛjii dooro le biyɛidolo ma?
47003010	Naran go, pɔɔlɔ kijɛ dooroi bee gɔ, iye dooro diyɛ gɔ le tunwaan ye, kijɛ kanmai laa.
47003011	Sabu kijɛ galajɛ, dooro unrunmɔ yasɛbe biyaai ye, kijɛ galaalɛ dooro gɔ wogɔ dɛi sigɛ.
47003012	Emɛ diyɛdɔn ɛju kɔɔ yasin dɛi, liyɛ sɛlɛ le wɔin.
47003013	Emɛ Mɔise gin’ kanraannɛ. Wo, Isɛrɛlu unrunw bemaa dooro galajɛ gɔ mananu wo wɔnu iyenɔu ga, girupala unrunmɔ sɔi le dɛbɛube.
47003014	Kaa Isɛrɛlu unrunw wogɔ paamu bɛɛubenɛ. Iye bai dɔɔ, aaru pɛi sɔɔ waaru be jaŋajɛ le, sɔi girupala dɛbu tunmɔ gɔ le, hakilɛ bemɛ dɛdɛbɛ. Sɔi gɔ dɛbɛlɛla, sabu Kirisito le digɛnu dɛbɛlɛjɛ.
47003015	Halu, iye bai dɔɔ Mɔise dɔn gɔbe waaru be jaŋajɛ puu, hakilɛ bemɛ nɛ sɔi yadɛbɛ.
47003016	Kaa Inɛw Baŋa sibɛ nɛ kigelemaa ye, sɔi dɛbɛ gɔ goiyaajɛ.
47003017	Sɔɔ ɔn nɛ Inɛw Baŋa gɔ, Kikinu gɔ woi. Iyaa Inɛw Baŋa Kikinu yalu wɔɔ nɛ, liliyɛ wɔlɔ. Inɛw puu hɔɔlɔwin.
47003018	Emɛ puu, girupala emɛ nɛ sɔi dɛbɛla. Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ kikinuyɛni Inɛw Baŋa dooro tagarajɛ gin’ wɔin. Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa Kikinu gɔnrɔn le, waaru puu dooro bɛɛ bɛɛ yaanu, emɛ duli ye, Yesu Kirisito bana gin’ biyɛdɛin.
47004001	Ama, amasɔgɔ emɛ jugaa birɛ ɔn nɛ emi kunaabe dɛi, anrangaju emɛ dogoolɛ.
47004002	Emɛ sɔɔ aboŋu le ma, sɔɔ dɔgɔgu ma, wogɔbe le onu dulaatin. Emɛ sakulu le yaauwɔnɛ. Iyaa, emɛ Ama sɔɔ gɔ dulomɔɔnɛ. Kaa naran gɔ wɛjɛii sɔi ye ɛjɛmɔɲu. Kunrin emɛ Ama giru nɛ, inɛ tuturu puu bɛrɛ, kinɛjugɔ womɔ nɛ boi ɛju emɛ boomu dɛnɛɲu.
47004003	Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju emɛ tagajɛ ɔn sɔɔ gɔ nimɛ wɛjɛii wɔlɔ ye, inɛw suiyoidɛin bɛrɛ wɛjɛii wɔlɔ wɔɔ.
47004004	Be sɔɔ gɔ le gawaanɛ, sabu aduna ɔn ama gɔ, bemaa Kirisito, Ama le murin wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, dooro womɔ Kibɛru Ɛju wijɛ be bɛrɛ wɛɛjɛ gɔ iyenɔu ga hakilɛ bemɛ dɛbaati.
47004005	Emɛ, waaju emɛ tagajɛ nɛ kuu emɛ dɛi sɔɔnɛ. Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa gɔ woi ga, emɛ waaju emɛ nɛ wogɔi tagaɲu. Emɛ kai Yesu dɛi, emi birɛbirɛnw ebei gɛɛɲu.
47004006	Wijɛ, ɔlɔ logoro nɛ dodoorodo ga Ama sɔɔnɛ gɔ, kinɛ emɛ nɛ yaa wijɛ womɔ dooriyemɔnɛ gɔ woi. Ama dooro, Kirisito girupala nɛ iyemɔjɛ gɔ emaa ɛjii jugɔ bɛɛ ga, kinɛ emɛ nɛ wijɛ gɔ wo dooriyemu.
47004007	Emi pɔnu toroi le kɛkɛu. Kokanran, kijɛ dɔnrun dɔɔmɔɔlɛ kɔɔ emɛ nɛ too. Kibɛru Ɛju gɔnrɔn diyɛ gɔ emɛ nɛ goolɛ, kaa Ama nɛ goojɛ inɛw bemaa jugɔ ga kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ.
47004008	Sabu, bana dɛin dɛin puu le emi ɔɲɔmɔuwɔin, kaa emɛ iŋiyaan wɔin. Emɛ jiire le wɔin, kaa diyɛdɔn emɛ dogolu.
47004009	Emi tɔɔɲɔuwɔin, kaa Ama emi pajalu. Emi laga sunugouwɔin, kaa emi suiyolu.
47004010	Emɛ waaru puu goju emɛ le Yesu yiun sɔɔ tagarauwɔin. Goju emɛ nɛ ɔnmɔ womɔ sɔɔ iyemɔ ga wogɔ biyɛuwɔ.
47004011	Sabu, aduna nɛ kinrun le waaru emɛ too le, emɛ Yesu sabu dɛi waaru puu yiun le bɛrii wɔin. Goju yinwɛnjɛ emɛ nɛ, Yesu ɔnmɔ iyemɔ ga wogɔ biyɛuwɔ.
47004012	Kunrin yiun, birɛ womɔ kɔlɔ emɛ nɛ birɛjɛ. Kaa ɔnmɔ gɔ, birɛ womɔ e nɛ birɛjɛ.
47004013	Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Mu gawaabɔn. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu sɔɔ sɔwaabɔn.” Emɛ kanran gagawu turu wogɔ ajubui sɛin digɛu, emɛ gawaa wɔin. Iyaa wogɔ sabu dɛi emɛ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin.
47004014	Emɛ igii wɔin, Inɛw Baŋa Yesui yiun nɛ bulomɔnɛ baŋa gɔ, emi yaa Yesu le bulogu ye, e lee, emɛ lee mɔɔnu ye Yesu giru nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdo.
47004015	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu e dɛi biyɛuwɔ. Kunrin, Ama nɛɛma gɔ bariyɛnu yaa, inɛw joo bɛrɛ dɔwaai dɛi, Amai birɛpoo tagu sɔɔ bari ye, boi sɔmu gɔ Ama mɔi biyɛ ga sɔɔ kɔɔbe biyɛuwɔ.
47004016	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, anrangaju emɛ dogoolɛ. Halu goju emɛ pɛyaa yanwaunwɔ kanran, kinɛ emɛ nɛ bai puu emɛ inɛ kanai taŋa taŋa yaauwɔin.
47004017	Waaru gaila le ɔɲɛ dagi emɛ bɛɛjɛ gɔ, dooro diyɛ, kale jugɔmɔɔlɛ asuu sɔgɔjɛ emɛ dɛi yegerejɛ.
47004018	Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ kijɛ iyemɔjɛ nɛ giru emɛ dɛɛraa gɛlɛlain. Kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ nɛ giru dɛɛraa sɛin. Kijɛ iyemɔjɛ, waaru gaila kijɛi. Kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ, asuu kijɛi.
47005001	Aduna ɔn nɛ kuru emɛ too ɔn, tiyɛ gɔ goju emɛ ɔn wologaatin ye, alagala nɛ, inɛ numɔ ginrun ujɔlu, kaa Ama kuu womɔ le ginrun wo ujaajɛ, asuu biyɛido gɔ emɛ yasin ga igii wɔin.
47005002	Kunrin, kuru ɔn nɛ toun, emɛ duru durouwɔin. Emɛ alagala ginrun emɛ gɔ arugoi gin’ yoo ga dadaaru diyɛ le wɔin.
47005003	Emɛ wogɔ yowaain ye, emi duŋu le biyɛidolo.
47005004	Kuru ɔn nɛ waaru emɛ too gɔ le, emɛ duru durouwɔin. Emɛ dɔɔ duiyaa wɔin. Kokanran, emɛ goju ɔn arugoi gin’ pomɔ ibɛɛ wɔin gin’ wɔlɔ. Kaa emɛ alagala goju gɔ arugoi gin’ yoo ibɛɛ wɔin. Ɔnmɔ gɔ, kijɛ yinwɛnjɛ gɔi donugaati ga emɛ wogɔi dɛnɛɲu.
47005005	Emi sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi yegerenɛ baŋa gɔ, Ama woi. Wo giru duuni ga, Kikinu gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe.
47005006	Emɛ kodɛi waaru puu anrangaju le jowaa wɔin. Emɛ goju ɔn le wɔin ye, Inɛw Baŋa le emi wagee wɔɔ ga emɛ igii wɔin.
47005007	Emɛ giru iye le yoi yaauwɔnɛ, kaa gagawu le yaauwɔin.
47005008	Emɛ anrangaju le jowaa wɔin. Iyaa goju ɔn nɛ goi ye, Inɛw Baŋa giru nɛ biyɛ ga, emɛ bɛrɛ wogɔ ire.
47005009	Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ goju le wɔin ma, goju gɔ nɛ gowaain ma, kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ sɔɔ emɛ Inɛw Baŋa kinɛ aamɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔin.
47005010	Sabu waajibi, emɛ puu Kirisito saliyɛ kiru yalu gɔ nɛ wɛwɛɛdɛin. Inɛ tuturu puu goju womɔ le wɔu kijɛ wo kanrun, ɛjui ma, mɔɲui ma, wogɔ tujɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
47005011	Inɛw Baŋai bana liyɛun jaan gɔ, emɛ wogɔ igii wɔin. Kodigɛu, inɛw bemaa tinwinrun emɛ le gawa ga emɛ be bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin. Ama emi ɛjii igii wɔɔ. E kanran kinɛjugɔ ebe nɛ emi igii wɔi ga wɔun.
47005012	Emɛ pilemaa kuu emɛ le boi ɛju emɛ sɔɔi e bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔnɛ. Kaa ebaa emɛ dɛi kuu ebe unu bɛɛ ga, e bɛrɛ banai obouwɔin. Kunrin, kinɛ bemɛ bana wɔɔ dɛi laa, kaa bain nɛ aŋai bei wɔɔ dɛi inɛw kuu bemɛ unɔw gɔbe, e aŋa bemɛ sai bɛbɛɛdei.
47005013	Kuu emɛ duliyaa ye, emɛ Ama dɛi kunrin wɔin. Kaa kuu emɛ kɛu wɔɔ ye, wogɔ tinɛ ebei.
47005014	Sabu inɛ turu inɛw puu dɛi yinwun ye, tiyɛ gɔ, inɛw gɔ puu yinwaain. Emɛ inɛw wogɔ le gawaa wɔin gɔ, Kirisito ihibɛ gɔ emi mamainiyɛnmɔjɛ.
47005015	Wo, inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe bemaa kuu bemɛ dɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛnɔu, kaa inɛ be dɛi yinwaan bulu gɔ dɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, inɛw puu dɛi yinwun.
47005016	Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ kanɛ baa, inɛ turui kanran, Adama unrunw bana inɛi yɛnɛjɛ gin’ yɛnɛɛnɛ. Halu emɛ Kirisitoi Adama ii bana inɛ yɛnɛjɛ gin’ yɛnaabɛin kanran, kanɛ emɛ kɔɔ gin’ woi yɛnɛuwɔnɛ.
47005017	Inɛ aai kanran Kirisito le too ye, woi maŋu kanai. Sɔɔ pɛi gɔbe puu galaain, kijɛ puu kanai biyaai.
47005018	Kɔɔbe puu Ama bɛrɛ goi. Wo Kirisito le digɛu, unrun lee, emɛ lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegeraati. Iyaa inɛw lee, wo lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yeguru birɛ gɔ, wo emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraabe.
47005019	Tiyɛ gɔ Ama, inɛw bɛrɛ hakɛ bemɛ lugolu kanraan, unrun lee, inɛw lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegere ga, Kirisito nɛ birɛ birɛube. Iyaa unrun le sɔɔ yeguru waaju taga ga emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraabe.
47005020	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kirisito dilɛ nɛ emɛ iŋɛ. Emɛ le digɛu, Ama kuu womɔ le ei tinwɛnrɛunwɔ gin’ wɔɔ. Emɛ Kirisito boi le e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, Ama lee, e lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegere ga yabai.
47005021	Kirisito, inɛ hakɛ inɛɛ bee gɔ, emɛ sabu dɛi Ama woi hakɛi bojaabe. Kunrin wo nɛ, inɛw teitai ga Ama lugojɛ gɔbe, emi taŋaai.
47006001	Emɛ Ama le birɛbirɛnw bɔɔwin dɛi, e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, Ama nɛɛma e bɛi gɔ, niwɛn sɛlɛ biyɛmɔnɔugi.
47006002	Sabu Ama sɔwaa gi: “Waaru sɛgɛraa gɔ le mu gɛɛn uwɔ nɛ suguru dɛɛraabɔn. Yayabu bai gɔ le, mu jobudigilu uwɔ saabɔn.” Nɛɛ waaru sɛgɛraa gɔ kanɛi. Yayabu bai gɔ iyei.
47006003	Birɛ emɛ nɛ lelu bɛɛmɔnɔu ga, emɛ kijɛ turu nɛ kanran inɛ tomɔmu sabaabui bii ibɛlain.
47006004	Kaa kijɛ wooi nɛ, emɛ emi Ama birɛbirɛnwin ga jugɔmɔuwɔin. Ɔɲɛ lee, nau lee, kinɛ ɔɲɛ lee tari nɛ, emɛ wogɔ jugɔmɔuwɔin.
47006005	Emi lagauwɔin, kaju kunɔuwɔin, emɛ dɛi giru giru sɔɔ biyɛuwɔ, emɛ birɛ nau nau birɛuwɔin, giri yeiyeenɛ, pana kayaanɛ.
47006006	Emɛ, teitai nɛ lee, jugɔ nɛ lee, muyɔn nɛ lee, ɛjii bii nɛ lee, Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn gɔ nɛ lee, ihibɛ tɔitɔi emɛ sɛɛ gɔ nɛ lee,
47006007	naran sɔɔ emɛ tagajɛ gɔ nɛ lee, Ama gɔnrɔn gɔ nɛ lee wogɔ jugɔmɔuwɔin. Teitai bii gɔ kɔmɔgelu emɛi. Kole taaɲu, kole togoɲu.
47006008	Emi bababaɲu, iyaa dɔgɔ emɛ bɛrɛ tatagaraɲu. Boi mɔɲu emɛ sɔsɔɔɲu, boi ɛju emɛ kanran sɔsɔɔɲu. Emi kakalu maŋaw gin’ yɛnɛuwɔin, kaa emɛ narain sɔɔɲu.
47006009	Emi inin gin’ wɔin, kaa ɛjii igii wɔin. Emi yinwɛin yaajɛ gin’ wɔɔ, kaa ɔnmɔi kowɔin. Ɔɲɔmaaɲu gin’ wɔin, kaa daanɛ.
47006010	Kinɛ jiun yasin gin’ wɔin, kaa waaru puu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔin. Dɛgugunw gin’ wɔin, kaa inɛw joo ɔgɔ unɔuwɔin. Kijɛ kanma sɛnɛ gin’ wɔin, kaa kijɛ puu yasin.
47006011	Kɔrɛnte ba unrunw, emɛ naran gɔi e bɛrɛ tagin, kinɛ emɛ nɛ sɔɔ turu kanran baŋarannɛ.
47006012	Emɛ kinɛ emɛ nɛ ei ɛjii paa wɔin. Kaa emɛ sibɛ go ihibɛ ebe gaila.
47006013	Mu unrunw mabe gin’ ei tinwɛnrɛunwɔn, e kanran kinɛ ebe nɛ kunrin emi ɛjii paai.
47006014	Inɛw Ama le gawanɛ le mɔrin ye, pagu turu biyɛnɔugi. Sabu teitai lee, teitai laa lee mɔɔnu ingei too? Maa wijɛ lee, ɔlɔ lee bɔɔ ingei too?
47006015	Iyaa Kirisito lee, jinrun puu kuu baŋa lee, aaru ingei too? Inɛ Ama le gawaajɛ lee, Ama le gawalu lee gamulu ingei too?
47006016	Ama Ginrun Diyɛ lee, ɔmɔlɔ lee yani yegi bɛɛjɛ? Ama ɔnmɔ Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ emi. Ama wo kuu womɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: “Mu logoro bemɛ nɛ toi ye be le yoi yayaadɔn. Mu Ama bemɛi bibiyɛdɔn. Be tɔgu mai bibiyɛdɛin.”
47006017	Wogɔ digɛu, Inɛw Baŋa Ama sɔwaa gi: “Logoro bemɛ nɛ gooi. Be le kabiyɛi. Kijɛ lɔgɔgu tabanɔugi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu ei sɛsɛgɛrɛdɔn.
47006018	Mu e bai biyɛdɔn. E anranw unrunw ma lee, unrunw yaanw ma leei biyɛdei. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ kunrin gi.”
47007001	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, pui kɔɔbe emɛ le kuni wɔɔ. Kodigɛu, emɛ goju lɔgɔ ma, kinɛ lɔgɔ ma wooi nɛ emi ɛjɛmɔmɔi. Ama giriliyɛ le emi ɛjɛmu ye kale dɔɔnɔmɔi.
47007002	Kinɛ ebe nɛ emi paai. Emɛ inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran mɔɲu kanrannɛ, inɛ turui kanran suyonɛ, inɛ turui kanran punɔnɛ.
47007003	Mu, jarugu kuu ebe nɛ duurɔdɔn dɛi sɔɔ kɔɔ gɛɛuwɔlɔn. Sabu bana sɔwaa mu galu gin’, ɔnmɔi ma, yinwin ma, ei kinɛ emɛ nɛ paa wɔin.
47007004	Mu e le ɛjii gawaa wɔun. E dɛi kuu ma gaai unɔuwɔn. Kinɛ ma kaaliyaa dain dɔwaai. Ɔɲɛ logoro nɛ mu kinɛ ɛɛli diyɛ le wɔun.
47007005	Naran go Maseduanɛ gana nɛ emɛ dɔi nɛ, emɛ deeliye turu kanran bɛɛnɛ. Emɛ ɔɲɛ tɔgu puu iyaabɛin. Bain go jaii, kinɛ emɛ nɛ liliyɛi.
47007006	Kaa Ama, inɛw ɔɲaa wɔin kinɛ kaaliyɛmɔnɛ gɔ, Tite wɛɛgu le kinɛ emɛ kaaliyɛmaabe.
47007007	Wɛɛgu womɔ sai laa, kaa iyaa kinɛ kaalu e le wo bɛi gɔ le, wo kinɛ emɛ kaaliyɛmaabe. Wo ebaa dadaaru ma le wɔi, kinɛ sɔmiyɛn le wɔi, mu dɛi maini diyɛ le wɔi ga emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe. Wogɔ kinɛ ɛɛlu ma bariyɛmaabe.
47007008	Halu lɛtɛrɛ ma gɔ kinɛ ebe jinwɛnmaabe kanran, kinɛ ma kɔɔliyaa wɔlɔ. Lɛtɛrɛ gɔ waaru gaila le kinɛ ebe jinwɛnmaabe ga iyaa, kinɛ ma kɔɔliyaabe.
47007009	Kaa kanɛ mu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔun. Kinɛ ebe jinwaan dɛi laa, kinɛ jiun gɔ e bɛrɛ bana duli wo obu gɔ dɛi. Kinɛ jiun ebe gɔ Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa digɛu, emɛ e bɛrɛ mɔɲu dɔɔnɔnɛ.
47007010	Kinɛ jiun Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa gɔ, bana duli yayabu nɛ inɛi jɛyaajɛ jɛɛlɛjɛ. Wogɔ dɛi kinɛ kɔɔliyɛɛlɛ. Kaa aduna kinɛ jiun gɔ yiun jɛɛlɛjɛ.
47007011	Iyaa, kinɛ jiun Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa kɔɔ, sɔɔ gɔ dɛi aŋai kinɛ ɔgu le ei wo boju gɔ yɛnɛi. E sɔɔ gɔ nɛ ei pilɛmɔuwɔi, sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ ebe tɛgaa, sɔɔ gɔ liyaai. Mui iyi dadaaru le wɔi, maini diyɛ le wɔi, jarugu duuru dabulu dɛnaabei. E mainiyaan ei sɔɔ gɔ nɛ tolo ga tagaraabei.
47007012	Nɛɛ e bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ mu tii gɔ, mɔɲu kanrannɛ gɔ dɛi laa, inɛ bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanrin gɔ dɛi laa. Kaa emɛ dɛi bana e mainiyɛnjɛ gɔ, Ama giru nɛ ebaa wogɔ jugɔ dɛii.
47007013	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi kinɛ emɛ kaaliyaa wɔɔ. Kinɛ emɛ kaaliyaa gɔi laa go, e puu Tite hakilɛ e daanu gɔ dɛi, kinɛ ɛɛli wo bɛi gɔ sigɛ le kinɛ emɛ ɛɛliyɛmaabe.
47007014	Mu giru womɔ nɛ e dɛi, kuu ma gaila unaabɔn. E dɔgɔ mu bɛrɛ tagarali. Waaru puu e bɛrɛ naran emɛ sɔɔjɛ gin’, Tite giru nɛ ei kijɛ dɛi emɛ sɔmu gɔ yaa narain bii.
47007015	Kunrin, sɔɔ yabu ebe lee, bana woi liliyɛ lee, goju kinwun lee le, ɛjii e sɛguru gɔ lee ajubaa ye, e sibɛ nɛ ihibɛ womɔ sigɛ le bariyaai.
47007016	Kijɛ puu nɛ e le gawu mu bɛɛjɛ gɔ dɛi mu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔun.
47008001	Ba unrunw, Maseduanɛ gana Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe nɛ Ama nɛɛma bana birɛ wo biru gɔ emɛ e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔuwɔin.
47008002	Halu be ɔɲɛ diyɛ subɔrɔ logoro nɛ toin kanran, halu nau ɛjii bei yasɛ kanran, kinɛ ɛɛli diyɛ be sɛɛ gɔ bei damaa, numɔ maa kunɔmɔlu go, be bɛrɛ sin gaai kanranmaabe.
47008003	Mu naran go e bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔn, be gɔnrɔn bemɛ bana wɔɔ gin’ sin kanraanbɛin. Halu gɔnrɔn bemɛ dɛi gaa kanraanbɛin. Kuu bemɛ le,
47008004	be maini le emɛ bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, Ama inɛw Judea nɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ sin kanrun birɛ gɔ nɛ numɔ unrunbemɛ kunɔmɔ gin.
47008005	Be, be le emɛ ajubu dɛi sigɛ kanraanbɛin. Be, laa gɔ, kuu bemɛ Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ obaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu emɛ bɛrɛ obin.
47008006	Kodigɛu, emɛ Titei gɛnyaan, ebe nɛ sin kanrun birɛ kɔɔ bana wo tɔlu le kɛukɛu, yai donugo gin.
47008007	Kijɛ puu nɛ sɔɔ ebe sɛɛu wɔɔ. Gagawu nɛ wee, sɔɔ nɛ wee, jugɔ nɛ wee, sɔɔ tɔgu puu nɛ kuu kunu nɛ wee, emi ibɛɛ bii nɛ wee. Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, sin kanrun birɛ ɔn nɛ kanran sɔɔ ebe sɛɛu bojoi.
47008008	Mu tɔɔrui e bɛrɛ obouwɔlɔn, kaa inɛw wajunw maini gɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmu ye, ihibɛ ebe yɔgɔ baa wɔɔ ma yɛnɛdɔn dɛii.
47008009	Sabu e Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ igii wɔi. Wo kijɛ baŋai bee kanran, ebaa nau unrunmɔ le digɛnu Ama oju dimi arusɛgɛ joo siyɛ ga, wo e sabu dɛi nauginɛi biyaabe.
47008010	Nɛɛ, sɔɔ kɔɔ sibɛ go kinɛ ma ajubu e bɛrɛ mu tagamɔi: Gari baa, buudu ɔn sɛgu gɔ e laa tɔlu. Kɔɔ sai laa, buudu gɔ sɛgu dadaaru kanran ei laa ai. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, buudu sɛgu gɔ e donugoun jaain wɔɔ.
47008011	Nɛɛ kai, wogɔ birɛ gɔ digi ye donugoi. Kinɛ ɛju le buudu gɔ sɛgu dadaaru ei ai gin’, kinɛ ɛju wogɔ le nimɛ kanran sɛgu donugoi. Gɔnrɔn ebe le kɛukɛu kanrain.
47008012	Sabu sin kanran ga kinɛ ɛju yasɛu ye, kijɛ u sɛɛ u obojɛ gɔi Ama yabajɛ. Kijɛ sɛlɛ u wɔɔ gɔi laa.
47008013	Ebaa inɛw wajunwin baradei giye ei dɛgugiyɛmɔ gɛɛnɛ. Kaa inɛw puu tunmɔ le kɛukɛu bii sɔɔi.
47008014	Kanɛ e kijɛ siyaa nau bemɛ goouwɔi. Nɛɛ, be kijɛ siyaa be wɔnu, nau e bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, be kanran nau ebe goo bɛbɛɛdɛin. Kunrin, e wooi kɛukɛu biyɛdo.
47008015	Wogɔ, Ama Dɔn sɔɔ ɔn le sɛgɛraa wɔɔ: “Inɛ gaai turaabe baŋa gɔ, sigɛ sɛbele. Gaila turaabe baŋa gɔi baalu kanranlu.”
47008016	Mamaa e dɛi emɛ sɛɛ tunkanrin, Ama, Tite kinɛ nɛ wo kunu gɔ dɛi, wo birɛpoo.
47008017	Tite bɛrɛ gɛɛn emɛ gɛin gɔ, wo yabaabe. Sigiyaa, mamaa womɔ dɛi, wo kuu womɔ le gowaa e bɛrɛ yaado gi.
47008018	Emɛ wo le digɛraa, Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagu dɛi, bainɛ boi ɛju womɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu nɛ ginaa wɔɔ gɔi tiiuwɔin.
47008019	Sigiyaa, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe woi yɛmaa, sin kanrun birɛ emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraaɲu ɔn nɛ, yoi yaanɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛi biyɛ gin. Emɛ birɛ wogɔ, Inɛw Baŋa boi sɔmɔ dɛi lee, inɛw wajunwin bara ga maini le emɛ wɔɔ tagara dɛi lee birɛɲu.
47008020	Buudu diyɛ ɔn le sin obu birɛ emɛ birɛjɛ gɔ dɛi, inɛw jarugu sɔɔ emɛ nɛ bɛɛnɔu ga, emɛ kajubauwɔin.
47008021	Emɛ sɔɔ ɛju gɔi kanrun dɛnɛɲu. Ama giru nɛ ɛjii wɔɔ sai laa, inɛw giru nɛ kanran ɛjii wɔɔ gɔi dɛnɛɲu.
47008022	Be le digɛraa emɛ, emɛ bainɛi kanran tiiuwɔin. Waaru joo, womaa maai wɔɔ ma, emɛ sɔɔ joo nɛ woi subɔraa yɛnaabɛin. Kanɛ iyaa e le ɛjii gawaa wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, mamaa womɔ sigɛ le bariyaai.
47008023	Nɛɛ Tite, wo kai mu bɔɔnɛi. Mu le bariyaa e dɛi birɛuwɔ. Ba unrunw wajunw gɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw tiibei. Be Kirisito boi sɔmi biyɛ dɛi birɛuwɔin.
47008024	Kodigɛu, e ihibɛ yasɛi ga, emɛ kanran e dɛi kuu emɛ unɔu baa bee ga, wogɔ sɛɛrɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe be iyemɔi.
47009001	Narain, Ama inɛw bɛrɛ baru tii dɛi, lɛtɛrɛ e bɛrɛ mu tiiun baalu.
47009002	Mu kinɛ ɛju ebe igii wɔun. Mu wogɔ dɛi Maseduanɛ bɛɛnw giru nɛ, e dɛi kuu ma unɔu, Akayi gana ba unrunw, gari baa, unrunbei yegeraa wɔin gɛɛuwɔn. Maini ebe gɔ inɛw jooi wo damu.
47009003	Kɔɔ sibɛ go ei mu sɔmu gɔ sɔɔ peerei biyɛnɔu, kaa mu sɔi gin’ e yeguru le wɔi biyɛ ga, mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Mu kodɛi ba unrunw gɔbei tiiuwɔn.
47009004	Maseduanɛ ba unrunw gɔbe waaru mu le be wiyaajɛ, e yeguru le wɔlɔi tɛmɛmɔnɔugi. Kɔɔi laa ye, e le emɛ gawu gɔ, emɛ dɔgɔi biyɛdo. Dɔgɔ ebe gɔ kai sɔɔnu doori.
47009005	Kodigɛu, ba unrunw gɔbe giru ma nɛ e bɛrɛ yaaun jaain wɔɔ ga ajubaa, mu bei gɛnyaanbɔn. Bemaa yaa ye sin obu pui e kunu sɔɔ gɔ kilɛmɔ gun. Kunrin, mu sin obu ebe gɔ yegeraa kilaai wɛɛ tɛmɛdɔn, iyaa, sin obu ebe gɔ kara sɛlɛ sɔɔi laa, kinɛpilu le sin obui ga jujugɔmɔdo.
47009006	E jugɔi, toi gaila tɔwaajɛ baŋa, gɛlu gaila gɛlɛdo. Gaai tɔwaajɛ baŋa, gaai gɛlɛdo.
47009007	Kodigɛu, inɛ tuturu puu kinɛ womɔ nɛ bana wo kɛjaajɛ gin’ obo. Kinɛ aalu le ma, waajibi ga ma obonɔu. Sabu kinɛ ɛɛlu le obonɛ gɔ, Ama wogɔ baŋai dɛnɛjɛ.
47009008	Ebaa, waaru puu, bana puu nɛ, kai ebe puu kilɛɲu kijɛ sɛnu, iyaa, birɛ ɛju wooi ebaa birɛ ga, kijɛ joo siyɛ ga, Ama e bɛrɛ nɛɛma tɔgu dɛin dɛin baru ye oboɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
47009009	Ama Dɔn nɛ inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ dɛi bana tɔŋɔ gin’: “Wo numɔ maa kunɔlu go naugunw bɛrɛ sin kanraanjɛ. Ɛju womɔ asuu bibiyɛdo.”
47009010	Ama, toi tɔɔnɛ bɛrɛ toi obonɛ gɔ, iyaa pana womɔ tɔɔnɛ gɔ, e bɛrɛ toi obo ye gaai narinyɛnmɔ ye, kole digɛnu wo ɛhɛju ebe ii gaai nanarinyɛnmɔdo.
47009011	Kunrin, sibɛ puu nɛ e kijɛ joo sii ye, waaru puu sin joo kanrun bɛbɛɛdei. Sin wogɔbe, emɛ le digɛnu Amai birɛpoo tagu jɛjɛɛlɛdo.
47009012	Sabu sin obu ɔn birɛ gɔ, Ama inɛw kai kikilɛmɔjɛ sai laa, kaa, Ama bɛrɛ birɛpoo tagu sɔɔ joo yaa nanarinyɛnmɔjɛ.
47009013	Inɛw, baru ebe birɛ le kinɛ ɛju ebe ihiyedɛin. Kole digɛnu, be Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ le e gawaa wɔi ga, sɔɔ yabu le bana e taguru gɔ dɛi, Ama boi sɔsɔmɔdɛin. Iyaa, be lee, inɛw wajunw puu lee bɛrɛ sin kanrun le bana kijɛ ebe e gamulu dɛi, be Amai sɔsɔmɔdɛin.
47009014	Ama nɛɛma diyɛ naa diyɛ e bɛrɛ wo kanrun gɔ dɛi, be ihibɛ le e dɛi Ama gɛgɛɛndɛin.
47009015	Ama sin obu aŋa dɛi gaa wo kanrun gɔ dɛi, woi sɔmɔmɔi.
47010001	Mu Pɔlu, e le wɔnu inɛ kuu sunugu le wɔɔ gɛɛɲu gɔ, wageniyaan ye e le inɛ ɛɛin wɔɔ gɛɛɲu gɔ, Kirisito kinɛ ɛju sɛɛ gɔ lee, muyɔn wo sɛɛ gɔ lee dɛi mu kuu ma le e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ,
47010002	e bɛrɛ waaru mu wiyaajɛ, mainiyaanjɛi ye, e le mu bɛrɛ ɛɛin biyɛ kaaramɔnɔugi. Sabu emaa Adama unrunw peere bana le kɛukɛu yoi yaaɲu inɛw gɛɛnw gɔbe sibɛ go liyɛ sɛlɛ go, mu ɛɛin bii bɛbɛɛdɔn ga igii wɔun.
47010003	Emɛ gojunawan le wɔin narain, kaa, Adama ii peere bana le jai jaiyɛɛnɛ.
47010004	Sabu gelu le kɔmɔ emɛ taajɛ gɔ, Adama ii peere kɔmɔtai gelui laa. Kaa Ama kɔmɔgelu paŋagui. Kɔmɔsɛguru ginrun gɔbei damu sunugoɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ. Emɛ, ajubu kɔri wɔin gɔbe le jaii ye bei susuyoɲu.
47010005	Kijɛ kuu ulogu ingei kanran, Ama jugu tɛtɛŋɛjɛ, kole jajaiyɛjɛ ye, emɛ wogɔbe minɛ nɛ damu sunugoɲu. Emɛ ajubu puu aa pagaa ye, Kirisito sɔɔ yabamɔɲu.
47010006	Iyaa, sɔɔ yabu ebe gɔ waaru kibaajɛ, sɔɔ yabala puu kuu nɛ jarugu duurɔ ga emɛ yegeraa wɔin.
47010007	E, sɔɔ bain go yɛnɛjɛi. Inɛ turu kuu womɔ le unruin Kirisito mɔi ga lugaa sɛɛ ye, wo sɔɔ ɔn ajubu womɔ nɛ kunɔ gɛliyɛ: Woi Kirisito mɔi wɔɔ gin’, emɛi kanran Kirisito mɔi.
47010008	Inɛw Baŋa, emɛ bɛrɛ kuu ebe nɛ paŋa obu gɔ dɛi, mu gaila kuu ma unaa gaanaatun kanran, dɔgɔ mu aaun jaanla. Paŋa wogɔ, ei bariyɛmɔ ga emɛ bɛrɛ obin, ei suyo dɛi laa.
47010009	Mu lɛtɛrɛ ma gɔbe le ei liirɛmɔuwɔn ma e ajubu ye ibɛlaun.
47010010	Sabu inɛw sɔwaa, lɛtɛrɛ nɛ sɔɔ womɔ gɔbe ɛɛin wɔɔ, paŋa yasin. Kaa kuu womɔ le wiyaai ye, womaa inɛ yɛbɛlɛginɛi, sɔɔ sɔɔ inɛɛ gɛɛɲu.
47010011	Inɛ kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔnɛ gɔ wo sɔɔ ɔn jugɔ: Wɔlɔ wɔnu lɛtɛrɛ nɛ bana sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gin’, wiyaa dɔwaain ye, emɛ wogɔ gin’ tee birɛɲu.
47010012	Narain, inɛw boi ɛju bemɛ be turu sɔɔɲu gamuu le kɛukɛu biyɛ ma, be le emi tunwɔn ma, emɛ kanraannɛ. Be kuu bemɛ gelu le unrunbei tunwɔnɲu. Tunmɔ tunmɔ le unrunbei tunwɔn yɛnɛɲu. Be bomɔgunwin.
47010013	Emɛ kai kuu emɛ unu ye kale gaanu ibɛlain. Ama, e bɛrɛ baa emi dɔɔmaa, birɛ emɛ bɛrɛ wo birɛmu gɔ, emɛ birɛ wogɔ kale gɔ nɛ biyɛdɛin.
47010014	E bɛrɛ baa dɔɔnɛ bɛin ye, emɛ kale gɔ nɛ gaanauwɔin. Kaa, emɛ kale gɔ nɛ gaanauwɔnɛ. Sabu emɛ naran go Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le e bɛrɛ baa dɔwaabɛin.
47010015	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ, kale biyɛun jaan gɔ nɛ gaananɛ. Emɛ inɛ waja birɛ dɛi kuu emɛ unɔuwɔnɛ. Kaa, gagawu e sɛɛ gɔ bariyaai ye, yalu birɛ biru emɛ logoro ebe nɛ sigɛ le wawanado ga emɛ wogɔ diyɛdɔn yasin.
47010016	Kunrin emɛ gana onu ebe nɛ wɔin gɔbe nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga bɛbɛɛdɛin. Inɛw wajunw minɛ nɛ biraa galin dɛi emɛ kuu emɛ unɔidenɛ.
47010017	Kaa Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ aai kanran, kuu womɔ uhunɔdo ye, Inɛw Baŋa kijɛ kanrun dɛi kuu womɔ unɔ.”
47010018	Sabu, inɛ le yabaidɛin gɔ, inɛ kuu womɔ le boi ɛju unrunmɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔi laa. Inɛw Baŋa, boi ɛju womɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔi.
47011001	E bomɔ daga ma gɔ tariyaabei ye ɛjii wɔɔ. Mainiyaan ye bomɔ ma muyɔin.
47011002	Mu e sibɛ go ele le wɔun. Ele Ama nɛ goojɛ gɔ le wɔun. Ingei ma giyaa ye, iyaa gulɔi aala gin’ ei igɛ obu bɛɛ ga, mu ainɛ turu sai bɛrɛ aŋa ma obun. Wogɔ Kirisitoi.
47011003	Kaa yuguru gɔ Hawai sosoŋɔ unrunmɔ le wo dɔburu gin’, hakilɛ ebe yanwan ye, naran le, ɛjaai go Kirisito sibɛ go bana e wɔɔ gɔ papajadei ma mu liyɛuwɔn.
47011004	Sabu, emɛ Yesu dɛi waaju tagin. Yesu wogɔi laa go, Yesu waja dɛi, inɛ wiyaa waaju tagaajɛ gɔ, e kobaŋai sɛɛu muyɔn bɛbɛɛjɛi. Iyenɛ, Kikinu e bɛi gɔi laa go, Kibɛru Ɛju le e yabu gɔi laa go, waja le yabu bɛbɛɛjɛi.
47011005	Mu, inɛw Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu sigɛbei ga kowɔin kɔɔbei, kijɛ nɛ dɔɔlu mu wɔɔ wɔlɔ ga wɔun.
47011006	Sɔɔ bana sɔɔun jaan sibɛ nɛ mu kijɛ kanma inɔn kanran, jugɔ sibɛ nɛ mu kunrin wɔlɔn. Emɛ bana puu le, sibɛ puu nɛ wogɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmaabɛin.
47011007	Kibɛru Ɛju Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ, mu dɔnrun wɔlɔ go e bɛrɛ tagun. Mu kuu ma sunugu ye, kuu ebe unɔdɔn ga wogɔ kanrun. Nɛɛ, mu wogɔ hakɛi kanrun ma?
47011008	Mu ei baradɔn ga, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wajabe bɛrɛ elu ɛlaa, be bɛrɛ tujɔ yabaabɔn.
47011009	Iyaa, ebe nɛ wɔu, kai biyaa, mu inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran dɔɔ ma duurɔlun. Ba unrunw Maseduanɛ gowaa wɛin gɔbe, kai ma be kilɛmu. Kijɛ inge nɛi kanran, e bɛrɛ dɔɔ ma duiyɔmɔ ga mu yabalun. Iye dɔɔ mu wogɔ kanraindolɔn.
47011010	Naran Kirisito nɛ goojɛ, mu nɛ too gɔ dɛi sɔɔjɔn, Akayi gana puu nɛ kuu ma unu sɔɔ kɔɔ, inɛ mu bɛrɛ goonɔido wɔlɔ.
47011011	Kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ mu sɔɔjɛ gɔ, inge dɛi? Ei ibɛlaun dɛi ma? Ei ibɛɛ wɔun ga Ama kai igii wɔɔ.
47011012	Kaa inɛw unrunbe kanran emɛ gin’ tee birɛɲu gɛɛuwɔin gɔbe, bemaa kuu bemɛ unu bana bɛɛnɔu ga, kanɛ bana kanraun mu wɔɔ gin’ mu kanrannu yinyaadɔn.
47011013	Inɛw kɔɔbe Kirisito jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu kakalugunwin. Birɛbirɛnw inɛw lelemɔwin, unrunbei Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui gin’ bojaa sɛin.
47011014	Wogɔ yaa sɔɔ taanrinyɛin laa, sabu Setanu wo kuu womɔ le unruin mɛlɛnkɛ dooro le wɔɔi gin’ bojojɛ.
47011015	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, birɛbirɛnw womɔbe unrunbei teitai birɛbirɛnwin gin’ be bojojɛ gɔ sɔɔ yerui laa. Birɛ bemɛ bana wɔɔ gin’, dumɔrɔn bemɛ yaa yinbiyɛdo.
47011016	Mu pilemaa sɔɔuwɔn, inɛ turu kanran mui bomɔginɛi gin’ yɛnɛnɔu. Kaa, mui bomɔginɛi gin’ yɛnɛuwɔi ye, maa kanran, gaila kuu ma unu bɛɛ dɛi biyɛmɔi.
47011017	Sɔɔ sɔɔu mu wɔɔ gɔ, mu Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ biyaa sɔɔuwɔlɔn. Kaa kuu ma unu sɔɔ sɔɔu mu wɔɔ ɔn nɛ, mu bomɔginɛ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn.
47011018	Inɛw joo aduna ɔn nɛ kijɛ be kanrun dɛi kuu bemɛ unɔuwɔin. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu yaa kuu ma uhunɔdɔn.
47011019	E hakilɛgunwin digɛu, nɛɛ bomɔgunwin sɛɛu tari bɛbɛɛjɛi.
47011020	Ei gunɔ kunɔ ma, ei kaya ma, guju ebe pɔɔ ma, ei namanu gala ma, lege ebe laga ma, e wogɔ tatariyɛjɛi.
47011021	Sɔɔ ga mu bɛrɛ dɔgɔi, kaa emɛ yɛbɛlɛ emɛi tagurin gin’ biyaai. Nɛɛ inɛ turu unrun kuu unrunmɔ unu bɛbɛɛjɛ ga wɔɔ ye, mu bomɔginɛ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn laa ye, mu yaa kuu ma unɔ bɛbɛɛjɔn.
47011022	Bei Heburu tɔgui laa? Mu kanran woi. Bei Isɛrɛlu tɔgui laa? Mu kanran woi. Be Abarahamu nɛ goin laa? Mu kanran woi.
47011023	Be Kirisito birɛbirɛnwin laa? Aiwa, mu kuu ma mu le wɔlɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn laa ye, be dɛi sigɛ Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛi wɔun. Birɛ nɛ be dɛi sigɛun, kubɔ lugo kaju mu yoi nɛ be dɛi sigɛun, logi bɛi nɛ be dɛi sigɛun. Waaru gamuu mu yiun le bɛrii biyɛbɔn.
47011024	Yahutunw, kubɔ pɛnai nɛ turu tolo go, kubɔ numɔrɔn baa mui lagin.
47011025	Kubɔ taanu baga le mui lagin. Tibu le mui kamaa daadɛin ga kubɔ turu bii. Kubɔ taanu diikoro mu le piri. Aga turu digɛ turu mu nɛudii nɛ yabɔn.
47011026	Mu oji joo yaabɔn. Wogɔbe nɛ dibe dii paruju yabe, kuu numɔ numɔw paruju yabe, tɔgu ma inɛw lee, tɔgu ma inɛwin laa lee puu sibɛ nɛ paruju yabe, ana diyɛ kɔlɔ nɛ lee, olusolo nɛ lee, nɛudii nɛ lee, paruju yabe. Ba unrunw tɔitɔi laain paruju yabe.
47011027	Mu birɛ kirɛbe lee, ɔɲɛ lee joo iyaabɔn. Bai joo giri bɛɛlɔn, giyɛ lee, diinɔɔrin lee iyaabɔn. Waaru joo pana kayi bɔrɔlu go aŋapagu le biyɛbɔn. Kaali lee, duŋu lee iyaabɔn.
47011028	Sɔɔ wajunw gɔbe sɔɔ sɔɔlu go, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe dɛi, mu bai puu jiire le wɔun.
47011029	Turu baŋa yɛbiliyaai ye, mui yaa yɛbiliyaai. Turu baŋa hakɛ nɛ numaa yowaai ye, kinɛ ma jijinwɛnjɛ.
47011030	Kuu ma unɔ ga mu bɛrɛ waajibi ye, yɛbɛlɛ ma kijɛ tagarajɛ dɛi kuu ma unɔdɔn.
47011031	Ama, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Ba gɔ, boi womɔ asuu sɔmi biyɛmɔ. Mu kakalui maŋaalɔn ga wo igii wɔɔ.
47011032	Damasu ana nɛ, Ɔgɔnɛ Aretasu waaru le, sɛmɛginɛ kɔɔ nɛ daanbe gɔ, mui aado ga Damasu bɛɛnw bɛrɛ ana gɔ dɔmiyɛnmɔube.
47011033	Kaa tomɔ nɛ mui kunaa, dɔlu le mui jege gɔ doɲu nɛ sunugaabɛin. Mu kɔɔ gin’ numɔ womɔ nɛ ɛliyaa gowaabɔn.
47012001	Kuu ma unu gɔ waajibi laa ye, ɛju konɛ tolo. Kokanran, mu kuu iyebe lee, Inɛw Baŋa mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmu lee sɔɔ nɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn.
47012002	Mu Kirisito jaŋu ii turu igii wɔun. Nɛɛ anranguju pɛli naisigɛ dɔwaai, wo goju womɔ nɛ yatobe ma, tobele ma, Ama igii wɔɔ laa ye, mu inɔn, kaa woi jeɲaa, ginsɛsai alagala taaniye go baa uni.
47012003	Ainɛ kɔɔi jeɲaa, alujɛnɛ nɛ baa uni ga mu igii wɔun. Kaa wo goju womɔ le bee ma, kole bele ma mu inɔn. Amai sai wogɔ jugɔjɛ.
47012004	Konɛ wo sɔɔ inɛ pilemu ye sɔɔ bɛɛlɛ, sɔɔ aŋa dɛi gaa ɛgaabe.
47012005	Inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ dɛi mu kuu ma uhunɔdɔn. Kaa kuu ma le yɛbɛlɛ ma kijɛ tagarajɛ dɛi laa ye, mu kuu ma unɔidolɔn.
47012006	Mu kuu ma unɔ ibɛɛ wɔun ye, mui bomɔginɛi gɛiyɛɛlɛ. Sabu mu narain sɔɔdɔn. Kaa inɛ turu mu nɛ sɔɔ wo iyejɛ lee, wo ɛgɛjɛ lee dɛi sigɛ mui bojodo ma liliyɛ dɛi, mu wogɔ kanraindolɔn.
47012007	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ kijɛ sigɛ naa sigɛ mu bɛrɛ jugɔmi kɔɔbe dɛi maa kuu ulo le joi ye biyɛnɔu ga, jijii turu goju ma nɛ digɛraa bojaaɲu. Jijii wogɔ, Setanu titiyainɛi biyaa, maa kuu ulo le joi ye biyɛnɔu ga mui ɔɲɔmɔuwɔ.
47012008	Kubɔ taanu mu Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, ɔɲɛ kɔɔ mu le wageniyɛnmɔ gun.
47012009	Wo mu le saa: «Nɛɛma ma gɔ ui baa. Sabu gɔnrɔn ma paŋa gɔ, yɛbɛlɛ nɛ iyemɔjɛ.» Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Kirisito gɔnrɔn gɔ mu nɛ toiyo ga, yɛbɛlɛ ma dɛi sigɛ le mu kuu ma uhunɔdɔn.
47012010	Kodigɛu, Kirisito dɛi yɛbɛlɛi ma, kuusugo sɔɔ ma, nau ma, tɔɔɲɔ ma, kinɛ ɔɲɛ sɔɔ ma mu bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, kinɛ ma ahaajɛ. Sabu waaru mui yɛbiliyaajɛ, paŋa waaru mu sɛɛ gɔ woi.
47012011	Mu bomɔginɛi biyaaun. Kaa ei mui biyɛmaa kaaru. Sabu boi ɛju ma sɔɔ sɔɔnw gɔ ei biyɛun dagaa. Halu mui kijɛ kanmai laa kanran, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu sigɛbei ga kowɔin kɔɔbei kijɛ nɛ dɔɔlu mu kanrun wɔlɔ.
47012012	Mui Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui ga birɛ le jugɔmɔjɛ gɔbe puu logoro ebe nɛ muyɔn tɔgu puu le tagaraabɛin. Sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee, yarabirɛ lee, taanrinyɛn lee wogɔ tagurin.
47012013	Dɔɔ ma e bɛrɛ duurɔlun mu kanrun gɔi laa go, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wajunw kijɛ bɛin e bɛɛlu gɔ ingei? Teitai laa wogɔ mui yaabu kanrain.
47012014	Yɛnɛi, kubɔ taaniye e bɛrɛ mu wɛɛido dɛi, mu mui yegeraa wɔun. Nimɛ kanran dɔɔ ma e bɛrɛ duurɔidolɔn. Sabu mu numɔ ebe kijɛi dɛnɛɛlɔn, ei dɛnɛjɔn. Unrunw, bei naranw kai dɛi kijɛ mɔɔnɔɔnɛ, kaa, unrunw naranw gɔbei, unrunw gɔ kai dɛi kijɛ mɔɔnɔɲu.
47012015	Kunrin, mu kai kinrun ebe dɛi numɔ ma kijɛ puu kinɛ ɛɛli le obodɔn. Mu mui kanran ohobodɔn. Mu kɔɔ gin’ ei ibɛɛ mu wɔnu, e mui gaai ibɛlai biyɛdei ma?
47012016	E ajubaa yɛnaa ye, maa dɔɔ ma e bɛrɛ duurɔlun narain, kaa maa inɛ soŋɔi digɛu sosoŋɔ ma le ei bɛi gɛɛjɛi.
47012017	Inɛw e bɛrɛ mu tii gɔbe le mu ei punaa kayaabɔn ma?
47012018	Mu Titei gɛnyaan, e bɛrɛ yaa gun. Iyaa emɛ bainɛ gɔi wo le digɛraa tiyaabɔn. Tite ei punaa kayaabe ma? Wo lee, mu lee, birɛ emɛ gɔ ajubu turu gɔ le birɛnɛ ma? Yoiyaara emɛ bana gɔ turu laa ma?
47012019	Emaa giru ebe nɛ, anrin baa kuu emɛ nɛ narain obouwɔin ma ga e ajubauwɔi. Kaa, emɛ Kirisito le pagu turu go Ama giru nɛ sɔɔuwɔin. Koyɛ, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, ebaa paŋa bɛɛ gai sɔɔɲu.
47012020	Waaru e bɛrɛ mu dɔwaajɛ, bana mu dɛnɛjɛ gin’ e yinwɔlɔi tɛmɛdɔn ma liyɛuwɔn. E kanran bana e dɛnɛɛlɛ gin’ mu biyɛdɔn ma liyɛuwɔn. Logoro ebe nɛ jai lee, ele lee, kinɛ ingelemu lee, tunmɔ tɛmurun sɔɔ lee, boi yamulu lee, jaara lee, kuu ulo lee, oju sɛlɛ birɛ lee tɛtɛmɛdɔn ma liyɛuwɔn.
47012021	Mu e bɛrɛ wiyaa dɔwaaun ye, Ama, giru ebe nɛ pilemu ye mu bɛrɛ dɔgɔ wo taguru ye, giru nɛ baa inɛw hakɛ kanrin gɔbe logoro nɛ joo, kanran lɔgɔgu bemɛ lee, sala bemɛ lee, kuu sɛlɛ birɛ bemɛ lee dɛi ajubuduli bɛɛnɛ giye, kuu bemɛ nɛ mu bɛrɛ pii pipiimɔ ma liyɛuwɔn.
47013001	Mu kubɔ taaniyei e bɛrɛ yaauwɔn. Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Sɔɔ puu sɛɛrɛ lɛi ma taanu ma aŋa sɛɛrɛ le kilɛmɔɲu.”
47013002	Kodigɛu, giru nɛ inɛw hakɛ kanrin gɔbe lee, wajunw puu lee bɛrɛ mu kanɛ baa tagauwɔn. Halu mu kanɛ e le wɔlɔn dɛi, kubɔ lɛiye e bɛrɛ mu wɛi gɔ le bana mu sɔi gin’, e bɛrɛ wiyaaun ye, inɛ mu paabaido wɔlɔ.
47013003	Kirisito mu le digɛnu sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ ga, e wogɔ sɛɛrɛ iye ibɛɛ wɔi digɛu, e bɛbɛɛdei. Kirisito e sibɛ nɛ yɛbɛlɛ le wɔlɔ, kaa gɔnrɔn womɔ logoro ebe nɛ tagarauwɔ.
47013004	Yɛbɛlɛ womɔ sabu dɛi woi baga nɛ pɛgin narain. Kaa wo Ama gɔnrɔn dɛi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ. Emɛ kanran, wo le digɛu yɛbiliyaain. Kaa emɛ sɔɔ ebe kilɛmɔɲu gɔnrɔn yasin, sabu emɛ kanran, Ama gɔnrɔn dɛi, Kirisito le digɛu ɔnmɔi wɔin.
47013005	E tunmi kuu ebe marun yɛnɛi. Gagawu le yaauwɔi ma tunmi ei suburu yɛnɛi. Yesu Kirisito e nɛ yato ga jugɔuwɔlɔi ma? Kɔɔi ye e subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛli ma laa ye kai.
47013006	Kaa emɛ subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛnɛ kanrannɛ ga e jujugɔdei diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
47013007	Ebaa mɔɲu turu kanran kanrannɔu ga, emɛ e dɛi Ama gɛɛunwɔin. Emɛ subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaaɲu tagaradɛin dɛi laa, kaa ebaa ɛju kanran gai. Halu emɛ subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛnɛ gin’ wɔin kanran koi.
47013008	Sabu emɛ naran gɔ le yabiyɛ gɔnrɔin laa ye, naran le jaiyɛ gɔnrɔn sɛnɛ.
47013009	Waaru emi yɛbiliyaa, kole digɛnu paŋa e siyaajɛ, emɛ kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu. Iyaa ei kibaai biyɛ ga, amagɛɛn emɛ nɛ kijɛ emɛ dɛnɛjɛ gɔ woi.
47013010	Wogɔ digɛu, kanɛ e le wɔlɔ mu wɔɔ waaru gɔ le mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tɔŋɔ tiiuwɔn. Waaru e bɛrɛ wiyaa mu dɔwaajɛ, maa kuu ebe nɛ paŋa mu sɛɛ le kɛukɛu e sibɛ nɛ ɛɛin biyɛnɔu ga kodɛi tɔŋɔuwɔn. Inɛw Baŋa, maa paŋa ebe bariyɛmɔ ga kuu ebe nɛ mu bɛrɛ paŋa obu. Ei suyo gai laa.
47013011	Nɛɛ kai ba unrunw, jamu biyɛmɔi. Kibaai bii nɛ mainiyɛin, tunmɔi mainiyɛnmɔi, mii turu le biyɛi, tunmɔ le jamu le biyɛi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, ihibɛ lee, jamu lee Ama gɔ e le bibiyɛdo.
47013012	Ama inɛw gin’ ihibɛ le tunmɔi poonɔi. Ama inɛw gɔbe puu ei poonɔuwɔin.
47013013	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ lee, Ama ihibɛ gɔ lee, Kikinu Pilu bɔɔi bii gɔ lee, e wooi le biyɛ.
48001001	Mu Pɔlu, Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn mu tiiuwɔ. Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui bii ma gɔ, inɛw sɔɔ aaru le digɛla, iyaa inɛ turu kanran mui tiilu. Kaa Yesu Kirisito lee, Ba Ama yiun nɛ woi bulomɔnɛ gɔ lee, mui be tii.
48001002	Ba unrunw ɔn nɛ mu le wɔin gɔbe, mu le bariyaa lɛtɛrɛ ɔn Galasi gana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe bɛrɛ tiiuwɔin.
48001003	Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
48001004	Ama emɛ, emɛ Bai wɔɔ gɔ diŋɛ le kɛukɛu, hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi yaba ye aduna mɔɲu ɔn numɔ nɛ emi yabu goonɔ ga, Yesu kuu unrunmɔ obaabe.
48001005	Boi sɔmu gɔ asuu nasuu Ama mɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
48001006	Bana, Ama, Kirisito nɛɛma dɛi ei boonɔnɛ gɔi ɔgu pajaatiyaa, kibɛru ɛju waja sɔɔ e yabu gɔ, wogɔ mu bɛrɛ maunɛ kanrun.
48001007	Naran sɔɔ gin ye, kibɛru ɛju waja wɔlɔ. Inɛw hakilɛ ebe bimiliyemɔw, inɛw Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ dulomaa ye yamulu ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe sai yɔɔin.
48001008	Kaa, halu emɛ ma, mɛlɛnkɛ alagala gowaa wɛi ma wiyaa, Kibɛru Ɛju e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu gɔi laa go, kibɛru ɛju waja tagaajɛ ye, baŋai jɛbi biyɛmɔ.
48001009	Emɛ e bɛrɛ tagaabɛin, iyaa kanɛ pilemaa sɔɔuwɔn: Kibɛru Ɛju le e yabu gɔi laa go, waja inɛ e bɛrɛ tagaajɛ biyaai ye, baŋai jɛbi biyɛmɔ.
48001010	Nɛɛ kanɛ sɔɔ mu sɔi gɔ nɛ, mu inɛw bemaa mui sɔmɔ ga ibɛun ma, Ama womaa mui sɔmɔ ga ibɛun? Maa, mu inɛw kinɛ aamɔ ibɛun ma? Iye bai dɔɔ mu inɛw kinɛ aamui ibɛun ye, mu Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛi biyɛbelɔn.
48001011	Ba unrunw, sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii jugɔi: Kibɛru Ɛju mu tagajɛ gɔ, wogɔ inɛw bɛrɛ goolu.
48001012	Mu wogɔ inɛw le bɛɛlun. Iyaa inɛ turu kanran wogɔ mu bɛrɛ deerelu. Kaa Yesu Kirisito kuu womɔ le, mu bɛrɛ wogɔ wo jugɔmu.
48001013	Laa waaru Yahutunw oju mu dimɛbe le bana mu bee gɔ, e wogɔ ɛgaabei. Mu waaru wogɔ le Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi gaai ɔɲɔmɔubɔn. Mu woi suyo ibɛɛ bɔun.
48001014	Yahutunw oju bana mu dimɛbe nɛ, mu kadagabe logoro nɛ, tɔgu ma inɛw joo dɛi sigɛ giru go yaaubɔn. Emɛ tirɛ anranw atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ mu kuu ma saii obaa sɛbɔn.
48001015	Kaa Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi, mui naranmɔ nɛ baa, mui dɛiin bojaa, mui birɛ womɔ dɛi boonaabe. Kɔɔ gin’, maa inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ Aini womɔ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga ga, waaru Aini womɔ mu bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ga kinɛ womɔ ai le, mu Adama ii turu kanran tinwinrun dɛnɛlun.
48001017	Iyaa, inɛw giru ma nɛ Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui biyin gɔbei iye ga, mu Jerusalɛmu kanran yaalun. Kaa mu ɔgu kɛu Arabi gana nɛ yaabɔn. Kɔɔ onu nɛ Damasu ana nɛ pilemaa wiyaabɔn.
48001018	Kɔɔ onu nɛ anranguju taanu galaa wo yaa, mu kɔɔ gin’, Piɛrui iye dɛi Jerusalɛmu nɛ yaabɔn. Mu bai pɛli numɔrɔnsigɛ wo le biyaabɔn.
48001019	Jake, Inɛw Baŋa suŋɔrɔn gɔi laa ye, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ inɛ turu kanran iyelun.
48001020	Mu Ama dɛi sɔɔuwɔn, sɔɔ mu gɛɛjɛ ɔn narain. Mu kakalui maŋaalɔn.
48001021	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, mu Rɔmɛ laamu Siri numɔ nɛ lee, Silisi numɔ nɛ lee yaabɔn.
48001022	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu Judea gana nɛ Kirisito le bɔɔi biyaa wɔin gɔbe nimɛ girupala ma iyetɛnɛ bɛin.
48001023	Be inɛw wajunw mu dɛi sɔɔ sɔɔu be bee ɔn sai ɛgɛubɛin: «Inɛ pɔɔlɔ emi ɔɲɔmɔu bee gɔ, laa gagawu yamala ga saii mainiyɛun wo bee gɔ, wo gagawu wogɔ dɛi kanɛ waaju tagauwɔ.»
48001024	Kɔɔ gin’, be mu dɛi Ama boi sɔmɔubɛin.
48002001	Anranguju pɛli naisigɛ galaa wo yaa, kɔɔ waaru le mu Barunabasu le Jerusalɛmu nɛ pilemaa yaabɔn. Mu Titei kanran jijɛ yaabɔn.
48002002	Ama, maa yaa ga mui jugɔmaabe dɛi, mu yaiun. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ inɛw giru toin gɔbe lee, mu lee, mɔɔnu dɛiin emɛ kanrun gɔ nɛ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju mu tagajɛ gɔ tiyɛ gɔ be bɛrɛ jeɲaa tagaabɔn. Sabu birɛ biraa mu galu gɔ lee, birɛ birɛu mu wɔɔ gɔ lee, kijɛ tiyɛ sɛlɛi biyɛ ga ibɛla bɔun.
48002003	Halu inɛw unrunbei ba unrunwin gɛɛnw gɔbe, logoro emɛ nɛ nɛyaantiyaa yoonw gɔbe, woi araa nɔɔmu ibɛɛ bɛin kanran, Tite mui dimiyaan wɛɛnɛ gɔ, Gɛrɛku tɔgui bee gɔ, araa nɔɔ ga wo bɛrɛ waajibi biyɛlu. Inɛw kɔɔbe Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu hɔɔlɔi bii bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ bana gɔ jugɔ ga baŋiyaan logoro emɛ nɛ yoin. Be wogɔ yamuluti ye emi Yahutunw tɔɔru gunɔ nɛ kunu ibɛɛ bɛin.
48002005	Kibɛru Ɛju naran gɔ, logoro ebe nɛ biyɛmɔ ga, emɛ sɔɔ bemɛ turu kanran keŋiyɛnnɛ.
48002006	Kaa, inɛw giru toiin ga lugaa sɛin gɔbe, bei inɛw inge tɔgui bɛin ma mu kai mai sɛlɔn, sabu Ama inɛwin kabu kunɔɔlɛ. Inɛw giru toin wogɔbe, Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ mu tagabe gɔ nɛ kijɛ baraun turu kanran sɛbenɛ.
48002007	Kaa, bana Yahutunw tɔgu dɛi Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagu gɔ, Ama Piɛru bɛrɛ sagu gawaraabe gin’, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagu gɔ, Ama mu bɛrɛ sagu gawaraabe ga, be jugaabɛin.
48002008	Sabu Ama, Piɛrui Yahutunw dɛi Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyɛmɔnɛ gɔ, mui inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui wo biyɛmu.
48002009	Jake lee, Piɛru lee, Jan lee, inɛw ginrun jɛiin gin’ lugaa sɛbɛin gɔbe, birɛ dɛin kɔɔ Ama mu bɛrɛ sagu gawaraabe ga jugaabɛin. Kunrin, be mu lee, Barunabasu lee bɛrɛ numɔ dɛɛraa, numɔ emɛ aa, emɛ wooi birɛbirɛnw tunmɔ bɔɔi sɛɛrɛ gɔ kɔɔ gin’ tagaraabɛin. Emɛ tunmɔ le aaraa, mu lee, Barunabasu lee, emɛ inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe logoro nɛ yai ye birɛdɛin, be Yahutunw logoro nɛ yai ye birɛdɛin gin.
48002010	Kaa be emaa, Jerusalɛmu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ dɛgugunw toin gɔbei ajuba gin. Mu yaa wogɔ kanran ga mainiyaanbɔn.
48002011	Kaa waaru Piɛru Antiɔse ana nɛ wo wɛi le, bana wo kanrun gɔ ɛjula dɛi, mu inɛw giru nɛ woi jarugaabɔn.
48002012	Jake inɛw gamuu tii gɔbe Antiɔse nɛ be wɛɛmɔ nɛ, Piɛru, ba unrunw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe le mɔrin ye pana kayaube. Kaa inɛw kɔɔbe be wiyaa, Piɛru, jaŋu unrunw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbei inɛw araa nɔɔmɔu jaain wɔɔ gɛɛnw gɔbei liyɛube dɛi, wo ba unrunw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe le wageniyaan, be le dɛiin biyaabe.
48002013	Piɛru le bariyaa, Yahutunw ba unrunw wajunw gɔbe kanran aŋa lɛilɛi sɔɔ kanraanbɛin. Barunabasui kanran be le bariyaa lelu nɛ yoomaabe.
48002014	Kaa, be Kibɛru Ɛju naran gɔ le kɛkɛu yoi yaabenɛ ga waaru mu iye le, mu inɛw puu giru nɛ Piɛru le ɔn gin’ sɔiun: «U Yahutunw tɔgu gɔ, u Yahutunw atɛmu gɔ pajaatiyaa, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain atɛmu gɔ le kɛukɛu biyaabeu. Nɛɛ, u yani inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bemaa Yahutunw bana wɔin gin’ tee biyɛ kaara giye tɔɔru ibɛɛ wɔu?»
48002015	Emɛ kai emi Yahutunw tɔitɔibei. Emi tɔgu waja inɛw, inɛw Ama tɔɔru digɛlain gɔbei laain.
48002016	Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ, Ama inɛ teitai wɔɔ ga wo lugojɛ gɔ, wogɔ inɛ Mɔise tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemɔnɛ gɔi laa. Kaa inɛ diyɛ womɔ Yesu Kirisito kuu nɛ daanaa wɔɔ gɔi ga emɛ igii wɔin. Emɛ, Tɔɔru gɔ sɔɔ sɛɛu kibemaaɲu dɛi laa, kaa Kirisito le gawaa emɛ wɔɔ gɔ dɛi emi teitai wɔɔ lugo ga, emɛ kanran kɔɔ dɛi Kirisito Yesu le gawaa wɔin. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ turu kanran Tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemu dɛi Ama giru nɛ teitai wɔɔ giye lugoidenɛ.
48002017	Kaa nɛɛ waaru Kirisito dɛi Ama giru nɛ teitai bii emɛ dɛnɛjɛ le, emi inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe le kɛukɛu hakɛ kanranwin biyaain ye, tiyɛ gɔ Kirisito, hakɛ birɛbirɛnɛi biyaai ma? Ai, asuu!
48002018	Kijɛ mu yamulu gɔ iyaa pilemaa mu yegerejɛ ye, tiyɛ gɔ mu mui Tɔɔru yamalanɛi ga tagarauwɔn.
48002019	Ama sibɛ go mui ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, Tɔɔru le digɛu, Tɔɔru sibɛ go mui yinwaain. Mui Kirisito le baga jai nɛ pɛgaaɲu.
48002020	Nɛɛ, kunrin ɔnmɔi mu wɔɔ gɔ, lee kuu ma le ɔnmɔi wɔlɔn. Kaa Kirisitoi mu nɛ ɔnmɔi biyaa wɔɔ. Kanɛ goju le ɔnmɔi mu wɔɔ gɔ, mu Ama Aini le gawaa mu wɔɔ gɔ digɛu ɔnmɔi wɔun. Wo mui ibiyaa, kuu womɔ mu dɛi obaabe.
48002021	Mu Ama nɛɛma gɔ jumɔlun. Sabu Ama giru nɛ teitai bii gɔ Tɔɔru le bɛɛmɔjɛ ye, Kirisito bamai yinwaain. yinwaain.
48003001	Hei, Galasi bɛɛnw, e hakilɛ sɛnɛ de! Yesu Kirisitoi bana baga jai nɛ pɛgaa dain gɔ, e inɛw bɛrɛ sɛɛu ɛjɛmaa jugɔmaabɛin gɔbe, inɛ aa ei dugaabe ma?
48003002	Mu selumu ɔn sai e sai ye ibɛɛ wɔun: E, Ama Kikinu gɔ, Tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemu le bɛɛi ma, maa, e Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ɛgaa, wogɔ le gawaabei dɛi bɛɛi?
48003003	E yani kanraan ɔn gin’ hakilɛ sɛnɛ bii? E Ama Kikinu le tɔlaa, kanɛ kuu ebe gɔnrɔn le donugu ibɛɛ wɔi ma?
48003004	Sɔɔ ɔn puu e bɛrɛ bamai biyaabe ma? Bamai kai biyɛun jaanla.
48003005	Ama, Kikinu womɔ e bɛrɛ obaa, taanrinyɛn birɛ logoro ebe nɛ biraa wo taguru gɔ, wogɔ ebaa Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔbe kibemɔuwɔi ga kanrun ma, maa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ɛgaa, iyaa wogɔ le gawaabei dɛi kanrun?
48003006	Kɔɔ sibɛ go Ama Dɔn bana Abarahamu dɛi sɔɔjɛ gin’: “Abarahamu Ama le gawaabe. Gagawu womɔ digɛu, Ama, woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe.”
48003007	Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw gagawu oju nɛ toin gɔbe, Abarahamu tirɛ unrunw tɔitɔi gɔbe bei ga e jugɔun jaain wɔɔ.
48003008	Ama Dɔn nɛ pɔɔlɔ baa sɔwaa, Ama, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, gagawu bemɛ dɛi inɛw teitai wɔin ga lulugodo gi. Kunrin, wage nɛ baa, Ama Dɔn Abarahamu bɛrɛ kibɛru ɛju ɔn tagaabe: “Ama u dɛi tɔgu wooi duba kakanrando.”
48003009	Abarahamu, Ama le gawaabe dɛi, Ama woi duba kanraanbe. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw gagawu oju nɛ toin gɔbe puu, Abarahamu gin’ Ama bei duba kakanrando.
48003010	Tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemu nɛ inɛw diyɛ bemɛ daanaa sɛin gɔbe, jebu kuu bemɛ nɛ yɔɔ. Sabu Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Inɛ waaru wooi Tɔɔru dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu gɔ puu kibemɔɔlɛ baŋa gɔ jɛbi biyɛmɔ.”
48003011	Inɛ turu kanran, Tɔɔru ɛjii kibemɔuwɔ dɛi, Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugoidolo ga daii wɔɔ. Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Inɛ gagawu le digɛu teitai wɔɔ gɔ, woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.”
48003012	Tɔɔru kibemu gɔ gagawu le digɛla. Kaa, bana Ama Dɔn sɔɔjɛ gin’: “Inɛ Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ kanranjɛ gɔ, Tɔɔru gɔ digɛnu woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.”
48003013	Kirisito, dilɛ emɛ nɛ woi jɛbi biyaa, Tɔɔru jebu gɔ nɛ emi dɔrugaabe. Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Inɛ baga nɛ jelaaɲu gɔ jɛbi biyɛmɔ.”
48003014	Ama, Abarahamu bɛrɛ duba ohobodo ga pui wo kunu gɔ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bemaa kanran Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu duba wogɔ bɛɛ ga, iyaa emaa gagawu gɔ dɛi, Ama pui kunaa Kikinu ohobodo wo gi gɔ bɛɛ ga, Kirisito emi dɔrugaabe.
48003015	Ba unrunw, emɛ, Adama unrunw bana kanranɲu gin’, sɔɔ gɔ emɛ wogɔ le tunwɔn yɛnɛmɔi: Inɛw lɛi tunmɔ le aaru aaraa, dɔn tɔŋɔmaa kilaai ye, inɛ waja turu kanran wogɔ kɔɔlɔmu ma, sɔɔ waja wogɔ nɛ bara ma kanrun bɛɛidolo.
48003016	Aiwa, Ama, Abarahamu lee, tiruwɛnɛ womɔ lee bɛrɛ pui kunaabe. Ama Dɔn nɛ, “tirɛ unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ” gɛɛnɛ, tiyɛ gɔ inɛw joo. Kaa, “tiruwɛnɛ uwɔ bɛrɛ” tɔŋaaɲu, tiyɛ gɔ inɛ turu sai. Tiruwɛnɛ wogɔ Kirisitoi.
48003017	Sɔɔ sɔi mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama aaru aaraa, tɔŋaa duunaa yasɛbe. Wo wogɔ kikibemɔdo gi. Kunrin anranguju suŋu nai pɛtaanu galaa wo yaa Tɔɔru wɛi gɔ, Ama pɔɔlɔ baa aaru aaru gɔi kɔɔlɔmu ye, wogɔ le digɛnu Ama pui kunu gɔi yamulu bɛɛidolo.
48003018	Sabu Ama sin obu kɛn gin’ obojɛ gɔ, wogɔ Tɔɔru le digɛnu bɛɛmɔjɛ ye, nɛɛ kɛn gɔ waja pui le kijɛ digɛ wɔlɔ. Kaa Ama Abarahamu bɛrɛ pui le digɛu kɛn gɔ obu.
48003019	Nɛɛ kunrin biyaai ye, Tɔɔru gɔ inge dɛi daani? Tɔɔru gɔ pui kuni onu nɛ daani, Tɔɔru yamulu gɔ jugɔmɔ dɛi daani. Abarahamu tiruwɛnɛ, inɛ dɛi pui gɔ kuni gɔ wɛɛido baa, Tɔɔru gɔ biyɛun jaain bee. Tɔɔru wogɔ, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe le digɛu, iyaa sɔɔ yegerenɛ turu le digɛu obaabɛin.
48003020	Inɛ sɔɔ yegerenɛ, inɛw tɔgu turu sai dɛi yoi yaalɛ. Kaa Ama kai koturu.
48003021	Tɔɔru gɔ, Ama pui gɔ le jajaiyɛjɛ ma? Asuu! Kaa, inɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛido tɔɔru yabe biyaai ye, kɔɔ waaru le inɛw, tɔɔru le digɛnu Ama giru nɛ teitai bii bɛbɛɛbɛin.
48003022	Kaa, gagawu bemɛ dɛi, inɛw Yesu Kirisito le gawaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ Ama pui kunu gɔ obo ga, Ama Dɔn sɔwaa, Adama unrunw puu hakɛ gunɔ nɛ toin gi.
48003023	Gagawu gɔ waaru dɔɔmɔ nɛ, Tɔɔru gɔ emi kaju kunaa gɛlɛbe, gagawu waaru wɛɛido bai tagaraidɛin baa, emi aa pinaa gɛlɛbe.
48003024	Kɔɔ gin’, emaa Ama giru nɛ gagawu gɔ dɛi teitai biyɛ ga, Kirisito wɛɛido baa, Tɔɔru, emi teeremɔnɛi bii.
48003025	Nɛɛ, iye gagawu waaru gɔ wiyaa dɔwaai dɛi, emi lee Tɔɔru numɔ nɛ tolo.
48003026	E gagawu nɛ Kirisito Yesu le pagu turu e bii gɔ le digɛu Ama unrunwin bii.
48003027	E puu, ei batise kanranmaabei. Kɔɔ gin’ e Kirisito le tunmɔi biyaai. Kanɛ e Kirisito bana gɔ jeɲaa wɔi.
48003028	Nɛɛ, kɔɔ biyaai ye, waja Yahutunɛ ma, Yahutunɛi laa ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, gunɔnɛ ma, gunɔ tolo ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, ainɛ ma, yaanran ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ. E puu Kirisito Yesu pagu turu bii gɔ nɛ koturu.
48003029	Nɛɛ, ei Kirisito mɔi ye, ei Abarahamu tirɛ unrunwin. Kunrin, Ama pui kunu gɔ bɛbɛɛdei.
48004001	Kijɛ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Aini wo ba kɛn balanɛ gɔ, waaru ii wo wɔɔ gɔ le, halu woi naran go kijɛ wooi baŋai kanran, wo lee, gunɔnɛ lee kabu tolo.
48004002	Wo ba waaru kɛju gɔ bai yai dɔɔ baa, wo inɛw woi kɔɔnw lee, inɛw arusɛgɛ womɔ kajubanw gɔbe lee numɔ nɛ too.
48004003	Emɛ kanran kɔɔ gin’, waaru unrunw dagunw gin’ emɛ bee le, emi aduna ɔn kijɛ paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe numɔ nɛ tobe.
48004004	Kaa waaru gɔ wo dɔwaa, Ama, Aini unrunmɔ tiyaabe. Inɛw, Tɔɔru numɔ nɛ tobɛin gɔbei dɔrugɔ ga, emaa kole digɛnu Ama unrunwin bii bɛɛ ga, yaanran woi narun, iyaa wo Yahutunw tɔɔru le yabaube.
48004006	Ei unrunw womɔ tɔitɔi tagara ga, Ama, kinɛ emɛ kɔlɔ nɛ Aini unrunmɔ Kikinu tiyaabe. Kikinu wogɔ kɔnwaan ye «Aba», tiyɛ gɔ “De” gɛɛjɛ.
48004007	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi ui waja gunɔnɛi laa, kaa ainii. Nɛɛ ui aini womɔi dɛi, Ama, unrunw unrunmɔ dɛi kijɛ wo sɛɛ puu ui ohobodo.
48004008	E pɔɔlɔ waaru Ama inin e bee le, ei kijɛ ama tɔitɔi laain gɔbe gunɔwin bee.
48004009	Kaa kanɛ Amai waaru e jugaajɛ gɔ le, kɔɔ dɛi ire, Ama waaru ei wo jugaajɛ gɔ le, e yani kijɛ yɛbɛlɛgunw, paŋagunwin ga wɔin gɔbe, kijɛ koolo kɔɔbe bɛrɛ pilemaa wɛɛuwɔi? E yani iyaa lee gunɔw bemɛi bii ibiyaa wɔi?
48004010	E bai gamuu gɔbe lee, iyepilu gamuu gɔbe lee, anrandii nɛ waaru gamuu gɔbe lee, anranguju gamuu gɔbe lee koi taajɛi!
48004011	Mu e dɛi liyaa wɔun: E dɛi birɛ naa mu biru gɔbe puu niwɛn sɛlɛ biyɛdo ma?
48004012	Ba unrunw, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, mu e gin’ wɔun dɛi, e kanran mu gin’ biyɛi. E mu bɛrɛ mɔɲu turu kanran kanranli.
48004013	Mu kubɔ pɔlɔ gɔ, inge dɛi Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ e bɛrɛ tagun ma e igii wɔi: Mui jijinwɛnbe dɛii.
48004014	Goju ma jinwɛnbe gɔ e bɛrɛ wogɔ subɔrɔ diyɛi bee. Yinkanran e mui yau kanrun ma, mu sai paja ma kanranli. Kaa e mui mɛlɛnkɛ ma, Kirisito Yesu ma gin’ sɛgɛraabei.
48004015	Kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ e sɛbe gɔbe puu yago yai? Mu sɔɔ ɔn e dɛi sɔɔ bɛbɛɛgɔn: E kanrun bɛbɛɛbei ye, giri ebe kanran wɔguru goonu ye mu bɛrɛ ohobobei.
48004016	Nɛɛ, e bɛrɛ naran gɔ mu sɔi dɛi kanɛ mui jaŋunɛ ebei biyaai ma?
48004017	Inɛw ɔnbe, e dɛi mamaa gaai tagarauwɔin, kaa kinɛ bemɛ ajubu gɔ ɛjula. Ebaa, mu le kabi ye, mamaa ebe gɔ unrunbe sibɛ go kigelemɔ ga, kijɛ be ibɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
48004018	Ɛju dɛi biyaai ye, mamaa le bii gɔ ɛjii wɔɔ. Kaa waaru logoro ebe nɛ mu too le sai laa, waaru wooi biyɛun jaan.
48004019	Unrunw mabe, Kirisito e nɛ yato ga sɛɛu jugɔmɔido baa, mu e dɛi iyaa pilemaa nɔrun dɛinyaan wɔun.
48004020	Bana waja le e le sɔɔ sɔɔ ga, kanɛ genɛ ebe nɛ yabɔn ye, mu bɛrɛ saii ɛjii bibiyɛbe. Mu e dɛi bana le biyɛun inɔn.
48004021	E inɛw Mɔise tɔɔru sɔɔ le tubi ibɛin gɔbe, e Tɔɔru sɔɔ gɛɛjɛ gɔbe ɛhɛgɛjɛi ma mui tagai.
48004022	Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa, Abarahamu womaa anranw unrunw lɛi sɛbe wa, turui gunɔ yaanran Hagaru le bɛi, lɛiye gɔ, yaanran gunɔnɛi laa bee, Sara le bɛi.
48004023	Gunɔ yaanran ii gɔ inɛw puu bana naranɲu gin’ woi narin. Kaa yaanran gunɔnɛi laa ii gɔ, Ama pui kunu gɔ le digɛu narin.
48004024	Sɔɔ ɔnbe le digɛu, Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ tagarajɛ gɔ unwɔ: Yaanw lɛi kɔɔbe, Ama aaru tɔgu lɛi wo kunu gɔbe sɛɛrɛ tagaraɲu. Aaru turu gɔ, wogɔ Sinayi kokoo nɛ goi, wo unrunw gunɔwin biyɛidɛin naranjɛ: Wogɔ Hagarui.
48004025	Hagaru gɔ, Arabi gana nɛ Sinayi kokoo gɔ sɛɛrɛi tagarajɛ. Iyaa Hagaru gɔ lee, iye Jerusalɛmu ana gɔ lee sɛsɛgɛrɛjɛ. Sabu Jerusalɛmu ana lee, unrunw womɔ lee gunɔwin.
48004026	Kaa, alagala Jerusalɛmu gɔ, wogɔ yaanran gunɔnɛi laa gɔ gin’ wɔɔ. Emɛ na gɔ woi.
48004027	Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “U yaanran ii narantɛlu gɔ, kinɛ uwɔ ɛɛliyɛmɔ. U yaanran nɔrun dɛinyin inɛɛ gɔ, kinɛ ɛɛlu kɔun diyɛ kɔnwun tɔlɔ. Sabu yaanran wo igɛ woi pajaati gɔ, yaanran igɛ sɛɛ dɛi sigɛ unrunw bɛɛdo.”
48004028	E kai, ba unrunw, Isaka gin’ ei Ama pui kunu gɔ le kɛukɛu unrunw naraanɲui.
48004029	Waaru galaai gɔ le, inɛw puu aŋai naranɲu gin’ aini naraanɲu gɔ, aini Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le naraanɲu gɔi tɔɔɲɔube. Iye bai dɔɔ jaa kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ.
48004030	Kaa, Ama Dɔn yani gi? Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Gunɔ yaanran kɔɔ lee, aini womɔ leei digɛ tii. Sabu gunɔ yaanran aini gɔ, yaanran hɔɔlɔnɛ aini le bari ye banɛ kɛn gɔ bɛɛ gamalaidolo.”
48004031	Kɔɔ gin’, ba unrunw, emi gunɔ yaanran unrunwin laa, kaa yaanran hɔɔlɔnɛ unrunwin.
48005001	Emaa naran go hɔɔlɔwin biyɛ ga, Kirisito kodɛi emi gunɔ nɛ goonu. Kɔɔ dɛi waja pilemaa ye gunɔ baga lolugu kɔkɔlɔ ebe nɛ kunɔmɔnɔu ga, ɛɛn go bii ye kuu ebe kajubai.
48005002	Keŋiyɛin, mu Pɔlu, mu e bɛrɛ daii sɔɔuwɔn: E ei araa nɔɔmɔ ga yayabajɛi ye, Kirisito e bɛrɛ niwɛn turu kanran siyɛidolo.
48005003	Mu iyaa inɛ aai kanran, inɛ unruin araa nɔɔmaajɛ baŋa gɔ, Mɔise tɔɔru sɔɔ gɔ puu sɛɛu wo gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ ga daii sɔɔuwɔn.
48005004	E, inɛw Tɔɔru gɛli le Ama giru nɛ ei teitai biyɛ ga ibɛi gɔbe, e lee, Kirisito lee kabiyaai. E Ama nɛɛma gɔ le gowaai.
48005005	Kaa, emɛ kai Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le, Ama, giru unrunmɔ nɛ emi teitai wɔɔ lugodo ga, wogɔ diyɛdɔn le wɔin. Emɛ, wogɔi gagawu le dɔmiyaan wɔin.
48005006	Inɛ aai kanran Kirisito Yesu nɛ too gɔ, woi araa nɔɔmaaɲu ma, woi araa nɔɔmɔla ma, wogɔ kijɛ niwɛn sɛɛi laa. Kijɛ niwɛn sɛɛ gɔ, wogɔ, gagawu ihibɛ le birɛ birɛjɛ gɔi.
48005007	E bana ɛju le tɔlaabei. Inɛ aa ebaa naran gɔ sɔɔ yabanɔu ga ei tɛŋaabe ma?
48005008	Ajubu wogɔ Ama ei boonɔnɛ gɔ bɛrɛ goolu.
48005009	“Kijɛ buru pidemu gaila sai, punau lɔɔraaɲu gɔ puu ingelemɔjɛ” ga, inɛw yingɛɛɲu.
48005010	Kaa e lee, mu lee, emi Inɛw Baŋa nɛ pagu turu gɔ digɛu ajubu emɛ dɛiin biyɛidolo ga mu gawaa wɔun. Kaa, inɛ hakilɛ ebe bimiliyemɔjɛ gɔ, mu kai mu sibɛ go, woi inɛ aai kanran, tujɔ womɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
48005011	Ba unrunw, iye bai dɔɔ mu araa nɔɔmu gɔ jaain wɔɔ waaju gɔ kunɔu gɛlɔn gɔ narain biyaai ye, inɛw inge dɛi mui ɔɲɔmɔnu biyɛdɛin ma? Kunrin biyaai ye, Kirisito, baga jai kuu nɛ wo yinwun sɔɔ gɔ dɛi inɛ turu kanran kinɛ yanwanbele.
48005012	Mu inɛw ei bimiliyemɔw gɔbe bemaa kijɛ be kanranjɛ gɔbe nɛ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ kanran gun: Bemaa kuu bemɛ le bei inɛw pɔrui biyɛmɔ wa!
48005013	Ba unrunw, e kai ei hɔɔlɔi biyɛ dɛi boonaaɲu. Kaa, e hɔɔlɔi bii kɔɔ le pari ye, gojunawan hakɛgu ebe kijɛ ebaa kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔ kanrannɔugi. Kaa, ihibɛ dɛi tunmɔ kai kilɛi.
48005014	Sabu sɔɔ ɔn turu nɛ Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ puu kikibejɛ: “Aŋai kuu uwɔ u ibɛ gin’, u bɔɔnɛi yaa kɔɔ gin’ ibɛi biyɛ.”
48005015	Kaa e olunawanbe gin’ tunmɔi barumanu, tunmɔ bɛrɛ mɔɲu dɔɔnɔuwɔi ye, e tunmɔi susuyodei ma giye kuu ebe kajubai.
48005016	Kijɛ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama Kikinui paju ye ei wo teeremɔmɔi. Kunrin e dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔbe le yabaidelei.
48005017	Sabu gojunawan hakɛgu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ, Kikinu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ le jajaiyɛjɛ. Kikinu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ yaa gojunawan hakɛgu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ le jajaiyɛjɛ. Be tunmɔ le kɔmɔ tataaɲu. Nɛɛ, kɔɔ dɛi kijɛ kanrun e ibɛ gɔ, e kanrun bɛɛidelei.
48005018	Kikinu ei teeremɔu wɔɔ ye, e Tɔɔru le tubiyaa wɔlɔi.
48005019	Gojunawan hakɛgu birɛ gɔbe igimɛi wɔɔ. Wogɔbe unwɔin: Sala salu lee, lɔgɔji lee, kuu sɛlɛ birɛ lee,
48005020	ɔmɔlɔ bulu lee, dugu lee, tunmɔi ibili lee, jai lee, ele lee, kinɛ ingelemu lee, tunmɔ tɛmurun lee, mii kabu lee, gojo kunu lee,
48005021	dadaaru sɔɔ lee, kɔɲɔ nɔi bimili lee, yɔgɔrɔ mɔɲu sɔɔ lee, kijɛ kɔɔbe le murin wɔin kanrun leei. Laa e bɛrɛ tagaabɔn, iyaa pilemaa e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn: Inɛw kijɛ kɔɔbe tunmɔ kanranw gɔbe, be Ama diinɛ kɛn gin’ bɛɛidenɛ.
48005022	Kaa, Kikinu ii naranjɛ gɔ, wogɔ ihibɛ lee, kinɛ ɛɛlu lee, jamu lee, muyɔn lee, ɛjii bii lee, ɛhɛju lee, sɔɔ turu baŋai bii lee,
48005023	tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le bii lee, kuu gɛli sɔɔ leei. Tɔɔru, sɔɔ kɔɔbe le jaiyɛjɛ turu kanran wɔlɔ.
48005024	Inɛw Kirisito Yesu mɔi wɔin gɔbe, be gojunawan hakɛgu gɔ lee, dadaaru womɔ puu lee, diŋɛ womɔ puu lee, baga jai nɛ pɛgaa daatin.
48005025	Emi Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le ɔnmɔi wɔɔ. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ Kikinu diŋɛ le kɛukɛu yaamɔi.
48005026	Emɛ kuu ulo le biyɛmɔnɔugin, tunmɔ kinɛ kijɛ ɔgu tɛgɛjɛ kanranmɔnɔugin, tunmɔ le ele le biyɛmɔnɔugin.
48006001	Ba unrunw, inɛ turu hakɛ kanraun wo wɔu tɛmaajɛi ye, e, inɛw Ama Kikinu ei teeremɔjɛ gɔbe, oju naran gɔ nɛ woi pilemu ye kunɔi. Kaa, e kinɛ ɛju le wogɔ kanrain. Iyaa, uwaa yaa subɔrɔ nɛ yoonɔu ga, kuu uwɔ kajuba.
48006002	E tunmɔi baraa ye inɛw dɔɔ demɛ le ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbe dɔɔ duiyɔi: E kɔɔ gin’ Kirisito tɔɔru gɔ kikibemɔdei.
48006003	Inɛ turu, woi kijɛi laa wɔnu, unruin kijɛi ga lugaa wɔɔ ye, baŋa kuu unrunmɔ lelemɔuwɔ.
48006004	Inɛ tuturu puu bana wo wɔɔ gɔ marun wo yɛnɛmɔ. Bana womɔ gɔ ɛjii wɔɔ ye, inɛ waja birɛ le tunwɔnlu go, birɛ womɔ sai dɛi kuu womɔ wo unɔmɔ.
48006005	Inɛ tuturu puu dɔɔ womɔi wɔɔ gɔ wo duiyɔun jaan.
48006006	Inɛ bɛrɛ Ama sɔɔ deeraaɲu gɔ, wogɔ baŋa inɛ woi deerenɛ gɔ le kijɛ ɛju wo sɛɛ gɔ gamalaun jaain wɔɔ.
48006007	E kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi, Amai mɔmɔɔnɛ. Inɛ kijɛ wo tɔi gɔi gɛgɛlɛdo.
48006008	Wo goju nawan womɔ bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛjui tɔi ye, goju nawan womɔ wo bɛrɛ yinwin gɛlɛmɔdo. Kaa wo Ama Kikinu bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛjui tɔi ye, Kikinu wo bɛrɛ ɔnmɔsɔgɔi gɛlɛmɔdo.
48006009	Ɛju kanrun nɛ emɛ ɔɲɔmɔnɔugin. Sabu emɛ ɔɲaa yaa pajanɛ ye, waaru sɛgɛraa gɔ le emɛ gɛlu gɛgɛlɛdɛin.
48006010	Kɔɔ gin’, bana waaru emɛ bɛɛ puu, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ ɛju kanranmɔi. Kaa sigɛ le gagawu nɛ ba unrunw gɔbe bɛrɛ kanranmɔi.
48006011	Bana lɛtɛrɛ ii tɔŋu poo le mu tɔŋɔjɛ gɔ e iyejɛ gin’, mu numɔ ma le e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn.
48006012	Inɛw gojunawan sibɛ go inɛw kinɛ aamu ibɛin gɔbe, inɛw wogɔbei ei araa nɔɔmu gɔ waajibi bojo ibɛɛ wɔin. Be Kirisito baga jai gɔ dɛi unrunbei ɔɲɔmɔnɔu sai dɛi kunrin kanraunwɔin.
48006013	Inɛw araa nɔwaanɲu gɔbe be kuu bemɛ le Tɔɔru gɔ sɛɛu digɛlain. Be gojunawan ebe nɛ sɛɛrɛ kɔɔ waajibi kunaa biyaabɛin dɛi kuu bemɛ unɔ ga, be kɔɔ dɛi ei araa nɔɔmu ibɛɛ wɔin.
48006014	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito baga jai gɔ dɛi laa ye, mu kai kijɛ turu le kanran kuu ma unɔidolɔn. Baga jai wogɔ digɛu aduna gɔ mu sibɛ go yinwaain, iyaa mui aduna sibɛ go yinwaain.
48006015	Araa nɔɔmaaɲu ma, araa nɔɔmɔla ma, niwɛn turu kanran sɛlɛ: Kijɛ maai wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔ kijɛ maŋu kanai bii gɔi.
48006016	Inɛw oju kɔɔ dimiyɛnw gɔbe, jamu lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee be le biyɛ, be lee, iyaa Ama inɛw tɔitɔi wajunw gɔbe puu le kanran biyɛ.
48006017	Nɛɛ, inɛ turu kanran waja wɛɛ ye mui ɔɲɔmɔnɔu. Sabu nanawanran goju ma nɛ mu sɛɛ gɔbe, mui Yesu gunɔnɛi ga jugɔmɔuwɔin.
48006018	Ba unrunw, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ. Amina.
49001001	Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui wɔɔ gɔ, Ama inɛw, iyaa inɛw Kirisito Yesu nɛ sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin biyaa, Epɛse ana nɛ wɔin gɔbe, e bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔn.
49001002	Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
49001003	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, iyaa wo Ba gɔ, Kirisito le digɛu, kikinu sibɛ go duba tɔgu puu le alagalabe nɛ emi duba kanraanjɛ baŋa gɔ, woi sɔmɔmɔi.
49001004	Sabu Ama emaa giru unrunmɔ nɛ inɛw ɛjaa, jarugu sɛnɛi biyɛ ga, aduna maŋamɔ nɛ baa, Kirisito nɛ wo emi yɛmaabe. Ama, ihibɛ womɔ sabu dɛi,
49001005	giru nɛ baa, diŋɛ womɔ dɛnɛ le kɛukɛu, Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu emi unrunw unrunmɔi bojodo ga kɛjaatiyaabe.
49001006	Aini ibɛ womɔ le digɛu nɛɛma diyɛ emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu gɔ dɛi emaa unruin sɔmɔ ga wo wogɔ kanrun.
49001007	Aini gɔ ili le emɛ kuu goonu biyaa, hakɛ yaabu kanrun biyaaɲu. Ama, nɛɛma womɔ bana gaai wɔɔ gɔ kɔɔ gin’ emɛ bɛrɛ taguru.
49001008	Nɛɛma wogɔ, wo emɛ bɛrɛ gagaa gɔ tiyaa, jugɔ puu lee, hakilɛ puu lee emi obaajɛ.
49001009	Wo diŋɛ womɔ sɔɔ boŋurun, wo bɛrɛ ɛju gin’ kɛjaa, Kirisito le digɛnu kibemɔdo ga wo sɛbe gɔ, emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe.
49001010	Wogɔ unwɔ: Alagala nɛ kijɛ toin wooi lee, minɛ nɛ kijɛ wɔin wooi lee, puu mɔɔnaa ye kuu baŋa turu bojodɛin. Wogɔ Kirisitoi. Waaru gɔbe kibaain biyaai ye, Ama kijɛ kanrando ga kɛjaa wo wɔɔ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
49001011	Iyaa, Ama, Kirisito nɛ emaa inɛw unrunmɔi biyɛ ga emi yɛmaabe. Wo kuu womɔ diŋɛ le sɔɔ kɛjɛjɛ baŋa gɔ, giru nɛ baa diŋɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu sɔɔ wogɔ kɛjaatiyaabe.
49001012	Emɛ, inɛw emɛ laa Kirisito nɛ gagawu emɛ kuni gɔbe, Ama, boi womɔ gaai wɔɔ dɛi emaa unruin sɔmɔ ga wogɔ kanrun.
49001013	E kanran, naran sɔɔ gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ le yayabu e bɛi gɔ, wogɔ e ɛgu onu nɛ, e Kirisito le gawaabei. Iyaa Kirisito nɛ pui kunaa Kikinu Pilu obin gɔ le e nɛ sɛɛrɛ kunaabɛin.
49001014	Kikinu Pilu wogɔ, kɛn emɛ giruduunu gɔ woi. Ama, boi womɔ gaai wɔɔ dɛi, unruin sɔmɔ ga, inɛw unrunmɔi wo boju gɔbe kuu goonu ye, be bɛrɛ kɛn wo oboido gɔ giruduuni.
49001015	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu le gagawu e sɛɛ lee, Ama inɛw wooi le ihibɛ e sɛɛ lee sɔɔ sɔɔu be wɔu ɛgaa,
49001016	mu kai e dɛi Amai birɛpoo tagu pajalun. Mu amagɛɛn ma nɛ ei naŋauwɔlɔn.
49001017	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, Ba dooro baŋa gɔ, ebaa woi jugɔ ga, Kikinu, hakilɛ lee, jugɔ lee ei obojɛ womaa e bɛrɛ obo ga gɛɛunwɔn.
49001018	Iyaa ebaa boonu ei wo boonu gɔ le diyɛdɔn digɛ gɔ jugɔ ga, ebaa inɛw womɔ bɛrɛ kɛn ɛju naa ɛju wo oboido gɔ bana gaai wɔɔ gɔ jugɔ ga, iyaa, emɛ inɛw gawaa wɔin nɛ gɔnrɔn diyɛ kale sɛlɛ womɔ bana birɛ birɛjɛ ebaa jugɔ ga, Ama womaa kinɛ ebe giri wijɛmɔ ga, mu gɛɛunwɔn. Gɔnrɔn kɔɔ, paŋa diyɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu birɛ birɛjɛ.
49001020	Paŋa diyɛ kɔɔ le Ama, Kirisitoi yiun logoro nɛ bulomaa goonaa, alagala nɛ woi numɔ iin unrunmɔ sibɛ nɛ dɛinyɛnmu.
49001021	Wo kɔɔ nɛ woi kuu bɛɛnw wooi kuu nɛ lee, paŋa wooi kuu nɛ lee, gɔnrɔn wooi kuu nɛ lee, laamu wooi kuu nɛ lee iyaa aduna ɔn nɛ sai laa, halu aduna wɛɛido nɛ boi boo bɛɛmɔjɛ puu kuu nɛ lee daanaa sɛɛ.
49001022	Ama, kijɛ puu Kirisito kubɔ doɲu nɛ kunaa, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, Kirisito gojui wɔɔ gɔ nɛ kijɛ puu kuu baŋa gɔ woi bojaabe. Kirisito, kijɛ puu, yalu puu nɛ sɛɛu joonɔnɛ baŋa gɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ sɛɛu jowaa wɔɔ.
49002001	Pɔɔlɔ e aduna ɔn bana jeɲaa yaaubei. Iyaa daa go kikinu mɔɲube kuu baŋa, inɛw Ama le yabaanɛbe nɛ kanɛ kikinu birɛjɛ gɔ, e bana womɔ le kɛukɛu yaaubei. Kɔɔ gin’, e sɔɔ yabala ebe le digɛu, hakɛ ebe le digɛu, ei yinwaan yaabe.
49002003	Emɛ kanran, emɛ puu inɛw kɔɔbe gin’ bɛin. Emɛ pɔɔlɔ dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ emɛ nɛ goojɛ diŋɛ le kɛukɛu yaaubɛin. Emɛ goju emɛ lee, ajubu emɛ lee diŋɛi kanraunbɛin. Emi bana narin le kɛukɛu, emɛ kanran wajunw gin’, Ama kinɛbanrun panai bɛin.
49002004	Kaa Ama, amasɔgɔjugɔ womɔ gaai wɔɔ dɛi, iyaa ihibɛ diyɛ le emi ibɛɛ wo bii gɔ dɛi,
49002005	emɛ sɔɔ yabala emɛ le digɛu inɛw yinwaan yaabɛin gɔ, wo Kirisito le emi ɔnmɔi bojaabe. Nɛɛma le sai ei yabaaɲu.
49002006	Kirisito Yesu nɛ pagu turu emɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ, Ama, Kirisito le emi tunmɔ go bulogaabe. Iyaa, Kirisito le emi tunmɔ go alagala nɛ laamu kanranmaabe.
49002007	Waaru wɛɛido gɔbe nɛ, Kirisito Yesu nɛ, emɛ sibɛ go Ama ihibɛ wo sɛɛ gɔ le digɛnu, nɛɛma diyɛ kale jugɔmɔɔlɛ womɔ tagara ga, wo kɔɔ kanrun.
49002008	Sabu nɛɛma le sai ei yabin, gagawu le digɛu bii. Wogɔ e nɛ goolu, Ama sin obui.
49002009	Inɛ turu kanran kuu unrunmɔ unɔ bɛɛnɔu ga, wogɔ, birɛ le bɛɛmɔlu.
49002010	Sabu emi Ama numɔbirui. Emaa sɔɔ ɛju kanran ga, Kirisito Yesu nɛ emi maŋi. Emaa sɔɔ ɛju wogɔbe nɛ yaa ga, Ama, giru nɛ baa bei yegeraa boju.
49002011	Yahutunw, goju guju nɛ sɛɛrɛ inɛw kunɔɲu dɛi, unrunbe araa nɔwaan wɔin gɛɛɲu. E goju sibɛ go tɔgu waja inɛw gɔbe, ebaa araa nɔɔnɛi ga be ei yinboonɔɲu. E inɛw kɔɔ gin’ ei boonɔɲu gɔbe, e pɔɔlɔ bana e bee gɔ naŋanɔugi.
49002012	Pɔɔlɔ, e Kirisito e le wɔlɔ go bei, e yerunwin bɛin, Ama tɔgu yɛmu inɛwin laai bei. Ama, pui kunaa, aaru wo aaru gɔbe nɛ ei tolo bee. Aduna nɛ e Ama inin go bei, diyɛdɔn sɛbelei.
49002013	Kaa kanɛ, Kirisito Yesu nɛ, e pɔɔlɔ inɛw wagee bɛin gɔbe, Kirisito ili le digɛu, ei bɛruniyɛnmaaɲu.
49002014	Sabu Kirisito, emɛ bɛrɛ jamu wo jɛɛlu. Yahutunw lee, tɔgu wajunw lee logoro nɛ kabu kunu jege gɔ, jaŋu be logoro nɛ tobe gɔ, wo wogɔ wolugaa, bei turu bojaabe.
49002015	Wo tɔgu lɛi gɔbe, unrun le pagu turu wɔnu, bei tɔgu kana turu bojo ga, yiun womɔ le digɛu, Tɔɔru lee, Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gi gɔ lee, bana kanran wo gi gɔ lee, kijɛi laa boju. Wo be lɛi logoro nɛ kunrin jamu jɛɛlu.
49002016	Kirisito, baga jai nɛ wo yinwun gɔ le digɛu, jaŋu bemɛ donugaati. Baga jai gɔ le digɛu, wo bei goju turu bojaa, Ama lee, be lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegeraabe.
49002017	Kunrin, e inɛw Ama le wagee bɛin gɔbe lee, be inɛw Ama le bɛrii bɛin gɔbe lee, e puu bɛrɛ Kirisito, jamu Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagai wɛi.
49002018	Sabu emɛ puu, Yahutunw gɔ ma, Yahutunwin laain gɔ ma, Kirisito le digɛnu, Ba Ama giru nɛ Kikinu Pilu turu gɔ le dɔɔ bɛɛɲu.
49002019	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, nɛɛ e yerunwin laai, kuuseguwin laai. Kaa e Ama inɛw baginrun unrunwin, Ama ginrun gonɔ bɛɛnwin.
49002020	Ei Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw lee bɔlɔtei gɔ nɛ daanaaɲu. Kirisito Yesu, wo kuu womɔ le ginrun sibɛ tibu gɔ woi biyaa wɔɔ.
49002021	Ginrun gɔ puu wo nɛ sɛɛu tunmɔ aa, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ Ama Ginrun Diyɛ dɛiin wɔɔi biyɛ ga ulouwɔ.
49002022	E kanran, Kirisito nɛ wajunw gɔ le mɔrinyaan, Ama, Kikinu womɔ le ginrun nɛ wo toi biyɛ ga, ei ujiyɛuwɔ.
49003001	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu Pɔlu, Kirisito Yesu dɛi kajuginɛi wɔɔ gɔ, e inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi gɛɛnjɔn.
49003002	Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi birɛ e dɛi birɛ ga mu bɛrɛ wo gawuru gɔ sɔɔ e ɛgaabei woi laa?
49003003	Tiyɛ gɔ, Ama, sɔɔ taguru le mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ boŋurun unrunmɔ wo jugɔmu sɔɔ gɔ woi. Mu kanɛ wogɔ kuu nɛ sɔɔ dumi tɔŋaabɔn.
49003004	E wogɔ jaŋaajɛi ye, Kirisito sɔɔ boŋurun bana jugaa mu wɔɔ paamu kanrun bɛbɛɛdei.
49003005	Waaru galu gɔbe nɛ, boŋurun kɔɔ sɔɔ, Adama unrunw bɛrɛ jugɔmɔnɛ. Kaa kanɛ, Ama, Kikinu womɔ le, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu ɛjaa wɔin womɔbe lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw ɛjaa wɔin womɔbe lee bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe.
49003006	Boŋurun sɔɔ wogɔ unwɔ: Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le digɛu, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, Kirisito Yesu nɛ Yahutunw le bari ye kɛn turu gɔi bɛɛɲu. Iyaa Kirisito nɛ be wooi goju turu gɔ digɛi biyaain, iyaa pui tunmɔ gɔ nɛ toin.
49003007	Ama, nɛɛma mu bɛrɛ wo obu le kɛukɛu, mu bɛrɛ sin kanraan, gɔnrɔn womɔ bana birɛjɛ le digɛu mu Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ birɛbirɛnɛi biyaa wɔun.
49003008	Mu Ama inɛw puu logoro nɛ, dagunw nɛ inɛ mu gaila wɔɔ gɔ, Kirisito arusɛgɛ kale jugɔ dɔɔmɔɔlɛ gɔ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain bɛrɛ taga ga, nɛɛma wogɔ mu bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
49003009	Iyaa Ama, sɔɔ boŋurun baŋaraan wo sɛbe kɔɔ, bana birɛ birɛido, maa inɛw puu bɛrɛ ɛjɛmɔ gin. Ama, kijɛ wooi maŋanɛ gɔ, waaru giru go galu puu nɛ sɔɔ boŋurun kɔɔ inɛw wooi bɛrɛ baŋaraan sɛbe.
49003010	Kunrin, alagalabe nɛ kuu bɛɛnw wɔin gɔbe lee, paŋa wɔin gɔbe lee, bemaa kanɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu le digɛnu, Ama hakilɛ, bana dɛin dɛin le aŋai jooi wɔɔ jugɔ dɛii.
49003011	Ama, asuu sɔɔ bana kɛjaa wo sɛbe le kɛukɛu sɔɔ kɔɔ kanrun. Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ le digɛu wo wogɔ kibemu.
49003012	Kirisito nɛ, emɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go, wo le gagawu emɛ sɛɛ gɔ le digɛnu, Ama giru nɛ dɔɔ bɛbɛɛɲu ga, diyɛdɔn le wɔin.
49003013	Kodigɛu, e dɛi ɔɲɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ gɔbe dɛi anrangaju ebe dogonɔu ga, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn. Ebaa dooro bɛɛ ga wogɔbe biyɛuwɔin.
49003014	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ba Ama, alagala nɛ lee, minɛ nɛ lee tɔgu wɔin puu boi wo nɛ goonɛ baŋa gɔ, mu giru womɔ nɛ tuŋiyɛunwɔn.
49003016	Womaa, dooro womɔ bana gaai wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, Kikinu womɔ le kinɛ kɔlɔ ebe gɔi gɔnrɔn le paŋa siyɛmɔ ga,
49003017	iyaa gagawu le Kirisito kinɛ ebe nɛ toiyo ga gɛɛunwɔn. Iyaa ebaa ihibɛ nɛ duu ebe sibe ye, wogɔ nɛ ɛɛn go daana ga gɛɛunwɔn.
49003018	Ebaa kunrin Ama bana gɔ e nɛ joi ye kale dɔɔ ga, Ama inɛw puu le, Kirisito ihibɛ wawanu gɔ lee, papala womɔ lee, totoo womɔ lee, gagabu womɔ lee paamu bɛɛ ga gɛɛunwɔn. Iyaa Kirisito ihibɛ, jugɔ wooi dɛi sigɛ gɔ jugɔɲu gɔnrɔn bɛɛ ga mu gɛɛunwɔn.
49003020	Nɛɛ Ama, gɔnrɔn womɔ emɛ nɛ birɛjɛ gɔ le digɛnu, kijɛ puu emɛ gɛɛnjɛ dɛi sigɛ, halu emɛ ajubajɛ dɛi sigɛ kanrun bɛbɛɛjɛ.
49003021	Boi sɔmu gɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu nɛ lee, waaru puu asuu womɔi biyɛmɔ, Amina.
49004001	Mu Inɛw Baŋa birɛ dɛi inɛ kaju too gɔ, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, yoiyaara ebe gɔ, boonu ei booni gɔ le sɛgɛrɛmɔi.
49004002	Waaru wooi puu kuu sunugu le biyɛi, tɛgɛ sɛlɛ go biyɛi, muyɔn le biyɛi. Ihibɛ le tunmɔ sɔɔ kanran muyɔin.
49004003	Mainiyaanjɛi ye, jamu tunmɔ le ei pagaa sɛɛ gɔ le digɛnu, turui bii Ama Kikinu e bɛrɛ jɛɛlu gɔ, wogɔ gɛliyɛi.
49004004	Ama boonu ei wo boonu gɔ le diyɛdɔn digɛ gɔ koturu wɔɔ. Emɛ goju turu wɔin, iyaa Ama Kikinu koturu sai wɔɔ.
49004005	Inɛw Baŋa koturu sai wɔɔ, gagawu koturu sai wɔɔ, batise koturu sai wɔɔ,
49004006	Ama koturu sai wɔɔ, inɛw puu Ba gɔ woi. Wo inɛw puu kuu nɛ wɔɔ, inɛw puu le digɛnu birɛjɛ, inɛw puu nɛ too.
49004007	Kaa emɛ tuturu puu, Kirisito, gamulu emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu le kɛukɛu, nɛɛma biyaa yasin.
49004008	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Daa yalu gɔbe nɛ waaru wo ulu le, wo gunɔw kole yai. Wo inɛw bɛrɛ sin obube obaabe.”
49004009	Nɛɛ, “wo ulu” tiyɛ gɔ ingei? Wo laa gɔ, minɛ doɲu yalu too gɔ nɛ sugaabe gɔ woi laa ma?
49004010	Susugonɛ gɔ, aduna puu wo le jooi biyɛ ga, alagala puu daa nɛ ulonɛ gɔ yaa woi.
49004011	Kɔɔbaŋa, inɛw bɛrɛ birɛ bemɛ wo obu: Gamuu Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui, wajunw inɛw Ama titiyaanwin, wajunw Kibɛru Ɛju tagawin, wajunw inɛw teeremɔw lee, jaŋudeerenw leebei.
49004012	Ama inɛw gɔbei, Ama birɛ dɛi yegere ye, Kirisito goju gɔ paŋa bariyɛmɔ ga wo kɔɔ gin’ boju.
49004013	Kunrin emɛ wooi puu gagawu nɛ turu, Ama Ainii jugu nɛ turu biyaain baa yai dɔɔ, iyaa inɛw na, Kirisito bana kibaa wɔɔ nɛ baa dɔwaain biyɛ ga kanrun.
49004014	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, waja emɛ unrunwin biyɛidenɛ. Ooɲɔ diikoro balaa ye sibɛ sibɛ nɛ yaajɛ gin’, inɛw nabaragunw, sosoŋɔ inɛ manamu bemɛ le inɛ lelemɔw gɔbe, deeru bemɛ emi jigemɔidolo.
49004015	Kaa, emɛ ihibɛ le naran sɔɔuwɔin ye, kijɛ puu nɛ bariyɛnu, Kirisito gin’ biyɛdɛin. Kirisito, goju kuu gɔ woi.
49004016	Wo kɔrumɔ le goju yalu dɛin dɛin gɔbe ɛjii tunmɔ aa gɛliyaa, goju na gɔ digu digu gɔbe puu le digɛu sɛɛu turu biyaa wɔɔ. Kunrin, goju yalu gɔ puu, birɛ womɔ bana jaan gin’ birɛu, goju na gɔ gabiyɛu, ihibɛ le paŋa bariyɛuwɔ.
49004017	Nɛɛ Inɛw Baŋa boi le sɔɔ e bɛrɛ sɔwaa, ɛjɛmɔu mu wɔɔ gɔ unwɔ: Inɛw Ama inin, ajubu koolo bemɛ le yaauwɔin gɔbe, yoiyaara ebe nɛ waja be gin’ yaanɔugi.
49004018	Be, hakilɛ bemɛ dɛdɛbɛ. Kuu ɛɛn bemɛ lee, sɔɔ jugɔla be nɛ too gɔ lee dɛi, ɔnmɔ Ama obojɛ gɔ sibɛ go bei yerunwin.
49004019	Kinɛ bemɛ, sɔɔ dɔgɔgu kabugu pajaati. Be kuu sɛlɛ nɛ unrunbei obaa, kanran lɔgɔgu tɔgu dɛin dɛin puu kanraun, iŋi bɛɛnɛ.
49004020	Kaa e kai, Kirisito sɔɔ e dei gɔ kɔɔ gin’ laa.
49004021	E bɛrɛ sɔɔ womɔ sɔwaabɛin, iyaa jaŋu unrunw bɛrɛ kanranɲu gin’ e Yesu nɛ naran too gɔ deeru biyaabei ye kai.
49004022	Waajibi jige pɛi le yaau e bee gɔ, dadaaru inɛ lelemu le digɛu ei yamalau wɔɔ gɔi pajai.
49004023	Kikinu ebe lee, ajubu ebe lee sɛɛu kanai e biyɛmɔu jaain wɔɔ.
49004024	Iyaa e jige kana gɔ kunɔi. Wogɔ Ama le murin maŋaaɲu. Iyaa teitai bii lee, Ama kinɛ aamu lee naran nɛ goojɛ gɔ le woi jugɔmɔjɛ.
49004025	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ tunmɔ le goju turu digɛbei dɛi, kakalu pajati ye, e inɛ tuturu puu wo bɔɔnɛ bɛrɛ naran sɔɔ.
49004026	Kinɛ ebe banraain ye, kinɛbanrun ebe hakɛ nɛ ei jɛyaamɔnɔugi. Kinɛbanrun le wɔnu nai numɔnɔugi.
49004027	Jinrun puu kuu baŋa bɛrɛ yalu yooɲu obonɔugi.
49004028	Inɛ gunyɔn gunyɔun bee gɔ, waja gunyɔn gunyɔnnɔu, kaa inɛ kai le wɔɔi bara bɛɛ ga wo mainiyaan ye, numɔ womɔ le birɛ ɛjii wɔɔ birɛ.
49004029	Aŋa ebe nɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu turu kanran goomɔnɔugi. Kaa sɔɔ sɔsɔɔdei biyaai ye, sɔɔ ɛju, inɛw, kai bana be sɛɛ le kɛukɛu, sɔɔ bei bariyɛmɔjɛ, inɛw kekeŋiyɛnw bɛrɛ nɛɛma jɛɛlɛjɛ sɔɔi biyɛmɔi.
49004030	Ama Kikinu Pilu, kuu goonu bai dɛi kole ei sɛɛrɛ kunaaɲu gɔ, kinɛ womɔ jinwɛnmɔnɔugi.
49004031	Kinɛ mɔɲu puu lee, kinɛ ingelemu lee, kinɛbanrun lee, siɲɛ ingelemu lee, boi yamulu lee, iyaa mɔmɔɲu tɔgu puu lee, e nɛ be goomɔi.
49004032	Tunmɔ le ɛjii biyɛi, tunmɔ amasɔgɔ jugɔi. Kirisito le digɛu, Ama ei yaabu kanrun gin’, tunmɔi yaabu kanrain.
49005001	Ei unrunw Ama ibɛi dɛi, Amai deewin biyɛi.
49005002	Kirisito emi ibiyaabe. Sadaga jiɲu ɛju sin obu, Ama nɛ ɛɛlui biyɛ ga iyaa wo emɛ dɛi kinrun womɔ obaabe. E kanran, kɔɔ gin’ ihibɛ nɛ yoi yaai.
49005003	Ama inɛw le bana dagaa gin’, sala ma, lɔgɔji ma girukakala ma, halu wogɔ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔi giye kanran logoro ebe nɛ ɛgɛmɔnɔugi.
49005004	Sɔɔ lɔgɔgu ma, sɔɔ bomɔgu ma, sɔɔ salagu ma, sɔɔ sɔi kanran e le jaanla. Kaa Amai birɛpoo tagu sɔɔ sɔɔi.
49005005	Sabu ɛjii jugɔi, inɛ salaginɛ ma, sɔɔ lɔgɔ kanrannɛ ma, girukakalaginɛ ma, wogɔ ɔmɔlɔ bulu le kɛkɛu, Kirisito lee, Ama lee diinɛ nɛ kɛn sɛlɛ.
49005006	Inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran sɔɔ koolo le ei lelemɔnɔugi. Sabu sɔɔ kɔɔ tunmɔ dɛi, Ama kinɛbanrun, inɛw sɔɔ yabaanɛ kuu nɛ sugojɛ.
49005007	E be le bɔɔi biyɛnɔugi.
49005008	Pɔɔlɔ e ɔlɔ nɛ tobei. Kaa kanɛ Inɛw Baŋa nɛ e wijɛ nɛ toi. Wijɛ unrunw gin’ yoi yaai.
49005009	Sabu wijɛ, ɛhɛju tɔgu puu lee, teitai tɔgu puu lee, naran tɔgu puu lee naranjɛ.
49005010	Mainiyaan ye kijɛ Inɛw Baŋa kinɛ aamɔjɛ gɔ kabugu bɛɛi.
49005011	Birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛ, ɔlɔ birɛ gɔbe mai siyɛnɔugi, kaa wogɔbe ɛlu goonɔi.
49005012	Inɛw kɔɔbe baŋiyaan, sɔɔ be kanranjɛ, halu sɔɔɲu kanran dɔgɔi.
49005013	Kaa kijɛ puu wijɛ nɛ goonaatin ye, bana be wɔɔ tɔitɔi gɔ jujugɔmɔjɛ.
49005014	Sabu kijɛ daii jugɔmaaɲu puu, wijɛi taŋajɛ. Kodigɛu bana sɔɔɲu gin’: “U giri yeiyaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, giri yemɛ. U yiun logoro nɛ bulo goo. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Kirisito ui wiwijɛmɔdo.”
49005015	Yoiyaara ebe bana ɛjii kajubai. Inɛw bomɔgunw yoiyaara yaanɔugi, kaa inɛw hakilɛgunw gin’ biyɛi.
49005016	Waaru koturu kanran kuu ebe nɛ galamɔnɔugi, sabu bai gɔbe mɔɲuniyaain.
49005017	Kodigɛu, hakilɛ sɛlɛ go biyɛnɔugi, kaa Inɛw Baŋa diŋɛ gɔ paamai.
49005018	Kɔɲɔ le bimiliyenɔugi, wogɔ yanwan jɛɛlɛjɛ. Kaa Ama Kikinu le joi ye biyɛi.
49005019	Ama sɔmu nii lee, Ama nii lee, nii Kikinu nɛ goojɛ lee sɔɔ le, tunmɔ le sɔɔ sɔɔi. Nii niinu, kinɛ ebe wooi le Inɛw Baŋai sɔmɔi.
49005020	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito boi le waaru puu, kijɛ puu dɛi Ba Amai birɛpoo tagai.
49005021	Kirisito giriliyɛ dɛi, tunmɔ le tubiyei.
49005022	E yaanw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa le tubiyaa e wɔɔ gin’, e igɛbe le tubiyei.
49005023	Sabu Kirisito, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kuui wɔɔ gin’, igɛnɛ, yaanran kuu gɔ woi. Kirisito, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, goju womɔi wɔɔ gɔi yabanɛ gɔ woi.
49005024	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, Kirisito le tubiyejɛ gin’, yaanw gɔbe, kijɛ puu nɛ be igɛbe le be tubiyemɔi.
49005025	E igɛnw gɔbe, Kirisito Ama inɛw mɔɔnui ibiyaa, kinrun unrunmɔ wo dɛi obu gin’, e yaanw ebei ibɛi biyɛi.
49005026	Kirisito kunrin Ama inɛw mɔɔnui dii le, Ama sɔɔ le digɛnu ɛjɛmɔ ye, Ama dɛi dɛiin bojo ga kinrun unrunmɔ obu.
49005027	Iyaa wo giru unrunmɔ nɛ woi dooro le bojo ga kanrun. Wogɔ nɛ lɔgɔ tarala, yalu sunwinyaain tolo, kijɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ, iyaa ɛjaai, jarugu sɛlɛ.
49005028	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’ igɛnw gɔbe, goju bemɛ bana be ibɛ gin’, yaanw bemɛ ibɛi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛ yaanran unrunmɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɔ, kuu unrunmɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
49005029	Inɛ turu kanran asuu goju unrunmɔ ibiliyɛtɛlu, kaa woi kakayamɔjɛ, kakajubajɛ. Kirisito yaa Ama inɛw mɔɔnu dɛi yinkanranjɛ.
49005030	Sabu emɛ, goju womɔ digɛbei.
49005031	“Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ainɛ, wo ba lee, wo na lee, be le kabi ye, yaanran womɔ le biyɛjɛ. Kunrin be lɛi inɛ turu taŋaɲu.”
49005032	Kɔɔ sɔɔ boŋurun diyɛi, kaa mu Kirisito lee, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu lee dɛi sɔɔuwɔn.
49005033	Kokanran e le yadigɛ. E igɛnw gɔbe, e inɛ tuturu, kuu bana ebe gin’ yaanran womɔi ibɛi e biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Yaanran kanran wo igɛi babaun jaain wɔɔ.
49006001	E unrunw gɔbe, ei Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi ei naranw gɔbei babai. Wogɔ teitai wɔɔ.
49006002	“U ba lee, u na lee baba.” Tɔɔru, pui wo le digɛraa wɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔ, tɔɔru kɔɔ woi.
49006003	Pui wo le digɛ gɔ unwɔ: “Kɔɔ biyaai ye, aduna nɛ u jamu lee, kinruntaun lee bɛbɛɛdou.”
49006004	E banw gɔbe, unrunw ebe kinɛ jinwɛnjɛ kanran kanrannɔugi, kaa Inɛw Baŋa teeremu le kɛukɛu, kɔi lee, tinwinrun womɔ lee le bei kɔɔi.
49006005	E gunɔw gɔbe, Kirisito sɔɔ e yabajɛ gin’, liliyɛ le, goju kinwun le, kinɛpilu le, aduna ɔn nɛ e baŋa wɔin gɔbe sɔɔ yabai.
49006006	Inɛw le boi ɛju bɛɛdei gin’, giru bemɛ nɛ sai wogɔ gin’ biyɛnɔugi, kaa Kirisito gunɔw, kinɛ ebe wooi le Ama diŋɛ kanranwin biyɛi.
49006007	Inɛw birɛi birɛɛlɛi, kaa Inɛw Baŋa birɛi birɛjɛi gin’, kinɛ ɛju le gunɔ birɛ ebe birɛi.
49006008	Sabu e igii wɔi, gunɔnɛi wee, hɔɔlɔnɛi wee, inɛ tuturu puu ɛju wo kanrun tujɔi Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ bɛɛdo.
49006009	E gunɔw baŋabe, e kanran gunɔw ebe le bana kɔɔ tunmɔ le biyɛi. Bei liirɛmu sɔɔ kanrannɔugi. Sabu e igii wɔi, be lee e lee Baŋa gɔ alagala nɛ yɔɔ, iyaa wo inɛ kabu kunɔɔlɛ.
49006010	Kɔɔbe wooi onu nɛ, nɛɛ e paŋa ebe Inɛw Baŋa nɛ bɛɛi. Gɔnrɔn paŋagu womɔ nɛ bɛɛi.
49006011	Jinrun puu kuu baŋa dabulu nɛ ɛɛn go iŋi bɛɛ ga, e Ama kɔmɔgelu gɔbe puu e nɛ kunɔi.
49006012	Sabu emɛ, Adama unrunw le kɔmɔ taauwɔnɛ. Kaa kuu bɛɛnw lee, paŋagunw lee, ɔlɔ aduna ɔn laamaw gɔbe lee, iyaa alagalabe kikinu mɔɲu gɔbe lee, be le taauwɔin.
49006013	Kodigɛu, Ama kɔmɔgelu gɔbe puu jeɲɛi. Kunrin bai mɔɲu wiyaai ye, e, jaŋunɛ gɔ le iŋi bɛbɛɛdei. Iyaa kunrin kɔmɔ taa donugaa ye, nimɛ kanran e ɛɛn go bii bɛbɛɛdei.
49006014	Nɛɛ ɛɛn go biyɛi, dɔin ebe nɛ, naran gɔ tɛmu gin’ pagiyɛi, teitai gɔ inrun arugoi gin’ kunɔi.
49006015	Jamu Kibɛru Ɛju inɛ mainiyɛnmɔjɛ gɔ, taga gin’ kubɔ ebe nɛ kunɔi.
49006016	Kɔɔbe puu kuu nɛ gagawu gɔ dɛdɛɛ gin’ jeɲɛi. Wogɔ le e Mɔɲu kuu baŋa kɛun, yaun bije goou wɔɔ gɔbe puu dai bɛbɛɛdei.
49006017	Yayabu gɔ, inrun goro gin’ kunɔi, iyaa Kikinu Pilu polukaaba, Ama sɔɔi wɔɔ gɔ jeɲɛi.
49006018	Amagɛɛn tɔgu dɛin dɛin le Ama bɛrɛ kai ebe taganu, waaru puu Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le Ama gɛɛin. Wogɔ le kaba kanranlu go ɛjii mainiyɛin. Ama inɛw puu dɛi waaru puu Ama gɛɛin.
49006019	Mu dɛi kanran Ama gɛɛin. Maa aŋa waaru mu koorojɛ puu, sɔɔ bɛi ye, Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ inɛw bɛrɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go jugɔmɔ ga, Ama gɛɛin.
49006020	Mu kaju gɔ nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ dɛi sɔɔ sɔɔnɛi biyaa wɔun. Kodigɛu bana sɔɔun mu jaan gin’ maa liyɛ sɛlɛ go taga ga, mu dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
49006021	Ebaa kanran, sɔɔ ma lee, kijɛ mu kanranjɛ lee jugɔ ga, bainɛ ibɛ emɛ Tisike, Inɛw Baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ ɛju, sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, e bɛrɛ kibɛru gɔ puu tatagado.
49006022	Womaa bana emɛ wɔɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ye, kinɛ ebe kaaliyɛmɔ ga, mu wogɔ dɛi tee woi e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn.
49006023	Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, ba unrunw bɛrɛ jamu lee, ihibɛ lee, gagawu lee obo.
49006024	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisitoi, ihibɛ dogoolɛ le inɛw ibɛin puu, nɛɛma be le biyɛmɔ.
50001001	Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, mu Pɔlu lee, Timɔte lee, emɛ, Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, emɛ tiiuwɔ. Pilipi ana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanw gɔbe lee, bei baranw gɔbe lee, inɛw Ama inɛwin wɔin puu, Kirisito Yesu nɛ toin gɔbe lee bɛrɛ emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔin.
50001002	Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
50001003	Waaru ei mu ajubaajɛ puu, mu Ama mai birɛpoo tagajɔn.
50001004	E wooi puu dɛi, waaru Ama mu gɛɛnjɛ wooi, mu kinɛ ɛɛlu le gɛɛnjɔn.
50001005	Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga ga, bai pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ gowaa iye wɛɛ dɔɔ, e mu le bɔɔi biyaabei gɔ dɛi mu Amai birɛpoo tagauwɔn.
50001006	Kɔɔ gin’ mu kijɛ ɔn le tilai gawaa wɔun: Ama kinɛ ebe nɛ birɛ ɛju ɔn tɔlɔnɛ gɔ, Kirisito Yesu bai wɛɛido le, birɛ gɔ kibeido baa, wo birɛ wogɔ birɛnu biyɛdo.
50001007	Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ narain ga jugɔmɔ ga, woi bɔlɔtei ɛju nɛ daana ga pɔɔlɔ mui hɔɔlɔnɛi bee. Nɛɛ kanɛ mui kaju nɛ too. Kaa kaju nɛ mu too gɔ le ma, hɔɔlɔnɛi mu wɔɔ gɔ le ma, e puu, Ama nɛɛma mu bɛrɛ obu gɔ nɛ gamulu ebe biyaabei. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e puu sibɛ go ajubu kɔɔ tunmɔ mu siyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Ei kinɛ ma nɛ saii paa wɔun.
50001008	Mu Kirisito Yesu bana ei ibɛ gin’, ihibɛ diyɛ wogɔ le ei ibɛɛ wɔun giyaajɔn ye, mu narain sɔɔjɔn ga Ama igii wɔɔ.
50001009	E dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn mu gɛɛnjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ebaa kijɛ ɛju gɔ yɛmu bɛɛ ga, ihibɛ ebe bariyɛ bariyɛ yaamɔ. Iyaa ihibɛ wogɔ kuu nɛ jugɔ tɔitɔi gɔ lee, paamukanrun kibaai gɔ lee bariyɛmɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ Kirisito bai wɛɛido gɔ le ei ɛjaai biyɛdo, iyaa kijɛ turu nɛ kanran ei jarugu bɛɛmɔidolo.
50001011	Amai baba dɛi, Ama boi sɔmi biyɛ dɛi, Yesu Kirisito turu sai ɛhɛju tɔitɔi obojɛ gɔ le ei jooi biyɛdo.
50001012	Ba unrunw, kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔi gɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔi tɛŋɛlu. Kaa woi giru go yaamaabe ga jugi e bii ye ibɛɛ wɔun.
50001013	Kɔɔ gin’, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ ginrun diyɛ dɔmiyɛnw gɔbe puu lee, inɛw wajunw ɔn nɛ wɔin gɔbe puu lee, maa Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛi dɛi kaju nɛ too ga igii wɔin.
50001014	Kaju nɛ mu too gɔ dɛi, ba unrunw joo gamuu Inɛw Baŋa nɛ diyɛ daanu bemɛ bariyaa, kɔɔ sabu dɛi be anrangaju bɛɛu, liliyɛ sɛlɛ le Ama sɔɔ tagauwɔin.
50001015	Inɛw gamuu kai, ele lee, jai lee mu sibɛ go be sɛɛ dɛi, Kirisito waaju gɔ tagauwɔin. Kaa, inɛw gamuu gɔbe kinɛ ɛju le tagauwɔin.
50001016	Be mui ibɛɛ wɔin dɛi kɔɔ gin’ kanraunwɔin. Sabu be, maa sɔɔ sɔɔ dɛi, maa inɛw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ narain ga jugɔmɔ dɛi, Ama ɔn nɛ mui tii ga be igii wɔin.
50001017	Kaa inɛw gamuu Kirisito waaju gɔ kuu unrunbemɛ kai dɛi tagauwɔin, be kinɛpilu le tagauwɔnɛ. Kɔɔ gin’, ajubu bemɛ nɛ, waaru kaju mu too gɔ le, ɔɲɛ ma bariyɛmu bɛbɛɛdɛin ga wɔin.
50001018	Wogɔ gaju turu kanran wɔlɔ. Be kinɛgɛun le birɛɲu ma, kinɛpilu le birɛɲu ma, bana biyaai wooi puu, Kirisito waaju gɔ tagi wɔɔ. Wogɔ dɛi kinɛ ma ɛɛli wɔɔ. Iyaa kinɛ ma kanran ɛɛliyɛmɔnu biyɛdɔn.
50001019	Sabu amagɛɛn ebe lee, Yesu Kirisito Kikinu baru gɔ lee digɛu, kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔi kɔɔbe wooi yayabu ma sɔɔ le kijɛ digɛi biyɛdo mu igii wɔun.
50001020	Dɔgɔ mui turu kanran aaidolo ga mu saii diyɛdɔn le dɔmiyaan wɔun. Kaa mu anrangaju gaai sii ye, ɔnmɔ ma le ma, yiun ma le ma, kanɛ goo ye, bai wooi mu dɛi Kirisito boi sɔmi biyɛdo.
50001021	Sabu, mu bɛrɛ kai ɔnmɔ gɔ Kirisitoi, iyaa yiun gɔ tinɛi.
50001022	Kaa iyaa, mu ɔnmɔi wɔnu birɛ niwɛn sɛɛ birɛ bɛbɛɛdɔn ye, nɛɛ mu kijɛ yɛmɛɲu inɔn.
50001023	Mui sibɛ lɛi nɛ biɲiyaan wɔɔ. Yinwaaun ye, Kirisito le biyɛ ga, wogɔ saii daariyaa wɔun, sigɛ le wogɔ ire.
50001024	Kaa e sabu dɛi, sɔɔ sigɛ le maa gɔ, wogɔ ɔnmɔi bii ma gɔ woi.
50001025	Mu kɔɔ daii jugaa wɔun dɛi, mu e wooi logoro nɛ bibiyɛdɔn ga igii wɔun. Ebaa Ama oju nɛ giru go yaa ga, ebaa iyaa kinɛ ɛɛlu le biyɛ ga mu bibiyɛdɔn.
50001026	Kɔɔ gin’, waaru logoro ebe nɛ pilemaa mu wiyaajɛ, e sigɛ le Kirisito Yesu nɛ mu dɛi kuu ebe unɔ bɛbɛɛdei.
50001027	Sigɛ le, Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le bana sɛgɛrɛjɛ gin’ yoi yaai. Kɔɔ gin’ mu ei yɛnɛi wɛwɛiun ma, logoro ebe nɛ toloun ma biyaai kanran, ebaa sɛɛu ajubu turu nɛ ɛɛn go iŋiyaan, gagawu Kibɛru Ɛju bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ dɛi tunmɔ le mɔrinyaan jai jaiyɛuwɔi ga mu ɛhɛgɛdɔn.
50001028	Jaŋuw ebe bɛrɛ ei kijɛ turu nɛ kanran liirɛmɔnɔugi. Wogɔ bei suiyi sɛɛrɛi biyɛdo, kaa iyaa ei yabu sɛɛrɛi biyɛdo. Yayabu wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ goo ye wɛɛdo.
50001029	Sabu Ama, Kirisito le gawu kuu ɛɛlu sai e bɛrɛ obolu, kaa iyaa wo dɛi ɔɲu kuu ɛɛlu gɔ e bɛrɛ obaabe.
50001030	Kanɛ jai diyɛ gɔ nɛ e mu le bari bɛbɛɛdei. Wogɔ jai diyɛ pɔɔlɔ baa jaiyɛu mu bee gɔ woi, iyaa bana e igu gin’, iye bai dɔɔ jai jaiyɛu mu gɛlɛ gɔ woi.
50002001	Kirisito nɛ pagu turu e wɔɔ gɔ, anrangaju ei ohobojɛ ma? Ihibɛ womɔ kinɛ kaalu ei ohobojɛ ma? E Ama Kikinu le bɔɔi biyaa wɔi ma? E tunmɔ dɛi ihibɛ lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee yasin ma?
50002002	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ e tunmɔ le ajubu turu le bii ye, ihibɛ turu nɛ bii ye, kinɛ ebe lee, ajubu ebe lee koturu bojo ye, kinɛ ɛɛlu ma kibemɔi.
50002003	E, kuu ebe kai dɛi ma, kuu ulo tiyɛ sɛlɛ dɛi ma giye, kijɛ turu kanran kanrannɔugi. Kaa e tunmɔ le kuu sunugu le bii ye, inɛ tuturu puu, inɛw wajunw gɔbe wo dɛi ire gin’ lugo.
50002004	Inɛ turu kanran kuu womɔ too tee toonɔu. Kaa inɛw wajunw kijɛ tinɛjɛ kanrain.
50002005	Kirisito Yesu jige sɛbe gɔ, e wogɔ tunmɔ siyɛi.
50002006	Halu wo lee, Ama lee bana koturu bee kanran, wo lee, Ama lee kɛukɛu bee kanran, wo wogɔ kijɛ paju bɛɛmɔɔlɛi ga lugolu.
50002007	Kaa wo kijɛ wo sɛbe puu pajaatiyaa, birɛbirɛnɛ bana jeɲaabe. Wo Adama unrunw gin’ biyaa, inɛ peere le murin unruin tagaraabe.
50002008	Wo kuu unrunmɔ sunugaa, iyaa yiun gɔ baa, baga jai kuu nɛ yai wo yinwɛindo baa, sɔɔ yabanɛi biyaabe.
50002009	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama, alagala nɛ yalu baba wo sigɛ gɔ wo bɛrɛ obaabe. Iyaa boi puu dɛi boi wo sigɛ gɔ wo nɛ kunaabe.
50002010	Kɔɔ gin’ alagala nɛ lee, minɛ nɛ lee, minɛ doɲu nɛ lee kijɛ ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe puu, Yesu boi sɔmɔ dɛi tutuŋiyɛndɛin.
50002011	Iyaa Ba Ama boi sɔmi biyɛ dɛi, inɛw wooi Yesu Kirisitoi Inɛw Baŋai ga daii gɛgɛɛdɛin.
50002012	Kɔɔ gin’, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, waaru e le mu bee le e waaru puu sɔɔ ma yabaabei. Nɛɛ, kanɛ e le wagee waaru mu wɔɔ gɔ le sɔɔ ma yabaabei ye sigɛ le wogɔ gaara maa. Yayabu ebe sɛɛu kibaai biyɛ ga, liliyɛ le, goju kinwun le birɛ birɛi.
50002013	Sabu, kijɛ diŋɛ womɔi wɔɔ gɔ ebaa ibɛɛ biyɛ ga, wogɔ kanrun kibemɔɲu gɔnrɔn ei obo ga, Ama, woi kinɛ ebe nɛ birɛ birɛuwɔ.
50002014	Aduna ɔn inɛw kakalugunw, inɛw mɔɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ ebaa inɛw jarugu sɛnɛ, inɛw tɛgɛ sɛnɛ, Ama unrunw nɛ lelu tolobei biyɛ ga, kijɛ puu guguun lee, jiiru lee wɔlɔ go kanrain. Be bɛrɛ sɔɔ ɔnmɔ obojɛ gɔ taganu wɔnu, logoro bemɛ nɛ alagala tolobe gin’ e dooroun jaain wɔɔ. E kɔɔ gin’ kanraanjɛi ye, Kirisito bai wɛɛido gɔ le mu e dɛi kuu ma unɔ bɛbɛɛgɔn. Sabu wogɔ birɛ mu biru gɔ lee, ɔɲɛ mu iye gɔbe lee bamai biyɛlu tagarado.
