50002017	Mui daaɲu kanran, bamai laa biyɛdo. Sabu gagawu ebe gɔ, sadaga Ama bɛrɛ e obojɛ gin’ wɔɔ dɛi, kinrun ma sadaga gɔ sadaga ebe gɔ nɛ bariyɛidoi biyɛdo. Kunrin biyaai ye, kinɛ ma ahaado, mu e puu le bari ye kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔdɔn.
50002018	E kanran kinɛ ebe aaun jaain wɔɔ, iyaa mu le bari ye kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔu jaain wɔɔ.
50002019	Kibɛru e bɛrɛ goo ye mu ɛgɛido gɔ le maa kuu ma le anrangaju siyɛ ga, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu diŋɛi biyaai ye, bɛrii Timɔte e bɛrɛ tii bɛbɛɛdɔn diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
50002020	Woi laa ye inɛ mu gin’ mai ebe sɛɛ wɔlɔ.
50002021	Inɛw wajunw gɔbe puu, kuu unrunbemɛ mai laa ye, Yesu Kirisito le sɔɔ digɛ mai sɛnɛ.
50002022	Timɔte kai, e jige ɛju womɔ igii wɔi. Sabu wo lee, mu lee, emɛ tunmɔ go Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ waaju tagaabɛin. Aini bana wo bai barajɛ gin’, wo birɛ gɔ nɛ kunrin mui barauwɔ.
50002023	Nɛɛ bana mu bɛrɛ biyɛido waaru mu jugaajɛ kɛu, mu woi e bɛrɛ titiidɔn diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
50002024	Mu iyaa, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ diyɛ ma daanaa, mu kuu ma le bɛrii ei yɛnɛi wɛwɛɛdɔn ga igii wɔun.
50002025	Emɛ bainɛ Epaporodite, kai ma kilɛ ga inɛ mu bɛrɛ e tii gɔ, birɛbirɛnɛ mu bɔɔnɛi, Kirisito dɛi kɔmɔ tai nɛ mui baranɛi. Kaa nɛɛ, woi e bɛrɛ pilemu ye mu tiiun jaain wɔɔ ga ajubaabɔn.
50002026	Sabu wo e puui iyi dadaaru le wɔɔ. Iyaa woi jinwaanbe ga e ɛgaabei dɛi, wo ɛjii ajubu le wɔɔ.
50002027	Narain, woi jinwaanbe, iyaa wo yiun le bɛrii bee. Kaa Ama amasɔgɔ womɔ jugaabe. Amasɔgɔ womɔ sai laa, kaa kinɛ jiun ma kuu nɛ kinɛjiun bariyɛnɔu ga, Ama, amasɔgɔ ma yaa jugaabe.
50002028	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu sigɛ le kinɛ ɔgu le woi e bɛrɛ tii ibɛɛ wɔun. Kɔɔ gin’ waaru woi e iyaajɛ kinɛ ebe ɛhɛɛliyɛdo, kunrin kinɛjiun ma gɔ yaa gagamiyɛndo.
50002029	E kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ le, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ e bainɛ gin’ woi sɛgɛrɛi. E inɛw wo gin’ wɔin gɔbei babai.
50002030	Sabu Kirisito birɛ gɔ dɛi woi yinwɛndo ga bee. E kuu ebe le mu dɛi kijɛ nɛ mui baru bɛɛidelei e wɔɔ gɔ, wo wogɔ nɛ mui bara ga, kinrun unrunmɔ kunaa nɛwɛnlu.
50003001	Ba unrunw mabe, kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, ei Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Kijɛ e bɛrɛ tɔŋaatiyaa mu galu gɔ, wogɔ pilemu taga ga mu bɛrɛ doori laa. Iyaa e bɛrɛ wogɔ ire.
50003002	Inɛw birɛ mɔɲu birɛnw gɔbe, inɛw iju kɔɔbe, inɛw araa nɔɔmɔw tɔitɔi laain kɔɔbe dɛi kuu ebe kajubai.
50003003	Sabu inɛw araa nɔɔmɔw tɔitɔi gɔbe, inɛw Amai Kikinu womɔ le babanw gɔbe, inɛw Kirisito Yesu dɛi kuu emɛ unɔw gɔbe, iyaa atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ inɛw diyɛ emɛ daanaa sɛnɛ gɔbe emi.
50003004	Kaa mu kanran atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ diyɛ ma daanu bɛbɛɛbɔn. Inɛ turu atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ diyɛ unrunmɔ daanu bɛbɛɛgɔn ga ajubaa yɔɔ ye, mu gaara wogɔ baŋa dɛi sigɛ ajubaun jaan.
50003005	Mui narin bai gagaraye gɔ le mui araa nɔɔmi. Mu ba lee, mu na lee Yahutunwin, mui Bɛnjamɛ tɔgui, mui Heburu tɔgu tɔitɔii. Yahutunw tɔɔru sibɛ go mui Parisiɛin bee.
50003006	Ama dɛi maini sibɛ go mui inɛw Yesu le gawaa wɔiin tɔɔɲɔnɛi bee. Tɔɔru yabu le teitai dɛnu sibɛ go, inɛw, jarugu turu kanran mu nɛ tɛmɛnɛ.
50003007	Kaa pɔɔlɔ kijɛ tinɛ sɛin gin’ mu lugoube gɔbe, kanɛ Kirisito dɛi, kijɛ tinɛ sɛnɛ gin’ lugouwɔn.
50003008	Kijɛ sigɛ le maa gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa ma jugɔ gɔ le tunwaan yɛnaajɔn ye, mu kijɛ puu kijɛ tinɛ sɛnɛ gin’ lugouwɔn. Kirisito dɛi, kijɛ kuu ma tee tinɛjɛ gɔ puu pajaatun. Kirisitoi tinɛi gin’ bɛɛ ga, wo le pagu turui biyɛ ga, mu kijɛ puu lɔgɔ gin’ lugouwɔn. Mu waja Tɔɔru yabu ma dɛi mui teitai wɔɔ ajubu siyɛidolɔn. Kaa Kirisito nɛ gagawu mu sɛɛ gɔ dɛi mui teitai wɔɔ. Teitai bii Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ dɛi, iyaa inɛ gawaa wɔɔ baŋa bɛrɛ teitai bii Ama obojɛ gɔ dɛi mui teitai wɔɔ.
50003010	Mu kijɛ turu sai ibɛɛ wɔun. Wogɔ Kirisito lee, bulogu womɔ gɔnrɔn gɔ lee jugu gɔi. Kɔɔ gin’, bana biyaai puu mui kanran yiun nɛ bulo ye goo bɛɛ ga, yiun womɔ nɛ yaa wo le murin bii ye, bana ɔɲɛ wo iye gin’, ɔɲɛ iye ibɛɛ wɔun.
50003012	Mu kijɛ dɛi mu goi kanɛ baa biyaajɔn ga wɔlɔn, maa kanɛ baa mui kibaai ga wɔlɔn. Kaa maini ye maa jobu tujɔ gɔ bɛɛ ga, mu jɔbɔuwɔn, sabu Kirisito Yesu wogɔ dɛi mui aa galaai.
50003013	Ai, ba unrunw, mu wogɔ biyaajɔn ga kanɛ baa kole wɔlɔn. Kaa, kijɛ mu kanranjɛ turu yɔɔ: Kijɛ onu ma nɛ wɔɔ naŋaatiyaa ye, mu giru ma nɛ kijɛ wɔɔ gɔi bɛɛdɔn giye mainiyɛnjɔn.
50003014	Kɔɔ gin’, Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu, Ama, tujɔ daa go maa bɛɛ ga mui wo boonu gɔi bɛɛ ga, wogɔ onu nɛ jɔbɔuwɔn.
50003015	Emɛ, inɛw kikinu sibɛ go inɛw nawin taŋaai gɔbe, emɛ puu ajubu tutunmɔ wogɔ siyɛmɔi. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, inɛw gamuu logoro ebe nɛ ajubu wajai sɛin biyaai ye, Ama wogɔ ei daii tatagarado.
50003016	Bana biyaai wooi puu, emɛ iye bai dɔɔ oju nɛ emɛ too gɔ, wogɔi dimi yaamɔi.
50003017	Ba unrunw, e mui deewin biyɛi. Emɛ giretagurui biyaabɛin. Aiwa, giru taguru kɔɔbe bana le kɛukɛu yoi yaanw gɔbe, e bei yɛnɛi.
50003018	Sabu mu kubɔ joo e bɛrɛ tagaaginaabɔn, iyaa kanɛ giridii le e bɛrɛ pilemaa sɔɔuwɔn: Inɛw joo yɔɔin, be Kirisito baga jai jaŋuw gin’ yoi yaauwɔin.
50003019	Be suiyi oju nɛ toin. Bɛrɛ bemɛ gɔ ama bemɛi biyaai. Be kijɛ dɛi dɔgɔ le be biyɛun jaan gɔ dɛi kuu ulo le wɔin. Iyaa, be aduna ɔn kijɛ ajubu sai le wɔin.
50003020	Emɛ kai, emi alagala diinɛ unrunwin. Yabanɛ alagala goo ye wɛɛido gɔi emɛ kinɛ ɔgu le dɔmiyaan wɔin. Wogɔ Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisitoi.
50003021	Gɔnrɔn kijɛ wooi unrun le wo tubiyemɔjɛ gɔ le, wo goju peere emɛ gɔ dulomu ye goju doorojɛ womɔ gɔ gin’ bobojodo.
50004001	Kɔɔ gin’ ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, inɛw dadaaru le saii mu wɔɔ gɔbe, inɛw dɛi kinɛ ma ɛɛliyaa wɔɔ gɔbe, e inɛw dɛi kuu ma unɔu mu wɔɔ gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ ɛɛn go bana iŋiyɛun e jaan kɔɔ woi.
50004002	Ewodi lee, Sintise lee, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ e Inɛw Baŋa nɛ tunmɔ le jamu le biyɛi.
50004003	U kanran, u birɛbirɛnɛ mu bɔɔnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋa gɔ, uwaa yaanw kɔɔbei bara ga ibɛɛ wɔun, sabu, inɛw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ taga ga, be mu le bariyaa jai jaiyaabɛin. Iyaa be birɛ kɔɔ dɛi Kilema lee, inɛw birɛbirɛnw mu bɔɔnw wajabe lee le kanran bariyaabɛin. Inɛw kɔɔbe puu ɔnmɔ dɔn gɔ nɛ boi bemɛ tɔŋi wɔɔ.
50004004	Ei Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi waaru wooi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Mu gimaa sɔɔuwɔn, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi.
50004005	E inɛw wooi bɛrɛ kinɛ kaalu ebe gɔi jugɔmɔi. Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛgu gɔ bɛrii wɔɔ.
50004006	Kijɛ turu kanran dɛi diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Kaa, kijɛ wooi dɛi, kai e sɛɛ gɔ, gɛɛn nɛ Ama bɛrɛ tagai. Waaru wo bɛrɛ kijɛ e gɛɛnjɛ wooi, woi birɛpoo tagai.
50004007	Kunrin, Ama jamu obojɛ gɔ, inɛw paamukanrun dɛi sigɛ wɔɔ gɔ, kinɛ ebe lee, hakilɛ ebe lee, Kirisito Yesu nɛ sɛɛu gɛgɛliyɛdo.
50004008	Nɛɛ, ba unrunw, sɔɔ dumɔrɔn ma gɔ unwɔ: Kijɛ boi ɛju sɛɛ wooi lee, kijɛ sɔmu wo le dagaa wɔɔ wooi lee, tiyɛ gɔ kijɛ narain wɔɔ baba sɛɛ, teitai wɔɔ, ɛjaa wɔɔ, ɛjii wɔɔ, inɛw wooi kinɛ aajɛ gɔ, e kijɛ kɔɔbe puu ajubu le biyɛi.
50004009	Kijɛ e bɛrɛ mu deeru gɔ lee, mu le e bɛi gɔ lee, kijɛ sɔɔu mu wɔu e ɛgu gɔ lee, kijɛ kanraun mu wɔu e iye gɔ lee kanrain. Kunrin, Ama, jamu obonɛ gɔ e le bibiyɛdo.
50004010	Mui Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi kinɛ gaai ɛɛliyɛmɔuwɔn. Sabu waaru joo onu nɛ, e iyaa lee pilemaa mai ma yasin ga kanraan tagaraabei. Ebaa mai ma sii gɔi pajaatiyaabei gɛɛlun, kaa e bana wogɔ tagaraun bɛɛli beei.
50004011	Kai le wɔun dɛi mu wogɔ gɛɛu wɔlɔn. Sabu kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ puu nɛ kinɛ ma aai biyɛ ga mu wogɔ le wɛɛjiyaa wɔun.
50004012	Mu dɛgu le bana biyɛɲu igii wɔun, kijɛ joo le bana biyɛɲu igii wɔun. Kijɛ kayaɲu yasɔn ma, giyɛ le wɔun ma, kijɛ joo yasɔn wee, mui baalu wee, yalu wooi nɛ, waaru wooi, mu bana sɛɛu biyɛun jaan deyaa wɔun.
50004013	Kirisito mui paŋa obojɛ gɔ digɛu, mu kijɛ wooi kanrun bɛbɛɛdɔn.
50004014	Yinkanran, ɔɲɛ nɛ waaru mu tobe le mui e baru gɔ, wogɔ sɔɔ ɛjui.
50004015	Pilipi bɛɛnw, e kuu ebe le bana e igu gin’: Waaru Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ logoro ebe nɛ tagu tɔlin le, Maseduanɛ nɛ gowaa waaru mu yai le, ei laa ye Ama inɛw mɔɔnu mui baru turu kanran wɔlɔ. Ei laa ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu turu kanran kɛɛlɛ sin obu mu bɛrɛ obu wɔlɔ.
50004016	Kunrin waaru Tesalonike nɛ mu bee le, e kubɔ turu dɛi sigɛ kijɛ kai ma kilɛido mu bɛrɛ tiyaabei.
50004017	Mu sin obu ebe tee dɛnɛɛlɔn, kaa kijɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ Ama, sin obu ebe dɛi ei sigɛ le duba wo kanraindo gɔi.
50004018	Kijɛ mu bɛrɛ e tii gɔ puu mu bɛrɛ dɔwaai, wogɔ kai ma dɛi gaa. Epaporodite numɔ nɛ kijɛ kunaa e tii gɔ waaru mu bɛrɛ dɔi le, kijɛ sɛbele mu bee turu kanran bele. Sin obu wogɔbe kijɛ jiɲu ɛjui, sadaga Ama yabaajɛi, wogɔ le kinɛ womɔ aa wɔɔ.
50004019	Kirisito Yesu nɛ arusɛgɛ dooro sɛɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu, Ama ma kai ebe wooi kikilɛdo.
50004020	Boi sɔmu gɔ asuu nasuu Ama emɛ Ba mɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
50004021	Ama inɛw, Kirisito Yesu mɔi wɔin gɔbe puu bemaa poo poo wa. Ba unrunw ɔn nɛ mu le wɔin gɔbe ei poonɔuwɔin.
50004022	Ama inɛw, ɔn nɛ wɔin gɔbe puu ei poonɔuwɔin. Sigiyaa, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ ginrun gonɔ inɛw ei poonɔuwɔin.
50004023	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
51001001	Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui wɔɔ gɔ lee, emɛ bainɛ Timɔte lee,
51001002	Ama inɛw Kirisito nɛ ba unrunw sɔɔ turu bɛɛnw, Kɔlɔse ana nɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔin. Ama emɛ Ba e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
51001003	Emɛ e dɛi Ama gɛɛnnu, waaru puu Ama, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ba gɔi birɛpoo tagauwɔin.
51001004	Inge dɛi ma giyaa ye, emɛ, Kirisito Yesu nɛ gagawu e sɛɛ gɔ lee, Ama inɛw dɛi ihibɛ e sɛɛ gɔ lee kibɛru ɛgaabɛin.
51001005	Naran sɔɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, e bɛrɛ waaru kubɔ pɔlɔ gɔ wo dɔi le, alagala nɛ kijɛ e dɛi wɔɔ diyɛdɔn gɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe dɛi, e gagawu kɔɔ lee, ihibɛ kɔɔ lee sɛi.
51001006	Kibɛru Ɛju kɔɔ e bɛrɛ dɔi gin’, aduna puu nɛ ginaa narinyaan bariyɛu yaauwɔ. E sibɛ nɛ kanran, bai pɔlɔ Ama nɛɛma sɔɔ ɛgaa, naran womɔ e jugɔ le baa, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ kunrin bariyɛu yaauwɔ.
51001007	Birɛbirɛnɛ ibɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛ, Epaparase sɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ ei wo deeru. Wo Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai. E dɛi birɛuwɔ.
51001008	Ama Kikinu ihibɛ e nɛ kunaa sɛɛ gɔ, wo emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe.
51001009	Emɛ kanran kodigɛu, kibɛru ebe emɛ ɛgu nɛ, e dɛi Ama gɛɛn pajanɛ. Ebaa Ama Kikinu hakilɛ obojɛ gɔ puu lee, paamu kanrun obojɛ gɔ puu lee digɛnu, Ama diŋɛ jugu le jooi biyɛ ga emɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
51001010	Ebaa Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ aŋai dagaa gin’ yoi yaa ga, kijɛ puu nɛ kinɛ womɔ aamɔ bɛɛ ga, emɛ kodɛi gɛɛnɲu. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, e birɛ ɛju puu bibirɛdei, Amai jugu ebe bariyɛ bariyɛ yaado.
51001011	Ama, gɔnrɔn womɔ, dooro le wɔɔ gɔ le kijɛ wooi nɛ ei paŋa obo ye, kijɛ puu tari ye muyɔn e bɛɛmɔ.
51001012	Kinɛ ɛɛli le Ba Amai birɛpoo tagai. Ebaa wijɛ diinɛ gɔ nɛ, Ama inɛw kɛn nɛ gamulu bɛɛ ga e bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obu baŋa gɔ woi.
51001013	Wo ɔlɔ paŋa nɛ emi ɛlaa, Aini ibɛ womɔ diinɛ nɛ emi gaanaabe.
51001014	Aini wogɔ le emɛ kuu goonu biyaa, hakɛ yaabu kanrun biyaaɲu.
51001015	Ama iyemɔɔlɛ gɔ, Kirisito nɛ iyemɔjɛ. Wo Aini pɔlɔi, kijɛ maŋaaɲu puu kuu nɛ wɔɔ.
51001016	Sabu kijɛ puu wo le maŋi: Alagala kijɛ ma, minɛ kijɛ ma, kijɛ iyemɔjɛ ma, iyemɔɔlɛ, ɔgɔbe gin’ ma, laamube gin’ ma, kuu bɛɛnw gin’ ma, paŋa gin’ ma, kijɛ puu wo le maŋi, wo dɛi maŋi.
51001017	Kijɛ puu biyɛmɔ nɛ wo yabe. Kijɛ puu wo kɔrumɔ le sɛɛu biyaa wɔin.
51001018	Goju gɔ kuu woi. Goju gɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnui. Ɔnmɔ kana gɔ wo nɛ tɔlɔjɛ. Kijɛ puu nɛ girui biyɛ ga, wo yiunbe logoro nɛ Aini pɔlɔi bulu.
51001019	Sabu, Ama sɛɛu kibaa, Aini womɔ nɛ toiyo ga wo bɛrɛ ɛjii biyaai.
51001020	Iyaa Aini gɔ le digɛnu, kijɛ puu, minɛ kijɛ ma, alagala kijɛ ma, unrun le mɔɔnɔ ga Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii biyaai. Aini gɔ ili baga jai nɛ togi gɔ le, Ama jamu jɛɛlaa, kunrin kijɛ puu unrun le mɔɔnu.
51001021	E kanran, pɔɔlɔ e Ama sibɛ go inɛw yerunwin bɛin. Iyaa ajubu mɔɲu ebe lee, birɛ mɔɲu ebe lee dɛi e jaŋuw womɔi bɛin.
51001022	Kaa kanɛ Ama, ei giru unrunmɔ nɛ ɛjaai, lɔgɔ tarala, jarugu sɛlɛ bojo ga, Aini womɔ inɛi taŋaa goju wo jeɲu yiun gɔ le ei unrun le mɔɔnaati.
51001023	Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, alagala doɲu nɛ inɛw toin puu bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagin gɔ, mu Pɔlu, Kibɛru Ɛju dɛi birɛbirɛnɛi biyaa mu wɔɔ gɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju e ɛgu wogɔ e bɛrɛ diyɛdɔn obu gɔ nɛ jigelu go, gagawu nɛ duu ebe daanaa ye, ɛɛn go e biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
51001024	Kanɛ e dɛi ɔɲɛ mu bɛɛjɛ gɔ, kinɛ ɛɛli ma konɛ too. Sabu Kirisitoi ɔɲɔmu nɛ kijɛ wajaai gɔ, mu wogɔ goju womɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu dɛi, goju ma nɛ kibemɔuwɔn.
51001025	Ama sɔɔ sɛɛu kibaa e bɛrɛ taga ga, bana Ama, mu bɛrɛ sagu wo duuru le kɛukɛu, mu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu birɛbirɛnɛi biyaa wɔun.
51001026	Tiyɛ gɔ sɔɔ boŋurun asuu inɛw wooi bɛrɛ babaŋa bee gɔ dɛi mu birɛuwɔn. Kaa Ama kanɛ, inɛw womɔ bɛrɛ jugɔmaajɛ.
51001027	Sabu inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain sibɛ go sɔɔ boŋurun kɔɔ arusɛgɛ le bana jowaa wo wɔɔ gɔ lee, bana dooro le wo wɔɔ gɔ lee, inɛw womɔ bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ga Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii biyaai. Sɔɔ boŋurun wogɔ unwɔ: Kirisito e nɛ yato. Iyaa wo e bɛrɛ Ama dooro bɛi diyɛdɔn obaajɛ.
51001028	Waaju emɛ nɛ, emɛ Kirisito wogɔ sɔɔi sɔɔɲu. Inɛw puu Kirisito nɛ, inɛw kibaain, Ama giru nɛ tagara ga, emɛ inɛwin hakilɛ puu le tinwɛnrɛunwɔin, deereuwɔin.
51001029	Sɔɔ nɛ giru dɛɛraa, birɛ birɛu, Kirisito gɔnrɔn paŋa mu nɛ birɛjɛ gɔ sabu dɛi jai jaiyɛu mu wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔ woi.
51002001	Mu e lee, Laodise ana bɛɛnw lee, inɛw nimɛ giru le giru le mui iyetɛnɛ gɔbe lee dɛi jai diyɛ mu jaiyɛuwɔ gɔ ebaa jugɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
51002002	E puu waa kinɛ kaalu bɛɛ ga, ihibɛ nɛ turui biyɛ ga, iyaa paamu kanrun tɔitɔi diyɛdɔn obojɛ gɔ le jooi biyɛ ga mu jaiyɛuwɔn. E kunrin Ama sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ jujugɔdɛin. Wogɔ Kirisito woi.
51002003	Ama hakilɛ lee, Ama jugɔ lee nɛ tinɛ diyɛ too gɔ puu wo nɛ baŋiyaan wɔɔ.
51002004	Inɛ turu kanran sɔɔ ɛɛlu le ei lelemɔnɔu ga mu kɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn.
51002005	Sabu halu mu goju le e le wɔlɔn kanran, kikinu sibɛ go e le yɔɔun. Bana oju le sɔɔ e kanranjɛ gɔ lee, Kirisito nɛ gagawu ebe bana ɛɛn go wɔɔ gɔ lee yɛnɛu, mu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔun.
51002006	Kirisito Yesui Inɛw Baŋa ebei ga e yabu le kɛukɛu, kunrin wo nɛ toiyo ye yoi ebe yaai.
51002007	Duu ebe wo nɛ sibaa, ɛɛn go daanaa ye bariyɛi. E bɛrɛ bana deerin le kɛukɛu, gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go biyɛ biyɛ yaai, Amai birɛpoo tagu nɛ maai biyɛi.
51002008	Inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran inɛw hakilɛ sɔɔ, sɔɔ koolo inɛ lelemu gɔ le ei aamɔnɔugi. Wogɔ inɛw atɛmu deeru lee, aduna ɔn kijɛ paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe lee nɛ goojɛ. Kirisito sɔɔi laa.
51002009	Sabu Ama bana, sɛɛu kibaa, goju le Kirisito nɛ yato.
51002010	Iyaa wo nɛ e yaa kijɛ puu kibaa yasɛi. Wo kuui bii puu lee, paŋa puu lee kuu nɛ daan.
51002011	Iyaa wo nɛ ei araa nɔɔmaabɛin. Araa nɔɔmu inɛw numɔ le kanranɲu gɔi laa, kaa Kirisito araa nɔɔmu, gojunawan hakɛgu le ei kabiyɛmɔjɛ gɔi.
51002012	Bana wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, batise e yoi gɔ le digɛu, Kirisito yiun gɔ lee, e lee tunmɔ go bojin. Iyaa e tunmɔ go bulaai, sabu Ama gɔnrɔn, Kirisitoi yiun logoro nɛ bulomu gɔ le e gawaabei.
51002013	Hakɛ ebe lee, gojunawan hakɛgu ebe araa nɔɔla gɔ lee dɛi, e yinwaan yaabei. Kaa Ama, Kirisito le ei ɔnmɔi bojaati. Wo hakɛ emɛ puu yaabu kanraanti.
51002014	Yoru emɛ tɔŋaa duunaaɲu gɔ, tɔɔru bemɛ le, emɛ le jaiyɛubɛin gɔbe, Ama, wogɔ sujaa goonaati. Wo wogɔ baga jai nɛ pɛgaa, niwɛn tolo bojaati.
51002015	Wo baga jai gɔ le, kuu bɛɛnw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe lee, paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe lee kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaa, paŋa bemɛ donugaa, inɛw puu giru nɛ bei tagaraabe.
51002016	Kunrin, kijɛ e kayajɛ dɛi ma, e nɔɔjɛ dɛi ma, bai diyɛbe sɔɔ dɛi ma, iyepilu kana sɔɔ dɛi ma, deeliye bai sɔɔ dɛi ma, inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran wogɔbe dɛi kuu ebe nɛ sɔɔ sɔɔmɔnɔugi.
51002017	Kɔɔbe puu kijɛ wɛɛido kikinɛi sai. Tɔitɔi gɔ Kirisitoi.
51002018	Inɛ aai kanran, kuu sunugu kakalugu ma, mɛlɛnkɛbe demɛniyɛnmu ma sɔɔ nɛ kuu kunaa sɛɛ bɛrɛ ei biɲɛ ye tujɔ ebe ɛlɛmɔnɔugi. Inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ kuu iye womɔ nɛ diyɛ daanajɛ. Adama ii hakilɛ koolo dɛi kuu womɔ unaa wɔɔ.
51002019	Wo goju kuu, Kirisito le digiyɛɛlɛ. Goju gɔ puu, Kirisito kɔrumɔ le pana bɛɛu, digu digu gɔbe lee, wolu gɔbe lee digɛu, sɛɛu tunmɔ aa gɛliyaa, Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu gabiyɛuwɔ.
51002020	E Kirisito le tunmɔ go yinwin dɛi, aduna ɔn kijɛ paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe sɔɔ nɛ gowaai bai, ei aduna mɔi gin’, ɔn jeɲɛnɔu, ɔn nɛwɛnnɔu, ɔn tabanɔu tɔɔru, inge dɛi kuu ebe nɛ daanamaa wɔi?
51002022	Kɔɔbe puu, kai nɛ kunaa ye dogo yaajɛ. Kɔɔbe Adama unrunw tɔɔrui, deeru bemɛi.
51002023	Narain, Ama demɛniyɛnmu sɔɔ kuu bemɛ le be yegeraajɛ nɛ inɛw bana kuu obaa sɛin lee, kuu sunugu le bana be wɔɔ lee, goju bemɛ nɛ ɔɲɛ bana be tagarajɛ lee yɛnaa ye, tɔɔru kɔɔbe nɛ hakilɛ sɔɔ yato gin’ wɔɔ. Kaa gojunawan hakɛgu dadaaru tɛŋu sibɛ go, niwɛn turu kanran sɛnɛ.
51003001	E Kirisito le tunmɔ go bului dɛi, daa kijɛ gɔbe dɛnɛi. Kirisito konɛ Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ yadaan.
51003002	Ajubu ebe daa kijɛ gɔbe nɛ bojoi, minɛ kijɛ nɛ bojonɔugi.
51003003	Sabu ei yinwaain. Iyaa ɔnmɔ ebe Kirisito le Ama nɛ yabaŋa.
51003004	Kirisito, ɔnmɔ ebe gɔ woi. Wo waaru unruin wo tagaraajɛ, ei yaa wo le dooro gɔ nɛ tatagaradɛin.
51003005	Aduna jige e nɛ too gɔ daitii. Tiyɛ gɔ sala lee, lɔgɔji lee, gojunawan ihibɛ lee, dadaaru mɔɲu lee, girukakala leei. Girukakala gɔ ɔmɔlɔ bulu le kɛkɛu.
51003006	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe dɛi Ama kinɛbanrun, inɛw sɔɔ yabaanɛbe kuu nɛ sugojɛ.
51003007	Pɔɔlɔ waaru hakɛ kɔɔbe nɛ e tobe le, e kɔɔ gin’ yoi yaaubei.
51003008	Kaa kanɛ e kanran ɔnbe puu pajai: Kinɛbanrun, kinɛ ingelemu, mɔmɔɲu. Boi yamulu ma, sɔɔ mɔɲu turu kanran aŋa ebe nɛ goomɔnɔugi.
51003009	Tunmɔ bɛrɛ kakalu maŋanɔugi. Sabu e jige pɛi gɔ lee, birɛ womɔ lee e nɛ goonaatiyaa,
51003010	jige kana gɔ e nɛ kunaa wɔi. Wogɔ inɛ kana, Amai jugu nɛ kibaai biyɛ ga kanai taŋa taŋa yaau, woi maŋanɛ gin’ tee biyɛuwɔ.
51003011	Wogɔ nɛ Yahutunw tɔgui ma, Yahutunw tɔgui laa ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ. Araa nɔwaan ma, araa nɔɔlu ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, inɛw yerube ma, olu inɛw ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, gunɔ tolo ma gunɔnɛ ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, kaa puu Kirisitoi, puu nɛ woi too.
51003012	Ei Ama inɛw yɛmaajɛbei, Ama ei dɛiin bojaa, inɛw ibɛ womɔbei bojaabe. Kodigɛu, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, ɛjii bii lee, kuu sunugu lee, tɛgɛ sɛlɛ lee, muyɔn lee, kɔɔbe e nɛ kunɔi.
51003013	Tunmɔ sɔɔ kanran muyɔin. Inɛ turu inɛ waja le sɔɔ yasɛ ye, e tunmɔ yaabu kanrain. Inɛw Baŋa ei bana yaabu kanrun gin’, e kanran tunmɔ yaabu kanrain.
51003014	Kaa kɔɔbe wooi kuu nɛ ihibɛ le biyɛi. Kibaai bii pagu gɔ woi.
51003015	Kirisito, jamu obojɛ gɔ kinɛ ebe kuu baŋai biyɛmɔi. Jamu wogɔ dɛi Ama ei boonaa goju turu bojaabe. Birɛpoo tagai.
51003016	Kirisito sɔɔ gɔ, arusɛgɛ womɔ wooi le e nɛ toiyomɔi. Hakilɛ wooi le tunmɔ deerei, tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛin. Kinɛ ebe wooi le Ama bɛrɛ birɛpoo tagu nii nii. Wogɔ Ama sɔmu lee, Ama nii lee, nii Kikinu nɛ goojɛ lee le kanrain.
51003017	Kijɛ ingei kanran e kanranjɛ wooi, sɔɔ nɛ ma, birɛ nɛ ma, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le kanrain. Wo le digɛnu Ba Amai birɛpoo taganu kanrain.
51003018	E yaanw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ bana dagaa gin’, e igɛbe le tubiyei.
51003019	E igɛnw gɔbe, yaanw ebe ibɛi biyɛi. Be le gaari biyɛnɔugi.
51003020	E unrunw gɔbe, kijɛ wooi nɛ ei naranw gɔbe sɔɔ yabai. Inɛw Baŋa nɛ wogɔ ɛɛli wɔɔ.
51003021	E banw gɔbe, unrunw ebe kinɛ yanwannɔu giye, kinɛ bemɛ jinwɛnmɔnɔugi.
51003022	E gunɔw gɔbe, kijɛ puu nɛ inɛw e baŋabe sɔɔ yabai. Kinɛ bemɛ aamɔdei gin’ giru bemɛ nɛ sai wogɔ gin’ biyɛnɔugi. Kaa kinɛpilu le Inɛw Baŋa giri liyɛ dɛi kanrain.
51003023	Birɛ ingei kanran e birɛjɛ puu, kinɛ ebe wooi le Inɛw Baŋa mɔi gin’ kanrain. Inɛw mɔi gin’ kanrannɔugi.
51003024	Jugɔi, e Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ kɛn gɔ tujɔi go bɛbɛɛdei. Kuu Baŋa dɛi birɛ birɛu e wɔɔ gɔ, naran go Kirisitoi.
51003025	Inɛ teitai laa le birɛ birɛjɛ gɔ, teitai laa womɔ le woi tujɔdɛin, sabu inɛ kabu kunu sɔɔ wɔlɔ.
51004001	E gunɔw bɛɛnw gɔbe, e kanran alagala nɛ e baŋa yɔɔ igii wɔi digɛu, gunɔw ebe le teitaii biyɛi, aŋai jaan gin’ biyɛi.
51004002	Amagɛɛn nɛ mainiyɛin. Wogɔ le kaba kanranlu go, Ama bɛrɛ birɛpoo tagu le Ama gɛɛin.
51004003	Iyaa Ama sɔɔ tagu dɛi, Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ taan pinulu ye, emaa Kirisito sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ taga bɛɛ ga emɛ dɛi kanran Ama gɛɛin. Mu sɔɔ boŋurun wogɔ dɛi kaju nɛ toun.
51004004	Maa daii bana sɔɔun mu jaan gin’ sɔɔ bɛɛ ga mu dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
51004005	Inɛw jaŋu unrunwin laain sibɛ go yoiyaara ebe nɛ hakilɛ le biyɛi. Waaru koturu kanran kuu ebe nɛ galamɔnɔugi.
51004006	Inɛw puu aŋa bana ɛju saaɲu gɔ ebaa jugɔ ga, waaru puu sɔɔ ebe nɛɛma wo siyɛmɔi, nɛu wo toiyomɔi.
51004007	Bainɛ ibɛ emɛ Tisike, Inɛw Baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ mu bɔɔnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, kibɛru ma puu e bɛrɛ tatagado.
51004008	Womaa bana emɛ wɔɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ye, kinɛ ebe kaaliyɛmɔ ga, mu wogɔ dɛi tee woi e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn.
51004009	Bainɛ ibɛ emɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ, Onɛsimɛ, ebe bɛɛnnɛ gɔ, woi wo le tiiuwɔn. Ɔn nɛ sɔɔ biyɛu wɔɔ kibɛru puu, be e bɛrɛ tatagadɛin.
51004010	Arisutaruke, kajuginɛ mu bɔɔnɛ gɔ ei poonɔuwɔ. Barunabasu bainɛ, Maruka yaa ei poonɔuwɔ. Wo dɛi e bɛrɛ tɔɔru obaabɛin. Wo e bɛrɛ wiyaa dɔwaai ye, woi ɛjii sɛgɛrɛi.
51004011	Yesu, Jusutusu boonɔɲu gɔ yaa ei poonɔuwɔ. Yahutunw logoro nɛ inɛw kɔɔbe sai mu le bariyaa, Ama diinɛ birɛ birɛuwɔin. Be mu bɛrɛ kinɛ kaalu diyɛ obaabɛin.
51004012	Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnɛ, Epaparase, ebe bɛɛnnɛ gɔ ei poonɔuwɔ. Wo waaru puu e dɛi amagɛɛn nɛ ɛjii iŋiyaan gɛɛunwɔ. Ebaa ɛɛn go iŋiyɛn ga, kibaain biyɛ ga, iyaa Ama diŋɛ kanran ga sɛɛu kuu ebe obo ga wo e dɛi Ama gɛɛunwɔ.
51004013	Wo e lee, Laodise ana bɛɛnw lee, Hierapolise ana bɛɛnw lee dɛi ɛjii ɔɲɔuwɔ ga mu sɛɛrɛ wogɔ goo bɛbɛɛdɔn.
51004014	Jɔŋujɔŋɔnɛ ibɛ emɛ Luka ei poonɔuwɔ. Demasu kanran ei poonɔuwɔ.
51004015	Laodise nɛ ba unrunw wɔin gɔbei poonɔi. Nɛpa lee ginrun womɔ nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ gɔ lee yaa poonɔi.
51004016	Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e jaŋaajɛi ye, Laodise bɛɛnw Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ yaa jaŋamɔi. E kanran Laodise goi ye lɛtɛrɛ e bɛrɛ wɛɛido gɔ jaŋai.
51004017	Arusipe bɛrɛ tagai, womaa Inɛw Baŋa birɛ wo bɛrɛ gawurin gɔ, wogɔ kajubaa ye ɛjii birɛ donugo wa.
51004018	Sɔɔ ɔnbe mu numɔ ma le mu tɔŋɔuwɔ: Mu Pɔlu ei poonɔuwɔn. Mu kaju nɛ toun ga naŋanɔugi. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
52001001	E inɛw Tesalonike ana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ toin gɔbe, e inɛw Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee mɔi wɔin gɔbe, mu Pɔlu lee, iyaa Silasu lee, Timɔte lee, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔin. Nɛɛma lee, jamu lee e le biyɛmɔ.
52001002	Emɛ e puu dɛi, waaru wooi Amai birɛpoo tagauwɔin. Iyaa waaru Ama emɛ gɛɛnjɛ wooi, emɛ e dɛi wo bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
52001003	Gagawu ebe dɛi birɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ lee, ihibɛ ebe dɛi birɛ diyɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛ diyɛ ebe bana ɛɛn go daan gɔ, emɛ waaru wooi, emɛ Ba Ama giru nɛ naŋaranɲu.
52001004	Ba unrunw, emɛ igii wɔin, Ama ei ibɛi biyaa, ei unrunmɔi biyɛ ga yɛmaabe.
52001005	Emɛ Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ gɔ e bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Wogɔ, aŋa sɔɔi sai biyɛlu. Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, gɔnrɔn diyɛ lee, Kikinu Pilu baru lee iyaa Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ naran tɔitɔi ga emɛ gawaa wɔin dɛi e bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Emɛ e sabu dɛi logoro ebe nɛ bana emɛ bee gɔ e igii wɔi.
52001006	E emi lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa lee deewin biyaabei. Iyaa ei ɛjii ɔɲaabe kanran, e Inɛw Baŋa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, kinɛ ɛɛlu Kikinu Pilu nɛ goo ye bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ le yabaabei.
52001007	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Maseduanɛ gana nɛ lee, Akayi gana nɛ lee inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe puu giru nɛ ei giretagurui biyaai.
52001008	Kunrin Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ gɔ e le digɛu, Maseduanɛ nɛ lee, Akayi nɛ lee sai ginɛlu, kaa gagawu ebe kibɛru gɔ yalu wooi nɛ dɔwaai. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi emɛ sɔɔ turu kanran sɔɔnu doori ga wɔin.
52001009	Ei yɛnɛi emɛ wɛɛ le, bana emi e sɛguru gɔ sɔɔ, inɛw kɔɔbe kuu bemɛ le sɔɔuwɔin. Bana ɔmɔlɔ gɔbe pajaatiyaa, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ, Ama tɔitɔi gɔ demɛniyɛnmɔ ga, wo le bana e tubi sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin.
52001010	Iyaa, Aini womɔ Yesui yiun nɛ wo bulomu gɔ, alagala goo ye wo wɛɛido gɔ dɔmiyaan e wɔɔ gɔ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin. Wogɔ baŋa gɔ, Ama kinɛbanrun bɛrii wɛɛido gɔ nɛ emi yabanɛ gɔ woi.
52002001	Ba unrunw, e bɛrɛ emɛ wɛɛ gɔ sɔɔ tiyɛ sɛlɛi biyɛlu ga e kuu ebe le igii wɔi.
52002002	Tesalonike ana nɛ, e bɛrɛ emɛ wɛɛmɔ nɛ, bana Pilipi ana nɛ inɛw emi be ɔɲɔmu gɔ lee, emi be duyi gɔ lee, e wogɔ igii wɔi. Halu jai diyɛ yabe kanran, e bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju wo bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ taga ga, Ama emɛ gɔ emi anrangaju obaabe.
52002003	Sabu waaju emɛ gɔ nɛ lelemu sɔɔ tolo, ajubu lɔguju tolo, iyaa nabara sɔɔ yaa tolo.
52002004	Kaa Ama bana ibɛ gin’ emɛ sɔɔuwɔin. Sabu Ama Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ taga ga emɛ le jaain wɔɔ dɛi, wo wogɔ sagu emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraabe. Emɛ, inɛ kinɛ aamɔ ga dɛnɛɛnɛ, kaa Ama kinɛ aamɔ ibɛɛ wɔin. Wo kinɛ emɛ lubo lubo yɛnɛuwɔ.
52002005	E igii wɔi, emɛ sɔmu ma, sɔɔ emɛ sɔi nɛ kɛɛlɛ dɛnu dadaaru baŋaran ma, emɛ kanrannɛ. Wogɔ nɛ, Ama wo sɛɛrɛ emɛi.
52002006	Halu, emi Kirisito jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui dɛi, paŋa emɛ e bɛrɛ dɔɔnu bɛbɛɛbɛin kanran, emɛ inɛw emi sɔmɔ ga dɛnɛnɛ. E ma, inɛw leebe ma, emi sɔmɔ ga emɛ dɛnɛnɛ. Kaa waaru logoro ebe nɛ emɛ tobe le, bana nanɛ unrunw womɔ ɛjii kajubajɛ gin’, emɛ e le tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le biyaabɛin.
52002008	Emɛ ei saii ibɛɛ bɛin dɛi, ei kinɛ emɛ nɛ paa wɔin dɛi, emɛ Kibɛru Ɛju Ama bɛrɛ goi gɔ e bɛrɛ obu ibɛɛ bɛin sai laa, kaa iyaa kinrun emɛ kanran obu ibɛɛ bɛin.
52002009	Ba unrunw, e naran go ɔɲɛ emɛ lee, birɛ kirɛ emɛ iyi gɔ lee naŋali. Waaru Kibɛru Ɛju Ama bɛrɛ goi gɔ e bɛrɛ emɛ tagau bee le, emɛ inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ, logoro ebe nɛ dɔɔi biyɛnɔu ga, aga lee digɛ lee birɛ biraabɛin.
52002010	E inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe logoro nɛ bana emɛ bee gɔ Ama kinɛ aa bee, teitai bee, lelu turu kanran tobele. E lee, Ama lee sɛɛrɛ goonw emɛi.
52002011	E igii wɔi, banɛ aŋai unrunw womɔ le kanranjɛ gin’, emɛ e tuturu bɛrɛ kunrin kanraanbɛin.
52002012	Emɛ ei mainiyɛnmaa, diyɛ ebe dɛinyɛnmaabɛin. Iyaa Ama ebaa, diinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ lee, dooro unrunmɔ nɛ lee yoo ga ei boonɔnɛ gɔ, kinɛ womɔ bana aajɛ gin’ kunrin yoi yaa ga, emɛ e bɛrɛ tɔɔraabɛin.
52002013	Amai waaru wooi kijɛ dɛi birɛpoo emɛ tagajɛ waja kanran yɔɔ. Waaru Ama sɔɔ e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu le, e keŋiyaan, wogɔ le yabaabei. E wogɔ inɛ sɔɔi gin’ lugoli, kaa Ama sɔɔi ga lugaabei. Wogɔ Ama sɔɔi gɔ yaa narain. Sabu Ama, e inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe nɛ birɛ birɛuwɔ.
52002014	Ba unrunw, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu Kirisito Yesu nɛ toin, Judea gana nɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ dɔi gɔ e bɛrɛ kanran dɔwaabe. Yahutunw bana inɛw kɔɔbei ɔɲɔmi gin’, e ba unrunw gɔbe ɔɲɛ tutunmɔ wogɔ e bɛrɛ dɔɔmaabɛin.
52002015	Yahutunw, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe lee daabɛin. Be emi ɛjii ɔɲɔmaabɛin, be Ama kinɛ ɛjii banranmɔuwɔin, bei inɛw puu jaŋuwin.
52002016	Be iyaa, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ emaa waaju be bɛrɛ yayabu obojɛ gɔi taganɔu ga, be emi tɛŋɛ ga mainiyɛunwɔin. Be kɔɔ gin’ hakɛ mɔɔnu waaru wooi be kanrun gɔbe kibemɔuwɔin. Kaa nɛɛ dumɔ gɔ, Ama kinɛbanrun gɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ sugaai.
52002017	Emɛ kai, ba unrunw, waaru gaila le emɛ tunmɔ le kabiyaabɛin. Kinɛ emɛ le laa, kaa goju emɛ le tunmɔ le kabin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, emɛ girupala ebe pilemɛ ye iye ga dadaaru diyɛ le bɛin dɛi, emɛ wogɔ kanrun bɛɛ ga mainiyaanbɛin.
52002018	Emɛ e bɛrɛ pilemu yaa ga ibɛɛ bɛin. Mu Pɔlu, e bɛrɛ wɛɛ ga, kubɔ turu dɛi sigɛ kanraan yɛnaabɔn. Kaa Setanu emi tɛŋaabe.
52002019	Sabu diyɛdɔn emɛ gɔ lee, kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn bɛi sɛɛrɛ le kuu emɛ unɔ emɛ bɛɛido gɔ lee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu waaru unruin wo tagaraido gɔ le, giru womɔ nɛ, inɛw leei laa, kaa ei tee biyɛdo.
52002020	Ɔnhɔn, kuu ulo emɛ sɔɔ gɔ lee, kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ gɔ lee ei.
52003001	Nɛɛ kunrin, emɛ ei iyelu go bii gɔ muyaan bɛɛnɛ kanraan, emɛ sai Atɛnɛ ana nɛ biyɛ ga yabaa,
52003002	Timɔte, emɛ bainɛ, Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju tagu Ama birɛ gɔ nɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛ gɔ, e bɛrɛ tiyaabɛin. Logoro ebe nɛ tɔɔɲɔ diyɛ e bɛrɛ dɔɔuwɔ gɔ dɛi inɛ turu kanran kinɛ yanwannɔu dɛi, womaa ei tibemɔ ga, gagawu ebe nɛ womaa ei mainiyɛnmɔ ga, emɛ woi e bɛrɛ tiyaabɛin. E kuu ebe le igii wɔi, tɔɔɲɔ kɔɔbe tunmɔ emɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ dɔdɔɔdo ga kɛjaa sɛbɛin gɔbei.
52003004	Kunrin waaru e le emɛ bee le, emɛ, ɔɲɛ emɛ bɛrɛ dɔdɔɔdo ga e bɛrɛ tagaaginaabɛin. E igii wɔi, kijɛ wogɔi biyaabe.
52003005	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu ei iyelu go bii gɔ muyaan bɛɛlu kanraan, gagawu ebe bana wɔɔ jugɔ ga, Timɔte e bɛrɛ tiyaabɔn. Setanu, inɛi subɔrɔnɛ gɔ ei susubɔrɔdo ma ga liyaabɔn. Iyaa wogɔ le digɛnu birɛ emɛ, birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛi biyɛnɔu ga mu liyaaun.
52003006	Kaa kanɛ Timɔte e bɛrɛ gowaa wiyaai. Wo gagawu ebe dɛi lee, ihibɛ ebe dɛi lee kibɛru ɛju jɛɛlaabe. Ebaa iye bai dɔɔ waaru wooi ihibɛ le emi ajubauwɔi gi, iyaa bana ei iye ga ɛjii daariyaa emɛ wɔɔ gin’, e ɛjii emi iyi dadaaru le wɔi ga emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe.
52003007	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ɔɲɛ emɛ nɛ lee, tɔɔɲɔ emɛ nɛ lee, ba unrunw, emɛ e dɛi kinɛ emɛ kaaliyaai. Kijɛ kinɛ emɛ kaaliyɛmu gɔ, wogɔ gagawu ebei.
52003008	E Inɛw Baŋa nɛ ɛjii kinɛ daanu le wɔi dɛi, emɛ naran go kanɛ ɔnmɔi wɔin.
52003009	Kanɛ emɛ e dɛi Amai birɛpoo ɛjii tagu bɛbɛɛdɛin. Emɛ e dɛi giru womɔ nɛ kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ sɛɛ gɔ puu dɛi woi birɛpoo tagauwɔin.
52003010	Emaa kuu emɛ le ei pilemu ye iye bɛɛ ga, iyaa gagawu ebe sibɛ go kijɛ dɔɔlu gɔ kibemɔ ga, aga lee digɛ lee, emɛ Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛɛunwɔin.
52003011	Ama, wo emɛ Ba gɔ lee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu lee, emaa ei yɛnɛi yai bɛɛ ga, oju gɔ be yegeremɔ.
52003012	Nɛɛ e kai, bana ei emɛ ibɛ gin’, tunmɔ ibɛɛ bii gɔ nɛ lee, inɛw puu ibɛɛ bii gɔ nɛ lee, Ama ei gabiyɛmɔnu, giru jɛyaa.
52003013	Kunrin Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu, inɛw womɔi wɔin gɔbe wooi le waaru wo wɛɛido, wo ei gɔnrɔn ohobodo, iyaa emɛ Ba Ama giru nɛ, wo bɛrɛ kuu ebe obu sibɛ go ei jarugusɛlɛ le biyɛmɔdo.
52004001	Kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, ba unrunw, e yoiyaara ebe bana Ama kinɛ aaido gɔ emɛ le deyaabei. Narain, e kanɛ baa bana kanraun e wɔɔ gɔ kɔɔ woi. Iyaa kanɛ ebaa wogɔ dɛi sigɛ kanran ga, emɛ Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, emɛ gimaa e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
52004002	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, emɛ bɛrɛ tɔɔru obaa ei obo gi gɔbe, e wogɔ igii wɔi.
52004003	Ama kijɛ ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Wo ebaa unrun dɛi dɛiin biyɛ, iyaa sala sɔɔ turu nɛ kanran yoonɔu ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
52004004	Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, dadaaru mɔɲu le bana be kanranjɛ gin’ laa, kaa Ama kinɛ bana aajɛ gin’, iyaa, inɛw bɛrɛ bana baba sɛɛ gin’, inɛ tuturu yaanran womɔ le ɛjii biyɛ.
52004006	Inɛ turu kanran, yaanw sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi wo bɔɔnɛ bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanran ma, woi jama ma kanrannɔu. Inɛw Baŋa, inɛw kɔɔ gin’ kanranw gɔbei lalagado ga emɛ laa e bɛrɛ sɔwaabɛin, ei daii tagaaginaabɛin.
52004007	Sabu Ama, sala dɛi emi boonɔlu, kaa emaa dɛiin, womɔi biyɛ ga wo emi boonaabe.
52004008	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi inɛ deeru kɔɔbe le yabalu gɔ, wo inɛ le yabalu kanranlu, kaa Ama, Kikinu Pilu womɔ ei obonɛ gɔ le yabalu kanrun.
52004009	Ba unrunw gagawu nɛ e bɔɔnw gɔbe ibɛɛ bii sibɛ go e bɛrɛ dɔn tɔŋu ye tiinu doori. Sabu Ama ebaa tunmɔi ibɛɛ biyɛ ga ei deeraabe.
52004010	Iyaa e ba unrunw Maseduanɛ gana puu nɛ wɔin gɔbe wooi, e bei yaa ibɛɛ wɔi. Kaa emɛ e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, ba unrunw, e nimɛ kanran wogɔ dɛi sigɛ kanrain.
52004011	Bana ebaa kanran ga laa baa emɛ tɔɔru gin’, e maini ye jamu le biyɛi, inɛw wajunw sɔɔ nɛ yoonɔugi, kuu ebe le birɛ birɛi.
52004012	Kɔɔ gin’, inɛw Yesu le gawaa wɔnɛ gɔbe, ei bababadɛin. Iyaa inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ ei dɔɔi biyɛidolo.
52004013	Ba unrunw, inɛw Ama le bii diyɛdɔn sɛnɛ gɔbe aŋai kinɛ jiun le biyɛɲu gin’ ebaa biyɛnɔu ga, inɛw yinwaan wɔin gɔbe sibɛ go ebaa naran gɔ jugɔ ga emɛ ibɛɛ wɔin.
52004014	Sabu emɛ Yesu yinwaan bulaai ga gawaa wɔin. Inɛw Yesu le gawaa wɔu yinwin gɔbe kanran, Ama bei Yesu le bubulugodo ga emɛ gawaa wɔin.
52004015	Sɔɔ e bɛrɛ sɔɔi emɛ do ɔn Inɛw Baŋa deeraabe. Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido, emɛ inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe, inɛw yinwaan diin gɔbe giru nɛ galaidenɛ.
52004016	Sabu, Ama mii diyɛ tɔɔru obu lee, mɛlɛnkɛbe puu kuu baŋa mii lee, Ama kaan mii gɔ lee waaru ɛgɛmaajɛ, Inɛw Baŋa, kuu womɔ le alagala goo ye susugodo. Inɛw Kirisito le gawaa wɔu yinwɛnw gɔbe laa bubulodɛin.
52004017	Kɔɔ onu nɛ emɛ inɛw ɔnmɔi wajaain gɔbe, emɛ be le bari ye daa go anrankulumɔ nɛ Inɛw Baŋai sɛgɛrɛ ga emi uhunɔdɛin. Kunrin emɛ asuu Inɛw Baŋa le bibiyɛdɛin.
52004018	E sɔɔ kɔɔbe le tunmɔ kinɛ kaaliyɛmɔi.
52005001	Ba unrunw, sɔɔ kɔɔbe biyɛidɛin bai gɔ ma, waaru gɔ ma dɛi e bɛrɛ tɔŋu tii ga e kai sɛlɛi.
52005002	Sabu, Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido gɔ, gugunyɔnnɛ digɛ bana wɛɛjɛ gin’ wɛɛdo ga e ɛjii igii wɔi.
52005003	Inɛw waaru «Jamui, alupɛi» be gɛɛjɛ gɔ le, kɔɔ waaru le, yaanran bana nɔrun dɛinyɛnjɛ gin’, yanwan diyɛ gɔ kubɔ turu kuu bemɛ nɛ susugodo. Inɛw, wogɔ nɛ ɛli goi bɛɛidenɛ.
52005004	Kaa e kai, ba unrunw, e ɔlɔ nɛ toloi. Kɔɔ gin’ Inɛw Baŋa bai gɔ gugunyɔnnɛ gin’ ei dɛbɛidolo.
52005005	E puu, ei wijɛ inɛwin, aga inɛwin. Emi digɛ ma, ɔlɔ ma inɛwin laa.
52005006	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ inɛw wajunw gin’ kikinu sibɛ go giri emɛ yeiyeun jaanla. Kaa emɛ giri yeiyelu go, kuu emɛ ɛjii gɛli ye biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
52005007	Giri waaru yeiyeɲu gɔ digɛi, iyaa kɔɲɔ le bimili ye biyɛɲu gɔ digɛi.
52005008	Kaa emi aga mɔi, iyaa kuu emɛ ɛjii emɛ gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, inrun arugoi gin’ emɛ goriyeun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa yayabu diyɛdɔn emɛ gɔ, inrun goro gin’ emɛ goriyeun jaain wɔɔ.
52005009	Ama, wo emaa kinɛbanrun unrunmɔ gɔ iye ga emi yɛmɛlu. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu emaa yayabu gɔ bɛɛ ga emi yɛmaabe.
52005010	Sabu waaru Kirisito wɛɛido le, emɛ ɔnmɔi wɔin ma, yinwaain ma, wo emaa wo le ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, emɛ dɛi yinwun.
52005011	Kunrin bana kanraun e wɔɔ gin’, e tunmɔi mainiyɛnmɔi, tunmɔ paŋa bariyɛmɔi.
52005012	Ba unrunw, emɛ e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, inɛw logoro ebe nɛ Ama birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa oju nɛ ei teeremɔw gɔbe, ei deerenw gɔbe, e bei babai.
52005013	Birɛ be birɛjɛ sabu dɛi e bei ɛjii babai, bei saii ibɛɛ biyɛi. E tunmɔ le jamu le biyɛi.
52005014	Ba unrunw, emɛ e bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛɛunwɔin, inɛw walagunw gɔbei tinwɛnrɛin, inɛw liliyɛgunw gɔbe diyɛ dɛinyɛnmɔi, inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunw gɔbei barai. Inɛw wooi le muyɔn le biyɛi.
52005015	Inɛ turu kanran mɔɲu, mɔɲu le tujɔmɔnɔu ga kuu kajubu le biyɛi. Kaa waaru wooi, tunmɔ bɛrɛ lee, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ lee ɛju kanran ga mainiyɛin.
52005016	E waaru wooi kinɛ ɛɛlu le biyɛi.
52005017	E waaru wooi Ama gɛɛin.
52005018	Kijɛ wooi nɛ Amai birɛpoo tagai. Sabu Kirisito Yesu nɛ, Ama kijɛ e nɛ wo ibɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
52005019	E Ama Kikinu birɛ gɔ tɛŋɛnɔugi.
52005020	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ gɔbe yau kanrannɔugi.
52005021	Kaa kijɛ puu ɛjii marun yɛnɛi: Kijɛ ɛju gɔbe gɛliyɛi,
52005022	kijɛ mɔɲu puu dɛi kuu ebe gɛliyɛi.
52005023	Ama, jamu obonɛ gɔ, ei kijɛ puu nɛ womɔi dɛiin biyɛmɔ. Iyaa kikinu ebe lee, kinrun ebe lee, goju ebe lee, bana ebe wooi nɛ, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito wɛɛido baa, Ama ei lelu wooi nɛ paaba.
52005024	Ama, ei boonɔnɛ gɔ, wogɔ kakanrando, sabu wo sɔɔ turu baŋai.
52005025	Ba unrunw, e emɛ dɛi kanran Ama gɛɛin.
52005026	Ba unrunw gɔbe wooi, Ama inɛw gin’ ihibɛ le poonɔi.
52005027	Mu Inɛw Baŋa boi le ei tɔɔrɔuwɔn, ba unrunw gɔbe wooi bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn jaŋai.
52005028	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
53001001	E inɛw Tesalonike ana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ toin gɔbe, e emɛ Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee mɔi wɔin gɔbe, mu Pɔlu lee, iyaa Silasu lee, Timɔte lee, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔin.
53001002	Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
53001003	E dɛi, ba unrunw, waaru wooi Amai birɛpoo emɛ tagaun jaain wɔɔ. Kunrin kanran ga jaain wɔɔ. Sabu gagawu ebe gaai bariyɛuwɔ, iyaa e tuturu wooi, tunmɔi ibɛɛ bii ebe bariyɛ bariyɛ yaauwɔ.
53001004	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe nɛ, emɛ e dɛi kuu emɛ unɔuwɔin. Tɔɔɲɔ lee, ɔɲɛ lee muyaan e wɔɔ gɔbe logoro nɛ bana ɛɛn go iŋiyaan, gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi emɛ kuu emɛ unɔuwɔin.
53001005	Kɔɔ puu Ama saliyɛ kiru gɔ teitai wɔɔ ga daii tagarajɛ. Dumɔ gɔ, Ama diinɛ, diinɛ dɛi ɔɲɔu e wɔɔ gɔ nɛ yoo ga e le jaain biyɛdo. E diinɛ wogɔ dɛi ɔɲɔuwɔi.
53001006	Ama kijɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ kakanrando: Wo inɛw ei ɔɲɔmɔw gɔbei ɔhɔɲɔmɔdo.
53001007	E inɛw kanɛ ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbe, Ama kinɛ ebe kakaaliyɛmɔdo, kinɛ emɛ yaa kakaaliyɛmɔdo. Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, inɛw Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le yabanɛ gɔbe ɔɲɔmɔ ga, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, mɛlɛnkɛ paŋagunw womɔbe le, yaun bije nɛ, alagala goo ye waaru unruin wo tagaraido le, Ama kunrin kanrando.
53001009	Ama bei ɔhɔɲɔmɔdo, bei asuu susuyodo. Inɛw Baŋa bei unrun le wagee bobojodo, bei dooro diyɛ unrunmɔ le wagee bojodo.
53001010	Inɛw Baŋa bai pilemɛ ye wɛɛido gɔ sɔɔ kɔɔ bibiyɛdo. Waaru pilemaa wo wiyaajɛ, inɛw womɔi wɔin gɔbe woi dedemɛniyɛnmɔdɛin. Inɛw wo le gawaa wɔin gɔbe puu woi bababadɛin. E yaa logoro bemɛ nɛ totoiyodei, sabu e sɔɔ womɔ e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu gɔ le yabaabei.
53001011	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ e dɛi Ama bɛrɛ waaru wooi gɛɛunwɔin. Ɔnmɔ nɛ ei boonaa wo jɛɛlu gɔ e le kijɛ jaain wɔɔi biyɛmɔ ga, womaa gɔnrɔn womɔ le, ɛju kanran ga daariyaa e wɔɔ puu ei kanrun bɛɛmɔ ga, iyaa gagawu ebe birɛ gɔ kibaai biyɛmɔ ga, emɛ wo bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
53001012	Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu boi gɔ e dɛi sɔsɔmɔdɛin, iyaa inɛw kanran wo dɛi boi ebe sɔsɔmɔdɛin. Ama emɛ lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee nɛɛma gɔ dɛi kunrin biyɛdo.
53002001	Nɛɛ, ba unrunw, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito wɛɛgu gɔ sɔɔ sibɛ go lee, iyaa emɛ wo le bari ye yalu turu nɛ emɛ mɔrinyɛindo sibɛ go lee kanran, emɛ e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin:
53002002	Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ sɔɔ le digɛnu ma, waaju taganu ma, maa iyaa lɛtɛrɛ emɛ bɛrɛ goi ga gɛɛɲu sɔɔ le digɛnu, Inɛw Baŋa bai gɔ wiyaa dɔwaai giye, hakilɛ ebe ɔgiri bimiliyemɔnɔugi, iyaa kikinu manu le kanran biyɛnɔugi.
53002003	Inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ, ei bana inge lei kanran lelemɔnɔugi. Sabu, Ama le murutu kanranw gɔbe wiyaa dɔɔnɛ ye, iyaa Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ, inɛ suiyi dɛi bojaaɲu gɔi tagaranɛ ye, bai diyɛ kɔɔ dɔɔidolo.
53002004	Ama jaŋunɛ kɔɔ, kijɛ amai gɛɛɲu, kijɛ demɛniyɛnmɔɲu puu le jajaiyɛdo. Unruin kijɛ kɔɔbe puu dɛi sigɛ bojodo. Wo unruin Amai giyaa ye, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ kɔlɔ nɛ baa yoi ye dɛinyɛndo.
53002005	Waaru e le mu bee le, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tagaabɔn ga e naŋaai ma?
53002006	Kɔɔ wooi nɛ, kijɛ kɔɔbe biyɛnɔu ga kijɛ tɛŋaa sɛɛ gɔ e kanɛ igii wɔi. Kunrin, Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ, waaru womɔ dɔwaai ye unruin tagarado.
53002007	Mɔmɔɲu gɔnrɔn babaŋa gɔ, kanɛ baa birɛ birɛuwɔ. Kaa, inɛ kanɛ woi tɛŋaa sɛɛ gɔ, oju womɔ nɛ goolu ye, kijɛ wɛɛido gɔ biyɛidolo.
53002008	Kɔɔ waaru le Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ tatagaradɛin. Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, aŋa uju unrunmɔ le woi dadaado, wɛɛgu unrunmɔ wijɛ diyɛ le woi susuyodo.
53002009	Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ waaru wɛɛido, wo Setanu gɔnrɔn le wɛɛdo. Wo taanrinyɛn lee, sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛnbe lee, yarabirɛ lee tɔgu dɛin dɛin inɛ lelemu le wɛɛdo.
53002010	Wo, inɛw suiyoidɛin gɔbe, mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin puu le lelelemɔdo. Be Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ naran bei yabado ga bee gɔi ibɛi biyɛ ga yabanɛ dɛi bei susuiyodo.
53002011	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama, bemaa kakalu gɔ le gawa ga, lelemu paŋa sɛɛ be bɛrɛ tiiuwɔ.
53002012	Kunrin inɛw Inɛw Baŋa naran sɔɔ gɔ le gawanɛ kanraan, teitai laa gɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔw gɔbe, Ama be bɛrɛ jarugu duduurɔdo.
53002013	Ba unrunw Inɛw Baŋa ibɛ gɔbe, emɛ kai e dɛi waaru wooi Amai birɛpoo emɛ tagaun jaain wɔɔ, sabu Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le ei Ama tɔgu dɛiin bojaaɲu gɔi digɛu, iyaa naran gɔ le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ digɛu, yayabu gɔ dɛi Ama, tɔlɔgu gɔ le baa ei yɛmaabe.
53002014	Sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi, Kibɛru Ɛju e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu gɔ digɛu, Ama ei boonaabe. Wo, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito dooro gɔ ebaa bɛɛ ga ei boonaabe.
53002015	Kɔɔ gin’, ba unrunw e ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin. Iyaa, sɔɔ le ma, lɛtɛrɛ le ma, deeru e bɛrɛ emɛ deeru gɔbei ɛjii gɛliyɛi.
53002016	Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito, kuu womɔ le, iyaa Ama emɛ Ba gɔ, emi ibɛɛ biyaa, nɛɛma womɔ le kinɛ kaalu sɔgɔjɛ lee, diyɛdɔn ɛju lee emi obu baŋa gɔ,
53002017	kinɛ ebe be kaaliyɛmɔ, iyaa, birɛ ɛju wooi lee, sɔɔ ɛju wooi lee kanran ga e bɛrɛ paŋa be obomɔ.
53003001	Kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, ba unrunw, bana logoro ebe nɛ bii gin’ Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ gɔ ɔgu ginɛ ga, baba siyɛ ga, e, emɛ dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
53003002	Ama womaa inɛw mɔɲube lee, inɛw teitai laain lee numɔ nɛ emi yaba ga, e emɛ dɛi Ama gɛɛin. Sabu inɛw puu gawa ga yabaidenɛ.
53003003	Kaa Inɛw Baŋa wo sɔɔ turu baŋai. Wo paŋa ei ohobodo, iyaa Mɔɲu kuu baŋa numɔ nɛ ei papaabado.
53003004	Kijɛ ebaa kanran ga emɛ tɔɔru gɔbe, e wogɔbe kanraunwɔi, iyaa wogɔbe kakanrandei ga Inɛw Baŋa nɛ, emɛ e le gawaa wɔin.
53003005	Ama, kinɛ ebe, ihibɛ e dɛi wo sɛɛ sibɛ go lee, Kirisito muyɔn ei obojɛ sibɛ go lee kigelemɔ.
53003006	Ba unrunw, emɛ Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito boi le e bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔuwɔin, bainɛ aai kanran, wala le biyaa, deeru wo bɛrɛ emɛ obu gɔ le kɛukɛu yoi yaalɛ gɔ, e genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔrɔ gooi.
53003007	Bana emi e deeun dagaa gɔ e kuu ebe le ɛjii igii wɔi. Sabu waaru e le emɛ bee le, emɛ wala walanɛ.
53003008	Emɛ inɛ turu kanran pana tujɔlu go, bamai kayanɛ. Kaa ɔɲɛ lee, birɛ kirɛ lee emɛ iyaabɛin. Emɛ inɛ turu nɛ kanran logoro ebe nɛ dɔɔi biyɛnɔu ga, aga lee digɛ lee birɛ biraabɛin.
53003009	Kunrin emɛ kanrun gɔ, wogɔ emaa e sagi biyɛ ga, e bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔun paŋa sɛnɛ dɛi laa. Kaa ebaa emi deewin biyɛ ga, emɛ emi giru taguru gin’ tagaraabɛin.
53003010	Kunrin waaru logoro ebe nɛ emɛ tobe le, emɛ sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tagaubɛin: Inɛ aai kanran birɛ birɛ ga yabaalɛ ye, pana yaa wo kayaun jaanla.
53003011	Sabu, inɛw gamuu logoro ebe nɛ wala walawin biyaa, be birɛ birɛɛnɛ, kaa sɔɔ be tolo nɛ aŋa kukunɔɲu ga emɛ ɛgɛuwɔin.
53003012	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito boi le, emɛ inɛw kɔɔbei tɔɔrɔuwɔin, be bɛrɛ gimaa gɛɛunwɔin: Bemaa sɛɛu birɛ birɛ wa, kuu bemɛ le pana be bɛi gɔ, wogɔ kaya wa.
53003013	Kaa, e kai ba unrunw, e ɛju kanrun nɛ ɔɲɔnɔugi.
53003014	Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn nɛ sɔɔ emɛ gi gɔ, inɛ turu wogɔ le yabalu ye, e inɛ wogɔi kajubai. Womaa dɔgɔ iye ga, e wo le mɔrin ye biyɛnɔugi.
53003015	Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ e woi jaŋunɛ gin’ lugonɔugi. Kaa bainɛ gin’ woi tinwɛnrɛin.
53003016	Inɛw Baŋa jamu obonɛ gɔ, yani biyaai kanran, waaru wooi, kuu womɔ le e bɛrɛ jamu obo. Inɛw Baŋa e wooi le biyɛ.
53003017	Poo kunu ɔn, mu Pɔlu, numɔ ma le mu tɔŋu. Mu lɛtɛrɛ mabe wooi nɛ boi ma kɔɔ gin’ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Dɔn tɔŋu ma bana gɔ kɔɔ woi.
53003018	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e wooi le biyɛ.
54001001	Mu Pɔlu, Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ lee, Kirisito Yesu, diyɛdɔn emɛi wɔɔ gɔ lee, tɔɔru mu bɛrɛ be obu gɔ le kɛukɛu, Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyaa wɔɔ gɔ,
54001002	mu, u Timɔte, gagawu nɛ ii ma tɔitɔi gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ lee, nɛɛma lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee ui obo.
54001003	Bana waaru Maseduanɛ gana yaa ga oju mu goi le u bɛrɛ mu tɔɔraabe gin’, mu uwaa Epɛse ana nɛ biyɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔun. Inɛw gamuu Epɛse ana nɛ yatoin. Be deeru kakalugu gɔ inɛwin deereuwɔin. Kɔɔ dɛi, mu uwaa Epɛse nɛ bii ye, inɛw kɔɔbei tɛŋɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
54001004	Bei taga, bemaa elumɛ sɔɔ nɛ lee, tirɛ anranw boi digu le digu le, buu, dumɔ sɛlɛ boonu nɛ lee, waaru bemɛ yamalanu biyɛnɔu wa. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe jiiru koolo koolo sai ihingelemɔɲu. Kaa wogɔ, Ama, emɛ dɛi yayabu sɔɔ yegeraa sɛɛ gɔ nɛ giru go emi yaamɔɔlɛ. Yayabu sɔɔ wogɔ emɛ gagawu le jujugɔdɛin.
54001005	Emaa kinɛ hakɛ tolo nɛ lee, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ nɛ lee, gagawu tɔitɔi nɛ lee, ihibɛ goojɛ gɔ le tunmɔi ibɛɛ biyɛ ga, tɔɔru ma kijɛ dɛi mu daanu gɔ kɔɔ woi.
54001006	Inɛw gamuu sɔɔ kɔɔbe le onu dulaatiyaa, be jiiru koolo koolo nɛ manaa toin.
54001007	Be Ama tɔɔru deeru deerewin bii dɛnɛɲu, kaa be kuu bemɛ le sɔɔ be sɔɔjɛ inin, iyaa kijɛ dɛi ɛjii namaa gɛliyaa be sɔɔjɛ gɔ yaa paamau wɔnɛ.
54001008	Nɛɛ Ama tɔɔru gɔ, bana kanraun jaan le kɛukɛu dimiyaanɲu ye, Tɔɔru ɛjui ga emɛ puu igii wɔin.
54001009	Kɔɔ gin’, emɛ sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii paamu kanraun jaain wɔɔ: Tɔɔru kai, inɛ teitai wɔɔ dɛi daananɛ, kaa inɛw kɔkɔlɔmaagunw dɛi lee, inɛw sɔɔ yabaanɛ gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw Ama babaanɛ gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw Ama lee, kijɛ ɛjaa wɔɔ wooi lee babaanɛ gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw be babe lee, be nabe lee daanw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw inɛw daanw gɔbe dɛi lee,
54001010	inɛw salagunw gɔbe dɛi lee, anranw anranw be tunmɔ le diinw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw gunɔw dɔnrɔnw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw kakalumaŋaw gɔbe dɛi lee, sɛɛrɛ kakalu goonw gɔbe dɛi lee, maa inɛ aai kanran deeru nanaa dimiyɛun jaan gin’ inɛ kanraanlɛ gɔ dɛi lee, tɔɔru gɔ daanaaɲu.
54001011	Deeru nanaa ɔn, Ama mu bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju taga ga tɔɔraabe gɔ le sɛgɛrɛuwɔ. Wogɔ, Ama, duba lee dooro lee baŋa gɔ bɛrɛ gowaa wɛɛ.
54001012	Mu inɛ birɛ womɔ dɛi mui paŋa obonɛ gɔ, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔi birɛpoo tagauwɔn. Mu pɔɔlɔ inɛ Yesu boi yamalanɛi bee gɔ, jaŋu unrunw womɔ tɔɔɲɔnɛi bee gɔ, inɛ gaari bee gɔ, mui inɛ le gawaɲui ga lugaa, birɛ womɔ gɔ dɛi mui wo yɛmu gɔ dɛi, mu woi birɛpoo tagauwɔn. Kaa Ama amasɔgɔ ma jugaabe, sabu mu jugɔlu go, gagawu sɛlɛ dɛi kanraunbɔn.
54001014	Kaa nɛɛma Inɛw Baŋa nɛ goojɛ gɔ mu sibɛ go gaai narinyaan, gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu nɛ bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ mu bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabe.
54001015	Sɔɔ ɔn sɔɔ narain, inɛw puu wogɔ le kinɛpilu le yabaun jaain wɔɔ. Kirisito Yesu, aduna nɛ hakɛ kanranwin yabai wɛi. Logoro bemɛ nɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ yɛmu gɔ mui.
54001016	Kaa Ama, amasɔgɔ ma jugaabe. Kunrin, Kirisito Yesu, muyɔn kibaai womɔ tagara ga wo mui hakɛ kanranw logoro nɛ diyɛnɛ gɔ, mu bɛrɛ laa muyɔn womɔ tagaraabe. Wogɔ le digɛnu maa inɛw ɔnmɔsɔgɔ dɛi wo le gawaidɛin gɔbe puu dɛi sɛɛrɛ gin’ biyɛ ga, Ama yabaabe.
54001017	Asuu Ɔgɔnɛ, asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ, giri le iyemɔɔlɛ gɔ, Ama wo turu gɔ, baba lee, boi sɔmu lee, asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
54001018	Ii ma Timɔte, waaru galaai gɔ le, inɛw, u dɛi Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi be sɔi gɔbe le kɛukɛu, tinwinrun ɔn ui obouwɔn. Sɔɔ u dɛi sɔin gɔbe ɛjii aa gɛliyaa ye, wogɔ le digɛnu kɔmɔ tai ɛju gɔ taa.
54001019	Gagawu gɔ lee, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ lee le biyɛ. Inɛw gamuu kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le bii gɔi pajaatin dɛi, be gagawu sibɛ go dii nɛ piriyaain.
54001020	Inɛw kunrin kanranw gɔbe logoro nɛ Himɛnɛ lee, Alɛsandere lee yatoin. Bemaa Ama boi yamulu ɛjula jugɔ ga, mu bei Setanu numɔ nɛ kunaabɔn.
54002001	Laa gɔ, inɛw puu dɛi amagɛɛn lee, Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn kunu lee, kai Ama bɛrɛ tagu lee, Amai birɛpoo tagu lee nɛ, inɛw bemaa biyɛ ga mu ui tinwɛnrɛunwɔn.
54002002	Kunrin, emaa jamu lee, iyaa, diyɛ daanaa ye, Ama giri liyɛ nɛ lee, bana jaan gin’ sɔɔ wooi nɛ ɛjii biyɛ ga, ɔgɔnw lee, paŋagunw gɔbe puu lee dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn ga, mu tinwinrun obouwɔn.
54002003	Wogɔ kanran ga Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɛjii wɔɔ, kinɛ womɔ aauwɔ.
54002004	Wo inɛw puu wa yayabu bɛɛ ga, bemaa naran gɔ jugɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
54002005	Sabu Ama koturu sai yɔɔ, iyaa Ama lee, inɛw lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegerenɛ koturu sai yɔɔ. Wogɔ, inɛ Kirisito Yesu gɔ woi.
54002006	Wo inɛw wooi dɔrugɔ ga kuu unrunmɔ obaabe. Kunrin wo, Ama, inɛw wooi wa yayabu bɛɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ sɛɛrɛ gɔ, waaru jaan gɔ le tagaraabe.
54002007	Wogɔ sabu dɛi mui waaju taganɛ lee, Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu lee biyɛ ga bojaaɲu. Mui inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi, gagawu lee naran lee jaŋudeerenɛi bojaaɲu. Mu narain sɔɔjɔn, kakalui maŋaalɔn.
54002008	Kunrin iyaa, mu anranw bemaa kinɛ ɛjaai le numɔ daa go dɛɛraa ye, kinɛbanrun siyɛlu go, jiiru wɔlɔ go, yalu wooi nɛ Ama gɛɛn ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
54002009	Kɔɔ gin’ yaanw kanran, sɔi be le dagaa wɔɔ goriyaa ye, baba lee, kuu sunugu lee le bii ye, kuu ɛru sigɛ le ma, kange le ma, dugɔi le ma, sɔi dɔnrun gaa ɛju le ma, saŋa saŋi ye biyɛnɔu.
54002010	Kaa yaanw Ama birɛ nɛ toin bana le kɛukɛu, birɛ ɛju be birɛmɔ.
54002011	Yaanran, deeru wo bɛrɛ deereɲu gɔ, sɔɔ sɔɔlu go, sɔɔ sɛɛu yabaa ye dee.
54002012	Mu yaanran womaa deeru deere ma, anranw kuu nɛ paŋa le biyɛ ma ga yabaalɔn. Kaa wo kelemu biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
54002013	Sabu Adama laa maŋaabɛin, kɔɔ onu nɛ Hawai maŋaabɛin.
54002014	Iyaa inɛ dɔburu yabu gɔ Adamai laa, kaa yaanran gɔi dɔburu yabaa, Ama sɔɔ gɔ le yabalu kanrun.
54002015	Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ, yaanran, gagawu nɛ lee, ihibɛ nɛ lee, ɛjaai bii nɛ lee, kuu sunugu nɛ lee, dumɔ gɔ baa biyaajɛ ye, ii nɔrun dɛi woi yayabadɛin.
54003001	Sɔɔ ɔn narain: Inɛ turu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛi bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, wo birɛ ɛjui daaru.
54003002	Nɛɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ, inɛ jarugu wo le wɔlɔi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Woi yaanran turu igɛi, inɛ hakilɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ, kuu kajubu le wɔɔ, inɛ sɔɔ sɛlɛ, ginrun sugo obonɛ, inɛ deeru deeru bɛɛjɛi biyɛun jaan.
54003003	Woi kɔɲɔnɔɔnɛi ma, inɛ koloi ma biyɛun jaanla. Kaa inɛ kaalu, jai jaiyɛɛlɛ, kɛɛlɛ dɛnɛnɛi laai wo biyɛmɔ.
54003004	Ginrun duu womɔ inɛ kajubaa sɛɛ, inɛ unrunw womɔ baba le sɔɔ womɔ yabawin biyɛmɔ.
54003005	Sabu inɛ ginrun duu unrunmɔ bana gɛliyɛɲu inɛɛ gɔ, kɔɔ baŋa yani Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi gɛli bɛɛdo?
54003006	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ, inɛ tubu kanai biyɛmɔnɔu. Kɔɔi laa ye, inɛ wogɔ tunmɔ kuu ulo le joo ye bii ye, Ama bana jinrun puu kuu baŋa nɛ jarugu wo duuru gin’, kuu womɔ nɛ yaa jarugu duduurɔdɛin.
54003007	Boi womɔ yanwannɔu ga, iyaa jinrun puu kuu baŋa woi pɛnrɛn unrunmɔ nɛ aanɔu ga, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ, inɛw jaŋu unrunwin laain gɔbe giru nɛ boi ɛju siyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
54003008	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanw baranw gɔbe kanran, inɛw jige ɛjui sɛin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Bei inɛw aŋa lɛilɛi wɔin ma, inɛw kɔɲɔ gunɔ nɛ toin ma, inɛw nabara le kijɛ dɛnɛwin ma biyɛun jaanla.
54003009	Be kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le gagawu sɔɔ boŋurun jugɔmaaɲu gɔ gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
54003010	Bei yaa suburu yɛnɛu jaain wɔɔ. Kijɛ dagalu turu kanran be le tɛmɛmɔlu ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ birɛ gɔ nɛ bei kunɔ.
54003011	Iyaa kɔɔ gin’ yaanw bemɛ kanran, yaanw jige ɛju sɛin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛw wajunw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔwin biyɛun jaanla. Kaa yaanw hakilɛ dɛinyaan, kijɛ wooi nɛ be le gawu bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ biyɛmɔ.
54003012	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanw baranw gɔbe, yaanran turu igɛi be biyɛmɔ. Unrunw bemɛ lee, ginrun duu bemɛ lee inɛw ɛjii kajubawin be biyɛmɔ.
54003013	Inɛw Ama inɛw mɔɔnu birɛ ɛjii birɛnw gɔbe, baba bɛbɛɛdɛin. Iyaa, Kirisito Yesu nɛ bɔɔi bii emɛ le digɛu gagawu emɛ sɛɛ sɔɔ gɔ, be liliyɛ turu kanran wɔlɔ go, wogɔ sɔɔ sɔɔ bɛbɛɛɲu.
54003014	Mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn. Kaa u bɛrɛ bɛrii wɛwɛɛdɔn diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
54003015	Nɛɛ, mu u bɛrɛ wiyaa bɛɛlun ye, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, bana Yesu jaŋu unrunwin emɛ biyɛido u bɛrɛ tatagarado. Emi Ama ginrun gonɔ maranwin, wogɔ Ama asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ inɛw mɔɔnui. Wogɔ tiyɛ gɔ, naran Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ jɛin gɔ lee, bɔlɔtei gɔ lee woi.
54003016	Gagawu emɛ sɔɔ boŋurun jugɔmaaɲu gɔ gaai wɔɔ. Inɛ turu kanran wogɔ le jiiru bɛɛidolo. Ama, inɛ taŋaa, unruin tagaraabe. Kikinu Pilu woi teitai wɔɔ ga jugɔmaabe, mɛlɛnkɛbe woi iyaabɛin. Tɔgube logoro nɛ waaju womɔ kunaaɲu. Aduna nɛ wo le gawaabɛin, woi alagala nɛ unaatin.
54004001	Ama Kikinu daii sɔwaa gi: «Waaru dumɔ gɔbe le, inɛw gamuu gagawu gɔ papajadɛin. Be kikinu kakalumaŋaw sɔɔ yayabadɛin, iyaa jinrunbe deeru onu nɛ didimiyɛndɛin.»
54004002	Be inɛw aŋa lɛilɛigunw lee, inɛw kakalumaŋaw lee bɛrɛ unrunbei liligijiyemɔdɛin. Inɛw, inɛw ligijiyemɔw wogɔbe, kinɛjugɔ bemɛ yanwaan, hakɛ gunɔ nɛ too.
54004003	Inɛw kɔɔbe purupagu lee, kijɛ gamuu kayi lee jaanla ga deereuwɔin. Kaa Ama, inɛw gawaa wɔin, naran jugaa wɔin gɔbe bemaa woi birɛpoo tagaatiyaa ye kunrin kaya gi. Ama, kakayɔn kɔɔbe kɔɔ dɛi boju.
54004004	Ama kijɛ maŋu gɔbe puu ɛjii wɔɔ. Kijɛ jumɔɲu turu kanran wɔlɔ. Kaa Amai birɛpoo tagu le kayaun jaain wɔɔ.
54004005	Sabu Ama sɔɔ gɔ lee, amagɛɛn gɔ lee dɛi kakayɔn gɔ ɛjaa wɔɔ.
54004006	U sɔɔ kɔɔbe, ba unrunw bɛrɛ deeraajɛu ye, ui Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnɛ ɛjui bibiyɛdo. Ui gagawu le kɔwaaɲu, u deeru ɛju gɔ sɛɛu dimiyaan wɔu ga jujugɔmɔdo.
54004007	Elumɛ tiyɛ sɛlɛ, gagawu sɔɔ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ gɔbe paja. Ama giriliyɛ nɛ bariyɛ bariyɛ yaa ga ɛjii mainiyɛn.
54004008	Gojutere le biyɛ ga maini gɔ niwɛn gaila sɛɛ. Kaa kanɛ lee, waaru wɛɛido gɔ lee dɛi, ɔnmɔ pui emɛ bɛrɛ kunaaɲu dɛi, Ama giriliyɛ gɔ kijɛ wooi nɛ niwɛn yasɛ.
54004009	Sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔ narain, iyaa inɛw puu wogɔ le sɛɛu yabaun jaain wɔɔ.
54004010	Emɛ birɛ birɛuwɔin, jaiyɛuwɔin. Sabu emɛ, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ, Ama inɛw wooi Yabanɛ gɔ, sigiyaa inɛw wo le gawauwɔin gɔbe Yabanɛ gɔ le diyɛ emɛ daanaaɲu.
54004011	U sɔɔ kɔɔbe inɛw bɛrɛ taga, wogɔbe le bei deere.
54004012	Inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ, uwaa ii dagi giye ui gailiyɛmɔnɔu. Kaa u sɔɔ nɛ lee, bana uwɔ nɛ lee, ihibɛ nɛ lee, gagawu nɛ lee, ɛjaai bii nɛ lee, inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe wooi giru nɛ ui giretagurui biyɛmɔ.
54004013	Mu wɛɛido baa, u Ama Dɔn inɛw puu giru nɛ jaŋu nɛ lee, inɛwin mainiyɛnmu nɛ lee, deeru deeru nɛ lee ɛjii kuu kunɔ.
54004014	Inɛw, u dɛi Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi be sɔi gɔ le digɛu, waaru inɛw naw kuu uwɔ nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan, Ama gɛɛin gɔ le, Ama uwaa kijɛ kanrun bɛɛ ga, gɔnrɔn u bɛrɛ wo obu gɔ, sin obu wogɔ pajanɔu.
54004015	Inɛw puu giru nɛ u mainiyaan, giru go yaauwɔu ga tagara dɛi, u sɔɔ kɔɔbe kanran. Wogɔ nɛ ɛjii kuu uwɔ obo.
54004016	U kuu bana uwɔ lee, deeru uwɔ gɔ lee ɛjii kajuba. Sɔɔ wogɔbe nɛ ɛjii mainiyɛn. U kunrin kanraunwɔu ye, kuu uwɔ lee, inɛw sɔɔ uwɔ keŋiyɛnw gɔbe lee yaa yayabadou.
54005001	U inɛ pɛii ganwannɔu. Kaa waaru wo le sɔɔ u sɔɔjɛ, u ba gin’ woi lugo. Sagatara unrunw gɔbe u ba unrunw gin’ lugo.
54005002	Yaanw naw gɔbe u nabe gin’ lugo, iyaa yaanw dagunw gɔbe u saabe gin’, manugu ɛju le bei tinwɛnrɛn.
54005003	Yapanuw tɔitɔi gɔbe baba.
54005004	Kaa yapanunɛ turu, unrunw ma, tirɛ unrunw ma yasɛ ye, gagawu bemɛ gɔ ginrun gonɔ bemɛ nɛ laa be tagaramɔ. Iyaa bei naranw gɔbe sibɛ go kijɛ kanraun jaain be wɔɔ gɔ puu be kanranmɔ. Wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii wɔɔ.
54005005	Nɛɛ, yapanunɛ tɔitɔi gɔ, kuu womɔ turu sai wɔɔ gɔ, wo diyɛ womɔ Ama nɛ daanaa sɛɛ. Wo aga lee digɛ lee, Ama womaa unruin bara gɛɛuwɔ, iyaa, wo Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ.
54005006	Kaa yapanunɛ yɔgɔrɔ sɔɔ nɛ tee biyɛjɛ gɔ, halu woi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ kanran, kanɛ baa yinwaain.
54005007	Bemaa jarugu le biyɛnɔu ga sɔɔ kɔɔbe bei taga.
54005008	Inɛ wo maranw kai kilɛɛlɛ gɔ, sigɛ le ginrun duu womɔ maranw kai kilɛɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa gagawu oju gɔ pajaati, woi inɛ tubu tolo dɛi mɔɲu.
54005009	Yapanunɛ, anranguju womɔ pɛlukuloi dɔɔlu ye, boi womɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋɔ kunɔnɔu. Iyaa woi yaanran igɛ kubɔ turu sai ɛyaabei biyɛmɔ.
54005010	Woi yaanran birɛ ɛju womɔ dɛi boi ɛju womɔ gowaa wɔɔi biyɛun jaan. Kunrin woi yaanran unrunw ɛjii kɔwaabe ga, yerunwin ɛjii sɛgɛraabe ga, Ama inɛw kubɔ mɔŋaabe ga, inɛw ɔɲɛ nɛ toin gɔbei baraabe ga, womaa birɛ ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin biraabe ga sɛɛrɛ ɛju gɔ inɛw wo dɛi gooun jaain wɔɔ.
54005011	Kaa yapanuw nimɛ pɛɛnɛ gɔbe boi tɔŋɔnɔu. Sabu igɛ ɛi dadaaru bei aa ye, be Kirisito le onu duduloɲu.
54005012	Wo le pui pɔlɔ be kunaabe gɔ yamalatiiɲu dɛi, jarugu le bibiyɛdɛin.
54005013	Iyaa kɔɔ kuu nɛ bariyaa, be wala deyaa, ginrun ginrun nɛ gɔgɔŋɔlɔɲu. Wala gɔ dɛi sigɛ, be mɛrun mɛrɛnwin biyɛɲu. Sɔɔ bei tolo nɛ aŋa kukunɔɲu. Kijɛ sɔɔun dagalu sɔɔnu biyɛɲu.
54005014	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi yapanuw nimɛ pɛɛnɛ gɔbe bemaa igɛ bemɛ ɛɛ ga mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Bemaa unrunw bɛɛ, ginrun bemɛ kajuba, jaŋuw emɛ bɛrɛ, sɔɔ mɔɲu emɛ dɛi yalu sɔɔɲu turu kanran be obomɔnɔu.
54005015	Sabu kanɛ baa gamuu naran oju gɔ pajaatiyaa, Setanu onu nɛ dimiyaain.
54005016	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu womaa, yapanuw tɔitɔi gɔbe kai kilɛ dɛi, yaanran jaŋu ii aai kanran, yapanuw yasɛ ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu bɛrɛ dɔɔ duurɔnɔu ga, baŋa kai bemɛ kilɛ.
54005017	Inɛw naw, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ɛjii teeremɔw gɔbe, tujɔ bemɛ sɔɔrɔ lɛi be le jaain wɔɔ. Sigɛ le inɛw waaju tagu nɛ lee, jaŋu deeru nɛ lee mainiyɛun wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
54005018	Sabu Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Naa jiŋu dɛnrɛn kiju namaa ye ii goonɔjɛ aŋa nɛ aŋa pɔin e kunɔu jaanla.” Iyaa gi: “Birɛbirɛnɛ, tujɔ womɔ wo le jaain wɔɔ.”
54005019	Inɛw lɛi ma taanu ma sɛɛrɛ goonw wɔlɔ ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na turu kanran dɛi jarugu yabanɔu.
54005020	Be logoro nɛ inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe, inɛw wajunw gɔbe bemaa liliyɛ le biyɛ ga, inɛw puu giru nɛ be le sɔɔ.
54005021	Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu lee, mɛlɛnkɛ yɛmaaɲu gɔbe lee giru nɛ u le daii sɔɔuwɔn: Inɛ kabu kunɔlu go, inɛ turu waja dɛi ire bojolu go, u tɔɔru ɔnbe gɛliyɛ.
54005022	U inɛ turu kanran kuu nɛ ɔgu numɔ yaŋurun ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu birɛ nɛ woi kunɔ ga kanrannɔu. Inɛw wajunw hakɛ le mɔrinyɛnnɔu. Ui ɛjaai gɛliyɛ.
54005023	U waaru wooi dii saun sai nɔɔnu biyɛnɔu. Kaa bɛrɛ uwɔ sabu dɛi lee, waaru joo jiun ui aajɛ gɔ dɛi lee, u resɛndii ilɛ gaila nɔɔ.
54005024	Inɛw gamuu, hakɛ bemɛ, saliyɛ kiru baa dɔmiyɛindolo, kanɛ baa ɛlu gowaai. Kaa inɛw gamuu hakɛ gɔ dumɔ nɛ ɛlu goodo.
54005025	Kɔɔ gin’ birɛ ɛju gɔbe yaa bain nɛ ihiyemɔdo. Iyaa birɛ nimɛ ɛlu goolu gɔbe yaa jaa baŋi biyɛidenɛ.
54006001	Jaŋu unrunw gunɔ nɛ toin gɔbe, be baŋabei ɛjii babaun jaain wɔɔ ga be lugomɔ. Inɛ turu kanran Ama boi mɔɲu ma, deeru emɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu ma sɔɔnɔu dɛi, kɔɔ gin’ be kanranmɔ.
54006002	Gunɔw be baŋa gɔbe jaŋu unrunwin wɔin gɔbe, be baŋabe jaŋu unrunw be ba unrunwin dɛi bei gailiyɛmɔu jaanla. Kaa be, be dɛi, sigɛ le ɛjii birɛ birɛun jaain wɔɔ, sabu inɛw birɛ bemɛ niwɛn kayaɲu gɔbe jaŋu unrunw ibɛɛ be wɔi. Kijɛ kɔɔbe bei deere, wogɔbe nɛ bei mainiyɛnmɔ.
54006003	Inɛ, deeru waja, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito naran sɔɔ gɔ lee, Ama giriliyɛ deeru emɛ gɔ lee deeru dɛin wɔɔ inɛ deerejɛ gɔ,
54006004	inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kuu ulo le jowaa wɔɔ. Wo kijɛ kanma inɛɛ. Kaa wo jiiru kunu dadaaru jiun lee, sɔɔ kuu nɛ jai jaiyɛ dadaaru lee le wɔɔ. Kijɛ kɔɔbe inɛwin tunmɔ le ele le bojojɛ, tunmɔ le jijiiremɔjɛ, duyɔ duyɔmɔjɛ, ajubu mɔɲu tunmɔ dɛi ahajubamɔjɛ.
54006005	Bei inɛw kuu sɛnɛi, naran nanaa inin wɔin, jiiru dumɔ sɛlɛ, tiyɛ sɛlɛ kunɔwin. Ajubu bemɛ nɛ, Ama giriliyɛ gɔ le digɛnu, kɛɛlɛ gaai bɛɛmɔjɛ ga wɔin.
54006006	Nɛɛ, inɛ Ama giriliyɛ gɔ dɛi, kijɛ wo sɛɛ gɔ woi baa wɔɔ ga wɔɔ ye, kɔɔbaŋa bɛrɛ Ama giriliyɛ gɔ arusɛgɛ diyɛi.
54006007	Sabu emɛ aduna nɛ wɛɛu, kijɛ turu kanran le wɛɛnɛ, iyaa waaru aduna nɛ emɛ gooido, kijɛ turu kanran le yaaidenɛ.
54006008	Kaa, emɛ kijɛ kayaɲu lee, kijɛ goriyeɲu lee yasin ye, wogɔ emi baamɔ.
54006009	Kaa inɛw arusɛgɛ joo bɛɛ ibɛin gɔbe, bei subɔrɔ nɛ nunumɔjɛ. Be dadaaru tiyɛ sɛlɛ joo nɛ lee, dadaaru mɔɲu joo nɛ lee pɛnrɛn nɛ yoyooɲu. Wogɔbe inɛi ɔgu mamanamɔjɛ, inɛi susuyojɛ.
54006010	Sabu mɔɲu dɛin dɛin bɔlɔduu gɔ, kɛɛlɛ dadaaru gɔ woi. Inɛw gamuu, wogɔ dadaaru ɛjii bei wo aa, gagawu oju gɔ pajaatin. Wogɔ digɛu kinɛjiun diyɛ le wɔin.
54006011	Kaa u, Ama inɛ gɔ, kijɛ kɔɔbe le wagee biyɛ. U teitai lee, Ama giriliyɛ lee, gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, muyɔn lee, inɛw le ɛjii bii lee dɛnɛ.
54006012	U gɔnrɔn uwɔ wooi le gagawu jobu gɔ jɔbɔ, u kuu uwɔ dɛi ɔnmɔsɔgɔ siyɛ. U gagawu uwɔ aŋa sɛɛrɛ ɛju gɔ, inɛw joo giru nɛ waaru u goi le, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ wogɔ dɛi Ama ui boonaabe.
54006013	Ama kijɛ wooi bɛrɛ ɔnmɔ obonɛ gɔ giru nɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu aŋa sɛɛrɛ ɛju Pɔnse Pilate giru nɛ goonɛ gɔ giru nɛ lee, mu uwaa
54006014	tɔɔru e bɛrɛ obin gɔ gɛliyɛ ga tɔɔrɔuwɔn. Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito bai kuu unrunmɔ wo tagaraido baa, u wogɔ sɛɛu jarugu wɔlɔ go gɛliyɛ.
54006015	Waaru wo kɛjɛido gɔ le, Ama Yesui pilemɛ ye wɛwɛɛmɔdo. Ama, duba baŋa gɔ, kijɛ wooi kuu baŋa gɔ wo turu sai. Woi ɔgɔnw wooi Ɔgɔnɛi, inɛw baŋabe wooi Inɛw Baŋai.
54006016	Wo turu sai asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ. Wo, wijɛ inɛ turu kanran wogɔ nɛ dɔɔ bɛɛlɛ gɔ nɛ too, inɛ turu kanran woi iyetɛlu, woi iye bɛɛlɛ. Baba lee, gɔnrɔn asuu dogoolɛ gɔ lee womɔi. Amina.
54006017	Aduna ɔn kijɛ nɛ inɛw ɔgɔ unrunwin wɔin gɔbe bemaa kuu ulo le biyɛnɔu wa. Bemaa arusɛgɛ kijɛ sɔgɔjɛi laa dɛi, diyɛ bemɛ arusɛgɛ gɔbe kuu nɛ daananɔu wa. Kaa Ama, emaa kinɛ emɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔ ga, emɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ wooi gaai obojɛ gɔ nɛ diyɛ bemɛ daana wa.
54006018	Bemaa ɛju kanran wa, birɛ ɛju biru nɛ ɔgɔ unrunwin biyɛ wa. Bemaa inɛw bɛrɛ sin kanrun nɛ lee, inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ kijɛ be sɛɛ gamulu nɛ lee, kinɛ ɔgu le biyɛ wa.
54006019	Be kɔɔ gin’, yogo dɛi arusɛgɛ ɛju, bɔlɔtei ɛju nɛ daan gɔi mɔɔnɔuwɔin, iyaa be kɔɔ waaru le ɔnmɔ tɔitɔi gɔ sisiyɛdɛin.
54006020	U Timɔte, kijɛ u bɛrɛ sagu duuraaɲu gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛ. U, jiiru tiyɛ sɛlɛ, gagawu sɔɔ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ gɔbe lee, jiiru, inɛw kakalu le jugɔ sɔɔi gɛɛɲu gɔbe lee nɛ aŋa uwɔ kunɔnɔu.
54006021	Inɛw gamuu kɔɔ gin’, jugɔ sɔɔ wogɔ yasin ga ajubaa, be gagawu oju gɔ nɛ gɛŋiyaan gowaain. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
55001001	Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyaa wɔɔ gɔ, inɛw Kirisito Yesu le bɔɔi wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ Ama pui kunu gɔ, maa inɛw bɛrɛ ginɛge ga, Ama mui tii.
55001002	Aini ii ma gin’ mu ibɛ gɔ, Timɔte, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ lee, nɛɛma lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee ui obo.
55001003	Bana mu tirɛ anranw kanrun gin’, mu kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le, Ama dɛi birɛ birɛu mu wɔɔ gɔi birɛpoo tagauwɔn. Mu aga lee, digɛ lee, waaru Ama mu gɛɛnjɛ wooi, ui ajubauwɔn, Amai birɛpoo tagauwɔn.
55001004	Mu giridii uwɔ gɔbe ajubauwɔn, iyaa, maa kinɛ saii ɛɛliyɛmu bɛɛ ga, mu ui pilemɛ ye iye ga gaai daariyaa wɔun.
55001005	Mu gagawu tɔitɔi u sɛɛ gɔ naŋalun. U na na Loyise lee, u na Yunise lee, gagawu tɔgu be laa siyaabɛin gɔ, u yaa gagawu wogɔ le wɔu ga mu saii igii wɔun.
55001006	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu u bɛrɛ naŋaranmɔuwɔn, numɔ ma waaru kuu uwɔ nɛ mu yaŋurun le sin obu Ama u bɛrɛ obu gɔ, u wogɔ le birɛ ɛju birɛnɛi biyɛ.
55001007	Sabu Kikinu Ama emɛ bɛrɛ obu gɔ liliyɛ obolu. Kaa, Kikinu gɔ, gɔnrɔn lee, ihibɛ lee, kuu kajubu le bii lee obojɛ.
55001008	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ dɛi sɛɛrɛ goo ga dɔgɔ ui aamɔnɔu. Iyaa mu, inɛ wo dɛi kanɛ kaju nɛ too gɔ dɛi kanran dɔgɔ ui aamɔnɔu. Kaa u, bana mu kanranjɛ gin’, Ama, gɔnrɔn u bɛrɛ obojɛ gɔ le kɛukɛu, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ dɛi ɔɲɛ gamulu uwɔi wɔɔ gɔ jeɲɛ.
55001009	Ama emi yabaabe, iyaa wo emaa inɛw womɔi biyɛ ga emi boonaabe. Ama, birɛ emɛ biru gɔ dɛi wogɔ kanranlu. Kaa wo sɔɔ unrunmɔ wo kɛju gɔ lee, nɛɛma unrunmɔ lee dɛi kanraanbe. Aduna maŋamɔ nɛ, Ama, nɛɛma wogɔ, Kirisito Yesu le digɛu emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe.
55001010	Kaa, kanɛ Ama, emi Yabanɛ Kirisito Yesu wɛɛgu le digɛu, nɛɛma wogɔ emɛ bɛrɛ tagaraabe. Yesu, yiun kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabe, iyaa, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le digɛu, wo ɔnmɔsɔgɔ emɛ bɛrɛ tagaraabe.
55001011	Ama, maa, Kibɛru Ɛju ginɛgenɛ lee, deerenɛ leei biyɛ ga, iyaa Kibɛru Ɛju dɛi Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyɛ ga mui boonaabe.
55001012	Iyaa kijɛ dɛi ɔɲɛ nɛ mu too gɔ kɔɔ woi. Kaa dɔgɔ mui aalu, sabu inɛ le gawaa mu wɔɔ gɔ inɛ aai ma mu igii wɔun. Iyaa wo Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ mu bɛrɛ sagu wo duuru gɔ, wo bai dumɔ gɔ baa wogɔ sɛɛu gɛliyɛun gɔnrɔn yasɛ ga mu gawaa wɔun.
55001013	Kirisito Yesu nɛ gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ nɛ bii ye, naran sɔɔ u bɛrɛ mu deeru gɔ giri teeremu gin’ ɛjii ai gɛliyɛ.
55001014	Kijɛ ɛju u bɛrɛ sagu duuraaɲu gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛ. U wogɔ, Kikinu Pilu emɛ nɛ too gɔ gɔnrɔn le ɛjii gɛliyɛ.
55001015	Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ jaŋu unrunw toin gɔbe puu mui pajaatin ga u igii wɔu. Inɛw wogɔbe logoro nɛ Pijɛle lee, Hɛrumɔjɛnɛ lee yatoin.
55001016	Ama, Onɛsipore ginrun gonɔ gɔ amasɔgɔ wo aamɔ. Sabu wo waaru joo kinɛ ma kaaliyɛmaabe, iyaa maa kaju nɛ too dɛi, mu dɛi dɔgɔ woi aalu.
55001017	Kaa waaru Rɔmɛ ana nɛ wo dɔi le, wo mui ɛjii dɛnaa iyaabe.
55001018	Saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ le Ama, amasɔgɔ womɔ woi aamɔ. Epɛse ana nɛ mu dɛi bana kijɛ dɛin dɛin wo kanrun gɔ, u saii igii wɔu.
55002001	U kai, ii ma, Kirisito Yesu nɛ nɛɛma bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ nɛ paŋa uwɔ bariyɛmɔ.
55002002	Iyaa, inɛw joo giru nɛ aŋa ma nɛ sɔɔ u ɛgu gɔ, u wogɔ inɛw sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋɛw, inɛw wajabe bɛrɛ pilemɛ ye deeru bɛɛidɛin bɛrɛ sagu duurɔ.
55002003	Kirisito Yesu sɔludasu ɛju gin’ ɔɲɛ gamulu uwɔi wɔɔ gɔ jeɲɛ.
55002004	Sɔludasu ii kɔmɔ tai dɛi unruin yegeraa wɔɔ gɔ, wo kuu womɔ baŋa kinɛ aamɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ dɛi, wo aduna sɔɔ wajunw nɛ toii ye, unruin gaaniyɛnmɔɔlɛ.
55002005	Inɛ tunmɔ galu jobu jɔbɔnɛ gɔ, wo tɔɔru daanaaɲu gɔ le kɛukɛu jobu gɔ jɔbɔlu ye, wo tujɔ diyɛ gɔ bɛɛidolo.
55002006	Woluwalanɛ saii birɛ nɛ mainiyaanbe gɔ, wo laa gamulu womɔ bɛɛun jaain wɔɔ.
55002007	Sɔɔ u bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔi ajubu yɛnɛ, sabu Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, kijɛ puu nɛ paamukanrun hakilɛ u bɛrɛ ohobodo.
55002008	Yesu Kirisito, Ama yiun nɛ bulomu gɔi, Ɔgɔnɛ Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, waaru wooi ajuba. Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ mu tagu gɔ kɔɔ woi.
55002009	Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagauwɔn dɛi mu ɔɲɛ nɛ toun, inɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu kanrannɛ gin’ mui yɔgu le kɔmaa sɛin. Kaa Ama sɔɔ gɔi yɔgu le kɔmɔnɛ.
55002010	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛw Ama yɛmu gɔbe dɛi, bemaa yayabu Kirisito Yesu le bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ lee, Ama le dooro sɔgɔ bɛɛ ga lee, mu kijɛ puu tariyɛuwɔn.
55002011	Sɔɔ ɔn narain: “Emɛ Yesu Kirisito le yinwaain ye, emɛ iyaa wo le ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdɛin.
55002012	Emɛ wo le bariyaa ɔɲɔuwɔin ye, emɛ iyaa wo le asuu laamu kakanrandɛin. Emɛ woi inin gin ye, wo yaa emi inɛɛ gɛgɛɛdo.
55002013	Emɛ wo sibɛ go sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋɛlain ye, wo kai sɔɔ turu baŋai. Sabu wo pui wo kunu gɔ nɛ gooidolo.”
55002014	Kijɛ inɛw uwɔ gɔbe bɛrɛ u naŋaranmɔu jaan gɔ unwɔ: Sɔɔ kuu nɛ jiiru kunɔnɔu giye, Ama giru nɛ be le daii sɔɔ. Inɛw kekeŋiyɛnw gɔbe suyoi laa ye jiiru wogɔ niwɛn turu kanran sɛlɛ.
55002015	U gɔnrɔn uwɔ wooi le biraa ye, Ama giru nɛ birɛbirɛnɛ sɔmu biyaajɛi, iyaa dɔgɔ sɛlɛi biyɛ. Ama sɔɔ gɔ bana jaan gin’ deere.
55002016	Jiiru tiyɛ sɛlɛ lee, jiiru gagawu sɔɔ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ lee le wagee biyɛ. Jiiru wogɔbe, Ama le inɛwin wawageniyɛnmɔɲu.
55002017	Inɛw jiiru kɔɔbe tunmɔ kunɔw deeru gɔbe, mirun mɔɲu gojui kayajɛ gin’ wɔin. Inɛw deeru wogɔbe deerenw logoro nɛ Himɛnɛ lee, Pilɛte lee yatoin:
55002018	Be naran oju gɔi pajaatiyaa, jaŋu unrunw gamuu gagawu yamalauwɔin. Be gɛɛuwɔin, emɛ jaŋu unrunw gɔbe kanɛ baa yinwaan bulaain, bulogu sɔɔ lee wɔlɔ.
55002019	Kaa Ama bɔlɔtei ɛju daanu gɔ wogɔ sɛɛu bibiyɛdo. Bɔlɔtei wogɔ nɛ sɔɔ ɔnbe tɔŋaaɲu: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛw womɔi wɔin gɔbe igii wɔɔ.” Iyaa: “Inɛ aai kanran, unruin Inɛw Baŋa Ama mɔi gɛɛjɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa sɔɔ teitai wɔlɔ le kabiyɛ.”
55002020	Ginrun diyɛ kɔlɔ nɛ kange gelu ma, sarudu gelu ma turu sai tolo. Kaa baga le gelu yegeraaɲu lee, nage le gelu yegeraaɲu lee yaa yatoin. Gelu gamuu gɔ bai diyɛ dɛi, gamuu bai peere mɔi.
55002021	Jaŋu ii deeru mɔɲu kɔɔbe dɛi kuu unrunmɔ sɛɛu gɛliyaajɛ gɔ, woi gelu bai diyɛ dɛi dɛiin bojaaɲui, sabu woi Ama dɛi dɛiin bojaaɲu, wo Baŋa gelui, kai kilu ɛjui, birɛ ɛju wooi dɛi woi yegeraa sɛin.
55002022	U sagataranw dadaaru gɔbe le wagee biyɛ. Inɛw kinɛ pilu le Inɛw Baŋa boi boonɔw gɔbe le bari ye, teitai lee, gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, jamu lee dɛnɛ.
55002023	Kaa jiiru bomɔgu lee, jiiru tiyɛ sɛnɛ gɔbe leei paja, sabu wogɔ jai narinyɛnmɔjɛ.
55002024	Inɛw Baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ, jai jaiyɛun jaanla. Kaa wo inɛw wooi le kaali bii ye, deeru deerenɛ ɛju, muyɔn baŋai biyɛun jaan.
55002025	Inɛw deeru womɔ le jaiyɛnw gɔbei tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le bei deeru wo deereun jaain wɔɔ. Ama be bɛrɛ bana duli obu ye, be naran gɔ jujugɔdɛin bibiyɛ.
55002026	Be kɔɔ waaru le hakilɛ bemɛ dɛdɛinyɛndo. Jinrun puu kuu baŋa diŋɛ unrunmɔ kanran ga, bei aa pɛnrɛn unrunmɔ nɛ kunaa wo sɛɛ gɔ nɛ, be ɛli goo bɛbɛɛdɛin.
55003001	U sɔɔ ɔn jugi biyɛ: Aduna dogogu le waaru nau wɛwɛɛdo.
55003002	Kɔɔ gin’ Adama unrunw kuu unrunbemɛ sai dɛnɛdɛin, kɛɛlɛ saii ibɛɛ biyɛdɛin, saba sabawin biyɛdɛin, kuu ulo ulowin biyɛdɛin. Be Ama boi yamalawin biyɛdɛin, iyaa bei naranw sɔɔ yabaidenɛ, yogosɛlɛ sɛlɛwin biyɛdɛin, be kijɛ ɛjaa wɔɔ dɛi baba turu kanran siyɛidenɛ.
55003003	Be inɛw ihibɛ sɛnɛ, amasɔgɔjugɔ sɛnɛ, inɛw wajunw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnw, kinɛ ɔgu banranmɔw, inɛw kiijiun sɛnɛ, inɛw ɛju le jaŋuwin biyɛdɛin.
55003004	Be inɛw jamajamaw, inɛw kolo, kuu ulo le jowaa wɔin biyɛdɛin, be inɛw yɔgɔrɔ sɔɔ Ama dɛi sigɛ ibɛin biyɛdɛin.
55003005	Bain go bei yɛnaa ye, emɛ wooi Ama giri liyɛ tunmɔ gɔ sɛin gin’ wɔɔ, kaa be Ama giri liyɛ wogɔ gɔnrɔn gɔ le yabaidenɛ. U inɛw kɔɔbe le yaa wagee biyɛ.
55003006	Logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw gamuu ginrun nɛ koi yooɲu, be yaanw gɔnrɔn sɛnɛ gɔbei, yaanw hakɛ joo kanraan, dadaaru mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin kanran ga daariyaa be wɔɔ onu nɛ dimiyaan wɔin gɔbei dɔdɔbɔrɔɲu.
55003007	Be waaru wooi sɔɔ dei ibɛɛ wɔin, kaa asuu naran gɔ jugu bɛɛidenɛ.
55003008	Bana Jannɛsu lee, Janbɛrɛsu lee, Mɔise le be jaiyaabe gin’, inɛw kɔɔbe kanran, naran gɔ le jaiyɛuwɔin. Bei inɛw kuu sɛnɛbei, gagawu bemɛ gɔ tiyɛ turu kanran sɛlɛ.
55003009	Kaa be sɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ giru bɛɛ yaaidenɛ. Sabu bana Jannɛsu lee, Janbɛrɛsu lee mɔ bii gin’, inɛw puu weje bemɛ sɔɔ gɔ jugɔtiidɛin.
55003010	Kaa u, deeru ma gɔbe nɛ lee, yoiyaara ma nɛ lee, kijɛ kanrando ga mu bee gɔbe nɛ lee, gagawu ma nɛ lee, muyɔn ma nɛ lee, ihibɛ ma nɛ lee, ɛɛn go aŋai mu bee nɛ lee,
55003011	tɔɔɲɔ ma gɔbe nɛ lee, ɔɲɛ ma gɔbe nɛ lee, mui ɛjii kajubaabeu. U Antiɔse nɛ lee, Ikɔniumu nɛ lee, Lisutere nɛ lee kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔwaabe gɔbe puu igii wɔu. Iyaa, tɔɔɲɔ mu bɛrɛ dɔi gɔbe igii wɔu. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa, tɔɔɲɔ kɔɔbe wooi nɛ mui yabaa goonaabe.
55003012	Kaa inɛw Kirisito Yesu nɛ, Ama oju nɛ teitai yai ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe puu, tɔɔɲɔ be bɛrɛ dɔdɔɔdo.
55003013	Kaa inɛw mɔɲu lee, inɛw kakalu le wɔin gɔbe lee, mɔɲu bemɛ bariyɛ bariyɛ yaado, inɛwin lelelemɔdɛin, kuu bemɛ yaa lelelemɔdɛin.
55003014	U kai, naran ui deerin gɔbe, naran le saii gawaa u wɔɔ gɔbe ɛjii gɛliyɛ. Sabu u, inɛw ui dedeerenw gɔbe le diyɛ daanu bɛbɛɛdou.
55003015	Kɔɔ gin’, dagi uwɔ le baa, u Ama Dɔn ɛjaai gɔbe igii wɔu. Kirisito Yesu le gawu gɔ le digɛnu, Ama Dɔn wogɔ, hakilɛ yayabu kɔɔ obojɛ gɔ ui obu bɛbɛɛdo.
55003016	Ama sɔɔ tɔŋɔmu puu, Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le tɔŋaaɲu. Naran deere ga niwɛn yasɛ, lelu lee, teitai laa lee goonɔ ga, bana ɛjii biyɛɲu dedeerejɛ.
55003017	Kɔɔ le digɛnu Ama inɛ gɔi sɛɛu deeraa ye, birɛ ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin sɛɛu birɛ bɛɛ ga yeguru kunaa wɔɔ.
55004001	Mu Ama giru nɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu, inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin lee, inɛw yinwaain gɔbe lee saliyɛ kireido baŋa giru nɛ lee, u bɛrɛ daii sɔɔuwɔn. Yesu, wɛɛgu womɔ le unruin wo tagaraido lee, laamu wo kanraindo gɔ lee dɛi u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn:
55004002	Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ u inɛw bɛrɛ taga, waaru sɛgɛraa ma, sɛgɛrɛlu ma, u wogɔ inɛw bɛrɛ gimɛ gimɛ ye taga. Muyɔn diyɛ le inɛwin deeraa ye, inɛw sɔɔ u sɔi gɔ le be yabamɔ, inɛwin jaruga, bei anrangaju obo.
55004003	Sabu waaru yawɛɛjɛ, inɛw, waaru wogɔ le naran sɔɔ keŋiyɛindenɛ. Kaa be deeru tɔgu dɛin keŋi ibɛɛ biyɛdɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ be dedeerenw dɛin dɛin, sɔɔ keŋi be ibɛ, be bɛrɛ sɔɔnw gɔbe, bei gɔŋɔ ye gɛgɛliyɛmɔdɛin.
55004004	Be Ama sɔɔ naran gɔ keŋiyɛn ga yabaidenɛ, kaa be elumɛbe nɛ hakilɛ bemɛ puu bobojodɛin.
55004005	Kaa u kai, waaru wooi hakilɛ uwɔ gɔ daana, ɔɲɛ tariyɛ, u Kibɛru Ɛju taganɛ birɛ birɛ, birɛ uwɔ wooi nɛ Ama birɛbirɛnɛ kibaai biyɛ.
55004006	Nɛɛ, kuu ma sɔɔ sibɛ go, kinrun ma sadaga gin’ Ama bɛrɛ oboɲu waaru gɔ dɔwaai, aduna nɛ mu gooun waaru dɔwaai.
55004007	Mu jobu diyɛ gɔ jɔbaabɔn, tunmɔ galu jobu ma gɔ kilaai, mu gagawu gɔ gɛliyaabɔn.
55004008	Kanɛ baa, teitai ɔgɔdomɔ ma gɔ Ama numɔ nɛ yato, jobu jɔbu nɛ inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ tujɔ gɔ, Ama, inɛw teitai wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ tujɔ wo oboido gɔ woi. Saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu saliyɛkirenɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ, wo tujɔ ma mui ohobodo. Saliyɛ kiru bai wogɔ le, wo mu bɛrɛ sai tujɔ gɔ oboidolo, kaa inɛw dadaaru diyɛ le Inɛw Baŋa wɛi ye unruin wo tagaraido bai gɔ dɔmi gɔbe puu bɛrɛ ohobodo.
55004009	U mainiyaanjɛu ye ɔgu wɛɛ mui tɛmɛ.
55004010	Sabu Demasu, aduna kijɛ ihibɛ dɛi, mui pajaatiyaa, Tesalonike ana nɛ yaai. Kɛrɛsɛn, Galasi gana nɛ yaai, Tite, Dalumasi gana nɛ yaai.
55004011	Luka turu sai mu le wɔɔ. Marukai dimɛraanjɛu ye kole wɛɛ, sabu wo birɛ ma nɛ mui baru bɛbɛɛdo.
55004012	Mu Tisikei, Epɛse ana nɛ tiyaatun.
55004013	Waaru u wɛɛjɛ le, u Toroasu nɛ, Karupusu mɔ nɛ kaali arugoi naa mu paju gɔ, mu bɛrɛ kole wɛɛ. U dɔn ma gɔbe yaa kole wɛɛ, sigɛ le dɔn bɛlu guju le yegeraaɲu gɔbe naŋanɔu.
55004014	Alɛsandere, irunɛ gɔ, wo amasɔgɔjugɔla birɛ mu bɛrɛ biraabe. Inɛw Baŋa, birɛ mɔɲu womɔ le kɛukɛu woi tutujɔdo.
55004015	U kanran, wo dɛi kuu uwɔ kajuba, sabu wo Ama sɔɔ emɛ tagajɛ gɔ le saii jaiyɛuwɔ.
55004016	Kubɔ pɔlɔ, paŋagunw giru nɛ, kuu ma goonu sɔɔ dɛi mui booni le, inɛ turu kanran mui wogɔ dɛi baralu. Be puu mui pajaatiyaa yain. Ama, wogɔ mɔɲu le bei tujɔnɔu.
55004017	Kaa Inɛw Baŋa Yesu wo mui baraa, wo mui paŋa obaabe. Kɔɔ gin’ mu Ama sɔɔ gɔ sɛɛu tagaa, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe ɛgaabɛin. Ama, yiun aŋa nɛ mui yabaabe.
55004018	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu mɔɲu wooi nɛ mui yayabado, iyaa wo sɛɛu, jamu le alagala diinɛ womɔ nɛ mui yoyoomɔdo. Boi sɔmu gɔ, asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
55004019	Mu Pirisilu lee, Akilasu leei poonɔuwɔn, iyaa Onɛsipore ginrun gonɔ bɛɛnw kanran poonɔuwɔn.
55004020	Erasute, Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ biyaai, iyaa mu Toropimɛ jijinwɛnjɛ dɛi, woi Mile nɛ pajaabɔn.
55004021	U kaali waaru dɔɔmɔ nɛ, maini ye wɛɛ. Ebulusu lee, Pudɛnsu lee, Linusu lee, Kulɔdia lee, gagawu nɛ ba unrunw emɛ bɔɔnw gɔbe lee, be puu ui poonɔuwɔin.
55004022	Inɛw Baŋa u le biyɛ. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
56001001	Mu Pɔlu, Ama birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ, Yesu Kirisito jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, mu tiiuwɔ. Inɛw Ama yɛmaabe gɔbe, maa bei gagawu nɛ dimɛrɛn jɛɛlɛ ga, gagawu emɛ sɔɔ gɔ le kɛukɛu, bei naran gɔi jugɔmɔ ga,
56001002	kɔɔ le digɛnu bemaa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ bɛi diyɛdɔn le biyɛ ga, sagu wogɔ mu bɛrɛ duuraaɲu. Ama kakalu maŋaalɛ gɔ, aduna maŋamɔ nɛ, wo ɔnmɔsɔgɔ wogɔ emɛ bɛrɛ ohobodo ga pui kunaabe.
56001003	Waaru jaan gɔ wo dɔwaa, waaju mu bɛrɛ wo gawaraabe gɔ le digɛu, Ama, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ wogɔ, sɔɔ womɔ le jugɔmaabe. Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ mu bɛrɛ tɔɔraabe dɛi, mu ɔnmɔsɔgɔ diyɛdɔn wogɔ tagauwɔn.
56001004	Tite, u, gagawu emɛ lɛi turu wɔɔ nɛ ii maa tɔitɔi gɔ, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu emi Yabanɛ gɔ lee, nɛɛma lee, jamu lee ui obo.
56001005	Uwaa sɔɔ yegeraa kilɛlu gɔbei kilɛmɔ ga, iyaa uwaa ana tuturu nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ inɛw naw yɛmɛ daana ga, mu wogɔ dɛi Kɛrɛte gana nɛ ui pajaabɔn. Sɔɔ u bɛrɛ mu sɔi gɔbe naŋanɔu.
56001006	Inɛ na, inɛ nɛ jarugu turu kanran tɛmɛmɔidoloi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Woi yaanran turu igɛi biyɛun jaan. Unrunw womɔ Yesu jaŋu unrunwin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Unrunw gɔbe ajubu sɛlɛ bemɛ dɛi lee, sɔɔ yabala bemɛ dɛi lee, boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔɔ inɛwin biyɛun jaanla.
56001007	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ gɔ, Ama birɛ gɔ wo sagi dɛi, wo le jarugu turu kanran tɛmɛmɔu jaanla. Woi, inɛ diŋɛ unrunmɔ kanrannɛi ma, kinɛ ɔgu ingelemɔnɛi ma, kɔɲɔnɔɔnɛi ma, inɛ koloi ma, inɛ nabara le kijɛ dɛnɛnɛi ma, wo biyɛun jaanla.
56001008	Kaa inɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ gɔ, ginrun sugo obonɛi biyɛ, ɛju dɛnɛnɛi biyɛ, inɛ kuu kajubu le wɔɔi, woi inɛ teitai, inɛ kuu unrunmɔ Ama nɛ sɛɛu obaa wɔɔ, inɛ dimɛ le wɔɔi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
56001009	Deeru nanaa gɔ le ba unrunw gagawu nɛ wo bɔɔnw gɔbei mainiyɛnmɔ bɛɛ ga, iyaa inɛw sɔɔ nanaa gɔ le jiiru kunɔw gɔbe aŋa pinɛ bɛɛ ga, wo sɔɔ nanaa gɔ, bana deerin le kɛukɛu, ɛjii ai wo gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
56001010	Inɛw kɔkɔlɔmaagunw gɔbe lee, inɛw sɔɔ koolo koolo joo sɔɔnw gɔbe lee, iyaa inɛw lelemɔw gɔbe, sigɛ le Yahutunw tubu kanraanɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ jooi wɔin.
56001011	U deeru teitai laa deereu be wɔɔ gɔ nɛ bei tɛŋɛ. Sabu be nabara le kɛɛlɛ bɛɛɲu giye deeru deereun jaanla be deerejɛ gɔ dɛi, be inɛw ginrun duu gamuu nɛ toin gɔbe puu lelemɔuwɔin.
56001012	Be bainɛ turu, inɛ titiyainɛ bemɛ turu, ɔn gin’ sɔi: “Kɛrɛte bɛɛnw, jaa kakalumaŋawin, be olunawan mɔɲube gin’ wɔin. Bei walagunw kɔrujagunwin.”
56001013	Ainɛ kɔɔ sɔɔ gi gɔ narain. Kɔɔ dɛi u inɛw deeru teitai laa deerenw gɔbei, bemaa gagawu tɔitɔi gɔ bɛɛ ga, ɛjii ganwan,
56001014	bemaa Yahutunw elumɛ gɔbe lee, inɛw naran gɔ pajaatiyaa wɔin tɔɔru gɔbe lee keŋiyɛnnɔu ga, bei ganwan.
56001015	Inɛw kikinu sibɛ go ɛjaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ, kijɛ lɔgɔjiyaa wɔɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ. Kaa inɛw hakɛ le lɔgɔjiyaa, naran gɔ le gawanɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ, kijɛ ɛjaa wɔɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ. Sabu hakilɛ bemɛ lee, kinɛjugɔ bemɛ lee hakɛ le lɔgɔjiyaa yanwaan wɔɔ.
56001016	Be Amai igii wɔin gɛɛɲu, kaa birɛ bemɛ gɔ le be Amai naran go inin ga tagarauwɔin. Bei inɛw jɛbi. Be Ama sɔɔ yabaanɛ, sɔɔ ɛju turu kanran kanrun bɛɛnɛ.
56002001	U kai, deeru nanaa gɔ bana le kɛukɛu inɛwin deere.
56002002	Anranw pɛi gɔbe bɛrɛ taga, bemaa inɛw hakilɛ dɛinyaan wɔin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ wa. Bei inɛw jige ɛju sɛbei biyɛun jaan. Be kuu kajubu le biyɛun jaan. Bei inɛw gagawu nɛ lee, ihibɛ nɛ lee, muyɔn nɛ lee, ɛɛn go iŋi biyɛun jaan.
56002003	Kɔɔ gin’ yaanw pɛi gɔbei yaa taga, yaanw Ama le gawaa wɔin gɔbe aŋai biyɛun jaan gin’, bemaa kunrin biyɛ wa. Bei inɛw wajunw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔwin biyɛun jaanla. Bei inɛw kɔɲɔnɔɔwin biyɛun jaanla. Be inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛjii wɔɔ gɔi deerewin biyɛun jaan.
56002004	Kunrin be yaanw dagunw gɔbe bemaa, be igɛbe lee, unrunw bemɛ lee ibɛɛ biyɛ ga,
56002005	kuu bemɛ ɛjii gɛliyɛ ga, ɛjaai biyɛ ga, ginrun bemɛ ɛjii kajuba ga, inɛw ɛjubei biyɛ ga, iyaa bemaa be igɛbe le tubi ye biyɛ ga, bei be deereun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ turu kanran Ama sɔɔ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnɔu ga, yaanw dagunw gɔbe kijɛ kɔɔbe puu kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
56002006	Iyaa kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, u sagatara unrunw gɔbe bemaa kuu kajubu le biyɛ ga bei tinwɛnrɛn.
56002007	Nɛɛ u kuu uwɔ le, kijɛ u kanranjɛ puu nɛ giretagurui biyɛ. Deeru uwɔ nɛ, u kinɛpilu le sɔɔ, u diyɛ daanu le biyɛ.
56002008	Iyaa kijɛ narain wɔɔ gɔ, inɛ turu kanran wogɔ jiiru bɛɛidolo gɔ, wogɔ sɔɔ. Inɛw u le jiiru kunɔw gɔbe, emɛ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu bɛɛnɛ kanraain ye, dɔgɔ bei aamɔ ga, u kijɛ kɔɔbe kanran.
56002009	Nɛɛ, gunɔw gɔbei tinwɛnrɛn, kijɛ wooi nɛ be baŋabe sɔɔ be yabaun jaain wɔɔ. Be baŋabe kinɛ kijɛ aajɛ be kanraun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa be baŋabe sɔɔ be jiireun jaanla.
56002010	Be, be baŋabe kijɛ gunyɔun jaanla. Kaa be baŋabe be le gawu bɛbɛɛdɛin ga be tagaraun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ le digɛnu inɛw bemaa kijɛ wooi nɛ Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ deeru gɔ sɛɛrɛ ɛjii biyɛ ga be kunrin kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
56002011	Ama nɛɛma womɔ, nɛɛma le digɛnu inɛw wooi yayabu bɛɛido gɔ tagaraajɛ.
56002012	Emaa kijɛ Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ gɔ lee, aduna dadaaru gɔbe lee pajaatiyaa ye, aduna ɔn nɛ, kuu emɛ kajubanu, teitai bii ye, Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu biyɛ ga, nɛɛma wogɔ emi deerejɛ.
56002013	Diyɛdɔn ɛju emɛ bai gɔ lee, Ama diyɛnɛ emɛ emi Yabanɛ gɔ, Yesu Kirisito, dooro womɔ wo tagaraido bai gɔ lee dɔmiyaan wɔnu, kɔɔ gin’ biyɛun jaan.
56002014	Emaa mɔɲu wooi nɛ goo ga, hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi ɛjɛmɔ ga, emi tɔgu wo turu sai mɔi wɔɔi bojo ga, kijɛ ɛju kanrun nɛ emaa gaai mainiyɛn ga, Yesu Kirisito, kuu unrunmɔ emɛ dɛi obaabe.
56002015	Kunrin kijɛ kɔɔbe, kijɛ deereun u jaan gɔbe bei. Gɔnrɔn wooi le inɛwin mainiyɛnmɔ, iyaa bei ɛjii ɛjii sɔɔ. Inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ ui gailiyɛmɔnɔu.
56003001	Inɛw bɛrɛ naŋaranmɔ, bemaa kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, paŋagunw gɔbe lee le tubiye wa. Bemaa sɔɔ bemɛ yaba wa, kijɛ ɛju kanrun wooi dɛi yeguru le biyɛ wa.
56003002	Inɛ turu kanran dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu be sɔɔun jaanla. Bei inɛw jai jaiyɛwin biyɛun jaanla. Inɛw kaalubei be biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa inɛw puu le tɛgɛ sɛlɛ be biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
56003003	Sabu emɛ yaa laa inɛw hakilɛ sɛnɛbei bɛin, sɔɔ yabau benɛ, emi lelaayaabe, dadaaru mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee, kijɛ kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔjɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee gunɔwin bɛin. Emɛ mɔmɔɲu nɛ lee, ele nɛ lee tobɛin. Inɛw emi ibiliyaa bɛin, emɛ yaa tunmɔi ibiliyaa bɛin.
56003004	Kaa Ama, emi Yabanɛ gɔ, inɛw bɛrɛ, ɛhɛju womɔ lee, ihibɛ womɔ lee, waaru wo taguru le,
56003005	wo emi yabaabe. Kijɛ ɛju emɛ kanranjɛ turu kanran dɛi wo emi yabalu. Kaa wo amasɔgɔjugɔ womɔ dɛi emi yabaabe. Wo hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi mɔŋaa ɛjɛmaa, emi pilemaa wo naranmu gɔ lee, iyaa ɔnmɔ kana Kikinu Pilu obojɛ gɔ lee le emi yabaabe.
56003006	Emaa kɔɔ gin’ Ama nɛɛma gɔ le digɛnu, giru womɔ nɛ inɛw teitai wɔin bii ye, iyaa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ kuu nɛ diyɛ daanaa emɛ wɔɔ gɔ kɛn balanwin biyɛ ga, Ama, Yesu Kirisito emi Yabanɛ gɔ le digɛu, Kikinu Pilu gɔ kuu emɛ nɛ gaai togaa kɔɔraabe.
56003008	Sɔɔ mu sɔi kɔɔ narain. Kɔɔ dɛi inɛw Ama le gawaa wɔin gɔbe, bemaa maini ye birɛ ɛju nɛ kuu bemɛ kunɔ ga, u kijɛ kɔɔbe gimɛ ye gimɛ ye taga. Sabu deeru kɔɔbe, deeru ɛjui, iyaa inɛwin babarado.
56003009	Kaa, jiiru bomɔgube ma, tirɛ anranw joo joo boi boonu ma, jai ma, Yahutunw tɔɔru tiyɛ dɛi jai ma, wogɔbe le wageniyɛn. Sabu wogɔ inɛwin baraalɛ, iyaa tiyɛ sɛlɛ.
56003010	Kɔɔ gin’ iyaa, inɛ turu inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe logoro nɛ kabu kunɔjɛ ye, womaa wogɔ kanrannɔu ga, woi tinwɛnrɛn. Wo nimɛ kanran yabalu biyaa ye, kubɔ lɛiye gɔ woi tinwɛnrɛn. Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ wo yabalu ye, nɛɛ u inɛ wogɔ baŋa le dɔrɔ goo.
56003011	Inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ, oju teitai gɔi pajaati ga, u igii wɔu. Iyaa hakɛ womɔ gɔbe, woi lelu nɛ too ga tatagaraɲu.
56003012	Mu, u bɛrɛ Arutemasu ma, Tisike ma titiidɔn. Kɔɔ waaru le, u maini ye Nikopolise ana gɔ nɛ wɛɛ mui tɛmɛ. Sabu kaali waaru galaido baa kɔɔ nɛ bibiyɛdɔn ga, mu ajubaa wɔun.
56003013	Iyaa tɔɔru jugɔnɛ Senasu lee, Apɔlɔsu lee waaru Kɛrɛte be gooido le, bemaa oji bemɛ dɛi kijɛ kai be sɛɛ puu siyɛ ga, u bei ɛjii niinɛ.
56003014	Iyaa jaŋu unrunw emɛ bɔɔnw gɔbe kanran, inɛw kai maa le wɔin gɔbei bara ga, bemaa inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ niwɛn siyɛ ga, birɛ ɛju nɛ giru go yai be deemɔ.
56003015	Nɛɛ, kɔɔ gin’ jaŋu unrunw mu le wɔin gɔbe puu ui poonɔuwɔin. Emɛ kanran jaŋu unrunw kɔɔ nɛ u le wɔin gɔbe, inɛw emi ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbei poonɔuwɔin. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e wooi le biyɛ.
57001001	Mu Pɔlu, inɛ Kirisito Yesu dɛi kajuginɛi wɔɔ gɔ lee, iyaa emɛ bainɛ Timɔte lee, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, bainɛ ibɛ emɛ, birɛbirɛnɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛ Pilemɔ lee,
57001002	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, ginrun uwɔ nɛ mɔrinyɛun wɔɔ lee, emɛ sainɛ Apia lee, iyaa birɛ dɛi inɛ mainiyaan kuu womɔ obaa wɔɔ gɔ emɛ bɔɔnɛ Arusipe lee bɛrɛ tiiuwɔin.
57001003	Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
57001004	Waaru Ama mu gɛɛnjɛ puu, mu ui ajubauwɔn, iyaa, Ama mai birɛpoo tagauwɔn,
57001005	sabu mu, Ama inɛw gɔbe puu sibɛ go ihibɛ u sɛɛ gɔ lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛ gagawu uwɔ bana wɔɔ lee sɔɔ be sɔɔu ɛgɛuwɔn.
57001006	Gagawu nɛ, emɛ lee, u lee bɔɔ kunaa emɛ sɛɛ gɔ, Kirisito nɛ kijɛ ɛju emɛ sɛɛ gɔbe puu nɛ jugɔ kibaai gɔ u bɛrɛ obu bɛɛ ga, mu Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn.
57001007	Mu bainɛ, ihibɛ le u wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, mu kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ lee, anrangaju diyɛ lee biyaabɔn, sabu u Ama inɛw gɔbe kinɛ kaaliyɛmaabeu.
57001008	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, halu mu Kirisito nɛ u bɛrɛ tɔɔru tɔɔrɔ ga, kara yasɔn kanran,
57001009	ihibɛ boi le u bɛrɛ gɛɛn gɛɛn mu bɛrɛ ire. Kɔɔ gin’, mu Pɔlu ainɛ na pɛi gɔ, iyaa sigiyaa Kirisito Yesu dɛi kaju nɛ kunaa sɛin gɔ,
57001010	mu Onɛsimɛ dɛi u bɛrɛ gɛɛn gɛɛunwɔn. Wo, waaru kaju nɛ mu too gɔ le, Kirisito nɛ ii mai biyaai.
57001011	Pɔɔlɔ wo u bɛrɛ inɛ niwɛn toloi bee, kaa kanɛ, u lee, mu lee bɛrɛ niwɛn yasɛ.
57001012	Wo, inɛ mu bɛrɛ saii maai wɔɔ gɔ, mu woi u bɛrɛ pilemaa tiiuwɔn.
57001013	Waaru Kibɛru Ɛju tagu gɔ dɛi kaju nɛ mu too gɔ le, dilɛ uwɔ nɛ womaa mui bara ga, woi mu le bojo ga mu bɛrɛ gaai ɛjii bibiyɛbe.
57001014	Kaa, kinɛ uwɔ aalu wo wɔnu, mu kijɛ turu kanran kanran ga ibɛlaun. Mu uwaa mu bɛrɛ ɛju kanrun kaara ga wɔlɔn. Diŋɛ uwɔ le u kanranjɛ mu bɛrɛ ire.
57001015	Uwaa Onɛsimɛi asuu pilemu siyɛ ga, waaru gaila le u le kabi bibiyɛ.
57001016	Sabu, kanɛ woi gunɔnɛ peerei laa, kaa wo gunɔnɛ dɛi ire: Woi bainɛ ibɛ mai. Woi mu bɛrɛ saii maai wɔɔ. Kaa gunɔnɛ gin’ lee, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ bainɛ gin’ lee, woi sigɛ le u bɛrɛ gaara maai biyɛun jaan.
57001017	Nɛɛ, u mui birɛbirɛnɛ u bɔɔnɛ gin’ lugaa sɛu ye, bana mui u sɛgɛrɛido gin’, woi kunrin tee sɛgɛrɛ.
