57001018	Wo u bɛrɛ sɔɔ jaanla kanraanbe ye, maa, u bɛrɛ kijɛ wo tujɔun jaan yɔɔ ye, wogɔ kuu ma nɛ duurɔ.
57001019	Mu numɔ ma le sɔɔ ɔn u bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn: Mu Pɔlu, yoru uwɔ gɔ puu u bɛrɛ tutujɔdɔn. Nɛɛ, u kinrun uwɔ mu dɛi u oboun jaain wɔɔ sɔɔ gɔ kai sɔɔnu doori.
57001020	Aiwa, mu bainɛ, mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, Inɛw Baŋa dɛi u sin ɔn mu bɛrɛ kanran: Kirisito nɛ bainɛ too gin’, u kinɛ ma kaaliyɛmɔ.
57001021	Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn waaru u bɛrɛ mu tɔŋɔjɛ le, kijɛ u bɛrɛ mu gɛɛnjɛ gɔ, u wogɔ kakanrandou ga mu gawaa wɔun. U wogɔ kuu nɛ baraa ye kanrandou ga mu igii wɔun.
57001022	Iyaa kɔɔ gin’, u mu dɛi ginrun diinyɛnɲu kanran yegere. Sabu Ama, gɛɛn ebe saa ye, mui kaju nɛ goonu ye e bɛrɛ pilemɛ ye titiido diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
57001023	Epaparase, Kirisito Yesu dɛi mu le kaju nɛ too gɔ, wo ui poonɔuwɔ.
57001024	Iyaa, Maruka lee, Arisutaruke lee, Demasu lee, Luka lee, birɛbirɛnw mu bɔɔnw gɔbe ui poonɔuwɔin.
57001025	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
58001001	Pɔɔlɔ, kubɔ lugo joo le, bana dɛin dɛin le, inɛw Ama titiyaanw le digɛu, Ama, emɛ babe bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔi.
58001002	Kaa bai dumɔrɔn ɔnbe nɛ, Ama, Aini unrunmɔ le digɛu emɛ bɛrɛ sɔwaabe. Wo woi kijɛ puu kɛn balanɛi bojaabe. Iyaa wo le digɛu adunai maŋu.
58001003	Aini wogɔ, Ama dooro wo le dooriyejɛ, Ama bana wɔɔ gin’ tee wɔɔ, kijɛ puu sɔɔ unrunmɔ gɔnrɔn le dɔnwaan gɛlɛ. Hakɛ ɛjɛmɔɲu birɛ gɔ kibemaatiyaa, wo alagala go Ama, baba diyɛ baŋa numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyin.
58001004	Kunrin, Aini gɔ, Ama wo bɛrɛ boi obu gɔ, mɛlɛnkɛbe boi dɛi gaa bana wɔɔ gin’, wo kanran be dɛi sigɛ biyaai.
58001005	Mɛlɛnkɛ aa bɛrɛ Ama ɔn gin’ sɔwaatɛli: “Ui Aini mai, iye mu ui narun.” Maa, “Mu wo bai biyɛdɔn, wo Aini mai biyɛdo.”
58001006	Sigiyaa, Ama, Aini pɔlɔ womɔ waaru aduna nɛ wo tii le, wo sɔwaa gi: “Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe puu woi be demɛniyɛnmɔmu!”
58001007	Mɛlɛnkɛbe dɛi sɔɔ wo gi unwɔ: “Wo mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbei ooɲɔi bojojɛ, birɛbirɛnw womɔbei yaun bijei bojojɛ.”
58001008	Kaa Aini gɔ dɛi kijɛ wo gi: “Ama, ɔgɔdɔin uwɔ asuu nasuu yɔɔ. Diinɛ uwɔ nɛ teitai gɔ, ɔgɔbaga gɔ woi biyɛdo.
58001009	U teitai ibiyaa, teitai laa ibiliyaabeu. Kɔɔ dɛi, Ama, Ama uwɔ gɔ, ui yɛmaa, ɔgɔnw kuu nɛ nii togo kɔɔrɔɲu gin’ kinɛ ɛɛli le ui joonaabe. Wo kunrin ui u bɔɔnw gɔbe dɛi sigɛ bojaabe.”
58001010	Ama iyaa sɔwaa gi: “U Inɛw Baŋa, tɔlɔgu gɔ le, u aduna bɔlɔtei daanaabeu. Iyaa alagala gɔbe numɔ uwɔ birɛi.
58001011	Kɔɔbe puu susuiyodɛin, kaa u yɔɔu. Be puu pɛyaa ye sɔi gin’ sɛsɛmiliyɛdɛin.
58001012	U arugoi diyɛ gin’ bei mumunɔdou. Sɔi dilɛɲu gin’ bei didilɛdɛin. Kaa u kai, u jaa tunmai. Iyaa anranguju uwɔbe dumɔ sɛnɛ.”
58001013	Mɛlɛnkɛ aa bɛrɛ Ama ɔn gin’ sɔwaatɛli: “Jaŋuw uwɔ gɔbe gɔnrɔn ye kubɔ uwɔ doɲu nɛ yai mu kunɔido baa, uwɔ numɔ iin ma sibɛ nɛ wɛɛ dɛinyɛn.”
58001014	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, titiyaanw gɔbe puu, kikinu Ama dɛi birɛbirɛnwin. Yayabu gɔ inɛw bɛɛidɛin gɔbei bara ga bei tiyaaɲu.
58002001	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emaa sɔɔ naran emɛ ɛgu gɔ nɛ emi goi ye wageniyɛnnɔu ga, sɔɔ gɔ ɛjii ai gɛli ye, emɛ kajubaun jaain wɔɔ.
58002002	Sabu mɛlɛnkɛbe sɔɔ sɔi gɔ narain ga iyemaabe tilai wo wɔnu, nɛ yɛnɛ iyaa sɔɔ kɔɔ inɛ digiyɛlu, kole yabalu gɔ, tujɔ wo le jaan gɔ biyaabe tilai wo wɔnu,
58002003	emɛ yayabu diyɛ ɔn lugolu kanraanɲu ye, yani ɛli bɛɛdɛin? Inɛw Baŋa kuu womɔ le wo laa yayabu kɔɔ sɔɔ wo tagaa inɛw ɛgin gɔbe, sɔɔ gɔ narain ga emɛ bɛrɛ yinjugɔmi.
58002004	Ama yaa sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee, yarabirɛ lee, taanrinyɛn tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee, be le digɛu kanranmaabe. Wo iyaa Kikinu Pilu sin obu gɔbe diŋɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu gamalaabe. Kunrin, wo sɛɛrɛ wo goobe nɛ paŋa oboube.
58002005	Aduna wɛɛido sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ, Ama, aduna wogɔ kuu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛbei daanalu.
58002006	Kaa inɛ turu Ama Dɔn yalu turu nɛ sɛɛrɛ ɔn gowaa gi: “Inɛ, kijɛ ingei bai, Ama, u woi ajubadou? Adama ii kijɛ ingei bai, woi kajubadou?
58002007	U gaila woi mɛlɛnkɛbe doɲu nɛ bojaabeu. U dooro lee, baba lee ɔgɔdomɔ gin’ kuu womɔ nɛ kunaabeu.
58002008	U kijɛ puu kubɔsɔrɔ womɔ nɛ wo le tubiyemaabeu.” Ama kijɛ puu inɛ le tubiyemaabe ye, tiyɛ gɔ kijɛ wo le tubiyelu turu kanran bojolu. Yinkanran, kanɛ kijɛ puu wo le tubiyaain ga emɛ iyeuwɔnɛ.
58002009	Kaa emɛ sɔɔ ɔn igii wɔin: Yesu, Ama nɛɛma dɛi, inɛw wooi dɛi yinwɛn ga, gaila woi mɛlɛnkɛbe doɲu nɛ bojaabɛin. Yiun wo muyɔn gɔ dɛi, dooro lee, baba lee ɔgɔdomɔ gin’ kuu womɔ nɛ kunaa, emɛ kanɛ woi iyeuwɔin.
58002010	Naran go Ama kijɛ puu mɔiyɛnmɔnɛ baŋa gɔ, iyaa kijɛ puu wo dɛi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, inɛw jooi dooro unrunmɔ nɛ kunɔ ga, ɔɲɛ gɔ le digɛu Yesui kibaai wo boju gɔ, wogɔ jaain bee. Sabu yayabu bemɛ nɛ bei teeremɔnɛ gɔ Yesu woi.
58002011	Yesu, hakɛ nɛ inɛ ɛjɛmɔnɛ baŋa gɔ lee, inɛw hakɛ nɛ wo ɛjɛmu gɔbe lee, be puu ba turu. Kɔɔ digɛu, bei unrun ba unrunw boonɔ ga dɔgɔ woi sɛlɛ.
58002012	Ama le sɔwaa kijɛ wo gi: “Mu mu ba unrunw bɛrɛ boi uwɔ tatagadɔn. Mu mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ u dɛi boi sɔmu nii niniidɔn.”
58002013	Wo iyaa sɔwaa gi: “Mu diyɛ ma Ama nɛ dadaanadɔn.” Gimaa iyaa gi: “Mu, Ama mu bɛrɛ unrunw obu gɔ le unwɔun.”
58002014	Unrunw gɔbe goju nɛ ilii jɔbɔjɛ dɛi, Yesu, wo kanran goju wogɔ tunmɔ jeɲaabe. Wo yiun womɔ le digɛu, jinrun puu kuu baŋa, yiun paŋa, numɔ womɔ nɛ too baŋa gɔnrɔn donugo ga kɔɔ gin’ kanrun.
58002015	Iyaa inɛw kinruntaun bemɛ wooi nɛ, yiun liliyɛ bemɛ dɛi gunɔ toin gɔbei gunɔ gɔ nɛ goonɔ ga kɔɔ gin’ kanrun.
58002016	Sabu wo mɛlɛnkɛbe jobu digilui saai wɛɛlu, kaa, Abarahamu tirɛ unrunw jobudigilu saai wɛi ga daii wɔɔ.
58002017	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, wo Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai, Ama birɛ nɛ amasɔgɔjugɔnɛi, sɔɔ turu baŋai bii ye, inɛw hakɛ mɛɛnɛ ga, waajibi kijɛ puu nɛ wo ba unrunw bana jeɲɛu jaain bee.
58002018	Woi waaru suburin le, wo kuu womɔ le ɔɲaabe dɛi, inɛw subɔrɔ nɛ toin gɔbei bara bɛbɛɛjɛ.
58003001	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ba unrunw Ama inɛwin wɔin gɔbe, e kanran inɛw Ama boonaajɛi wɔin gɔbe, Yesui ajubu yɛnɛi: Ama woi tiyaa, gagawu sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ nɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai boju.
58003002	Mɔise, Ama ginrun gɔ puu nɛ birɛbirɛnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai bii gin’, Yesu, Ama woi daananɛ gɔ le sɔɔ turu baŋai biyaabe.
58003003	Ginrun ujɔnɛ, ginrun gɔ dɛi sigɛ baba wo bɛɛjɛ gin’, Mɔise dɛi sigɛ Yesu le baba jaan ga yinlugaaɲu.
58003004	Ginrun tuturu puu inɛ uju. Kaa kijɛ puu ujɔnɛ gɔ Amai.
58003005	Mɔise kai, Ama sɔɔ gɛɛido dɛi sɛɛrɛ goo ga, birɛbirɛnɛi go, Ama ginrun gɔ puu nɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai bii.
58003006	Kaa Kirisito, Ainii go Ama ginrun kuu nɛ dɛinyaan, sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ. Emɛ kijɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin ga kuu emɛ unaa emɛ sɛɛ gɔ nɛ, liyɛ sɛlɛ gɔ lee, diyɛdɔn gɔ lee gɛliyaa kole wɔin ye, Ama ginrun gɔ emi.
58003007	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, nɛɛ, Kikinu Pilu bana sɔi gin’: “Iye e Ama mii ɛgaajɛi ye,
58003008	murutu waaru le olusolo nɛ Amai bai suburin gɔbe le bana bii gin’, e kɔkɔlɔmaa le biyɛnɔugi.
58003009	Ama gi: ‘E babe, anranguju pɛnai birɛ ma iyaabɛin kanran, olusolo gɔ nɛ mui subɔraa yɛnaabɛin.
58003010	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu waaru wogɔ inɛw le kinɛ banraan, kijɛ mu gi: Be waaru puu ajubu bemɛ nɛ mana mana yaauwɔin. Be oju mabe sɔɔ paamu kanrun yabanɛ.
58003011	Kodigɛu, mu kinɛbanrun ma le wɔu, mui jɛbiyaa, bemaa deeliye be dɛi mu boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ gun.’’
58003012	Mu ba unrunw, logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu kanran kinɛ mɔɲu kunɔ ye, gagawu sɛlɛ le bii ye, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔi pajanɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai.
58003013	Kaa logoro ebe nɛ hakɛ inɛ turui manamɔ ye, kɔkɔlɔmaa kunɔmɔnɔu ga, iye, waaru ɛju emɛ sɛɛ gɔ le, e bai puu tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛin.
58003014	Sabu diyɛdɔn le emɛ tɔlu gɔ, dumɔ gɔ baa ɛɛn go yagɛlɛin biyaai ye, emi Kirisito le bɔɔi.
58003015	Ama Dɔn sɔwaa, “Iye e Ama mii ɛgaajɛi ye, murutu waaru le bana bii gin’, kɔkɔlɔmaa le biyɛnɔugi” gi.
58003016	Inɛw Ama mii ɛgaabɛin, kaa murutu kanrin gɔbe aabei? Inɛw Mɔise bei teeremaa, Ejipute gana nɛ goin gɔbe puu bei laa ma?
58003017	Anranguju pɛnai, Ama, inɛw aabe le kinɛbanrun le bee? Inɛw hakɛ kanraan olusolo nɛ numaa yayinwin gɔbei laa ma?
58003018	Iyaa Ama jɛbiyaa, inɛw aabe deeliye be dɛi unrun boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ gi? Inɛw sɔɔ womɔ yabalu kanranw gɔbei laa ma?
58003019	Inɛw kɔɔbe gagawu sɛlɛ bemɛ sabu dɛi deeliye wogɔ nɛ yoonɛ kanrin ga emɛ iyeuwɔin.
58004001	Deeliye wogɔ nɛ yoo ga, Ama pui gɔ emɛ le yɔɔ digɛu, logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu bɛɛ yoolu kakanrando ma liyɛmɔi.
58004002	Inɛw olusolo nɛ bɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ tagin gin’, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ kanran yintagin. Kaa sɔɔ be ɛgu gɔ, be gagawu le yabanɛ digɛu, sɔɔ gɔ be bɛrɛ niwɛn siyɛlu.
58004003	Deeliye dɛi Ama sɔwaa: “Mu kinɛbanrun ma le wɔu mui jɛbiyaa, bemaa deeliye be dɛi mu boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ gun” wo gi gɔ, emɛ inɛw gawaaɲu gɔbe, deeliye wogɔ nɛ emɛ yoojɛ. Ama, aduna maŋu le baa birɛ womɔ kilaa yaabe kanran, wo sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔwaabe.
58004004	Sabu Ama Dɔn yalu turu nɛ, bai sɔiye gɔ dɛi sɔwaa, “Bai sɔiye gɔ, Ama birɛ wo birɛbe puu dɛɛnrinyaanbe” gin.
58004005	Yalu waja nɛ wo iyaa sɔwaa, “Be deeliye be dɛi mu boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ” gin.
58004006	Kɔɔi ye inɛw be laa deeliye nɛ yoi Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ɛgin gɔbe, gagawu sɛlɛ bemɛ dɛi deeliye gɔ nɛ yoonɛ digɛu, inɛw gamuu nimɛ bɛɛ yoyoomɔ.
58004007	Kodigɛu, Ama pilemaa bai kɛjaajɛ. Wo iye gi. Waaru diyɛ galaa wo yaa, wo Dawide le digɛu, Ama Dɔn yalu giru nɛ gin gɔ nɛ wogɔ sɔi, gi: “Iye e Ama mii ɛgaajɛi ye, kɔkɔlɔmaa le biyɛnɔugi.”
58004008	Josue, inɛw gɔbei deeliye nɛ yoomaabe ye, Ama kɔɔ onu nɛ bai waja sɔɔ sɔɔbele.
58004009	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama, bai sɔiye gɔ le wo dɛɛnrin gin’, Ama inɛw dɛi deeliye kɔɔ tunmɔ yɔɔ.
58004010	Sabu Ama deeliye boju gɔ nɛ inɛ yowaajɛ, Ama, birɛ unrunmɔ nɛ wo dɛɛnrinyaanbe gin’, kɔɔbaŋa kanran birɛ unrunmɔ nɛ dɛdɛɛnrinyɛndo.
58004011	Kɔɔ digɛu maini ye deeliye wogɔ nɛ yoomɔi. Logoro emɛ nɛ inɛ turu kanran, sɔɔ yabala wogɔ tunmɔ le bii ye, deeliye gɔ nɛ bɛɛ yoolu kanrannɔu ga mainiyɛnmɔi.
58004012	Ama sɔɔ gɔ, sɔɔ ɔnmɔi, gɔnrɔn yasɛ, polukaaba aŋa lɛi wooi dɛi sigɛ sii wɔɔ. Wo kikinu lee, kinrun lee yalu kabiyɛjɛ go baa yayoojɛ. Digu gɔbe lee, bɔnu lee yalu kabiyɛjɛ go baa yayoojɛ. Wo kinɛ dadaaru gɔbe lee, kinɛ ajubu lee saliyɛ kirenɛi.
58004013	Kijɛ maŋaaɲu, Ama giru nɛ baŋiyaan wɔɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ. Ama, sɔɔ emɛ puu wo bɛrɛ sɔɔi emɛ do baŋa gɔ, kijɛ puu giru womɔ nɛ dɛbulu ye ije go biyɛjɛ.
58004014	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa diyɛ, alagala nɛ Ama giru nɛ baa dɔwaa wɔɔ gɔ emɛ yasin. Wogɔ Ama Aini Yesui. Kodigɛu, gagawu emɛ sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛmɔi.
58004015	Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa, yɛbɛlɛ emɛ nɛ emɛ le ɔɲɔ bɛɛlɛi emɛ sɛnɛ. Kaa kijɛ puu nɛ emɛ gin’ woi subɔraabɛin. Kaa wo hakɛ kanranlu.
58004016	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama womaa amasɔgɔ emɛ jugɔ ga, emaa nɛɛma bɛi ye, waaru jaan gɔ le jobudigilu emɛ saa ga, emɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go Ama ɔgɔdɔin giru nɛ dɔɔmɔi.
58005001	Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa tuturu wooi, inɛw logoro nɛ Ama woi yɛmɛjɛ. Inɛw dɛi Ama birɛ birɛ ga woi daanaaɲu. Sin obu lee, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga lee Ama bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔnɛi.
58005002	Wo kuu womɔ le, yɛbɛlɛ wo bɛrɛ dɔɔ bɛbɛɛjɛ digɛu, inɛw sɔɔ inin, lelu nɛ toin gɔbe amasɔgɔ jugɔ bɛbɛɛjɛ.
58005003	Wo kuu womɔ le yɛbɛlɛginɛi sabu dɛi, tɔgu womɔ inɛw hakɛ dɛi Ama bɛrɛ sadaga wo dɔɔnɔjɛ gin’, kuu womɔ hakɛ dɛi kanran, Ama bɛrɛ sadaga wo dɔɔnɔu jaain wɔɔ.
58005004	Inɛ turu kanran sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai bii baba gɔ kuu unrunmɔ bɛrɛ obu bɛɛlɛ. Kaa Aarɔn mɔ bana bii gin’, Amai wogɔ nɛ inɛi boonɔjɛ.
58005005	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, Kirisito gɔ, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai bii baba gɔ, kuu unrunmɔ bɛrɛ wo obolu. Kaa wo le sɔwaa, “Ui Aini mai, iye mu ui narun”, iyaa, “U Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔu”, Ama gɛɛnɛ gɔ, baba kɔɔ wo bɛrɛ wo obu.
58005007	Yesu aduna nɛ waaru wo bee le, wo amagɛɛn lee, kai womɔ Ama bɛrɛ tagu lee, kɔun diyɛ le giridii le, Ama, yiun nɛ woi yabu bɛɛbe baŋa bɛrɛ sɔmiyaanbe. Ama yaa, Yesu, baba le wo le tubiyaa wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, gɛɛn womɔ gɔ saabe.
58005008	Kaa halu wo Ama Ainii kanran, wo ɔɲɛ wo iye gɔ le digɛu sɔɔ yabu deyaabe.
58005009	Woi kibaai waaru bojin le, inɛw sɔɔ womɔ yabanw wooi bɛrɛ wo yayabu asuu wɔɔ obonɛi biyaai.
58005010	Ama yaa woi Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai bojaabe.
58005011	Sɔɔ kanɛ emɛ sɔi kɔɔbe kuu nɛ emɛ sɔɔ joo sɔɔun yasin. Kaa e sɔɔ paamu kanrun nɛ ɔgulai digɛu, tiyɛ bemɛ e bɛrɛ taga ga nawin wɔɔ.
58005012	Waaru ɔn le jaŋudeerewin e biyɛun jaan bee. Kaa Ama sɔɔ sibɛ go sɔɔ pɔlɔ jugɔun jaan gɔbe e bɛrɛ deere ga e nimɛ kai yasɛi. Jaa gunu kaya dɛi, e nimɛ kanran iru kai yasɛi.
58005013	Inɛ iru sai nɔɔjɛ, nimɛ ii digɛu, teitai sɔɔ kabu kunu bɛɛlɛ.
58005014	Kaa jaa gunu inɛw naw mɔi. Be wɛɛjiyɛu, wɛɛjiyɛu, ɛju lee, mɔɲu lee kabu kunu deyaain.
58006001	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kirisito deeru sɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔbe sai nɛ biyɛlu kanraan ye, giru go inɛw naw le deeru jaan gɔ nɛ yaamɔi. Emɛ sɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔbe nɛ pilemu pilemu wɛɛ kanranmɔnɔugin. Tiyɛ gɔ birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛ gɔbe le onu duloti lee, Ama le diyɛ daana lee,
58006002	batise dɛin dɛin deeru lee, inɛ kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋurun deeru lee, yiun bulogu deeru lee, Ama saliyɛ kiru tujɔ asuu nasuu biyɛido deeru lee.
58006003	Giru go yai gɔ, Ama yabaajɛ ye kijɛ emɛ kanraindo gɔ woi.
58006004	Inɛw Ama wijɛ gɔ kubɔ turu biyaa, alagala sin obu gɔ nɛwaan, Kikinu Pilu biyaa, Ama sɔɔ ɛjii wɔɔ ga jugaa, aduna wɛɛido gɔnrɔn gɔ nɛwaan, pilemaa numaa oju nɛ gowaain gɔbe, be pilemaa Ama Aini gɔi baga jai nɛ pɛgɛu, inɛw wooi giru nɛ dɔgɔ wo bɛrɛ tagarauwɔin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi bei pilemɛ ye waja ajubuduli nɛ jɛɛlu bɛɛmɔɔlɛ.
58006007	Minɛ bɛru bɛru anrandii bɛɛjɛ, dii gɔ nɔwaan, inɛw dɛi woi walin dɛi kijɛ niwɛn sɛɛ gogoomɔjɛ ye, minɛ gɔ Ama bɛrɛ duba biyaajɛ.
58006008	Kaa minɛ gɔ jijii lee, dɔgɔ mɔɲu lee goomɔjɛ ye, woi niwɛn sɛlɛ. Ama jebu wo le bɛrii wɔɔ, woi tɛguru le dogojɛ.
58006009	Ba unrunw ibɛ emɛbe, halu emɛ kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin kanran, e bana ɛju yayabu nɛ yaajɛ gɔ nɛ toin ga, emɛ e sibɛ go diyɛdɔn le wɔin.
58006010	Ama, teitai laa go wɔlɔ. Wo kijɛ e kanrun gɔbe naŋaidolo. Iyaa Ama inɛw dɛi birɛ biraa e galu lee, nimɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ lee le digɛu wo bɛrɛ ihibɛ e taguru gɔ, wo naŋaidolo.
58006011	E tuturu puu dumɔ gɔ baa maini tunmɔ kɔɔ le bii ye, kijɛ e dɔmɔ gɔ sɛɛu bɛɛ ga emɛ wogɔi dɛnɛɲu.
58006012	Ebaa walagunwin taŋa ga emɛ ibɛlain. Kaa ebaa inɛw gagawu nɛ biyaa, muyaan wɔnu, kɛn pui kunaaɲu gɔ bɛɛɲu gɔbei dee ga emɛ ibɛɛ wɔin.
58006013	Ama, Abarahamu le pui kunɔu, kijɛ wo dɛi gaa kole jɛbiyɛɲu waja wɔlɔ gɔ digɛu, wo kuu unrunmɔ le jɛbiyaa,
58006014	gi: “Mu naran go ui duba kakanrandɔn, iyaa tɔgu uwɔ ɛjii nanarinyɛnmɔdɔn.”
58006015	Kunrin muyɔn le dɔmiyaan wɔu, Abarahamu kijɛ wo bɛrɛ pui kuni gɔ yinbɛi.
58006016	Inɛw, waaru jebu be jɛbiyɛjɛ le, kijɛ be dɛi gaa le jɛbiyɛɲu. Jebu gɔ, sɔɔ gɔ bɛrɛ paŋa obaa ye jiiru puu wo donugojɛ.
58006017	Kunrin Ama, pui wo kunu kɛn inɛw balanw gɔbe bɛrɛ diŋɛ unrunmɔ sɔɔ asuu kɔɔliyɛɛlɛ ga daii jugɔmɔ ibɛɛ bee. Kɔɔ dɛi, wo pui gɔ kuu nɛ jebu gɔ yinbaru.
58006018	Kunrin kijɛ kɔɔliyɛɛlɛ kolɛi wɔɔ. Iyaa wogɔ nɛ Ama, kakalu maŋu bɛɛlɛ. Kodigɛu, emɛ inɛw yalu babaŋi emɛ wo nɛ biyaaɲu gɔbe, diyɛdɔn bɛbɛɛdɛin ga emɛ bɛrɛ pui kunaaɲu gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛ ga anrangaju diyɛ le wɔin.
58006019	Inrun kirɛgu diikoroi ɛjii ɛɛin yalu womɔ nɛ bojojɛ gin’, diyɛdɔn wogɔ kinrun emɛi gain gain bojojɛ. Iyaa diyɛdɔn wogɔ, alagala Ama ginrun, kɛju sɔi gɔ kɛjaa galaa ye, kɔlɔ go baa yadɔɔjɛ.
58006020	Yesu wo laa giru emɛ nɛ, emɛ dɛi konɛ yowaabe. Wo Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai biyaabe.
58007001	Mɛlukisedɛku wogɔ Salɛmu ana ɔgɔnɛi bee, iyaa Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi bee. Abarahamu, kɔmɔ nɛ ɔgɔnw gɔnraan pilemaa wɛɛu wo wɔu, Mɛlukisedɛku yaa woi sɛgɛraa, woi duba kanraanbe.
58007002	Abarahamu, ɔgɔnw gɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ wo ɛlu puu jaka wo bɛrɛ obu. Mɛlukisedɛku boi tiyɛ pɔlɔ gɔ teitai ɔgɔnɛi. Iyaa wo Salɛmu ɔgɔnɛi bee, tiyɛ gɔ jamu ɔgɔnɛ.
58007003	Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ ba sɔɔ sɔɔnɛ, na sɔɔ sɔɔnɛ, tirɛ anranw sɔɔ sɔɔnɛ, bai womɔ ɔn nɛ tɔlɔjɛ wɔlɔ, ɔn nɛ dogojɛ wɔlɔ. Wo Ama Aini gin’ asuu sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔɔ.
58007004	Mɛlukisedɛku bana gaai wo wɔɔ gɔ yɛnɛi. Abarahamu emɛ tirɛ ainɛ diyɛ gɔ, kɔmɔ nɛ kijɛ wo bɛi jaka gɔ wo bɛrɛ obu.
58007005	Lewi tɔgu inɛw sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ nɛ yooɲu gɔbe, Tɔɔru gɔ le kɛukɛu, be Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ jaka yaba bɛbɛɛɲu. Tiyɛ gɔ, be inɛw bemɛ be gin’ Abarahamu tɔgu nɛ goin bɛrɛ yabaɲu.
58007006	Kaa Mɛlukisedɛku, wo Lewi tɔgu inɛi laa bee kanran, Abarahamu bɛrɛ jaka yabaabe. Wo iyaa, Ama pui womɔbe inɛ bɛrɛ wo kunu gɔ, inɛ wogɔi duba kanraanbe.
58007007	Bana wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, duba kanranjɛ baŋa gɔ, duba bɛɛnɛ gɔ dɛi gaa, jiiru wɔlɔ.
58007008	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw sɔɔ sibɛ nɛ jaka yabanw gɔbe, waajibi inɛw yinwɛindɛinbei. Kaa Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ sibɛ nɛ Ama Dɔn inɛ dɛi sɛɛrɛ gowaa, ɔnmɔi wɔɔ wo gi gɔ, jaka gɔ wo yabu.
58007009	Iyaa Abarahamu jaka waaru wo goonu le, Lewi, jaka yabanw tɔgu tirɛ ainɛ gɔ, wo kanran jaka goonaati gɛɛ bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
58007010	Sabu Mɛlukisedɛku, Abarahamui waaru wo sɛguru le, Lewii naranla bee kanran, wo unrun tirɛ ainɛ ili nɛ yatobe.
58007011	Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ Tɔɔru obin gɔ, duu womɔ Lewi tɔgu inɛw sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ sɔɔ kuu nɛ daan. Sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ sɔɔ wogɔ, kijɛ kibaai bee ye, Aarɔn mɔ gin’ pajati ye, Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ waja daana ga inge dɛi waajibi bii?
58007012	Sabu, sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ sɔɔ gɔ dulomaaɲu ye, waajibi tɔɔru gɔ yaa duliyeun jaain wɔɔ.
58007013	Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ, inɛ dɛi sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔin gɔ, wo tɔgu waja nɛ goi. Tɔgu womɔ inɛ turu kanran, sadagadumu nɛ birɛ birɛɲu sɔɔ nɛ tolo.
58007014	Sabu wo Juda tɔgu nɛ goi ga igimɛi wɔɔ. Mɔise, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw sɔɔ sɔɔu, tɔgu kɔɔ inɛw dɛi sɔɔ kanma gɛɛlu.
58007015	Sɔɔ emɛ gi gɔ daii wɔɔ ga sɔɔ waja sigɛ le jugɔmɔjɛ unwɔ: Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ Mɛlukisedɛku gin’ wɔɔ waja gowaa wɔɔ.
58007016	Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wo bii gɔ, inɛ nɛ wo goibe sɔɔ le digɛla. Kaa ɔnmɔ dogoolɛ gɔnrɔn le digɛ.
58007017	Sabu Ama Dɔn sɛɛrɛ gowaa gi: “U Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔu.”
58007018	Kunrin, sɔɔ tɔɔraaɲu pɛi gɔ, yɛbɛlɛ womɔ lee, niwɛn tolo womɔ lee dɛi woi pajaatin.
58007019	Sabu Tɔɔru, kijɛ turu kanran kibaai bojaa bɛɛlu. Kaa iyaa, diyɛdɔn sigɛ wiyaai. Emɛ wogɔ le Ama giru nɛ dɔɔɲu.
58007020	Wogɔ nɛ sigiyaa, Ama kuu unrunmɔ wo jɛbi sɔɔ gɔ yɔɔ. Inɛw wajunw sadaga dɔɔnɔwin be bii gɔ, kuu jɛbi kɔɔ tunmɔ le biyɛnɛ.
58007021	Kaa Yesu, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wo bii gɔ, Ama kuu unrunmɔ jɛbiyaa woi daanu. Ama sɔwaa gi: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama kuu unrunmɔ jɛbiyaajɛ, wo sɔɔ unrunmɔ kɔɔlɔmɔidolo. U asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔu.”
58007022	Ama kuu jɛbi gɔ sabu dɛi, Yesu, aaru dɛi sɛɛrɛi biyaa wo wɔɔ gɔ, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ dɛi sigɛ.
58007023	Sɔɔ waja yaa unwɔ: Lewi tɔgu, sadagadɔɔnɔw gɔbe yinwɛn yinwɛn yaabɛin digɛu, birɛ gɔ nɛ asuu toii bɛɛbenɛ dɛi jooi bɛin.
58007024	Kaa Yesu, wo kai asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ digɛu, sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ womɔ gɔ nɛ dilɛ wɔlɔ.
58007025	Kosabu dɛi inɛw wo le digɛnu Ama giru nɛ dɔɔɲu gɔbei sɛɛu yabu bɛɛjɛ. Sabu be dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn ga wo asuu ɔnmɔi yɔɔ.
58007026	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa emɛ le dagaa gɔ, Yesu woi. Wo ɛjaa wɔɔ, jarugu wo le wɔlɔ, lɔgɔ turu kanran wo nɛ tarala, hakɛgunw le woi kabugaa, alagalabe dɛi sigɛ Ama woi daa go unaajɛ.
58007027	Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu bɛɛnw wajunw, bai puu kuu unrunbemɛ hakɛ dɛi sadaga tɛgɛraa ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ Isɛrɛlu tɔgu puu hakɛ dɛi be tɛgɛrɛjɛ gin’, wo wogɔ kai sɛlɛ. Waaru kuu unrunmɔ sadaga wo obu le, wo kubɔ turu sai wogɔ kanraan kilaai.
58007028	Mɔise tɔɔru le kɛukɛu, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu bɛɛnw daanaaɲu gɔbe, inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunwin. Kaa Ama kuu jɛbi sɔɔ, Tɔɔru onu nɛ wɛi gɔ, Aini gɔi sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai daanu. Ama woi asuu kibaai boju.
58008001	Sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ nɛ, sɔɔ ii gɔ unwɔ: Emɛ Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa kɔɔ tunmɔi sɛin. Wo alagala nɛ Ama baba diyɛ baŋa ɔgɔdɔin numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ.
58008002	Konɛ, Ama Ginrun kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ, tiyɛ gɔ guju kuru Ama Ginrun nanaa inɛ kurolu, Inɛw Baŋa Ama kuraabe gɔ nɛ, wo sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai biyaa wɔɔ.
58008003	Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa tuturu puui, sin obu lee, sadaga lee, Ama bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔ dɛi daanaɲu. Kodigɛu, sadaga dɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa emɛ gɔ, wo kanran, Ama bɛrɛ kijɛ dɔɔnɔɲu wo siyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
58008004	Wo aduna nɛ bee ye, woi sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi kanran biyɛbele, sabu inɛw wajunw, Tɔɔru le kɛukɛu sadaga dɔɔnɔɲu yɔɔin.
58008005	Wogɔ bɛɛnw sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ be birɛjɛ gɔ, alagala nɛ nanaa kanranɲu gɔ yarai. Mɔise mɔ kanran, guju kuru Ama Ginrun gɔ waaru kurodo ga wo bee le kunrin bee. Ama wo le sɔwaa gi: “Ɛjii kajuba, kokoo nɛ u bɛrɛ tagurin gɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, kijɛ gɔ puu wogɔ gin’ kanran.”
58008006	Kaa kanɛ Yesu, sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ wo bɛi gɔ, bemɛ gɔ kuu nɛ wɔɔ. Sabu aaru dɛi sɔɔ yegerenɛi wo wɔɔ gɔ, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ dɛi sigɛ. Iyaa pui sigɛbe kuu nɛ daan.
58008007	Aaru pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ sɔɔ tolo, sɛɛu bee ye, aaru lɛiye dɛnɛnu doori bee.
58008008	Kaa Ama, inɛw womɔbe nɛ jarugu tɛmaabe. Wo saa gi: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama gi: ‘Bai yawɛɛjɛ, mu Isɛrɛlu inɛw lee, Juda tɔgu lee le aaru kana ahaaradɔn.
58008009	Aaru wogɔ, be babe numɔ aa, Ejipute gana nɛ bai bei mu goonɔbe le, be le aaru mu aaru gɔ gin’ biyɛidolo. Sabu be aaru ma gɔ yamalaatin digɛu, mu kanran be le onu dulaatun.’
58008010	Nɛɛ Inɛw Baŋa Ama gi: ‘Bai kɔɔbe galaai ye, Isɛrɛlu inɛw le aaru mu aaraido gɔ unwɔ: Mu tɔɔru mabe hakilɛ bemɛ nɛ kukunɔdɔn. Kinɛ bemɛ nɛ yaa tɔtɔŋɔdɔn. Mu Ama bemɛi biyɛdɔn, be inɛw mai biyɛdɛin.
58008011	Inɛ turu kanran, waja tɔgu womɔ inɛ ma, wo bainɛ ma deere ye, «U Inɛw Baŋa Amai jugɔ» gɛɛnu doori. Dagunɛ nɛ goi ye, diyɛnɛ nɛ yai dɔɔ, be puu mui jujugɔdɛin.
58008012	Sabu mu teitai laa bemɛ be bɛrɛ yaabu kakanrandɔn. Mu waja asuu hakɛ bemɛ ajubu ma nɛ wɛɛmɔidolɔn.’’
58008013	Ama, aaru kɔɔ aaru kanai wo gi gɔ le digɛu, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ pɛii bojaati. Kijɛ pɛi anranguju joo bɛɛu gɛlɛ gɔ, manu womɔ bɛrii wɔɔ.
58009001	Aaru pɔlɔ gɔ, Ama demɛniyɛnmu sibɛ go tɔɔru womɔbe yasɛbe, Ama ginrun numɔ le yegeraaɲu kanran yasɛbe.
58009002	Sabu guju kuru Ama Ginrun kuraa yabe. Kuru kɔlɔ kɛju pɔlɔ gɔ, yalu ɛjaai gɔ woi. Wogɔ nɛ pilɛlɔn diyɛ gɔ lee, tabalu gɔ lee, Ama burui ga buru duunaaɲu gɔ lee yatobɛin.
58009003	Yalu kɔɔ galaai ye kɛju kunu lɛiye sɔi gɔ onu nɛ yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɛɛɲu gɔ yabe.
58009004	Wogɔ nɛ uguru tɛguru yalu kange le yegeraaɲu gɔ lee, aaru koro gɔ, sɛɛu kange le kuyaa wɔɔ gɔ lee yatobɛin. Koro gɔ kɔlɔ nɛ, kange gelu, buru manɛ gɛɛɲu gɔ too gɔ lee, Aarɔn baga titimu, liyɛ bujaa wɔɔ gɔ lee, aaru tibu kɛbiriyɛun, tɔɔru sɔɔ konɛ tɔŋaaɲu gɔ lee yatobɛin.
58009005	Ama, dooro baŋa yalu gɔ nɛ yɔɔ sɛɛrɛi ga, koro gɔ kuu nɛ, Mɛlɛnkɛ Serubɛn gɛɛɲu gɔbe yegeraa yabɛin. Be, hakɛ mɛɛnɛɲu yalu gɔ gamuju bemɛ le dɛbaa gɛliyaa bɛin. Kaa sɔɔ gɔbe digu le digu le sɔɔɲu waaru gɔ kanɛ laa.
58009006	Kijɛ kɔɔbe puu kɔɔ gin’ wo wɔnu, Ama bɛrɛ sadaga dɔɔnɔw gɔbe bai tuturu puu kuru kɛju pɔlɔ yalu gɔ nɛ yowaa ye, sadaga dɔɔnu bemɛ birɛ birɛɲu.
58009007	Kaa kuru kɛju lɛiye gɔ nɛ, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ sai, anranguju nɛ kubɔ turu sai yoojɛ. Wo kuu womɔ dɛi, iyaa tɔgu gɔ puu lelu dɛi, waajibi arusɛgɛ ili, sadagai Ama bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔ ga kole yoojɛ.
58009008	Guju kuru Ama Ginrun pɔlɔ kɔɔ waaru bee puu nɛ, yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yoo ga oju pinɛlɛla bee ga, Kikinu Pilu sɔɔ kɔɔbe le emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmɔube.
58009009	Kɔɔbe puu kanɛ bana sɔɔ wɔɔ jugɔmɔjɛ. Sin obu lee, sadaga lee, Ama bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛubɛin gɔbe, Ama demɛniyɛnmɔnɛ gɔ kinɛjugɔ nɛ jarugu donugu bɛɛbele ga tagarajɛ.
58009010	Sabu sɔɔ gɔ kayɛrɛ ma, kijɛ nɔɔɲu ma, dii le ui bana ɛjɛmɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin ma sɔɔ le digɛ. Kɔɔbe kinɛjugɔ sɔɔ le digɛla, kaa goju sai le tɔɔru digɛi. Ama, kijɛ puu pilemɛ ye kanai wo bojoido waaru yai dɔɔ nɛ birɛ birɛ ga daanaabɛin.
58009011	Kaa Kirisito, kijɛ ɛju kanɛ baa wɔin sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai wɛi. Kuru nɛ wo galu gɔ, wo gaa, sɛɛu kibaa wɔɔ. Wogɔ inɛ numɔ le yegerenɛ. Tiyɛ gɔ aduna maŋaaɲu ɔn kijɛi laa.
58009012	Wo kubɔ turu sai yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yowaa kilaai. Wo ɛnrɛn ili le ma, naa unrunw ili le ma yoolu. Kaa kuu bana womɔ ili le yoi. Wo kɔɔ gin’ kanraan, asuu kuu emɛ gowaai boju.
58009013	Ɛnrɛn ili lee, naa jaŋu ili lee, naa unrunw tɛgɛrɛɲu unɔ gɔ lee, inɛw ligijiyaain gɔbe nɛ miɲaa ye, ligiji bemɛ sɔɔ donugaa ye, bei ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.
58009014	Kɔɔ kunrin wɔɔ ye, Kirisito ili gɔ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ. Wo Ama Kikinu asuu wɔɔ gɔ le digɛu kuu unrunmɔ Ama bɛrɛ sadaga lɔgɔ taralai obu. Ili womɔ kinɛjugɔ emɛ nɛ birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛ gɔbe ɛjɛmɔ ye, emaa Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ dɛi birɛ birɛ ga kakanrando.
58009015	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛw Ama bei boonu gɔbe, asuu kɛn pui gɔ bɛɛ ga, Kirisito aaru kana sɔɔ yegerenɛi. Yiun womɔ aaru pɔlɔ waaru le hakɛ kanrin gɔbe dɔrugaati digɛu, be wogɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin.
58009016	Kɛn balu dɔn nɛ sɔɔ too gɔ, dɔn tɔŋɔnɛ gɔ yinwaain ye kijɛ kanranɲui. Kinrun le wo wɔnu sɔɔ kanranɲui laa. Kodigɛu, kɛn balu dɔn yɔɔ ye, dɔn tɔŋɔnɛ gɔ yinwaain ga igimɛi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
58009018	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ kanran ili wɔlɔ go aaranɛ.
58009019	Mɔise, inɛw gɔ puu bɛrɛ tɔɔru sɔɔ tuturu puu Tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu gɔ nɛ bana too gin’ tagaatiyaa, naa unrunw ili dii le biraa, peju kukuli banrun lee, isɔpe tiun bagi lee, konɛ sowaa Tɔɔru dɔn gɔ nɛ miɲaa, iyaa inɛw gɔ puu bɛrɛ miɲaabe.
58009020	Kɔɔ gin’ kanraun wɔu kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: “Ɔn Ama ebaa aaru nɛ biyɛ ga wo tɔɔru gɔ ili gɔi.”
58009021	Mɔise kɔɔ gin’ iyaa kuru gɔ lee, sadaga birɛ gelu gɔ puu lee nɛ ili miɲaabe.
58009022	Tɔɔru le kɛukɛu, kijɛ tuturu laa ye, puu ili le ɛjɛmɔɲu. Iyaa ili togiyelu go, hakɛ yaabu kanrun wɔlɔ.
58009023	Kɔɔbe alagala nɛ kijɛ nanaa wɔɔ yarai. Bei kɔɔ gin’ ɛjɛmɔ ga waajibi bee. Kaa alagala kijɛ nanaa gɔbe, be kuu bemɛ le sadaga kɔɔbe dɛi sigɛbe kaii sɛin.
58009024	Sabu Kirisito, yalu ɛjaa nɛ wo yoi gɔ, nanaa gɔ yara gin’ numɔ le yegeraaɲu gɔi laa. Kaa wo alagala naa gɔ nɛ yowaa, kanɛ emɛ dɛi Ama giru nɛ wɔɔ.
58009025	Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa anranguju wɛɛjɛ puu arusɛgɛ ili le yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yoyoojɛ. Kaa Kirisito kɔɔ gin’, kubɔ joo kuu unrunmɔ sadaga obodo ga yoolu.
58009026	Sabu wogɔ gin’ bee ye, Kirisito aduna maŋi nɛ kubɔ joo wo ɔɲɔu jaain bee. Kaa kanɛ, waaru gɔbe dumɔrɔn bemɛ nɛ dɔɔuwɔ gɔ le, wo kuu unrunmɔ sadaga obu le digɛnu hakɛ donugo ga, kubɔ turu sai wiyaa kilaai.
58009027	Inɛ tuturu puu kubɔ turu yinwɛn ga waajibi, kɔɔ onu nɛ Ama, saliyɛ womɔ kikiredo.
58009028	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, Kirisito, inɛw joo hakɛbe duiyɔ ga, kubɔ turu sai kuu unrunmɔ sadaga obu. Wo kubɔ lɛiye gɔ wɛwɛɛdo, kaa hakɛ goonɔ dɛi biyɛidolo. Inɛw woi dɔmɔi gɔbei yaba ga wɛɛdo.
58010001	Yahutunw tɔɔru gɔ, kijɛ nanaa gɔbe bana sɛɛu tagaraalɛ. Kaa kijɛ ɛju wɛɛido gɔ kikinɛi sai. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, sadaga tutunmɔ deeliye sɛlɛ go pipilemu anranguju puu goonɔɲu gɔbe le digɛnu, tɔɔru kɔɔ Ama giru nɛ inɛw dɔɔnw gɔbei asuu kibemu bɛɛlɛ.
58010002	Bei kibemu bɛbɛɛbe ye, inɛw Ama demɛniyɛnmɔw gɔbe kubɔ turu sai hakɛ nɛ bei ɛhɛjɛmɔbɛin digɛu, iyaa hakɛ jarugu, kinɛjugɔ bemɛ nɛ kanɛ toiyobele digɛu, sadaga dɔɔnu gɔ papajabɛin.
58010003	Kaa sadaga kɔɔbe le inɛw bɛrɛ anranguju wɛɛjɛ puu hakɛ bemɛ naŋaranmɔɲu.
58010004	Sabu naa jaŋu ili lee, ɛnrɛn ili lee, asuu hakɛ goonu bɛɛlɛ.
58010005	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Kirisito, aduna nɛ wɛɛu, Ama le sɔwaa gi: “U sadaga wee, sin obu wee dɛnɛlu. Kaa u gojui mu bɛrɛ obu.
58010006	Arusɛgɛ sɛɛu tɛguru sadaga wee, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga wee, wogɔbe kinɛ uwɔ aalɛ.
58010007	Nɛɛ mu sɔwaa gun: ‘Ama, mu unwɔun. Dɔn gɔ nɛ mu dɛi bana tɔŋaaɲu le kɛukɛu, mu diŋɛ uwɔ kanrain wiyaa wɔun.”
58010008	Kirisito laa gɔ sɔwaa gi: “U sadaga wee, sin obu wee, arusɛgɛ sɛɛu tɛguru sadaga wee, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga wee dɛnɛlu, kinɛ uwɔ aalɛ.” Kokanran sadaga kɔɔbe Tɔɔru gɔ le kɛukɛu dɔɔnɔɲu.
58010009	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo gimaa, “Mu unwɔun, diŋɛ uwɔ kanrain wiyaa wɔun” gi. Kunrin wo sadaga pɔlɔ sɔɔ gɔ goonaatiyaa, lɛiye gɔ daanaati.
58010010	Yesu Kirisito, Ama diŋɛ kibemaati. Wogɔ digɛu, goju womɔ kubɔ turu sai sadaga obaa wo kilu gɔ le digɛu, emi hakɛ emɛ nɛ ɛjaai.
58010011	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ puu birɛ unrunmɔ birɛ ga bai tuturu puu ihiŋiyɛnjɛ. Wo sadaga tɔgu tunmɔ gɔbe, halu wogɔbe hakɛbe goonu bɛɛnɛ kanran, kubɔ joo dɔdɔɔnɔjɛ.
58010012	Kaa Kirisito asuu nasuu dɛi hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga turu deŋɛ deŋɛ dɔɔnaatiyaa, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyaain.
58010013	Kanɛ kɔɔ nɛ, wo Ama, jaŋuw womɔ gɔbei gɔnrɔn ye kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ wo kunɔido dɔmiyaan wɔɔ.
58010014	Kunrin, sadaga turu deŋɛ deŋɛ le digɛu, wo inɛw hakɛ nɛ ɛjɛɲu gɔbei asuu dɛi kibemaati.
58010015	Kikinu Pilu yaa sɛɛrɛ wogɔi emɛ bɛrɛ goojɛ. Kikinu Pilu laa gɔ sɔwaa:
58010016	“Inɛw Baŋa Ama gi: ‘Bai kɔɔbe galaai ye, aaru be le mu aaraido gɔ unwɔ: Mu tɔɔru mabe kinɛ bemɛ nɛ kukunɔdɔn. Hakilɛ bemɛ nɛ yaa tɔtɔŋɔdɔn.’”
58010017	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo gi: “Mu waja hakɛ bemɛ lee, mɔɲu bemɛ lee asuu ajubu ma nɛ wɛɛmɔidolɔn.”
58010018	Nɛɛ, hakɛ kɔɔbe yaabu kanraantin digɛnu, waja hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga jɛɛlɛnu doori.
58010019	Nɛɛ kai ba unrunw, Yesu ili digɛnu, emɛ yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yoo ga liyɛ sɛnɛ.
58010020	Wogɔ nɛ yoo ga, Yesu emɛ dɛi oju kana, ɔnmɔi wɔɔ, kɛju sɔi le galajɛ pinɛlaati. Tiyɛ gɔ goju womɔ le galajɛ.
58010021	Iyaa sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ diyɛ, Ama ginrun kuu nɛ daan, emɛ yasin.
58010022	Kɔɔbe wooi digɛu, kinɛpilu le, gagawu kibaai le, kinɛ emɛ ɛjɛmɔ ye kinɛjugɔ nɛ jarugu sɔɔ goonɔti ye, dii ɛju le goju gɔ mɔŋi go, emɛ Ama giru nɛ dɔɔmɔi.
58010023	Emɛ le pui kunu baŋa gɔ sɔɔ turu baŋai digɛu, diyɛdɔn sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛmɔi.
58010024	Tunmɔ kajubu ye, ihibɛ nɛ lee, birɛ ɛju biru nɛ lee tunmɔi mainiyɛnmɔmɔi.
58010025	Bana inɛw gamuu wɛɛjui biyaa wɔɔ gin’, emɛ tunmɔ le mɔrin gɔ pajamɔnɔugin. Kaa tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛnmɔi. Sigɛ le Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido gɔ bɛrii wɔɔ ga e iyeuwɔi dɛi tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛnmɔi.
58010026	Naran gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmaaɲu onu nɛ, bɛrɛ mɔɲu dɛi emɛ hakɛ kanrannu yaaɲu ye, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga waja wɔlɔ.
58010027	Liliyɛ diyɛ le, Ama saliyɛ kiru gɔ lee, yaun diyɛ, Ama le inɛw yabanɛ gɔbei tɛnwɛn ga wɔɔ gɔ lee, emɛ dɔmɔ gɔ woi.
58010028	Inɛ Mɔise tɔɔru yamalaajɛ puu, inɛw lɛi ma taanu ma aŋa sɛɛrɛ ɛgaa ye, amasɔgɔjugɔ wɔlɔ go woi daaɲu.
58010029	Nɛɛ, Ama Aini gɔi kubɔ le inɛ namanu galaido gɔ, aaru ili, kole woi hakɛ nɛ ɛjɛmaabɛin gɔ kijɛ yamalai inɛ bojoido gɔ, iyaa Ama Kikinu, nɛɛma wo bɛrɛ obu gɔi inɛ duyɔido gɔ mɔ yani biyɛdo? Tujɔ wo le jaan gɔ, yagɔ baŋa mɔ dɛi sigɛ le mɔɲu biyɛun jaan ga e ajubaalɛi ma?
58010030	Sabu “duguru gɔ mu goodo, pilemɛ ye mu tujɔdo” gɛɛnɛ baŋa gɔ, iyaa, “Inɛw Baŋa Ama, tɔgu womɔ inɛw saliyɛ kikiredo” gɛɛnɛ baŋa gɔ, emɛ igii wɔin.
58010031	Aa, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ numɔ nɛ yoi gɔ, wogɔ liliyɛ diyɛ naa diyɛ sɔɔi de!
58010032	Kaa Ama wijɛ gɔ e bɛi onu nɛ, bai pɔlɔ wɛin gɔbe sɔɔ ajubu yɛnɛi. Bai wogɔbe le, e kɔmɔ diyɛ taa ɔɲɛ diyɛ muyaanbei.
58010033	Doguru gamuu, inɛw puu giru nɛ ei duyɔ lee, ɔɲɔmɔ lee kanranɲu. Doguru gamuu iyaa inɛw kɔɔ gin’ wɔin gɔbe boru bariyaabei.
58010034	E kajugunw amasɔgɔ jugaabei. Iyaa kijɛ e sɛɛ e bɛrɛ ɛlɛ ga kinɛ ɛɛli le yabaabei, sabu e kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ, kijɛ asuu biyɛido yasɛi ga igii wɔi.
58010035	Kodigɛu, diyɛdɔn ebe pajanɔugi. Tujɔ diyɛ kole yadigɛ.
58010036	Ama diŋɛ kibemɔ ye, e bɛrɛ kijɛ pui kuni gɔ bɛɛ ga, e muyɔn kai yasɛi.
58010037	Sabu Ama Dɔn gɛɛjɛ gin’: “Gaila kanraan ye, gaila sai nɛ, inɛ wɛɛun dagaa gɔ wɛwɛɛdo. Wo tanwaindolo.
58010038	Kaa inɛ gagawu le digɛu giru ma nɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ, woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo. Kaa wo onu pilemɔjɛ ye, wo le kinɛ ma aaidolo.”
58010039	Emɛ kai, emɛ inɛw onu pilemɛ ye suiyoɲu gɔbe bɔɔi laain. Kaa inɛw gawa ye kinrun bemɛ yabaɲu gɔbe bɔɔi.
58011001	Kijɛ emɛ dɔmɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin ga diyɛ daanu ye bii gɔ, gagawu gɔ woi. Gagawu, kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe yɔɔin ga diyɛ daanu ye bii.
58011002	Gagawu dɛi pɔɔlɔ inɛw Ama kinɛ aamaabɛin.
58011003	Alagala lee, minɛ lee Ama sɔɔ le mɔii ga, emɛ gagawu le wogɔ paamaɲu. Wogɔ digɛu, kijɛ emɛ iyejɛ gɔbe, kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ nɛ goi.
58011004	Gagawu dɛi Abɛlu, sadaga Kayɛn mɔ dɛi sigɛ Ama bɛrɛ obu. Gagawu womɔ dɛi, Ama woi inɛ teitai lugu, sabu Ama, sin obu womɔbe le yabaabe. Halu wo yinwaain kanran, gagawu gɔ le digɛu, wo nimɛ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ.
58011005	Gagawu dɛi, Henɔku yinwɛnlu go, Ama nɛ woi jeɲaa uni. Waja woi iyemɔlu, sabu Ama woi jeɲaajiyaabe. Ama woi jeɲɛmɔ nɛ, Henɔku kinɛ womɔ aamaabe ga wo dɛi sɛɛrɛ gowaabɛin.
58011006	Gagawu wɔlɔ go inɛ turu kanran Ama kinɛ aamu bɛɛlɛ. Sabu inɛ Ama giru nɛ dɔɔjɛ, Ama yɔɔ, iyaa wo inɛw woi dɛnɛw gɔbei tutujɔjɛ ga wo gawaun jaain wɔɔ.
58011007	Gagawu dɛi Nɔwe, sɔɔ wɛɛlu, nimɛ iyemɔbele dɛi Ama woi wo tinwɛnraan, Ama giri liyɛ le sɔɔ yabaa, ginrun womɔ inɛwin yaba ga diikoro diyɛ yegeraabe. Wo kunrin aduna kuu nɛ jarugu duuraatiyaa, teitai gagawu le bɛɛmɔjɛ kɛn balanɛi biyaabe.
58011008	Gagawu dɛi Abarahamu, Ama woi boonaa gana kɛn womɔi wo bojoido sibɛ go yaa wo giyaa, wo sɔɔ yabaa yaabe. Wo yalu wo yaaido inɛɛ wɔu gowaa yai.
58011009	Gagawu dɛi wo gana Ama wo bɛrɛ pui kunu gɔ nɛ wiyaa, yerunɛ gana yeru nɛ daan gin’ dɛinyaanbe. Wo konɛ guju kurube nɛ toiyaa bee. Isaka lee, Jakɔbu lee, wo le pui tutunmɔ gɔ kɛn balanw gɔbe, be yaa guju kuru nɛ kunrin tobɛin.
58011010	Sabu Abarahamu, ana bɔlɔtei ɛɛnbe kuu nɛ daan, Ama ajubaa ujaabe gɔi dɔmɔbe.
58011011	Gagawu dɛi, Abarahamu, halu woi ɛjii pɛyaa galaayaabe kanran, iyaa Sara ii naranbele kanran, ii bɛɛɲu gɔnrɔn biyaabe. Sabu wo le pui kunu baŋa gɔ sɔɔ turu baŋai ga wo diyɛdaanu le bee.
58011012	Kunrin, ainɛ turu kɔɔ nɛ, ainɛ yinwaanyaabe bɔɔi kɔɔ nɛ, tɔgu joo narinyaanbe. Jojoo bemɛ alagala tolo gin’ bee, nɛudii diŋirun sɔsɔun gin’, lugo bɛɛmɔɔlɛ.
58011013	Inɛw kɔɔbe puu kijɛ be bɛrɛ pui kuni gɔ bɛɛnɛ go gagawu gɔ le biyaa wɔu yinyinwin. Kaa be kijɛ gɔbe wagee iyaa kinɛ bemɛ aabe. Be unrunbe aduna nɛ yerunwin, oju galanwin ga, daii sɔwaabɛin.
58011014	Inɛw kɔɔ gɛɛnw, baginruin dɛnɛuwɔin ga tagaraɲu.
58011015	Be gana nɛ be goi dadaaru bei yasɛbe ye, konɛ pilemɛ ye wɛɛɲu bana bɛbɛɛbɛin.
58011016	Kaa be baginrun sigɛi daariyaa wɔin, tiyɛ gɔ alagala baginrun. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama be dɛi ana yegeraajɛ digɛu, unruin Ama bemɛ be boonɔjɛ gɔ dɛi dɔgɔ woi aalɛ.
58011017	Gagawu dɛi, Abarahamu, Ama, waaru woi maraan yɛnu le, Isakai sadaga tɛgɛrɛdo ga yabaabe. Abarahamu, Ama, pui unrunmɔbe wo bɛrɛ kunu baŋa gɔ, halu Ama wo le sɔwaa: “U Isaka sai le tirɛ unrunw u bɛrɛ obodɔn ga pui mu kunu gɔbe bɛbɛɛdou” giyaabe kanran, wo aini koturu womɔ sadaga tɛgɛrɛdo ga bee.
58011019	Ama gɔnrɔn yasɛ, halu yiun bulogu bɛbɛɛjɛ ga, Abarahamu manugaube. Ii womɔ pilemaa wo bɛrɛ obin gɔ, yiun nɛ bulogaa obin gɛɛ bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
58011020	Gagawu dɛi Isaka, Jakɔbu lee, Esau lee, sɔɔ be bɛrɛ wɛɛido dɛi, Ama boi bowaabe.
58011021	Gagawu dɛi Jakɔbu, yinwɛin wo do ɛjii bɛruniyaan wɔɔ waaru le, Josɛpu anranw unrunw lɛi tuturu dɛi Ama boi bowaa, baga unrunmɔ kuu nɛ tijaa gɛliyaa Amai demɛniyɛnmaabe.
58011022	Gagawu dɛi Josɛpu, bai womɔ bɛruniyaan wo wɔu, Isɛrɛlu unrunw Ejipute gana nɛ be gooido sɔɔ sɔwaa, sɛgɛ unrunmɔ dɛi tɔɔru obu.
58011023	Gagawu dɛi Mɔise ba lee, wo na lee woi naraan, ii gɔ anran ɛju yasɛ ga iyaa, be ɔgɔnɛ tɔɔru ginɛmu gɔ liyɛnɛ go, iyepilu taanu woi baŋurin.
58011024	Gagawu dɛi Mɔise, waaru wo gabi le, unruin ɔgɔnɛ iyaa ii boonɔmɔ ga yabalu.
58011025	Hakɛ nɛ toi ye waaru gaila kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔ dɛi, wo Ama inɛw le ɔɲɛ iye ire ga wogɔ yɛmaabe.
58011026	Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ dɛi dɔgɔ iyi gɔ, Ejipute arusɛgɛ gɔbe dɛi sigɛ kijɛ irei ga wo yinlugu. Sabu wo wagee, giru go tujɔ wo bɛɛido gɔ nɛ giri dɛɛraa sɛbe.
58011027	Gagawu dɛi Mɔise, Ejipute nɛ ɔgɔnɛ kinɛbanrun gɔ liyɛlu go goi. Ama iyemɔɔlɛ gɔi iyeuwɔ gin’ biyaa, wo ɛɛn go biyaabe.
58011028	Gagawu dɛi wo Taŋagalu janwan gɔ daanaa, Ama titiyainɛ dadaanɛ gɔ, Isɛrɛlu anranw unrunw, bɛrɛ pɔlɔ gɔbei tabanɔu ga, taan bemɛ nɛ ili miɲɛ kɔɔrɔ ga tɔɔru.
58011029	Gagawu dɛi Isɛrɛlu unrunw, nɛudii banrun gɔ minɛ maa gin’ kɛjaa taŋi. Kaa Ejipute bɛɛnw wogɔ gin’ kanraan be yɛnaa, dii bei kimaati.
58011030	Isɛrɛlu unrunw, gagawu bemɛ dɛi, Jeriko ana jege gɔ, bai sɔi gɔŋaa be galaa wolu.
58011031	Gagawu dɛi yaanran dimu le kayanɛ, Rahabu, Jeriko nɛ inɛw Ama sɔɔ yabaanɛ gɔbe le bariyaa suiyolu. Sabu wo Isɛrɛlu inɛw tebutebenw gɔbei ɛju le sɛguru.
58011032	Mu nɛɛ inge sɔi baradɔn? Sabu Jedeyɔn ma, Baraku ma, Samusɔn ma, Jɛpute ma, Dawide ma, Samuɛlu ma, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe ma sɔɔ sɔɔdɔn gun ye, wogɔ waaru bɛɛidolɔn.
58011033	Gagawu le be diinɛbe kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaa, teitai kanraan, Ama kijɛ pui kunu gɔ biyaabɛin. Be yarabe aŋa pagaabɛin,
58011034	yaun paŋa donugaabɛin, polukaaba aŋa nɛ ɛliyaa gowaabɛin. Yɛbɛlɛgunwin wɔu, pilemaa gɔnrɔn biyaabɛin, kɔmɔ nɛ be anranwin bɛin, iyaa gana waja kɔmɔ numɔ gɔbei nanaabɛin.
58011035	Yiunbe bulaa, yaanw gamuu bɛrɛ inɛw bemɛ pilemaa obaaɲu. Inɛw gamuui ɛjii ɔɲɔmaa, yiun baa dɔɔni. Be bulogu sigɛ gɔ bɛɛdɛin ga, ɔɲɛ gɔ nɛ bei ɛli goomɔ ga yabanɛ.
58011036	Inɛw gamuu iyaa yamurinyɛnmu lee, bɔɔniyɛn logi lee biyaabɛin. Gamuui yɔgu le kɔmaa, kaju nɛ kunaabɛin.
58011037	Gamuui tibu le kamaa daabɛin, bimu le dɛŋaabɛin, polukaaba le daabɛin. Gamuu peju guju lee, ɛnrɛn guju lee sɔi bemɛi goriyaa, kijɛ kanma sɛbenɛ wɔu, tɔɔɲɔ bɛɛu, ɔɲɔmu diyɛ bɛɛu, ungo yaa, ungo yaa kanraunbɛin.
58011038	Inɛw kɔɔbe puui aduna le jaanla bee. Be ginaa, olusolo nɛ lee, kokoo kuu nɛ lee, kɔmɔ nɛ lee, bonɔ nɛ lee yalabɛin.
58011039	Inɛw kɔɔbe puu, gagawu bemɛ dɛi sɔɔ bemɛ Ama kinɛ aabe. Kokanran be kijɛ be bɛrɛ pui kuni gɔ bɛɛnɛ.
58011040	Sabu Ama, kijɛ sigɛ, emɛ dɛi ajubaa yasɛbe. Emɛ tolo go bei sɛɛu kibaai biyɛ ga wo ibɛla bee.
58012001	Emɛ kanran inɛw sɛɛrɛ bemɛ gowaaɲu joo naa joo kɔɔbe anrankulumɔ gin’ emi gɔŋaa gɛlin. Kɔɔ digɛu, kijɛ emi gaanajɛ wooi lee, hakɛ naraan emɛ nɛ tariyɛjɛ gɔ lee emɛ nɛ goonɔti ye, tunmɔ galu jobu giru emɛ nɛ bojaaɲu gɔ muyɔn le jɔbɔmɔi.
58012002	Giri emɛ Yesu bɛrɛ dɛɛrɛ ye bojomɔi. Gagawu emɛ wo nɛ goojɛ, sɛɛu wo kibemɔjɛ. Wo kinɛ ɛɛli wo dɛi bojaaɲu gɔ nɛ giri dɛɛraa sɛbe dɛi, baga jai ɔɲɛ muyɔn ga yabaabe, dɔgɔ wogɔ nɛ too gɔ kijɛi ga lugolu. Kanɛ wo Ama ɔgɔdɔin numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ.
58012003	Hakɛ kanranw wo dɛi be ingilu gɔ aŋai Yesu wo muyɔn gɔ ajubai. Kunrin e ɔɲɔ ye kinɛ yanwan le biyɛidenɛ.
58012004	Sabu hakɛ le kɔmɔ e taajɛ gɔ nɛ, e nimɛ kanran yiun nɛ dɔɔ baa tariyɛli.
58012005	Ama, unrunw unrunmɔ gin’ ei lugaa, tinwinrun ei wo tinwinrun ɔn e naŋaai ma? Wo gi: “Aini ma, Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔi logi gɔ, sɔɔ gailai gin’ yɛnɛnɔu. Wo ui sɔwaajɛ ye, kinɛ uwɔ yanwanmɔnɔu.
58012006	Sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛ wo ibɛ gɔi kɔɔjɛ. Aini womɔi ga inɛ wo lugojɛ puui lagajɛ.”
58012007	Ɔɲɛ gɔ kɔi logi gin’ muyɔin, sabu Ama, unrunw womɔi gin’ ei aa gɛlɛ. Ii wo ba kɔi logi bɛɛlɛ yɔɔ ma?
58012008	Unrunw puu kɔi logi bɛɛɲu gɔ e bɛɛlɛi ye, ei silɛ unrunwin, bama unrunw tɔitɔii laai.
58012009	Emɛ aduna ɔn nɛ banw yasin, be emi kɔwaabɛin dɛi emɛ bei babaabɛin. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emaa ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ emɛ Ba alagala nɛ wɔɔ gɔ le emɛ tubiyeun jaan.
58012010	Emɛ babe aduna nɛ wɔin gɔbe, bana ɛjii wɔɔ ga be ajubaajɛ le kɛukɛu, waaru gaila emi kɔwaabɛin. Kaa Ama emaa bana ɛjaa wo wɔɔ gin’ ɛjaain biyɛ ga, ɛju emɛ dɛi emi kɔɔjɛ.
58012011	Logi waaru inɛi lagaɲu le, baŋa bɛrɛ kinɛ ɛɛlii biyɛɛlɛ, kinɛ jinwin biyɛjɛ. Kaa kɔɔ onu nɛ inɛw kole deeru bɛin gɔbe tinɛ womɔ ihiyeɲu. Wogɔ jamu lee, teitai bii leei.
58012012	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, numɔ baariyaa wɔɔ ebe gɔbe ɛɛnnɛi. Gɔru baariyaa wɔɔ ebe gɔbe nɛ paŋa kunɔi.
58012013	Kubɔ ebe oju demu demu wɔɔ gɔbe nɛ toiyomɔi. Kɔɔ gin’ tegutegenɛ kubɔ lɛɛriyɛidolo, kaa babajado.
58012014	Inɛw wooi le jamu le biyɛ ga, iyaa ɛjaai biyɛ ga mainiyɛin. Sabu ɛjaai wɔlɔ go inɛ turu kanran Inɛw Baŋai iyeidolo.
58012015	Inɛ turu kanran Ama nɛɛma gɔ le onu dulonɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai. Inɛ turu kanran, tiun gaaru gin’ pujo ye, inɛw joo bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanran ye, nurun womɔ gɔ tanuganɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai.
58012016	Inɛ turu kanran salaginɛi ma, Esau gin’ Amai babaalɛ biyɛnɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai. Esau, kubɔ turu pana dɛi diyɛ unrunmɔ dɔnrun.
58012017	Dogo, unrun ba duba gɔ bɛɛdo wo giyaa, wo le yabanɛ ga e igii wɔi. Halu wo giridii le duba gɔ dɛnɛube kanran, sɔɔ womɔ bana kɔɔlɔmɔɲu bɛɛlu.
58012018	Isɛrɛlu unrunw dɔɔin gin’ e Sinayi kokoo tabu bɛɛmɔjɛ genɛ nɛ dɔɔli. Yaun bije womɔ le, ɔlɔ womɔ le, kurugu womɔ le, ooɲɔ simɛ womɔ le, kaan soguru womɔ le, mii paan womɔ le bee gɔ, e wogɔ genɛ nɛ dɔɔli. Isɛrɛlu unrunw mii wogɔ ɛgaa, waja sɔɔ turu kanran unrunbe bɛrɛ ɛgɛmɔnɔu ga amagɛɛn kunaabɛin.
58012020	Sabu “Halu bɛlu kokoo gɔ nɛ tɛmiyaanjɛ ye, tibu le kama daadɛin” ga tɔɔru obin gɔ, be wogɔ gɔnrɔnbenɛ.
58012021	Sɔɔ konɛ bee gɔ bana inɛ liirɛmɔjɛ gɔ gabaai digɛu, Mɔise sɔwaa gi: «Mu ɛjii liyaa, kinwɛunbɔn.»
58012022	Kaa e kokoo genɛ nɛ dɔwaa e wɔɔ gɔ, Siɔn kokoo gɔi. Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ ana, alagala Jerusalɛmu, mɛlɛnkɛ muɲu joo naa joo womɔ le, e wogɔ genɛ nɛ dɔwaa wɔi.
58012023	E unrunw pɔlɔ Ama Kikinu sibɛ go naraanɲu, alagala nɛ boi bemɛ tɔŋi wɔɔ, kinɛ ɛɛli mɔɔnu nɛ dɔwaa wɔi. E Ama, inɛw puu saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ lee, inɛw teitai sɛɛu kibaai bojin kikinube lee genɛ nɛ dɔwaa wɔi.
58012024	Iyaa e Yesu, aaru kana sɔɔ yegerenɛ gɔ lee, ili womɔ miɲi gɔ Abɛlu ili dɛi sigɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ lee genɛ nɛ dɔwaa wɔi.
58012025	Wogɔ digɛu, kuu ebe kajubai. E le sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ baŋa sɔɔ gɔ pogonɔugi. Sabu aduna nɛ, Ama tinwinrun be bɛrɛ oboube sɔɔ inɛw yabanɛ gɔbe, jarugu duiyi nɛ ɛliyɛnɛ. Nɛɛ, alagala nɛ wɔu, emɛ bɛrɛ tinwinrun obojɛ baŋa gɔ, emɛ wo le onu dulaatin ye, emɛ yani ɛliyɛdɛin?
58012026	Waaru kɔɔ le mii womɔ adunai jigemaabe, kaa kanɛ wo emɛ le pui kunaa, “Mu kubɔ turu sai iyaa, adunai sai laa, kaa alagalabei yaa jijigemɔdɔn” gi.
58012027	“Kubɔ turu sai iyaa” wo gi gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ kijɛ maŋaaɲu gɔbe jijigedɛin, mana yaadɛin ga tagarajɛ. Kunrin kijɛ jigeelɛ gɔbe yabiyɛdɛin.
58012028	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ diinɛ jigeelɛi bɛɛɲu digɛu, yogosɛlɛ le biyɛmɔnɔugin. Emɛ birɛpoo tagu le bii ye, Ama kinɛ bana aajɛ gin’ baba le, giri liyɛ le, woi demɛniyɛnmɔmɔi.
58012029	Sabu Ama emɛ gɔ, naran go yaun kijɛ sɛɛu tɛgɛ yamalajɛi.
58013001	Tunmɔi ba unrunw gin’ ibɛɛ bii nɛ giru go yaamɔi.
58013002	Yerunw sɛguru gɔ naŋanɔugi. Gamuu kunrin kanraun, jugɔlu go mɛlɛnkɛbe sɛgɛraabɛin.
58013003	Inɛw kaju toin gɔbe, e be le kaju toi gin’ bei ajubai. Inɛw ɔɲɔmu bɛɛɲu gɔbe, e kanran be gin’ ɔɲɛ nɛ toi gin’ bei ajubai.
58013004	Inɛw wooi, purupagu babai. Iyaa, purupagu teenu lɔgɔjiyaa biyɛmɔnɔu. Sabu Ama salagunw lee, dimudimiyɛnw lee saliyɛ kikiredo.
58013005	Yoiyaara ebe gɔ buudu dadaaru le digɛ biyɛmɔnɔugi, kaa kijɛ e sɛɛ gɔ ei baamɔi. Sabu Ama sɔwaa gi: “Mu u le asuu wageniyɛindolɔn, asuu ui pajaidolɔn.”
58013006	Kodigɛu, emɛ anrangaju le “Inɛw Baŋa Ama mui baranɛi, mu liyɛidolɔn. Inɛ mu bɛrɛ inge kanrun bɛɛdo ma?” gɛɛ bɛbɛɛɲu.
58013007	Ei teeremɔw, Ama sɔɔ e bɛrɛ tagin gɔbei ajubai. Yoiyaara be yai lee, dumɔ bemɛ lee ajubaa ye, gagawu bemɛ deei.
58013008	Yesu Kirisito, yaa lee, iye lee, asuu tunmai.
58013009	Deeru yeru tɔgu dɛin dɛin le ei manamɔnɔugi. Sabu kinɛ emɛ gɔ kayɛrɛ sibɛ go tɔɔru lei laa, kaa Ama nɛɛma le paŋa bɛɛjɛ ye ɛju. Inɛw tɔɔru wogɔbe gɛlin gɔbe, wogɔ nɛ niwɛn turu kanran bɛɛnɛ.
58013010	Sadagadumu emɛ sɛɛ gɔ nɛ guju kuru Ama Ginrun birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, dumu wogɔ sadaga nɛ kuru sɛnɛ.
58013011	Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga obodo giye, arusɛgɛbe ili yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛjɛ. Kaa nawan gɔbe, ana laara nɛ goonaa ye tɛgɛrɛɲu.
58013012	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Yesu kanran, kuu bana womɔ ili le inɛw gɔbe ɛjɛmɔ ga, ana laara nɛ gowaa yinwun.
58013013	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, emɛ ana laara gɔ nɛ, dɔgɔ tunmɔ wo bɛi gɔ duiyaa ye, wo bɛrɛ yaamɔi.
58013014	Sabu ɔn nɛ ana nɛ jaa biyɛɲu emɛ sɛnɛ. Kaa emɛ ana wɛɛido gɔi dɛnɛuwɔin.
58013015	Kodigɛu, Yesu le digɛnu waaru wooi emɛ Ama bɛrɛ woi sɔmu sadaga emɛ obomɔi. Tiyɛ gɔ woi Inɛw Baŋa emɛi ga aŋa le daii sɔɔmɔi.
58013016	Ɛju kanrun lee, kijɛ e sɛɛ tunmɔ le gamulu lee naŋanɔugi. Sabu sadaga wogɔ tunmɔ Ama kinɛ ahaajɛ.
58013017	Ei teeremɔw gɔbe sɔɔ yabai, iyaa be le tubiyei. Ama, kinrun ebe dɛi bei seselumɛdo digɛu, be jaa ei kajubau gɛlin. Birɛ bemɛ kinɛ ɛɛli le birɛ bɛɛ ga sɔɔ bemɛ yabai. Kinɛ jiun le birɛɲu biyɛmɔnɔugi, sabu wogɔ e bɛrɛ niwɛn turu kanran siyɛidolo.
58013018	Emɛ dɛi Ama gɛɛin. Emɛ kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le wɔin ga gawaa wɔin. Iyaa kijɛ puu nɛ emɛ yoiyaara ɛju yai ibɛɛ wɔin.
58013019	Mu ɛjii ɛɛnnaa, e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ bɛrii Ama mui pilemɛ ye e bɛrɛ tii ga Ama gɛɛin.
58013020	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu, pejugirɛnɛ diyɛ gɔ, ili womɔ le aaru sɔgɔjɛ biyɛmaabe dɛi, Ama woi yiun logoro nɛ bulomaabe. Ama, jamu obonɛ gɔ, ebaa diŋɛ womɔ kanran bɛɛ ga, birɛ ɛju wooi birɛ bɛɛ gɔnrɔn e bɛrɛ obo. Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu, kijɛ wo bɛrɛ ɛju emɛ nɛ wo kanranmɔ. Boi sɔmu gɔ asuu nasuu Yesu mɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
58013022	Mu ba unrunw, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ tinwinrun sɔɔ ɔn muyɔn le keŋiyɛin, sabu lɛtɛrɛ mu tɔŋu gɔ dumii wɔɔ.
58013023	Emɛ bainɛ Timɔtei kaju nɛ pajaatin ga igii biyɛi. Wo bɛrii wiyaai ye, mu wo le ei yɛnɛi wɛɛdɔn.
58013024	Ei teeremɔw gɔbe puu lee, Ama inɛw gɔbe lee, bemaa popoo wa. Itali gana jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, ei poonɔuwɔin.
58013025	Ama nɛɛma gɔ e wooi le biyɛ.
59001001	Mu Jake, Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ mui. Ama unrunw aduna yalu wooi nɛ ginaa wɔin gɔbe puu, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Mu ei poonɔuwɔn.
59001002	Ba unrunw mabe, ei subɔrɔ dɛi waaru nau e bɛrɛ dɔwaa ye, wogɔ kinɛ ɛɛlu sɔɔ gin’ lugoi.
59001003	Kunrin, kijɛ kɔɔbe le gagawu ebe subɔraa yɛnaaɲu ye, wogɔ muyɔn ebe bariyɛmɔjɛ ga e igii wɔi.
59001004	Kaa dumɔ gɔ baa, ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin. Kunrin ebaa Yesu jaŋu unrunw kibaain, kijɛ turu kanran e nɛ lugo dɔɔlu biyɛnɔu ga ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin.
59001005	Inɛ turu, logoro ebe nɛ hakilɛ sɛlɛ ye, wo wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn, wo wo bɛrɛ ohobodo. Ama, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ dɔnrun wɔlɔ go, gaai, ihibɛ le ohobojɛ.
59001006	Inɛ hakilɛ sɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa kinɛ lɛilɛi turu kanran sɛlɛ go, gagawu le Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn. Sabu inɛ kinɛ lɛilɛi le wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa nɛudii, ooɲɔ taŋa taŋa bala bala ye yaajɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
59001007	Kɔɔ gin’, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, kinɛ lɛilɛi baŋa gɔ, inɛ kijɛ wo kanranjɛ puu nɛ diyɛ womɔ daanla gɔ, wo Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ kijɛ gɛɛn ye bɛbɛɛdo ma giye ajubanɔu.
59001009	Bainɛ dɛguginɛ gɔ, Ama, kuu womɔ unaajɛ dɛi kinɛ womɔ ɛɛliyɛmɔ.
59001010	Yesu jaŋu ii ɔgɔinɛ gɔ yaa, Ama, kuu womɔ sunugaajɛ dɛi kinɛ womɔ ɛɛliyɛmɔ. Ɔgɔinɛ belu puyo gin’ ɔgu gagalajɛ.
59001011	Sabu nai gowaa, ɔgiyaai ye, belu gɔi mamaaŋiyɛnmɔjɛ, puyo womɔ babagamɔjɛ. Iyaa ɛhɛju womɔ manayaado. Kɔɔ gin’ ɔgɔinɛ yaa, birɛ womɔ nɛ wo tonu, woi oroli ye gagalado.
59001012	Inɛ subɔrɔ tariyaajɛ gɔ, Ama wo yabu. Kɔɔ gin’ pinɛ womɔ yɛnaaɲu onu nɛ, wo, inɛw Ama ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ Ama ɔnmɔsɔgɔ oboido gɔ, wogɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
59001013	Inɛ aai kanran, subɔrɔ nɛ woi yowaai ye, Ama woi suburu ga ajubanɔu. Sabu Ama lee mɔɲu lee jaŋala, iyaa wo inɛ turu kanran suburu ye teitai laa kanranmɔɔlɛ.
59001014	Inɛ tuturu puu, dadaaru mɔɲu womɔ woi biɲaa ye pɛnrɛn nɛ kunaa ye, subɔrɔ nɛ yoojɛ.
59001015	Kɔɔ gin’ dadaaru mɔɲu gɔ bɛrɛ bɛraa ye, hakɛ naranjɛ. Hakɛ gɔ gabiyaa, na taŋa ye, yiun naranjɛ.
59001016	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi.
59001017	Sin obu ɛju naa ɛju wooi lee, sin obu kibaai wooi lee, alagala goo ye wɛɛjɛ. Ama bɛrɛ goo ye wɛɛjɛ. Nai lee, iyepilu lee, tolobe lee maŋanɛ gɔ bɛrɛ goo ye wɛɛjɛ. Ama asuu duliyeelɛ, wo onu dulo ye ɔlɔ nɛ asuu emi pajaidolo.
59001018	Kijɛ wo maŋaabe wooi logoro nɛ emaa dɛnrɛn ii pɔlɔ gin’ biyɛ ga, Ama, diŋɛ womɔ tɔitɔi le, emi naran sɔɔ gɔ le naraanbe.
59001019	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e sɔɔ ɔn jugi biyɛi: Inɛ tuturu puu sɔɔ keŋi nɛ ɔgi biyɛ, kaa sɔɔ sɔi nɛ lee, kinɛbanrun nɛ lee ɔgiriyɛnɔugi.
59001020	Sabu, inɛ kinɛbanrun le wɔɔ gɔ, Ama giru nɛ kijɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ kanraanlɛ.
59001021	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, kijɛ inɛ lɔgɔjiyɛmɔjɛ wooi lee, kanran mɔɲu wooi lee pajutii. E kuu sunugu le Ama, kinɛ ebe nɛ sɔɔ yibaajɛ gɔ le yabai. Sabu wogɔ ei yabu bɛbɛɛdo.
59001022	E, Ama sɔɔ keŋi sai turu nɛ bii ye, kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi. E naran go wogɔ birɛ birɛi.
59001023	Inɛ Ama sɔɔ ɛgaa, wogɔ birɛ birɛɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa inɛ kikinu yɛnu nɛ girupala womɔ bana wɔɔ gɔ tɔitɔi yɛnɛjɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
59001024	Kaa wo unruin yɛnaa kilaai onu nɛ, wo yayaajɛ. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo bana wo bee gɔ ɔgu kɛu naŋayaajɛ.
59001025	Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ Ama tɔɔru kibaai gɔ woi, wogɔ inɛi hɔɔlɔi bobojojɛ. Inɛ Kibɛru Ɛju deeru gɔbe ɛjii dimɛ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ baŋa Kibɛru Ɛju deeru gɔbe naŋaalɛ ye, wo deeru wogɔbe le kɛukɛu birɛ birɛjɛ ye, kɔɔ waaru le inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kijɛ wo kanraindo wooi nɛ duba bɛbɛɛdo.
59001026	Inɛ unrun wa, Ama oju dimɛ ga wɔɔ, kaa ninɛ womɔ karumu kunɔ bɛɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa kuu unrunmɔ lelemɔuwɔ. Ama dimi womɔ gɔ niwɛn sɛlɛ.
59001027	Ama emɛ Ba gɔ, Ama dimi ɛju tɔitɔi ga wo lugojɛ gɔ unwɔ: Laawagunw ɔɲaa wɔin lee, yapanuw ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbe lee kajubu gɔ lee, aduna kijɛ lɔgɔgu pajaatiyaa ye, kuu uwɔ ɛjii gɛli leei.
59002001	Ba unrunw mabe, e, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito, dooro ɔgɔnɛ gɔ le gawaa wɔi. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi inɛw kabu e kunɔu jaanla.
59002002	Kɔɔ gin’, mɔɔnu ebe nɛ inɛ turu, kange numɔsagai numɔ unrunmɔ nɛ kunaa, arugoi ɛju goriyaa wiyaa yowaai ye, iyaa dɔgɔpaganɛ turu, arugoi sɛmɛlɛ goriyaa wiyaa yowaai ye,
59002003	e kɔɔ waaru le, ainɛ ɔgɔinɛ gɔi ɛjii sɛgɛraa ye, turu baŋa wo le gɛgɛɛdo: «Wɛɛ, u yalu ɛju ɔn nɛ dɛinyɛn.» Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ainɛ dɛguginɛ gɔ le gɛgɛɛdo: «U kɔɔ nɛ iŋiyɛn, maa wɛɛ kubɔsɔrɔ ma nɛ dɛinyɛn.»
59002004	E kijɛ e kanranjɛ gɔi iyeuwɔi ma? E logoro ebe nɛ tunmɔi kabu kunɔuwɔi, e inɛw bana e lugojɛ gɔ ajubu mɔɲu le digɛ.
59002005	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii keŋiyɛin: Ama, aduna ɔn nɛ, dɔgɔpaganw gɔbei yɛmaa, bemaa gagawu nɛ ɔgɔ unrunwin biyɛ gi. Iyaa Ama bemaa, inɛw woi ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe dɛi pui kunaa, diinɛ ohobodo wo gi gɔ, wogɔ kɛn balanwin biyɛ gi.
59002006	Kaa, e kai, dɔgɔpaganw gɔbei gailiyɛmɔuwɔi. Inɛw ei ɔɲɔmɔw gɔbe, inɛw ei saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ paŋa le jɛyaanw gɔbe, ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe bei laa ma?
59002007	Inɛw Baŋa ebe boi ɛju e bɛrɛ kunu gɔ yamalanw gɔbe bei.
59002008	“Aŋai kuu uwɔ u ibɛ gin’ u bɔɔnɛi yaa kɔɔ gin’ ibɛi biyɛ.” Ama diinɛ tɔɔru gɔ woi. E Ama Dɔn bana gɛɛjɛ gin’ Tɔɔru wogɔ kanrun ye kikibemɔjɛi ye, e sɔɔ ɛjui kanranjɛi.
59002009	Kaa e inɛw kabu kunɔuwɔi ye, e hakɛ kanraunwɔi. Iyaa, ei Tɔɔru yamalawin dɛi, Tɔɔru gɔ yaa jarugu kuu ebe nɛ sunugouwɔ.
59002010	Sabu inɛ Tɔɔru gɔ puu kanraan, koturu yamalajɛ baŋa gɔ, tɔɔru wajunw gɔbe wooi dɛi jarugu le wɔɔ.
59002011	Kɔɔ gin’ Ama tɔɔraa gi: “Dimu dimiyɛnnɔu.” Ama iyaa tɔɔraa gi: “Inɛi daanɔu.” Nɛɛ, u dimu dimiyɛɛnlɛu, kaa inɛi dadaajɛu ye, u Tɔɔru gɔ puu yamalanɛi biyaau.
59002012	Tɔɔru inɛi hɔɔlɔi bojojɛ gɔ, Ama, tɔɔru wogɔ le kuu ebe nɛ saliyɛ kikirɛdo ga ajubu le bii ye, sɔɔ ebe kunrin sɔɔi, birɛ ebe kunrin birɛi.
59002013	Inɛ, inɛw wajunw amasɔgɔ jugɔlu gɔ, inɛ wogɔ, saliyɛ womɔ Ama bai kireido gɔ, amasɔgɔjugɔ biyɛidolo. Kaa amasɔgɔ jugɔ, saliyɛ kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
59002014	Ba unrunw mabe, inɛ turu unrun gagawu yasɛ gɛɛjɛ, kaa birɛ womɔ le wogɔ tagaraalɛ ye, wogɔ niwɛn ingei sɛɛ? Gagawu womɔ kɔɔ gin’ woi yabu bɛbɛɛdo ma?
59002015	Aiwa, bainɛ turu ma, yasanɛ turu ma, duŋu le ma, giyɛ le wɔɔ biyaai ye,
59002016	kɔɔ gin’ logoro ebe nɛ turu baŋa bemaa, «Jamu le biyɛi, Ama kaali ebe goo, Ama pana ebe tɔɔ» aŋa le sai giyaajɛ ye, e inɛw kɔɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ kai bemɛ kilɛido oboolɛi ye, wogɔ be bɛrɛ inge niwɛin sɛɛ?
59002017	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, gagawu kanran, kuu womɔ le, birɛ gɔbe wɔlɔ ye, woi kijɛ yinwin.
59002018	Kaa, inɛ turu ɔn gin’ sɔwaajɛ ye: «U gagawu yasɛu, mu kai birɛ gɔbe yasɔn. Birɛ wɔlɔ go gagawu uwɔ yani bii bɛɛjɛ ma mu bɛrɛ tagara, kɔɔ waaru le mu gagawu ma, birɛ le u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.
59002019	U Ama koturu sai wɔɔ ga, wogɔ le gawaa wɔu. Aiwa, ɛjii wɔɔ. Wogɔ sɔɔ ɛjui. Jinrunbe kanran wogɔ le gawaa wɔin, iyaa be liyaai ye kikinwɛnɲu.
59002020	U inɛ bomɔginɛ gɔ, birɛ gɔbe wɔlɔ ye, gagawu kijɛ tiyɛ sɛlɛi ga jugɔ ibɛɛ wɔu ma?
59002021	Emɛ tirɛ ainɛ Abarahamu, waaru aini womɔ Isakai sadagadumu gɔ nɛ Ama bɛrɛ sadaga gin’ wo obu le, birɛ womɔ sabu dɛi, Ama woi inɛ teitai wɔɔi ga lugaabe.
59002022	Nɛɛ u iyeuwɔu, Abarahamu, gagawu womɔ lee, birɛ womɔ lee, kubɔ tunmɔ yaabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ Abarahamu gagawu gɔ, birɛ womɔ le digɛu, gagawu kibaai biyaabe.
59002023	Kɔɔ gin’ Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu gɔi kibaai: “Abarahamu, Ama le gawaabe. Gagawu womɔ digɛu, Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe.” Iyaa Ama woi unrun anrungei gi.»
59002024	Aiwa, e nɛɛ iyeuwɔi, Ama, inɛ teitai wɔɔ ga wo lugojɛ gɔ, gagawu womɔ sai dɛi laa, kaa birɛ wo birɛjɛ gɔbe dɛi.
59002025	Rahabu, yaanran dimu le kayaube mɔ gɔ yaa kunrin bii. Waaru tebutebenw Josue tii gɔbei ɛjii sɛgɛraa, bei baraa, oju waja le ana gɔ nɛ bei wo goomu le, birɛ womɔ dɛi woi yaanran teitai ga Ama lugaabe.
59002026	Sabu bana goju, kikinu tolo ye yinwaain wɔɔ gin’, gagawu yaa, birɛ gɔbe wɔlɔ ye yinwaain.
59003001	Ba unrunw mabe, logoro ebe nɛ inɛw joo Ama sɔɔ deerewin biyɛ ga dɛnɛnɔugi. Sabu emɛ jaŋudeerenw gɔbe, Ama saliyɛ kireido gɔ sigɛ le emɛ le nau biyɛdo ga e igii wɔi.
59003002	Emɛ puu kijɛ joo nɛ emi lelelejɛ. Inɛ sɔɔ wo sɔɔjɛ nɛ leleelɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa inɛ kibaai, sabu wo goju womɔ puu yaa sɛɛu gɛli bɛbɛɛdo.
59003003	Emɛ sɔun womaa sɔɔ emɛ yaba ga wɔin ye, emɛ aŋa womɔ nɛ karumu kukunɔɲu: Kɔɔ gin’ emɛ woi yalu emɛ ibɛ puu nɛ jɛyai bɛbɛɛdɛin.
59003004	Iyaa diikoro yɛnɛi: Halu ɛjii gaai wɔɔ kanran, ooɲɔ diyɛ diyɛbe woi damaa yaajɛ kanran, kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ kijɛ kigelemɔɲu dagi le, diikoro jɔbɔmɔnɛ gɔ, yalu wo ibɛ nɛ woi jɛyaajɛ.
59003005	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, ninɛ kanran, goju nɛ yalu dagii, kaa saba diyɛ diyɛ sabajɛ. Yaun dagi bana unu diyɛ tɛgɛjɛ gɔi ajubu yɛnɛi.
59003006	Ninɛ, yaun gin’ wɔɔ. Wo nɛ mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin jowaa wɔɔ. Goju emɛ nɛ yalu turui. Wo goju emɛ puu lɔlɔgɔjiyɛmɔjɛ. Yaun banrun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ le woi tɛŋunaa, ninɛ, aduna nɛ bii emɛ puu nɛ, yaun kunɔjɛ.
59003007	Olunawan tɔgu dɛin dɛinbe lee, sasaabe lee, kijɛ minɛ nɛ bumɔɲu lee, nɛudii iijube lee, Adama unrunw wogɔbe tubiyemu bɛbɛɛɲu, iyaa tubiyemaabɛin.
59003008	Kaa ninɛ kai, inɛ turu kanran woi tubiyemu bɛɛlɛ: Ninɛ kijɛ mɔɲui, tiŋɛ bɛɛmɔɔlɛ, wo dugo inɛ dai le jowaa wɔɔ.
59003009	Emɛ ninɛ le Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Bai sɔsɔmɔɲu, iyaa ninɛ le Ama, unrun le murin inɛw wo maŋaajɛ gɔbei jɛjɛbɛɲu.
59003010	Aŋa tutunmɔ gɔ nɛ duba lee, jebu lee gogoojɛ. Ba unrunw mabe, wogɔ kanraun jaanla.
59003011	Diipujo tutunmɔ nɛ dii ɛɛlu lee, dii gaaru lee goo bɛbɛɛjɛ ma?
59003012	Ba unrunw mabe, gaa na, oliwe ii narun bɛbɛɛdo ma? Iyaa resɛn tiun, gaa ii narun bɛbɛɛdo ma? Kɔɔ gin’, diipujo nɛɛmi wɔɔ nɛ dii ɛɛlu goolɛ.
59003013	Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ hakilɛ lee, jugɔ lee sɛɛ yato ma? Aiwa, inɛ wogɔ baŋa wo hakilɛ lee, sasai lee yasɛ ga bana ɛju womɔ le jugɔmɔ. Iyaa, kijɛ wo kanranjɛ puu kuu sunugu lee hakilɛ lee le kanranjɛ ga jugɔmɔ.
59003014	Kaa kinɛ ebe nɛ ele mɔɲu lee, kuu ma too sɔɔ lee gɛliyaa wɔi ye, e kuu ebe unɔnɔugi. Iyaa, naran gɔ kakalu le tilɛnɔugi.
59003015	Kɔɔ, hakilɛ Ama bɛrɛ daa go goojɛ gɔ woi laa. Kaa aduna hakilɛi, gojunawan hakilɛi, jinrun puu kuu baŋa bɛrɛ goi.
59003016	Sabu yalu ele lee, kuu ma too lee wɔɔ gɔ, yalu wogɔ nɛ giru giru sɔɔ lee, sɔɔ mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee tɛtɛmɛmɔjɛ.
59003017	Kaa, hakilɛ daa go goo ye wɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ laa gɔ ɛjaa wɔɔ. Kɔɔ onu nɛ woi jamu hakilɛi, kaali wɔɔ, inɛ le ɛjii wɔɔ, amasɔgɔjugɔ le jowaa wɔɔ, sɔɔ ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin kanrannɛi, inɛi kabu kunɔɔlɛ, aŋa lɛilɛi sɛlɛ.
59003018	Inɛw jai aŋaranw gɔbe, be jamui toi gin’ tɔɔuwɔin. Kɔɔ gin’ ii be gɛlɛido gɔ, wogɔ ɔnmɔ teitai gɔi.
59004001	Logoro ebe nɛ kɔmɔ lee, jai lee, inge ingelemɔjɛ ma? Dadaaru mɔɲu waaru puu goju ebe nɛ jaiyɛuwɔ gɔbe birɛi laa ma?
59004002	E kijɛ turu daariyaa wɔi, kaa kijɛ wogɔ aŋai kanrun ye bɛɛɲu sɛlɛi. Kɔɔ waaru le e inɛi dadaajɛi. E kijɛ turu dadaaru le wɔi, kaa bana wogɔ bɛɛɲu sɛlɛi. Kɔɔ waaru le jiiru lee, jai lee ihingeledo. Kijɛ e ibɛ gɔ e bɛɛlɛi. Sabu e wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛnlɛi.
59004003	E gɛɛn gɛgɛɛnjɛi, kaa e kijɛ e gɛɛnjɛ bɛɛlɛi. Sabu bana le e gɛɛnjɛ gɔ mɔɲi wɔɔ: E kijɛ e gɛɛnjɛ gɔ dadaaru mɔɲu ebe kai kilɛ dɛi gɛɛnjɛi.
59004004	E, dimudimiyɛnw gin’, inɛw sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋiyɛɛnnɛ gɔbe, aduna ibɛi bii gɔ Ama jaŋunɛi bii ga, e inɛi ma? Inɛ aduna anrungei bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa Ama jaŋunɛi biyɛdo.
59004005	E ajubu ebe nɛ Ama Dɔn gɔ bamai sɔɔjɛ ga wɔi ma? “Ama, kikinu emɛ nɛ wo kunaabe gɔ, kikinu wogɔ ele le wɔɔ.”
59004006	Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, Ama, nɛɛma gɔ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ gaai wɔɔ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Ama, inɛw kuu unrunbemɛ unɔw gɔbe le jajaiyɛjɛ. Kaa inɛw kuu sunugu le wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ nɛɛma ohobojɛ.”
59004007	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e Ama le tubiyei. E, jinrun puu kuu baŋa dɛi ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin, wo jɔbɔ ye e le wagee bibiyɛdo.
59004008	E, Ama le bɛrii biyɛi, wo e le bɛrii bibiyɛdo. E inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe, bana mɔɲu ebe dulomɔi. E inɛw kinɛ lɛilɛi le wɔin gɔbe, kinɛ ebe ɛjɛmɔi.
59004009	Ei inɛw amasɔgɔgunwin ga igii biyɛi. Kinɛjiun le biyɛi, sɔmiyɛin. Mɔmu ebe gɔ pii tanugai. Kinɛ ɛɛlu ebe gɔ kinɛjiun tanugai.
59004010	Inɛw Baŋa giru nɛ kuu ebe sunugoi. Wo kuu ebe uhunɔdo.
59004011	E tunmɔ sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnɔugi, ba unrunw mabe. Inɛ wo bainɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔjɛ gɔ, maa inɛ wo bainɛ saliyɛ kirɛjɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa Tɔɔru dɛi mɔɲu sɔɔuwɔ, Tɔɔru saliyɛi kirɛuwɔ. U Tɔɔru saliyɛ kireuwɔu ye, u waja Tɔɔru sɔɔ yabanɛi laau, kaa saliyɛkirenɛ womɔi biyaau.
59004012	Tɔɔru daananɛ gɔ lee, saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ lee, Ama turu sai. Yabanɛ gɔ lee, susuiyomɔnɛ gɔ lee, Ama turu sai. Nɛɛ u, inɛ waja saliyɛ kirenɛ gɔ, ui aai?
59004013	Nɛɛ, e mui ɛjii keŋiyɛin, e inɛw sɔɔ ɔn gin’ sɔɔnw gɔbe: «Iye ma, yogo ma, emɛ ana diyɛ ɔn nɛ yayaadɛin, emɛ wogɔ nɛ anranguju turu bibiyɛdɛin, emɛ ibɛsoɲu sasaɲadɛin, emɛ kɛɛlɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin.»
59004014	E, yogo kijɛ biyɛido inɛw inin gɔbe! Sabu kinruntaun ebe yagɔ baa wɔɔ ma? Kukumɔ, waaru gaila le iyemaajɛ ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ ɔgu giru emɛ nɛ manayaajɛ gɔ, ei wogɔ le murin wɔɔ.
59004015	Bana e gɛɛun jaan gɔ unwɔ: «Inɛw Baŋa yabaajɛ ye, emi ɔnmɔi biyɛdo, emɛ kijɛ ɔn ma kijɛ kɔɔ ma kakanrandɛin.»
59004016	Kaa kanɛ e kuu ulo le biyaa, e saba sabauwɔi. Kuu ulo kɔɔ tunmɔ ɛjula.
59004017	Inɛ kijɛ ɛju kanraun wo jaan gɔ igii wɔnu kanraanlɛ baŋa, wo hakɛ kanraunwɔ.
59005001	Nɛɛ, ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe, mui ɛjii keŋiyɛin. Mɔɲu e bɛrɛ dɔɔido gɔbe dɛi, mii diyɛ le sɔmiyɛin.
59005002	Arusɛgɛ e sɛɛ gɔbe dodogodo. Sɔi ebe gɔbe peru kakayado.
59005003	Kange e sɛɛ gɔ lee, sarudu e sɛɛ gɔ lee, kɔjɔ uhulodo. Kɔɔ gin’, saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ le kɔjɔ wogɔ e dɛi sɛɛrɛi bibiyɛdo. Kɔjɔ wogɔ yaun gin’ ei tɛgu ye yayamalado. E, waaru dumɔ ɔn le arusɛgɛ balaa mɔɔnaa wɔi.
59005004	Inɛw birɛbirɛnw, minɛ ebe gɛlɛnw gɔbe tujɔ gɔ, e be bɛrɛ oboli. E amasɔgɔ pii bemɛ gɔ keŋiyɛin. Mii bemɛ, Ama kijɛ wooi kuu nɛ daan gɔ suguru nɛ baa yowaai.
59005005	E, aduna ɔn nɛ kijɛ kinɛ ebe aajɛ dadaaru dɛi kɛɛlɛ ebe yamalaabei. Arusɛgɛ, bai woi sɛnwɛindɛin dɛi aŋai ɛjii kayamaaɲu gin’, e, saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ dɛi kuu ebe le ei ɛjii kayamaa, pooniyaan wɔi.
59005006	E, inɛw teitai wɔin gɔbe kuu nɛ jarugu duuraa, bei daabei, be sɔɔ turu kanran saanɛ.
59005007	Ba unrunw mabe, e, Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛido baa, muyɔn le biyɛi. Bana woluwalanɛ, minɛ unrunmɔ nɛ gɛlu ɛju bɛɛ dɛi muyɔn le wo biyɛjɛ gɔi yɛnɛi: Anrandii pɔlɔ gɔ sugu gowaa, anrandii dumɔ gɔ sugoido baa, wo muyɔn le bii ye dɔdɔmiyɛnjɛ.
59005008	E kanran muyɔn le biyɛi. Anrangaju le biyɛi. Sabu Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛgu gɔ bɛrii wɔɔ.
59005009	Ba unrunw mabe, Ama womaa saliyɛ ebe kirɛnɔu ga, e tunmɔ dɛi guguun guunnɔugi. Yɛnɛi, saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ wagela. Wo murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ kohiŋɛn.
59005010	Ba unrunw, e inɛw Ama titiyaanw Ama dɛi sɔɔ sɔwaabɛin gɔbei ajubu yɛnɛi. Ɔɲɛ bemɛ gɔ lee, muyɔn bemɛ gɔ lee deei.
59005011	Emɛ, inɛw muyɔn muyɔnw gɔbe Ama be yabu gɛɛuwɔin. E Jɔbu muyɔn muyaanbe gɔ sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaabei. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, dumɔ gɔ bana Jɔbui duba wo kanraanbe gɔ igii wɔi. Sabu Inɛw Baŋa amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, ɛhɛju lee le jowaa wɔɔ.
59005012	Sigɛ le, ba unrunw, e kuu ebe jɛbiyɛnɔugi. E alagala le ma, minɛ le ma, bana waja turu le kanran kuu ebe jɛbiyɛnɔugi. Kaa Ama, jarugu, kuu ebe nɛ sunugonɔu ga, «ee» ebe ee biyɛmɔi, «ai» ebe ai biyɛmɔi.
59005013	Inɛ turu logoro ebe nɛ ɔɲɛ le wɔɔ ye, wo Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn. Inɛ turu kinɛ ɛɛlu le wɔɔ ye, birɛpoo tagu nii wo niiu jaain wɔɔ.
59005014	Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu jijinwɛnjɛ biyaai ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw gɔbe boonaa ye, kuu womɔ nɛ nii paraaɲu onu nɛ, wo dɛi Inɛw Baŋa boi le Ama be gɛɛnmɔ.
59005015	Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, gɛɛn bemɛ sasaado ga, wogɔ le gawaa wɔin ye, inɛ jiunginɛ gɔi babajado. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛ kɔɔ bɛrɛ jamu ohobodo. Wo hakɛ kanraanbe ye, Ama woi yaabu kakanrando.
59005016	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e tunmɔ bɛrɛ hakɛ ebe tagai. Ei baja dɛi, e tunmɔ dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛin. Inɛ teitai wɔɔ amagɛɛn gɔ, gɔnrɔn diyɛ yasɛ.
59005017	Eli inɛ emɛ gin’ beei: Wo anran miinɔu ga, amagɛɛn nɛ ɛjii mainiyaanbe. Kɔɔ gin’, anranguju taanu lee pɛjɛrɛ lee, minɛ nɛ anrandii sugolu.
59005018	Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo iyaa lee Ama gɛnyaanbe. Anran miyaanbe. Dɛnrɛn ilaabe.
59005019	Ba unrunw mabe, logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu lelaa, naran oju gɔ pajaa wo tiyaa, bainɛ waja inɛ wogɔi naran oju gɔ nɛ pilemaa jɛɛlaajɛ ye,
59005020	e igii biyɛi, inɛ, inɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ turu oju mɔɲu wo tobe gɔ nɛ goonɔjɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa inɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ gɔ kikinu gɔi yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ yabauwɔ. Iyaa, hakɛ joo naa joo yaabu kakanrandɛin.
60001001	Mu Piɛru, Yesu Kirisito jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, e, Ama inɛw yɛmu, aduna ɔn nɛ yerunwin wɔin gɔbe, inɛw Rɔmɛ laamu, Pɔn lee, Galasi lee, Kapadɔse lee, Asi lee, Bitini lee numɔ nɛ ginaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn.
60001002	Ebaa Yesu Kirisito sɔɔ yaba ga, ili womɔ le ei ɛjɛmɔ ga, Ba Ama pɔɔlɔ baa sɔɔ bibiyɛdo ga wo kɛju gɔ le kɛukɛu ei yɛmi. Iyaa Kikinu womɔ gɔnrɔn le ei Ama tɔgu dɛiin bojaaɲui digɛu ei yɛmi. Ama, nɛɛma lee, jamu lee ei gaai obo.
60001003	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, iyaa wo Ba gɔi sɔmɔmɔi. Amasɔgɔjugɔ diyɛ womɔ sabu dɛi, Yesu Kirisitoi yiun nɛ bulogu gɔ le digɛu Ama emi pilemaa narun. Emɛ kunrin diyɛdɔn ɔnmɔ gɔ yasin.
60001004	Iyaa Ama, inɛw womɔ dɛi kɛn maŋaa sɛɛ gɔ, wogɔ bɛɛ ga emɛ kinɛ ɔgu le wɔin. Wo wogɔ e dɛi alagala nɛ gɛliyaa wɔɔ. Wogɔbe, arusɛgɛ asuu yanwaannɛbei, lɔgɔjiyɛɛnɛbei, kumujiyeenɛbei.
60001005	Yayabu, waaru dumɔ gɔ le jugɔmɔidɛin ga kanɛ baa yegeraaɲu gɔ, yayabu wogɔ bai e bɛɛido baa, e inɛw gagawu ebe dɛi Ama, gɔnrɔn unrunmɔ le gɛlɛ gɔbe, e dɛi Ama kijɛ ɛju wogɔbe alagala nɛ bojaa sɛɛ.
60001006	Halu kanɛ waaru gaila le, subɔrɔ tɔgu dɛin dɛin dɛi kinɛ ebe jijinwɛndo bibiyɛ kanran, e kijɛ ɛju wogɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔuwɔi.
60001007	Subɔrɔ kɔɔbe, gagawu ebe pinɛ yɛnɛdɛin ga e bɛrɛ dɔɔuwɔ. Kange, halu pinɛ womɔ yaun nɛ yɛyɛnɛɲu kanran, woi kijɛ sɔgɔɔlɛi. Kunrin, gagawu ebe gaai kange dɛi ire wɔɔ gɔ yaa, yagɔ baa ɛɛn ma jugɔ ga, pinɛ womɔ yɛyɛnɛɲu. Kɔɔ gin’ e boi sɔmu lee, dooro lee, baba lee, Yesu Kirisito waaru unruin wo tagaraido gɔ le bɛbɛɛdei.
60001008	Halu e woi iyetɛnɛ kanran woi ibɛɛ wɔi. Halu e kanɛ woi iyeuwɔnɛ kanran, e wo le gawaa wɔi. E kɔɔ sabu dɛi kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ naa diyɛ le wɔi. Kinɛ ɛɛlu gɔ bana gaa gɔ aŋa le sɔi bɛɛmɔɔlɛ.
60001009	Sabu e kijɛ dɛi gawaa e wɔɔ gɔi bɛɛuwɔi: Wogɔ kikinu ebe yayabu gɔ woi.
60001010	Yayabu kɔɔ sɔɔ dɛi, inɛw Ama titiyaanw denu dɛnaabɛin, selumu selumaabɛin. Iyaa, be Ama e bɛrɛ nɛɛma oboido gɔ dɛi sɔɔ wɛɛido sɔwaabɛin.
60001011	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe nɛ Kirisito Kikinu tobe gɔ, Kirisito ɔɲɛ iyeido sɔɔ lee, kɔɔ onu nɛ dooro wo bɛɛido sɔɔ lee, giru nɛ baa sɔwaatiyaabɛin. Waaru yagɔ le ma, bana inge le ma biyɛdo ma ga, be mainiyaan jugɔ ibɛɛ bɛin.
60001012	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɔɔ taga ga sagu duurin gɔ, wogɔ kuu bemɛ dɛi laa, kaa e dɛi ga Ama be bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe. Sɔɔ wogɔ, kanɛ inɛw Kibɛru Ɛju waaju taganw gɔ le digɛu e bɛrɛ tagaaɲu. Be Kikinu Pilu alagala gowaa tiin gɔ gɔnrɔn le sɔɔ gɔ tagaabɛin. Halu mɛlɛnkɛbe kanran wogɔ paamu kanran ga daariyaabɛin.
60001013	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi yeguru le biyɛi, hakilɛ kunɔi. Kuu ebe ɛjii gɛliyɛi. Yesu Kirisito waaru unruin wo tagaraido gɔ le nɛɛma e bɛrɛ oboidɛin gɔ, diyɛ ebe sɛɛu wogɔ nɛ daanai.
60001014	E, Ama sɔɔ le yabawin biyɛi. Pɔlɔ pɔlɔ, Amai jugɔlu ebe waaru le dadaaru e sɛbe gɔbe le biyɛnɔugi.
60001015	Ama ei boonɔnɛ gɔ bana ɛjaa wɔɔ gin’, kijɛ e kanranjɛ wooi nɛ e yaa ɛjaai biyɛi.
60001016	Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “E ɛjaai biyɛi, sabu mu ɛjaa wɔun.”
60001017	Inɛwin kabu kunɔlu go, inɛ tuturu, birɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu saliyɛ womɔ Ama kirenɛ gɔ, woi e Bai ga wo bɛrɛ gɛɛnjɛi ye, iyɛru nɛ waaru e wɔɔ le e Ama giri liyɛ le biyɛi.
60001018	Nɛɛ, e tirɛ anranw oju niwɛn sɛlɛ ei be deeraabe gɔ nɛ inge le ei dɔrugaabɛin ma e igii wɔi. Kijɛ yanwanjɛ, sarudu ma, kange ma gin’ le kai ei dɔrugɔnɛ.
60001019	Kaa Kirisito ili dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ le ei dɔrugaabɛin. Kirisito, wo peju ii jiun sɛlɛ ma, lɔgɔ ma tolo gin’ biyaabe.
60001020	Ama, Kirisito gɔi aduna maŋamɔ nɛ yɛmaabe. Iyaa kanɛ waaru dumɔ ɔn le, Ama, ɛju ebe dɛi woi daii tagaraabe.
60001021	Ama, Kirisitoi yiun nɛ bulugaa, dooro wo bɛrɛ obonɛ gɔ, e Kirisito wogɔ le digɛu wo le gawaa wɔi. Kunrin gagawu ebe gɔ lee, diyɛdɔn ebe gɔ lee, Ama nɛ bojaa sɛi.
60001022	Gagawu nɛ e ba unrunw gɔbei kinɛpilu le ibɛɛ biyɛ ga, e naran gɔ le yabu le digɛu kinɛ ebe ɛjɛmaabei. Kodigɛu e tunmɔi kinɛ ebe wooi le, ɛjii ibɛɛ biyɛi.
60001023	Ama sɔɔ ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ asuu wɔɔ gɔ le digɛu ei pilemaa naraanɲu. Ei narannɛ gɔ inɛ yinwɛnjɛi laa, wo asuu yɔɔ.
60001024	Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Adama unrunw puu belu gin’ wɔin, daula bemɛ olu belu puyo gin’ wɔɔ. Belu mamaaŋiyɛnjɛ, puyo womɔ babagajɛ.
60001025	Kaa, Inɛw Baŋa Ama sɔɔ gɔ asuu sɔsɔgɔjɛ.” Sɔɔ wogɔ Kibɛru Ɛju, sɔɔ e bɛrɛ tagu gɔ woi.
60002001	Kɔɔ dɛi, e, mɔmɔɲu wooi lee, nabara wooi lee, iyaa aŋa lɛilɛi lee, ele lee, inɛw mɔɲu sɔɔ sɔi puu lee pajai.
60002002	Ibanrin kanɛ naraanɲu bana wo na iru daariyɛjɛ gin’, iru koro kikinugu lɔgɔ tolo dadaaru gɔ ei aamɔi. E wogɔ nɔwaan ye, kole digɛnu ei gagabiyɛdo, ei yayabadɛin.
60002003	Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “E Inɛw Baŋa Ama yagɔ baa ɛjii wɔɔ ma maraan yɛnaabei.”
60002004	Inɛw Baŋa genɛ nɛ dɔɔi. Woi tibu ɔnmɔ inɛw kamaa pajin gɔi, kaa Ama tibu maai wɔɔi ga yɛmaabe gɔi.
60002005	E yaa tibu ɔnmɔi wɔin gin’ bii ye, Inɛw Baŋa womaa ei jeɲɛ ye ginrun kikinugu e le ujɔ ga genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔɔi. E ginrun wogɔ kɔlɔ nɛ inɛw Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw dɛiin bojaaɲui bibiyɛdei. Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu sadaga Ama Kikinu le digɛ Ama bɛrɛ dɔdɔɔnɔdei, wogɔ Ama yayabajɛ.
60002006	Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋi: “Yɛnɛ, ginrun sibɛ tibu maai wɔɔ gɔ yɛmaa mu Siɔn nɛ duunaajɔn. Kaa, inɛ wo le gawaajɛ gɔ, wo asuu dɔgɔ iyeidolo.”
60002007	E inɛw Kirisito le gawaa wɔin gɔbe, e bɛrɛ tibu gɔ gaai maai wɔɔ. Kaa inɛw wo le gawanɛ gɔbe dɛi Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gin: “Ginrun ujɔnw tibu kamaa pajin gɔ, tibu wogɔ, ginrun sibɛ tibu gɔ woi bii.”
60002008	Iyaa Ama Dɔn yalu waja nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Wogɔ tibu inɛw kubɔ tomɔmɔjɛ gɔ woi, dumɔ bei numɔmɔjɛ gɔi.” Be Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ gɔ le yabanɛ dɛi kubɔ bemɛ tomi. Ama pɔɔlɔ baa kunrin biyɛdo ga sɔwaa galaai.
60002009	Kaa ei tɔgu yɛmaaɲui. Ei Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw, Ama ɔgɔnɛi wɔɔ gɔ birɛbirɛnwin. Ei tɔgu Ama unrun dɛi dɛiin bojaa sɛɛi. Iyaa ei tɔgu Ama mɔi wɔɔi. Ama ɔlɔ nɛ ei goonaa, wijɛ womɔ kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ doorojɛ gɔ nɛ ei jɛɛlɛnɛ gɔ birɛ ɛju naa ɛju gɔbe ebaa inɛw wooi bɛrɛ taga ga, wogɔ dɛi ei yɛmi.
60002010	Pɔɔlɔ e Ama tɔgui laai bei, kaa kanɛ ei Ama tɔgui. Pɔɔlɔ, Ama, amasɔgɔ ebe jugɔlu bee, kaa kanɛ amasɔgɔ ebe jugaaɲu.
60002011	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, ei aduna ɔn nɛ yerunwin, ei oju galanwin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, e dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ ebe nɛ goojɛ, kikinu ebe le jaiyɛjɛ gɔ dɛi kuu ebe gɛliyɛi.
60002012	Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe giru nɛ bana ebe ɛjii biyɛmɔi. Kunrin, halu be ei jaaraa, ebaa mɔɲu kanranwin giyaaɲu kanran, be waajibi kanran ɛju ebe gɔ ihiyedɛin. Iyaa bai Ama saliyɛ kirei wɛɛido gɔ le, be Ama boi sɔsɔmɔdɛin.
60002013	Inɛw Baŋa dɛi, e aduna paŋagunw wooi le tubiyei: Ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ, kijɛ puu kuui wɔɔ gɔ lee,
60002014	sɛmɛgunw lee, inɛw mɔɲu kanranw gɔbei mɔɲii tujɔ ga, ɛju kanranw gɔbei sɔmɔ ga, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ bei tii.
60002015	Ama diŋɛ gɔ unwɔ: Kanran ɛju ebe gɔbe le, bomɔgunw jugɔ sɛlɛ le sɔɔ sɔɔnw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔɲu bɛɛmɔnɔugi.
60002016	E hɔɔlɔnw gin’ biyɛi. Kaa hɔɔlɔi bii ebe gɔ kijɛ mɔɲu dɛbu gɛlii biyɛmɔnɔugi, Ama birɛbirɛnw gin’ biyɛi.
60002017	E inɛw puui babai: Gagawu nɛ e ba unrunw gɔbei ibɛɛ biyɛi, Ama giri liyɛi, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔi babai.
60002018	Gunɔw gɔbe, e baba wooi le e baŋabe le tubiyei. Baŋa ɛju gɔbe, kinɛ ɛju le wɔin gɔbe sai laa, halu baŋa nau gɔbe le kanran tubiyei.
60002019	Halu ɔɲɛ gɔ wo le jaanla bee kanran, Ama kinɛ aamɔ dɛi, inɛ ɔɲɛ muyaanjɛ ye, wogɔ Ama giru nɛ sɔɔ ɛjui.
60002020	Mɔɲu e kanrun dɛi ei lagaaɲu ye, e wogɔ muyaanjɛi giye wogɔ dɛi ei sɔmɔ ga wɔi ma? Kaa ɛju e kanrun dɛi ei ɔɲɔmaaɲu ye, e wogɔ muyaanjɛi ye, Ama giru nɛ wogɔ sɔɔ ɛjui.
60002021	Kijɛ dɛi Ama ei boonu gɔ yaa kɔɔ woi. Sabu Kirisito, kuu womɔ le e dɛi ɔɲaabe. Ebaa kubɔnami unrunmɔ dimiyɛn ga, wo giru tagurui biyaabe.
60002022	Wo hakɛ turu kanran kanrantɛlu. Iyaa, aŋa womɔ nɛ nabara sɔɔ wo goou inɛ turu kanran ɛgɛtɛlu.
60002023	Waaru woi be duyɔ le, wo duyaa tujɔlu. Inɛw waaru woi ɔɲɔmi le, wo bei ɔɲɔmu tujɔdo gɛɛlu. Kaa teitai le Ama saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ numɔ nɛ sɔɔ unrunmɔ pajaabe.
60002024	Emaa hakɛ sibɛ go inɛw yinwin bii ye, emaa teitai gɔ dɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, Kirisito goju womɔ le ɔɲɔu, kuu womɔ le baga jai nɛ hakɛ emɛ duiyaabe. Woi be lagu gɔ dɛi ei bajaai.
60002025	E peju manaayaabɛin gin’ bei. Kaa kanɛ, kikinu ebe girɛnɛ lee, kikinu ebe gɛliyɛnɛ gɔ lee bɛrɛ ei pilemaa jɛɛlaaɲu.
60003001	E kanran, yaanw gɔbe, e igɛbe le e tubiyeun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ bana ɛju ebe le digɛnu igɛnw gamuu Ama sɔɔ le gawanɛ ye, inɛw gawaa wɔin bibiyɛdɛin. Kunrin e sɔɔ sɔi kai siyɛidelei.
60003002	Sabu bana ebe gɔ aŋai ɛjii wɔɔ lee, aŋai baba sɛɛ gɔ lee, be ihiyeɲu.
60003003	Saŋa saŋi ebe bain saŋa saŋi biyɛmɔnɔugi: Kuu ɛru sigɛ le ma, kange dugɔi ma, sɔi dɔnrun diyɛ e goriyeido ma nɛ hakilɛ ebe bojonɔugi.
60003004	Kaa saŋa saŋi ebe gɔ kinɛ ebe kɔlɔ nɛ saŋa saŋiyaan wɔi biyɛmɔi. Saŋa saŋi wogɔ asuu bibiyɛdo, wogɔ kinɛ kuu sunugu sɛɛ, kaali wɔɔ nɛ goi. Wogɔ Ama giru nɛ kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ ɛjii wɔɔ.
60003005	Pɔɔlɔ yaanw Ama giri liyɛnw, Ama nɛ diyɛ bemɛ daanaa bɛin gɔbe, be kɔɔ gin’ unrunbei saŋaraunbɛin.
60003006	Sara kunrin bee. Wo Abarahamu sɔɔ yabaa, woi unrun baŋai ga boonɔube. E ɛju kanranjɛi ye, iyaa kijɛ turu nɛ kanran kinɛ ebe yanwaanlɛ ye, ei Sara unrunw yaanwin.
60003007	E igɛnw gɔbe, e kanran bana ɛju le yaanw ebe le biyɛi. Be e gin’ gɔnrɔn sɛnɛ ga paamai. Kunrin be sibɛ go baba le biyɛi. Sabu Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi ɔnmɔ wo obojɛ gɔ, e wooi bɛrɛ tunmɔ go obojɛ. Kijɛ turu kanran amagɛɛn ebe tɛŋɛnɔu ga, e kɔɔ gin’ kanrain.
60003008	Kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, e wooi sɔɔ turu gɔ le biyɛi. E tunmɔ amasɔgɔ jugɔi. Ba unrunw gin’ tunmɔi ibɛɛ biyɛi. Tunmɔ le kinɛ ɛju le biyɛi. Tunmɔ le kuu sunugu le biyɛi.
60003009	Inɛ mɔɲu kanrannɛ gɔi mɔɲu le tujɔnɔugi, maa inɛ duyɔ duyɔnɛ gɔi duyɔ le tujɔnɔugi. Kaa be dɛi Ama boi booi. Sabu waaru Ama ei boonu le wo ei duba kanrando ga boonu.
60003010	Sabu Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Inɛ, aduna kayi ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, inɛ, bai ɛju iye ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, mɔɲu dɛi ninɛ womɔ ai gɛliyɛ, nabara sɔɔ dɛi aŋa womɔ ai gɛliyɛ.
60003011	Wo mɔɲu kanrun le onu kigelemaatiyaa ye, ɛju kanran. Wo jamu dɛnɛ, wogɔ onu nɛ digiyɛ.
60003012	Sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama, giri unrunmɔ inɛw teitai wɔin bɛrɛ dɛɛraa wɔɔ, wo gɛɛn bemɛ keŋiyɛunwɔ. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa Ama, mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe le jajaiyɛjɛ.”
60003013	Ɛju kanrun dɛi e saii mainiyɛunwɔi ye, inɛ aa e bɛrɛ mɔɲu kakanrando ma?
60003014	Kaa halu teitai dɛi ei ɔɲɔmɔdɛin kanran, Ama e yabu. E, inɛw giri liyɛnɔugi. Iyaa kikinu manu le biyɛnɔugi.
60003015	Kaa, Kirisitoi kinɛ ebe nɛ babai, woi Inɛw Baŋa ebei ga jugɔi. Diyɛdɔn le e wɔɔ tiyɛ gɔ inɛ aai kanran e bɛrɛ selumaajɛ ye, e waaru wooi inɛ wogɔ aŋa saa ga yeguru le biyɛi.
60003016	Kaa e wogɔ tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le, iyaa baba le kanrain. Waaru ei mɔɲu kanranwin giyaa ei jaaraaɲu, ei Kirisito mɔi digɛu bana ɛju le e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, inɛw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnw gɔbe bemaa sɔɔ bemɛ dɛi dɔgɔ le biyɛ ga, e kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le biyɛi.
60003017	Ama diŋɛi ye, kanran mɔɲu dɛi ɔɲɛ bɛɛ dɛi, kanran ɛju dɛi ɔɲɛ bɛɛ ire.
60003018	Sabu Kirisito, kuu unrunmɔ le hakɛ ebe dɛi kubɔ turu sai yinwaan kilaai bii. Ei Ama genɛ nɛ jɛyaa ga, wo inɛ teitai bee gɔ, inɛw teitai laain dɛi yinwun. Inɛw, Kirisito goju gɔi daabɛin, kaa Ama, Kikinu unrunmɔ le digɛu yiun nɛ woi bulomaabe.
60003019	Wo Kikinu wogɔ le, kikinu pɔɔlɔ Ama sɔɔ yabanɛ kanrin, kaju nɛ toin gɔbe bɛrɛ waaju tagai yaabe. Wogɔ Nɔwe waaru le, Ama waaru muyaan bee gɔ le, diikoro diyɛ gɔ waaru yegereubɛin gɔ le bii. Diikoro wogɔ nɛ inɛw lugo gaila, tiyɛ gɔ inɛw gagara sai dii nɛ yabaabɛin.
60003021	Dii wogɔ, batise kanɛ ei yabajɛ gɔ sɛɛrɛi bee. Batise wogɔ goju lɔgɔ goonɔ dɛi laa, kaa Ama giru nɛ kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ pui kunu sɔɔi. Batise wogɔ, Yesu Kirisito, yiun nɛ wo bulu gɔ dɛi ei yabajɛ.
60003022	Yesu Kirisito alagala ulaa, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ daan. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe lee, alagala paŋagunw gɔbe lee, alagala sɛmɛgunw gɔbe lee, wo le tubiyaa wɔin.
60004001	Kunrin Kirisito, ɔɲɛ iyaabe dɛi, e kanran, wo gin’ ɔɲɛ bɛɛ ga yeguru le biyɛi. Sabu inɛ goju ɔɲɛ iyaajɛ gɔ, woi hakɛ le kabiyaa kilaai.
60004002	Nɛɛ, e kanɛ baa, aduna nɛ bai e bɛrɛ wajaai gɔ wooi, inɛw dadaaru mɔɲu gin’ laa, kaa Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu biyɛi.
60004003	E pɔɔlɔ, inɛw Ama inin gɔbe kijɛ kanrun ibiin gɔbe kanraun tanwaanbei. Nɛɛ kɔɔ baa wɔɔ. E kuu sɛlɛ lee, dadaaru mɔɲu lee, kɔɲɔ le bimili lee, yɔgɔrɔ mɔɲu lee, mɔrin ye kijɛ nɔi gabu lee, ɔmɔlɔ bulu tuutaaɲu gɔ lee, wogɔbei kanraunbei.
60004004	Nɛɛ kanɛ, inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, e be le mɔrinyaan ye yanwan mɔɲu naa mɔɲu kɔɔbe kanraanlɛ e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, be bɛrɛ maunɛ wɔɔ, iyaa ei duduyɔɲu.
60004005	Inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe lee, inɛw yinwaain gɔbe lee saliyɛ kiredo ga, Ama unruin yegeraa wɔɔ gɔ, kijɛ be kanrun gɔbe bei seselumɛdo.
60004006	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, inɛw yiunbe bɛrɛ kanran tagaabɛin. Inɛw puu saliyɛ bana kireɲu gin’, waaru ɔnmɔi be bee le inɛw saliyɛ bemɛ kirin gɔbe, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ be bɛrɛ tagin. Kunrin, bemaa Ama bana kikinui wɔɔ gin’ kikinu sibɛ go ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ be bɛrɛ tagin.
60004007	Kijɛ puu dogogu gɔ bɛruniyaain. Kɔɔ digɛu Ama gɛɛn bɛɛ ga, e hakilɛ ebe daanaa ye, kuu ebe ɛjii gɛliyɛi.
60004008	Kijɛ wooi dɛi sigɛ tunmɔi ɛjii ibɛɛ bii gɔ kinɛ ebe nɛ kunɔi. Sabu ihibɛ, hakɛ joo naa joo yaabu kakanranjɛ.
60004009	E guguun wɔlɔ go, tunmɔ bɛrɛ ginrun sugo oboi.
60004010	Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ tuturu Ama sin obu dɛin wo bɛrɛ obu gɔ kajubanɛi ɛjui wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa sin obu dɛin wo bɛi gɔ inɛw puu kai kili biyɛmɔ.
60004011	Kijɛ wooi nɛ baba gɔ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu Ama mɔi biyɛmɔ ga, inɛ waaju taganɛ gɔ, Ama sɔɔ gɔ inɛw bɛrɛ saanau jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa inɛ inɛw wajunw baranɛ gɔ, Ama wo bɛrɛ paŋa obojɛ gɔ le wo birɛun jaain wɔɔ. Boi sɔmu lee, gɔnrɔn lee, asuu nasuu Yesu Kirisito mɔi. Amina.
60004012	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, subɔrɔ nau e bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ gɔ, kijɛ yeru gin’ bojo ye, maunɛ biyɛnɔugi.
60004013	Kaa, waaru Kirisito dooro tagaraidɛin gɔ le ebaa kanran kinɛ ɛɛlu le joo ye biyɛ ga, e wo gin’ ɔɲɛ iyaabei dɛi, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi.
60004014	Ei Kirisito jaŋu unrunwin dɛi ei duyaaɲu ye, Ama e yabu, sabu dooro Kikinu, Ama Kikinu gɔ, e le wɔɔ.
60004015	Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ turu kanran, inɛ daanɛi ma, gugunyɔnnɛi ma, mɔɲu kanrannɛi ma, inɛ waja sɔɔ nɛ aŋa womɔ kunɔnɛi ma gin’ bii ye ɔɲɛ woi bɛɛmɔnɔu.
60004016	Kaa inɛ tuturu wooi, Kirisito inɛi dɛi ɔɲɛ iyeuwɔ ye, wo kɔɔ dɛi dɔgɔ le biyɛnɔu. Kaa, Kirisito inɛi wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi wo Ama boi sɔmɔ.
60004017	Sabu saliyɛ kiru tɔlɔgu gɔ dɔwaai. Ama ginrun gonɔ maranw gɔbe saliyɛ laa kiredɛin. Nɛɛ, saliyɛ kiru gɔ kuu emɛ nɛ laa tɔlɔdo ye, inɛw Ama bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju goi gɔ le yabanɛ gɔbe le bana yagɔ le dogodo?
60004018	Ama Dɔn bana sɔɔjɛ gin’: “Inɛw teitai gɔbe yaba ga nawin wɔɔ ye, inɛw Amai babanɛ, hakɛ kanranw gɔbe mɔ yani biyɛdo?”
60004019	Kɔɔ gin’, inɛw Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu ɔɲɔuwɔin gɔbe, birɛ ɛju kanrun gɔ be digiyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Be iyaa Maŋanɛ, sɔɔ turu baŋa gɔ nɛ sagu bemɛ sɛɛu be duurɔun jaain wɔɔ.
60005001	Mu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na gɔ, nɛɛ mu, e inɛw Ama inɛw mɔɔnu logoro nɛ inɛw nawin wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn. Mui Kirisito ɔɲɛ sɛɛrɛi. Mu iyaa dooro jugɔmɔidɛin gɔ nɛ gamulu ma bɛbɛɛdɔn. Inɛw naw gɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ mu gɛɛjɛ unwɔ:
60005002	E pejugirɛnw gin’, Ama peju kulɔ e bɛrɛ sagu duuru gɔi ɛjii kajubai. Kinɛ aalu lei laa, kaa Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu, kinɛ ɛju le woi kajubai. Kɛɛlɛ bɛɛ sai dɛi kanrannɔugi, kaa kuu ebe obaa ye kanrain.
60005003	Inɛw e bɛrɛ gawaraaɲu gɔbei paŋa tagaranɔugi, kaa peju kulɔ gɔ giru nɛ, giru taguru ɛjubei biyɛi.
60005004	Kɔɔ gin’, waaru pejugirɛnw Kuu Baŋa unruin tagaraido, e dooro ɔgɔdomɔ kɔɔlɔɔlɛ gɔ bɛbɛɛdei.
60005005	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, e sagatara unrunw gɔbe, inɛw e dɛi gaain gɔbe le tubiyei. E wooi puu kuu sunugu le bii ye tunmɔ kai kilɛi. Sabu Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Ama, inɛw kuu unrunbemɛ unɔw gɔbe le jajaiyɛjɛ, kaa inɛw kuu sunugu le wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ nɛɛma ohobojɛ.”
60005006	Ama waaru kɛjɛido gɔ le womaa kuu ebe unɔ ga, e kɔɔ dɛi Ama numɔ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ gɔ doɲu nɛ kuu ebe sunugoi.
60005007	Diyɛdai ebe wooi kuu womɔ nɛ duurɔi, sabu wo mai ebe yasɛ.
60005008	E kuu ebe ɛjii gɛliyɛi, giri yemɛi. Jaŋunɛ ebe, jinrun puu kuu baŋa gɔ, yara durojɛ gin’, inɛ wo tɛnwɛindo bɛɛ ga gɔŋɔlɔuwɔ.
60005009	Gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go bii ye wo le jaiyɛi. Sabu gagawu nɛ e ba unrunw aduna yalu wooi nɛ wɔin gɔbe ɔɲɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ bɛɛuwɔin ga e igii wɔi.
60005010	Kaa waaru gaila ei ɔɲaai onu nɛ, nɛɛma wooi obonɛ Ama gɔ, Kirisito le ebaa dooro sɔgɔ womɔ nɛ yoo ga ei boonaajɛ baŋa gɔ, wo tunmi ei titibemɔdo, ei ɛɛn go ihiŋiyɛnmɔdo, paŋa ei ohobodo, bɔlɔtei ɛju nɛ ei dadaanado.
60005011	Gɔnrɔn gɔ asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
60005012	Lɛtɛrɛ dumi ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔ tii ga Silasu mui baraabe. Mu, woi bainɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai ga lugaa wɔun. Mu ei anrangaju obu ibɛɛ wɔun. Iyaa e bɛrɛ daii tagauwɔn, Ama nɛɛma tɔitɔi gɔ kunrin wɔɔ. E wogɔ nɛ ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin.
60005013	Babilɔnɛ ana nɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu e gin’ Ama yɛmu gɔ ei poonɔuwɔ. Maruka, ii ma kanran ei poonɔuwɔ.
60005014	E Ama inɛw gin’ tunmɔi ihibɛ le poonɔi. E inɛw Kirisito mɔi wɔin gɔbe puu, jamu e le biyɛ.
61001001	Mu Piɛru, Yesu Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛ, jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu womɔ gɔ, e inɛw Yesu Kirisito, Ama emɛi wɔɔ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ gɔ teitai gɔ dɛi, emɛ gin’ gagawu tɔitɔi gɔ biyaaɲu gɔbe, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn.
61001002	Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Kirisito lee jugɔ ebe gɔ dɛi, Ama, nɛɛma lee, jamu lee ei gaai obo.
61001003	Ama, dooro womɔ lee, ɛhɛju womɔ lee wo le gamala ga emi boonaabe. Emɛ woi jugaaɲu digɛu, iyaa gɔnrɔn womɔ le digɛu Ama emaa giri unrunmɔ liyɛwin biyɛ ga, kijɛ kai emɛ sɛɛ puu emi obaabe.
61001004	Dooro womɔ lee, ɛhɛju womɔ lee digɛu, Ama, pui diyɛ saii maai wɔin gɔbe emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe. Ebaa dadaaru mɔɲu yanwan tɛbɛjɛ, aduna nɛ wɔɔ gɔ aŋa nɛ ɛli goo ye, inɛw Ama jige sɛin biyɛ ga, pui wogɔbe emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe.
61001005	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e maini ye, gagawu ebe kuu nɛ ɛhɛju barai. Iyaa ɛhɛju ebe nɛ jugɔ barai.
61001006	Iyaa e maini ye, jugɔ ebe kuu nɛ kuu ebe ai gɛli barai. Kuu ai gɛli nɛ muyɔn barai, muyɔn kuu nɛ Ama giri liyɛ barai.
61001007	Nɛɛ iyaa maini ye, Ama giri liyɛ kuu nɛ gagawu nɛ ba unrunw ibɛɛ bii barai, ba unrunw ibɛɛ bii kuu nɛ inɛw puu ibɛɛ bii barai.
61001008	Bana ɛju e siyɛun jaan gɔbe kɔɔ woi. E bana ɛju kɔɔbe e nɛ narinyɛn narinyɛn yaauwɔ ye, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito jugu gɔ nɛ be e bɛrɛ birɛ bibirɛmɔdɛin, iyaa giru go ei yayaamɔdɛin.
61001009	Kaa inɛ bana ɛju kɔɔbe le wɔlɔ gɔ, wo kijɛ wagee wɔɔ iyeelɛ, woi giruminɛ gin’ wɔɔ. Wo pɔɔlɔ hakɛ pɛi wo sɛbe gɔbe ɛjɛmaatin ga naŋaai.
61001010	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi ba unrunw mabe, Ama ei wo boonu gɔ lee, ei wo yɛmu gɔ lee narain biyɛ ga ɛjii mainiyɛin. Sabu e kunrin kanranjɛi biyaai ye, asuu gagawu ebe gɔ pajaidelei.
61001011	Kɔɔ gin’, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ Yesu Kirisito diinɛ sɔgɔ gɔ nɛ jiiru wɔlɔ go ei yoyoomɔdɛin.
61001012	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, halu e kanɛ baa kijɛ kɔɔbe igii wɔi kanran, iyaa naran ei tagin gɔ nɛ ɛɛn go iŋiyaan wɔi kanran, mu waaru wooi ei kijɛ kɔɔbe nanaŋaranmɔdɔn.
61001013	Ebaa yeguru le biyɛ ga, waaru aduna ɔn nɛ ɔnmɔi mu wɔɔ gɔ le, ajubu ma nɛ ei sɔɔ kɔɔbe pilemu pilemu mu naŋaranmɔu dagaa.
61001014	Sabu Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito bana mu bɛrɛ jugɔmu le kɛukɛu, yiun ma bɛruniyaain ga mu igii wɔun.
61001015	Mui yinwaain onu nɛ ebaa kijɛ wogɔbe waaru wooi naŋurun bɛɛ ga, mu mamainiyɛndɔn.
61001016	Kunrin, waaru Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito gɔnrɔn sɔɔ gɔ lee, wɛɛgu womɔ sɔɔ gɔ lee e bɛrɛ emɛ tagaabe le, emɛ sasai elumɛ sɔɔ gɔbe dimiyɛnnɛ. Kaa emɛ ɔgɔ dalee womɔ giri emɛ le iyaaɲu.
61001017	Baba lee, dooro lee, Ba Ama bɛrɛ gowaa waaru wo bɛɛ le, emɛ yalu gɔ nɛ yabɛin. Ama dooro diyɛ baŋa, mii unrunmɔ goomaa kijɛ gi: “Ɔn Aini ibɛ ma gɔ woi. Wo le kinɛ ma ɛjii aa wɔɔ.”
61001018	Waaru yalu diyɛ kokoo ɛjaai gɔ nɛ wo le emɛ bee le, emɛ kuu emɛ le mii alagala goobe kɔɔi ɛgaabɛin.
61001019	Kunrin, inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ sɔin gɔ, sigɛ le narain ga emɛ jugaaɲu. Sɔɔ wogɔ e kajubu ire. Sabu sɔɔ wogɔ, baa yaaido baa, yaju tolo kinɛ ebe wijɛmɔido baa, lanpa ɔlɔ nɛ doorojɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
61001020	Laa gɔ sɔɔ ɔn jugi biyɛi: Inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa too gɔ, inɛ turu kanran tiyɛ gɔ kuu womɔ le tagu bɛɛidolo.
61001021	Sabu inɛw Ama titiyaanw turu kanran, inɛ diŋɛ le kɛukɛu sɔɔ womɔ sɔɔlu. Kaa, Kikinu Pilu bei teeremɔube dɛi, inɛw kɔɔbe Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔwaabɛin.
61002001	Waaru galaai gɔ le bana Isɛrɛlu tɔgu logoro nɛ inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw biyaabe gin’, iyaa lee logoro ebe nɛ jaŋudeerenw kakalugunw bibiyɛdo. Be deeru kakalugu, yanwan jɛɛlɛɲu gɔbe le logoro ebe nɛ wɛwɛɛdɛin. Kuu Baŋa bei dɔrugaabe gɔ le yabaidenɛ. Be kunrin ɔgu yanwan kuu bana bemɛ nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdɛin.
61002002	Inɛw joo, kuu sɛlɛ sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ nɛ bei didimiyɛndɛin. Kijɛ be kanranjɛ gɔ le digɛu, naran oju gɔ boi gɔ dɛi, inɛw gawanɛ gɔbe sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔsɔɔdɛin.
