61002003	Girikakala bemɛ dɛi, jaŋudeerenw kakalugunw kɔɔbe, sɔɔ kuu bemɛ le kɛgɛraa be kunu gɔbe e bɛrɛ jɛɛlu ye, ei kakayadɛin. Kaa Ama, pɔɔlɔ baa jarugu kuu bemɛ nɛ duuraa kilaai: Bei suiyoido waaru gɔ tanwaindolo!
61002004	Mɛlɛnkɛ hakɛ kanrin gɔbe, Ama, amasɔgɔ bemɛ aalu, kaa yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ nɛ bei kamaa kunaa, saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ dɔɔido baa kɔmaa, ɔlɔ nɛ gɛlɛ.
61002005	Iyaa Ama, aduna pɛi gɔ amasɔgɔ aalu. Kaa wo, aduna wogɔ inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe kuu nɛ dii diyɛ wɛɛmaabe. Wo Nɔwe, teitai waaju kanrannɛ gɔ lee, inɛw sɔi waja lee laa ye, inɛ wo yabu wɔlɔ.
61002006	Inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ sɔɔ be bɛrɛ dɔɔido sɛɛrɛi biyɛ ga, Ama Sodomɛ lee, Gomɔre lee ana gɔbe kuu nɛ jarugu duuraa, yaun le bei tɛgɛraa unɔi bojaabe.
61002007	Iyaa Ama, Lote, inɛ teitai gɔi yabaabe. Lote, wo inɛw mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe kuu sɛlɛ sɔɔ gɔ dɛi saii kinɛ jiun le bee.
61002008	Sabu ainɛ teitai kɔɔ, logoro bemɛ nɛ dɛinyaan wɔu, kanran mɔɲu bemɛ gɔ iyaa, ɛgaa, wo bai wooi saii kinɛ jiun le bimiliyaa bee.
61002009	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛw giri womɔ liyɛnw gɔbe bana subɔrɔ nɛ goonɔɲu igii wɔɔ. Iyaa Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kirɛido le, inɛw teitai laain gɔbei laga ga, wo bei aŋai gɛliyɛun igii wɔɔ.
61002010	Wo sigɛ le inɛw dadaaru mɔɲu lɔgɔgu kinɛ bemɛ nɛ gooɲu gɔbe le wɔin gɔbe, inɛw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe gailamɔw gɔbei lalagado. Jaŋu deerenw kakalugunw wogɔbe, inɛw kolobei, diŋɛ unrunbemɛ kanranwin. Kɔɔ dɛi be alagala nɛ kijɛ ɔnmɔ dooro le wɔin gɔbei liyɛɛnɛ. Kaa bei koi duyɔɲu.
61002011	Halu mɛlɛnkɛbe, jaŋudeerenw kɔɔbe dɛi sigɛ paŋa lee, gɔnrɔn lee sɛin gɔbe, kijɛ ɔnmɔ dooro le wɔin kɔɔbei Inɛw Baŋa giru nɛ, bei jaruganu duyɔidenɛ.
61002012	Kaa inɛw kɔɔbe, kijɛ paamaanɛ be wɔɔ gɔbe dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu koi sɔɔɲu. Be olunawan aa ye daa dɛi naraanɲu gin’, kuu bemɛ le sɔɔ be biyaajɛi kanranɲu. Bei olunawanbe aŋai daaɲu gin’ susuyodɛin.
61002013	Iyaa, inɛw bɛrɛ ɔɲɛ be kanrun tujɔ, ɔɲɛi biyɛdo. Aga, sala sala ga kinɛ bemɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu. Be, ba unrunw jaa ebe nɛ e le waaru be mɔrinyaanjɛ, be sala sɔɔ bemɛ le kinɛ bemɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu. Kaa wogɔ nɛ bana bemɛ e bɛrɛ dɔgɔi, yawara sɔɔi.
61002014	Be yaanran yɛnu ye daariyɛlu go bii bɛɛnɛ, be hakɛ kanrun gɔ pajaanɛ. Inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunw gɔbei dɔdɔbɔrɔɲu. Kinɛ bemɛ kijɛ baala dadaaru le wɛɛjiyaa wɔɔ. Ama jebu gɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ yɔɔ!
61002015	Be oju teitai gɔ pajaatiyaa, manaai. Be Bosoru aini, Balaamu oju gɔ dimiyaanbɛin. Balaamu, mɔɲu kanrannu kɛɛlɛ wo bɛɛido gɔi ibɛɛ biyaabe.
61002016	Kaa hakɛ womɔ dɛi Ama woi ganwaanbe. Kɔɔ gin’, jandulu sɔɔ sɔɔ bɛɛlɛ turu, inɛ mii jeɲaa sɔɔ sɔi tɔlaa, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ weje sɔɔ gɔi tɛŋaabe.
61002017	Inɛw kɔɔbe diipujo dii sɛnɛbe gin’ wɔin. Kulumɔ ooɲɔ diyɛ balajɛ gin’ wɔin. Ɔlɔ diyɛ naa diyɛ gɔ nɛ Ama be dɛi yalu yegeraa yasɛ.
61002018	Be kuu ulo sɔɔ bomɔgu koi sɔɔɲu. Be kuu sɛlɛ dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ bemɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔbe le, inɛw lelu nɛ toin gɔbe logoro nɛ, kanɛ goonw gɔbei dɔdɔbɔrɔɲu.
61002019	Be inɛw kɔɔbei hɔɔlɔwin bojodɛin gɛɛɲu. Kaa kuu bemɛ le bei wɛɛju yanwan tɛbɛɲu gunɔwin. Sabu inɛ tuturu puu kijɛ woi gɔnrɔnjɛ gunɔnɛi.
61002020	Inɛw kɔɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ Yesu Kirisito be jugu gɔ le digɛu aduna dadaaru lɔgɔgu gɔ nɛ bei gooni. Kaa iyaa lee oju pɛi bemɛ nɛ pilemaa yowaa, kijɛ lɔgɔgu kɔɔbe pilemaa kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaaɲu ye, bana bemɛ gɔ Yesu waaru jugɔlu be bee dɛi sigɛ mɔɲii biyaai.
61002021	Inɛw kɔɔbe oju teitai gɔ jugɔnɛ bɛin ye be bɛrɛ irebe. Kaa tɔɔru ɛjaai waaju be bɛrɛ tagin gɔ le onu dulaatin ye, bana be wɔɔ gɔ laa mɔ dɛi sigɛ mɔɲii wɔɔ.
61002022	Kijɛ be bɛrɛ dɔi gɔ taanrinyɛn ɔnbe narain ga tagaraajɛ: “Iju kijɛ wo guraabe gɔi pilemaa mirɛin wiyaai.” Iyaa “Tolu kanɛ mɔŋi gɔ, iyaa pilemaa pɔnu nɛ binɛrɛin yaai.”
61003001	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, ɔn lɛtɛrɛ lɛiyei e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Lɛtɛrɛ lɛi gɔbe kɛu nɛ, deeru e bɛrɛ mu naŋaranmɔjɛ gɔbe le digɛnu ebaa kinɛ ebe nɛ ajubu ɛju toiyomɔ ga, kijɛ mu dɛnu gɔ woi.
61003002	Giru nɛ baa inɛw Ama titiyaanw ɛjaa wɔin gɔbe sɔɔ sɔin gɔbe lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa emɛ, emi Yabanɛ bɛrɛ tɔɔru goi, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu ebe gɔbe ei deerin lee, ebaa naŋaran ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
61003003	E laa gɔ jugi biyɛi, waaru dumɔ gɔ le, inɛw ei mɔmɔw wɛwɛɛdɛin, inɛw, kuu bemɛ dadaaru le kɛukɛu yoi yayaadɛin. Be ei jairɛ kakanrandɛin,
61003004	kijɛ be gɛɛido: “Wo wɛwɛɛdo ga pui kunaabe woi laa ma? Aiwa! Wo yago wɔɔ? Emɛ babe yinwaan galaain, kaa aduna maŋi nɛ iye wɛɛ dɔɔ, kijɛ wooi bana be bee gin’ wɔin.”
61003005	Kaa, be igii wɔnu kijɛ ɔn nanaŋaɲu: Pɔɔlɔ baa, Ama tɔɔraa, alagalabe lee, minɛ lee, biyɛ wo giyaa biin. Minɛ dii nɛ goonaa, dii le maŋu.
61003006	Iyaa dii le, tiyɛ gɔ dii diyɛ le aduna pɛi kɔɔi suyaabɛin.
61003007	Ama tɔɔru turu gɔ le, iye alagala gɔbe lee, iye minɛ gɔ lee, yaun le suyo dɛi bojaaɲu. Bei bai inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe saliyɛ kiraa ye suyoidɛin gɔ dɛi bojaaɲu.
61003008	Kaa ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kijɛ naŋau jaanla turu yɔɔ: Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ bai turu anranguju muɲu gin’ wɔɔ, anranguju muɲu, bai turu gin’ wɔɔ.
61003009	Inɛw gamuu bana ajubajɛ gin’ laa, Inɛw Baŋa pui womɔ kibemɔ ga tanwaanlɛ. Kaa wo e dɛi muyɔn le wɔɔ. Sabu wo inɛ aai kanran suiyo ga ibɛla. Kaa inɛw puu wa ajubuduli bɛɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
61003010	Kaa Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido gɔ, gugunyɔnnɛ bana wɛɛjɛ gin’ bibiyɛdo. Bai wogɔ le alagalabe siɲɛ diyɛ le gagaladɛin. Kijɛ wooi yaun tɛgɛ ye tɔtɔɔnrinyɛnmɔdo. Minɛ lee, kijɛ kɔlɔ womɔ nɛ toin gɔbe lee, tɛgɛ ye unɔi bibiyɛdɛin.
61003011	Kijɛ puu kɔɔ gin’ tɔtɔɔnrinyɛndo digɛu, e kuu ebe le inɛw inge tunmɔi biyɛun jaan? Ama bai aduna saliyɛ kirɛido waaru e dɔmɔ gɔ le, iyaa bai wogɔ ɔgu dɔɔ dɛi waaru e mainiyɛnjɛ, ei Ama dɛi waaru wooi inɛw dɛiin bojaaɲui biyɛun jaain wɔɔ, waaru wooi Ama giri liyɛwin e biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Bai wogɔ dɔwaai ye, alagalabe yaun tɛgɛ ye dodogodo. Kijɛ puu yaun bije uju gɔ dɛi tɔtɔɔnrinyɛndo.
61003013	Kaa, Ama alagala kanabe lee, minɛ kana lee, teitai gɔ yalu jaa biyɛido pui kunaabe. Kijɛ emɛ dɔmɔ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
61003014	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, Ama giru nɛ ei ɛjɛmɔ ye, jarugusɛlɛ le biyɛ ga, wo le jamu le biyɛ ga, bai wogɔ waaru e dɔmɔ le, e mainiyɛin.
61003015	Inɛw Baŋa emɛ muyɔn gɔ, ei yabu ojui bojaaɲu gin’ lugoi. Bainɛ ibɛ emɛ Pɔlu, Ama wo bɛrɛ hakilɛ obu gɔ le digɛu bana tɔŋu gɔ kɔɔ woi.
61003016	Lɛtɛrɛ womɔbe wooi nɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe dɛi yalu wo sɔɔjɛ nɛ, kijɛ wo tɔŋu gɔbe kɔɔ woi. Lɛtɛrɛ womɔbe nɛ sɔɔ gamuu paamu kanrun nau yɔɔ. Bana Ama Dɔn yalu waja gamuu le be kanranjɛ gin’, inɛw jugɔ sɛnɛ, inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunw, sɔɔ womɔ tiyɛ koi gɔnɔmɔɲu. Be kɔɔ gin’ kuu bemɛ suyouwɔin.
61003017	E kai ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kanɛ ei tinwɛnraanɲu. Kodigɛu inɛw mɔɲu kanranw lelu le ei manamɔnɔu ga, ɛɛn go iŋi ebe gɔ nɛ goonɔu ga, kuu ebe kajubai.
61003018	Kaa, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ lee, jugɔ womɔ gɔ nɛ lee bii ye giru go yaai. Kanɛ gowaa, boi sɔmu gɔ asuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
62001001	Inɛ boi womɔ Ɔnmɔ sɔɔ gɛɛɲu gɔ, emɛ wo dɛi e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔin. Kijɛ puu tɔlɔmɔ nɛ wo yabe. Emɛ woi ɛgaabɛin. Giri emɛ le woi iyaabɛin. Emɛ woi ɛjii yɛnaabɛin. Numɔ emɛ le woi tabaabɛin.
62001002	Ɔnmɔ gɔ, waaru aduna nɛ wiyaa, unruin wo taguru le, emɛ woi iyaabɛin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ sɛɛrɛ womɔ goouwɔin. Ɔnmɔ kɔɔ, asuu ɔnmɔi. Ba Ama le bee. Kaa, kanɛ woi emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmaaɲu.
62001003	Emɛ, Ba Ama le bɔɔi wɔin. Iyaa Aini womɔ, Yesu Kirisito le bɔɔi wɔin. Nɛɛ, ebaa yaa emɛ le bɔɔi biyɛ ga, emɛ kijɛ emɛ iyi gɔ, emɛ ɛgu gɔ, wogɔ e bɛrɛ tagauwɔin.
62001004	Kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ kibaai biyɛ ga, emɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe tɔŋɔuwɔin.
62001005	Yesu Kirisito le kibɛru ɛgaa, e bɛrɛ emɛ tagajɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama wijɛi. Ɔlɔ turu kanran wo nɛ tolo.
62001006	Nɛɛ, emɛ wo le bɔɔi wɔin gɛɛnu, nimɛ kanran ɔlɔ nɛ yaaɲu ye, emɛ kakalu maŋawin. Naran le yoi yaauwɔnɛ.
62001007	Kaa, Ama, bana wijɛ nɛ too gin’ emɛ wijɛ nɛ yoi yaaɲu ye, emɛ tunmɔ le bɔɔi wɔin. Iyaa, Aini womɔ Yesui ili gɔ, hakɛ wooi nɛ emi ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.
62001008	Yɛnɛi, emɛ hakɛ sɛnɛ gɛɛuwɔin ye, kuu emɛ lelemɔuwɔin. Naran emɛ le wɔlɔ.
62001009	Kaa emɛ, hakɛ emɛ gɔbe Ama bɛrɛ tagaa ye, kuu gɔ nɛ iŋiyɛunwɔin ye, Ama kai, wo sɔɔ turu baŋai, teitai wɔɔ, hakɛ emɛ puu emɛ bɛrɛ yaabu kanrun ye, mɔɲu wooi nɛ emi ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.
62001010	Nɛɛ, emɛ hakɛ sɛnɛ gɛɛuwɔin ye, emɛ Amai kakalu maŋanɛi bojouwɔin. Sɔɔ womɔ emɛ gɛlɛlain.
62002001	Unrunw dagunw mabe, ebaa hakɛ kanrannɔu ga, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe tɔŋɔuwɔn. Kaa inɛ turu, hakɛ turu kanranjɛ biyaa ye, Ba Ama giru nɛ emɛ sɔɔ yegerenɛ yasin. Wogɔ inɛ teitai wɔɔ, Yesu Kirisito gɔ woi.
62002002	Emaa hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛɛ ga, wo, kuu womɔ le woi sadaga obaabe. Wo hakɛ emɛ gɔbe turu sai dɛi kuu womɔ obolu. Kaa aduna inɛw puu hakɛ dɛi kuu womɔ obu.
62002003	Emɛ Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛgɛliyɛɲu ye, naran go emɛ woi igii wɔin.
62002004	Inɛ turu woi igii wɔɔ gɛɛnu, tɔɔru womɔbe gɛliyɛɛlɛ ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kakalu maŋanɛi. Naran turu kanran wo le wɔlɔ.
62002005	Kaa, inɛ sɔɔ womɔ gɛliyɛjɛ gɔ, naran go Amai ibɛi bii womɔ kibaa wɔɔ. Kunrin, emɛ Ama le toin ga igii wɔin.
62002006	Inɛ Ama le too gɛɛjɛ gɔ, waajibi Yesu bana bii gin’ biyɛjɛ. Wo Yesu kubɔnamaran dimiyɛnjɛ.
62002007	Ba unrunw, mu tɔɔru kanai e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔlɔn. Kaa, tɔɔru pɛii. Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ e yabu le baa, tɔɔru e sɛɛ gɔ woi. Tɔɔru pɛi kɔɔ, laa baa, sɔɔ e ɛgu gɔ woi.
62002008	Kaa iyaa, tɔɔru e bɛrɛ mu tɔŋɔjɛ gɔ, tɔɔru kanai. Yɛnɛi, ɔlɔ gɔ galauwɔ. Wijɛ tɔitɔi gɔ, kanɛ baa doorouwɔ. Wogɔ digɛu, tɔɔru gɔ, tɔɔru kanai narain. Yesu Kirisito bana nɛ lee, bana ebe nɛ lee, tɔɔru gɔ narain ga iyemɔuwɔ.
62002009	Inɛ turu, wijɛ nɛ too gɛɛnu, wo bainɛi ibiliyaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa nimɛ kanran ɔlɔ nɛ too.
62002010	Inɛ wo bainɛ ibɛ gɔ, wijɛ nɛ biyɛjɛ. Kijɛ inɛ tomɔmu turu kanran wo nɛ tolo.
62002011	Kaa, inɛ wo bainɛi ibiliyaa wɔɔ gɔ, ɔlɔ nɛ too. Wo ɔlɔ nɛ yoi yaauwɔ. Ɔlɔ gɔ giri womɔ dɛbaa gɛlɛ gɔ digɛu, wo yalu wo yaajɛ inɛɛ.
62002012	Unrunw mabe, mu sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Yesu Kirisito boi dɛi hakɛ ebe gɔbe, Ama, e bɛrɛ yaabu kanraanti.
62002013	Banw gɔbe, mu sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Kijɛ puu tɔlɔmɔ nɛ baa inɛ wɔɔ gɔ, e woi igii wɔi. Sagataranw, mu sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. E Mɔɲu kuu baŋa kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabei.
62002014	Unrunw mabe, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. E, Ba Amai igii wɔi. Banw gɔbe, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Kijɛ puu tɔlɔmɔ nɛ baa inɛ wɔɔ gɔ, e woi igii wɔi. Sagataranw, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. E gɔnrɔn yasɛi. Ama sɔɔ, kinɛ ebe nɛ yato. Iyaa Mɔɲu kuu baŋa kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabei.
62002015	Aduna ibɛi biyɛnɔugi. Aduna le kijɛ digɛ ibɛi biyɛnɔugi. Inɛ, aduna ibɛi wɔɔ ye, Ba Amai ibɛla.
62002016	Aduna kijɛ gɔbe puu, dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔbe lee, girikakala lee, arusɛgɛ dɛi kuu unaa ye bii lee, kijɛ kɔɔbe, Ba Ama bɛrɛ goolɛ. Kaa aduna le digɛ.
62002017	Aduna galauwɔ. Kunrin, aduna nɛ dadaaru wɔin puu galauwɔin. Kaa, inɛ Ama diŋɛ kanranjɛ gɔ, asuu bibiyɛdo.
62002018	Unrunw mabe, aduna dumɔ gɔ bɛruniyaain. Kirisito jaŋunɛ gɔ wɛwɛɛdo be giyaa, e ɛgaabei. Aiwa, kanɛ baa Kirisito jaŋuw joo yɔɔin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, aduna dumɔ gɔ bɛruniyaain ga, emɛ igii wɔin.
62002019	Inɛw kɔɔbe, logoro emɛ nɛ goin. Kaa, be emɛ maranwin laain. Be emɛ maranwin bɛin ye, emɛ le bibiyɛbɛin. Kaa, inɛw gamuu emɛ le wɔin kanran, logoro bemɛ nɛ turu kanran emɛ maranwin laa emaa jugɔ ga, sɔɔ kɔɔ bii.
62002020	Kaa e kai, Kirisito, e bɛrɛ Ama Kikinu gɔ obaa, Ama dɛi ei dɛiin bojaajɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e puu jugɔ yasɛi.
62002021	Kɔɔi biyaa ye, ebaa, naran gɔ inin dɛi mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔlɔn. Kaa, e naran gɔ kabu kunu bɛbɛɛjɛi. Iyaa naran nɛ kakalu turu kanran tolo ga, e igii wɔi.
62002022	Nɛɛ, kakalu maŋanɛ gɔ aai? Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ Yesui laa, inɛ gɛɛnɛ gɔi laa ma? Inɛ kɔɔbaŋa Kirisito jaŋunɛ gɔ woi. Wo, Ba Ama le yabalu. Aini womɔ Yesu le yaa yabalu.
62002023	Aini gɔ le inɛ yabalu gɔ, Ba Ama le yaa tolo. Kaa Aini gɔ le inɛ yabaajɛ gɔ, Ba Ama le bɔɔi.
62002024	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ e yabu le baa, sɔɔ e ɛgu gɔ wogɔ nɛ biyɛi. E wogɔ yagɛlɛi ye, e Aini gɔ le yatoiyodei. Ba Ama le yaa yatoiyodei. E wooi pagu turu.
62002025	Be le yatoin ye, Kirisito emɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ ohobodo ga, pui wo kunu gɔ unwɔ: Ɔnmɔsɔgɔ.
62002026	Inɛw ei lelemɔdɛin ga wɔin gɔbe dɛi mu sɔɔ kɔɔ tɔŋɔjɔn.
62002027	Nɛɛ, e kai, Kirisito e bɛrɛ Kikinu obu gɔ, e nɛ yato. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e inɛ waja deeru kai sɛlɛi. Kikinu gɔ, kijɛ puu nɛ ei dedeerejɛ. Deeru womɔ puu narain. Kakalu, wogɔ nɛ tolo. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, bana ei wo deeru gin’, deeru womɔ le kɛukɛu Yesu Kirisito le yatoiyoi.
62002028	Unrunw dagunw, Yesu Kirisito le yatoiyoi. Waaru wo wiyaa, emaa diyɛdɔn le biyɛ ga, wo le yatoiyoi. Iyaa, wo wiyaai ye, emaa giru womɔ nɛ dɔgɔ le biyɛnɔu ga, wo le yatoiyoi.
62002029	Nɛɛ, Yesu teitai wɔɔ ga, e igii wɔi. Wogɔ digɛu, inɛ teitai kanranjɛ puu, Ama ii ga jugɔi.
62003001	Ba Ama emi bana wo ibɛ gɔ yɛnɛi. Ihibɛ womɔ gɔ dɛi, boi emɛ Ama unrunw gɛɛɲu. Iyaa naran go, emɛ Ama unrunwin. Aduna bɛɛnw, emɛ Ba Ama inin gɔ digɛu, emi yaa inin.
62003002	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kanɛ emɛ Ama unrunwin. Kaa, bana emɛ biyɛido tɔitɔi nimɛ kanran tagarala. Kaa, emɛ sɔɔ ɔn igii wɔin: Kirisito waaru wiyaa, emɛ bana wo wɔɔ gin’ tee woi iyedɛin. Emɛ yaa, wo le murin biyɛdɛin.
62003003	Inɛ aai kanran, sɔɔ kɔɔ le Yesu Kirisito nɛ diyɛ womɔ daanaa wɔɔ ye, bana wo ɛjaa wɔɔ gin’, inɛ wogɔ baŋa, kuu unrunmɔ ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.
62003004	Iyaa, hakɛ gin ye, tɔɔru yamuli. Inɛ hakɛ kanranjɛ, tɔɔru yamalauwɔ.
62003005	Nɛɛ, Yesu Kirisito, hakɛ emɛ gɔbe goonɔdo ga, aduna nɛ wɛi ga, e igii wɔi. Iyaa, hakɛ turu kanran wo le wɔlɔ.
62003006	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ wo le too, hakɛ papajajɛ. Inɛ hakɛ nɛ toi ye biyɛjɛ, woi iyelu, woi inɛɛ.
62003007	Unrunw dagunw, inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ ei lelemɔnɔugi. Inɛ birɛ teitai birɛjɛ, Yesu Kirisito bana teitai wɔɔ gin’, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa yaa teitai wɔɔ.
62003008	Kaa, inɛ hakɛ pajaalɛ, inɛ wogɔ jinrun puu kuu baŋa inɛi. Tɔlɔ gɔ le baa, jinrun puu kuu baŋa hakɛ kanraunwɔ. Nɛɛ, Ama Aini gɔ, birɛ womɔ yamala ga wɛi.
62003009	Inɛ aai kanran, Ama ii ye, Ama bana gɔ wo nɛ yato gɔ dɛi, wo hakɛ nɛ bii bɛɛlɛ. Ama wo Bai gɔ dɛi, wo hakɛ nɛ bii bɛɛlɛ.
62003010	Ama unrunw lee, jinrun puu kuu baŋa unrunw lee, bana jugɔmɔjɛ gɔ ɔn woi: Inɛ teitai kanraanlɛ ma, wo bainɛ ibɛla ma biyaai ye, inɛ wogɔ, Ama ii laa.
62003011	Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ e yabu le baa, sɔɔ e ɛgu gɔ nɛ, emaa tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛ gin.
62003012	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ Kayɛn gin’ biyɛmɔnɔugin. Wo Mɔɲu kuu baŋa inɛi bee, iyaa, wo suŋɔrɔin daabe. Birɛ womɔ ɛjula bee dɛi, wo, wo suŋɔrɔn dai. Kaa, wo suŋɔrɔn birɛ gɔ teitai bee.
62003013	Ba unrunw mabe, aduna inɛw ei ibiliyaa wɔin ye, e bɛrɛ maunɛ bojonɔugi.
62003014	Emɛ, emɛ ba unrunw ibɛɛ wɔin gɔ digɛu, emɛ yiun nɛ gowaa, ɔnmɔ nɛ taŋaai ga igii wɔin. Inɛ, wo bainɛ ibiliyaa wɔɔ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ baŋa yinwaain.
62003015	Inɛ aai kanran, wo bainɛ ibiliyaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa inɛ daanɛi. Iyaa, inɛ daanɛ turu kanran, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ, wo nɛ tolo ga, e igii wɔi.
62003016	Nɛɛ, ihibɛ bana jugɔmɔjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Yesu Kirisito, emɛ sabu dɛi kinrun womɔ pajaabe. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ yaa, emɛ ba unrunw dɛi kinrun emɛ pajaun jaain wɔɔ.
62003017	Inɛ ɔgɔinɛ turu, wo bainɛ, kai turu le wɔɔ ga iyaa, kinɛ unrunmɔ ɛɛnnaa, amasɔgɔ womɔ jugɔlu ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, Ama ihibɛ wo nɛ yato ma?
62003018	Aiwa, unrunw dagunw, kɔɔi biyaa ye, aŋa le, ninɛ ɛɛlu le sai, inɛ ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɛɛmɔnɔugin. Kaa birɛ le, naran go inɛ ibɛi biyɛmɔi.
62003019	Kunrin, emɛ naran gɔ le toin ga jujugɔdɛin. Iyaa, kinɛ emɛ nɛ jarugu tolo go, Ama giru nɛ diyɛdɔn le biyɛdɛin.
62003020	Kinɛ emɛ emi jarugaajɛ kanran, Ama, kinɛ emɛ dɛi gaa, wo kijɛ wooi igii wɔɔ.
62003021	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kinɛ emɛ, emi jarugaalɛ ye, emɛ diyɛdɔn le Ama le sɔɔ sɔi bɛbɛɛɲu.
62003022	Iyaa, emɛ tɔɔru womɔbe yagɛlɛin gɔ digɛu, kijɛ wo bɛrɛ ɛju kanraunwɔin gɔ digɛu, emɛ kijɛ emɛ gɛɛnjɛ puu, wo nɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin.
62003023	Nɛɛ, kijɛ emɛ bɛrɛ wo tɔɔrɔjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Emaa, Aini womɔ Yesu Kirisito le gawa. Iyaa, Yesu Kirisito, emɛ bɛrɛ bana tɔɔru gin’ tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛ.
62003024	Inɛ Ama tɔɔru gɔbe le yabajɛ gɔ, Ama le yato. Ama yaa wo le yatoiyojɛ. Ama, Kikinu womɔ emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu gɔ dɛi, Ama, emɛ le yato ga, emɛ igii wɔin.
62004001	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw joo aduna nɛ gowaa yɔɔin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama Kikinu, unrunbe le yɔɔ inɛw gɛɛɲu puu le gawanɔugi. Kaa, kikinu be le wɔɔ gɔ, Ama Kikinui ma suburu yɛnɛi.
62004002	E sɔɔ ɔn le, Ama Kikinu jujugɔdei: Inɛ aai kanran, Yesu Kirisito aduna nɛ emɛ gin’ inɛi biyaa, wɛi gɛɛjɛ ye, inɛ kɔɔ Ama Kikinu wo le yɔɔ.
62004003	Kaa, inɛ aai kanran, Yesu sibɛ nɛ, sɔɔ kɔɔ le yabalu ye, Ama Kikinu wo le wɔlɔ. Kikinu wo le wɔɔ gɔ, Kirisito jaŋunɛ yawɛɛjɛ be giyaa e ɛgu gɔ kikinui. Kikinu wogɔ kanɛ baa aduna nɛ yɔɔ.
62004004	Kaa e kai, unrunw mabe, ei Ama mɔi. Kikinu e le wɔɔ gɔ, aduna nɛ kikinu wɔɔ gɔ dɛi gaa. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw gɔbei gɔnraanjɛi.
62004005	Be, aduna inɛwin gɔ digɛu, aduna sɔɔi sɔɔɲu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, aduna inɛw yaa bei kekeŋiyɛnɲu.
62004006	Kaa, emi Ama mɔi. Inɛ Ama igii wɔɔ, emi kekeŋiyɛnjɛ. Inɛ Ama mɔi laa, emi keŋiyɛɛnlɛ. Kunrin, emɛ naran Kikinu lee, kakalu kikinu lee, kabu kunu bɛbɛɛdɛin.
62004007	Ba unrunw, ihibɛ gɔ Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛmɔi. Inɛ ihibɛ sɛɛ gɔ, Ama ii, iyaa, Amai igii wɔɔ.
62004008	Ama ihibɛi. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ ihibɛ sɛlɛ gɔ, Ama inɛɛ.
62004009	Ama, emɛ sibɛ go ihibɛ womɔ bana wo taguru unwɔ: Aini turu womɔ le digɛnu emaa ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, wo, woi aduna nɛ tiyaabe.
62004010	Nɛɛ, ihibɛ tɔitɔi gɔ emɛ yani jugɔɲu? Emɛ Amai ibɛi biyaabɛin dɛi, ihibɛ tɔitɔi gɔ jugɔdɛin ma? Ai, Amai, emi ibɛi biyaa, Aini womɔ tiyaa, hakɛ emɛ yaabu kanran ga, woi sadagai boju. Ihibɛ tɔitɔi gɔ emɛ kɔɔ gin’ jugin.
62004011	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, nɛɛ, Ama kɔɔ gin’ emi ibɛi bii ye, emɛ yaa tunmɔ ibɛi emɛ biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
62004012	Inɛ turu kanran Amai iyetɛlu. Kaa, emɛ tunmɔi ibɛɛ wɔin ye, Ama, emɛ le yato. Iyaa, ihibɛ womɔ kinɛ emɛ nɛ emɛ sɛɛ gɔ, kibaa wɔɔ.
62004013	Emɛ Ama le yatoin, Ama emɛ le yato. Wo, Kikinu womɔ emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe dɛi, emɛ wogɔ igii wɔin.
62004014	Iyaa, Ba Ama, Aini womɔ, aduna Yabanɛi biyɛ ga tiyaabe. Emɛ wogɔ iyaa, sɛɛrɛ goouwɔin.
62004015	Yesu Ama Ainii ga inɛ gɛɛjɛ gɔ, Ama, inɛ wogɔ le yato. Inɛ wogɔ yaa, Ama le yato.
62004016	Nɛɛ, Ama, emi bana wo ibɛ gɔ, emɛ wogɔ jugaa, wogɔ le gawaabɛin. Ama ihibɛi. Iyaa, inɛ ihibɛ sɛɛ gɔ, Ama le yato. Ama yaa wo le yato.
62004017	Logoro emɛ nɛ ihibɛ kibaai ye, saliyɛ kirɛidɛin bai gɔ, emɛ diyɛdɔn le biyɛdɛin. Sabu aduna nɛ bana emɛ gɔ, Yesu Kirisito bana gin’ wɔɔ.
62004018	Ihibɛ, liliyɛ sɛlɛ. Kinɛ nɛ ihibɛ kibaai ye, liliyɛ donugutiijɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ liliyɛ le wɔɔ, kinɛ womɔ nɛ ihibɛ gɔ kibelu. Inɛ liyɛ liyɛjɛ, kanɛ baa kuu unrunmɔ nɛ jarugu duuraati.
62004019	Kaa emɛ kai, Ama laa emi ibɛi bii gɔ digɛu, emɛ ihibɛ yasin.
62004020	Inɛ turu, unrun Amai ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɛɛnu, wo bainɛi ibiliyaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔ kakalu maŋanɛi. Wo bainɛ, giri womɔ le wo iyejɛ gɔi ibɛla ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, Ama iyeelɛ wo wɔɔ gɔ, ibɛi bii bɛɛlɛ.
62004021	Iyaa, Yesu Kirisito, emɛ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔɔru: Inɛ Amai ibɛ gɔ, wo bainɛ yaa ibɛi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
62005001	Inɛ aai kanran, Yesui Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔi ga, gawaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔ Ama ii. Nɛɛ, inɛ aai kanran, banɛ ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, unrunw womɔ gɔbei yaa ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
62005002	Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, emɛ Ama unrunwin ibɛɛ wɔin ga, Ba Ama bana emɛ ibɛ lee, tɔɔru womɔbe bana emɛ gɛlɛ lee nɛ jugɔmɔdo.
62005003	Yɛnɛi, Amai ibɛi bii gɔ, wogɔ, tɔɔru womɔbe yabu gɔ woi. Inɛ aai kanran, Ama ii ye, wo aduna kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛjɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛliyɛ ga, emɛ bɛrɛ naula. Nɛɛ, aduna kuu nɛ kijɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ, gagawu emɛ gɔ woi.
62005005	Naran go, Yesu Ama Aini ga, inɛ gawaa wɔɔ gɔi laa ye, aduna ɔn kuu nɛ inɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛjɛ wɔlɔ.
62005006	Yesu Kirisito, aduna nɛ wo wɛi. Waaru wo wɛi le, wo batise womɔ dii lee, ili womɔ lee nɛ wɛi. Dii nɛ sai wɛɛlu. Kaa dii lee, ili lee nɛ wɛi. Ama Kikinu yaa, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ gogoojɛ. Ama Kikinu, narain.
62005007	Aiwa, sɛɛrɛ taanu wɔin:
62005008	Ama Kikinu sɛɛrɛ lee, dii sɛɛrɛ lee, ili sɛɛrɛ lee. Sɛɛrɛ taanu kɔɔ puu tunmɔ le sɛgɛraa wɔin.
62005009	Emɛ, inɛw sɛɛrɛ le gagawaɲu. Nɛɛ, Ama sɛɛrɛ gɔ inɛ mɔ dɛi gaa. Aiwa, Ama, Aini womɔ dɛi sɛɛrɛ wo goi gɔ kɔɔ woi.
62005010	Kunrin, inɛ Ama Aini le gawaajɛ, kinɛ womɔ nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ yasɛ. Kaa inɛ Ama le gawalu gɔ, Ama, Aini womɔ dɛi sɛɛrɛ wo goi gɔ le gawalu gɔ digɛu, inɛ kɔɔ, Amai kakalu maŋanɛi bojouwɔ.
62005011	Nɛɛ, sɛɛrɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ ɔnmɔsɔgɔ obaajɛ. Ɔnmɔ kɔɔ, Aini womɔ le bɛɛmɔjɛ.
62005012	Inɛ aai kanran, Aini gɔ le yato ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa ɔnmɔ gɔ yasɛ. Ama Aini gɔ le inɛ tolo, ɔnmɔ gɔ sɛlɛ.
62005013	Nɛɛ, e, inɛw Ama Aini le gawaa wɔin gɔbe, ebaa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ yasɛi jugɔ ga, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn.
62005014	Iyaa, kijɛ emɛ gɛɛnjɛ puu, Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa ye, wo gɛɛn emɛ kekeŋiyɛnjɛ ga, emɛ wogɔ diyɛdɔn yasin.
62005015	Iyaa, wo gɛɛn emɛ kekeŋiyɛnjɛ ga, emɛ igii wɔin dɛi, kijɛ ingei kanran wo bɛrɛ emɛ gɛɛindo puu, emɛ kijɛ wogɔ yaa biyaaɲu ga igii wɔin.
62005016	Inɛ turu wo bainɛ hakɛ kanraun wo wɔu iyaajɛ ye, yiun nɛ inɛi hakɛ jɛyaajɛi laa ye, baŋa wo bainɛ gɔ dɛi Ama gɛɛn. Yiun nɛ, hakɛ inɛi jɛyaajɛi laa ye, Ama, bainɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔnmɔ obu ye, woi yayabado. Kaa, yiun nɛ hakɛ inɛi jɛyaajɛ yɔɔ. Hakɛ wogɔ dɛi gɛɛn gɛɛlun.
62005017	Narain, kanran teitai laa puu hakɛi. Kaa, yiun nɛ hakɛ inɛi jɛyaalɛ yɔɔ.
62005018	Inɛ aai kanran, Ama ii ye, hakɛ kanrannu biyɛɛlɛ ga, emɛ igii wɔin. Ama Aini woi gɛlɛ. Iyaa, Mɔɲu kuu baŋa, kuu womɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn sɛlɛ.
62005019	Nɛɛ, emɛ kai, emi Ama mɔi ga igii wɔin. Kaa aduna bɛɛnw puu Mɔɲu kuu baŋa numɔ nɛ toin.
62005020	Ama Aini gɔ wiyaa, hakilɛ emɛ bɛrɛ obaa, emɛ Ama tɔitɔi gɔi jugaaɲu ga igii wɔin. Yesu Kirisito le digɛu, emɛ Ama wogɔ le toin. Ama tɔitɔi gɔ, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ, Yesu gɔ yaa woi.
62005021	Unrunw mabe, ɔmɔlɔ dɛi kuu ebe kajubai.
63001001	Mu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na gɔ, yaanran Ama yɛmaajɛ gɔ lee, unrunw womɔ lee, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e, inɛw naran le mu ibɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Naran gɔ emɛ yasin. Iyaa, naran gɔ emɛ asuu sisiyɛdɛin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ ei ibɛ gɔ mu turu sai laa. Inɛw naran gɔ jugaa wɔin gɔbe wooi ei ibɛɛ wɔin.
63001003	Ama emɛ Ba lee, Aini womɔ Yesu Kirisito lee, emɛ bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee ohobodɛin. Sin obu kɔɔbe, naran le, iyaa ihibɛ le, emɛ le bibiyɛdɛin.
63001004	Unrunw uwɔbe logoro nɛ, Ba Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ bana tɔɔru le kɛukɛu, gamuu naran le yoi yaauwɔin ga tɛmaa, kinɛ ma gaai ɛɛliyaabe.
63001005	Nɛɛ, yaanran ɛju, mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ emɛ tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛmɔi. Kɔɔ tɔɔru kanai u bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiu wɔlɔn. Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ emɛ yabu le baa, tɔɔru emɛ bɛi gɔ woi.
63001006	Ihibɛ gɔ, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe le kɛukɛu yoi yai gɔ woi. Tɔlɔ gɔ le baa, bana e ɛgu gin’, tɔɔru digiyɛ gin gɔ, ihibɛ le bii gɔ woi.
63001007	Yɛnɛi, aduna nɛ inɛw lelemɔw joo ginaa yɔɔin. Yesu Kirisito, emɛ gin’ inɛi biyaa aduna nɛ wɛi ga, be sɔɔ wogɔ le gawaanɛ. Inɛ kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ gɔ, inɛ lelemɔnɛ gɔ woi. Kirisito jaŋunɛ gɔ woi.
63001008	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ebaa birɛ emɛ tinɛ manamɔnɔu, kaa tujɔ ebe sɛɛu bɛɛ ga, kuu kajubu le biyɛi.
63001009	Yɛnɛi, inɛ aai kanran, Kirisito deeru obu gɔ nɛ taŋaa ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, Ama wo le wɔlɔ. Kaa, deeru gɔ nɛ inɛ biyɛjɛ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ baŋa, Ba Ama wo le yɔɔ. Aini gɔ yaa wo le yɔɔ.
63001010	Inɛ turu e bɛrɛ wɛɛu, Kirisito deeru obu gɔ le wɛɛlu ye, ginrun ebe nɛ woi sɛgɛrɛnɔugi. Poo womɔ saa ga yabanɔugi.
63001011	Inɛ poo womɔ saajɛ, birɛ mɔɲu womɔ nɛ wo le bariyɛuwɔ.
63001012	Mu sɔɔ waja joo e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔ tiiun jaan yasɔn. Kaa, mu wogɔbe lɛtɛrɛ le tɔŋɔ ibɛlaun. Kaa, kuu ma le e bɛrɛ wɛi ye, emɛ wooi aŋa le, aŋa le, sɔɔ sɔɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔun. Kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ kunrin kibedo.
63001013	U saa Ama yɛmu gɔ, unrunw womɔbe ui poonɔuwɔin.
64001001	Mu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na gɔ, mu anrunge, naran le ɛjii mu ibɛ, Gayisu, u bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tɔŋɔ tiiuwɔn.
64001002	Mu anrunge, kijɛ wooi nɛ uwaa giru go yaa ga, mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Kikinu sibɛ go bana giru u yaajɛ gin’, Ama, goju jamu ui obo.
64001003	Pɔɔlɔ baa bana naran le u yaajɛ gin’, iye bai dɔɔ naran le bana u iŋɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ, ba unrunw wiyaa ye, mu bɛrɛ goouwɔin. Wogɔ kinɛ ma gaai ɛɛliyɛmaabe.
64001004	Unrunw mabe naran gɔ nɛ biyaa yaauwɔin dɛi sigɛ, kibɛru kinɛ ma ɛɛliyɛmɔjɛ wɔlɔ.
64001005	Mu anrunge, ba unrunw dɛi birɛ u birɛjɛ gɔ, bana jaan gin’ u ɛjii naran le birɛjɛu. Halu yerunwin kanran, u ɛjii birɛjɛu.
64001006	Be ihibɛ uwɔ sɔɔ, mɔɔnu emɛ nɛ sɔwaabɛin. Nimɛ kanran, Ama bana dɛnɛjɛ gin’ oju bemɛ dɛi bei bara ga pajanɔu.
64001007	Be Kirisito birɛ birɛdɛin ga, oju gowaabɛin. Inɛw Ama inin numɔ nɛ kijɛ yaba ga yabanɛ.
64001008	Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ, inɛw kɔɔbe tunmɔ emɛ sɛgɛrɛun jaain wɔɔ. Kunrin emɛ, be le bari ye, naran gɔ dɛi birɛbirɛnwin biyɛdɛin.
64001009	Mu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ dumi tiyaabɔn. Kaa Diotɛrɛpe, sɔɔ emɛ yabaalɛ. Inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe logoro nɛ, wo unrun sigɛ bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
64001010	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu wɛwɛiun ye, birɛ mɔɲu wo birɛjɛ gɔbe lee, emɛ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu wo sɔɔjɛ gɔbe lee, e bɛrɛ tatagadɔn. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe woi baalu ga, wo kuu womɔ le ba unrunw Kibɛru Ɛju taganw gɔbei sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ. Iyaa inɛw bei sɛguru ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbei tɛtɛŋɛjɛ. Wo inɛw wogɔbei inɛw gawaa wɔin mɔɔnu nɛ nanu nanu goonɔjɛ giye kanranjɛ.
64001011	Mu anrunge, mɔɲu dimiyɛnnɔu. Kaa ɛju dimiyɛn. Inɛ ɛju kanrannɛ, Ama inɛi. Kaa mɔɲu kanrannɛ, Amai jugɔlu.
64001012	Inɛw puu Demɛtiriusu dɛi sɔɔ ɛju sɔɔuwɔin. Naran gɔ yaa wo dɛi sɛɛrɛ ɛju goouwɔ. Emɛ yaa sɔɔ ɛju womɔ sɔɔuwɔin. Sɛɛrɛ emɛ gɔ narain ga, u igii wɔu.
64001013	Mu u bɛrɛ sɔɔ joo tɔŋɔ tii bɛbɛɛbɔn. Kaa mu wogɔbe lɛtɛrɛ le kanran ibɛlaun.
64001014	Mu bɛrii ui iye ibɛɛ wɔun. Kunrin, emɛ aŋa le, aŋa le, tunmɔ le sɔɔ sɔɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin.
64001015	Ama jamu u le biyɛ. U anrunge gɔbe uwaa popoo gin. Emɛ anrunge gɔbe, tuturu puu bemaa popoo wa.
65001001	Mu, Jude, Yesu Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ, Jake suŋɔrɔn gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa mu tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama inɛw boonaajɛ gɔbe, inɛw wo ibɛ gɔbe, Yesu Kirisito dɛi inɛw wo gɛlɛ gɔbe, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn.
65001002	Ama, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee, ihibɛ lee ei gaai obo.
65001003	Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, Ama, yayabu tunmɔ, emɛ puu mɔi wɔɔ gɔ kuu nɛ maini ye lɛtɛrɛ tɔŋɔ ga saii daariyaabɔn. Kaa, kɔɔ waaru le, gagawu, inɛw womɔbe bɛrɛ kubɔ turu sai obaa kilaa, sagu wo duuru gɔ dɛi jaiyɛ ga, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tii ye, ei mainiyɛnmɔ ga, mu bɛrɛ waajibi biyaai, mu jugaabɔn.
65001004	Inɛw gamuu baŋiyaan logoro ebe nɛ yowaa yatoin. Ama Dɔn nɛ pɔɔlɔ baa tɔŋi wɔɔ, inɛw kɔɔ tunmɔbe, jarugu kuu bemɛ nɛ susugodo gin. Inɛw Ama inin kɔɔbe, kuu sɛlɛ sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ bɛrɛ naran obo ga, Ama emɛ nɛɛma sɔɔ gɔ dulomɔuwɔin. Be iyaa, Kuu Baŋa turu gɔ, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le yabanɛ.
65001005	Kijɛ gamuu e igu gɔbe ei naŋaranmu ibɛɛ wɔun. Waaru galaai gɔ le, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, Ejipute gana nɛ Isɛrɛlu unrunwin waaru gunɔ nɛ yabaa wo goonu le, inɛw wo le gawanɛ gɔbei kɔɔ onu nɛ suyaabe.
65001006	Iyaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn laa Ama bei obu gɔ le biyɛ ga yabanɛ, kaa yalu be bee gɔbe pajin gɔbe, Bai Diyɛ saliyɛ kiru gɔ dɛi, Ama bei asuu, inrun jɔrɔgɔ le kɔmaa, ɔlɔ nɛ kunaa yasɛ.
65001007	Kunrin mɛlɛnkɛ kɔɔbe gin’ Sodomɛ bɛɛnw lee, Gomɔre bɛɛnw lee, ana be le bɛrii daanbɛin bɛɛnw lee, sala nɛ kuu bemɛ obaa bɛin gɔbe, iyaa Adama ii kijɛ mɔɲu kanraun jaanla gɔbe, be kanrun gɔ ajubai. Be yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ ɔɲaa yatoin. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe, inɛw bemaa kunrin kanrannɔu ga, bei titinwɛnrɛnɲu.
65001008	Inɛw mɔɲu, logoro ebe nɛ sasai le yoonw kɔɔbe, be yaa kunrin kanranɲu: Yaŋawelu bemɛ digiyaa, goju bemɛ koi lɔgɔjiyɛmɔɲu. Be Ama gɔnrɔn gɔ yau kanranɲu. Be mɛlɛnkɛ dooro le wɔin gɔbei koi duyɔɲu.
65001009	Kaa halu, mɛlɛnkɛbe puu kuu baŋa gɔ, Misɛlu kanran, waaru Mɔise yiun gɔ dɛi jinrun puu kuu baŋa le wo jiireube le, wo woi duyɔ ga daariyɛlu. Kaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Ama ui laga.»
65001010	Kaa, inɛw kɔɔbe, kijɛ paamaanɛ be wɔɔ gɔ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔɲu. Be olunawanbe gin’ kuu bemɛ le sɔɔ be biyaajɛ gɔi kanranɲu. Be kunrin kuu bemɛ suyoɲu.
65001011	Bɔnrɔn be le yɔɔ, sabu be Kayɛn bana kanrun gin’ kanrin. Iyaa, Balaamu bana kanrun gin’, be buudu bɛɛ dɛi mɔɲu kakanranɲu. Bei suiyaai, sabu be Kore gin’ Ama le murutu kanraanbɛin.
65001012	Ba unrunw tunmɔ le mɔrinyaan yalu jaa e kayajɛ nɛ, ei dɔgɔ aamɔw gɔ bei. Be kayɛrɛ ɛjii kayaa ye, bɛrɛ bemɛ dɔgɔ sɛlɛ le joonɔɲu. Be anrankulumɔ dii sɛnɛ ooɲɔ balaa yaajɛ gin’ wɔin. Be tiun nabe ii bemɛ waaru dɔwaai kanran, ii naraannɛ gin’ wɔin. Be tiun nabe duu bemɛ mɔmaa goonaaɲu gin’ wɔin. Bei yinwaan dogaai.
65001013	Bei nɛudii gunu waaŋiyaan wɔin gin’ birɛ lɔgɔgu bemɛ yugɔrɔ gin’ goonɔu wɔin gin’ wɔɔ. Bei tolo yalu wooi nɛ gɔŋɔrɔnɲu gin’ wɔɔ. Ama be dɛi ɔlɔ diyɛ naa diyɛ gɔ nɛ yalu yegeraa sɛɛ. Be wogɔ nɛ asuu bibiyɛdɛin.
65001014	Henɔku, Adama tirɛ unrunw logoro nɛ tirɛ ii sɔiye gɔ, waaru wage nɛ baa inɛw kɔɔbe dɛi sɔɔ sɔwaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Yɛnɛi! Inɛw wooi saliyɛ kire ga Inɛw Baŋa titiyaanw ɛjaa kulɔ joo lugu bɛɛmɔɔlɛ womɔbe le wɛwɛɛdo. Wo, inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe, kijɛ mɔɲu be kanrun gɔbe puu dɛi lee, iyaa inɛw hakɛ kanranw, Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu wo dɛi be sɔi gɔbe puu dɛi lee, jarugu kuu bemɛ nɛ duurɔ ga, wo wɛwɛɛdo.»
65001016	Wogɔbe inɛw guguun guunwin, bana be wɔɔ gɔ le inɛw kinɛ bemɛ aa wɔnɛ. Be dadaaru bemɛ le kɛukɛu yoi yaauwɔin. Aŋa bemɛ nɛ sɔɔ goojɛ, sɔɔ kuu ulogui. Be inɛwin, kijɛ bemɛ bɛɛ dɛi sɔmɔɲu.
65001017	Kaa e kai, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, sɔɔ giru nɛ be tagu gɔbe pilemu ajubai.
65001018	Be e bɛrɛ sɔwaa gin: «Waaru dumɔ gɔ le inɛw ei mɔmɔw wɛwɛɛdɛin, inɛw Ama giri liyɛla dadaaru bemɛ le kɛukɛu yoi yayaadɛin.»
65001019	Ama unrunw logoro nɛ mii kabu kunɔw gɔ bei. Inɛw arusɛgɛ gin’ wɔin gɔbe bei. Ama Kikinu be nɛ tolo.
65001020	Kaa e kai, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito, e bɛrɛ, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ, ɛhɛju womɔ dɛi oboido waaru gɔ dɔmiyaan wɔnu, e gagawu gaai ɛjaai ebe nɛ giru go yaai. Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le Ama gɛɛin. Ama ihibɛ gɔ nɛ biyɛi.
65001022	Inɛw kinɛ lɛilɛi le wɔin gɔbe amasɔgɔ jugu ye, bei barai.
65001023	Inɛw gamuu gɔbe, yaun nɛ bei ɛlɛ ye goonu ye yabai. Gamuu gɔbe, e amasɔgɔ bemɛ e jugɔun jaain wɔɔ. Kaa e kuu ebe kajubai. Halu sɔi hakɛ bemɛ dɛi lɔgɔjiyaa wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔbe ibiliyɛi.
65001024	Ei numɔnɔu giye, ei gɛliyɛnɛ gɔ, jarugusɛlɛ le, kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ le dooro womɔ giru nɛ ei jɛɛlu ye iŋɛrɛindo baŋa gɔ,
65001025	Ama turu emi Yabanɛ gɔ woi. Boi sɔmu gɔ lee, baba diyɛ gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ nɛ womɔi biyɛmɔ. Tɔlɔgu gɔ le baa, iye wɛɛ dɔɔ kunrin wɔɔ. Asuu nasuu kunrin biyɛdo. Amina.
66001001	Yesu Kirisito sɔɔ jugɔmu gɔ unwɔ. Ama wo bɛrɛ jugɔmaa, sɔɔ bɛrii biyɛido, birɛbirɛnw unrunmɔ bɛrɛ tagara wo gi gɔ woi. Kirisito, mɛlɛnkɛ unrunmɔ tiyaa, birɛbirɛnɛ unrunmɔ Jan bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe.
66001002	Wo, Ama sɔɔ lee, Yesu Kirisito wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmu lee dɛi dɔn ɔn nɛ sɛɛrɛ goouwɔ. Wo sɔɔ wo iyi puu tagaabe.
66001003	Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi ɔn mii ɛɛn le inɛ jaŋajɛ gɔ Ama wo yabu. Inɛw sɔɔ gɔ ɛgɛ ye, dɔn gɔ nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaa too gɔ gɛliyɛɲu gɔbe, be kanran Ama be yabu. Sabu sɔɔ kɔɔbe waaru gɔ bɛruniyaain.
66001004	Asi numɔ nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔi wɔin gɔbe, mu Jan, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn: Ama yɔɔ gɔ, yabe gɔ, wɛɛido gɔ, wo lee, kikinu kosɔi ɔgɔdɔin womɔ giru nɛ wɔin gɔbe lee,
66001005	iyaa Yesu Kirisito, sɛɛrɛ goonɛ sɔɔ turu baŋa gɔ, yiun logoro nɛ wo Aini pɔlɔi bulu gɔ, aduna ɔgɔnw puu kuu baŋa gɔ lee, be e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo. Kirisito, emi ibɛɛ wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, yinwaan, ili womɔ le hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi Yabanɛ gɔ,
66001006	iyaa wo Ba Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw ɔgɔwin emi bojonɛ gɔ, dooro gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
66001007	Yɛnɛi, wo anrankulumɔ nɛ kowɛɛjɛ. Inɛw puu woi ihiyedɛin. Halu inɛw woi sɔbin gɔbe woi ihiyedɛin. Aduna tɔgu puu wo dɛi tɔɔnrɔn tɔtɔɔnrɔndɛin. Ee, Amina.
66001008	Inɛw Baŋa Ama, kanɛ yɔɔ gɔ, yabe gɔ, wɛɛido gɔ, gɔnrɔn wooi sɛɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔwaa, Alupa gɔ lee, Omɛga gɔ lee unruin gi.
66001009	Mu Jan, e bainɛ gɔ, ɔɲɛ nɛ lee, Ama diinɛ nɛ lee, sɔɔ tari nɛ lee, Yesu nɛ e bɔɔnɛi. Ama sɔɔ tagu lee, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goi lee dɛi, mu yalu dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ Patumɔsu gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ bɔun.
66001010	Inɛw Baŋa bai gɔ, Ama Kikinu, kuu ma nɛ sugaa, mu onu ma nɛ mii diyɛ, kaan sɔgɔrɔjɛ gin’ ɛgaabɔn.
66001011	Mii gɔ sɔɔ gɛɛbe: «Kijɛ u iyejɛ gɔ dɔn turu nɛ tɔŋaa ye ana sɔi ɔnbe Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ tii: Epɛse nɛ lee, Simirunɛ nɛ lee, Pɛrugamu nɛ lee, Tiatire nɛ lee, Sarude nɛ lee, Piladɛlupi nɛ lee, Laodise nɛ lee.»
66001012	Mu aa mu le sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ ma ga kigelemaa yɛnaabɔn. Mui waaru mu kigelumu le, mu kange pilɛlɔn kosɔi iyaabɔn.
66001013	Pilɛlɔn sɔi gɔbe logoro nɛ, kijɛ ɔnmɔ turu Adama ii murin wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Wo arugoi pala kunaa, kange tɛmu gegeɲɛ unrunmɔ nɛ pagaa sɛbe.
66001014	Kuu womɔ kukuli, peju kukuli pilu gin’, pilu pala pala bee. Giri womɔbe yaun bije gin’ bee.
66001015	Kubɔ womɔbe, gaanran yaun nɛ mɛnu ilaa too gin’ dooriyeube. Mii womɔ, dii diyɛ soguru gin’ bee.
66001016	Numɔ iin womɔ le wo tolo kosɔi yasɛbe. Aŋa womɔ nɛ polukaaba aŋa lɛi womɔ sii wɔɔ gooube. Girupala womɔ gɔ nai, paŋa womɔ wooi le dooriyejɛ gin’ bee.
66001017	Woi iyaa, mu kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ numaa sugaa yiun gin’ biyaabɔn. Wo numɔ iin womɔ mu nɛ yaŋaraan, gi: «Liliyɛ le biyɛnɔu. Pɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔrɔn gɔ lee mui.
66001018	Ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ mui. Mu yinwaanbɔn, kaa kanɛ mu asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔun. Yiun lee, yinwunrun lee taan ii gɔ mu sɛɛ.
66001019	Nɛɛ, kijɛ kanɛ biyɛu wɔin gɔbe lee, kɔɔ onu nɛ biyɛidɛin lee, u iye gɔbe tɔŋɔ.
66001020	Tolo kosɔi numɔ iin ma nɛ u iye gɔ lee, kange pilɛlɔn sɔi gɔbe lee, tiyɛ babaŋa bemɛ gɔ unwɔ: Tolo kosɔi gɔbe, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔi mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbei. Pilɛlɔn sɔi gɔbe, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔi gɔbei.»
66002001	«Epɛse nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Numɔ iin womɔ nɛ tolo sɔi gɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, kange pilɛlɔn kosɔi logoro nɛ yoi yaauwɔ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
66002002	Mu birɛ u biru gɔ lee, bana u biru gɔ lee, muyɔn uwɔ lee igii wɔun. U inɛw mɔɲu gɔbei tariyɛɛlɛu ga mu igii wɔun. Inɛw unrunbei Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui gɛɛɲu, kaa jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui laain gɔbe, u bei subɔraa yɛnaabeu. Be kakalumaŋawin ga u iyaabeu.
66002003	U sɔɔ tatariyɛjɛu, boi ma dɛi ɔɲɛ tariyaabeu, anrangaju uwɔ dogomɔlu.
66002004	Kaa u le sɔɔ mu sɛɛ gɔ unwɔ: U ihibɛ pɔlɔ u sɛbe gɔ pajaatu.
66002005	Yalu nɛ gowaa u numu gɔ ajuba. Iyaa bana uwɔ dulomaa ye, birɛ pɔlɔ u birɛbe gɔ birɛ. Kaa bana uwɔ dulomɔlu ye, mu u bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn, mu pilɛlɔn uwɔ gɔ yalu womɔ nɛ gogoonɔdɔn.
66002006	Kaa sɔɔ ɔn kai u nɛ tɛtɛmɛmɔjɛ: U Nikolayitebe birɛ gɔ ibiliyaa wɔu. Mu kanran birɛ bemɛ ibiliyaa wɔun.
66002007	‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn. ‘Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, mu, tiun ɔnmɔ obojɛ, Ama alujɛnɛ nɛ daan gɔ ii, wo bɛrɛ kakayamɔdɔn.’ »
66002008	«Simirunɛ nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Pɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔrɔn gɔ lee woi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, yinwaanbe kaa pilemaa ɔnmɔi biyaai baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
66002009	Mu ɔɲɛ uwɔ lee, dɛgu uwɔ lee igii wɔun. Kaa ui ɔgɔinɛi. Inɛw unrunbei Yahutunwin gɛɛu, Yahutunwin laain, kaa Setanu babanw mɔɔnu inɛwin wɔin gɔbe, mu sɔɔ mɔɲu u dɛi be sɔɔjɛ gɔ igii wɔun.
66002010	Ɔɲɛ u ɔɲɔido gɔ liyɛnɔu. Ei marun yɛnɛ giye jinrun puu kuu baŋa gɔ logoro ebe nɛ gamuui kaju nɛ kamu kukunɔdo. E bai pɛlu ɔɲɔmu bɛbɛɛdei. Yiun gɔ baa sɔɔ turu baŋai biyɛ. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu ɔnmɔ domɔ gɔ u bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
66002011	‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn. ‘Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, yiun lɛiye gɔ wo bɛrɛ dɔɔidolo.’ »
66002012	«Pɛrugamu nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Polukaaba aŋa lɛi womɔ sii wɔɔ gɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
66002013	Mu yalu nɛ u daan gɔ igii wɔun. Setanu ɔgɔdɔin yalu wɔɔ gɔ woi. U boi ma yagɛlɛu. Halu sɛɛrɛ ma goonɛ sɔɔ turu baŋa Antipasui, ana ebe Setanu yalui wɔɔ gɔ nɛ bai dain gɔbe le, u gagawu uwɔ mu sibɛ nɛ kɔɔlɔmɔlu.
66002014	Kaa u le sɔɔ gamuu mu sɛɛ yɔɔ: Uwɔ nɛ inɛw Balaamu deeru gɛlin yɔɔin. Balaamu, Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ ɔmɔlɔ nawan tɛnwɛnmaa ye, sala nɛ bei yoomaa ye, kɔɔ gin’ bei hakɛ nɛ numɔ yoomɔ ga, Balaku bɛrɛ deereube.
66002015	Kunrin, u kanran, uwɔ nɛ Nikolayitebe deeru inɛw gɛlin yɔɔin.
66002016	Kodigɛu, bana uwɔ dulomɔ. Kɔɔi laa ye, mu bɛrii u bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn. Aŋa ma nɛ polukaaba goojɛ gɔ le mu be le kɔmɔ tataadɔn.
66002017	‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn. ‘Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, buru manɛ gɛɛɲu babaŋa gɔ lee, tibi pili lee woi ohobodɔn. Tibi wogɔ nɛ boi kana yatɔŋɔ. Inɛ tibi gɔ bɛɛjɛ gɔi laa ye, inɛ waja turu kanran boi gɔ inɛɛ.’ »
66002018	«Tiatire nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Ama Aini, giri womɔbe yaun bije gin’ wɔɔ gɔ, kubɔ womɔbe mɛnu bubaaɲu gin’ dooriyeube gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
66002019	Mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe igii wɔun. Ihibɛ uwɔ lee, gagawu uwɔ lee, birɛ inɛw dɛi u biru gɔ lee, sɔɔ tari uwɔ lee igii wɔun. Birɛ dumɔrɔn uwɔ gɔbe, pɔlɔ mɔ gɔbe dɛi joo ga igii wɔun.
66002020	Kaa u le sɔɔ mu sɛɛ gɔ unwɔ: U yaanran unruin inɛ Ama titiyainɛ gɛɛjɛ Jesabɛlui pajaa, birɛbirɛnw mabei lelemɔmaabeu. Sabu wo sala sala lee, ɔmɔlɔ pana kaya lee deeru be bɛrɛ obaabe.
66002021	Mu womaa bana womɔ dulomɔ ga waaru wo bɛrɛ obaabɔn. Kaa wo sala oju womɔ nɛ goi ibɛla.
66002022	Kodigɛu, mu woi ɔɲɛ teenu nɛ duduunɔdɔn. Kunrin, inɛw wo le dimudimiyɛnw gɔbe, wo le birɛ be biru gɔ dɛi be bana bemɛ duliyemɔnɛ ye, mu be bɛrɛ ɔɲɛ diyɛ dɔdɔɔnɔdɔn.
66002023	Mu unrunw womɔ gɔbei dadaadɔn. Kunrin, kinɛ ajubu lee, kinɛ kɔlɔ nɛ sɔɔ boŋurun too lee lubo ye marun yɛnɛnɛ gɔ mui ga, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe puu papaamadɛin. Mu kunrin e tuturu puui, inɛ kanma birɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu tutujɔdɔn.
66002024	‘Kaa e Tiatire inɛw wajunw gɔbe, e deeru kɔɔ le yabanɛ. Iyaa inɛw kɔɔbe gɛɛjɛ gin’ Setanu sɔɔ boŋurun too too gɔbe e deenɛ. Mu dɔɔ waja e bɛrɛ duurɔidolɔn ga sɔɔuwɔn.
66002025	Kaa kijɛ e sɛɛ gɔ, mu wɛɛido baa ɛjii ai gɛliyɛi.
66002026	Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, dumɔ gɔ yai dɔɔ baa inɛ diŋɛ ma kanraanjɛ gɔ, mu tɔgu gɔbe kuu nɛ paŋa wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
66002027	Mu ba bɛrɛ paŋa mu bɛi gɔ, mu wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn. Wo inrun sɔsɔru le bei girɛdo. Toroi gin’ bei jɔgɔdo.
66002028	Mu iyaa yajutolo wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
66002029	‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »
66003001	«Sarude nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Ama kikinu sɔi gɔ lee, tolo kosɔi lee sɛɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ: Mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe igii wɔun. Uwaa ɔnmɔi wɔɔ ga boi uwɔ gowaa wɔɔ. Kaa u yinwaaun.
66003002	Kajuba, kijɛ u le waju, yinwɛndo ga wɔɔ gɔ, paŋa womɔ bara. Sabu Ama ma giru nɛ mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe kibaai tɛmɛlun.
66003003	Kodigɛu, deeru u bɛi gɔ lee, aŋai u ɛgu gɔ lee ajuba. Deeru wogɔ yabaajɛu ye, bana uwɔ dulomɔ. U mainiyaan kajubu le biyɛlu ye, mu gugunyɔnnɛ gin’ wɛɛdɔn. Kuu uwɔ nɛ wɛi ye waaru mu gooido u jugɔidolou.
66003004	Kaa nimɛ kanran Sarude nɛ u inɛw sɔi bemɛ lɔgɔjiyɛmɔnɛ gamuu yasɛu. Be sɔi pilu kunɔ ye, mu le yoi yayaadɛin, sabu wogɔ be le dagaa wɔɔ.
66003005	Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, wo kunrin sɔi pilu gogoriyedo. Mu ɔnmɔ dɔn gɔ nɛ boi womɔ kɔjɔ ye goonɔidolɔn. Iyaa, mu Ba lee, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe lee giru nɛ, mu woi igii wɔun ga sɛɛrɛ gogoodɔn.
66003006	‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »
66003007	«Piladɛlupi nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Ɛjaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, naran baŋa gɔ, Dawide taan ii gɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, pinɛlaa wo jɛ ye inɛ turu kanran pinu bɛɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, pinaa wo jɛ ye inɛ turu kanran pinulu bɛɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
66003008	Mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe igii wɔun. Yɛnɛ, u gɔnrɔn gaai sɛlɛu kanran, u sɔɔ ma gɛliyaabeu, boi ma gɛliyaa aŋa uwɔ tilɛlu. Kodigɛu, mu giru uwɔ nɛ taan pinɛlaa bojaatun. Inɛ turu kanran wogɔ pinɛ bɛɛlɛ.
66003009	Yɛnɛ, Setanu babanw mɔɔnu inɛw, unrunbei Yahutunwin gɛɛɲu, kaa Yahutunwin laain, kakalui maŋauwɔin gɔbe, mu bei wɛɛmɔ ye kubɔsɔrɔ uwɔ nɛ ui demɛniyɛnmɔ ye, mu ui ibiyaaun ga be bɛrɛ jujugɔmɔdɔn.
66003010	Ɔɲɛ tariyɛ ga mu tɔɔru gɔ, u sɔɔ wogɔ gɛliyaabeu digɛu, mu kanran, minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin puu suburu yɛnɛ ga ɔɲɛ aduna puu kuu nɛ wɛɛido gɔ waaru nɛ ui gɛgɛliyɛdɔn.
66003011	Mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn. Inɛ turu kanran ɔgɔdomɔ uwɔ ɛlɛnɔu ga, kijɛ u sɛɛ gɔ ɛjii ai gɛliyɛ.
66003012	Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, Ama ma Ginrun Diyɛ nɛ mu woi jɛin turui bobojodɔn. Wo konɛ asuu goolɛ. Ama ma boi lee, Ama ma ana Jerusalɛmu kana, Ama ma bɛrɛ alagala goi ye sugojɛ gɔ boi lee, boi kana ma lee wo nɛ tɔtɔŋɔdɔn.
66003013	‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »
66003014	«Laodise nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Amina baŋa gɔ, sɛɛrɛ goonɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai, naran baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, kijɛ Ama maŋaajɛ puu wo nɛ tɔlu baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
66003015	Mu birɛ uwɔbe igii wɔun. U Ama sibɛ go kaalulau, nuulau. U kaali beu ma, nuui beu ye koi bee.
66003016	Kaa u tugoi tugoi biyaa, kaalulau, nuulau dɛi, mu aŋa ma nɛ ui turɔ gogoonɔdɔn.
66003017	U unruin ɔgɔinɛi, arusɛgɛ baŋai, kijɛ turu kanran kai le wɔlɔu gɛɛjɛu. Kaa u amasɔgɔ le wɔu, yeeriyeginɛi, dɛguginɛi, giruminɛi, duŋu le wɔu ga inɛɛu.
66003018	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu ui tinwɛnrɛunwɔ ɔgɔinɛi taŋa ga ma nɛ wɛi ye kange yaun nɛ kunaa ɛjɛmaaɲu gɔ ɛbɛ. Uwaa sɔi kunu ye, duŋu uwɔ dɔgɔ gɔ baŋaran ga, sɔi pilu wɛɛ ɛbɛ. Uwaa giri iye ga giri loo wɛɛ ɛbɛ ye giri uwɔ nɛ para.
66003019	Mu kai, inɛw mu ibɛ gɔbei sɔsɔɔjɔn, bei kɔi logi lalagajɔn. Kodigɛu, maini diyɛ le biyaajɛu ye bana uwɔ dulomɔ.
66003020	Yɛnɛ, mu murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ taan tɔgɔu yahiŋɔ. Inɛ mii ma ɛgaa taan pinɛlaajɛ ye, mu womɔ nɛ yoyoodɔn, wo le pana kakayadɔn, wo yaa mu le pana kakayado.
66003021	Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, mu bana gɔnrɔn biyaa, mu Ba le ɔgɔdɔin womɔ nɛ mu dɛinyin gin’, mu woi kanran ɔgɔdɔin ma nɛ mu le dɛdɛinyɛnmɔdɔn.
66003022	‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »
66004001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaa, alagala nɛ murɔn aŋa turu pinɛlaa wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Mii laa kaan gin’ mu ɛgu gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Ɔn nɛ ulo. Kijɛ kɔɔbe onu nɛ wɛɛidɛin gɔbe mu u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.»
66004002	Ginsɛsai Ama Kikinu, kuu ma nɛ sugaabe. Alagala nɛ ɔgɔdɔin yabe. Inɛ turu ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ yadaanbe.
66004003	Konɛ daanbe baŋa gɔ, bana womɔ tibu dɔnrun diyɛ jasupe lee, saruduanɛ lee gin’ dooroube. Nɔmɔsije, bana womɔ tibu dɔnrun diyɛ emɛrɔde gin’ dooriyeu, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ sɛɛu gɔŋaa gɛlɛbe.
66004004	Ɔgɔdɔin pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ ɔgɔdɔin kɔɔi gɔŋaa yasɛbɛin. Ɔgɔdɔin pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ gɔbe nɛ, inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ, sɔi pilu kunaa, kange ɔgɔdomɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ kunaa, yadaanbɛin.
66004005	Anrangiriyenube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrandagulube lee, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gooubɛin. Ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ, tɛlutin yaun kosɔi, yaun taŋau, yabɛin. Wogɔbe, Ama kikinu kosɔi gɔbe bei.
66004006	Ɔgɔdɔin giru gɔ nɛ yɛnaa ye, wɛɛrɛ nɛudii gin’ bee. Tibu dɔnrun diyɛ kirisitalu gin’ sɛɛ bee. Kijɛ ɔnmɔ konai, logoro gɔ nɛ biyaa, ɔgɔdɔin gɔi gɔŋaa yagɛlɛbɛin. Be giru go lee, onu go lee, giri le jowaa bɛin.
66004007	Kijɛ ɔnmɔ pɔlɔ gɔ yara murin wɔɔ, lɛiye gɔ naa jaŋu murin wɔɔ, taaniye gɔ inɛ girupala gin’ yasɛbe, naiye gɔ anrankɔ kiliyaa yaauwɔ le murin wɔɔ.
66004008	Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe tuturu puu gamuju kuloi kuloi sɛbɛin. Goju gɔ puu, bain go lee, gamuju doɲu gɔbe puu nɛ lee giri jowaa wɔɔ. Aga lee digɛ lee deeliye sɛlɛ go, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ, yabe gɔ, yɔɔ gɔ, wɛɛido gɔ, wo ɛjaa wɔɔ, ɛjaa wɔɔ, ɛjaa wɔɔ.»
66004009	Kijɛ ɔnmɔ gɔbe ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa, asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔi dooromaa, babaa, birɛpoo waaru be tagaajɛ puu,
66004010	inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ gɔbe, ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ giru nɛ tutuŋiyɛnɲu. Be asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔi dedemɛniyɛnmɔɲu. Ɔgɔdomɔ bemɛ goonaa, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ kamaa tiyaa ye ɔn gin’ gɛɛɲu:
66004011	«U Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, Ama emɛ gɔ, dooro gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, u le dagaa wɔɔ. Sabu u kijɛ puu maŋaabeu. Iyaa be puu diŋɛ uwɔ le wɔin, diŋɛ uwɔ le biin.»
66005001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa numɔ iin nɛ dɔnmunɔ wo tou mu iyaabɔn. Dɔnmunɔ gɔ kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ lee, bain gɔ nɛ lee puu tɔŋu tɔŋi. Sɛɛrɛ kosɔi wo nɛ kunaa daŋaa bojaaɲu.
66005002	Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ turu, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ sɔɔu wo wɔu iyaabɔn: «Sɛɛrɛ gɔbe taruluti ye, dɔn gɔ pinɛlɛ ga aa le dagaa?»
66005003	Alagala nɛ ma, minɛ nɛ ma, minɛ doɲu nɛ ma, inɛ turu kanran dɔn gɔ pinɛlɛ ye kɔlɔ gɔ yɛnɛ bɛɛbele.
66005004	Dɔn gɔ pinɛlɛ ye kɔlɔ gɔ yɛnɛ ga inɛ le dagaa bɛɛmɔlu sabu dɛi mu ɛjii sɔmiyaanbɔn.
66005005	Inɛw naw gɔbe logoro nɛ koturu mu le sɔwaa gi: «Sɔmiyɛnnɔu, yɛnɛ, Juda tɔgu nɛ yara goi gɔ, Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, wo gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ. Kodigɛu, wo sɛɛrɛ sɔi gɔbe goonu ye dɔn gɔ pinulu bɛbɛɛjɛ.»
66005006	Kɔɔ gin’, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee logoro nɛ Peju Ii woi sɛnwaanɲu gin’ wo iŋɛu mu iyaabɔn. Peju Ii gɔ kɛlɛ kosɔi sɛbe, giri kosɔi sɛbe. Wogɔbe Ama kikinu kosɔi, minɛ yalu wooi nɛ tiyaaɲu gɔbe bei.
66005007	Wo wiyaa, ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa numɔ iin nɛ dɔn gɔ yabaabe.
66005008	Waaru dɔn gɔ wo bɛi le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ konai gɔbe lee, inɛw naw pɛli naisigɛ gɔbe lee, Peju Ii gɔ giru nɛ tuŋiyaanbɛin. Be tuturu puu giŋiru lee, iyaa kange diikɔrɔi uguru jiɲu ɛju le joonaa yagɛlɛbɛin. Uguru gɔ wogɔ Ama inɛw amagɛɛn gɔ woi.
66005009	Be nii kana ɔn gin’ niiubɛin: «Dɔn gɔ yabaa ye sɛɛrɛ gɔbe pinɛlɛ ga u le dagaa wɔɔ. Sabu ui daaɲu, u ginrun wooi nɛ lee, sɔɔ wooi nɛ lee, tɔgu wooi nɛ lee, gana wooi nɛ lee, inɛw bemaa Ama mɔi biyɛ ga, yinwaan, ili uwɔ le bei ɛbaabeu.
66005010	U Ama emɛ dɛi bei ɔgɔwin, sadagadɔɔnɔwin bojaabeu. Be aduna laamu kakanrandɛin.»
66005011	Iyaa mu yɛnɛubɔn, mu mɛlɛnkɛ joo mii ɛgaabɔn. Be ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee gɔŋaa gɛlɛbɛin. Be muɲu muɲu muɲu, muɲu kɛnwɛn bɛin.
66005012	Mii ɛɛn le kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Peju Ii sɛnwaanɲu gɔ, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, arusɛgɛ gɔ lee, hakilɛ gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, boi sɔmu gɔ lee, wo le dagaa wɔɔ.»
66005013	Kijɛ maŋaaɲu puu, alagala nɛ wɔin lee, minɛ nɛ wɔin lee, minɛ doɲu nɛ toin lee, nɛudii nɛ lee, kɔlɔ bemɛ nɛ kijɛ toin wooi lee, be ɔn gin’ gɛɛu be wɔu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Boi sɔmu gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, asuu nasuu ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee mɔi biyɛmɔ.»
66005014	Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe «Amina» gɛɛubɛin. Inɛw naw gɔbe tuŋiyaan demɛniyɛnmu demɛniyɛnmaabɛin.
66006001	Waaru Peju Ii gɔ, sɛɛrɛ kosɔi gɔbe logoro nɛ turu taralaa wo pinulu le, mu yɛnɛubɔn. Kijɛ ɔnmɔ konai gɔbe logoro nɛ koturu anrandagulu mii gin’ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.»
66006002	Mu yɛnaa, sɔun pilu kowɔɔ. Sɔun gɔ kuu nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ, too kɛun tai yagɛlɛbe. Ɔgɔdomɔ wo bɛrɛ obaabɛin. Wo gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋai wɔu, gowaa, gɔnrɔn bɛɛi yai.
66006003	Peju Ii gɔ waaru sɛɛrɛ lɛiye gɔ taralaa wo pinulu le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ lɛiye gɔ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.»
66006004	Sɔun waja yaun banrun gin’ biyaa gowaabe. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ, minɛ nɛ jamu donugu ye inɛw bemaa tunmɔi sɛnwɛn ga, gɔnrɔn wogɔ wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu. Polukaaba diyɛ kanran wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
66006005	Peju Ii gɔ waaru sɛɛrɛ taaniye gɔ taralaa wo pinulu le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ taaniye gɔ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.» Mu yɛnaa, sɔun gɛun kowɔɔ. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ, tankodo numɔ le yagɛlɛ.
66006006	Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe logoro nɛ mii goojɛ gin’ mu ɛgaabɔn. Kijɛ gi: «Bai turu birɛ buudu, alukama kilo koturu dɔnruin. Ɔruje kilo taanu bai turu birɛ buudu le kɛu wɔɔ. Kaa nii lee, resɛndii ilɛ lee kai yamalanɔu.»
66006007	Peju Ii gɔ sɛɛrɛ naiye gɔ taralaa waaru wo pinulu le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ naiye gɔ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.»
66006008	Mu yɛnaa, sɔun purugu kowɔɔ. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa boi Yiun gɛɛbɛin. Yinwunrun onu womɔ nɛ yadimɛbe. Bemaa polukaaba le, giyɛ le, jaabu le, olunawan le, minɛ inɛw gamulu naiye turu gɔbe daiti ga, gɔnrɔn be bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
66006009	Sɛɛrɛ numɔrɔnye gɔ taralaa waaru wo pinulu le, inɛw Ama sɔɔ dɛi dain gɔbe lee, sɛɛrɛ goi bemɛ dɛi dain gɔbe lee, mu kikinu bemɛ mɔi jiɲu ɛju gɔ yalu tɛgɛrɛɲu doɲu gɔ nɛ iyaabɔn.
66006010	Be mii diyɛ le ɔn gin’ gin: «Inɛw Baŋa ɛjaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, naran baŋa gɔ, u waaru yagɔ baa dɔmi ye, saliyɛ kiru ye, minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin kuu nɛ emi dain duguru goodou?»
66006011	Be tuturu bɛrɛ arugoi pilu obaa, bemaa nimɛ kanran waaru gaila deeliyaa wɔnu, birɛbirɛnw be gin’ daaidɛin be bɔɔnw, be ba unrunw gɔbe, lugo bemɛ kibeido dɔmiyɛn gin.
66006012	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Peju Ii gɔ sɛɛrɛ kuloiye gɔ taralaa pinɛlɛu wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Minɛ ɛjii jigaabe. Nai saii gɛunniyaan bee. Iyepilu gɔ sɛɛu ili gin’ banrin bee.
66006013	Tolo gɔbe ooɲɔ diyɛ wiyaa ye gaa na jigemaa ye ii koro gɔbe bagajɛ gin’ alagala goi ye minɛ nɛ bagaubɛin.
66006014	Alagala gɔ, dɔn munɔɲu gin’ manaai. Kokoobe lee, minɛ dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ gɔbe lee, puu yalu bemɛ nɛ goonaatin.
66006015	Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe lee, inɛw diyɛnw gɔbe lee, kɔmɔ numɔ kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe lee, paŋagunw gɔbe lee, inɛw wajunw puu, gunɔw gɔbe lee, gunɔ tonɛ gɔbe lee, kɔmɔ nɛ lee, kokoobe dumɔ logoro nɛ lee baŋiyaanbɛin.
66006016	Be kokoo gɔbe lee, dumɔ gɔbe lee bɛrɛ sɔɔu, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Kuu emɛ nɛ sugo ye ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa giru nɛ lee, Peju Ii gɔ kinɛbanrun nɛ lee emi baŋarain.
66006017	Sabu kinɛbanrun bemɛ bai diyɛ gɔ wiyaai. Inɛ aa wogɔ tari bɛɛjɛ?»
66007001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ nai, minɛ sibɛ nai nɛ be iŋɛu mu iyaabɔn. Minɛ nɛ lee, nɛudii nɛ lee, tiun na turu kanran nɛ lee, ooɲɔ suyonɔu ga, be minɛ ooɲɔ nai gɔbei tɛŋaa gɛlɛbɛin.
66007002	Mɛlɛnkɛ waja duu sibɛ go gowaa wo wɛɛu mu iyaabɔn. Ama ɔnmɔ sɛɛrɛ kuni gɔ wo yagɛlɛbe. Minɛ lee nɛudii lee yamala ga mɛlɛnkɛ nai bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaaɲu gɔbe le wo mii diyɛ le sɔwaa gi:
66007003	«Ama emɛ birɛbirɛnw didimɛ nɛ sɛɛrɛ emɛ kunɔido baa, minɛ ma, nɛudii ma, tiun ma tabanɔugi.»
66007004	Kɔɔ onu nɛ inɛw nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ kuni lugo gɔ mu ɛgaabɔn. Inɛw muɲu suŋu lee muɲu pɛnai naisigɛ, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu puu nɛ goin.
66007005	Juda tɔgu nɛ inɛw muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ kuni. Rubɛn tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Gadu tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ,
66007006	Asɛru tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Nɛputali tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Manase tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ,
66007007	Simɛyɔn tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Lewi tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Isakaru tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ,
66007008	Sabulɔn tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Josɛpu tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Bɛnjamɛ tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ kuni.
66007009	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaa, mɔɔnu diyɛ kowɔɔ. Inɛ turu kanran lugo bemɛ jugɔ bɛɛlɛ. Be gana puu nɛ, ginrun puu nɛ, tɔgu wooi nɛ, sɔɔ wooi nɛ goin. Be ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee giru nɛ iŋɛbɛin. Be arugoi pilu yatobɛin. Tamaro tiun liyɛbe yagɛlɛbɛin.
66007010	Be mii diyɛ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Yayabu gɔ Ama emɛ ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee bɛrɛ goojɛ.»
66007011	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe puu ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee gɔŋaa sɛbɛin. Be ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ tuŋiyaan, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa, Amai demɛniyɛnmaabɛin.
66007012	Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Amina, boi sɔmu gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, hakilɛ gɔ lee, birɛpoo tagu gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, asuu nasuu Ama emɛ mɔi. Amina.»
66007013	Inɛw naw gɔbe logoro nɛ turu baŋa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Arugoi pilu kunaa kowɔin gɔbe aabei? Be yago gowaa wɛin?»
66007014	Mu aŋa womɔ saa: «Mu baŋa, u igu.» Kɔɔ waaru le wo saa gi: «Kɔɔbe tɔɔɲɔ diyɛ gɔ nɛ inɛw gowaa wɛɛnw gɔbei. Be Peju Ii ili gɔ nɛ arugoi bemɛ mɔŋaa pili bojaaɲu.
66007015	Be kɔɔ dɛi Ama ɔgɔdɔin giru gɔ nɛ biyaa, aga lee digɛ lee Ginrun Diyɛ womɔ nɛ wo dɛi birɛ birɛuwɔin. Ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ, kuu bemɛ nɛ sɔi kuru womɔ ihiŋɛrɛndo.
66007016	Giyɛ asuu bei aaidolo, diinɔɔrin asuu bei aaidolo, nai kanran asuu waja bei tɛgɛidolo, ujɔ kanran asuu bei aaidolo.
66007017	Sabu ɔgɔdɔin logoro nɛ Peju Ii wɔɔ gɔ bei gigirɛdo. Wo ɔnmɔ dii yalu pujojɛbe nɛ bei jɛyaado. Ama, giri bemɛ nɛ giridii puu yayaaɲado.»
66008001	Peju Ii gɔ sɛɛrɛ sɔiye gɔ taralaa waaru wo pinulu le, alagala nɛ lɛɛrɛ pɛjɛrɛ koturu gin’ kelemu biyaabe.
66008002	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, mu mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi ɔgɔdɔin giru nɛ iŋɛi gɔbei iyaabɔn. Kaan kosɔi be bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
66008003	Mɛlɛnkɛ waja wiyaa, sadagadumu giru gɔ nɛ iŋiyaanbe. Wo kange gelu uguru tɛguru turu yasɛbe. Uguru jiɲu ɛju gaai, Ama inɛw puu amagɛɛn gɔ le baraa ye, sadagadumu, kange le yegeraaɲu ɔgɔdɔin giru nɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ tɛgɛrɛ ga wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
66008004	Uguru jiɲu ɛju kukumɔ gɔ, mɛlɛnkɛ numɔ gɔ nɛ gowaa, Ama inɛw amagɛɛn gɔbe le bariyaa, daa go Ama bɛrɛ ulaabe.
66008005	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ uguru tɛguru gelu gɔ jeɲaa, sadagadumu gɔ nɛ yaun goonaa konɛ joonaa, minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaabe. Anrandagulube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrangiriyenube lee, minɛjigu lee biyaabe.
66008006	Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi kaan sɔi gɛlin gɔbe, kaan bemɛ sujɔ ga unrunbei yegeraabɛin.
66008007	Mɛlɛnkɛ pɔlɔ gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Anransaŋaran lee, yaun lee, ili le bariyaa, minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaabɛin. Aduna gamulu taaniye turu tɛgaajɛ. Tiun gamulu taaniye turu tɛgaajɛ. Iyaa belu wɛru puu tɛgaajɛ.
66008008	Mɛlɛnkɛ lɛiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Kokoo diyɛ yaun aa wɔɔ gin’ nɛudii nɛ kamaa kunaaɲu. Nɛudii gamulu taaniye turu ili taŋaai.
66008009	Nɛudii nɛ kijɛ maŋaaɲu kinrun le toin puu, gamulu taaniye turu yinwaain. Diikoro gamulu taaniye turu suiyaain.
66008010	Mɛlɛnkɛ taaniye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Tolo diyɛ tɛlutin yaun gin’ tɛgɛu, alagala gowaa bagaa sugaabe. Tolo gɔ dibe dii gamulu taaniye turu gɔ nɛ lee, diipujobe nɛ lee sugaabe.
66008011	Tolo kɔɔ boi Gaaru gɛɛɲu. Dii gamulu taaniye turu gɔ gaari biyaai. Dii gaaru kɔɔbe dɛi inɛw joo yinwaain.
66008012	Mɛlɛnkɛ naiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Nai gamulu taaniye turu lee, iyepilu gamulu taaniye turu lee, tolobe gamulu taaniye turu lee lagaabɛin. Kijɛ kɔɔbe gamulu taaniye koturu gɔ ɔlɔi taŋaai. Dɛnrun gamulu taaniye turu ɔlɔi biyaai. Digɛ mɔ yaa kunrin biyaai.
66008013	Mu yɛnaa, sasaa anrankɔ alagala go ɛjii ulaa kiliyeu, mii diyɛ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛu wo wɔu ɛgaabɔn: «Mɛlɛnkɛ taanu wajunw gɔbe kaan mii be goonɔido gɔ dɛi, minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin bɛrɛ bɔnrɔn yɔɔ, bɔnrɔn yɔɔ, bɔnrɔn yɔɔ.»
66009001	Mɛlɛnkɛ numɔrɔnye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Tolo turu alagala gowaa minɛ nɛ bagaa sugaa wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Bonɔ diyɛ dumɔ sɛlɛ aŋa taan ii gɔ wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
66009002	Tolo gɔ bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ pinɛlaabe. Kukumɔ, gaanran diyɛ yaun kukumɔ gin’, bonɔ gɔ nɛ gowaa ulaabe. Bonɔ gɔ nɛ kukumɔ goojɛ gɔ dɛi, nai lee, wɛwɛi lee kurugiyaain.
66009003	Kukumɔ gɔ nɛ kakaabe gowaa, minɛ nɛ sugaabɛin. Mɔmiyɛn paŋai be bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
66009004	Be le sɔwaaɲu, bemaa minɛ nɛ belu wɔɔ tabanɔu, wɛru turu kanran ma, tiun turu kanran ma yamalanɔu gin. Kaa inɛw Ama sɛɛrɛ didimɛ bemɛ nɛ wɔlɔ gɔbe sai ɔɲɔmɔ gin.
66009005	Inɛwin daa ga be bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔnɛ. Kaa iyepilu numɔrɔn inɛwin ɔɲɔmɔ gin. Ɔɲɔmu bemɛ gɔ mɔmiyɛn tamu inɛi ɔɲɔmɔjɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
66009006	Bai kɔɔbe le, inɛw yiun dɛdɛnɛdɛin, kaa bɛɛidenɛ. Be yinwɛn ibɛɛ biyɛdɛin, kaa yiun be le jɔbɔ wawageniyɛndo.
66009007	Kakaa kɔɔbe, sɔun kɔmɔ dɛi yegeraa wɔin le murin bɛin. Kuu bemɛ nɛ kange ɔgɔdomɔ gin’ yabe. Girupala bemɛ inɛ girupala gin’ bee.
66009008	Kukuli bemɛ yaanw kukuli gin’ bee. Tɔnrɔn bemɛ yarabe tɔnrɔn gin’ bee.
66009009	Gegeɲɛ bemɛ nɛ inrun arugoi gin’ yabe. Gamuju be lagajɛ soguru gɔ sɔun wogotoro joo kɔmɔ nɛ jɔbaa yaajɛ siɲɛ gin’ bee.
66009010	Be mɔmiyɛn dulɔ gin’, kijɛ tatamu yasɛbɛin. Iyepilu numɔrɔn inɛwin ɔɲɔmɔ ga gɔnrɔn be sɛbe gɔ dulɔ bemɛ nɛ tobe.
66009011	Ɔgɔnɛ kuu bemɛ nɛ laamu kanranjɛ gɔ bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ titiyainɛ gɔ woi. Heburu sɔɔ le boi womɔ Abadɔn gɛɛɲu. Gɛrɛku sɔɔ le wogɔ Apɔliɔn gɛɛɲu, tiyɛ gɔ yayamalanɛ.
66009012	Bɔnrɔn pɔlɔ gɔ galaai. Bɔnrɔn kolɛi kɔɔ onu nɛ yawɛɛɲu.
66009013	Mɛlɛnkɛ kuloiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Ama giru nɛ kange sadagadumu wɔɔ gɔ kinrun nai gɔbe nɛ gowaa mu mii ɛgaabɔn.
66009014	Mɛlɛnkɛ kuloiye kaan gɛlɛbe gɔ bɛrɛ sɔwaa gi: «Eparate dibe diyɛ gɔ nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ nai pagaa sɛin gɔbei pagala.»
66009015	Kunrin mɛlɛnkɛ nai gɔbe, anranguju kɔɔ lee, iyepilu kɔɔ lee, bai kɔɔ lee, lɛɛrɛ kɔɔ lee dɛi unrunbei yegeraabɛin gɔbe, inɛw gamulu taaniye turu gɔi daa ga bei kɔmɔlaa bɛin.
66009016	Sɔunbe le kɔmɔtaanw lugo gɔ mu bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Inɛw muɲu kɛmɛ kɛmɛ suŋu lɛi bɛin.
66009017	Mu kunrin kuu iye gɔ nɛ sɔun gɔbe lee, inɛw kuu bemɛ nɛ yaŋabɛin gɔbe lee iyaabɔn. Be inrun arugoi yaun banrun gin’ biyaa, bulɔbulɔ gin’ biyaa, sidu gin’ yulɔpurun gin’ biyaa, yasɛbɛin. Sɔun gɔbe kuu yara kuu gin’ bee. Aŋa bemɛ nɛ yaun lee, kukumɔ lee, sidu lee gooube.
66009018	Inɛw gamulu taaniye turu gɔi mɔɲu taanu kɔɔbe le daabɛin: Yaun lee, kukumɔ lee, sidu lee, sɔun gɔbe aŋa nɛ goobe gɔ le daabɛin.
66009019	Sabu sɔun gɔbe paŋa, aŋa bemɛ nɛ lee, dulɔ bemɛ nɛ lee too. Dulɔ bemɛ yuguru murin bee. Dulɔ gɔbe kuu yasin, kole inɛw bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanraunbɛin.
66009020	Inɛw wajunw, mɔɲu kɔɔbe le digɛu yinwɛnnɛ gɔbe, numɔ bemɛ le kijɛ be yeguru sibɛ go bana bemɛ duliyemɔnɛ. Be jinrunbe lee, degebe kange le ma, sarudu le ma, mɛnu le ma, tibu le ma, baga le ma yegeraaɲu, giri iyeenɛ, suguru ɛgɛɛnɛ, yoi yai bɛɛnɛ gɔbe lee, demɛniyɛnmu pajanɛ.
66009021	Inɛw gɔbe, inɛ dai bemɛ dɛi ma, dugu bemɛ dɛi ma, sala bemɛ dɛi ma, gunyɔn bemɛ dɛi ma, bana bemɛ duliyemɔnɛ.
66010001	Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ waja, anrankulumɔ sɔi gin’ kunaa alagala gowaa sugou wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Kuu womɔ nɛ nɔmɔsijei bee. Girupala womɔ nai gin’ bee, kubɔ womɔbe yaun jɛin gin’ bee.
66010002	Wo numɔ womɔ le dɔn dagi yagɛlɛbe. Dɔn gɔ pinɛlaa bee. Wo kubɔ iin gɔ nɛudii nɛ bojaa, kubɔ nana gɔ minɛ nɛ bojaa sɛbe.
66010003	Yara durojɛ gin’ wo mii diyɛ le kɔnwaanbe. Wo kɔnwaan, anrandagulu kosɔi gɔbe mii bemɛ goonaabɛin.
66010004	Anrandagulu kosɔi gɔbe waaru sɔɔ be sɔi le, mu tɔtɔŋɔdɔn ga bɔun. Kaa alagala gowaa mu mii ɛgaabɔn, sɔwaa gi: «Anrandagulu kosɔi gɔbe sɔɔ gin gɔ baŋurun bojo. Wogɔ tɔŋɔnɔu.»
66010005	Mɛlɛnkɛ nɛudii kuu nɛ lee, minɛ kuu nɛ lee iŋɛu wo wɔu mu iyi gɔ numɔ iin womɔ alagala go jeɲaa,
66010006	asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ alagala lee, kɔlɔ womɔ nɛ kijɛ toin lee, minɛ lee, kijɛ wo nɛ too lee, nɛudii lee, kɔlɔ womɔ nɛ kijɛ toin lee maŋanɛ gɔ le unruin jɛbiyaabe. Wo jɛbiyaa, dɔmiyɛnɲu waaru waja wɔlɔ gi.
66010007	Kaa mɛlɛnkɛ sɔiye gɔ, waaru kaan sujɔi wo tɔlaajɛ, Ama sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ kikibedo. Inɛw Ama titiyaanw birɛ womɔ birɛnw bɛrɛ Ama bana wo tagu le kɛukɛu kibedo.
66010008	Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala gowaa mii mu ɛgu gɔ mu le pilemaa sɔwaa gi: «Yaa, mɛlɛnkɛ nɛudii kuu nɛ lee, minɛ kuu nɛ lee iŋɛ numɔ nɛ dɔn dagi pinɛlaa wɔɔ gɔ yaba.»
66010009	Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ womaa dɔn gɔ mu bɛrɛ obo gɛɛu, wo bɛrɛ yaabɔn. Wo mu le sɔwaa gi: «Yaba kaya. Bɛrɛ uwɔ kɔlɔ nɛ gagaaru gɔ biyɛdo, kaa aŋa uwɔ nɛ yɛin gin’ ɛɛli biyɛdo.»
66010010	Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ numɔ nɛ dɔn gɔ yabaa kayaabɔn. Aŋa ma nɛ dɔn gɔ yɛin gin’ ɛɛli bee. Kaa waaru kayaa mu kilu le, bɛrɛ ma nɛ gagaaru gɔ bee.
66010011	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu le kijɛ gin: «Nimɛ kanran tɔgu joo lee, gana joo lee, sɔɔ joo lee, ɔgɔnw joo lee dɛi, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi u sɔɔun jaain wɔɔ.»
66011001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ saguba, baga kijɛ tunwin gin’ biyaa, mu bɛrɛ obaa kijɛ gin: «Ingele, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ lee, sadagadumu gɔ lee tunwɔn. Iyaa inɛw Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ Ama demɛniyɛnmɔuwɔin gɔbe lugo.
66011002	Kaa Ama Ginrun Diyɛ, bain gonɔ gɔ yapaja, tunwɔnnɔu. Sabu wogɔ inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ obaatin. Be iyepilu pɛnai lɛisigɛ, ana diyɛ Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ gɔ kubɔ le nanamadɛin.
66011003	Waaru kɔɔbe nɛ, mu sɛɛrɛ goonw lɛi mabei sɔi sɛmɛlɛ goriyemu ye, bai muɲu lee suŋu lɛi pɛlukuloi kɔɔbe nɛ sɔɔ Ama bɛrɛ goi sɔɔ ga, gɔnrɔn bei ohobodɔn.»
66011004	Sɛɛrɛ goonw lɛi gɔbe, minɛ kuu baŋa giru nɛ oliwe tiun lɛi lee, pilɛlɔn lɛi lee wɔin gɔ bei.
66011005	Inɛ turu be bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanrun ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, aŋa bemɛ nɛ yaun gowaa ye jaŋuw bemɛ gɔi suyotiijɛ. Inɛ be bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanranjɛ ga wɔɔ baŋa gɔi kunrin daaun jaan.
66011006	Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi waaru be sɔɔjɛ gɔ le, anran miinɔu giye be alagala pinɛɲu gɔnrɔn yasin. Dii gɔbe ili tanugaɲu gɔnrɔn yasin. Waaru be dɛnɛjɛ puu le mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin minɛ nɛ tiiɲu gɔnrɔn yasin.
66011007	Waaru sɛɛrɛ bemɛ gowaa be kibemaajɛ, bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ nɛ olunawan goojɛ gɔ be le kɔmɔ tai ye, kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛi ye, bei dadaado.
66011008	Yiun bemɛ ana diyɛ pɔŋɔrɔn gɔ nɛ biyɛdo. Inɛw Baŋa bemɛi baga jai nɛ ana pɛgin gɔ tee woi. Sɔɔ babaŋa le ana gɔ Sodomɛ ma, Ejipute ma gɛɛɲu.
66011009	Tɔgu puu lee, ginrun puu lee, sɔɔ puu lee, gana puu lee inɛw, bai taanu lee pɛjɛrɛ lee, yiun bemɛ yɛyɛnɛdɛin. Be yiun gɔbei ɔnsain nɛ kunɔmɔ ga yabaidenɛ.
66011010	Minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin gɔbe be sabu dɛi kinɛ ɛɛli le biyɛdɛin. Be kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔdɛin. Be tunmɔ bɛrɛ sin obu titiidɛin, sabu inɛw Ama titiyaanw lɛi kɔɔbe minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin gɔbei ɛjii ɔɲɔmaatiyaabɛin.
66011011	Bai taanu lee pɛjɛrɛ gɔ lee galaai ye, ɔnmɔ kikinu Ama bɛrɛ goi wɛi ye be nɛ yoyoodo. Be ingelaa ye kubɔ kuu nɛ ihiŋiyɛndɛin. Liliyɛ diyɛ, inɛw bei iyeidɛin kinɛ nɛ yoyoodo.
66011012	Inɛw Ama titiyaanw lɛi gɔbe, mii diyɛ alagala goi ye be le ɔn gin’ sɔɔnu wo wɔnu ɛhɛgɛdɛin: «Ɔn nɛ uloi.» Kunrin, be jaŋuw gɔbe bei yɛnɛnu be wɔnu, be anrankulumɔ nɛ alagala uhulodɛin.
66011013	Waaru kɔɔ le tee minɛ ɛjii jijigedo. Ana diyɛ gɔ gamulu pɛluye koturu susugodo. Inɛw muɲu sɔi minɛjigu kɔɔ nɛ yinwɛndɛin. Wajunw gɔbe ɛjii liliyɛdɛin. Be alagala Ama gɔi bababadɛin.
66011014	Bɔnrɔn lɛiye gɔ galaai. Kaa taaniye gɔ kowɛɛjɛ.
66011015	Mɛlɛnkɛ sɔiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Alagala nɛ mii diyɛ diyɛ gowaa gi: «Aduna laamu gɔ Inɛw Baŋa Ama emɛ lee, Yabanɛ Diyɛ wo tii lee bɛrɛ taŋaai. Wo asuu nasuu laamu kakanrando.»
66011016	Inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ Ama giru nɛ ɔgɔdɔin bemɛ nɛ daanbɛin gɔbe tuŋiyaan, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa, Amai demɛniyɛnmaabɛin.
66011017	Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa, u yabeu, yɔɔ baŋa gɔ, gɔnrɔn diyɛ uwɔ le digɛu, laamu uwɔ u daanu gɔ dɛi, emɛ ui birɛpoo tagauwɔin.
66011018	Tɔgu wajunw, kinɛ banraan bɛin. Kaa kinɛbanrun uwɔ gɔ wiyaai. Yiun saliyɛ kireɲu waaru dɔwaai. Inɛw Ama titiyaanw birɛbirɛnw uwɔ gɔbe lee, Ama inɛw, boi uwɔ liyɛnw, diyɛnw lee, dagunw lee, tujɔun waaru dɔwaai. Inɛw minɛi yamalau wɔin gɔbei yamalaun waaru dɔwaai.»
66011019	Kɔɔ waaru le, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ alagala nɛ pinɛlaabɛin. Ama aaru koro gɔ Ginrun Diyɛ womɔ nɛ iyemaabe. Anrangiriyenube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrandagulube lee, minɛjigu lee, anransaŋaran diyɛ lee biyaabe.
66012001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ sɛɛrɛ diyɛ alagala nɛ iyemaabe: Yaanran, nai gɔ sɔi gin’ kunaa, iyepilu kubɔ womɔbe doɲu nɛ wɔɔ, tolo pɛli lɛisigɛ ɔgɔdomɔi kuu womɔ nɛ kunaa bee.
66012002	Wo, bɛrɛ dɔɔ le bee. Nɔrun dɛinyaan ɔɲɔu, duru duroube.
66012003	Sɛɛrɛ waja alagala nɛ iyemaabe: Olunawan demɛrɛn diyɛ, banrin biyaa wɔɔi. Kuu kosɔi sɛɛ, kɛlɛ pɛlu sɛɛ, kuu gɔ tuturu nɛ ɔgɔdomɔ yato.
66012004	Wo dulɔ womɔ le alagala tolo gamulu taaniye koturu sɛmaa minɛ nɛ kamaa sunugaabe. Yaanran nɔrun daan gɔ, ii narannu wo digɛnu tɛnwɛndo ga, olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ giru womɔ nɛ iŋiyaan bee.
66012005	Yaanran gɔ ii naraanbe, ainii. Ii gɔ inrun sɔsɔru le aduna tɔgu wooi gigirɛdo. Kaa ii kɔɔi jeɲaa, Ama lee, ɔgɔdɔin womɔ lee giru nɛ unin.
66012006	Yaanran gɔ, olusolo nɛ, Ama wo dɛi yalu yegeraa yasɛbe. Wo yalu wogɔ nɛ bai muɲu lee suŋu lɛi pɛlukuloi nɛ pana womɔ kunɔmɔ ga jɔbaa yaabe.
66012007	Kɔɔ waaru le alagala nɛ kɔmɔ biyaabe. Mɛlɛnkɛbe puu kuu baŋa Misɛlu lee, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe lee, olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ le jaiyaabɛin. Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ yaa, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe le, be le jaiyaabe.
66012008	Kaa olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ gɔnrɔn bɛɛlu. Be alagala nɛ waja yalu biyɛɲu bɛɛnɛ.
66012009	Kunrin olunawan demɛrɛn diyɛ kɔɔ, pɔɔlɔ baa yuguru gɔ, boi womɔ jinrun puu kuu baŋa lee, Setanu lee gɛɛɲu gɔ, aduna inɛw puu lelemɔnɛ gɔ, woi minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaaɲu. Wo lee, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe wo le bariyaa, bei minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaaɲu.
66012010	Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala nɛ mu mii diyɛ ɛgaabɔn, kijɛ gɛɛbe: «Nɛɛ Ama emɛ yayabu gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, laamu gɔ lee, iyaa Yabanɛ Diyɛ wo tii paŋa gɔ lee wiyaa dɔwaain. Sabu ba unrunw emɛ jaaranɛ gɔ, aga lee, digɛ lee, Ama emɛ giru nɛ bei jaarau bee baŋa gɔ, woi minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaaɲu.
66012011	Ba unrunw emɛ gɔbe, Peju Ii ili gɔ le woi gɔnraanɲu. Sɛɛrɛ be goi sɔɔ gɔ le woi gɔnraanɲu. Be kinrun bemɛ pajaa yinwɛn ga yabaabɛin.
66012012	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e alagalabe lee, alagala nɛ wɔin gɔbe lee, kinɛ ebe ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Minɛ lee, nɛudii lee, bɔnrɔn ebei, sabu jinrun puu kuu baŋa e nɛ sugaai. Wo bɛrɛ waaru gaila sai waju wo igii wɔɔ dɛi, kinɛbanrun diyɛ le wɔɔ.»
66012013	Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, minɛ nɛ woi kamaa tiyaatin ga waaru wo iyi le, wo yaanran aini narannɛ gɔ onu nɛ nanaa digiyaabe.
66012014	Kɔɔ waaru le, yaanran gɔ womaa olusolo nɛ yalu womɔ sibɛ nɛ kili ye yaa ga, sasaa anrankɔ diyɛ gamuju lɛi gɔ wo bɛrɛ obaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ wo anranguju taanu, iyepilu kuloi, yuguru gɔ le wagee bii ye pana womɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
66012015	Yaanran gɔi dibe balujɛ ye yaa ga, yuguru gɔ aŋa unrunmɔ le dibe dii gin’ turaa yaanran gɔ onu nɛ tiyaabe.
66012016	Kaa minɛ, yaanran gɔi yabaabe. Aŋa unrunmɔ gɔmaa, dibe dii, olunawan demɛrɛn aŋa womɔ le turaa tii gɔi miraanjɛ.
66012017	Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, yaanran gɔ le kinɛ ɛjii banraanbe. Wo yaanran gɔ unrunw wajunw, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛlin gɔbe, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goin gɔbe, be le kɔmɔ taai yaabe.
66012018	Wo nɛudii diŋirun nɛ sɔsɔun diin kuu nɛ iŋiyaanbe.
66013001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ olunawan turu nɛudii nɛ wo goou mu iyaabɔn. Wo kɛlɛ kopɛlu sɛbe, kuu kosɔi sɛbe. Kɛlɛ womɔbe nɛ ɔgɔdomɔ pɛlu yabe. Kuu womɔbe nɛ Ama boi yamulu boibe yatɔŋɔbe.
66013002	Olunawan mu iyi gɔ, yunrun tɔgu turu le murin wɔɔ. Kubɔ womɔbe, olunawan urusu kubɔ gin’ bee. Aŋa womɔ yara aŋa gin’ bee. Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, gɔnrɔn unrunmɔ lee, ɔgɔdɔin unrunmɔ lee, paŋa diyɛ lee, wo bɛrɛ obaabe.
66013003	Olunawan gɔ kuu turu gɔ barumaa yinwɛndo ga bee. Kaa barumu yiun baa bee kɔɔ bajaai. Aduna gɔ puu wogɔ iyaa, be bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaa, olunawan gɔi dimiyaanbɛin.
66013004	Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, olunawan gɔ bɛrɛ paŋa wo obu dɛi, be olunawan demɛrɛn gɔi demɛniyɛnmaabɛin. Be iyaa olunawan gɔi demɛniyɛnmaa ɔn gin’ gɛɛubɛin: «Olunawan gɔ le murin wɔɔ baŋa gɔ yago wɔɔ? Aa wo le jaiyi bɛɛjɛ?»
66013005	Olunawan gɔ bɛrɛ kuu ulo sɔɔ sɔi lee, Ama boi yamulu sɔɔ sɔi lee aŋa obaaɲu. Iyepilu pɛnai lɛisigɛ birɛ womɔ birɛ ga, wo bɛrɛ paŋa obaaɲu.
66013006	Wo aŋa gɔmaa Amai duyɔ, boi womɔ yamala, yalu wo wɔɔ gɔ lee, alagala nɛ inɛw konɛ toin gɔbe lee dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔ, kanraunbe.
66013007	Ama inɛw le jai jaiyi ye bei gɔnrɔn ga paŋa wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu. Ginrun wooi lee, tɔgu wooi lee, sɔɔ wooi lee, gana wooi lee kuu nɛ paŋa wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
66013008	Iyaa minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin puu, aduna maŋamɔ nɛ baa, inɛw boi bemɛ Peju Ii sɛnwin ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋɔnɛ gɔbe puu, woi dedemɛniyɛnmɔdɛin.
66013009	“Inɛ suguru too baŋa wo keŋiyɛn.
66013010	Inɛ waajibi kaju yoo ga wɔɔ gɔ, wo kaju yoyoodo. Inɛ waajibi polukaaba le daa ga wɔɔ gɔ, polukaaba le dadaadɛin. Ama inɛw gɔbe, ɛɛn go bii nɛ lee, gagawu nɛ lee, kijɛ dɛi biyɛun be jaan gɔ kɔɔ woi.”
66013011	Kɔɔ onu nɛ olunawan waja, minɛ nɛ gowaa wo wɛɛun mu iyaabɔn. Wo kɛlɛ lɛi, peju ii kɛlɛ murin yasɛbe. Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔube.
66013012	Olunawan pɔlɔ gɔ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ puu le, wo giru womɔ nɛ birɛ birɛjɛ. Wo minɛ lee, inɛw minɛ nɛ wɔin gɔ puu leei paŋa le olunawan pɔlɔ, barumaa yinwɛndo ga bee, kaa sɛɛu bajumui gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔmɔube.
66013013	Wo sɛɛrɛ diyɛ diyɛ kanraunbe. Halu inɛw be yɛnɛnu, alagala goi ye minɛ nɛ yaun sugomɔube.
66013014	Olunawan gɔ giru nɛ sɛɛrɛ kanran ga wo bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obin gɔ le wo aduna nɛ inɛw toin gɔbei lelemɔjɛ. Be bɛrɛ sɔɔu, bemaa olunawan polukaaba le barumaa, yinwɛnlu gɔ dɛi dege yegere gɛɛube.
66013015	Dege gɔ sɔɔ sɔi bɛɛ ga, iyaa, inɛw woi demɛniyɛnmɔɔnɛ gɔbei dai bɛɛ ga, olunawan lɛiye gɔ bɛrɛ dege gɔi ɔnmɔi bojo paŋa obaaɲu.
66013016	Olunawan gɔ, inɛw puu bɛrɛ, inɛw diyɛnw sɛlɛ, dagunw sɛlɛ, ɔgɔ unrunw sɛlɛ, dɛgugunw sɛlɛ, gunɔw sɛlɛ, gunɔwin laain sɛlɛ, numɔ iin bemɛ nɛ ma, didimɛ bemɛ nɛ ma, sɛɛrɛ kunɔ kaaramɔube.
66013017	Iyaa inɛ turu kanran, olunawan gɔ sɛɛrɛ sɛlɛ go, tiyɛ gɔ, boi womɔ ma, boi womɔ le lugo tenɛjɛ gɔ ma sɛlɛ go, ebu ɛbɛ ma, dɔnrun dɔnrɔn ma, kara sɛbele.
66013018	Ɔn nɛ hakilɛ siyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛ jugɔ sɛɛ gɔ, olunawan gɔ le lugo sɛgɛrɛjɛ gɔ iijɛ yɛnɛ. Sabu inɛ lugoi. Lugo womɔ gɔ suŋu kuloi, pɛlukuloi kuloisigɛ.
66014001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaabɔn. Peju Ii gɔ Siɔn kokoo nɛ kohiŋɛ. Inɛw muɲu suŋu lee muɲu pɛnai naisigɛ wo le yabɛin. Boi womɔ lee, wo Ba boi lee didimɛ bemɛ nɛ yatɔŋɔbe.
66014002	Alagala gowaa soguru diyɛ, dii diyɛ soguru gin’, anrandagulu diyɛ soguru gin’ mu ɛgaabɔn. Soguru gɔ giŋiru baanw, giŋiru baaɲu gin’ wɔɔ.
66014003	Inɛw muɲu joo kɔɔbe ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee giru nɛ nii kana niiubɛin. Inɛw muɲu suŋu lee muɲu pɛnai naisigɛ, minɛ nɛ dɔrugin kɔɔbei laa go, inɛ turu kanran nii gɔ dee bɛɛbele.
66014004	Inɛw kɔɔbe, yaanw le unrunbei lɔgɔjiyɛmɔnɛ, sabu be yaanran inin. Be Peju Ii gɔ yalu yaajɛ wooi nɛ, woi dimiyɛnɲu. Inɛw logoro nɛ bei dɔrugaa, dɛnrɛn ii pɔlɔ gin’ Ama lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee bɛrɛ bei obin.
66014005	Iyaa aŋa bemɛ nɛ kakalu turu kanran tɛmɛmɔlu. Jarugu be le wɔlɔ.
66014006	Mu mɛlɛnkɛ waja alagala go ɛjii ulaa kiliyeu wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Wo Kibɛru Ɛju asuu wɔɔ aduna inɛw wooi, gana puu lee, ginrun puu lee, sɔɔ puu lee, tɔgu puu lee bɛrɛ tagaɲu yasɛbe.
66014007	Wo mii ɛɛn le sɔɔu gi: «Ama saliyɛ kiru waaru gɔ dɔwaai. Kodigɛu, Ama giri liyɛi, woi babai. Alagala lee, minɛ lee, nɛudii lee, diipujobe lee maŋanɛ gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔi.»
66014008	Mɛlɛnkɛ waja, lɛiye gɔ, pɔlɔ gɔi digiyaabe. Kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Wo numaai, wo numaai, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ, tɔgu gɔbe puu bɛrɛ sala mɔɲu womɔ resɛndii ilɛ ilɛ nɔɔmɔnɛ gɔ, wo numaai.»
66014009	Mɛlɛnkɛ waja, taaniye gɔ, bei digiyaa, mii diyɛ le kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Inɛ aai kanran, olunawan gɔ lee, dege womɔ leei demɛniyɛnmaa, iyaa, didimɛ womɔ nɛ ma, numɔ womɔ nɛ ma, sɛɛrɛ biyaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ,
66014010	wo kanran, Ama kinɛbanrun resɛndii ilɛ sumɔla go kinɛbanrun gelu womɔ nɛ kunaaɲu gɔ nɔnɔɔdo. Iyaa mɛlɛnkɛ ɛjaain gɔbe giru nɛ lee, Peju Ii gɔ giru nɛ lee, wo yaun lee, sidu lee nɛ ɛjii ɔhɔɲɔdo.
66014011	Yaun bei ɔɲɔmɔjɛ kukumɔ gɔ asuu nasuu uhulodo. Iyaa be inɛw olunawan gɔ lee, dege womɔ lee demɛniyɛnmɔw gɔbe, inɛ aai kanran olunawan gɔ boi sɛɛrɛ biyaajɛ gɔ, be aga lee, digɛ lee deeliye sɛnɛ.»
66014012	Ama inɛw, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛliyɛɲu gɔbe lee, Yesu nɛ gagawu bemɛ kɔɔlɔmɔnɛ gɔbe lee, kijɛ dɛi ɛɛn go be biyɛun jaan gɔ kɔɔ woi.
66014013	Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala gowaa mu mii ɛgaabɔn, kijɛ gɛɛbe: «Sɔɔ ɔn tɔŋɔ: ‘Kanɛ baa Inɛw Baŋa nɛ tou inɛw yinwɛnɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.’ » Ama Kikinu saa gi: «Narain, be ɔɲɛ bemɛ nɛ dedeeliyedɛin, sabu birɛ ɛju bemɛ onu bemɛ nɛ yadimiyɛndo.»
66014014	Iyaa mu yɛnaa, kulumɔ pilu kowɔɔ. Kulumɔ gɔ kuu nɛ, kijɛ ɔnmɔ turu, Adama ii murin yadaanbe. Kuu womɔ nɛ kange ɔgɔdomɔ yatobe, numɔ womɔ nɛ kɔrɔgoi sii yatobe.
66014015	Mɛlɛnkɛ waja Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ gowaa, kulumɔ kuu nɛ daan baŋa gɔ le mii diyɛ le kɔnwɔunbe: «Kɔrɔgoi uwɔ tiyaa ye gɛlu gɛlɛ. Sabu minɛ dɛnrɛn gɔ ilaai, gɛlu gɛlɛɲu waaru dɔwaai.»
66014016	Kɔɔ waaru le kulumɔ kuu nɛ daan baŋa gɔ kɔrɔgoi unrunmɔ minɛ nɛ gaanaabe. Minɛ gɛlaabɛin.
66014017	Mɛlɛnkɛ waja alagala nɛ Ama Ginrun Diyɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ gowaabe. Wo kanran kɔrɔgoi sii turu yasɛbe.
66014018	Mɛlɛnkɛ waja, mɛlɛnkɛ yaun kuu nɛ paŋa sɛɛ, sadagadumu gɔ nɛ gowaa kɔrɔgoi sii sɛɛ baŋa gɔ le mii diyɛ le sɔwaa gi: «Kɔrɔgoi sii uwɔ tiyaa ye, minɛ resɛn tuɲɔ gɔbe kɛjɛ, sabu resɛn gɔbe ilaain.»
66014019	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ kɔrɔgoi womɔ minɛ nɛ gaanaabe. Wo minɛ resɛn na gɔbe gɛlaa, resɛn gɔ Ama kinɛbanrun resɛn ii yalu namaɲu diyɛ gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabe.
66014020	Resɛn ii gɔ, ana laara go resɛn ii yalu namaɲu gɔ nɛ namaabɛin. Resɛn ii yalu namaɲu gɔ nɛ ili gowaa bumaa kilomɛtɛrɛ suŋu taanu yai. Totoo womɔ minɛ nɛ gowaai ye sɔun karumu nɛ dɔɔube.
66015001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu alagala nɛ sɛɛrɛ waja, sɛɛrɛ diyɛ, iyaa maunɛ wɔɔ iyaabɔn: Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi, jaabu sɔi gɛliyaa bɛin. Mɔɲu dumɔrɔn gɔbe bei, sabu Ama kinɛbanrun gɔ be le digɛnu kibedo.
66015002	Mu wɛɛrɛ nɛudii gin’ iyaabɔn. Yaun le bariyaa bee gin’ wɔɔ. Olunawan gɔ lee, dege womɔ lee, boi womɔ le lugo sɛgɛrɛjɛ gɔ lee kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaaɲu bɛɛnw gɔbe, nɛudii gɔ kuu nɛ iŋiyaan bɛin. Ama giŋiru gɔbe numɔ bemɛ nɛ yato.
66015003	Be Ama birɛbirɛnɛ Mɔise nii gɔ lee, Peju Ii nii gɔ lee niiubɛin: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ, birɛ uwɔ gɔbe gaai wɔin, ɛjunaa gabaain. Ganabe ɔgɔnɛ, oju uwɔbe teitai wɔin, narain.
66015004	Inɛw Baŋa, inɛ aa ui liyɛɛlɛ, boi uwɔ sɔmɔɔlɛ wɔɔ? Sabu u turu sai ɛjaa wɔɔ. Gana gɔbe wooi wɛi ye, giru uwɔ nɛ ui dedemɛniyɛnmɔdɛin. Sabu birɛ teitai uwɔ gɔbe iyemaajɛ.»
66015005	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaa, alagala nɛ Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ aaru guju kuru Ama Ginrun gɔ pinɛlaai.
66015006	Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi, jaabu sɔi gɛlɛbɛin gɔbe Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ gowaabɛin. Be lɛn sɔi tɔitɔi ɛju doorojɛ kunaa bɛin. Gegeɲɛ bemɛ nɛ kange tɛmu pagaa sɛbɛin.
66015007	Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe logoro nɛ turu baŋa, mɛlɛnkɛ sɔi gɔbe bɛrɛ kange dii gelu kosɔi obaabe. Ama asuu nasuu wɔɔ kinɛbanrun konɛ jooi bee.
66015008	Kɔɔ wo biyaa, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ, Ama dooro lee, Ama gɔnrɔn lee digɛu, kukumɔ le jooi biyaabe. Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi jaabu sɔi gɔbe kibeido baa, inɛ turu kanran Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ yoi bɛɛbele.
66016001	Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ mii diyɛ gowaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gɛɛu wo wɔu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Yaai, Ama kinɛbanrun diikɔrɔi kosɔi gɔbe minɛ nɛ togo tii.»
66016002	Mɛlɛnkɛ pɔlɔ gɔ yaa, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ minɛ nɛ togaa tii. Inɛw olunawan gɔ sɛɛrɛ sɛin, dege womɔ demɛniyɛnmi gɔbe goju nɛ mirun mɔɲu tɛugu gowaabe.
66016003	Mɛlɛnkɛ lɛiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ nɛudii nɛ togaa kunu. Nɛudii gɔ inɛ yiun ili gin’ biyaai. Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nɛudii nɛ tobɛin puu yinwaain.
66016004	Mɛlɛnkɛ taaniye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ dibebe lee, diipujobe lee nɛ togaa kunu. Wogɔbe ili taŋaai.
66016005	Mɛlɛnkɛ dii baŋa gɔ ɔn gin’ wo sɔɔu mu ɛgaabɔn: «U yɔɔ baŋa gɔ, yabe baŋa gɔ, u ɛjaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, ɔn gin’ saliyɛ u kiru gɔ digɛu, u teitai wɔu.
66016006	Sabu be Ama inɛw ili togaabɛin, inɛw Ama titiyaanw ili togaabɛin. U kanran, bemaa ili nɔɔ ga, be bɛrɛ obaajɛu. Wogɔ be le dagaa wɔɔ.»
66016007	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu sadagadumu mii gɔ ɛgaabɔn, sɔwaa gi: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ, naran go saliyɛ uwɔ gɔbe narain, teitai wɔin.»
66016008	Mɛlɛnkɛ naiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ nai nɛ togaa kɔɔru. Nai, yaun womɔ le inɛwin tɛgɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabe.
66016009	Kunrin nai uju diyɛ inɛwin tɛgaabe. Be Ama, mɔɲu kɔɔ kuu nɛ paŋa sɛɛ baŋa gɔi duyaabɛin. Be bana bemɛ duliyemɔ ye woi babanɛ.
66016010	Mɛlɛnkɛ numɔrɔnye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ olunawan gɔ ɔgɔdɔin nɛ togaa tiyaabe. Olunawan gɔ laamu, yalu puu ɔlɔi biyaai. Inɛw goju jiun dɛi ninɛ bemɛ tɛnwɛunbɛin.
66016011	Tɛu bemɛ lee, mirun bemɛ lee dɛi, be alagala Ama gɔi duyaabɛin. Bana bemɛ duliyemɔ ye, kanran mɔɲu bemɛ paja ga yabanɛ.
66016012	Mɛlɛnkɛ kuloiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ Eparate dibe diyɛ gɔ nɛ togaa kunaabe. Duu sibɛ go goi ye ɔgɔnw wɛɛnw gɔbe bɛrɛ oju yegere ga dii gɔ paain.
66016013	Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ aŋa nɛ lee, olunawan gɔ aŋa nɛ lee, iyaa inɛ titiyainɛ kakaluginɛ gɔ aŋa nɛ lee, kikinu mɔɲu taanu, tɔru murin biyaa, goou be wɔu iyaabɔn.
66016014	Wogɔbe jinrunbe kikinui. Sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn kanranwin. Iyaa be aduna ɔgɔnw puu bɛrɛ yayaaɲu, Ama, gɔnrɔn wooi sɛɛ baŋa bai diyɛ gɔ le kɔmɔ taaidɛin gɔ dɛi bei mɔmɔɔnɔɲu.
66016015	Inɛw Baŋa sɔwaa gi: «Yɛnɛ, mu gugunyɔnnɛ gin’ wɛɛjɔn. Inɛ giri yeiyelu go biyaa, unrun sɔi tolo go yaanɔu ga, inɛw giru nɛ dɔgɔ iyenɔu ga, sɔi unrunmɔbe gɛliyaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, Ama wo yabu.»
66016016	Jinrun kɔɔbe, ɔgɔnw gɔbei yalu turu nɛ mɔɔnaabɛin. Heburu sɔɔ le yalu gɔ boi Harumagedɔn gɛɛɲu.
66016017	Mɛlɛnkɛ sɔiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ wɛwɛi nɛ togu. Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gowaa, mii diyɛ ɛgɛmaa, sɔwaa gi: «Kanraan kilaai.»
66016018	Anrangiriyenube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrandagulube lee, minɛjigu diyɛ lee biyaabe. Aduna nɛ inɛw mɔii nɛ, minɛjigu kɔɔ tɔgu biyɛtɛlu, puu dɛi mɔɲu bee.
66016019	Ana diyɛ gɔ gamulu taanu kɛjiyaabe. Ganabe ana gɔbe puu numaai. Ama, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ bɛrɛ kinɛbanrun diyɛ unrunmɔ resɛndii ilɛ gelu gɔ obodo ga woi naŋaraanbe.
66016020	Gana dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ gɔbe puu manaai. Kokoo gɔbe yaa iyemɔlu.
66016021	Anransaŋaran diyɛ diyɛ, dedemɛ bemɛ kilo pɛnainai baa, alagala gowaa inɛw kuu nɛ sugaabɛin. Inɛw, anransaŋaran yanwan gɔ dɛi Amai duyaabɛin, sabu yanwan gɔ mɔɲuniyaan gabaai.
66017001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ dii gelu kosɔi gɛlɛbɛin gɔbe logoro nɛ, turu wiyaa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Wɛɛ, yaanran dimu le kayanɛ diyɛ, dibe joo genɛ nɛ daan gɔ kuu nɛ jarugu duurin gɔ, mu u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.
66017002	Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe wo le sala salaabɛin, iyaa aduna inɛw gɔbe sala womɔ kɔɲɔ nɔwaan bimiliyaabɛin.»
66017003	Ama Kikinu kuu ma nɛ wo sugaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mui jeɲaa olusolo nɛ jɛyaabe. Yaanran turu olunawan banrun kuu nɛ dɛinyaan wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Olunawan gɔ goju puu nɛ Ama boi yamulu boibe tɔŋaa bee. Wo kuu sɔi, kɛlɛ pɛlu sɛbe.
66017004	Yaanran gɔ sɔi banrun dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ lee, sɔi banrun waja lee arugoii tobe. Kange lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ dugɔi lee le unruin saŋaraan bee. Numɔ womɔ le wo kange dii gelu, kijɛ dɔgɔgu lee, sala womɔ lɔgɔ lee joonaa, yasɛbe.
66017005	Didimɛ womɔ nɛ boi tiyɛ babaŋa yatɔŋɔbe gi: “Dimu le kayanw lee, aduna sɔɔ dɔgɔgu lee na Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ.”
66017006	Yaanran kɔɔ, Ama inɛw ili lee, Yesu dɛi iŋiyaan yinwin ili lee le bimiliyaa wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Woi iyaa, mu bɛrɛ saii maunɛ kanraanbe.
66017007	Kɔɔ gin’ wo biyaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Inge dɛi ui maunɛ kanranmɔuwɔu? Mu yaanran gɔ lee, olunawan woi duiyaa, kuu sɔi, kɛlɛ pɛlu sɛɛ gɔ lee, sɔɔ boŋurun bemɛ u bɛrɛ tatagadɔn.
66017008	Olunawan u iyi gɔ ɔnmɔi yabe, kaa kanɛ wɔlɔ. Wo bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ nɛ goi ye suiyiyaado. Aduna inɛw, aduna maŋi le baa, boi bemɛ ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋɔnɛ gɔbe, olunawan gɔ ɔnmɔi bee, kaa wɔlɔ, pilemu ye ihiyemɔdo dɛi, woi iyaa ye be bɛrɛ maunɛ biyɛdo.
66017009	«Yalu ɔn nɛ hakilɛ sɔɔ paamu kanrun obojɛ gɔ siyɛun jaain wɔɔ: Kuu sɔi gɔbe, kokoo kosɔii. Yaanran gɔ, kokoo wogɔbe kuu nɛ daan. Wogɔ iyaa ɔgɔnw kosɔii.
66017010	Numɔrɔn gɔbe numaa galaain, koturu gɔ kanɛ woi wɔɔ, waja gɔ nimɛ wɛɛlu. Waaru wo wiyaa, wo waaru gaila sai biyɛdo.
66017011	Olunawan ɔnmɔi bee, kaa wɔlɔ wɔɔ gɔ, kuu womɔ le wo ɔgɔnɛ gagaraye gɔi. Wo iyaa ɔgɔnw sɔi gɔbe logoro nɛ ɔgɔnɛ turui. Wo suiyi nɛ yaajɛ.
66017012	«Kɛlɛ pɛlu u iyi gɔ ɔgɔnw pɛlui. Be nimɛ kanran laamu bɛɛnɛ. Kaa olunawan gɔ le bariyaa ye, lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ ɔgɔwin biyɛ ga, be wogɔ paŋa bɛbɛɛdɛin.
66017013	Be wooi puu ajubu turu gɔi sɛin. Iyaa be gɔnrɔn bemɛ lee, paŋa bemɛ lee, olunawan gɔ numɔ nɛ papajadɛin.
66017014	Be Peju Ii gɔ le kɔmɔ tataadɛin. Kaa Peju Ii gɔ inɛw baŋabe wooi Inɛw Baŋai, ɔgɔnw wooi Ɔgɔnɛi digɛu, wo, inɛw boonaaɲu, yɛmaaɲu, sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin womɔbe le kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛdo.»
66017015	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ iyaa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Dibe joo u iye gɔ, yaanran dimu le kayanɛ yalu daan gɔ, wogɔbe tɔgubei, inɛw joobei, ganabei, iyaa sɔɔbei.
66017016	Kɛlɛ pɛlu u iyi gɔ lee, olunawan gɔ lee, be yaanran dimu le kayanɛ gɔi ihibiliyɛdɛin. Be kijɛ womɔ puu pɔnɔrɔn ye goju ije le woi pajadɛin. Nawan womɔ tɛnwɛn ye, yaun le woi tɛgɛrɛdɛin.
66017017	Sabu Ama bemaa kijɛ unrun kɛjaajɛ gɔ kanran ga, kinɛ bemɛ nɛ kunaabe. Kunrin, be wooi puu ajubu turu le bii ye, Ama sɔɔ gɔbe kibeido baa, ɔgɔ paŋa bemɛ gɔ olunawan gɔ numɔ nɛ paja ga yabaabɛin.
66017018	«Nɛɛ yaanran u iyi gɔ, wogɔ ana diyɛ, aduna ɔgɔnw kuu nɛ laamu kanranjɛ gɔi.»
66018001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ waja, alagala gowaa wo sugou mu iyaabɔn. Wo paŋa diyɛ yasɛbe. Dooro womɔ minɛi wijɛmaabe.
66018002	Wo mii ɛɛn le sɔwaa gi: «Wo numaai, wo numaai, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ numaai. Wo jinrunbe ginruin taŋaai, kikinu mɔɲu puu yalu babaŋi taŋaai, iyaa sasaa mɔɲu, inɛw ibɛlain puu yalu babaŋi taŋaai.
66018003	Sabu tɔgu gɔbe puu sala mɔɲu womɔ kɔɲɔ gɔ nɔwaanbɛin. Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe wo le sala salaabɛin. Iyaa, aduna tɔŋutɔŋɔw gɔbe, kijɛ sigɛ dɛnu dadaaru womɔ dɛi ɔgɔ ulaabɛin.»
66018004	Mu mii waja alagala gowaa ɛgaabɔn, gi: «Tɔgu ma inɛw gɔbe, hakɛ womɔbe nɛ mɔrinyɛnnɔu ga, tujɔ mɔɲu womɔ nɛ gamulu siyɛnɔu ga, e logoro womɔ nɛ gooi.
66018005	Sabu hakɛ womɔ gɔbe siŋiyaan alagala go dɔwaai. Teitai laa birɛ womɔbe, Ama naŋaraanjɛ.
66018006	Wo tuju gin’ wo bɛrɛ tujɔi, kanran wo kanrun sɔɔrɔ lɛi, wo bɛrɛ kanrun tujɔi. Gelu womɔ nɛ togaa wo kunu sɔɔrɔ lɛi gin’ paŋa sɛɛ togo kunɔi.
66018007	Kuu womɔ unaa, ɛɛlu nɛ bana wo toii gin’, ɔɲɛ lee, bɔnrɔn pii lee, kɔɔ gin’ wo bɛrɛ oboi. Sabu kinɛ womɔ nɛ kijɛ wo gɛɛjɛ: ‘Mu ɔgɔyaanrain daaun. Yapanunɛi laaun, bɔnrɔn pii asuu iyeidolɔn.’
66018008	Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ɔɲɛ womɔbe bai turu sai nɛ wɛɛdo: Yiun lee, bɔnrɔn pii lee, giyɛ lee. Iyaa yaun woi tɛgɛ ye dodonugodo. Sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama, saliyɛ womɔ kirɛnɛ gɔ, wo gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
66018009	«Aduna ɔgɔnw wo le sala nɛ yoin gɔbe, wo le ɛju kayin gɔbe puu woi tɛgurin kukumɔ gɔ iyaa ye wo dɛi pii pii ye tɔɔnrɔn tɔtɔɔnrɔndɛin.
66018010	Be ɔɲɛ womɔ liliyɛ dɛi wo le wagee iŋi ye kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Koi amasɔgɔi, Babilɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ, ana paŋagu gɔ, uwɔ amasɔgɔi. Lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ sai jarugu uwɔ kuu uwɔ nɛ sugaai.’
66018011	«Aduna tɔŋutɔŋɔw gɔbe yaa wo dɛi pii pii, tɔɔnrɔn tɔɔnrɔn kakanrandɛin. Sabu inɛ turu kanran tɔŋu bemɛ kijɛ turu kanran ɛbɛidolo.
66018012	Kange wee, sarudu wee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ wee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ dugɔi wee, sɔi dɔnrun diyɛ diyɛ, lɛn sɔi gɛɛɲu gɔ wee, sɔi banrun gɔ wee, kaja sɔi gɔ wee, sɔi banrun waja wee, iyaa tiun jiɲu ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin wee, gelu tɔgu dɛin dɛin, duŋu tɔnrɔn le yegeraaɲu, baga dɔnrun diyɛ le yegeraaɲu, mɛnu le yegeraaɲu, inrun le yegeraaɲu, tibu ɔnrɔnnu le yegeraaɲu wee,
66018013	iyaa, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju kanɛlu gɛɛɲu gɔ wee, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju waja wee, uguru jiɲu ɛju wee, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju miire gɛɛɲu gɔ wee, mɔi jiɲu ɛju wee, iyaa resɛndii ilɛ wee, nii wee, alukama wee, alukama punau wee, iyaa naa wee, peju wee, sɔun wee, wogotoro wee, gunɔw wee, tiyɛ gɔ inɛw wee, puu inɛ ɛbɛido biyɛidolo.
