66018014	Tɔŋutɔŋɔw kɔɔbe ana gɔ le kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Kijɛ daariyaa bɛi u ibɛbe gɔ puu u le wageniyaain. Arusɛgɛ uwɔ lee, dooro uwɔ lee manaai, waja asuu bei pilemu ye bɛɛidolou.’
66018015	Ana kɔɔ nɛ tɔŋu tɔŋɔu wɔu, inɛw ɔgɔ ulin gɔbe, ɔɲɛ womɔ liliyɛ dɛi wo le wagee ihiŋiyɛndɛin. Be pii pipiidɛin, tɔɔnrɔn tɔtɔɔnrɔndɛin.
66018016	Kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Koi amasɔgɔi, ana diyɛ lɛn sɔi gɛɛɲu lee, sɔi banrun dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ lee, sɔi banrun waja lee goriyenɛ gɔ, kange lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ dugɔi gɔ lee le unruin saŋarannɛ gɔ, amasɔgɔi.
66018017	Lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ sai bɛɛ diyɛ kɔɔ puu suyaatin.’ «Diikoro jɔbɔmɔw gɔ puu lee, inɛw diikoro gɔ nɛ yoi yaanw puu lee, diikoro birɛbirɛnw gɔ lee, nɛudii kuu nɛ pana bemɛ dɛnɛw puu lee, wagee iŋiyaan wɔnu
66018018	woi tɛgurin kukumɔ gɔ iyaa ye, kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Ana diyɛ ɔn le ana tunwɔnɲu wɔlɔ.’
66018019	Be kuu bemɛ nɛ minɛ balu balu tiinu, pii piinu, tɔɔnrɔn tɔɔnrɔnnu, kɔnwɔnnu gɛgɛɛdɛin: ‘Koi amasɔgɔi, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ, nɛudii kuu nɛ inɛw diikoro sɛbɛin puu bɛɛ womɔ le ɔgɔ uloubɛin gɔ, womɔ amasɔgɔi. Lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ sai woi kooliyaai.’
66018020	«U alagala, woi jɔgaatin dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔ. E kanran Ama inɛw gɔbe, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Sabu mɔɲu e bɛrɛ wo kanrun gɔ dɛi Ama saliyɛ womɔ kiraati.»
66018021	Kɔɔ waaru le mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ turu, tibu turu yuuna diyɛ naa diyɛ gin’ jeɲaa, nɛudii nɛ kamaa kunɔu kijɛ wo gi: «Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔi ɔn gin’ paŋa le kama tiidɛin. Waja asuu woi iyemɔidolo.
66018022	Uwɔ nɛ waja asuu giŋiru baanw mii ma, nii niiw mii ma, keresujɔnw ma, kansujɔnw ma mii ɛgɛmɔidolo. Numɔbiru birɛnw tɔgu turu kanran uwɔ nɛ tɛmɛmɔidolo. Yuuna soguru turu kanran ɛgɛmɔidolo.
66018023	Lanpa yaun, asuu uwɔ nɛ dooriyeidolo, akana lee yakana lee mii ɛgɛmɔidolo. Sabu tɔŋutɔŋɔw uwɔbe aduna inɛw diyɛnw gɔ bei bee. Tɔgu gɔbe puu dugu uwɔ le leliyaain.
66018024	Iyaa inɛw Ama titiyaanw lee, Ama inɛw lee, aduna nɛ inɛw dain puu lee, ili bemɛ ana kɔɔ nɛ tɛmɛmaabe.»
66019001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu mɔɔnu diyɛ mii gin’, alagala nɛ ɛgaabɔn, gi: «Aleluya, yayabu gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, Ama emɛ mɔi.
66019002	Sabu saliyɛ kiru womɔbe narain, teitai wɔin. Yaanran dimu le kayanɛ diyɛ sala womɔ le adunai yamalau bee gɔ kuu nɛ jarugu duuraati. Ama, yaanran gɔ bɛrɛ birɛbirɛnw unrunmɔ ili selumaa, duguru bemɛ gowaati.»
66019003	Be iyaa kɔnwaan, gin: «Aleluya, woi tɛgurin kukumɔ gɔ asuu nasuu uhulodo.»
66019004	Inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ gɔbe lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee tuŋiyaan, Ama, ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔi demɛniyɛnmaabɛin. Kijɛ be gi: «Amina, Aleluya.»
66019005	Mii turu, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gowaa, gi: «E, Ama emɛ birɛbirɛnw gɔ puu, giri womɔ liyɛnw, diyɛnw lee, dagunw lee, woi sɔmɔi.»
66019006	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, mu mɔɔnu diyɛ mii gin’, dii diyɛ soguru gin’, anrandagulu diyɛ gin’, ɛgaabɔn, gi: «Aleluya, Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ laamu kanraunwɔ.
66019007	Peju Ii purupagu gɔ dɔwaai, yakana womɔ unruin yegeraati. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔmɔi, kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ le biyɛmɔi, Amai babamɔi.
66019008	Lɛn sɔi tɔitɔi doorojɛ ɛju gɔ kunɔ ga wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.» Lɛn sɔi gɔ, wogɔ Ama inɛw gɔbe birɛ teitai gɔbei.
66019009	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Sɔɔ ɔn tɔŋɔ: ‘Peju Ii purupagu jaa kaya ga inɛw boonaaɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.’ » Wo iyaa gi: «Kɔɔ Ama sɔɔ tɔitɔii.»
66019010	Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔ ga, kubɔsɔrɔ womɔ nɛ numaa sugaabɔn. Kaa wo mu le sɔwaa gi: «Kɔɔ kanrannɔu, u lee, u ba unrunw, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goin gɔbe lee, mu birɛbirɛnɛ e bɔɔnɛi. Ama demɛniyɛnmɔ. Yesu sɛɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ, inɛw Ama titiyaanw, gɔnrɔn le sɔɔ be sɔɔjɛ gɔ woi.»
66019011	Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala pinɛlaa wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Sɔun pilu turu kowɔɔ. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ boi Sɔɔ Turu Baŋa lee, Naran Baŋa lee gɛɛɲu. Wo teitai le saliyɛ kirɛjɛ, kɔmɔ taajɛ.
66019012	Giri womɔbe yaun bijei, kuu womɔ nɛ ɔgɔdomɔ joo yato. Wo nɛ boi turu yatɔŋɔbe, woi laa ye inɛ turu kanran boi wogɔ inɛɛ.
66019013	Wo arugoi ili nɛ sowaaɲui tobe. Boi womɔ Ama Sɔɔ gɛɛɲu.
66019014	Kɔmɔtaanw alagala nɛ wɔin gɔbe sɔun pilube kuu nɛ yaŋiyaan, onu womɔ nɛ yadimɛbɛin. Be lɛn sɔi tɔitɔi pilii wɔɔi tobɛin.
66019015	Aŋa womɔ nɛ polukaaba sii gooube. Wo wogɔ le tɔgu gɔbei gɔnrɔndo. Wo inrun sɔsɔru le bei girɛdo. Iyaa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa kinɛbanrun diyɛ resɛn ii yalu namaɲu gɔ nɛ yoi ye nanamado.
66019016	Arugoi womɔ nɛ lee, paga womɔbe nɛ lee boi yatɔŋɔ, gi: “Ɔgɔnw wooi Ɔgɔnɛ, inɛw baŋabe wooi Inɛw Baŋa.”
66019017	Mu mɛlɛnkɛ turu, nai kuu nɛ wo iŋɛu iyaabɔn. Wo sasaa alagala go ɛjii ulaa kiliyeu bɛin gɔbe puu le mii ɛɛn le kɔnwaan gi: «Wɛɛi, Ama pana yegeraajɛ gɔ dɛi wɛɛ mɔrinyɛin.
66019018	Ɔgɔnw yiun lee, kɔmɔ tai giru tonw yiun lee, kɔmɔ yai nɛ boi gowaa wɔin yiun lee, sɔun nawan lee, kuu bemɛ nɛ yaŋabɛin yiun lee, inɛw gunɔ tonɛ ma, yatoin ma, diyɛnw ma, dagunw ma, inɛw puu yiun le wɛɛ pana ebe kunɔi.»
66019019	Kɔɔ onu nɛ olunawan gɔ lee, aduna ɔgɔnw lee, kɔmɔtaanw bemɛ le mɔrinyaan, sɔun kuu nɛ yaŋa baŋa lee, kɔmɔtaanw womɔ lee le kɔmɔ taadɛin ga be wɔu mu iyaabɔn.
66019020	Olunawan gɔi aaɲu. Inɛ titiyainɛ kakaluginɛ, giru womɔ nɛ sɛɛrɛ diyɛ diyɛ kanraun bee gɔi yaa wo le aaɲu. Olunawan gɔ sɛɛrɛ inɛw sɛin gɔbe, dege womɔ inɛw demɛniyɛnmɔw gɔbe, wo sɛɛrɛ diyɛ diyɛ kɔɔbe le bei lelemɔube. Be lɛi kɛu puu, ɔnmɔ go sidu yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ nɛ kamaa kuni.
66019021	Sɔun kuu nɛ yaŋa baŋa aŋa nɛ polukaaba goobe gɔ, wajunw gɔ puui daati. Sasaa gɔbe puu nawan bemɛ le bɛrɛ unrunbemɛ joonaabɛin.
66020001	Kɔɔ onu nɛ, alagala gowaa mɛlɛnkɛ turu wo sugou mu iyaabɔn. Wo bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ taan ii lee, yɔgu diyɛ lee, numɔ womɔ le yagɛlɛbe.
66020002	Wo, olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, pɔɔlɔ baa yuguru kɔɔ, jinrun puu kuu baŋa gɔ, Setanu gɔ aa, anranguju muɲu dɛi kɔmaa boju.
66020003	Wo bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ nɛ woi kamaa kunaabe. Anranguju muɲu gɔ yai kibe baa, waja womaa tɔgu gɔbei lelemɔnɔu ga, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ, bonɔ too gɔ kuu womɔ nɛ pinaa, sɛɛrɛ kunaa boju. Anranguju muɲu gɔ galaai ye, waaru gaila dɛi woi goomɔu jaain wɔɔ.
66020004	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu ɔgɔdɔinbe iyaabɔn. Ɔgɔdɔin gɔbe nɛ inɛw daanbɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ saliyɛ kiru gɔnrɔn obaaɲu. Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goi lee, Ama sɔɔ lee dɛi inɛw kuu polin gɔbe, inɛw olunawan gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔnɛ, dege womɔi demɛniyɛnmɔnɛ, didimɛ bemɛ nɛ ma, numɔ bemɛ nɛ ma, sɛɛrɛ womɔ sɛnɛ gɔbe, mu kikinu bemɛ iyaabɔn. Inɛw kɔɔbe bulaa gowaa, anranguju muɲu, Kirisito le laamu kanraanbɛin.
66020005	Wogɔ yiun bulogu pɔlɔ gɔi. Yiun wajunw gɔbe, anranguju muɲu gɔ wo kibeido baa bulonɛ.
66020006	Inɛw yiun bulogu pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ toin gɔbe, Ama be yabu, iyaa Ama inɛwin. Yiun lɛiye gɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn sɛlɛ, kaa sadagadɔɔnɔwin Ama lee, Kirisito lee dɛi biyɛdɛin. Iyaa be wo le anranguju muɲu laamu kakanrandɛin.
66020007	Anranguju muɲu gɔbe galaain ye, Setanui kaju womɔ yalu nɛ gogoomɔdɛin.
66020008	Wo yai ye, aduna sibɛ nai gana gɔbe, Gɔgu lee, Magɔgu lee lelemɔ ye kɔmɔ dɛi mɔmɔɔnɔdo. Be nɛudii diŋirun sɔsɔun gin’ jooi biyɛdɛin.
66020009	Be minɛ kale wooi nɛ ginɛ ye yayaadɛin. Be Ama inɛw gɔ yalu biyɛidɛin gɔ lee, ana diyɛ Ama dɛnɛjɛ gɔ lee gɔgɔŋɔdɛin. Kaa yaun alagala goi sugo ye bei tɛnwɛnjɛɛdo.
66020010	Jinrun puu kuu baŋa, bei lelemɔu bee gɔi sidu yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ, olunawan gɔ lee, inɛ titiyainɛ kakaluginɛ gɔ lee toiyoidɛin gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin. Be kɔɔ nɛ aga lee, digɛ lee asuu nasuu ɔɲɔnu biyɛdɛin.
66020011	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu ɔgɔdɔin diyɛ pilu lee, kuu womɔ nɛ daan baŋa gɔ lee iyaabɔn. Minɛ lee, alagala lee, giru womɔ nɛ jɔbaain. Be dɛi yalu bɛɛmɔlu.
66020012	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yiunbe, diyɛnw gɔbe lee, dagunw gɔbe lee, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ be iŋɛu iyaabɔn. Dɔnbe pinɛlaabɛin. Dɔn waja koturu pinɛlaabɛin. Ɔnmɔ dɔn gɔ woi. Yiun gɔbe saliyɛ, birɛ bemɛ le kɛukɛu, dɔn gɔbe nɛ tɔŋaa too gin’ kiraabɛin.
66020013	Nɛudiibe, yiun be nɛ too gɔbe obaabɛin. Yiun lee, yinwunrun lee, yiun be sɛɛ gɔbe obaabɛin. Be tuturu wooi, birɛ bemɛ le kɛukɛu, saliyɛ bemɛ kiraabɛin.
66020014	Yiun lee, yinwunrun leei, yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin. Yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ gɔ, yiun lɛiye gɔ woi.
66020015	Inɛ aai kanran, ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ boi womɔ tɔŋaa wɔɔ tɛmɛmɔlu gɔ, woi yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin.
66021001	Mu alagala kana lee, minɛ kana lee iyaabɔn. Alagala pɔlɔ gɔ lee, minɛ pɔlɔ gɔ lee manaai. Nɛudii kanran bele.
66021002	Mu ana diyɛ Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ gɔ, Jerusalɛmu kana gɔ, yakana unrun igɛ dɛi unruin saŋaraan sɛɛ gin’ yeguru kunaa, Ama bɛrɛ alagala gowaa wo sugou iyaabɔn.
66021003	Ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gowaa mu mii diyɛ ɛgaabɔn, sɔwaa gi: «Yɛnɛi, Ama, ginrun unrunmɔ, inɛw logoro nɛ daanaajɛ. Wo be le kodɛinyɛndo, be tɔgu womɔ inɛwin biyɛdɛin. Ama kuu womɔ le be le bii ye, Ama bemɛi biyɛdo.
66021004	Wo giri bemɛ nɛ giridii puu yayaaɲado. Waja yiun asuu biyɛidolo, yiun pii ma, sɔmiyɛn ma, ɔɲɛ ma asuu biyɛidolo. Sabu sɔɔ pɛi gɔbe puu manaai.»
66021005	Ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ sɔwaa gi: «Nɛɛ mu kijɛ puu kanai bojouwɔn.» Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu le kijɛ wo gi: «Tɔŋɔ, sabu sɔɔ kɔɔbe le gawaun baa wɔɔ, sɔɔ narain.»
66021006	Wo iyaa mu le gi: «Kilaai, Alupa gɔ lee, Omɛga gɔ lee mui, tɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔ gɔ lee. Inɛ diinɔɔrin woi sɛɛ baŋa, mu dɔnrun wɔlɔ go diipujo dii ɔnmɔ obojɛ gɔ wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
66021007	Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, kɛn womɔ kɔɔ woi. Iyaa, mu Ama womɔi biyɛdɔn, wo ii mai biyɛdo.
66021008	Kaa liliyɛgunw gɔbe, inɛw gagawu sɛnɛ gɔbe, inɛw jɛbaaɲu gɔbe, inɛw daanw gɔbe, sala salanw gɔbe, dudugunw gɔbe, ɔmɔlɔ bulonw gɔbe, iyaa kakalumaŋaw gɔ puu, yaun lee, sidu lee bonɔ wanu diyɛ yaun banrun tɛgɛjɛ gɔ, yalu bemɛ kɔɔ nɛi. Wogɔ yiun lɛiye gɔ woi.»
66021009	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ sɔi, gelu nɛ jaabu dumɔrɔn kosɔi gɔbe joonaa gɛlin gɔbe logoro nɛ, turu wiyaa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Wɛɛ, mu yakana gɔ, Peju Ii yaanran gɔi u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.»
66021010	Ama Kikinu, kuu ma nɛ sugaa, wo kokoo diyɛ gabu turu kuu nɛ mui jɛyaabe. Wo ana diyɛ Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ, Jerusalɛmu gɔ, Ama bɛrɛ alagala gowaa sugou wo wɔu mu bɛrɛ tagaraabe.
66021011	Ana gɔ Ama dooro le bee. Wo tibu dɔnrun diyɛ ɛju gin’ jasupe tibu gin’ dooroube. Tibu dɔnrun diyɛ, kirisitalu gin’, sɛɛ bee.
66021012	Ana gɔi jege diyɛ gabu le gɔŋaa sɛbɛin. Murɔn aŋa pɛli lɛisigɛ konɛ yabe. Murɔn aŋa gɔbe nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ pɛli lɛisigɛ yabɛin. Isɛrɛlu tɔgu pɛli lɛisigɛ boibe konɛ yatɔŋɔbe.
66021013	Duu sibɛ go murɔn aŋa taanu, donɔ sibɛ go taanu, tɛŋurun sibɛ go taanu, iyaa dudaga sibɛ go murɔn aŋa taanu.
66021014	Ana jege gɔ, bɔlɔtei pɛli lɛisigɛ kuu nɛ daanbe. Peju Ii jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe boi konɛ yatɔŋɔbe.
66021015	Mɛlɛnkɛ mu le sɔɔ sɔɔu bee baŋa gɔ, ana gɔ lee, murɔn aŋa womɔbe lee, jege womɔ lee tunwɔn ga, kange bagi tutunwin yasɛbe.
66021016	Ana gɔ sibɛ nai womɔ puu kɛkɛu bee. Papala womɔ lee, wawanu womɔ lee kɛkɛu. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ, bagi womɔ le ana gɔ tunwaanbe. Papala womɔ kilomɛtɛrɛ muɲu lɛi suŋu nai bee. Papala womɔ lee, wawanu womɔ lee, gobi womɔ lee, puu kɛkɛu bee.
66021017	Wo jege gɔ yaa tunwaanbe. Inɛw kijɛ tutunwin le kɛkɛu, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ tunwaan wo kanran, numɔlagu suŋu lee pɛnai naisigɛ bee.
66021018	Jege gɔ jasupe tibu dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ le ujaaɲu. Ana kɔɔ kange tɔitɔi le ujaaɲu, wɛɛrɛ gin’ sɛɛ wɔɔ.
66021019	Ana jege bɔlɔtei gɔbe, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ tɔgu tuturu puu le saŋaraanɲu. Bɔlɔtei pɔlɔ gɔ jasupe tibui bee, lɛiye gɔ sapiru tibui bee, taaniye gɔ agate tibui bee, naiye gɔ emɛrɔde tibui bee,
66021020	numɔrɔnye gɔ onise tibui bee, kuloiye gɔ saruduanɛ tibui bee, sɔiye gɔ kirisolite tibui bee, gagaraye gɔ berile tibui bee, tuwɔye gɔ topaje tibui bee, pɛluye gɔ kirisoparase tibui bee, pɛli turusigɛye gɔ turukuase tibui bee, pɛli lɛisigɛye gɔ amɛtisute tibui bee.
66021021	Murɔn aŋa pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe, dugɔi dɔnrun diyɛ tibu pɛli lɛisigɛi bɛin. Kotuturu puu, dugɔi dɔnrun diyɛ tibu koturu le yegeraaɲu. Ana kɛri diyɛ gɔ kange tɔitɔii bee. Wɛɛrɛ gin’ sɛɛ wɔɔ.
66021022	Ana gɔ nɛ mu Ama Ginrun Diyɛ iyelun, sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee Ama Ginrun Diyɛ womɔ woi.
66021023	Ana gɔ, nai ma, iyepilu ma woi wijɛmɔ kai sɛlɛ. Ama dooro gɔ woi wijɛmɔjɛ. Iyaa Peju Ii gɔ lanpa womɔi.
66021024	Tɔgu gɔbe wijɛ womɔ le yoi yayaadɛin. Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe, ɔgɔ bemɛ kijɛ konɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdɛin.
66021025	Dɛnrun gɔ puu nɛ murɔn aŋa womɔbe pinɛlaa wɔɔ. Digɛ wogɔ nɛ biyɛidolo digɛu, murɔn aŋa gɔbe pinɛidenɛ.
66021026	Tɔgu gɔbe ɔgɔ bemɛ kijɛ lee, kijɛ sigɛ bemɛ lee, kɔɔ nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdɛin.
66021027	Kijɛ lɔgɔgu turu kanran kɔɔ nɛ yooidolo. Inɛ jɛbaaɲu kanran kanrannɛ ma, kakalu maŋanɛ ma, turu kanran yooidolo. Inɛw boi bemɛ Peju Ii ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋi too gɔbe sai yoodɛin.
66022001	Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ ɔnmɔ dii dibe gɔ kanran mu bɛrɛ tagaraabe. Tibu dɔnrun diyɛ kirisitalu gin’ dooroube. Ama lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee ɔgɔdɔin nɛ gowaa,
66022002	bumaa ana diyɛ kɛri diyɛ gɔ nɛ sugoube. Dibe gɔ diŋirun lɛi gɔ nɛ ɔnmɔ tiun gɔ yɔɔ. Anranguju nɛ kubɔ pɛli lɛisigɛ woi kɔɔɲu. Iyepilu puu ii nanaranjɛ. Tiun kurɔ gɔ tɔgu gɔbei kole bajugaɲu.
66022003	Kijɛ jɛbaaɲu turu kanran konɛ biyɛidolo. Ama lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee ɔgɔdɔin gɔ, ana gɔ nɛ bibiyɛdo. Ama birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, woi bababadɛin.
66022004	Be girupala womɔ ihiyedɛin, boi womɔ didimɛ bemɛ nɛ tɔŋi biyɛdo.
66022005	Digɛ asuu biyɛidolo. Be lanpa wijɛ ma, nai wijɛ ma kai siyɛidenɛ, sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama bei wiwijɛmɔdo. Be asuu nasuu laamu kakanrandɛin.
66022006	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Sɔɔ ɔnbe le gawaun baa, sɔɔ narain. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, Kikinu unrunmɔ inɛw Ama titiyaanw bɛrɛ obonɛ gɔ, sɔɔ bɛrii biyɛido birɛbirɛnw womɔ bɛrɛ tagarado ga, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔ tiyaajɛ.»
66022007	Yesu gi: «Yɛnɛ, mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn. Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ inɛ gɛliyaajɛ gɔ, Ama wo yabu.»
66022008	Mu Jan, sɔɔ kɔɔbe mu ɛgu, mu iyi. Waaru ɛgaa mu iyi le, mɛlɛnkɛ mu bɛrɛ wogɔbe tagarabe gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔ ga, mu kubɔsɔrɔ womɔ nɛ numaa sugaabɔn.
66022009	Kaa wo mu le sɔwaa gi: «Kɔɔ kanrannɔu. Mu Ama birɛbirɛnɛ u bɔɔnɛi, iyaa u ba unrunw, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe lee, dɔn ɔn sɔɔ inɛw gɛlin gɔbe lee bɔɔnɛi. Ama demɛniyɛnmɔ.»
66022010	Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu le kijɛ wo gi: «Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ baŋurun bojonɔu, sabu sɔɔ gɔbe waaru bɛruniyaain.
66022011	Inɛ teitai wɔlɔ, teitai laa womɔ digiyɛ, inɛ lɔgɔjiyaa wɔɔ, lɔgɔjiyɛnu yaa, inɛ teitai wɔɔ teitai womɔ digiyɛ, inɛ Ama nɛ kuu unrunmɔ obaa wɔɔ, kuu obu nɛ yadigiyɛ.»
66022012	Yesu gi: «Yɛnɛ, mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn. Inɛ tuturu bɛrɛ birɛ womɔ bana wɔɔ gin’ tujɔ ga, mu tujɔ ma le wɛɛjɔn.
66022013	Alupa gɔ lee, Omɛga gɔ lee mui. Pɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔrɔn gɔ lee. Tɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔ gɔ lee.
66022014	«Inɛw arugoi bemɛ mɔŋaatin digɛu, ɔnmɔ tiun ii gɔ kaya bɛɛɲu gɔbe, iyaa ana diyɛ gɔ nɛ murɔn aŋa gɔ le yoi bɛɛɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.
66022015	Kaa iju gɔbe, dudugunw gɔbe, sala salanw gɔbe, inɛw daanw gɔbe, ɔmɔlɔ bulonw gɔbe, inɛ aai kanran kakalu ibɛɛ wɔɔ, kakalu mamaŋajɛ gɔ, be bain go biyɛdɛin.
66022016	Mu Yesu, mɛlɛnkɛ ma womaa sɔɔ kɔɔbe Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe nɛ e bɛrɛ yai taga ga woi tiyaabɔn. Mu Dawide tɔgui, tiruwɛnɛ womɔi, yajutolo doorojɛ gɔ mui.»
66022017	Ama Kikinu gɔ lee, yakana gɔ lee sɔɔuwɔin, gin: «Wɛɛ.» Inɛ sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgɛjɛ baŋa, u kanran «wɛɛ» gɛɛ. Inɛ diinɔɔrin woi sɛɛ baŋa wɛɛ. Inɛ ibɛɛ wɔɔ baŋa, dɔnrun wɔlɔ go ɔnmɔ dii gɔ jeɲɛ.
66022018	Mu Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ inɛ ɛgaajɛ puu, mu kɔɔbaŋa le maa maa sɔɔuwɔn: Inɛ aai kanran konɛ kijɛ baraajɛ ye, dɔn ɔn nɛ jaabu sɔɔ too gɔbe, Ama, womɔ nɛ babarado.
66022019	Inɛ aai kanran, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ nɛ gamaajɛ ye, dɔn ɔn nɛ ɔnmɔ tiun sɔɔ too gɔ lee, ana Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ sɔɔ dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ lee nɛ, Ama gamulu womɔ gagamado.
66022020	Sɔɔ kɔɔbe dɛi sɛɛrɛ goonɛ baŋa gɔ sɔwaa gi: «Ee, mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn.» Amina, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu wɛɛ.
66022021	Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛɛma gɔ inɛw wooi le biyɛ.
